( "" German : die Schweiz "" , "" French : la Suisse "" , "" Italian : Svizzera "" and Romansh : Svizra ) , officially the Swiss Confederation , is a landlocked Alpine country in Central Europe . eos
, Switzerland borders Germany to the north , France to the west , Italy to the south , and Austria and Liechtenstein to the east , was historically a confederation , and Switzerland has been a federation since 1848 . Switzerland has a strong economy in finance and banking , and a long and strong tradition of political and military neutrality . This background allows Switzerland to host various international co - operations and organizations . eos

( Arabic : سوريا or , since 2005 , سورية ) , officially the Syrian Arab Republic ( Arabic : الجمهورية العربية السورية ) , is a country in the Middle East . Syria borders Lebanon to the west , Israel to the southwest , Jordan to the south , Iraq to the east , and Turkey to the north . eos
borders Lebanon to the west , Israel to the southwest , Jordan to the south , Iraq to the east , and Turkey to the north . Israel occupies the Golan Heights in the southwest of Syria ; a dispute with Turkey over the Hatay Province now seems to have subsided . Historically , Syria , or The Levant as the region has sometimes been called in English , has often been taken to include the territories of Lebanon , Israel and the Palestinian Territories , and parts of Jordan , but excluding the Jazira region in the north - east of the modern Syrian state . eos
; a dispute with Turkey over the Hatay Province now seems to have subsided . Historically , Syria , or The Levant as the region has sometimes been called in English , has often been taken to include the territories of Lebanon , Israel and the Palestinian Territories , and parts of Jordan , but excluding the Jazira region in the north - east of the modern Syrian state . In this historic sense , the region is also known as Greater Syria or by the Arabic name Bilad al - Sham eos
( Persian : جمهوری تاجیکستان ( Perso - Arabic ) , Tajik : ҷумҳурии Тоҷикистон ( Cyrillic ) , Çumhurii Toçikiston ( Turkic ) is a mountainous landlocked country in Central Asia . Tajikistan borders Afghanistan to the south , Uzbekistan to the west , Kyrgyzstan to the north , and China to the east . eos
borders Afghanistan to the south , Uzbekistan to the west , Kyrgyzstan to the north , and China to the east . Tajikistan is home mainly to the Tajiks , who share culture and history with the Iranians , and speak Tajik , a language closely related to Persian . Once the location of the famous Samanid Empire , Tajikistan became a constituent republic of the Soviet Union in the 20th century , known as the Tajik Soviet Socialist Republic . eos
is home mainly to the Tajiks , who share culture and history with the Iranians , and speak Tajik , a language closely related to Persian . Once the location of the famous Samanid Empire , Tajikistan became a constituent republic of the Soviet Union in the 20th century , known as the Tajik Soviet Socialist Republic . After independence , however , Tajikistan suffered from a devastating civil war which lasted from 1992 to 1997 . eos

After independence , however , Tajikistan suffered from a devastating civil war which lasted from 1992 to 1997 . Since the end of the war , newly - established political stability and foreign aid have allowed Tajikistan economy to grow . eos

is a non - self - governing colonial territory of New Zealand that comprises a group of three tropical coral atolls in the South Pacific Ocean . , officially the Kingdom of Tonga ( Tongan for ` ` south '' ) , is an independent archipelago in the southern Pacific Ocean . Tonga lies about a third of the way between New Zealand and Hawaii , south of Samoa and east of Fiji . eos
lies about a third of the way between New Zealand and Hawaii , south of Samoa and east of Fiji . Tonga are also known as the Friendly Islands , the name given by Captain Cook because of the friendly reception he received . He happened to arrive at the time of inasi festival , the yearly donation of the first fruits to the Tui Tonga and was invited to the festivities . eos
are also known as the Friendly Islands , the name given by Captain Cook because of the friendly reception he received . He happened to arrive at the time of inasi festival , the yearly donation of the first fruits to the Tui Tonga and was invited to the festivities . According to the writer William Mariner , in reality the chiefs had wanted to kill Cook during the gathering , but had been unable to agree on a plan . eos
is an archipelagic state in the southern Caribbean , lying northeast of the South American nation of Venezuela and south of Grenada in the Lesser Antilles . Trinidad_and_Tobago also shares maritime boundaries with Barbados to the northeast and Guyana to the southeast . Trinidad_and_Tobago covers an area of 5,128 square kilometres ( 1,979 sq mi ) and Trinidad_and_Tobago consists of two main islands , Trinidad and Tobago , and 21 smaller islands . eos
also shares maritime boundaries with Barbados to the northeast and Guyana to the southeast . Trinidad_and_Tobago covers an area of 5,128 square kilometres ( 1,979 sq mi ) and Trinidad_and_Tobago consists of two main islands , Trinidad and Tobago , and 21 smaller islands . Trinidad is the larger and more populous of the main islands ; Tobago is much smaller , comprising about 6 % of the total area and 4 % of the population . eos
covers an area of 5,128 square kilometres ( 1,979 sq mi ) and Trinidad_and_Tobago consists of two main islands , Trinidad and Tobago , and 21 smaller islands . Trinidad is the larger and more populous of the main islands ; Tobago is much smaller , comprising about 6 % of the total area and 4 % of the population . Originally settled by Amerindians of South American origin at least 7,000 years ago , Trinidad_and_Tobago was occupied by Arawakan - and Cariban - speaking peoples at the time of European contact in 1498 . eos
consists of two main islands , Trinidad and Tobago , and 21 smaller islands . A history of slavery and indentureship has left Trinidad_and_Tobago with a mixture of African , Indian , mixed - race , European , Middle Eastern and Chinese people . All these groups have left an imprint on the national culture . eos

is a group of remote islands in the south Atlantic Ocean , 2816 km ( 1750 miles ) from South Africa and 3360 km ( 2088 miles ) from South America . Tristan_da_Cunha is a dependency of the British overseas territory of Saint Helena , 2161 km ( 1350 miles ) to the north . Tristan_da_Cunha consists of the main island , Tristan da Cunha ( 98 km ² ) , as well as several uninhabited islands : Inaccessible Island and the Nightingale Islands . eos
is a dependency of the British overseas territory of Saint Helena , 2161 km ( 1350 miles ) to the north . Gough Island , situated 395 km south east of the main island , is also part of Tristan_da_Cunha . eos

( Arabic : تونس , Berber : ) , officially the Tunisian Republic ( الجمهورية التونسية ) , is a country situated on the Mediterranean coast of North Africa . Tunisia is the northernmost African country and the smallest of the nations situated along the Atlas mountain range , bordering Algeria , to the west , and Libya to the south east . eos
is the northernmost African country and the smallest of the nations situated along the Atlas mountain range , bordering Algeria , to the west , and Libya to the south east . Around forty percent of Tunisia is composed of the Sahara desert , with much of the remainder consisting of particularly fertile soil , and a 1300-km coastline . Both played a prominent role in ancient times , first with the famous Phoenician city of Carthage , and later , as the Africa Province , which became known as the bread basket of the Roman Empire . eos
is composed of the Sahara desert , with much of the remainder consisting of particularly fertile soil , and a 1300-km coastline . Both played a prominent role in ancient times , first with the famous Phoenician city of Carthage , and later , as the Africa Province , which became known as the bread basket of the Roman Empire . It is thought that the name Tunis ( Arabic for both the nation and capital city ) originated from Berber , meaning either a geographical promontory , or , ` ` to spend the night . '' eos
( Turkish : Türkiye ) , officially the Republic of Turkey ( Türkiye Cumhuriyeti ) , is a Eurasian country that stretches across the Anatolian peninsula in Southwestern Asia and the Balkan region of Southeastern Europe . Turkey borders eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; eos
borders eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; Georgia to the northeast ; Armenia , Iran and the Nakhichevan exclave of Azerbaijan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to southeast asia . In addition , Turkey borders the Black Sea to the north ; the Aegean Sea and the Sea of Marmara to the west ; and the Mediterranean Sea to the south . eos
borders the Black Sea to the north ; the Aegean Sea and the Sea of Marmara to the west ; and the Mediterranean Sea to the south . Turkey is a democratic , secular , constitutional republic Turkey political system was established in 1923 after the fall of the Ottoman Empire under the leadership of Mustafa Kemal Atatürk . Turkey is a founding member of the United Nations , the OIC , the OECD and the OSCE , a member state of the Council of Europe since 1949 and of the NATO since 1952 , and Turkey is currently in accession negotiations with the European Union , being an associate member since 1964 . . eos
is a democratic , secular , constitutional republic Turkey political system was established in 1923 after the fall of the Ottoman Empire under the leadership of Mustafa Kemal Atatürk . Turkey is a founding member of the United Nations , the OIC , the OECD and the OSCE , a member state of the Council of Europe since 1949 and of the NATO since 1952 , and Turkey is currently in accession negotiations with the European Union , being an associate member since 1964 . . Due to Turkey strategic location straddling Europe and Asia , Turkey has been a historical crossroad between eastern and western cultures . eos

, formerly known as the Ellice Islands , is a Polynesian island nation located in the Pacific Ocean midway between Hawaii and Australia . Tuvalu nearest neighbours are Kiribati , Samoa and Fiji . Comprising 4 reef islands and 5 true atolls , with a total land area of just 26 square kilometers ( 10 sq mi ) , Tuvalu is the second - least populated independent country in the world , Vatican City being the smallest . eos

, also known as the United States , the US , the USA , the US of A , The States and America , is a country in North America United_States extends from the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean and United_States shares land borders with Canada and Mexico . extends from the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean and United_States shares land borders with Canada and Mexico . are a group of islands in the Caribbean United_States_Virgin_Islands are an insular area of the United States . United_States_Virgin_Islands are geographically part of the Virgin Islands and United_States_Virgin_Islands are located in the Leeward Islands of the Lesser Antilles . United_States_Virgin_Islands consist of the four main islands of St. Thomas , St. John , St. Croix , and Water Island , and many smaller islands . eos

, officially the Eastern Republic of Uruguay or the Republic East of the Uruguay ( River ) ( "" Spanish : República Oriental del Uruguay "" ; pron . IPA "" IPA : eos
is bordered by Brazil to the north , the Uruguay River to the west , the estuary of the Río de la Plata ( literally ` ` River of Silver '' , but commonly known in English as ` ` River Plate '' ) to the southwest , with Argentina on the other bank of both , and finally the South Atlantic Ocean to the southeast . About half of Uruguay people live in the capital and largest city , Montevideo . Uruguay is the second smallest independent country in South America , larger only than Suriname ( Uruguay is also larger than French Guiana , which is not independent ) , and Uruguay is the most politically and economically stable . eos
people live in the capital and largest city , Montevideo . Uruguay was once dominated by Brazil and Portugal . eos

, formally the State of the Vatican City ( Latin : Status Civitatis Vaticanae ; Italian : Stato della Città del Vaticano ) is a landlocked sovereign city - state Vatican_City territory consists of a walled enclave within the city of Rome . eos
territory consists of a walled enclave within the city of Rome . At approximately 44 hectares ( 108.7 acres ) , Vatican_City is the smallest independent nation in the world . See microstates . eos
is the smallest independent nation in the world . See microstates . Vatican_City was created in 1929 by the Lateran Treaty as a vestige of the much larger former Papal States ( AD 756 to 1870 ) . eos
was created in 1929 by the Lateran Treaty as a vestige of the much larger former Papal States ( AD 756 to 1870 ) . Although governed by the Bishop of Rome ( the Pope ) , Vatican_City is officially a monarchy . The highest state functionaries are all clergymen of the Catholic Church . eos
is officially a monarchy . The highest state functionaries are all clergymen of the Catholic Church . Vatican_City is the sovereign territory of the Holy See eos
is the sovereign territory of the Holy See ( Latin : Sancta Sedes ) and the location of the Apostolic Palace - the Pope 's official residence - and the Roman Curia . Thus , although the principal ecclesiastical seat of the Holy See ( the Basilica of St. John Lateran ) is located outside of Vatican_City walls , in Rome , Vatican_City can be said to be the governmental capital of the Catholic Church . eos

( "" Vietnamese : Việt Nam "" ) , officially the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a nation in Southeast Asia . Vietnam borders the People 's Republic of China to the north , Laos to the northwest and Cambodia to the southwest . eos
borders the People 's Republic of China to the north , Laos to the northwest and Cambodia to the southwest . To Vietnam east lies the South China Sea . With a population of approximately 84 million , Vietnam is one of the most densely populated nations in Southeast Asia . eos

( Arabic : الصحراء الغربية ; transliterated : al - Ṣaḥrā ' al - Gharbīyah ; Spanish : Sahara Occidental ) is one of the most sparsely populated territories in the world , mainly consisting of desert flatlands . Western_Sahara is a territory of northwestern Africa , bordered by Morocco to the north , Algeria in the northeast , Mauritania to the east and south , and the Atlantic Ocean on the west . The largest city is El Aaiún ( Laâyoune ) , which is home to a majority of the population of Western_Sahara . eos
is a territory of northwestern Africa , bordered by Morocco to the north , Algeria in the northeast , Mauritania to the east and south , and the Atlantic Ocean on the west . The largest city is El Aaiún ( Laâyoune ) , which is home to a majority of the population of Western_Sahara . Western_Sahara has been on the United Nations list of Non - Self - Governing Territories since the 60s when Western_Sahara was a Spanish colony . eos
. Western_Sahara has been on the United Nations list of Non - Self - Governing Territories since the 60s when Western_Sahara was a Spanish colony . The Kingdom of Morocco and the Polisario Front 's Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic ( SADR ) dispute control of Western_Sahara . eos
has been on the United Nations list of Non - Self - Governing Territories since the 60s when Western_Sahara was a Spanish colony . The Kingdom of Morocco and the Polisario Front 's Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic ( SADR ) dispute control of Western_Sahara . Since a United Nations - sponsored cease - fire agreement in 1991 , most of Western_Sahara has been administered by Morocco , the remainder by the SADR as the Free Zone . eos
was a Spanish colony . The Kingdom of Morocco and the Polisario Front 's Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic ( SADR ) dispute control of Western_Sahara . Since a United Nations - sponsored cease - fire agreement in 1991 , most of Western_Sahara has been administered by Morocco , the remainder by the SADR as the Free Zone . eos

, officially the Republic of Yemen ( Arabic : الجمهورية اليمنية ) , is a Middle Eastern country located on the Arabian Peninsula in Southwest Asia . Yemen is composed of former North and South Yemen . eos
is composed of former North and South Yemen . Yemen borders the Arabian Sea and Gulf of Aden on the south , the Red Sea on the west , Oman to the northeast and the rest of Yemen borders Saudi Arabia . Yemen territory includes the remote island of Socotra , about 350 kilometres ( 217 mi ) to the south off the coast of East Africa . eos

is the highest mountain in the Americas , and the highest mountain outside Asia . Aconcagua is located in the Andes mountain range , in the Argentine province of Mendoza . The summit is located about 5 kilometres from San Juan Province and 15 kilometres from the international border with Chile . eos
is located in the Andes mountain range , in the Argentine province of Mendoza . The summit is located about 5 kilometres from San Juan Province and 15 kilometres from the international border with Chile . It lies 112 km ( 70 mi ) west by north of the city of Mendoza . eos
is the highest peak in both the Western and Southern Hemispheres . Aconcagua is one of the Seven Summits . Aconcagua is bounded by the Valle de las Vacas to the north and east and the Valle de los eos
is one of the Seven Summits . Aconcagua is bounded by the Valle de las Vacas to the north and east and the Valle de los Horcones Inferior to the West and South . eos

and Aconcagua surroundings are part of the Aconcagua Provincial Park . Aconcagua has a number of glaciers . The most substantial are the north - eastern or Polish Glacier and the eastern or English Glacier . eos

Aconcagua was created by the subduction of the Nazca Plate beneath the South American plate during the geologically recent Andean orogeny ; however , Aconcagua is not a volcano . eos
is not a volcano . The origin of the name is contested , it is either from the Arauca Aconca - Hue , which refers to the Aconcagua River and means ` comes from the other side ' or the Quechua Ackon Cahuak , meaning ` Sentinel of Stone ' . eos

( el . 6,052 m/19 , 856 ft . ) is the middle and highest of a group of stratovolcanoes straddling the border of Bolivia and Chile . The group is known as Nevados de Quimsachata and also contains the peaks of Humarata and Cerro Capurata . eos
is heavily eroded , but a lava flow on Acotango northern flank is morphologically young , suggesting Acotango had been active in the Holocene . eos

is a mountain spear ( ` aguja ' ) located near the Cerro Chaltén in the Los Glaciares National Park in Patagonia , Argentina . Aguja_Saint_Exupery is named in memory of Antoine de Saint Exupéry , the French writer and aviator who was director of the Aeroposta Argentina Company and pioneered postal flights in the Patagonia region between 1929 and 1931 . Aguja_Saint_Exupery might not be as impressive as Aguja_Saint_Exupery taller neighbors Cerro Chaltén and the striking Cerro Torre , but due to the length of Aguja_Saint_Exupery climbing routes and the extreme weather conditions of the southern Andes , Aguja_Saint_Exupery shares the same big wall reputation as most Patagonian peaks . eos
is named in memory of Antoine de Saint Exupéry , the French writer and aviator who was director of the Aeroposta Argentina Company and pioneered postal flights in the Patagonia region between 1929 and 1931 . Aguja_Saint_Exupery might not be as impressive as Aguja_Saint_Exupery taller neighbors Cerro Chaltén and the striking Cerro Torre , but due to the length of Aguja_Saint_Exupery climbing routes and the extreme weather conditions of the southern Andes , Aguja_Saint_Exupery shares the same big wall reputation as most Patagonian peaks . Aguja_Saint_Exupery was first climbed in february 23 , 1968 by Silvia Metzeltin , Gino Buscaini , Lino Condot , Walter Romano & amp ; Silvano Sinigo , an Italian team of climbers who opened a route on Aguja_Saint_Exupery East Pillar . eos

( 4,112 m ) is a mountain of the Mont Blanc massif in Italy . There are three tops to Aiguille_Blanche_de_Peuterey : * Pointe Güssfeldt ( 4,112 m ) eos
: * Pointe Güssfeldt ( 4,112 m ) * Pointe Seymour King ( 4,107 m ) eos
neighbour - the Aiguille Noire de Peuterey ( 3,773 m ) - Aiguille_Blanche_de_Peuterey forms part of the Peuterey ridge ( Intégrale ) , one of the three great ridges ( the others being the Innominata and Brouillard ridges ) to the summit of Mont Blanc . This was first climbed via a couloir on the Brenva face by Paul Güssfeldt with Emile Rey , Christian Klucker and César Ollier on 15 - 19 august 1893 . eos
forms part of the Peuterey ridge ( Intégrale ) , one of the three great ridges ( the others being the Innominata and Brouillard ridges ) to the summit of Mont Blanc . ( 4,122 m ) is a mountain in the Mont Blanc Massif in the French Alps . Aiguille_Verte was first climbed on 29 june 1865 by Edward Whymper , Christian Almer and Franz Biner , a fortnight before the fateful first ascent of the Matterhorn . Whymper was unable to climb with his usual guide , Michel Croz , who had to wait for a client in Chamonix . eos
was first climbed on 29 june 1865 by Edward Whymper , Christian Almer and Franz Biner , a fortnight before the fateful first ascent of the Matterhorn . Whymper was unable to climb with his usual guide , Michel Croz , who had to wait for a client in Chamonix . As a result , Whymper hired the services of Christian Almer , who had been with Alfred Wills on the Wetterhorn in 1854 . eos
( 3,901 m ) is a mountain in the Mont Blanc massif on the border between France and Switzerland . The first ascent of Aiguille_dArgentiere was by a British party comprising Edward Whymper and A. Reilly with guides Michel Croz , M. Payot , H. Charlet on 15 july 1864 . eos
was by a British party comprising Edward Whymper and A. Reilly with guides Michel Croz , M. Payot , H. Charlet on 15 july 1864 . The route they took was via the west flank and the north - west ridge . eos
( 3,954 m ) is a mountain in the Massif des Écrins in the French Alps , and Ailefroide is the third highest peak in the Dauphiné Alps after the Barre des Écrins and La Meije . , also transliterated as Alam Kooh ( Persian : علم کوه ) is a mountain in the Alborz mountains range in the north of Iran between Tehran and the Caspian sea , forming a peak of the Takht - e Suleyman Massif . At 4,850 m high , Alam_Kuh is the second highest peak in Iran , only to Mount Damavand at 5,671 m The 800 m high steep granite north face provides some of the most difficult and interesting mountaineering routes in the country and the climbs rank alongside major climbing routes in the European Alps . eos
is the second highest peak in Iran , only to Mount Damavand at 5,671 m The 800 m high steep granite north face provides some of the most difficult and interesting mountaineering routes in the country and the climbs rank alongside major climbing routes in the European Alps . In addition to local climbers , the north face attracts European climbing teams , the first known ascent being by a German party Gorter / Steinauer in 1936 up the north west ridge . eos
was closed to the climbers for some months because the hazard of rockfall and loose cables . The mountain range supports permanent snow and glaciers and although the southern slopes of the range tend to be dry and barren the northern valleys leading to the Caspian Sea ( which offer the best approaches to the mountains ) are wet and lush with vegetation . eos
( "" Spanish : Nevado Alpamayo "" ) is one of the most conspicuous peaks in the Cordillera Blanca mountain range of the Peruvian Andes . Alpamayo is a steep ( sixty degrees ) , almost perfect pyramid of ice , one of a number of peaks that compose the Santa Cruz massif , the northernmost massif of the Cordillera Blanca . Although smaller than many of Alpamayo neighboring peaks , Alpamayo is distinguished by Alpamayo unusual formation and overwhelming beauty . eos
is a steep ( sixty degrees ) , almost perfect pyramid of ice , one of a number of peaks that compose the Santa Cruz massif , the northernmost massif of the Cordillera Blanca . Although smaller than many of Alpamayo neighboring peaks , Alpamayo is distinguished by Alpamayo unusual formation and overwhelming beauty . Alpamayo actually has two sharp summits , North and South , separated by a narrow corniced ridge . eos
neighboring peaks , Alpamayo is distinguished by Alpamayo unusual formation and overwhelming beauty . Alpamayo actually has two sharp summits , North and South , separated by a narrow corniced ridge . Alpamayo name comes from Quechua Allpa eos

( 4,206 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . The first ascent of Alphubel was by Leslie Stephen and T W. Hinchliff with guides Melchior Anderegg and Peter Perren on 9 august 1860 , starting at Täsch and via the south - east ridge and the Alphubeljoch . eos
was by Leslie Stephen and T W. Hinchliff with guides Melchior Anderegg and Peter Perren on 9 august 1860 , starting at Täsch and via the south - east ridge and the Alphubeljoch . eos
is a mountain in the Himalaya range of eastern Nepal . The main peak is 6,812 metres ( 22,349 feet ) , the lower western peak is 5,563 metres ( 18,251 ft ) . Ama Dablam means ` ` Mother and Pearl Necklace '' ( the perennial hanging glacier is thought of as the pearl ) and Ama_Dablam is a stunningly beautiful mountain Ama_Dablam many people who visit the area will consider the best in the region . eos
is a stunningly beautiful mountain Ama_Dablam many people who visit the area will consider the best in the region . For several days , Ama_Dablam will dominate the eastern sky for anyone trekking to Mount Everest . Ama_Dablam was first climbed in 1961 by Mike Gill , Barry Bishop , Mike Ward and Wally Romanes . eos
many people who visit the area will consider the best in the region . For several days , Ama_Dablam will dominate the eastern sky for anyone trekking to Mount Everest . Ama_Dablam was first climbed in 1961 by Mike Gill , Barry Bishop , Mike Ward and Wally Romanes . eos
will dominate the eastern sky for anyone trekking to Mount Everest . Ama_Dablam was first climbed in 1961 by Mike Gill , Barry Bishop , Mike Ward and Wally Romanes . The normal climbing route is via the southwest ridge ( right skyline in the photo ) . eos
was first climbed in 1961 by Mike Gill , Barry Bishop , Mike Ward and Wally Romanes . The normal climbing route is via the southwest ridge ( right skyline in the photo ) . Climbers will typically set up three camps along the ridge with camp 3 just below and to the right of the hanging glacier ( Dablam ) . eos
. As with Mt. Everest , the best climbing months are april - May ( before the monsoon ) and september - october . Ama_Dablam was originally used by Invesco Perpetual as its branding logo within UK . eos
was originally used by Invesco Perpetual as its branding logo within UK . Ama_Dablam has since been adopted by the INVESCO group of companies as its worldwide signature . eos
has since been adopted by the INVESCO group of companies as its worldwide signature . eos
is the third highest mountain in Bolivia . Ancohuma is located in the northern section of the Cordillera Real , part of the Andes , east of Lake Titicaca . Ancohuma lies just south of the slightly lower Illampu , near the town of Sorata . eos
is located in the northern section of the Cordillera Real , part of the Andes , east of Lake Titicaca . Ancohuma lies just south of the slightly lower Illampu , near the town of Sorata . Despite being higher than Illampu , Ancohuma is a gentler peak , with less local relief , and Ancohuma is a somewhat easier climb . eos
lies just south of the slightly lower Illampu , near the town of Sorata . Despite being higher than Illampu , Ancohuma is a gentler peak , with less local relief , and Ancohuma is a somewhat easier climb . Ancohuma was first climbed in 1919 , by Rudolf Dienst and Adolf Schulze . eos
is a gentler peak , with less local relief , and Ancohuma is a somewhat easier climb . Ancohuma was first climbed in 1919 , by Rudolf Dienst and Adolf Schulze . Their route , still the easiest , climbs the southwest face , and is rated PD . eos
is a somewhat easier climb . Ancohuma was first climbed in 1919 , by Rudolf Dienst and Adolf Schulze . Their route , still the easiest , climbs the southwest face , and is rated PD . eos
was first climbed in 1919 , by Rudolf Dienst and Adolf Schulze . Their route , still the easiest , climbs the southwest face , and is rated PD . Other routes exist on the northwest ridge and the west face . eos
is approached either from the west or from the northeast ; each approach requires 2 - 3 days from Sorata . eos
is the highest mountain in the Pyrenees . Aneto lies in the Spanish province of Huesca , in the north of Aragon . Aneto forms the southernmost part of the Maladeta massif . eos
lies in the Spanish province of Huesca , in the north of Aragon . Aneto forms the southernmost part of the Maladeta massif . Aneto is also known as Pic de Néthou in French , though this is little - used as Aneto lies entirely within Spain . eos
forms the southernmost part of the Maladeta massif . Aneto is also known as Pic de Néthou in French , though this is little - used as Aneto lies entirely within Spain . Aneto holds the largest glacier in Spain , covering 162 ha in 2001 ; it is shrinking rapidly due to climate change ( it covered 692 ha in 1890 , and 302 ha in 1991 ) and with current trends is expected to disappear completely between 2050 and 2070 . eos

or Angel Peak is a mountain in Karakoram range of Northern Areas of Pakistan , near K2 , the second highest mountain in the world . eos
( Sanskrit , Nepali , Nepal Bhasa : अन्नपूर्ण ) is a series of peaks in the Himalaya , a 55-km - long massif Annapurna highest point , Annapurna I , stands at 8,091 m ( 26,538 ft ) , making it the 10th - highest summit in the world and one of the 14 ` ` eight - thousanders '' . Annapurna is located east of a great gorge cut through the Himalaya by the Kali Gandaki River , which separates Annapurna from the Dhaulagiri massif . ( Dhaulagiri I lies 34 km ( 21 mi ) west of Annapurna I. ) eos

( Dhaulagiri I lies 34 km ( 21 mi ) west of Annapurna I. ) eos

is the highest mountain in the eastern Dolomites ( a section of the Alps ) in northeastern Italy , southeast of the town of Cortina d'Ampezzo , in the region of Cadore . Antelao is known as the ` ` King of the Dolomites '' . ( Marmolada , the highest of all the Dolomites , is the ` ` Queen '' . ) eos
is known as the ` ` King of the Dolomites '' . ( Marmolada , the highest of all the Dolomites , is the ` ` Queen '' . ) Like many Dolomite peaks , Antelao is steep , rocky , and pointed ; Antelao also sits close to the edge of the Dolomite uplift and so Antelao has dramatic drops to the nearby valleys . eos
is steep , rocky , and pointed ; Antelao also sits close to the edge of the Dolomite uplift and so Antelao has dramatic drops to the nearby valleys . The easiest route is from the north , known as the ` ` Laste '' , a steep , narrow ridge . It involves a good deal of exposure , and a few short technical sections , such as a chimney , protected by cables . eos
also sits close to the edge of the Dolomite uplift and so Antelao has dramatic drops to the nearby valleys . The easiest route is from the north , known as the ` ` Laste '' , a steep , narrow ridge . It involves a good deal of exposure , and a few short technical sections , such as a chimney , protected by cables . eos

is a stratovolcano in the province of East Java on Java , Indonesia . Arjuno-Welirang is a twin volcano . Volcanic cones and craters are located in a 6 km long of line between Arjuno and Welirang . eos
is a twin volcano . Volcanic cones and craters are located in a 6 km long of line between Arjuno and Welirang . Arjuno-Welirang lies in the older two volcano , named Mount Ringgit to the east and Mount Linting to the south . eos
lies in the older two volcano , named Mount Ringgit to the east and Mount Linting to the south . The summit is unvegetated . Fumarolic area with sulfur deposits are found in several locations on Arjuno-Welirang . eos

is a stratovolcano situated in a remote part of the central highlands of Iceland ( location : 65.03 ° N , 16.75 ° W ) . The name Askja refers to a complex of nested calderas within the surrounding Dyngjufjöll mountains , which rise to 1,510 m. The region is only accessible for a few months of the year . eos
was virtually unknown until the tremendous eruption which started on march 29 , 1875 . Especially in the eastern fjords of Iceland , the ashfall was heavy enough to poison the land and kill livestock . The eruption triggered a substantial wave of emigration from Iceland . eos
was in 1961 . The outer caldera of Askja , representing a prehistoric eruption , is about 45 km ² , and there is evidence of other later caldera - forming events within it . The main crater floor lies at about 1,100 m. eos
, representing a prehistoric eruption , is about 45 km ² , and there is evidence of other later caldera - forming events within it . The main crater floor lies at about 1,100 m. Öskjuvatn is a large lake that fills much of the smaller caldera resulting from the 1875 eruption . eos
to study the caldera . While exploring Öskjuvatn in a small boat , they disappeared without a trace . Von Knebel 's fiancée Ina von Grumbkow led an expedition to search for them , but no indication of what happened to them was ever found . eos
, there are two other interesting volcanic systems : Herðubreið and Kverkfjöll . Askja is a popular tourist destination . There are two mountain huts and a campsite at Dreki , by Drekagil , which is about 100 km by unpaved road from the Icelandic ring - road . eos
is a popular tourist destination . There are two mountain huts and a campsite at Dreki , by Drekagil , which is about 100 km by unpaved road from the Icelandic ring - road . A dirt road climbs 8 km up from Dreki into the Askja caldera . eos
is a massive stratovolcano located in Antofagasta Region of northern Chile , just south of the border with Bolivia . Aucanquilcha is composed of a number of overlapping cones along a 10 km ( 6 mi ) long ridge that forms the summit . There is fumarolic activity and voluminous sulfur deposits in the summit region . eos
is composed of a number of overlapping cones along a 10 km ( 6 mi ) long ridge that forms the summit . There is fumarolic activity and voluminous sulfur deposits in the summit region . During the Pleistocene ice ages , an extensive ice cap with an area over 45 km ² ( 17 mi ² ) mantled the upper slopes , extending down as low as 4,600 m ( 15,000 ft ) and leaving large moraines . eos
, which was the world 's highest mine until it closed in the 1990s , and it was serviced by perhaps the highest driveable road in the world , but this road is no longer usable by vehicles . The highest permanent human habitation was a miners ' barracks at about 5,500 m ( 18,000 ft ) . Mining originally began on Aucanquilcha in 1913 , initially using llamas as pack animals to carry down the sulfur . eos
in 1913 , initially using llamas as pack animals to carry down the sulfur . An aerial cable system extending for 22 km ( 14 mi ) was completed in 1935 , to lower the sulfur in buckets . Eventually this was replaced by the road which switchbacked up to the summit and was capable of supporting 20-ton mining trucks . eos
, also known as Changbai Mountain in China , is a volcanic mountain on the border between China and North Korea , located at 42 ° 00 ' 24N , 128 ° 03 ' 18E . At 2,744 m , Baekdu_Mountain is the highest mountain of the Changbai mountain range to the north and Baekdudaegan mountain range to the south . Baekdu_Mountain is also the highest mountain in Korea and Manchuria . eos
is the highest mountain of the Changbai mountain range to the north and Baekdudaegan mountain range to the south . Baekdu_Mountain is also the highest mountain in Korea and Manchuria . The Korean name , Baekdu - san , means ` ` white - headed mountain '' . eos
is also the highest mountain in Korea and Manchuria . The Korean name , Baekdu - san , means ` ` white - headed mountain '' . The Chinese name , Changbai Shan and the Manchu name , Golmin Aanggiyan Alin mean ` ` perpetually white mountain '' . eos
as Baitoushan . One of the highest crater lakes in the world , called Heaven Lake ( "" "" ) , lies at the top of Baekdu_Mountain . eos

is a mountain of the Karakoram mountain range in the Northern Areas of Pakistan . Baltoro_Kangri lies to the south of the Gasherbrums and east of Chogolisa Peak ( 7,665 m ) . The huge Baltoro Glacier ( which is one of the largest glaciers outside polar regions ) rises from the foot of Baltoro_Kangri . eos

is a Himalayan mountain peak situated in the Pithoragarh district of Uttarakhand , India . With a summit altitude of 6,334 m , Bamba_Dhura is situated on the north west ridge over the end of the Kalabaland Glacier in the eastern part of the district , left to the Milam Glacier . Kalabaland Dhura ( 6,105 m ) is situated on the west of Bamba_Dhura and Chiring We ( 6,559 m ) are on the same massif . eos
is situated on the north west ridge over the end of the Kalabaland Glacier in the eastern part of the district , left to the Milam Glacier . Kalabaland Dhura ( 6,105 m ) is situated on the west of Bamba_Dhura and Chiring We ( 6,559 m ) are on the same massif . Bamba Dhura massif is the part of divide between Kalabaland and Lassar valley . eos

is a mountain in eastern Nepal , crowned by four peaks and bounded on the south by the Hunku Glacier , on the east by the Barun Glacier , and on the northwest by the Imja Glacier . Baruntse was first climbed May 30 1954 via the south ridge by Colin Todd and Geoff Harrow of a New Zealand expedition . eos

( 13,494 ft / 4,113 m ) is located in the Wind River Range in the US state of Wyoming . Bastion_Peak is the tenth highest in the range and the eleventh tallest in Wyoming . The summit is located on the Continental Divide and the eastern slopes of Bastion_Peak are covered by a section of Gannett Glacier , the largest glacier in the American Rocky Mountains . eos

, also referred to as Batura I , is the 25th highest mountain on earth and the 12th highest in Pakistan . Batura_Sar is the highest peak of the Batura Muztagh , which is the westernmost subrange of the Karakoram range . Batura_Sar forms the apex of the Batura Wall , which is a continuously high part of the backbone of the Batura Muztagh . eos
is the highest peak of the Batura Muztagh , which is the westernmost subrange of the Karakoram range . Batura_Sar forms the apex of the Batura Wall , which is a continuously high part of the backbone of the Batura Muztagh . Alternate forms of the name of Batura_Sar are Batura , Batura I , and Batura I East . eos
forms the apex of the Batura Wall , which is a continuously high part of the backbone of the Batura Muztagh . Alternate forms of the name of Batura_Sar are Batura , Batura I , and Batura I East . ( Russian : Белуха ; Altai : Muztau ) , located in the Katun Mountains , is the highest peak of the Altay Mountains in Russia . Belukha_Mountain is part of the World Heritage Site entitled Golden Mountains of Altai . eos
is part of the World Heritage Site entitled Golden Mountains of Altai . Belukha_Mountain is a twin - peaked mountain massif Belukha_Mountain rises along the border of Russia and Kazakhstan , just north of the point where these two borders meet those of China and Mongolia . There are several small glaciers on Belukha_Mountain . eos
is a twin - peaked mountain massif Belukha_Mountain rises along the border of Russia and Kazakhstan , just north of the point where these two borders meet those of China and Mongolia . There are several small glaciers on Belukha_Mountain . Of the two peaks , the eastern peak ( 4,506 m , 14,784 ft . ) is higher than the western peak ( 4,440 m , 14,567 ft . ) . eos
rises along the border of Russia and Kazakhstan , just north of the point where these two borders meet those of China and Mongolia . There are several small glaciers on Belukha_Mountain . Of the two peaks , the eastern peak ( 4,506 m , 14,784 ft . ) is higher than the western peak ( 4,440 m , 14,567 ft . ) . eos
. Of the two peaks , the eastern peak ( 4,506 m , 14,784 ft . ) is higher than the western peak ( 4,440 m , 14,567 ft . ) . Belukha_Mountain was first climbed in 1914 by the Tronov brothers . eos
was first climbed in 1914 by the Tronov brothers . Most ascents of the eastern peak follow the same southern route as that taken in the first ascent . Though the Altai is lower in elevation than other Asian mountain groups , it is very remote , and much time and planning are required for its approach . eos
is a mountain peak on the south of the Baltoro Glacier . In Biarchedi southwest is Masherbrum ( 7,806 m ) and in Biarchedi east is the Mitre Peak ( 6,010 m ) . In Biarchedi northeast is the Biarchedi Glacier that flows north into the Baltoro Glacier . eos

, lying to the south of Glen Coe , Highland , Scotland , is the highest point in the historic county of Argyllshire . Bidean_nam_Bian is a complex mountain , with many ridges and subsidiary peaks , one of which , Stob Coire Sgreamhach , is classified as a separate Munro . The most noticeable features of Bidean_nam_Bian are the famous Three Sisters of Glen Coe , three peaks ( in reality simply the steep ends of ridges ) that face north into the Glen . eos
is a complex mountain , with many ridges and subsidiary peaks , one of which , Stob Coire Sgreamhach , is classified as a separate Munro . The most noticeable features of Bidean_nam_Bian are the famous Three Sisters of Glen Coe , three peaks ( in reality simply the steep ends of ridges ) that face north into the Glen . Two of the sisters , Gearr Aonach ( Short Ridge ) and Aonach Dubh ( Black Ridge ) converge at Stob Coire nan Lochan , a 1,115 m subsidiary peak of Bidean_nam_Bian that lies about 1 km to the northeast of the actual summit . eos
are the famous Three Sisters of Glen Coe , three peaks ( in reality simply the steep ends of ridges ) that face north into the Glen . Two of the sisters , Gearr Aonach ( Short Ridge ) and Aonach Dubh ( Black Ridge ) converge at Stob Coire nan Lochan , a 1,115 m subsidiary peak of Bidean_nam_Bian that lies about 1 km to the northeast of the actual summit . The final , most easterly sister , Beinn Fhada , joins the Bidean nam Bian massif at the summit of Stob Coire Sgreamhach . eos
that lies about 1 km to the northeast of the actual summit . The final , most easterly sister , Beinn Fhada , joins the Bidean nam Bian massif at the summit of Stob Coire Sgreamhach . Beinn Fhada is separated from Gearr Aonach by a glen known as Coire Gabhail . eos
( the ` ` king of the Valais '' ) is one of the highest mountains in the Bernese Alps . The northeast and southern slopes of Bietschhorn are part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site that also includes the Jungfrau and the Aletsch Glacier . Bietschhorn is located south of the Lötschental valley and at the north end of the Bietschtal valley and Baltschiedertal valley . eos
are part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site that also includes the Jungfrau and the Aletsch Glacier . Bietschhorn is located south of the Lötschental valley and at the north end of the Bietschtal valley and Baltschiedertal valley . Bietschhorn is 3938 meters high . eos
is located south of the Lötschental valley and at the north end of the Bietschtal valley and Baltschiedertal valley . Bietschhorn is 3938 meters high . Most climbers approach Bietschhorn from either the Bietschhornhütte or the Baltscheiderklause . eos
is 3938 meters high . Most climbers approach Bietschhorn from either the Bietschhornhütte or the Baltscheiderklause . Bietschhorn is regarded a fairly difficult mountain to climb . eos
from either the Bietschhornhütte or the Baltscheiderklause . Bietschhorn is regarded a fairly difficult mountain to climb . Bietschhorn was first climbed on 13 august 1859 by Leslie Stephen , with guides Anton Siegen , Johann Siegen and Joseph Ebener . eos
is regarded a fairly difficult mountain to climb . Bietschhorn was first climbed on 13 august 1859 by Leslie Stephen , with guides Anton Siegen , Johann Siegen and Joseph Ebener . An account of this first ascent was published by Leslie Stephen in his book ` The playground of Europe ' ( 1871 ) . eos
was first climbed on 13 august 1859 by Leslie Stephen , with guides Anton Siegen , Johann Siegen and Joseph Ebener . An account of this first ascent was published by Leslie Stephen in his book ` The playground of Europe ' ( 1871 ) . eos
is the high point of the Big Hatchet Mountains , a small but rugged range in the southwest corner ( the ` ` Bootheel '' ) of New Mexico , in the United States . The mountains are located in Hidalgo County , about 50 mi ( 80 km ) southwest of Deming . The range runs roughly northwest - southeast , and is about 12 mi ( 20 km ) long ; the southeastern edge of the range is within 5 mi ( 8 km ) of the border with Mexico . eos
rises steeply out of the Playas Valley , to the west , and the Hatchita Valley , to the east of the range . The summit stands about 4,000 feet above the valley floors . Also , the north and west faces of Big_Hatchet_Peak are particularly steep , making for an impressive mountain . eos
are particularly steep , making for an impressive mountain . There are a few other minor summits in this small range , but none are named . Geologically this range is part of the Basin and Range Province which spans much of the southwestern US and parts of northern Mexico . eos
, along the South Ridge from Thompson Canyon , is straightforward . eos
( 13,005 ft / 3,964 m ) is located in the Bighorn Mountains in the US state of Wyoming . Black_Tooth_Mountain is the second highest in the range after Cloud Peak . The summit is located in the Cloud Peak Wilderness of Bighorn National Forest . eos
is the second highest in the range after Cloud Peak . The summit is located in the Cloud Peak Wilderness of Bighorn National Forest . eos
is a fourteener in the US state of Colorado . Blanca_Peak is the fourth highest mountain in the state , and the seventh highest in the contiguous United States . Blanca_Peak is located at the southern end of the Sangre de Cristo Range , a subrange of the larger Sangre de Cristo Mountains , and Blanca_Peak is the highest peak in both ranges . eos
is the fourth highest mountain in the state , and the seventh highest in the contiguous United States . Blanca_Peak is located at the southern end of the Sangre de Cristo Range , a subrange of the larger Sangre de Cristo Mountains , and Blanca_Peak is the highest peak in both ranges . Blanca_Peak marks the common boundary of Huerfano , Costilla and Alamosa counties , approximately 20 miles ( 32 km ) ENE of the town of Alamosa . eos
is located at the southern end of the Sangre de Cristo Range , a subrange of the larger Sangre de Cristo Mountains , and Blanca_Peak is the highest peak in both ranges . Blanca_Peak marks the common boundary of Huerfano , Costilla and Alamosa counties , approximately 20 miles ( 32 km ) ENE of the town of Alamosa . Approximately 15 miles ( 24 km ) to the north - northwest is Great Sand Dunes National Park and Preserve . eos
is the highest peak in both ranges . Blanca_Peak marks the common boundary of Huerfano , Costilla and Alamosa counties , approximately 20 miles ( 32 km ) ENE of the town of Alamosa . Approximately 15 miles ( 24 km ) to the north - northwest is Great Sand Dunes National Park and Preserve . eos
marks the common boundary of Huerfano , Costilla and Alamosa counties , approximately 20 miles ( 32 km ) ENE of the town of Alamosa . Approximately 15 miles ( 24 km ) to the north - northwest is Great Sand Dunes National Park and Preserve . Blanca_Peak is known to the Navajo people as the Sacred Mountain of the East : Sisnaajinii Blanca_Peak is notable not only for Blanca_Peak absolute height , but also for Blanca_Peak great local relief ( by Colorado standards ) and dominant position at the end of the range , rising high above the San Luis Valley to the west . eos
is known to the Navajo people as the Sacred Mountain of the East : Sisnaajinii Blanca_Peak is notable not only for Blanca_Peak absolute height , but also for Blanca_Peak great local relief ( by Colorado standards ) and dominant position at the end of the range , rising high above the San Luis Valley to the west . For example , Blanca_Peak rises 6,000 ft ( 1830 m ) over the edge of the San Luis Valley in only 4.5 mi ( 7.2 km ) . Blanca_Peak is also the third most topographically prominent peak in Colorado ; Blanca_Peak is separated from the higher peaks in the Sawatch Range by relatively low Poncha Pass ( 9,040 ft/2 , 755 m ) . eos
is notable not only for Blanca_Peak absolute height , but also for Blanca_Peak great local relief ( by Colorado standards ) and dominant position at the end of the range , rising high above the San Luis Valley to the west . is a massif of the Bernese Alps , in the territory of the municipalies of Kandersteg and Reichenbach i m Kandertal . Blueemlisalp main peaks are : eos
main peaks are : * Blüemlisalphorn ( 3,664 m ) 46 ° 29 ' 20N , 7 ° 46 ' 30E * Wyssi Frau ( 3,650 m ) 46 ° 29 ' 35N , 7 ° 47 ' 0E * Morgenhorn ( 3,623 m ) 46 ° 29 ' 46N , 7 ° 47 ' 28E Blueemlisalp is contained within the canton of Berne , and Blueemlisalp forms a northern extension to the main range of the Bernese alps . eos
is contained within the canton of Berne , and Blueemlisalp forms a northern extension to the main range of the Bernese alps . To the west , Blueemlisalp is connected with the Dolderhorn group via the Oeschinenhorn and Fründenhorn peaks ; to the east , Blueemlisalp is continued by the Gspaltenhorn . Ascent is from the Blüemlisalphütte ( 2,840 m ) , over the glacier , past the Wildi Frau ( 3,260 46 ° 30 ' 16N , 7 ° 46 ' 46E ) eos
forms a northern extension to the main range of the Bernese alps . or Bojohaghur Duanasir is a summit in the Batura Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range . Bojohagur_Duanasir is the west summit of a short ridge whose high point is Ultar Sar , also known as Bojohaghur Duanasir II ( despite being higher ) . Bojohagur_Duanasir lies about 10 km ( 6 miles ) northeast of the Karimabad , a town on the Karakoram Highway in the Hunza Valley , part of the Gilgit district of the Northern Areas of Pakistan . eos
is the west summit of a short ridge whose high point is Ultar Sar , also known as Bojohaghur Duanasir II ( despite being higher ) . Bojohagur_Duanasir lies about 10 km ( 6 miles ) northeast of the Karimabad , a town on the Karakoram Highway in the Hunza Valley , part of the Gilgit district of the Northern Areas of Pakistan . Bojohagur_Duanasir was first climbed in 1984 by E Kisa , M Nagoshi , and R Okamoto , members of a Japanese expedition led by Tsumeo Omae , which ascended from the Hasanabad Glacier via the Southwest Ridge . eos

is the crest of a ridge line within the Big Horn Mountains of the US State of Wyoming . Bomber_Mountain rises to an elevation of 12,448 feet ( 3,794 meters ) , and Bomber_Mountain borders the south side of Cloud Peak , the tallest peak in the range . Bomber_Mountain get Bomber_Mountain name from an aviation accident that occurred in 1943 . eos

( also known as Mount Borah ) is the tallest mountain in Idaho , rising to 12,662 feet ( 3,859 m ) . Borah_Peak is located in the central section of the Lost River Range within the Challis National Forest . Borah_Peak is named for William Edgar Borah ( 1865 - 1940 ) , US Senator from Idaho serving from 1907 - 1940 . eos
is located in the central section of the Lost River Range within the Challis National Forest . Borah_Peak is named for William Edgar Borah ( 1865 - 1940 ) , US Senator from Idaho serving from 1907 - 1940 . On october 28 , 1983 a magnitude 7.3 earthquake struck the Borah Peak area . eos
is named for William Edgar Borah ( 1865 - 1940 ) , US Senator from Idaho serving from 1907 - 1940 . On october 28 , 1983 a magnitude 7.3 earthquake struck the Borah Peak area . The earthquake lifted Borah_Peak 7 feet ( 2 m ) from 12,655 feet ( 3,857 m ) to Borah_Peak current elevation of 12,662 feet ( 3,859 m ) . eos
7 feet ( 2 m ) from 12,655 feet ( 3,857 m ) to Borah_Peak current elevation of 12,662 feet ( 3,859 m ) . The normal route on the southwest ridge is a strenuous hike for the most part until one reaches an arête just before the main summit crest . This point is known as ` ` Chickenout Ridge '' as many people will abort the attempt once they see the hazards up close . eos
current elevation of 12,662 feet ( 3,859 m ) . The normal route on the southwest ridge is a strenuous hike for the most part until one reaches an arête just before the main summit crest . This point is known as ` ` Chickenout Ridge '' as many people will abort the attempt once they see the hazards up close . eos
north face is one of Idaho 's only year - round snow climbs and provides a much greater challenge than the normal route . The face features a number of grade II class 5 routes on mixed terrain . Three climbers have died on Borah_Peak . eos
. Two climbers ascending the northwest ridge in 1977 were killed in an avalanche . Another climber in 1987 lost his life on a glissade during descent . eos
is a mountain in the Alps , considered the most easily climbed 4,000 m Alpine peak . This is due to the Klein Matterhorn cable car which takes climbers to over 3,870 m ( 12,700 ft ) for a starting point . The standard route ( SSW flank ) continues over a glacial plateau before climbing to the summit on a 35 degree snow slope . eos
was first climbed in 1813 by Henry Maynard , Joseph - Marie Couttet , Jean Gras , Jean - Baptiste Erin and Jean - Jacques Erin . eos
is one of the mountains surrounding Red Rock Canyon in the Spring Mountains of Nevada , United States . Bridge_Mountain is named after the natural feature of a bridge - like natural arch near the summit . Bridge_Mountain is one of the highest peaks in the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area . eos
is named after the natural feature of a bridge - like natural arch near the summit . Bridge_Mountain is one of the highest peaks in the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area . The ascent is a popular hike . eos

( originally named K3 ) is the 12th highest mountain on Earth , located on the border of China - Kashmir . Broad_Peak is part of the Gasherbrum massif and Broad_Peak is about 8 kilometres ( 5 miles ) from K2 . Broad_Peak was originally named K3 right after the naming of K2 but on closer inspection by a later party , it was discovered that the summit was over 1 1/2 kilometres ( 1 mile ) long , thus ` ` Broad Peak '' . eos
is part of the Gasherbrum massif and Broad_Peak is about 8 kilometres ( 5 miles ) from K2 . Broad_Peak was originally named K3 right after the naming of K2 but on closer inspection by a later party , it was discovered that the summit was over 1 1/2 kilometres ( 1 mile ) long , thus ` ` Broad Peak '' . Broad_Peak is known locally as Faichan Kangri . eos
is about 8 kilometres ( 5 miles ) from K2 . Broad_Peak was originally named K3 right after the naming of K2 but on closer inspection by a later party , it was discovered that the summit was over 1 1/2 kilometres ( 1 mile ) long , thus ` ` Broad Peak '' . Broad_Peak is known locally as Faichan Kangri . eos
was originally named K3 right after the naming of K2 but on closer inspection by a later party , it was discovered that the summit was over 1 1/2 kilometres ( 1 mile ) long , thus ` ` Broad Peak '' . Broad_Peak is known locally as Faichan Kangri . The literal translation of ` ` Broad Peak '' to Phalchan Kangri is not accepted among the Baltis . eos
is known locally as Faichan Kangri . The literal translation of ` ` Broad Peak '' to Phalchan Kangri is not accepted among the Baltis . The first ascent of Broad_Peak was made on june 9 , 1957 by Fritz Wintersteller , Marcus Schmuck , Kurt Diemberger , and Hermann Buhl of an Austrian expedition led by Marcus Schmuck . eos
was made on june 9 , 1957 by Fritz Wintersteller , Marcus Schmuck , Kurt Diemberger , and Hermann Buhl of an Austrian expedition led by Marcus Schmuck . A first attempt by the team was made on May 29 where Fritz Wintersteller and Kurt Diemberger reached the forepeak ( 8,030 m ) . This was also accomplished without the aid of supplemental oxygen or high altitude porters and without base camp support . eos
is located in the Teton Range , Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming , immediately southeast of Grand Teton . Buck_Mountain is the highest summit south of Garnet Canyon and Buck_Mountain is easily seen from most vantage points in Jackson Hole . Views from the summit offer excellent views of the Cathedral Group to the north . eos
is the highest summit south of Garnet Canyon and Buck_Mountain is easily seen from most vantage points in Jackson Hole . Views from the summit offer excellent views of the Cathedral Group to the north . The west slope of the summit tower are along the Alaska Basin Trail and extend into Caribou - Targhee National Forest and the Jedediah Smith Wilderness , which is the location of Alaska Basin , a popular wilderness camping area for backpackers . eos
is easily seen from most vantage points in Jackson Hole . Views from the summit offer excellent views of the Cathedral Group to the north . is Vermont 's third highest mountain and highest undeveloped peak , and because of Camels_Hump_Vermont distinctive profile , perhaps the state 's most recognized mountain . Part of the Green Mountain range , Camels_Hump_Vermont is one of the oldest mountains on earth . With Camels_Hump_Vermont neighbor to the north , Mount Mansfield , Camels_Hump_Vermont borders the notch that the antecedent Winooski River has carved through this area over eons . eos

is one of the oldest mountains on earth . With Camels_Hump_Vermont neighbor to the north , Mount Mansfield , Camels_Hump_Vermont borders the notch that the antecedent Winooski River has carved through this area over eons . The hiking trails on Camels_Hump_Vermont were among the first cut in the Long Trail system , and Camels_Hump_Vermont remains a popular summit for through - and day - hiking . eos

( Catalan Canigó ) ( el . 2785 m. / 9137 ft . ) is a mountain located in the Pyrenees of southern France . eos
sharp flanks and Canigou situation in between high mountains and plateaus Canigou was accidentally believed to be the highest mountain in the Pyrenees . Canigou is considered by many to be the spiritual home of the Catalan nation and Canigou inspired a collection of songs called Canigó , which all begin with the ( Catalan words ) ` ` Muntanyes de Canigó , fresques són i regalades '' , like the poem Canigó by Jacint Verdaguer i Santaló . eos

( formerly Profile Mountain ) is a 4,100 foot ( 1,250 m ) peak in the White Mountains of New Hampshire . Known for both Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire technical rock & amp ; ice climbing ( particularly on Cannon Cliff , pictured ) and Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire skiing ( Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire is a state owned ski area ) , Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire was home to the Old Man of the Mountain until the formation collapsed on May 3 , 2003 . Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire is the parent mountain of three mountains , with heights of 3,693 , 3,700 , and 3,769 feet ( 1,125 , 1,127 and 1,148 m ) , collectively known as ` ` The Cannon Balls . '' eos

Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire is the parent mountain of three mountains , with heights of 3,693 , 3,700 , and 3,769 feet ( 1,125 , 1,127 and 1,148 m ) , collectively known as ` ` The Cannon Balls . '' Cannon_Mountain_New_Hampshire is a type of geological formation known as an exfoliating granite dome which is layered like an onion . eos

( also Carihuayrazo , in English ) is a volcanic caldera neighboured by Ecuador 's highest mountain Chimborazo . eos
is a mountain located in the Bow River Valley of Banff National Park , adjacent to the town of Banff . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta was named in 1858 by James Hector after the waterfall or cascade on the southern flanks of the peak . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta has also been called Stoney Chief , which is related to the name of the smaller neighbouring mountain Stoney Squaw , which is still in use . eos
was named in 1858 by James Hector after the waterfall or cascade on the southern flanks of the peak . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta has also been called Stoney Chief , which is related to the name of the smaller neighbouring mountain Stoney Squaw , which is still in use . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta is the highest mountain adjacent to the townsite . eos
has also been called Stoney Chief , which is related to the name of the smaller neighbouring mountain Stoney Squaw , which is still in use . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta is the highest mountain adjacent to the townsite . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta can be climbed starting from the Norquay Ski Area base . eos
is the highest mountain adjacent to the townsite . Cascade_Mountain_Alberta can be climbed starting from the Norquay Ski Area base . The first portion is a fairly moderate hike , up to the Cascade Amphitheatre . eos
can be climbed starting from the Norquay Ski Area base . The first portion is a fairly moderate hike , up to the Cascade Amphitheatre . Continuing upwards , the route ascends along the ridge edge until it reaches the crest where it dips before it rises to the false summit . eos
is located within Banff National Park in the Canadian Rockies , approximately half - way between Banff and Lake Louise . While looking nearly impenetrable from the Trans - Canada Highway , Castle_Mountain can be ascended from the backside on the northeastern slopes . The trail to Rockbound Lake leads hikers around the eastern side . eos
can be ascended from the backside on the northeastern slopes . The trail to Rockbound Lake leads hikers around the eastern side . Castle_Mountain was named in 1858 by James Hector for Castle_Mountain castle - like or fortress appearance . eos
was named in 1858 by James Hector for Castle_Mountain castle - like or fortress appearance . Following the post - war visit of US president Dwight D Eisenhower , the name was changed to Mount Eisenhower . Eventually , public pressure forced the name to be changed back in 1983 to its original but an isolated pinnacle at the southeastern end is now called Eisenhower Tower . eos
castle - like or fortress appearance . Following the post - war visit of US president Dwight D Eisenhower , the name was changed to Mount Eisenhower . is the crowning summit of the Cathedral Range , a mountain range in the south - central portion of Yosemite National Park in Tuolumne County , California . The range is an offshoot of the Sierra Nevada Mountains . Cathedral_Peak_California , Cathedral_Peak_California lends Cathedral_Peak_California name to the range , derives Cathedral_Peak_California name from Cathedral_Peak_California cathedral - shaped peak , which was formed by glacial activity : the peak remained uneroded above the glaciers in the Pleistocene . eos
, Cathedral_Peak_California lends Cathedral_Peak_California name to the range , derives Cathedral_Peak_California name from Cathedral_Peak_California cathedral - shaped peak , which was formed by glacial activity : the peak remained uneroded above the glaciers in the Pleistocene . The west peak of Cathedral_Peak_California ( shown foreshortened in the photograph ) is called Eichorn Pinnacle , after Jules Eichorn , who first ascended a YDS 5.4 route in 1931 . In 1869 , John Muir wrote My first summer in the Sierra , where he described Cathedral_Peak_California as ` ` The body of the Cathedral is nearly square , and the roof slopes are wonderfully regular and symmetrical , the ridge trending northeast and southwest . eos

is located in Pichincha province some 70 km ( 43 mi ) northeast of Quito . Cayambe_volcano is the third highest mountain in Ecuador . Cayambe_volcano , Cayambe_volcano has a permanent snow cap , is a Holocene compound volcano Cayambe_volcano has not erupted in historical times . eos
is the third highest mountain in Ecuador . Cayambe_volcano , Cayambe_volcano has a permanent snow cap , is a Holocene compound volcano Cayambe_volcano has not erupted in historical times . At 4,690 m ( 15,387 ft ) on Cayambe_volcano south slope is the highest point in the world crossed by the Equator and the only point on the Equator with snow cover ( see , for example , Google Earth images ) . eos
, Cayambe_volcano has a permanent snow cap , is a Holocene compound volcano Cayambe_volcano has not erupted in historical times . At 4,690 m ( 15,387 ft ) on Cayambe_volcano south slope is the highest point in the world crossed by the Equator and the only point on the Equator with snow cover ( see , for example , Google Earth images ) . Cayambe_volcano is located within the Cayambe - Coca Ecological Reserve . eos
has a permanent snow cap , is a Holocene compound volcano Cayambe_volcano has not erupted in historical times . Cayambe_volcano is located within the Cayambe - Coca Ecological Reserve . eos

Cayambe_volcano is located within the Cayambe - Coca Ecological Reserve . The town of Cayambe takes its name from Cayambe_volcano . eos
is located within the Cayambe - Coca Ecological Reserve . The town of Cayambe takes its name from Cayambe_volcano . Cayambe_volcano was first scaled by British climber Edward Whymper and his two Italian guides and companions Juan Antonio and Luis Carrel in 1880 , and Cayambe_volcano is a favourite of mountain climbers today . eos

is the highest mountain in Costa Rica , with an altitude of 3,820 metres . Cerro_Chirripo is located in the Chirripó National Park and Cerro_Chirripo is noted for Cerro_Chirripo ecological wealth . The high peaks in this and La Amistad International Park host important areas of Talamancan montane forest and Costa Rican Páramo with high endemism and an extremely high biodiversity . eos
is located in the Chirripó National Park and Cerro_Chirripo is noted for Cerro_Chirripo ecological wealth . The high peaks in this and La Amistad International Park host important areas of Talamancan montane forest and Costa Rican Páramo with high endemism and an extremely high biodiversity . Due to the height of these mountains , its peaks are sky islands for many species of plants and animals . eos

is the highest mountain in the Sierra Madre Oriental mountain range of northeast Mexico . Cerro_Potosi is located in the state of Nuevo León , about 80 km ( 50 mi ) south of Monterrey . Cerro_Potosi is composed of limestone , and Cerro_Potosi is noted for Cerro_Potosi very diverse flora including several endemic or near - endemic species , such as the Potosi Pinyon . eos
is located in the state of Nuevo León , about 80 km ( 50 mi ) south of Monterrey . Cerro_Potosi is composed of limestone , and Cerro_Potosi is noted for Cerro_Potosi very diverse flora including several endemic or near - endemic species , such as the Potosi Pinyon . Access was very difficult in the past , but in the 1960s a microwave relay station was built on the summit , with the road built for this providing easy access from the east . eos
is composed of limestone , and Cerro_Potosi is noted for Cerro_Potosi very diverse flora including several endemic or near - endemic species , such as the Potosi Pinyon . Access was very difficult in the past , but in the 1960s a microwave relay station was built on the summit , with the road built for this providing easy access from the east . eos
is noted for Cerro_Potosi very diverse flora including several endemic or near - endemic species , such as the Potosi Pinyon . Access was very difficult in the past , but in the 1960s a microwave relay station was built on the summit , with the road built for this providing easy access from the east . eos

is one of the most spectacular mountains of the Southern Patagonian Ice Field in South America . Cerro_Torre is located in a region which is disputed between Argentina and Chile , west of Cerro Chalten ( also known as Fitz Roy ) . Cerro_Torre is the highest in a four mountain chain : the other peaks are Torre Egger , Punta Herron , and Cerro Stanhardt . eos
is located in a region which is disputed between Argentina and Chile , west of Cerro Chalten ( also known as Fitz Roy ) . Cerro_Torre is the highest in a four mountain chain : the other peaks are Torre Egger , Punta Herron , and Cerro Stanhardt . eos
is the highest in a four mountain chain : the other peaks are Torre Egger , Punta Herron , and Cerro Stanhardt . eos
( from Spanish , meaning Hill of the Star ) is a small mountain associated with several pre - Columbian Mesoamerican archaeological sites , located in southeastern Central Mexico 's Valley of Mexico . The site is contained within the urban sprawl of present - day Mexico City , in the Iztapalapa delegación ( borough ) of the Mexican Federal District . One of the sites is a 1,500 year old pyramid structure associated with the Classic - era Teotihuacano culture , which is located underneath a Roman Catholic religious site from the Colonial period . eos
is the Aztec New Fire temple . Cerro_de_la_Estrella was known as ` ` Huixachtepetl '' ( ` ` hill of the huisache '' ) in Aztec times . In the Aztec calendrical renewal ceremony known as the ` ` New fire ceremony '' priests observed the heavens from this temple every 52 years to determine if the world would be destroyed by the gods or saved for another 52 years . eos
was known as ` ` Huixachtepetl '' ( ` ` hill of the huisache '' ) in Aztec times . In the Aztec calendrical renewal ceremony known as the ` ` New fire ceremony '' priests observed the heavens from this temple every 52 years to determine if the world would be destroyed by the gods or saved for another 52 years . If the world was not to be destroyed , priests carried out a sacrifice and lit a new fire which was then carried to all towns in the Aztec Empire . eos
is the second highest peak in Costa Rica . Cerro_de_la_Muerte name means ` ` Mountain of Death '' , since in the past crossing the mountains from the Valle Central meant a three or four day journey , on foot or on horseback , and many ill - prepared travelers succumbed to the cold and rain . However , Cerro_de_la_Muerte is now easily accessible since the Pan - American Highway runs close by . eos
name means ` ` Mountain of Death '' , since in the past crossing the mountains from the Valle Central meant a three or four day journey , on foot or on horseback , and many ill - prepared travelers succumbed to the cold and rain . However , Cerro_de_la_Muerte is now easily accessible since the Pan - American Highway runs close by . The drivable track from the highway leads to the summit , with its cluster of telecommunications aerials . eos
is now easily accessible since the Pan - American Highway runs close by . The drivable track from the highway leads to the summit , with its cluster of telecommunications aerials . At this altitude , overnight temperatures can dip close to freezing , but the sun soon raises the temperatures in the morning , with a high risk of sunburn in the thin clear air . eos
is in Talamanca range , which extends from eastern Costa Rica into neighbouring western Panama . This range was a volcanic island in the geological past , and its separation from other mountain ranges means that it has developed many endemic species of animals and plants , often with affinities to Andean forms . The higher areas are páramo habitat , with stunted shrubs , dwarf bamboo , and tree ferns , and smaller plants like blueberry , gooseberry and lady 's slipper . eos
are endemic to the Talamanca range . These include Fiery - throated Hummingbird , Timberline Wren , Sooty Robin , Black - billed Nightingale - Thrush , Peg - billed Finch and Volcano Junco . eos
( English : Saddle Hill ) , named for Cerro_de_la_Silla distinctive saddle - shaped profile when viewed from the west , is a famous symbol of the landscape of the state of Nuevo León , Mexico . Even though Cerro_de_la_Silla is located in the adjacent city of Guadalupe , Cerro_de_la_Silla is widely associated to the city of Monterrey , Mexico . eos
distinctive saddle - shaped profile when viewed from the west , is a famous symbol of the landscape of the state of Nuevo León , Mexico . Even though Cerro_de_la_Silla is located in the adjacent city of Guadalupe , Cerro_de_la_Silla is widely associated to the city of Monterrey , Mexico . Cerro_de_la_Silla covers an area of 60.5 square kilometres ( 23 mi ² ) . eos

is widely associated to the city of Monterrey , Mexico . Cerro_de_la_Silla covers an area of 60.5 square kilometres ( 23 mi ² ) . Cerro_de_la_Silla has four peaks : Pico Antena , Pico Norte , Pico Sur and Pico la Virgen ; Pico Norte ( North Peak ) eos
covers an area of 60.5 square kilometres ( 23 mi ² ) . Cerro_de_la_Silla has four peaks : Pico Antena , Pico Norte , Pico Sur and Pico la Virgen ; Pico Norte ( North Peak ) is the highest at 1820 m ( 5970 ft ) while Pico la Virgen ( Virgin 's Peak ) is the lowest at 1750 m ( 5740 ft ) . eos
has four peaks : Pico Antena , Pico Norte , Pico Sur and Pico la Virgen ; Pico Norte ( North Peak ) is the highest at 1820 m ( 5970 ft ) while Pico la Virgen ( Virgin 's Peak ) is the lowest at 1750 m ( 5740 ft ) . Set aside as a Natural Monument by the government of Mexico in 1991 , Cerro_de_la_Silla is a popular recreational area and Cerro_de_la_Silla is often climbed by hikers who take a 2.5 km ( 1.6 mi ) trail to reach the top . eos
is a popular recreational area and Cerro_de_la_Silla is often climbed by hikers who take a 2.5 km ( 1.6 mi ) trail to reach the top . The ascent is considered fairly difficult , requiring approximately 3 hours to complete . A panoramic view of the city of Monterrey can be seen from the top . eos

for the population . Sadly , the day of its inauguration was also the day of its closure , as a tragic accident took the lives of five people , including the engineer Jesús Fernández , its designer . Several plans have been announced to rebuild another tramway with no results . eos
( or Chagragil , Chakar Aghil , Kingata Tagh "" or Kingata Tagh II , see below "" ) is a major mountain in Xinjiang , China . Chakragil is located about southwest of Kashgar , about due north of Muztagh Ata , and northwest of Kongur . Chakragil is in the subrange known as the Kingata Shan , at the extreme northwest end of the Kunlun Mountains , near the Pamir Mountains , and Chakragil is sometimes considered part of the latter . eos
is located about southwest of Kashgar , about due north of Muztagh Ata , and northwest of Kongur . Chakragil is in the subrange known as the Kingata Shan , at the extreme northwest end of the Kunlun Mountains , near the Pamir Mountains , and Chakragil is sometimes considered part of the latter . The Gez River flows just south of Chakragil . eos
is in the subrange known as the Kingata Shan , at the extreme northwest end of the Kunlun Mountains , near the Pamir Mountains , and Chakragil is sometimes considered part of the latter . The Gez River flows just south of Chakragil . Due to Chakragil remote location , Chakragil is a little - visited peak . eos
is sometimes considered part of the latter . The Gez River flows just south of Chakragil . Due to Chakragil remote location , Chakragil is a little - visited peak . eos
. Due to Chakragil remote location , Chakragil is a little - visited peak . Chakragil was attempted by the famed mountaineering pair of Eric Shipton and Bill Tilman in september , 1948 . eos
remote location , Chakragil is a little - visited peak . Chakragil was attempted by the famed mountaineering pair of Eric Shipton and Bill Tilman in september , 1948 . However they only reached a height of about 5,200 m ( 17,000 ft ) . eos
is a little - visited peak . Chakragil was attempted by the famed mountaineering pair of Eric Shipton and Bill Tilman in september , 1948 . However they only reached a height of about 5,200 m ( 17,000 ft ) . eos
was attempted by the famed mountaineering pair of Eric Shipton and Bill Tilman in september , 1948 . However they only reached a height of about 5,200 m ( 17,000 ft ) . On september 1 , 1988 , Japanese leader Misao Hirano , together with Minoru Hachisu and Kenji Nakayama , made the first ascent of Chakragil . eos
