( or Lapche Kang , Lobuche Kang I , Choksiam ) is a high peak of the Himalayas in Nepal / Tibet , on the main chain on the watershed separating the Sub - Continent of India from Tibet . Labuche_Kang lies in a little - known region known as the Labuche Himal . eos
lies in a little - known region known as the Labuche Himal . Labuche_Kang was first climbed in 1987 by a Tibetan - Japanese expedition , via the West Ridge . According to the Index , there have been no subsequent attempts or ascents . eos
was first climbed in 1987 by a Tibetan - Japanese expedition , via the West Ridge . According to the Index , there have been no subsequent attempts or ascents . eos
in the Haramosh Valley , ( near Chogurunma Glacier ) is 6,985 m high . Laila_Peak_Haramosh_Valley was first climbed by the Hekiryou Alpine Club of Japan in 1979 . eos

in Hushe valley near Gondogoro glacier is in Karakoram range and Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley is 6,096 m high . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley distinctive spear - like shape makes Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley one of the most beautiful mountains of the world . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley North West face has a slope of 45 degrees in more than 1500 vertical meters . eos
is 6,096 m high . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley distinctive spear - like shape makes Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley one of the most beautiful mountains of the world . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley North West face has a slope of 45 degrees in more than 1500 vertical meters . eos
distinctive spear - like shape makes Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley one of the most beautiful mountains of the world . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley North West face has a slope of 45 degrees in more than 1500 vertical meters . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley has been climbed at least once but no record of Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley ascents has been maintained . eos
one of the most beautiful mountains of the world . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley North West face has a slope of 45 degrees in more than 1500 vertical meters . Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley has been climbed at least once but no record of Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley ascents has been maintained . eos

According to the local people in Hushe , Laila_Peak_Hushe_Valley has been climbed only twice , a total of only seven people have summited . eos

is the highest peak of the Langtang Himal , which is a subrange of the Nepal Himalaya , southwest of the Eight - thousander Shisha Pangma . eos
is an ice - clad and cone - shaped stratovolcano on the border of Argentina and Chile . Lanin forms a part of two national parks : Lanín in Argentina and Villarrica in Chile . The ascent to Lanin is relatively simple , however many deaths have been occurred due to lack of responsibility and caution of the climbers . eos
forms a part of two national parks : Lanín in Argentina and Villarrica in Chile . The ascent to Lanin is relatively simple , however many deaths have been occurred due to lack of responsibility and caution of the climbers . The ascent is regulated by the management of Argentinian National Parks and the Argentine National Gendarmerie . eos
is relatively simple , however many deaths have been occurred due to lack of responsibility and caution of the climbers . The ascent is regulated by the management of Argentinian National Parks and the Argentine National Gendarmerie . Lanin is the symbol of the province of Neuquen , being part of the flag and Neuquen 's anthem . eos
is the symbol of the province of Neuquen , being part of the flag and Neuquen 's anthem . The nearest town it is Junin de los Andes , a touristic center . The access to Lanin is through the national route 60 . eos
is through the national route 60 . eos
is the most active volcano of the northern Chilean Andes . Lascar_Volcano lies east of the Salar de Atacama and immediately west of Aguas Calientes volcano . Other volcanoes in the area include the Acamarachi and Chiliques , all of which form a spectacular backdrop for Laguna Lejía . eos
lies east of the Salar de Atacama and immediately west of Aguas Calientes volcano . Other volcanoes in the area include the Acamarachi and Chiliques , all of which form a spectacular backdrop for Laguna Lejía . Lascar_Volcano contains six overlapping summit craters . eos
contains six overlapping summit craters . Prominent lava flows descend Lascar_Volcano NW flanks . The largest eruption of Lascar_Volcano took place about 26,500 years ago , and following the eruption of the Tumbres scoria flow about 9000 years ago , activity shifted back to the eastern edifice , where three overlapping craters were formed . eos
NW flanks . The largest eruption of Lascar_Volcano took place about 26,500 years ago , and following the eruption of the Tumbres scoria flow about 9000 years ago , activity shifted back to the eastern edifice , where three overlapping craters were formed . Frequent small - to - moderate explosive eruptions have been recorded from Lascar_Volcano in historical time since the mid-19th century , along with periodic larger eruptions that produced ashfall hundreds of kilometers away from Lascar_Volcano . eos
took place about 26,500 years ago , and following the eruption of the Tumbres scoria flow about 9000 years ago , activity shifted back to the eastern edifice , where three overlapping craters were formed . Frequent small - to - moderate explosive eruptions have been recorded from Lascar_Volcano in historical time since the mid-19th century , along with periodic larger eruptions that produced ashfall hundreds of kilometers away from Lascar_Volcano . The largest historical eruption of Lascar_Volcano took place in 1993 , producing pyroclastic flows to 8.5 km NW of the summit and ashfall in Buenos Aires . eos
in historical time since the mid-19th century , along with periodic larger eruptions that produced ashfall hundreds of kilometers away from Lascar_Volcano . The largest historical eruption of Lascar_Volcano took place in 1993 , producing pyroclastic flows to 8.5 km NW of the summit and ashfall in Buenos Aires . eos

( also known as Mount Lassen ) is the southernmost active volcano in the Cascade Range . Lassen_Peak is part of the Cascade Volcanic Arc which is an arc that stretches from northern California to southwestern British Columbia . Located in the Shasta Cascade region of Northern California , Lassen_Peak rises 2,000 feet ( 610 m ) above the surrounding terrain and Lassen_Peak has a volume of half a cubic mile , making Lassen_Peak one of the largest lava domes on Earth . eos
is part of the Cascade Volcanic Arc which is an arc that stretches from northern California to southwestern British Columbia . Located in the Shasta Cascade region of Northern California , Lassen_Peak rises 2,000 feet ( 610 m ) above the surrounding terrain and Lassen_Peak has a volume of half a cubic mile , making Lassen_Peak one of the largest lava domes on Earth . Lassen_Peak was created on the destroyed northeastern flank of now gone Mount Tehama , a stratovolcano that was at least a thousand feet ( 300 m ) higher than Lassen_Peak . eos
rises 2,000 feet ( 610 m ) above the surrounding terrain and Lassen_Peak has a volume of half a cubic mile , making Lassen_Peak one of the largest lava domes on Earth . Lassen_Peak was created on the destroyed northeastern flank of now gone Mount Tehama , a stratovolcano that was at least a thousand feet ( 300 m ) higher than Lassen_Peak . Lassen_Peak has the distinction of being the only other volcano in the Cascades besides Mount St. Helens to have erupted during the 20th century . eos
has a volume of half a cubic mile , making Lassen_Peak one of the largest lava domes on Earth . Lassen_Peak was created on the destroyed northeastern flank of now gone Mount Tehama , a stratovolcano that was at least a thousand feet ( 300 m ) higher than Lassen_Peak . Lassen_Peak has the distinction of being the only other volcano in the Cascades besides Mount St. Helens to have erupted during the 20th century . eos
one of the largest lava domes on Earth . Lassen_Peak was created on the destroyed northeastern flank of now gone Mount Tehama , a stratovolcano that was at least a thousand feet ( 300 m ) higher than Lassen_Peak . Lassen_Peak has the distinction of being the only other volcano in the Cascades besides Mount St. Helens to have erupted during the 20th century . eos
was created on the destroyed northeastern flank of now gone Mount Tehama , a stratovolcano that was at least a thousand feet ( 300 m ) higher than Lassen_Peak . Lassen_Peak has the distinction of being the only other volcano in the Cascades besides Mount St. Helens to have erupted during the 20th century . On May 22 , 1915 , an explosive eruption at Lassen_Peak devastated nearby areas and rained volcanic ash as far away as 200 miles ( 320 km ) to the east . eos
. Lassen_Peak has the distinction of being the only other volcano in the Cascades besides Mount St. Helens to have erupted during the 20th century . On May 22 , 1915 , an explosive eruption at Lassen_Peak devastated nearby areas and rained volcanic ash as far away as 200 miles ( 320 km ) to the east . eos
has the distinction of being the only other volcano in the Cascades besides Mount St. Helens to have erupted during the 20th century . On May 22 , 1915 , an explosive eruption at Lassen_Peak devastated nearby areas and rained volcanic ash as far away as 200 miles ( 320 km ) to the east . This explosion was the most powerful in a 1914 - 17 series of eruptions that were the last to occur in the Cascades before the 1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens in Washington . eos
devastated nearby areas and rained volcanic ash as far away as 200 miles ( 320 km ) to the east . This explosion was the most powerful in a 1914 - 17 series of eruptions that were the last to occur in the Cascades before the 1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens in Washington . Lassen Volcanic National Park was created in Shasta County , California to preserve the devastated area and nearby volcanic wonders . eos
is topped by craters . In fact , a series of these craters exist around Lassen_Peak summit , although two of these are now covered by solidified lava and sulfur deposits . Lassen_Peak is the largest of a group of more than 30 volcanic domes that have erupted over the past 300,000 years in the Lassen Volcanic Center . eos

is a peak of the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range in the Svaneti region of Georgia . The elevation of Latsga is 4,019 meters ( 13,182 ft . ) above sea level . Latsga main glacier , Lekhzir , covers Latsga southern slopes and portions of the adjacent valleys . eos

is a peak ( 4,042 m ) of the Aarmassif in the Bernese Alps . The first ascent was on 8 august 1842 by Pierre Jean Édouard Desor , Christian Girard , Arnold Escher von der Linth with the guides Melchior Bannholzer and Jakob Leuthold . eos
is a granite dome in Yosemite National Park , California , USA . Lembert_Dome soars 800 feet ( 240 m ) above Tuolumne Meadows and the Tuolumne River and Lembert_Dome can be hiked starting at the Tioga Road in the heart of Tuolumne Meadows , 8 miles west of the Tioga Pass Entrance to Yosemite National Park . Lembert_Dome was named after John Baptist Lembert , a homesteader in Tuolumne Meadows . eos
soars 800 feet ( 240 m ) above Tuolumne Meadows and the Tuolumne River and Lembert_Dome can be hiked starting at the Tioga Road in the heart of Tuolumne Meadows , 8 miles west of the Tioga Pass Entrance to Yosemite National Park . Lembert_Dome was named after John Baptist Lembert , a homesteader in Tuolumne Meadows . Rock climbers can scale the face from the parking lot just off the Tioga Road , but hikers can simply walk up the back side or take the challenging steeper trek up the face starting from just east of the parking lot . eos
can be hiked starting at the Tioga Road in the heart of Tuolumne Meadows , 8 miles west of the Tioga Pass Entrance to Yosemite National Park . was named after John Baptist Lembert , a homesteader in Tuolumne Meadows . Rock climbers can scale the face from the parking lot just off the Tioga Road , but hikers can simply walk up the back side or take the challenging steeper trek up the face starting from just east of the parking lot . Triumphant climbers have sometimes been disappointed to see children and infants at the top , with their families on a hike . eos
, known as Mount Kaufmann until 1928 , is the highest mountain in the Trans - Alay Range of Central Asia and the second highest peak in the Pamir Mountains , exceeded only by Ismail Samani Peak ( 7,495 m ) . Lenin_Peak stands on the border of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan ; Lenin_Peak is the second - highest point of both countries . Lenin_Peak is also sometimes referred to as ` ` Achiktash '' . eos
stands on the border of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan ; Lenin_Peak is the second - highest point of both countries . Lenin_Peak is also sometimes referred to as ` ` Achiktash '' . Lenin_Peak was discovered in 1871 and originally named after Konstantin Kaufman . eos

( 4,294 m ) is a mountain located in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . Lenzspitze is the furthest peak south on the Nadelgrat , a high - level ridge running roughly north - south above the resort of Saas Fee to the east , and the Mattertal to the west . Lenzspitze was first climbed in august 1870 by Clinton Thomas Dent with guide Alexander Burgener and a porter , Franz Burgener , by the north - east face to the Nadeljoch and then the north - west ridge to the summit . eos
is the furthest peak south on the Nadelgrat , a high - level ridge running roughly north - south above the resort of Saas Fee to the east , and the Mattertal to the west . Lenzspitze was first climbed in august 1870 by Clinton Thomas Dent with guide Alexander Burgener and a porter , Franz Burgener , by the north - east face to the Nadeljoch and then the north - west ridge to the summit . This route is rarely used today . eos
was first climbed in august 1870 by Clinton Thomas Dent with guide Alexander Burgener and a porter , Franz Burgener , by the north - east face to the Nadeljoch and then the north - west ridge to the summit . This route is rarely used today . The east - north - east ridge starts at the Mischabel Hut . eos
north - east face is a classic ice climb , comprising a 500-metre wall of ice or neve at an angle of up to 56 degrees , first climbed by Dietrich von Bethmann - Hollweg with Oskar and Othmar Supersaxo on 7 july 1911 . This face was descended on skis by Heini Holzer on 22 july 1972 . eos
( 4,000 m ) is a mountain in the Mont Blanc massif in the French Alps . Les_Droites has two summits : * West summit ( 3,984 m ) , first ascent by W A. B Coolidge , Christian Almer Sr and Christian Almer Jr on 16 july 1876 * East summit ( 4,000 m ) , first ascent by Thomas Middlemore and John Oakley Maund with guides Henri Cordier , Johann Jaun and Andreas Maurer on 7 august 1876 The north face of Les_Droites rises some 1,600 m from the Argentière basin at an average angle of 60 ° , and is the steepest face on the 10-km - long ridge that stretches from the Aiguille Verte to Mont Dolent . eos
has two summits : * West summit ( 3,984 m ) , first ascent by W A. B Coolidge , Christian Almer Sr and Christian Almer Jr on 16 july 1876 * East summit ( 4,000 m ) , first ascent by Thomas Middlemore and John Oakley Maund with guides Henri Cordier , Johann Jaun and Andreas Maurer on 7 august 1876 The north face of Les_Droites rises some 1,600 m from the Argentière basin at an average angle of 60 ° , and is the steepest face on the 10-km - long ridge that stretches from the Aiguille Verte to Mont Dolent . The first route to be made on it was via the central couloir on the north - east flank by Bobi Arsandaux and Jacques Lagarde on 31 july 1930 . eos

is connected to Mount Everest via the South Col . In addition to the main summit at 8,516 metres above sea level , Lhotse Middle ( East ) is 8,414 metres and Lhotse Shar is 8,383 metres . Lhotse is located at the border between Tibet ( China ) and Nepal . eos

is a highly symmetrical stratovolcano on the southernmost part of the border between Chile and Bolivia . Licancabur is located just southwest of Laguna Verde in Bolivia and northwest of Juriques volcano . The summit crater is about 400 m wide and contains a 70 by 90 m crater lake which is ice - covered most of the year . eos
is located just southwest of Laguna Verde in Bolivia and northwest of Juriques volcano . The summit crater is about 400 m wide and contains a 70 by 90 m crater lake which is ice - covered most of the year . This is one of the highest lakes in the world , and despite air temperatures which can drop to -30 ° C , it contains planktonic fauna . eos
most recent volcanic activity produced extensive lava flows which extend 6 km down the northwest and southwest flanks , with older lava flows reaching 15 km and pyroclastic flow deposits as far as 12 km from the peak . Extensive Inca ruins are located at the summit , providing proof of pre - Columbian ascents as well as evidence for a lack of major eruptions over the past 500 - 1,000 years . Licancabur is a Cunza word that the indigenous people of this area used to refer to themselves as well as to Licancabur . eos
is a Cunza word that the indigenous people of this area used to refer to themselves as well as to Licancabur . eos

is a mountain located east of Habel Creek in the Canadian Rockies of Jasper National Park . Little_Alberta was named in 1984 after nearby Mount Alberta ( 3,619 m ( 11,873 ft ) ) . The ACC operates the Lloyd MacKay Hut on a rocky shoulder of Little_Alberta . eos

, or simply Little Bear , is one of the fourteeners of the US state of Colorado . Little_Bear_Peak lies at the southern end of the Sangre de Cristo Range , which is the northern section of the Sangre de Cristo Mountains . Little_Bear_Peak is just southwest of Blanca Peak , one of the highest and most topographically prominent of the Colorado fourteeners . eos
lies at the southern end of the Sangre de Cristo Range , which is the northern section of the Sangre de Cristo Mountains . Little_Bear_Peak is just southwest of Blanca Peak , one of the highest and most topographically prominent of the Colorado fourteeners . While Little_Bear_Peak has little more than the minimum 300 feet of prominence to qualify as a separate peak , Little_Bear_Peak is notable for being one of the most technically difficult and dangerous of the fourteeners to climb ; Little_Bear_Peak standard route is known for being exposed to rockfall . eos
is just southwest of Blanca Peak , one of the highest and most topographically prominent of the Colorado fourteeners . While Little_Bear_Peak has little more than the minimum 300 feet of prominence to qualify as a separate peak , Little_Bear_Peak is notable for being one of the most technically difficult and dangerous of the fourteeners to climb ; Little_Bear_Peak standard route is known for being exposed to rockfall . The connecting ridge to Blanca Peak is one of the most challenging outings of its type in the state . eos
has little more than the minimum 300 feet of prominence to qualify as a separate peak , Little_Bear_Peak is notable for being one of the most technically difficult and dangerous of the fourteeners to climb ; Little_Bear_Peak standard route is known for being exposed to rockfall . The connecting ridge to Blanca Peak is one of the most challenging outings of its type in the state . Little_Bear_Peak is located within the Rio Grande National Forest , and Little_Bear_Peak is on the border between Alamosa County and Costilla County . eos

is a stratovolcano at the border of Argentina ( Salta Province ) and Chile . Llullaillaco lies in the Puna de Atacama , a region of very high volcanic peaks on a high plateau within the Atacama Desert , one of the driest places in the world . Llullaillaco is the second highest active volcano in the world , surpassed only by Ojos del Salado . eos
lies in the Puna de Atacama , a region of very high volcanic peaks on a high plateau within the Atacama Desert , one of the driest places in the world . Llullaillaco is the second highest active volcano in the world , surpassed only by Ojos del Salado . Llullaillaco is the fifth highest volcano in the world , and Llullaillaco is also the seventh highest mountain of the Western Hemisphere . eos
is the second highest active volcano in the world , surpassed only by Ojos del Salado . Llullaillaco is the fifth highest volcano in the world , and Llullaillaco is also the seventh highest mountain of the Western Hemisphere . Llullaillaco follows the typical Puna de Atacama volcano pattern : Llullaillaco is surrounded by large debris fields , and Llullaillaco is perpetually capped by snow and small glaciers despite the extremely dry conditions of the region . eos
is the fifth highest volcano in the world , and Llullaillaco is also the seventh highest mountain of the Western Hemisphere . Llullaillaco follows the typical Puna de Atacama volcano pattern : Llullaillaco is surrounded by large debris fields , and Llullaillaco is perpetually capped by snow and small glaciers despite the extremely dry conditions of the region . Llullaillaco name comes from Aymara ` ` murky water '' : llulla = dirty and yacu = water . eos
is also the seventh highest mountain of the Western Hemisphere . Llullaillaco follows the typical Puna de Atacama volcano pattern : Llullaillaco is surrounded by large debris fields , and Llullaillaco is perpetually capped by snow and small glaciers despite the extremely dry conditions of the region . Llullaillaco name comes from Aymara ` ` murky water '' : llulla = dirty and yacu = water . eos
follows the typical Puna de Atacama volcano pattern : Llullaillaco is surrounded by large debris fields , and Llullaillaco is perpetually capped by snow and small glaciers despite the extremely dry conditions of the region . Llullaillaco name comes from Aymara ` ` murky water '' : llulla = dirty and yacu = water . Other sources propose it to have originated from Quechua Lullac = lie , Yacu = water : ` ` lying ( or treacherous ) water '' . eos

name comes from Aymara ` ` murky water '' : llulla = dirty and yacu = water . Other sources propose it to have originated from Quechua Lullac = lie , Yacu = water : ` ` lying ( or treacherous ) water '' . It has been confirmed that Incas climbed Llullaillaco in the pre - Colombian period . eos
in the pre - Colombian period . Artifacts on the summit constitute the highest evidence of human presence worldwide before the late nineteenth century . Also , the huáqueros may have also reached Llullaillaco summit and those of other mountains in the region during their searches . eos

is the center of the Lone Peak Wilderness Area , which was established in 1978 . Lone_Peak , at 11,253 ' elevation , is one of the taller peaks in the Wasatch Range along the Wasatch Front and Lone_Peak tends to be a favorite hike . Lone_Peak consists almost entirely of quartz monzonite ( a granitoid , or granite - like ) rock of the 30.5 million year old Little Cottonwood Stock . eos
, at 11,253 ' elevation , is one of the taller peaks in the Wasatch Range along the Wasatch Front and Lone_Peak tends to be a favorite hike . Lone_Peak consists almost entirely of quartz monzonite ( a granitoid , or granite - like ) rock of the 30.5 million year old Little Cottonwood Stock . Quartzite and limestone are also found in distal locations on Lone_Peak . eos

has an elevation of 1,838 metres above sea level . Loser_mountain is the most prominent landmark of the Ausseerland . Among the locals , Loser_mountain is also known as the Ausseer Ohrwaschl ( Aussee Ear ) because of Loser_mountain shape . eos

( "" Irish : Log na Coille "" , meaning Hollow of the Wood ) is the highest mountain in Leinster and the 13 highest Irish peak . Lugnaquilla is the highest peak in the Wicklow Mountains in eastern Ireland , and Lugnaquilla is one of Ireland 's fourteen mountains over 3,000 ft , with an elevation of 925 m ( 3,035 ft ) . eos
is the highest peak in the Wicklow Mountains in eastern Ireland , and Lugnaquilla is one of Ireland 's fourteen mountains over 3,000 ft , with an elevation of 925 m ( 3,035 ft ) . Views , on a clear day extend east across the Irish Sea to the hills of the Llŷn Peninsula and mountains of Snowdonia in Wales . Lugnaquilla proximity to the capital , Dublin , ensures that Lugnaquilla is a frequently climbed mountain . eos
is one of Ireland 's fourteen mountains over 3,000 ft , with an elevation of 925 m ( 3,035 ft ) . Views , on a clear day extend east across the Irish Sea to the hills of the Llŷn Peninsula and mountains of Snowdonia in Wales . Lugnaquilla proximity to the capital , Dublin , ensures that Lugnaquilla is a frequently climbed mountain . eos
proximity to the capital , Dublin , ensures that Lugnaquilla is a frequently climbed mountain . The most popular approaches to Lugnaquilla , as Lugnaquilla is affectionately known , are via Glenmalure and the Glen of Imaal . Lugnaquilla is a bulky mountain , with a large plateau - type summit , bounded on two sides by steep glacial corries ( the North and South Prisons ) . eos

( or Liskamm ) ( 4,527 m ) is a mountain in the Alps lying on the border between Switzerland and Italy . Lyskamm consists of a five - kilometre - long ridge with two distinct peaks . The southern ( Italian ) face is somewhat rugged , and rises only a few hundred metres above the glacier below ( Ghiacciaio del Lis ) , while the northern ( Swiss ) side is an impressive 1100-metre ice - covered wall , rising up from the Gorner Glacier . eos
consists of a five - kilometre - long ridge with two distinct peaks . The southern ( Italian ) face is somewhat rugged , and rises only a few hundred metres above the glacier below ( Ghiacciaio del Lis ) , while the northern ( Swiss ) side is an impressive 1100-metre ice - covered wall , rising up from the Gorner Glacier . Lyskamm is often climbed as a traverse from the Felikjoch ( West ) , to the Listjoch ( East ) or vice versa . eos
is often climbed as a traverse from the Felikjoch ( West ) , to the Listjoch ( East ) or vice versa . The traverse consists mostly of a narrow , snow - covered ridge , with some scrambling over rocks . In good conditions , this route is fairly easy and objectively safe , however in bad snow conditions and/or bad visibility , the ridge can be challenging because of large , sometimes double , cornices , mainly on the southern side of the ridge . eos
or Machhaphuchhare is a mountain in the Annapurna Himal of north central Nepal . Machapuchare is revered as particularly sacred by the local population , and hence Machapuchare is off limits to climbing . eos
is revered as particularly sacred by the local population , and hence Machapuchare is off limits to climbing . eos
is off limits to climbing . eos
is a stratovolcano in the Andes , lying on the border between Argentina and Chile . Maipo_volcano is located 90 km ( 55 miles ) south of Tupungato and about 100 km ( 60 miles ) southeast of Santiago . Maipo_volcano retains a symmetrical , conical volcanic shape , unlike many of the other nearby peaks , making Maipo_volcano the best known peak in the region , though Maipo_volcano is not the highest . eos
is located 90 km ( 55 miles ) south of Tupungato and about 100 km ( 60 miles ) southeast of Santiago . Maipo_volcano retains a symmetrical , conical volcanic shape , unlike many of the other nearby peaks , making Maipo_volcano the best known peak in the region , though Maipo_volcano is not the highest . ( Nearby Castillo is 5,485 m high . ) eos

( in Nepal officially मकालु ; in China officially Makaru ; Chinese : 马卡鲁山 , Pinyin : Mǎkǎlǔ Shān ) is the fifth highest mountain in the world and Makalu is located east of Mount Everest , on the border between Nepal and Tibet . Makalu is an isolated peak Makalu shape is a four - sided pyramid . Makalu has two notable subsidiary peaks . eos

is an isolated peak Makalu shape is a four - sided pyramid . Makalu has two notable subsidiary peaks . Kangchungtse , or Makalu II , 7678 m , lies about 3 km ( 2 mi ) north - northwest of the main summit . eos
shape is a four - sided pyramid . Makalu has two notable subsidiary peaks . Kangchungtse , or Makalu II , 7678 m , lies about 3 km ( 2 mi ) north - northwest of the main summit . eos
has two notable subsidiary peaks . Kangchungtse , or Makalu II , 7678 m , lies about 3 km ( 2 mi ) north - northwest of the main summit . Rising about 5 km ( 3.5 mi ) north - northeast of the main summit across a broad plateau , and connected to Kangchungtse by a narrow , 7,200 m saddle , is Chomo Lonzo , 7804 m. eos
was made by an American team led by W Siri in the spring of 1954 . They attempted the southeast ridge but were turned back at 7,100 m ( 23,300 ft ) by a constant barrage of storms . A New Zealand team including Sir Edmund Hillary was also active in the spring , but did not get very high due to injury and illness . eos
while trying to make the first winter ascent . Makalu is one of the harder eight - thousanders , and Makalu is considered one of the most difficult mountains in the world to climb . Makalu is notorious for Makalu steep pitches and knife - edged ridges that are completely open to the elements . eos
is one of the harder eight - thousanders , and Makalu is considered one of the most difficult mountains in the world to climb . Makalu is notorious for Makalu steep pitches and knife - edged ridges that are completely open to the elements . The final ascent of the summit pyramid involves technical rock climbing . eos
is considered one of the most difficult mountains in the world to climb . Makalu is notorious for Makalu steep pitches and knife - edged ridges that are completely open to the elements . The final ascent of the summit pyramid involves technical rock climbing . eos
is notorious for Makalu steep pitches and knife - edged ridges that are completely open to the elements . The final ascent of the summit pyramid involves technical rock climbing . Makalu is the only Nepalese 8,000 m peak which has yet to be climbed in true winter conditions . eos

is a scenic peak in the Hazara region of the Himalayas in northern Pakistan . Makra_Peak is 3,586 m / 11,655 feet high and almost 200 km from Islamabad on Naran road . From Kiwai a jeep track goes upwards to Shogran , a tourist place , the track goes upward to Payee Lake and ends at Seree . eos
is 3,586 m / 11,655 feet high and almost 200 km from Islamabad on Naran road . From Kiwai a jeep track goes upwards to Shogran , a tourist place , the track goes upward to Payee Lake and ends at Seree . From here it is a walking trek of three hours to the top of Makra_Peak . eos
. Although Makra_Peak is an easy peak deaths have occurred in storms . In spite of the difficulties , the top offers the unforgettable scenery of Hazara and Azad Kashmir . eos
is an easy peak deaths have occurred in storms . In spite of the difficulties , the top offers the unforgettable scenery of Hazara and Azad Kashmir . Waters of Makra_Peak glacier feed the Kunhar River . eos
glacier feed the Kunhar River . eos
is a 517 m ( 1696 ft ) high peak near Castleton in the High Peak of Derbyshire , England . Mam_Tor name literally translates as Heights of the Mother and Mam_Tor is also known as the Shivering Mountain on account of the instability of Mam_Tor lower shale layers . Indeed , in 1979 the continual battle to maintain the A625 road ( Sheffield to Chapel en le Frith ) on the crumbling southern side of Mam_Tor was lost when the road officially closed as a through - route . eos
name literally translates as Heights of the Mother and Mam_Tor is also known as the Shivering Mountain on account of the instability of Mam_Tor lower shale layers . Indeed , in 1979 the continual battle to maintain the A625 road ( Sheffield to Chapel en le Frith ) on the crumbling southern side of Mam_Tor was lost when the road officially closed as a through - route . The summit of Mam_Tor is encircled by a late Bronze Age and early Iron Age hill fort . eos
is also known as the Shivering Mountain on account of the instability of Mam_Tor lower shale layers . Indeed , in 1979 the continual battle to maintain the A625 road ( Sheffield to Chapel en le Frith ) on the crumbling southern side of Mam_Tor was lost when the road officially closed as a through - route . The summit of Mam_Tor is encircled by a late Bronze Age and early Iron Age hill fort . eos

The summit of Mam_Tor is encircled by a late Bronze Age and early Iron Age hill fort . eos
was lost when the road officially closed as a through - route . The summit of Mam_Tor is encircled by a late Bronze Age and early Iron Age hill fort . Radiocarbon analysis suggests occupation from around 1200 BC . eos
is encircled by a late Bronze Age and early Iron Age hill fort . Radiocarbon analysis suggests occupation from around 1200 BC . The earliest remaining features are two Bronze Age burial mounds , one just below the summit and the other on the summit itself . eos
near the summit , allowing inhabited timber huts to be constructed . At the base of Mam_Tor and nearby are three show caves : Speedwell Cavern , Blue John Cavern and Treak Cliff Cavern where lead , Blue John and other minerals were once mined . Mam_Tor sits near the top of Winnats Pass ( a steep and narrow limestone gorge ) , Mam_Tor forms the eastern end of Rushup Edge , and Mam_Tor dominates the western end of the ` ` Great Ridge '' , one of the most famous , beautiful , and easy - to - reach ridgewalks in the Peak District . eos
and nearby are three show caves : Speedwell Cavern , Blue John Cavern and Treak Cliff Cavern where lead , Blue John and other minerals were once mined . Mam_Tor sits near the top of Winnats Pass ( a steep and narrow limestone gorge ) , Mam_Tor forms the eastern end of Rushup Edge , and Mam_Tor dominates the western end of the ` ` Great Ridge '' , one of the most famous , beautiful , and easy - to - reach ridgewalks in the Peak District . The Ridge separates the two arms of the Hope Valley : the valley of the River Noe ( Edale ) to the north , and the Peakshole Water ( Castleton ) to the south . eos
forms the eastern end of Rushup Edge , and Mam_Tor dominates the western end of the ` ` Great Ridge '' , one of the most famous , beautiful , and easy - to - reach ridgewalks in the Peak District . The Ridge separates the two arms of the Hope Valley : the valley of the River Noe ( Edale ) to the north , and the Peakshole Water ( Castleton ) to the south . Starting at the western end , the walker leaves the summit of Mam_Tor , passes the remains of the fort 's earthworks , dips into the saddle of Hollins Cross , climbs to Back Tor , then dips and climbs again to the conical peak of Lose Hill at the eastern end of the Ridge . eos
dominates the western end of the ` ` Great Ridge '' , one of the most famous , beautiful , and easy - to - reach ridgewalks in the Peak District . The Ridge separates the two arms of the Hope Valley : the valley of the River Noe ( Edale ) to the north , and the Peakshole Water ( Castleton ) to the south . Starting at the western end , the walker leaves the summit of Mam_Tor , passes the remains of the fort 's earthworks , dips into the saddle of Hollins Cross , climbs to Back Tor , then dips and climbs again to the conical peak of Lose Hill at the eastern end of the Ridge . eos
sits near the top of Winnats Pass ( a steep and narrow limestone gorge ) , Mam_Tor forms the eastern end of Rushup Edge , and Mam_Tor dominates the western end of the ` ` Great Ridge '' , one of the most famous , beautiful , and easy - to - reach ridgewalks in the Peak District . The Ridge separates the two arms of the Hope Valley : the valley of the River Noe ( Edale ) to the north , and the Peakshole Water ( Castleton ) to the south . Starting at the western end , the walker leaves the summit of Mam_Tor , passes the remains of the fort 's earthworks , dips into the saddle of Hollins Cross , climbs to Back Tor , then dips and climbs again to the conical peak of Lose Hill at the eastern end of the Ridge . eos
, passes the remains of the fort 's earthworks , dips into the saddle of Hollins Cross , climbs to Back Tor , then dips and climbs again to the conical peak of Lose Hill at the eastern end of the Ridge . In the other direction , walkers who have climbed Lose Hill from Hope railway station see Mam_Tor as a dramatic target for an easy one - hour walk with beautiful views on either side . A common target for walkers from Edale or Castleton is the dip of Hollins Cross , the meeting place of many paths visible from the valley bottoms on both sides . eos
as a dramatic target for an easy one - hour walk with beautiful views on either side . A common target for walkers from Edale or Castleton is the dip of Hollins Cross , the meeting place of many paths visible from the valley bottoms on both sides . Other walkers take the longer route past the show caves ( ie via Winnats Pass or the old A - road ) or Barber Booth . eos
is a large lava dome complex Mammoth_Mountain lies to the west of the town of Mammoth Lakes , California in the Inyo National Forest . Mammoth_Mountain is home to the Mammoth Mountain Ski Area which is notable in that it gets an unusually large amount of snow compared to other Eastern Sierra peaks , due to Mammoth_Mountain lying in a low gap in the Sierra crest . In the summer months the ski gondolas are used by mountain bikers and tourists who wish to get a spectacular summit view of Long Valley Caldera directly to the east and Sierra peaks to the west , south and north . eos

or Mamostang Kangri is the highest peak in the remote Rimo Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range in India near the disputed border with Pakistan . Mamostong_Kangri is located about 30 km east - southeast of the snout of the Siachen Glacier . Mamostong_Kangri is the 48th highest independent peak in the world ( using a 500 m prominence cutoff ) . eos
is located about 30 km east - southeast of the snout of the Siachen Glacier . Mamostong_Kangri is the 48th highest independent peak in the world ( using a 500 m prominence cutoff ) . The South Chong Kumdan Glacier , Kichik Kumdan eos
is the 48th highest independent peak in the world ( using a 500 m prominence cutoff ) . The South Chong Kumdan Glacier , Kichik Kumdan ( Thangman ) , Mamostong , and South Terong Glaciers all head on the slopes of Mamostong_Kangri . eos
. Mamostong_Kangri has not seen a great deal of visitation due to Mamostong_Kangri remote location and the unsettled political and military situation in the region . The first European exploration of Mamostong_Kangri was in 1907 by Arthur Neve and D G. Oliver . eos
has not seen a great deal of visitation due to Mamostong_Kangri remote location and the unsettled political and military situation in the region . The first European exploration of Mamostong_Kangri was in 1907 by Arthur Neve and D G. Oliver . The first ascent was made in 1984 by an Indo - Japanese expedition , via the Northeast Ridge , after a complicated approach . eos

is a mountain located on the west coast of the Canadian island of Newfoundland in the Long Range Mountains . Marble_Mountain_Newfoundland is a series of steep ridges forming part of the southern side of the Humber River valley . The highest point of Marble_Mountain_Newfoundland is ` ` Mount Musgrave '' ( 540 m , 48 ° 55 ' 49N , 57 ° 50 ' 03W ) at Steady Brook , approximately 7 kilometres east of Corner Brook . eos
is a series of steep ridges forming part of the southern side of the Humber River valley . The highest point of Marble_Mountain_Newfoundland is ` ` Mount Musgrave '' ( 540 m , 48 ° 55 ' 49N , 57 ° 50 ' 03W ) at Steady Brook , approximately 7 kilometres east of Corner Brook . The peak is named in honour of Sir Anthony Musgrave , a colonial governor of Newfoundland . eos
is ` ` Mount Musgrave '' ( 540 m , 48 ° 55 ' 49N , 57 ° 50 ' 03W ) at Steady Brook , approximately 7 kilometres east of Corner Brook . The peak is named in honour of Sir Anthony Musgrave , a colonial governor of Newfoundland . Marble_Mountain_Newfoundland is the site of the largest alpine ski resort in Atlantic Canada , and Marble_Mountain_Newfoundland hosts Environment Canada 's doppler weather radar station ` ` XME '' . eos
is the site of the largest alpine ski resort in Atlantic Canada , and Marble_Mountain_Newfoundland hosts Environment Canada 's doppler weather radar station ` ` XME '' . The Marble Mountain Ski Resort is known to have some of the best skiing east of the Rockies with an average of 5 metres ( 16.5 feet ) of snow each year , compared to Mont Tremblant 's 3.65 metres ( 12 feet ) . The resort was a key venue for the 1999 Canada Winter Games hosted by Corner Brook . eos
hosts Environment Canada 's doppler weather radar station ` ` XME '' . The Marble Mountain Ski Resort is known to have some of the best skiing east of the Rockies with an average of 5 metres ( 16.5 feet ) of snow each year , compared to Mont Tremblant 's 3.65 metres ( 12 feet ) . The resort was a key venue for the 1999 Canada Winter Games hosted by Corner Brook . eos
boasts the only detachable high speed quad lift in Atlantic Canada , the Governor 's Express . It is 1660 m in length and has a ride time of approximately 8 minutes . eos
( the Italian name ; also Ladin : Marmoleda , German : Marmolata ) is a mountain in northeastern Italy ( just east of Trento ) and the highest mountain of the Dolomites ( a section of the Alps ) . Marmolada consists of a ridge running west to east . eos
consists of a ridge running west to east . Towards the south Marmolada breaks suddenly into sheer cliffs , forming a rock face several kilometres long . On the north side there is a comparatively flat glacier , the only large glacier in the Dolomites ( the Marmolada Glacier , Ghiacciaio della Marmolada ) . eos
breaks suddenly into sheer cliffs , forming a rock face several kilometres long . On the north side there is a comparatively flat glacier , the only large glacier in the Dolomites ( the Marmolada Glacier , Ghiacciaio della Marmolada ) . The ridge is composed of several summits , decreasing in altitude from west to east : Punta Penia ( 3,343 m ) , Punta Rocca ( 3,309 m ) , Punta Ombretta ( 3,230 m ) , Monte Serauta ( 3,069 m ) , and Pizzo Serauta ( 3,035 m ) . eos
, so Marmolada formed part of the front line . Austrian soldiers were quartered in deep tunnels bored into the northern face 's glacier , and Italian soldiers were quartered on the south face 's rocky precipices . As glaciers retreat , soldiers ' remains and belongings are occasionally discovered . eos
formed part of the front line . Austrian soldiers were quartered in deep tunnels bored into the northern face 's glacier , and Italian soldiers were quartered on the south face 's rocky precipices . As glaciers retreat , soldiers ' remains and belongings are occasionally discovered . eos
is a mountain in the Elk Mountains that consists of two peaks , South Maroon Peak and North Maroon Peak , separated by about a third of a mile . Maroon_Bells is on the border between Pitkin County and Gunnison County , Colorado , United States , about 12 miles southwest of Aspen , Colorado . Both peaks are counted as fourteeners . eos
is on the border between Pitkin County and Gunnison County , Colorado , United States , about 12 miles southwest of Aspen , Colorado . Both peaks are counted as fourteeners . Maroon Peak , at 14,156 feet , is the 27th highest peak in Colorado ; North Maroon Peak , at 14,014 feet , is the 50th highest . eos
from the Maroon Creek valley to the northeast is one of the most famous scenes in Colorado , and is reputed to be the ` ` most - photographed spot in Colorado '' and one of Colorado 's premier scenic overlooks . Maroon Lake ( 9,580 ' ) provides one of the most memorable scenes in the Rockies . The lake occupies a basin that was sculpted by Ice - Age glaciers and later dammed by landslide and rockfall debris from the steep slopes above the valley floor . eos
is a large basaltic volcanic caldera located 20 km south of Managua , Nicaragua , Central America and Masaya is Nicaragua 's first and largest National Park , Masaya is one of 78 protected areas of Nicaragua . The volcanic complex is composed of a nested set of calderas and craters , the largest of which is Las Sierras shield volcano and caldera . eos
is Nicaragua 's first and largest National Park , Masaya is one of 78 protected areas of Nicaragua . The volcanic complex is composed of a nested set of calderas and craters , the largest of which is Las Sierras shield volcano and caldera . eos
is one of 78 protected areas of Nicaragua . The volcanic complex is composed of a nested set of calderas and craters , the largest of which is Las Sierras shield volcano and caldera . eos
sensu stricto , a shallow shield volcano composed of basaltic lavas and tephras . This hosts Masaya caldera , formed 2500 years ago by an 8 cu km basaltic ignimbrite eruption . Inside this caldera a new basaltic complex has grown from eruptions mainly on a semi - circular set of vents that include the Masaya and Nindiri cones . eos
, Santiago , Nindiri and San Pedro . Observations in the walls of the pit craters indicate that there have been several episodes of cone and pit crater formation . The floor of Masaya caldera is mainly covered by poorly vegetated aa lava , indicating resurfacing within the past 1000 or so years , but only two lava flows have erupted since the sixteenth century . eos
continually emits large amounts of sulfur dioxide gas ( from the active Santiago crater ) and volcanologists study this ( amongst other signs ) to better understand the behavior of Masaya and also evaluate the impact of acid rain and the potential for health problems . Other eruptive events have occurred in the last 50 years . On november 22 , 1999 , Masaya appears to have begun a new eruptive event . eos
and also evaluate the impact of acid rain and the potential for health problems . Other eruptive events have occurred in the last 50 years . On november 22 , 1999 , Masaya appears to have begun a new eruptive event . eos
appears to have begun a new eruptive event . A hot spot appeared on satellite imagery , and there was a possible explosion . On april 23 , 2001 the crater exploded and formed a new vent in the bottom of the crater . eos
. The plume rose to a height of ~ 4.6 km .1 Masaya is located in the department of Masaya . eos
is located in the department of Masaya . eos
( also known as K1 ) is the 22nd highest mountain in the world and the 11th highest in Pakistan ( according to the Indian government , Masherbrum is in India and the 11th highest in India ) . Masherbrum is the highest peak of the Masherbrum range , a subrange of the Karakoram mountains . Masherbrum is a large and striking peak , Masherbrum is somewhat overshadowed by the nearby 8000 m peaks of the main range of the Karakoram which includes four of the fourteen Eight - thousanders , namely K2 , Gasherbrum I , Broad Peak and Gasherbrum II . eos
is in India and the 11th highest in India ) . Masherbrum is the highest peak of the Masherbrum range , a subrange of the Karakoram mountains . Masherbrum is a large and striking peak , Masherbrum is somewhat overshadowed by the nearby 8000 m peaks of the main range of the Karakoram which includes four of the fourteen Eight - thousanders , namely K2 , Gasherbrum I , Broad Peak and Gasherbrum II . eos
is the highest peak of the Masherbrum range , a subrange of the Karakoram mountains . Masherbrum is a large and striking peak , Masherbrum is somewhat overshadowed by the nearby 8000 m peaks of the main range of the Karakoram which includes four of the fourteen Eight - thousanders , namely K2 , Gasherbrum I , Broad Peak and Gasherbrum II . The meaning of the name ` ` Masherbrum '' is not entirely clear . eos
is a large and striking peak , Masherbrum is somewhat overshadowed by the nearby 8000 m peaks of the main range of the Karakoram which includes four of the fourteen Eight - thousanders , namely K2 , Gasherbrum I , Broad Peak and Gasherbrum II . The meaning of the name ` ` Masherbrum '' is not entirely clear . It may come from mashadar ( muzzle - loading gun ) plus brum ( mountain ) , from the resemblance of the double summit to an old muzzle - loader . eos
is somewhat overshadowed by the nearby 8000 m peaks of the main range of the Karakoram which includes four of the fourteen Eight - thousanders , namely K2 , Gasherbrum I , Broad Peak and Gasherbrum II . The meaning of the name ` ` Masherbrum '' is not entirely clear . It may come from mashadar ( muzzle - loading gun ) plus brum ( mountain ) , from the resemblance of the double summit to an old muzzle - loader . eos
, also known as Matlalcuéyetl , Matlalcueitl or Malintzin , is an active volcano ( although dormant for last 3,100 years ) located in Tlaxcala and Puebla states , in Mexico . Officially , Matlalcueitl_volcano summit reaches 4,461 meters ( 14646 ft ) above sea level , though in some articles is considered to be 4,503 m with GPS . Matlalcueitl_volcano height puts Matlalcueitl_volcano as the highest Tlaxcalan peak , the third in Puebla and the fifth in the country . eos
summit reaches 4,461 meters ( 14646 ft ) above sea level , though in some articles is considered to be 4,503 m with GPS . Matlalcueitl_volcano height puts Matlalcueitl_volcano as the highest Tlaxcalan peak , the third in Puebla and the fifth in the country . Matlalcueitl_volcano is the 252nd highest mountain in the world . eos
height puts Matlalcueitl_volcano as the highest Tlaxcalan peak , the third in Puebla and the fifth in the country . Matlalcueitl_volcano is the 252nd highest mountain in the world . Matlalcueitl_volcano prominence or height above the valleys surrounding Matlalcueitl_volcano varies from 1,908 meters above Huamantla city , in Tlaxcala , to 2461 meters above the Villa Vicente Guerrero town , being Matlalcueitl_volcano height 2,221 meters above Tlaxcala city and 2,299 meters above Puebla city . eos

is the 252nd highest mountain in the world . Matlalcueitl_volcano prominence or height above the valleys surrounding Matlalcueitl_volcano varies from 1,908 meters above Huamantla city , in Tlaxcala , to 2461 meters above the Villa Vicente Guerrero town , being Matlalcueitl_volcano height 2,221 meters above Tlaxcala city and 2,299 meters above Puebla city . The distance from this big towns to the La Malinche ' summit is 22.4 kilometers and 28.3 km , respectively , and 118 km from Mexico City . eos
prominence or height above the valleys surrounding Matlalcueitl_volcano varies from 1,908 meters above Huamantla city , in Tlaxcala , to 2461 meters above the Villa Vicente Guerrero town , being Matlalcueitl_volcano height 2,221 meters above Tlaxcala city and 2,299 meters above Puebla city . Matlalcueitl_volcano climate is cold on the summit and mild on Matlalcueitl_volcano hillsides . eos

hillsides . The Tlaxcaltecs named Matlalcueitl_volcano Matlalcuéyetl , which in English means ` ` Lady of the Blue Skirts , '' a wizard goddess . The Spanish changed Matlalcueitl_volcano name to ` ` Malintzin '' and/or ` ` Malinche '' , in honor of a woman from the current Tabasco state , called Malinalli , who helped the Spanish as a translator . eos

( German ) or Cervino ( Italian ) , ( French : Mont Cervin or Le Cervin ) is perhaps the most familiar mountain in the European Alps . On the border between Switzerland and Italy , Matterhorn towers over the Swiss village of Zermatt and the Italian village Breuil - Cervinia in the Val Tournanche . eos
towers over the Swiss village of Zermatt and the Italian village Breuil - Cervinia in the Val Tournanche . Matterhorn derives Matterhorn name from the German words Matte , meaning meadow , and Horn , which means peak . Matterhorn has four faces , facing the four compass points , the north face overlooking the Zmutt Valley , the south face Breuil - Cervinia , the east and west faces looking towards the Gornergrat and the Dent d'Hérens , respectively , with the north and south faces meeting to form a short east - west summit ridge . eos
derives Matterhorn name from the German words Matte , meaning meadow , and Horn , which means peak . Matterhorn has four faces , facing the four compass points , the north face overlooking the Zmutt Valley , the south face Breuil - Cervinia , the east and west faces looking towards the Gornergrat and the Dent d'Hérens , respectively , with the north and south faces meeting to form a short east - west summit ridge . The faces are steep , and only small patches of snow and ice cling to them ; regular avalanches send the snow down to accumulate on the glaciers at the base of each face . eos
name from the German words Matte , meaning meadow , and Horn , which means peak . Matterhorn has four faces , facing the four compass points , the north face overlooking the Zmutt Valley , the south face Breuil - Cervinia , the east and west faces looking towards the Gornergrat and the Dent d'Hérens , respectively , with the north and south faces meeting to form a short east - west summit ridge . The faces are steep , and only small patches of snow and ice cling to them ; regular avalanches send the snow down to accumulate on the glaciers at the base of each face . eos
has four faces , facing the four compass points , the north face overlooking the Zmutt Valley , the south face Breuil - Cervinia , the east and west faces looking towards the Gornergrat and the Dent d'Hérens , respectively , with the north and south faces meeting to form a short east - west summit ridge . The faces are steep , and only small patches of snow and ice cling to them ; regular avalanches send the snow down to accumulate on the glaciers at the base of each face . The Hörnli ridge of the northeast ( in the center of the view from Zermatt ) is the usual climbing route . eos
is a dormant volcano in the Hawaiian Islands , one of five volcanoes which together form the island of Hawai'i . Pu'u Wekiu , one of numerous cinder cones on the summit plateau , is the highest point in the state of Hawaii at 13,796 feet ( 4,205 m ) . Mauna_Kea is the tallest mountain in the world when measured from base to summit , since Mauna_Kea base is located on the seafloor about beneath the surface of the Pacific Ocean , bringing Mauna_Kea total height to well over 33000 ft . eos
is the tallest mountain in the world when measured from base to summit , since Mauna_Kea base is located on the seafloor about beneath the surface of the Pacific Ocean , bringing Mauna_Kea total height to well over 33000 ft . In the Hawaiian language , mauna kea means ` ` white mountain '' , a reference to Mauna_Kea summit being regularly snow - capped during the Northern Hemisphere winter . eos
base is located on the seafloor about beneath the surface of the Pacific Ocean , bringing Mauna_Kea total height to well over 33000 ft . is the largest volcano on earth . Mauna_Loa is an active shield volcano , with a volume estimated at approximately 18,000 cubic miles ( 75,000 km ³ ) , although Mauna_Loa peak is about 120 feet ( 37 m ) lower than that of Mauna_Loa neighbor , Mauna Kea , another of five volcanoes that form the Island of Hawaii . The Hawaiian name ` ` Mauna Loa '' means ` ` Long Mountain '' . eos
is an active shield volcano , with a volume estimated at approximately 18,000 cubic miles ( 75,000 km ³ ) , although Mauna_Loa peak is about 120 feet ( 37 m ) lower than that of Mauna_Loa neighbor , Mauna Kea , another of five volcanoes that form the Island of Hawaii . The Hawaiian name ` ` Mauna Loa '' means ` ` Long Mountain '' . Lava eruptions from Mauna_Loa are silica - poor , thus very fluid : and as a result eruptions tend to be non - explosive and Mauna_Loa has extremely shallow slopes . eos
peak is about 120 feet ( 37 m ) lower than that of Mauna_Loa neighbor , Mauna Kea , another of five volcanoes that form the Island of Hawaii . The Hawaiian name ` ` Mauna Loa '' means ` ` Long Mountain '' . Lava eruptions from Mauna_Loa are silica - poor , thus very fluid : and as a result eruptions tend to be non - explosive and Mauna_Loa has extremely shallow slopes . eos
neighbor , Mauna Kea , another of five volcanoes that form the Island of Hawaii . The Hawaiian name ` ` Mauna Loa '' means ` ` Long Mountain '' . Lava eruptions from Mauna_Loa are silica - poor , thus very fluid : and as a result eruptions tend to be non - explosive and Mauna_Loa has extremely shallow slopes . eos
are silica - poor , thus very fluid : and as a result eruptions tend to be non - explosive and Mauna_Loa has extremely shallow slopes . Mauna_Loa has probably been erupting for at least 700,000 years and Mauna_Loa may have emerged above sea level about 400,000 years ago , although the oldest - known dated rocks do not extend beyond 200,000 years . Mauna_Loa magma comes from the Hawaii hotspot , which has been responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian island chain for tens of millions of years . eos
has extremely shallow slopes . Mauna_Loa has probably been erupting for at least 700,000 years and Mauna_Loa may have emerged above sea level about 400,000 years ago , although the oldest - known dated rocks do not extend beyond 200,000 years . Mauna_Loa magma comes from the Hawaii hotspot , which has been responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian island chain for tens of millions of years . eos
has probably been erupting for at least 700,000 years and Mauna_Loa may have emerged above sea level about 400,000 years ago , although the oldest - known dated rocks do not extend beyond 200,000 years . Mauna_Loa magma comes from the Hawaii hotspot , which has been responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian island chain for tens of millions of years . The slow drift of the Pacific Plate will eventually carry Mauna_Loa away from the hotspot , and Mauna_Loa will thus become extinct within 500,000 to one million years from now . eos
may have emerged above sea level about 400,000 years ago , although the oldest - known dated rocks do not extend beyond 200,000 years . Mauna_Loa magma comes from the Hawaii hotspot , which has been responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian island chain for tens of millions of years . The slow drift of the Pacific Plate will eventually carry Mauna_Loa away from the hotspot , and Mauna_Loa will thus become extinct within 500,000 to one million years from now . eos
magma comes from the Hawaii hotspot , which has been responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian island chain for tens of millions of years . The slow drift of the Pacific Plate will eventually carry Mauna_Loa away from the hotspot , and Mauna_Loa will thus become extinct within 500,000 to one million years from now . Mauna_Loa most recent eruption occurred from march 24 1984 , to april 15 1984 . eos
away from the hotspot , and Mauna_Loa will thus become extinct within 500,000 to one million years from now . Mauna_Loa most recent eruption occurred from march 24 1984 , to april 15 1984 . No recent eruptions of Mauna_Loa have caused fatalities , but eruptions in 1926 and 1950 destroyed villages , and the city of Hilo is partly built on lava flows from the late nineteenth century . eos
will thus become extinct within 500,000 to one million years from now . Mauna_Loa most recent eruption occurred from march 24 1984 , to april 15 1984 . most recent eruption occurred from march 24 1984 , to april 15 1984 . No recent eruptions of Mauna_Loa have caused fatalities , but eruptions in 1926 and 1950 destroyed villages , and the city of Hilo is partly built on lava flows from the late nineteenth century . In view of the hazards Mauna_Loa poses to population centers , Mauna_Loa is part of the Decade Volcanoes program , which encourages studies of the most dangerous volcanoes . eos
have caused fatalities , but eruptions in 1926 and 1950 destroyed villages , and the city of Hilo is partly built on lava flows from the late nineteenth century . In view of the hazards Mauna_Loa poses to population centers , Mauna_Loa is part of the Decade Volcanoes program , which encourages studies of the most dangerous volcanoes . Mauna_Loa has been intensively monitored by the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory ( HVO ) since 1912 . eos
poses to population centers , Mauna_Loa is part of the Decade Volcanoes program , which encourages studies of the most dangerous volcanoes . Mauna_Loa has been intensively monitored by the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory ( HVO ) since 1912 . Observations of the atmosphere are undertaken at the Mauna Loa Observatory , and of the Sun at the Mauna Loa Solar Observatory , both located near Mauna_Loa summit . eos

Hawaii Volcanoes National Park covers the summit and the southeastern flank of Mauna_Loa , including a separate volcano , Kilauea . eos

is an active volcano in the Philippines on the island of Luzon , in the province of Albay in the Bicol Region . Mayon_Volcano almost perfectly - shaped cone is considered by some to be the Philippine equivalent of Mount Fuji in Japan . Mayon_Volcano is situated 15 kilometres northwest of Legazpi City . eos
almost perfectly - shaped cone is considered by some to be the Philippine equivalent of Mount Fuji in Japan . Mayon_Volcano is situated 15 kilometres northwest of Legazpi City . Mayon_Volcano is classified by volcanologists as a stratovolcano ( composite volcano ) . eos
is situated 15 kilometres northwest of Legazpi City . Mayon_Volcano is classified by volcanologists as a stratovolcano ( composite volcano ) . Mayon_Volcano symmetric cone was formed through alternate pyroclastic and lava flows . eos
is classified by volcanologists as a stratovolcano ( composite volcano ) . Mayon_Volcano symmetric cone was formed through alternate pyroclastic and lava flows . Mayon_Volcano is the most active volcano in the country , having erupted over 47 times in the past 400 years . eos
symmetric cone was formed through alternate pyroclastic and lava flows . Mayon_Volcano is the most active volcano in the country , having erupted over 47 times in the past 400 years . Mayon_Volcano is located between the Eurasian and the Philippine Plate , at a convergent plate boundary : where a continental plate meets an oceanic plate , the lighter continental plate overrides the oceanic plate , forcing it down ; magma is formed where the rock melts . eos
is the most active volcano in the country , having erupted over 47 times in the past 400 years . Mayon_Volcano is located between the Eurasian and the Philippine Plate , at a convergent plate boundary : where a continental plate meets an oceanic plate , the lighter continental plate overrides the oceanic plate , forcing it down ; magma is formed where the rock melts . Like other volcanoes located around the rim of the Pacific Ocean , Mayon_Volcano is a part of the ` ` Pacific Ring of Fire '' . eos
is located between the Eurasian and the Philippine Plate , at a convergent plate boundary : where a continental plate meets an oceanic plate , the lighter continental plate overrides the oceanic plate , forcing it down ; magma is formed where the rock melts . Like other volcanoes located around the rim of the Pacific Ocean , Mayon_Volcano is a part of the ` ` Pacific Ring of Fire '' . eos
is a part of the ` ` Pacific Ring of Fire '' . eos
is the highest peak in the Snowy Range , a part of the Medicine Bow Mountains , about 35 miles west of Laramie , Wyoming . Medicine_Bow_Peak lies within Medicine Bow National Forest . The summit is over 12,013 feet ( 3,661 m ) high and is visible from Snowy Range Pass , elevation 10,847 ft ( 3,300 m ) , on Wyoming Highway 130 , a Wyoming Scenic Byway . eos
lies within Medicine Bow National Forest . The summit is over 12,013 feet ( 3,661 m ) high and is visible from Snowy Range Pass , elevation 10,847 ft ( 3,300 m ) , on Wyoming Highway 130 , a Wyoming Scenic Byway . The most commonly used trail to the peak is a four - mile hike featuring switch - backs and a great deal of loose rock . eos
is usually covered with snow from october to late june . During winter the peak can be reached by snowshoe or by skiing . Summer conditions can be extreme , with frequent thunderstorms and hail during the afternoons . eos
is a mountain in Naltar Valley in the Gilgit District of Northern Areas of Pakistan . Mehrbani_Peak lies in the northwest of Naltar Peak ( 4,678 m ) and in the south of the Snow Dome peak ( 5,029 m ) ( there is another Snow Dome peak near Concordia ) . eos
lies in the northwest of Naltar Peak ( 4,678 m ) and in the south of the Snow Dome peak ( 5,029 m ) ( there is another Snow Dome peak near Concordia ) . eos
is a mountain in the Massif des Écrins range , located at the border of the Hautes - Alpes and Isère départements . Meije overlooks the nearby village of La Grave , a mountaineering centre and ski resort , well - known for Meije off - piste and extreme skiing possibilities . Meije is composed of three principal summits . eos
overlooks the nearby village of La Grave , a mountaineering centre and ski resort , well - known for Meije off - piste and extreme skiing possibilities . Meije is composed of three principal summits . The highest point is the Grand Pic de la Meije at 3,984 metres . eos
off - piste and extreme skiing possibilities . Meije is composed of three principal summits . The highest point is the Grand Pic de la Meije at 3,984 metres . eos
is composed of three principal summits . The highest point is the Grand Pic de la Meije at 3,984 metres . The Doigt de Dieu ( English : Finger of God ) , a large snow - clad tower at the east end of the ridge , overhanging the south slopes , is an attraction for mountaineers of all levels of ability . eos
was made on august 16 , 1877 by Emmanuel Boileau de Castelneu and Pierre Gaspard and son . In 1891 , J H. Gibson , U Almer and F Boss made the first traverse of the ridge , from west to east . For mountaineering , Meije can be approached from two mountain refuges : eos
can be approached from two mountain refuges : * The refuge du Promontoire at 3,082 metres , is situated at the bottom of the steep south buttress of the peak , and allows access to routes on the south face of Meije . * eos
. * The refuge de l'Aigle at 3,450 metres , is situated at the top of the Tabuchet glacier , and allows access to the north face . eos

is the highest peak of the Cordillera de la Ramada range and the eighth highest mountain of the Andes . Mercedario is located 100 km to the north of Aconcagua , in the Argentine province of San Juan . Mercedario was first ascended in 1934 by Adam Karpiński and Wiktor Ostrowski , members of a Polish andinist expedition led by Konstanty Jodko - Narkiewicz . eos
is located 100 km to the north of Aconcagua , in the Argentine province of San Juan . Mercedario was first ascended in 1934 by Adam Karpiński and Wiktor Ostrowski , members of a Polish andinist expedition led by Konstanty Jodko - Narkiewicz . eos

is a peak in the Palisades group , part of the central Sierra Nevada Mountains in the US state of California . Middle_Palisade rises to 14,012 feet ( 4,271 m ) , and Middle_Palisade is the twelfth highest peak in the state . Several routes involving exposed scrambling and/or easy technical rock climbing ( class 4 ) exist on the various flanks of Middle_Palisade . eos
rises to 14,012 feet ( 4,271 m ) , and Middle_Palisade is the twelfth highest peak in the state . Several routes involving exposed scrambling and/or easy technical rock climbing ( class 4 ) exist on the various flanks of Middle_Palisade . Some routes involve travel on the Middle Palisade Glacier . eos
is the twelfth highest peak in the state . Several routes involving exposed scrambling and/or easy technical rock climbing ( class 4 ) exist on the various flanks of Middle_Palisade . Some routes involve travel on the Middle Palisade Glacier . eos
. Some routes involve travel on the Middle Palisade Glacier . The easiest route involves scrambling ( class 3 ) up a chute in the east face of Middle_Palisade . eos

is the third highest peak in the Teton Range , Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming . Middle_Teton is immediately southwest of Grand Teton and the two are separated from one another by the lower saddle , a broad high ridge at 11,600 feet ( 3,540 m ) . The Middle Teton Glacier is located on the eastern slopes of Middle_Teton . eos
is immediately southwest of Grand Teton and the two are separated from one another by the lower saddle , a broad high ridge at 11,600 feet ( 3,540 m ) . The Middle Teton Glacier is located on the eastern slopes of Middle_Teton . Middle_Teton is a classic pyramidal shaped alpine peak and Middle_Teton is sometimes included as part of the Cathedral Group of high Teton peaks . eos
. Middle_Teton is a classic pyramidal shaped alpine peak and Middle_Teton is sometimes included as part of the Cathedral Group of high Teton peaks . The 40 mi long Teton Range is the youngest mountain chain in the Rocky Mountains , and began their uplift 9 million years ago , during the Miocene . eos
is a classic pyramidal shaped alpine peak and Middle_Teton is sometimes included as part of the Cathedral Group of high Teton peaks . The 40 mi long Teton Range is the youngest mountain chain in the Rocky Mountains , and began their uplift 9 million years ago , during the Miocene . Several periods of glaciation have carved Middle_Teton and the other peaks of the range into their current shapes . eos
is sometimes included as part of the Cathedral Group of high Teton peaks . The 40 mi long Teton Range is the youngest mountain chain in the Rocky Mountains , and began their uplift 9 million years ago , during the Miocene . Several periods of glaciation have carved Middle_Teton and the other peaks of the range into their current shapes . eos
and the other peaks of the range into their current shapes . From the lower saddle , a distinctive feature known as the black dike appears as a straight line running from near the top of Middle_Teton down 800 feet ( 240 m ) . The black dike is a basaltic intrusion that occurred long after the surrounding rock was formed . eos
down 800 feet ( 240 m ) . The black dike is a basaltic intrusion that occurred long after the surrounding rock was formed . eos
are a series of jagged peaks in the Sierra Nevada Mountains of the state of California in the southwestern United States . Collectively , Minarets_California form an arête and Minarets_California are a prominent feature in the Ansel Adams Wilderness . Minarets_California were named by the California Geographical Survey in 1868 , which reported : ` ` To the south of Mount Ritter are some grand pinnacles of granite , very lofty and apparently inaccessible , to which we gave the name of ` the Minarets . ' '' eos
form an arête and Minarets_California are a prominent feature in the Ansel Adams Wilderness . Minarets_California were named by the California Geographical Survey in 1868 , which reported : ` ` To the south of Mount Ritter are some grand pinnacles of granite , very lofty and apparently inaccessible , to which we gave the name of ` the Minarets . ' '' Seventeen of Minarets_California have been given unofficial names , including Michael Minaret , Adams Minaret , Leonard Minaret , and Clyde Minaret . eos
are a prominent feature in the Ansel Adams Wilderness . Minarets_California were named by the California Geographical Survey in 1868 , which reported : ` ` To the south of Mount Ritter are some grand pinnacles of granite , very lofty and apparently inaccessible , to which we gave the name of ` the Minarets . ' '' Seventeen of Minarets_California have been given unofficial names , including Michael Minaret , Adams Minaret , Leonard Minaret , and Clyde Minaret . eos
were named by the California Geographical Survey in 1868 , which reported : ` ` To the south of Mount Ritter are some grand pinnacles of granite , very lofty and apparently inaccessible , to which we gave the name of ` the Minarets . ' '' Seventeen of Minarets_California have been given unofficial names , including Michael Minaret , Adams Minaret , Leonard Minaret , and Clyde Minaret . Walter A Starr , Jr. , author of Starr 's Guide to the John Muir Trail and the High Sierra Region , fell to his death while solo - climbing Michael Minaret in 1933 . eos
have been given unofficial names , including Michael Minaret , Adams Minaret , Leonard Minaret , and Clyde Minaret . Walter A Starr , Jr. , author of Starr 's Guide to the John Muir Trail and the High Sierra Region , fell to his death while solo - climbing Michael Minaret in 1933 . Until 1984 , the Ansel Adams Wilderness was named the Minaret Wilderness after Minarets_California . eos

is an iconic mountain in the South Island of New Zealand . Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand is one of the most photographed peaks in the country . The distinctive shape of Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand in southern New Zealand gives Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand name , after the mitre headwear of Christian bishops . eos
is one of the most photographed peaks in the country . The distinctive shape of Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand in southern New Zealand gives Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand name , after the mitre headwear of Christian bishops . Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand was named by a survey crew from the HMS Acheron . eos
in southern New Zealand gives Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand name , after the mitre headwear of Christian bishops . name , after the mitre headwear of Christian bishops . Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand was named by a survey crew from the HMS Acheron . Part of the reason for Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand iconic status is Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand location . eos
was named by a survey crew from the HMS Acheron . Part of the reason for Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand iconic status is Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand location . Close to the shore of Milford Sound , in the Fiordland National Park in the southwestern South Island , Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand is a stunning sight . eos
iconic status is Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand location . Close to the shore of Milford Sound , in the Fiordland National Park in the southwestern South Island , Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand is a stunning sight . Rising to 1,692 metres from the water of the sound ( more technically a fjord ) , Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand is actually a closely grouped set of five peaks , although from most easily accessible viewpoints Mitre_Peak_New_Zealand appears as a single point . eos

is a stratovolcano in the Chilean province of Valdivia in the Andes . Mocho-Choshuenco has recorded eruptions from 1864 and 1937 but Mocho-Choshuenco is actually inactive . The highest part of Mocho-Choshuenco forms the Mocho - Choshuenco National Reserve , the east parts of Mocho-Choshuenco borders the Huilo - Huilo Natural Reserve . eos
has recorded eruptions from 1864 and 1937 but Mocho-Choshuenco is actually inactive . Mocho-Choshuenco has two peaks : the Choshuenco in north - west with 2415mts and the Mocho at south - east with 2422mts . eos

( German : ` ` monk '' ) is a mountain in the Swiss Alps . Together with the Eiger and the Jungfrau Moench forms a salient tripartite group visible from far away . eos
forms a salient tripartite group visible from far away . Moench was first climbed on august 15 , 1857 by Christian Almer , Christian Kaufmann , Ulrich Kaufmann and Sigismund Porges . eos

or Phola Gangchen is an eastern outlier of Shishapangma , the 14th highest peak in the world . Both are in the Jugal Himal , a subrange of the Himalaya in Tibet . ( This range is contiguous with , and often considered as part of , the Langtang Himal . ) eos
elevation is also given as 7,661 m ( 25,134 ft ) ; the elevation given here is from a Chinese survey . ( Neate 1989:52 ) Molamenqing is little - known , partly since Molamenqing does not have much independent stature . Molamenqing topographic prominence , ie Molamenqing rise above the saddle connecting Molamenqing with Shishapangma , is only 430 metres , which is relatively small for a Himalayan peak , although large enough for Molamenqing to qualify in some reckonings as an independent peak . eos
is little - known , partly since Molamenqing does not have much independent stature . Molamenqing topographic prominence , ie Molamenqing rise above the saddle connecting Molamenqing with Shishapangma , is only 430 metres , which is relatively small for a Himalayan peak , although large enough for Molamenqing to qualify in some reckonings as an independent peak . Molamenqing did enjoy a temporary fame in the early 1980 's . eos
does not have much independent stature . Molamenqing did enjoy a temporary fame in the early 1980 's . eos
topographic prominence , ie Molamenqing rise above the saddle connecting Molamenqing with Shishapangma , is only 430 metres , which is relatively small for a Himalayan peak , although large enough for Molamenqing to qualify in some reckonings as an independent peak . Molamenqing did enjoy a temporary fame in the early 1980 's . At the time Molamenqing was one of the highest unclimbed peaks in the world ( using a prominence cutoff low enough to qualify Molamenqing as a separate summit ) . eos

did enjoy a temporary fame in the early 1980 's . At the time Molamenqing was one of the highest unclimbed peaks in the world ( using a prominence cutoff low enough to qualify Molamenqing as a separate summit ) . A team from New Zealand applied to the Chinese authorities to climb Molamenqing , and became one of the first Western teams to be allowed to climb in Tibet since before World War II . eos
was one of the highest unclimbed peaks in the world ( using a prominence cutoff low enough to qualify Molamenqing as a separate summit ) . A team from New Zealand applied to the Chinese authorities to climb Molamenqing , and became one of the first Western teams to be allowed to climb in Tibet since before World War II . The team succeeded in making the first , and so far the only , ascent of Molamenqing . eos
as a separate summit ) . A team from New Zealand applied to the Chinese authorities to climb Molamenqing , and became one of the first Western teams to be allowed to climb in Tibet since before World War II . The team succeeded in making the first , and so far the only , ascent of Molamenqing . eos
, and became one of the first Western teams to be allowed to climb in Tibet since before World War II . The team succeeded in making the first , and so far the only , ascent of Molamenqing . They started from the east side of Molamenqing , but their long route went via the north side of Shishapangma and approached the summit from the west . eos
. They started from the east side of Molamenqing , but their long route went via the north side of Shishapangma and approached the summit from the west . The Index lists no other attempts on Molamenqing . eos
