( Romanian : Vârful Moldoveanu ) is the highest mountain in Romania , being located in the Făgăraş Mountains of the Southern Carpathians . The most used paths to reach Moldoveanu_Peak are over the Vistea Mare Peak ( 2527 m ) , by paths coming from Podragu , Sambata , or by the Vistea Valley . eos
are over the Vistea Mare Peak ( 2527 m ) , by paths coming from Podragu , Sambata , or by the Vistea Valley . The closest locality is Victoria , on the north side . On the south side Moldoveanu_Peak is accessible from northwest of Câmpulung . eos
is accessible from northwest of Câmpulung . eos
( Italian for white mountain ) or Mont Blanc ( French , same meaning ) also known as ` ` La Dame Blanche '' ( French , the white lady ) is a mountain in the Alps . With Mont_Blanc 4,808 m summit , Mont_Blanc is the highest mountain in the Alps and Western Europe . eos
4,808 m summit , Mont_Blanc is the highest mountain in the Alps and Western Europe . Mont_Blanc lies between the regions of Aosta Valley , Italy , and Haute - Savoie , France . The location of the summit itself is a subject of controversy between the two countries , as each tends to place it within its own boundaries on maps . eos
is the highest mountain in the Alps and Western Europe . Mont_Blanc lies between the regions of Aosta Valley , Italy , and Haute - Savoie , France . The location of the summit itself is a subject of controversy between the two countries , as each tends to place it within its own boundaries on maps . eos
lies between the regions of Aosta Valley , Italy , and Haute - Savoie , France . The location of the summit itself is a subject of controversy between the two countries , as each tends to place it within its own boundaries on maps . In a convention between France and Kingdom of Sardinia , in Turin ( 1861 ) , the border was fixed on the highest point of Mont_Blanc . eos
. This was the last official definition of this border , but often the French maps do not respect this solution . The two most famous towns near Mont_Blanc are Courmayeur , in Aosta Valley , Italy , and Chamonix , in Haute - Savoie , France - the site of the first Winter Olympics . eos
are Courmayeur , in Aosta Valley , Italy , and Chamonix , in Haute - Savoie , France - the site of the first Winter Olympics . between these two cities and is one of the major trans - Alpine transport routes . The Mont Blanc Massif is popular for mountaineering , hiking , and skiing . eos
( 4,748 m ) in the Mont Blanc massif in Italy , is the second highest mountain in the Alps and the second highest point in Italy . ( Occitan : Ventor in classical norm or Ventour in Mistralian norm ) is a mountain in the Provence region of southern France , located some 20 km north - east of Carpentras , Vaucluse . eos
borders the Drôme département . Mont_Ventoux is the largest mountain in the region and Mont_Ventoux has been nicknamed the ` ` Giant of Provence '' , or ` ` The Bald Mountain '' . As the name might suggest ( venteux means windy in French ) , it can get windy at the summit , especially with the mistral ; windspeeds as high as 320 km / h ( 193 mph ) have been recorded . eos
is the largest mountain in the region and Mont_Ventoux has been nicknamed the ` ` Giant of Provence '' , or ` ` The Bald Mountain '' . As the name might suggest ( venteux means windy in French ) , it can get windy at the summit , especially with the mistral ; windspeeds as high as 320 km / h ( 193 mph ) have been recorded . The road over Mont_Ventoux is often closed due to high winds . eos
has been nicknamed the ` ` Giant of Provence '' , or ` ` The Bald Mountain '' . As the name might suggest ( venteux means windy in French ) , it can get windy at the summit , especially with the mistral ; windspeeds as high as 320 km / h ( 193 mph ) have been recorded . The road over Mont_Ventoux is often closed due to high winds . eos
is often closed due to high winds . The real origins of the name are thought to trace back to the 1st or 2nd century AD , when Mont_Ventoux was named ` Vintur ' after a Gaulish god of the summits , or ` Ven - Top ' , meaning ` ` snowy peak '' in the ancient Gallic language . In the 10th century , the names Mons Ventosus and Mons Ventorius appear . eos
was named ` Vintur ' after a Gaulish god of the summits , or ` Ven - Top ' , meaning ` ` snowy peak '' in the ancient Gallic language . In the 10th century , the names Mons Ventosus and Mons Ventorius appear . Mont_Ventoux , although geologically part of the Alps , is often considered to be separate from them , due to the lack of mountains of a similar height nearby . eos
, although geologically part of the Alps , is often considered to be separate from them , due to the lack of mountains of a similar height nearby . The top of Mont_Ventoux is bare limestone without vegetation or trees . eos

( Mont Perdu in French , both meaning lost mountain ) is the third highest mountain in the Pyrenees . The summit of Monte_Perdido ( 3355 m ) , located in Spain , lies hidden from France by the seemingly impenetrable peaks of the Cirques of Gavarnie and Estaube . eos
( 3355 m ) , located in Spain , lies hidden from France by the seemingly impenetrable peaks of the Cirques of Gavarnie and Estaube . To get to Monte_Perdido from Spain is easier . Explorers first had to hike from the Aragonese village of Torla along the huge Ordesa Valley and then up through the Circo de Soaso before attempting the stiff climb to the summit . eos
from Spain is easier . Explorers first had to hike from the Aragonese village of Torla along the huge Ordesa Valley and then up through the Circo de Soaso before attempting the stiff climb to the summit . Monte_Perdido is the centrepiece of the Spanish Ordesa y eos
is the centrepiece of the Spanish Ordesa y Monte Perdido National Park which was established in 1918 with just 21 square kilometres of land . Today the park has grown significantly to 156 square kilometres and incorporates the whole of the Añisclo Canyon . eos
is an extinct volcano in La Rioja Province , Argentina . Monte_Pissis is the third highest in the Western Hemisphere , and Monte_Pissis is located about 550 km north of Aconcagua . Due to Monte_Pissis location in the Atacama Desert , Monte_Pissis has very dry conditions with snow only remaining on the peak during winter . eos
is the third highest in the Western Hemisphere , and Monte_Pissis is located about 550 km north of Aconcagua . Due to Monte_Pissis location in the Atacama Desert , Monte_Pissis has very dry conditions with snow only remaining on the peak during winter . Monte_Pissis is very high and remote , however the ascent is but a hike , albeit a long one . eos

In 1994 it was claimed by Argentine authorities that an advanced GPS survey had determined that the elevation of Monte_Pissis was 6,882 m , and higher than Ojos del Salado , but SRTM data and several modern GPS surveys have proved that this widely reproduced and repeated claim is incorrect . eos

( known as Cerro Roraima in Spanish , Monte Roraima in Portuguese ) , with a peak at 2,810 metres ( 8986 feet ) , is the highest of Venezuela 's distinctive table - top mountains , known as tepuis . Monte_Roraima marks the border between Venezuela , Brazil and Guyana , although more than three quarters of Monte_Roraima is in Venezuelan territory . Monte_Roraima is the highset mountain in Guyana , but Venezuela and Brazil have higher mountains . eos
marks the border between Venezuela , Brazil and Guyana , although more than three quarters of Monte_Roraima is in Venezuelan territory . Monte_Roraima is the highset mountain in Guyana , but Venezuela and Brazil have higher mountains . The triple border point on the summit is at 5 ° 12 ' 08N , 60 ° 44 ' 07W . eos
is in Venezuelan territory . Monte_Roraima is the highset mountain in Guyana , but Venezuela and Brazil have higher mountains . The triple border point on the summit is at 5 ° 12 ' 08N , 60 ° 44 ' 07W . eos
is the highset mountain in Guyana , but Venezuela and Brazil have higher mountains . The triple border point on the summit is at 5 ° 12 ' 08N , 60 ° 44 ' 07W . Monte_Roraima lies on the Guiana Shield in the southeastern corner of Venezuela 's 30,000 km ² Canaima National Park , which is roughly located in the Gran Sabana region . eos
lies on the Guiana Shield in the southeastern corner of Venezuela 's 30,000 km ² Canaima National Park , which is roughly located in the Gran Sabana region . The tabletop mountains of the park are considered some of the oldest geological formations on Earth , dating back to the Precambrian Era , some two billion years ago . The average height of Monte_Roraima is about 2,500 metres ( 8,200 feet ) , making Monte_Roraima the highest point for distance of 549.44 kilometres ( 341.48 miles ) in any direction . eos
is about 2,500 metres ( 8,200 feet ) , making Monte_Roraima the highest point for distance of 549.44 kilometres ( 341.48 miles ) in any direction . The nearest peak that is taller is Cerro Marahuaca , to the west - southwest . Despite the fact the steep sides of Monte_Roraima make Monte_Roraima difficult to access , Monte_Roraima was the first major tepui to be climbed : eos

inspired Sir Arthur Conan Doyle to write his classic adventure yarn , The Lost World , in 1912 - now made into countless films . Since long before the arrival of European explorers in Venezuela Monte_Roraima has held a special significance for the indigenous people of the region and Monte_Roraima is central to many of their myths and legends . eos
has held a special significance for the indigenous people of the region and Monte_Roraima is central to many of their myths and legends . The Pemon Indians of the Gran Sabana see Monte_Roraima as the stump of a mighty tree that once held all the fruits and tuberous vegetables in the world . Felled by one of their ancestors , the tree crashed to the ground , unleashing a terrible flood . eos
is central to many of their myths and legends . , also known as Monte Cochrane , is a mountain on the border between Argentina and Chile . Monte_San_Lorenzo is covered by three large glaciers ( two in Argentina and one in Chile ) . The Argentine glaciers show clear evidence of retreat . eos

, also known as Monte San Clemente , is the highest mountain in Chilean Patagonia and the highest mountain south of 40 ° S outside Antarctica . Monte_San_Valentin stands at the north end of the North Patagonian Icefield . Monte_San_Valentin can be climbed from Lago Leones , to the south east , or from Laguna San Rafael , to the west . eos
stands at the north end of the North Patagonian Icefield . Monte_San_Valentin can be climbed from Lago Leones , to the south east , or from Laguna San Rafael , to the west . The ascent is long and is particularly subject to bad weather . eos
can be climbed from Lago Leones , to the south east , or from Laguna San Rafael , to the west . The ascent is long and is particularly subject to bad weather . The accident and fatality rate is high . eos
in 1993 included two surveyors , who calculated an elevation of 4,080 ± 20 m by using a GPS . In 2001 a group measured 4,070 ± 40 m , also using GPS . SRTM data also supports an elevation in excess of 4,000 metres . eos
is a pyramidal peak with a glaciated saddle - shaped summit located in Alberto de Agostini National Park , Chile . Monte_Sarmiento rises abruptly from the east shore of the Magdalena Channel and Monte_Sarmiento marks the western border of the Cordillera Darwin . is the second highest mountain in New Hampshire , after Mt. is the highest peak in the northeast United States which does not have an auto road to the summit . Located in the Northern Presidential Range , Mount_Adams_New_Hampshire was named after John Adams , the second president of the United States . Mount_Adams_New_Hampshire was given this name on july 31 , 1820 . eos
was named after John Adams , the second president of the United States . Mount_Adams_New_Hampshire was given this name on july 31 , 1820 . To the north and east is Mount Madison and to the south and west is Mount Jefferson . eos
was given this name on july 31 , 1820 . To the north and east is Mount Madison and to the south and west is Mount Jefferson . There are two major subsidiary peaks of Mount_Adams_New_Hampshire : Mount Sam Adams and Mount Quincy Adams , named after John Adams ' cousin , Revolutionary leader Samuel Adams , and son , President John Quincy Adams , respectively . eos
: Mount Sam Adams and Mount Quincy Adams , named after John Adams ' cousin , Revolutionary leader Samuel Adams , and son , President John Quincy Adams , respectively . These peaks along with the two other sub - peaks , Adams 4 and Adams 5 are collectively referred to as the ` ` Adams Family '' of peaks . is a mountain Located in Iligan City , Philippines Mount_Agad-Agad has an estimated height 1,600 feet above sea level . or Gunung Agung is a mountain in Bali . This stratovolcano is the highest point on the island . Mount_Agung dominates the surrounding area influencing the climate . eos
dominates the surrounding area influencing the climate . The clouds come from the west and Mount_Agung takes their water so that the west is lush and green and the east dry and barren . Mount_Agung last erupted in 1963 - 64 and Mount_Agung is still active , with a large and very deep crater which occasionally belches smoke and ash . eos
takes their water so that the west is lush and green and the east dry and barren . Mount_Agung last erupted in 1963 - 64 and Mount_Agung is still active , with a large and very deep crater which occasionally belches smoke and ash . From a distance , Mount_Agung appears to be perfectly conical , despite the existence of the large crater . eos

is a 3,990 metre high mountain in the Wharton Range in Central Province , Papua New Guinea . Mount_Albert_Edward_Papua_New_Guinea consists of two peaks about 400 metres apart , a cross marks the top of the slightly higher western peak and a trig station marks the eastern peak . Mount_Albert_Edward_Papua_New_Guinea lies approximately 140 km north of Port Moresby . eos
consists of two peaks about 400 metres apart , a cross marks the top of the slightly higher western peak and a trig station marks the eastern peak . Mount_Albert_Edward_Papua_New_Guinea lies approximately 140 km north of Port Moresby . The first recorded ascent was in 1906 by C A W Monckton . eos
lies approximately 140 km north of Port Moresby . The first recorded ascent was in 1906 by C A W Monckton . There were further ascents in the early 20th century , but the first detailed account was made in 1935 following an ascent by Richard Archbold and Austin L Rand in 1933 . eos
, or Boundary Peak 180 , is a high peak in the Saint Elias Mountains , on the border between Alaska and the Yukon Territory . Mount_Alverstone shares a large massif with the higher Mount Hubbard to the south and the slightly lower Mount Kennedy to the east . The summit of Mount_Alverstone marks a sharp turn in the Alaska / Canada border ; the border goes south from this point toward the Alaska panhandle and west toward Mount Saint Elias . eos

is a caldera ( about 10 km in diameter ) located in the Aleutian Range of Alaska , United States . The area around Mount_Aniakchak is the Aniakchak National Monument and Preserve , maintained by the National Park Service . Mount_Aniakchak is an extant volcano - at least ten lava flows have occurred since the formation of the caldera in 1645 B.C. ; the most recent was in 1931 . eos
is the Aniakchak National Monument and Preserve , maintained by the National Park Service . Mount_Aniakchak is an extant volcano - at least ten lava flows have occurred since the formation of the caldera in 1645 B.C. ; the most recent was in 1931 . Surprise Lake within the caldera is the source of the Aniakchak River , a National Wild River . eos
is an extant volcano - at least ten lava flows have occurred since the formation of the caldera in 1645 B.C. ; the most recent was in 1931 . Surprise Lake within the caldera is the source of the Aniakchak River , a National Wild River . In november of 1967 , Mount_Aniakchak was designated as a National Natural Landmark by the National Park Service . eos
was designated as a National Natural Landmark by the National Park Service . eos
( "" IPA : ænˈtɛɹoʊ "" ) is the tenth highest peak in Colorado , with an elevation of 14,269 ft ( 4,349 m ) . Mount_Antero is named for Chief Antero of the Uintah band of Utes . eos
is named for Chief Antero of the Uintah band of Utes . Mount_Antero is located in the central Sawatch Range in Chaffee County between the towns of Buena Vista and Salida . Mount_Antero is prized for Mount_Antero gemstone deposits and Mount_Antero has one of the highest concentrations of aquamarine in the country . eos
is located in the central Sawatch Range in Chaffee County between the towns of Buena Vista and Salida . Mount_Antero is prized for Mount_Antero gemstone deposits and Mount_Antero has one of the highest concentrations of aquamarine in the country . There are several active private mining claims being exploited on Mount_Antero and surrounding peaks . eos

is located entirely within the San Isabel National Forest , due south of the more visually prominent Mount Princeton . There are two popular climbing routes on Mount_Antero . The generally accepted hiking route is from the east starting at the Browns Creek Trailhead and paralleling Little Browns Creek to its upper reaches where it crosses Forest Road 1A , then following the road near to the summit . eos
. The generally accepted hiking route is from the east starting at the Browns Creek Trailhead and paralleling Little Browns Creek to its upper reaches where it crosses Forest Road 1A , then following the road near to the summit . The other route follows the same forest road from the north up Baldwin Creek . eos
was surveyed by the Pike Expedition in 1806 . A forest service sign at the Browns Creek trailhead commemorates the expedition camp at the eastern base of Mount_Antero . eos
. eos
is a large stratovolcano on the island of Mindanao in the Philippines . Mount_Apo is the highest mountain in the country and Mount_Apo overlooks Davao City , a few kilometres to the northeast . Mount_Apo name means ` ` master '' or ` ` grandfather '' . eos
is the highest mountain in the country and Mount_Apo overlooks Davao City , a few kilometres to the northeast . Mount_Apo name means ` ` master '' or ` ` grandfather '' . Mount_Apo is flat topped , with three peaks , and Mount_Apo is capped by a 500 m wide volcanic crater containing a small crater lake . eos
overlooks Davao City , a few kilometres to the northeast . Mount_Apo name means ` ` master '' or ` ` grandfather '' . Mount_Apo is flat topped , with three peaks , and Mount_Apo is capped by a 500 m wide volcanic crater containing a small crater lake . eos
name means ` ` master '' or ` ` grandfather '' . Mount_Apo is flat topped , with three peaks , and Mount_Apo is capped by a 500 m wide volcanic crater containing a small crater lake . Mount_Apo is a source of geothermal energy , but the date of Mount_Apo most recent eruption is unknown , and none are verified in historic times . eos
is flat topped , with three peaks , and Mount_Apo is capped by a 500 m wide volcanic crater containing a small crater lake . Mount_Apo is a source of geothermal energy , but the date of Mount_Apo most recent eruption is unknown , and none are verified in historic times . Mount_Apo is one of the most popular climbing destinations in the Philippines , and the summit is easy to reach . eos

( ` ` Արագած '' in Armenian ) is the highest point in Armenia located in the province of Aragatsotn , northwest from Yerevan . Mount_Aragats is a standalone extinct stratovolcano with four main peaks forming the rim of the crater , and Mount_Aragats is a popular destination for local alpinists . Located on Mount_Aragats slopes are the Byurakan Observatory and the medieval Amberd Fortress . eos
is a standalone extinct stratovolcano with four main peaks forming the rim of the crater , and Mount_Aragats is a popular destination for local alpinists . Located on Mount_Aragats slopes are the Byurakan Observatory and the medieval Amberd Fortress . The observatory is known worldwide , and it is one of the main observatories in the world . eos
is a popular destination for local alpinists . Located on Mount_Aragats slopes are the Byurakan Observatory and the medieval Amberd Fortress . The observatory is known worldwide , and it is one of the main observatories in the world . eos

is a popular destination for tourists , especially in summer . To the south of Mount_Aragats is Ashtarak , one of the main cities . On the other sides of the mountains are villages and towns . eos

is a twin peaked mountain with two flat - topped cylindrical rock towers , separated by a saddle . Mount_Asgard is located in Auyuittuq National Park , on the Cumberland Peninsula of Baffin Island , Nunavut , Canada . Mount_Asgard is named after Asgard , the realm of the gods in Norse Mythology . eos
is located in Auyuittuq National Park , on the Cumberland Peninsula of Baffin Island , Nunavut , Canada . Mount_Asgard is named after Asgard , the realm of the gods in Norse Mythology . Mount_Asgard is perhaps the most famous of the Baffin Mountains . eos
is named after Asgard , the realm of the gods in Norse Mythology . Mount_Asgard is perhaps the most famous of the Baffin Mountains . Mount_Asgard slightly higher North Peak was first ascended in 1953 by H Webber , J Marmet , and Rothlisberger . eos
is perhaps the most famous of the Baffin Mountains . Mount_Asgard slightly higher North Peak was first ascended in 1953 by H Webber , J Marmet , and Rothlisberger . In 1976 , stuntman Rick Sylvester performed a BASE jump off Mount_Asgard for the opening sequence of the James Bond film The Spy eos
slightly higher North Peak was first ascended in 1953 by H Webber , J Marmet , and Rothlisberger . In 1976 , stuntman Rick Sylvester performed a BASE jump off Mount_Asgard for the opening sequence of the James Bond film The Spy Who Loved Me , although the fictional setting was the Alps . eos

is New Zealand 's highest mountain outside the Mount Cook region . Set within the South Island 's Mount Aspiring National Park , Mount_Aspiring has a height of 3,033 metres . Māori named Mount_Aspiring Tititea , which translates as Glistening Peak . eos
has a height of 3,033 metres . Māori named Mount_Aspiring Tititea , which translates as Glistening Peak . Named in december 1857 by the Chief Surveyor for the Otago Province , John Turnbull Thompson . eos
Tititea , which translates as Glistening Peak . Named in december 1857 by the Chief Surveyor for the Otago Province , John Turnbull Thompson . Mount_Aspiring lies at the junction of three major glacial systems - the Bonar Glacier , which drains into the Waipara River , and the Volta and Therma Glaciers , which both drain into the Waitoto River . eos
lies at the junction of three major glacial systems - the Bonar Glacier , which drains into the Waipara River , and the Volta and Therma Glaciers , which both drain into the Waitoto River . The Waipara is a tributary of the Arawhata River , and both the Arawhata and Waitoto Rivers flow out to the west coast in between Haast and Jackson Bay . Mount_Aspiring is usually accessed via the West Matukituki Valley , which is reached by a 50-kilometre road from Wanaka to a trailhead at Raspberry Flat . eos
is usually accessed via the West Matukituki Valley , which is reached by a 50-kilometre road from Wanaka to a trailhead at Raspberry Flat . From here a network of huts provide staging points for climbers . The first is Mt Aspiring Hut , which is 8 kilometres ( or approximately two hours ' walk ) from the trailhead . eos
is a high peak of the Saint Elias Mountains on the border between the US state of Alaska and the Canadian territory of Yukon . eos
( elevation 10,778 feet , 3,285 m ) is a glaciated andesitic stratovolcano in the Cascade Volcanic Arc and the Cascades of Washington State in the United States about due east of the city of Bellingham , Whatcom County . Mount_Baker is also easily visible from much of Greater Victoria , Greater Vancouver and the Fraser Valley just across the Canadian border to the north , and especially from the communities of Mission and Abbotsford , both about 28 mi east of Vancouver , BC - as well as from some locations in Everett and even Seattle to the southwest . Local Native Americans call Mount_Baker ` ` Koma Kulshan , '' but the explorer George Vancouver named Mount_Baker for 3rd Lieutenant Joseph Baker of the HMS Discovery , who on april 30 , 1792 became the first European to see Mount_Baker . eos
is also easily visible from much of Greater Victoria , Greater Vancouver and the Fraser Valley just across the Canadian border to the north , and especially from the communities of Mission and Abbotsford , both about 28 mi east of Vancouver , BC - as well as from some locations in Everett and even Seattle to the southwest . Local Native Americans call Mount_Baker ` ` Koma Kulshan , '' but the explorer George Vancouver named Mount_Baker for 3rd Lieutenant Joseph Baker of the HMS Discovery , who on april 30 , 1792 became the first European to see Mount_Baker . After Mount Rainier , Mount_Baker is the most heavily glaciated of the Cascade volcanoes : the volume of snow and ice on Mount_Baker ( 0.43 cubic miles , 1.8 cubic kilometers ) is greater than that of all the other Cascades volcanoes ( except Rainier ) combined . eos
` ` Koma Kulshan , '' but the explorer George Vancouver named Mount_Baker for 3rd Lieutenant Joseph Baker of the HMS Discovery , who on april 30 , 1792 became the first European to see Mount_Baker . After Mount Rainier , Mount_Baker is the most heavily glaciated of the Cascade volcanoes : the volume of snow and ice on Mount_Baker ( 0.43 cubic miles , 1.8 cubic kilometers ) is greater than that of all the other Cascades volcanoes ( except Rainier ) combined . Mount_Baker is also one of the snowiest places in the world : in 1999 , Mount Baker Ski Area , located on a subsidiary peak , set the world record for snowfall in a single season . eos
for 3rd Lieutenant Joseph Baker of the HMS Discovery , who on april 30 , 1792 became the first European to see Mount_Baker . Mount_Baker is also one of the snowiest places in the world : in 1999 , Mount Baker Ski Area , located on a subsidiary peak , set the world record for snowfall in a single season . eos

is a mountain located on the Continental Divide , on the borders of Banff and Kootenay national parks in Canada . Mount_Ball is the highest peak of the Ball Range . Mount_Ball was named in 1858 by James Hector after John Ball , a politician who helped secure funding for the Palliser Expedition . eos
is the highest peak of the Ball Range . Mount_Ball was named in 1858 by James Hector after John Ball , a politician who helped secure funding for the Palliser Expedition . Mount_Ball can be ascended from a scrambling route by late summer but Mount_Ball involves remote bushwacking , which limits the number of attempts per year . eos

is a large mountain in the center of Baranof Island , Alaska - close to the town of Sitka . Mount_Bassie is a massive hulk of rock , Mount_Bassie footprint covering nearly five square miles . Mount_Bassie is bordered by the Blue Lake and Medvejie Lake watersheds and the Baranof River watershed , effectively splitting the island in two ( one can see both Chatham Strait and the Pacific Ocean from the peak or surrounding ridges ) . eos
is a massive hulk of rock , Mount_Bassie footprint covering nearly five square miles . Mount_Bassie is bordered by the Blue Lake and Medvejie Lake watersheds and the Baranof River watershed , effectively splitting the island in two ( one can see both Chatham Strait and the Pacific Ocean from the peak or surrounding ridges ) . Mount_Bassie is adjacent to Camp Lake from which ascents typically originate . eos
footprint covering nearly five square miles . Mount_Bassie is bordered by the Blue Lake and Medvejie Lake watersheds and the Baranof River watershed , effectively splitting the island in two ( one can see both Chatham Strait and the Pacific Ocean from the peak or surrounding ridges ) . Mount_Bassie is adjacent to Camp Lake from which ascents typically originate . eos
is bordered by the Blue Lake and Medvejie Lake watersheds and the Baranof River watershed , effectively splitting the island in two ( one can see both Chatham Strait and the Pacific Ocean from the peak or surrounding ridges ) . Mount_Bassie is adjacent to Camp Lake from which ascents typically originate . Mount_Bassie is fairly isolated in terms of sister peaks and Mount_Bassie has only two modest lower ridges running off the south and north sides of Mount_Bassie . eos
is adjacent to Camp Lake from which ascents typically originate . Mount_Bassie is fairly isolated in terms of sister peaks and Mount_Bassie has only two modest lower ridges running off the south and north sides of Mount_Bassie . The rest of Mount_Bassie slopes down steeply into surrounding river valleys . eos
is fairly isolated in terms of sister peaks and Mount_Bassie has only two modest lower ridges running off the south and north sides of Mount_Bassie . The rest of Mount_Bassie slopes down steeply into surrounding river valleys . Mount_Bassie is rarely summitted , although the western face is frequently traversed on the Baranof Cross - Island Trail . eos

( Gunung Batur ) is located at the center of two concentric calderas north west of Mount Agung , Bali , Indonesia . The south east side of the larger 10 × 13 km caldera contains a caldera lake . The inner 7.5-kilometer - wide caldera , which was formed during emplacement of the Bali ( or Ubud ) eos
has produced vents over much of the inner caldera , but a NE - SW fissure system has localized the Batur I , II , and III craters along the summit ridge . Historical eruptions have been characterized by mild - to - moderate explosive activity sometimes accompanied by lava emission . Basaltic lava flows from both summit and flank vents have reached the caldera floor and the shores of Lake Batur in historical time . eos
was in 1804 , and Mount_Batur has been frequently active since then . eos
has been frequently active since then . eos
is a peak along the crest of the Sierra Nevada Mountains in California , USA . Mount_Baxter_California lies within the John Muir Wilderness , just north of Baxter Pass . A flock of protected bighorn sheep live in the vicinity of Mount_Baxter_California . eos
lies within the John Muir Wilderness , just north of Baxter Pass . A flock of protected bighorn sheep live in the vicinity of Mount_Baxter_California . Because of this , access to Mount_Baxter_California is limited to december 15 through july 1 of every year . eos
. Because of this , access to Mount_Baxter_California is limited to december 15 through july 1 of every year . Mount_Baxter_California is to the northeast of the Rae Lakes , a popular backpacking destination along the John Muir Trail . eos
is limited to december 15 through july 1 of every year . Mount_Baxter_California is to the northeast of the Rae Lakes , a popular backpacking destination along the John Muir Trail . Mount_Baxter_California was probably named after John Baxter , a rancher in Owens Valley . eos

is a high , glaciated peak in the Saint Elias Range of Alaska . Mount_Bear lies within Wrangell - Saint Elias National Park , about 4 miles ( 6.4 km ) west of the Yukon border . The Barnard Glacier flows from Mount_Bear southwest slopes , while the Klutlan Glacier lies to the north . eos
lies within Wrangell - Saint Elias National Park , about 4 miles ( 6.4 km ) west of the Yukon border . The Barnard Glacier flows from Mount_Bear southwest slopes , while the Klutlan Glacier lies to the north . Mount_Bear principal claim to fame is that Mount_Bear is a fourteener , and in fact one of the highest 20 peaks in the United States . eos
southwest slopes , while the Klutlan Glacier lies to the north . Mount_Bear principal claim to fame is that Mount_Bear is a fourteener , and in fact one of the highest 20 peaks in the United States . Despite Mount_Bear height , Mount_Bear is a little - visited peak , being surrounded by higher and better - known peaks such as Mount Bona on the west , and Mount Lucania and Mount Logan on the east . eos
principal claim to fame is that Mount_Bear is a fourteener , and in fact one of the highest 20 peaks in the United States . Despite Mount_Bear height , Mount_Bear is a little - visited peak , being surrounded by higher and better - known peaks such as Mount Bona on the west , and Mount Lucania and Mount Logan on the east . However Mount_Bear is a large peak even in relative terms : for example , the drop from the summit to the Barnard Glacier is 8,000 feet ( 2440 m ) in less than 5 miles ( 8 km ) , and 10,000 feet ( 3048 m ) in less than 12 miles ( 19.3 km ) . eos

is a mountain peak over fourteen thousand feet in elevation in the US state of Colorado . Mount_Belford is located in the Collegiate Peaks , a group of mountains in the central Sawatch Range , just west of the Arkansas River in Chaffee County . Mount_Belford lies near Mount Oxford and Missouri Mountain , and Mount_Belford is often climbed in conjunction with one or both of these peaks . eos

is the sixth highest volcano in Antarctica , located 16 km west of Mount Moulton in Marie Byrd Land near the eastern coast of the Ross Sea . Mount_Berlin is composed of two coalesced shield volcanoes : Marren Peak and Berlin Crater . The volcanic structure is considered active , as steaming fumaroles have been observed near the rim of the northern and western calderas , producing fumarolic ice towers . eos
is composed of two coalesced shield volcanoes : Marren Peak and Berlin Crater . The volcanic structure is considered active , as steaming fumaroles have been observed near the rim of the northern and western calderas , producing fumarolic ice towers . Discovered by the Byrd Antarctic Expedition on flights to the NE and E of Little America in november - december 1934 . eos
is a part . Named by the US - SCAN for Leonard M Berlin , leader of the USAS party which sledged to Mount_Berlin in december 1940 . eos
in december 1940 . eos
( Indonesian : Gunung Binaia ) is the highest point on the Indonesian island of Seram ( or Ceram ) . Mount_Binaiya is one of the one hundred most topographically prominent peaks on Earth . eos
is one of the one hundred most topographically prominent peaks on Earth . eos
is located in Gallatin National Forest , in the US state of Montana . Located near the East Gallatin River , Gallatin County , Mount_Blackmore is in the Gallatin Range . Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden 's survey expedition of the Yellowstone area named Mount_Blackmore for Mary Blackmore , wife of William Blackmore , an English land speculator and philanthropist who accompanied the Hayden Survey . eos
is in the Gallatin Range . Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden 's survey expedition of the Yellowstone area named Mount_Blackmore for Mary Blackmore , wife of William Blackmore , an English land speculator and philanthropist who accompanied the Hayden Survey . Mary Blackmore contracted pneumonia and died in Bozeman , Montana during the early summer of 1872 . eos
for Mary Blackmore , wife of William Blackmore , an English land speculator and philanthropist who accompanied the Hayden Survey . Mary Blackmore contracted pneumonia and died in Bozeman , Montana during the early summer of 1872 . eos
is one of the major mountains of the Saint Elias Mountains in eastern Alaska , and Mount_Bona is the fifth highest independent peak in the United States . Mount_Bona and Mount_Bona adjacent neighbor Mount Churchill are both large ice - covered stratovolcanoes . Mount_Bona has the distinction of being the highest volcano in the United States and the fourth highest in North America , outranked only by the three highest Mexican volcanoes , Pico de Orizaba , Popocatépetl , and Iztaccíhuatl . eos
is the fifth highest independent peak in the United States . Mount_Bona and Mount_Bona adjacent neighbor Mount Churchill are both large ice - covered stratovolcanoes . Mount_Bona has the distinction of being the highest volcano in the United States and the fourth highest in North America , outranked only by the three highest Mexican volcanoes , Pico de Orizaba , Popocatépetl , and Iztaccíhuatl . eos
and Mount_Bona adjacent neighbor Mount Churchill are both large ice - covered stratovolcanoes . Mount_Bona has the distinction of being the highest volcano in the United States and the fourth highest in North America , outranked only by the three highest Mexican volcanoes , Pico de Orizaba , Popocatépetl , and Iztaccíhuatl . Mount_Bona massif is covered almost entirely by icefields and glaciers , and it is the principal source of ice for the Klutlan Glacier , which flows east for over 40 mi into the Yukon Territory of Canada . eos
adjacent neighbor Mount Churchill are both large ice - covered stratovolcanoes . Mount_Bona has the distinction of being the highest volcano in the United States and the fourth highest in North America , outranked only by the three highest Mexican volcanoes , Pico de Orizaba , Popocatépetl , and Iztaccíhuatl . Mount_Bona massif is covered almost entirely by icefields and glaciers , and it is the principal source of ice for the Klutlan Glacier , which flows east for over 40 mi into the Yukon Territory of Canada . eos
has the distinction of being the highest volcano in the United States and the fourth highest in North America , outranked only by the three highest Mexican volcanoes , Pico de Orizaba , Popocatépetl , and Iztaccíhuatl . Mount_Bona massif is covered almost entirely by icefields and glaciers , and it is the principal source of ice for the Klutlan Glacier , which flows east for over 40 mi into the Yukon Territory of Canada . Mount_Bona also contributes a large volume of ice to the north - flowing Russell Glacier system . eos
massif is covered almost entirely by icefields and glaciers , and it is the principal source of ice for the Klutlan Glacier , which flows east for over 40 mi into the Yukon Territory of Canada . Mount_Bona also contributes a large volume of ice to the north - flowing Russell Glacier system . Mount_Bona was named by Prince Luigi Amedeo , Duke of the Abruzzi in 1897 , who saw the peak while making the first ascent of Mount Saint Elias about 80 miles ( 130 km ) to the southeast . eos
also contributes a large volume of ice to the north - flowing Russell Glacier system . Mount_Bona was named by Prince Luigi Amedeo , Duke of the Abruzzi in 1897 , who saw the peak while making the first ascent of Mount Saint Elias about 80 miles ( 130 km ) to the southeast . He named Mount_Bona after the Bona , his racing yacht . eos
was named by Prince Luigi Amedeo , Duke of the Abruzzi in 1897 , who saw the peak while making the first ascent of Mount Saint Elias about 80 miles ( 130 km ) to the southeast . He named Mount_Bona after the Bona , his racing yacht . Mount_Bona was first climbed in 1930 by Allen Carpé , Terris Moore , and Andrew Taylor , from the Russell Glacier on the west of the peak . eos
after the Bona , his racing yacht . Mount_Bona was first climbed in 1930 by Allen Carpé , Terris Moore , and Andrew Taylor , from the Russell Glacier on the west of the peak . The current standard route is the East Ridge ; a climb of nearby Mount Churchill is a relatively easy addition via this route as well . eos
was first climbed in 1930 by Allen Carpé , Terris Moore , and Andrew Taylor , from the Russell Glacier on the west of the peak . The current standard route is the East Ridge ; a climb of nearby Mount Churchill is a relatively easy addition via this route as well . eos
is the remnants of a former stratovolcano created nearly 60 million years ago . Between four and six different glacial periods over the past 50 million years have eroded the volcano to produce Mount_Boucherie . eos

or the Brandon Mountain ( Irish : Sliabh Bhreandáin or Cnoc Bréanainn ) is a mountain on the Dingle Peninsula , in Co. . eos
takes Mount_Brandon name from Saint Brendan ` ` The Navigator '' , who legend suggests climbed to the summit around AD 530 to see The Americas , before setting sail . The small village of Brandon lies at the foot of Mount_Brandon , on the north side . Mount_Brandon is part of the unnamed central mountain range of the Dingle Peninsula , which were formed 300 million years ago , and forming an impressive high ridge which extends for across the peninsula and taking in the other peaks of Barr an Ghéaráin ( Brandon Peak ) , Piaras Mór , and Más an Tiompán , . eos

, on the north side . Mount_Brandon is part of the unnamed central mountain range of the Dingle Peninsula , which were formed 300 million years ago , and forming an impressive high ridge which extends for across the peninsula and taking in the other peaks of Barr an Ghéaráin ( Brandon Peak ) , Piaras Mór , and Más an Tiompán , . Mount_Brandon owes Mount_Brandon craggy shape thanks to the work of local glaciers during the Ice age , which gouged out a series of corries ( cooms ) on the eastern flank of Mount_Brandon . eos
is part of the unnamed central mountain range of the Dingle Peninsula , which were formed 300 million years ago , and forming an impressive high ridge which extends for across the peninsula and taking in the other peaks of Barr an Ghéaráin ( Brandon Peak ) , Piaras Mór , and Más an Tiompán , . Mount_Brandon owes Mount_Brandon craggy shape thanks to the work of local glaciers during the Ice age , which gouged out a series of corries ( cooms ) on the eastern flank of Mount_Brandon . Running in a line almost all the way to the summit are the Pater Noster Lakes , a series of rock steps each of which are occupied by a lake , the largest being Loch Cruite . eos
owes Mount_Brandon craggy shape thanks to the work of local glaciers during the Ice age , which gouged out a series of corries ( cooms ) on the eastern flank of Mount_Brandon . Running in a line almost all the way to the summit are the Pater Noster Lakes , a series of rock steps each of which are occupied by a lake , the largest being Loch Cruite . The summit of Mount_Brandon is rounded and smooth due to the fact that it was never covered by ice , and presents a stark contrast to the conical top of Brandon Peak , which is almost Alpine in appearance . eos

is a mountain in Alberta , Canada . Mount_Brazeau is located in the upper Coronet Creek Valley of Jasper National Park , and Mount_Brazeau stands west of the Coronet Glacier and south of Maligne Lake . Mount_Brazeau was named in 1902 by Arthur P Coleman after Joseph Edward Brazeau , who had provided his translation skills to the Palliser Expedition . eos

is a fourteener in the US state of Colorado , located approximately 1 mile ( 1.6 km ) south of Mount Lincoln in the Mosquito Range . Mount_Bross lies in northwestern Park County . With a topographic prominence in the range of 292 to 332 feet ( 89 to 101 m ) , Mount_Bross barely qualifies as an independent peak by the standard 300 foot prominence rule . eos
lies in northwestern Park County . With a topographic prominence in the range of 292 to 332 feet ( 89 to 101 m ) , Mount_Bross barely qualifies as an independent peak by the standard 300 foot prominence rule . Mount_Bross is often climbed together with Mount Lincoln and nearby Mount Democrat . eos

is a mountain at the southwestern corner of the Columbia Icefield , in British Columbia near the border with Alberta . Mount_Bryce can be seen from the Icefields Parkway . Mount_Bryce was named in 1898 by J Norman Collie after Viscount James Bryce , who was President of the Alpine Club in London at the time . eos
can be seen from the Icefields Parkway . Mount_Bryce was named in 1898 by J Norman Collie after Viscount James Bryce , who was President of the Alpine Club in London at the time . Mount_Bryce is the fifteenth highest peak in British Columbia . eos

However Mount_Bryce is more notable for Mount_Bryce large local relief above the nearby valleys to the south , east , and west . eos

is a mountain in the Australian Alps . The summit of Mount_Buller_Victoria can be reached by vehicle via the village coupled with a 500 m short walk . It is also possible to climb Mount_Buller_Victoria from Delatite river level you can follow the Klingsporn walking track . eos
can be reached by vehicle via the village coupled with a 500 m short walk . It is also possible to climb Mount_Buller_Victoria from Delatite river level you can follow the Klingsporn walking track . The Klingsporn track was the bridle trail in days gone by when stockmen would take their cattle up high for the summer months . eos
from Delatite river level you can follow the Klingsporn walking track . The Klingsporn track was the bridle trail in days gone by when stockmen would take their cattle up high for the summer months . The walk begins at Merimbah and is a 8 km walk on a well defined track . eos

, in Mount Carleton Provincial Park , is the highest elevation in the Canadian province of New Brunswick , and Mount_Carleton is also the highest peak in the Canadian Maritime Provinces . Mount_Carleton is one of the highlights of the Canadian portion of the International Appalachian Trail . Mount_Carleton was named after Thomas Carleton , New Brunswick 's first governor . eos
is also the highest peak in the Canadian Maritime Provinces . Mount_Carleton is one of the highlights of the Canadian portion of the International Appalachian Trail . Mount_Carleton was named after Thomas Carleton , New Brunswick 's first governor . eos
is one of the highlights of the Canadian portion of the International Appalachian Trail . Mount_Carleton was named after Thomas Carleton , New Brunswick 's first governor . Before aerial surveillance was extensively used , a hut was maintained on the summit for fire - spotting in the remote north - central part of the province . eos
was named after Thomas Carleton , New Brunswick 's first governor . Before aerial surveillance was extensively used , a hut was maintained on the summit for fire - spotting in the remote north - central part of the province . A very similar hut was maintained on Big Bald Mountain . eos
is a monadnock , an erosional remnant of resistant igneous rocks that remained after an ancient Mesozoic peneplain surface was uplifted in the Cenozoic to form a plateau , and subsequently dissected via millions of years of erosion by wind , water and glacial ice . Mount_Carleton consists of 400 million - year - old rhyolitic and basaltic volcanics . eos
consists of 400 million - year - old rhyolitic and basaltic volcanics . eos
( known as Mont D'Iberville in Quebec ) is a mountain located on the border between Labrador and Quebec in the Selamiut Range of the Torngat Mountains . Mount_Caubvick is the highest point in mainland Canada east of Alberta . Mount_Caubvick relatively low elevation disguises a massive peak that rises sharply from nearby sea levels . eos
is the highest point in mainland Canada east of Alberta . Mount_Caubvick relatively low elevation disguises a massive peak that rises sharply from nearby sea levels . Craggy ridges , steep cirques and glaciers are prominent features of the peak . eos
relatively low elevation disguises a massive peak that rises sharply from nearby sea levels . Craggy ridges , steep cirques and glaciers are prominent features of the peak . Mount_Caubvick was named Mont d'Iberville by the Quebec government in 1971 . eos
was named Mont d'Iberville by the Quebec government in 1971 . Mount_Caubvick remained nameless on the Labrador side for several years , Mount_Caubvick became unofficially know as L1 , L for Labrador and 1 for highest . In 1981 , on the suggestion of Dr. Peter Neary , the provincial government named Mount_Caubvick after one of the five Inuit who accompanied George Cartwright to England in 1772 . eos
remained nameless on the Labrador side for several years , Mount_Caubvick became unofficially know as L1 , L for Labrador and 1 for highest . In 1981 , on the suggestion of Dr. Peter Neary , the provincial government named Mount_Caubvick after one of the five Inuit who accompanied George Cartwright to England in 1772 . Mount_Caubvick also hosts the highest point in both the province of Newfoundland and Labrador and Quebec , although the summit itself lies about 10 metres northeast of the Quebec provincial border and is entirely within Labrador . eos

is a stratovolcano in Alaska . In late 2004 or early 2005 , a wide crater lake formed from meltwater within the summit crater . In july 2005 , the southern crater rim was breached and the lake partially drained , producing a lahar with an estimated volume of 197000000 cuft which ran for over 17 mi downstream . eos
is a volcano in the Saint Elias Mountains and the Wrangell Volcanic Field of eastern Alaska . ( "" Persian : دماوند "" ) also known as Donbavand , is a dormant volcano in Iran . Located in the middle Alborz Range , adjacent to Varārū , Sesang , Gol - e Zard and Mīānrūd , Mount_Damavand is the highest point in both Iran and the wider Middle East . Mount_Damavand is also the highest volcano in all of Asia . eos
is the highest point in both Iran and the wider Middle East . Mount_Damavand is also the highest volcano in all of Asia . Though not volcanically active , there are fumaroles near the summit crater that deposit sulfur , which were most recently known to be active on july 6 , 2007 . eos
is also the highest volcano in all of Asia . Though not volcanically active , there are fumaroles near the summit crater that deposit sulfur , which were most recently known to be active on july 6 , 2007 . Mount_Damavand is located near the southern coast of the Caspian Sea , in Āmol county , Māzandarān , 66 km ( 41 miles ) eos
is located near the southern coast of the Caspian Sea , in Āmol county , Māzandarān , 66 km ( 41 miles ) northeast of Tehran . Mount_Damavand is , as any cursory reading of Persian literature will indicate , the Mount Olympus of Persian mythology . eos
is , as any cursory reading of Persian literature will indicate , the Mount Olympus of Persian mythology . The best major settlement for mount climbers is new Iranian Mountain Federation Camp in village Polour , located at the south of Mount_Damavand . eos

is a flat - topped mountain , named for evolution - theorist Charles Darwin , in the Sierra Nevada range in Fresno County , California Mount_Darwin_California is a popular climb . Mount_Darwin_California is located in the Kings Canyon National Park and the Inyo National Forest . Mount_Darwin_California was first climbed on august 12 , 1908 by Ernest Clayton Andrews , the Australian geologist , and Willard D Johnson . eos
is a popular climb . Mount_Darwin_California is located in the Kings Canyon National Park and the Inyo National Forest . Mount_Darwin_California was first climbed on august 12 , 1908 by Ernest Clayton Andrews , the Australian geologist , and Willard D Johnson . eos
is located in the Kings Canyon National Park and the Inyo National Forest . Mount_Darwin_California was first climbed on august 12 , 1908 by Ernest Clayton Andrews , the Australian geologist , and Willard D Johnson . The modern name of Mount_Darwin_California was given to Mount_Darwin_California in 1895 by Theodore S Solomons and E C. Bonner ( of the United States Geological Survey ) as part of a series of mountains named after naturalists . eos
was first climbed on august 12 , 1908 by Ernest Clayton Andrews , the Australian geologist , and Willard D Johnson . The modern name of Mount_Darwin_California was given to Mount_Darwin_California in 1895 by Theodore S Solomons and E C. Bonner ( of the United States Geological Survey ) as part of a series of mountains named after naturalists . Other nearby mountains include Mount Mendel , Mount Fiske , Mount Haeckel , Mount Huxley , Mount Spencer , and Mount Wallace . eos
was given to Mount_Darwin_California in 1895 by Theodore S Solomons and E C. Bonner ( of the United States Geological Survey ) as part of a series of mountains named after naturalists . Other nearby mountains include Mount Mendel , Mount Fiske , Mount Haeckel , Mount Huxley , Mount Spencer , and Mount Wallace . ( This assortment of mountains is also known as the Evolution Region . ) eos

is a mountain in Contra Costa County , California in the San Francisco Bay Area , located south of the town of Clayton and northeast of Danville . Mount_Diablo is an isolated 3,849-foot ( 1,173 m ) upthrust peak Mount_Diablo is visible from most of the San Francisco Bay Area and much of northern California . Mount_Diablo appears from many angles to be a double pyramid and Mount_Diablo includes many subsidiary peaks , the largest and closest of which is the other half of the double pyramid , North Peak , nearly as high in elevation at 3,557 feet ( 1,084 m ) . eos
is an isolated 3,849-foot ( 1,173 m ) upthrust peak Mount_Diablo is visible from most of the San Francisco Bay Area and much of northern California . Mount_Diablo appears from many angles to be a double pyramid and Mount_Diablo includes many subsidiary peaks , the largest and closest of which is the other half of the double pyramid , North Peak , nearly as high in elevation at 3,557 feet ( 1,084 m ) . Mount_Diablo is the centerpiece of Mount Diablo State Park , a state park of approximately 20,000 acres ( 80 km ² ) in area . eos
is visible from most of the San Francisco Bay Area and much of northern California . Mount_Diablo appears from many angles to be a double pyramid and Mount_Diablo includes many subsidiary peaks , the largest and closest of which is the other half of the double pyramid , North Peak , nearly as high in elevation at 3,557 feet ( 1,084 m ) . Mount_Diablo is the centerpiece of Mount Diablo State Park , a state park of approximately 20,000 acres ( 80 km ² ) in area . eos
appears from many angles to be a double pyramid and Mount_Diablo includes many subsidiary peaks , the largest and closest of which is the other half of the double pyramid , North Peak , nearly as high in elevation at 3,557 feet ( 1,084 m ) . Mount_Diablo is the centerpiece of Mount Diablo State Park , a state park of approximately 20,000 acres ( 80 km ² ) in area . The park was the first public open space of a complex - according to Save Mount Diablo - now including 38 preserves , including adjacent and nearby city open spaces , regional parks , watersheds , etc . , buffered in some areas with private lands protected with conservation easements . eos
includes many subsidiary peaks , the largest and closest of which is the other half of the double pyramid , North Peak , nearly as high in elevation at 3,557 feet ( 1,084 m ) . is the centerpiece of Mount Diablo State Park , a state park of approximately 20,000 acres ( 80 km ² ) in area . The park was the first public open space of a complex - according to Save Mount Diablo - now including 38 preserves , including adjacent and nearby city open spaces , regional parks , watersheds , etc . , buffered in some areas with private lands protected with conservation easements . Preserved lands on and around Mount_Diablo total more than 90,000 acres ( 360 km ² ) . eos
total more than 90,000 acres ( 360 km ² ) . Except for distant views from the Central Valley , Mount_Diablo northwestern double pyramid view is most familiar to California residents . is a conspicuous , isolated volcanic cone , lying at the head of McMurdo Sound and east of Koettlitz Glacier , overlooking the NW portion of the Ross Ice Shelf . Mount_Discovery forms the center of a three - armed mass of which Brown Peninsula is one extension to the north ; Minna Bluff is a second to the east ; the third is Mount Morning to the west . Discovered by the British National Antarctic Expedition ( 1901 - 04 ) and named for their expedition ship Discovery . eos
forms the center of a three - armed mass of which Brown Peninsula is one extension to the north ; Minna Bluff is a second to the east ; the third is Mount Morning to the west . Discovered by the British National Antarctic Expedition ( 1901 - 04 ) and named for their expedition ship Discovery . eos
is the highest point . Mount_Edgecumbe_Alaska had for centuries been known to the native Tlingit people as L'UX , and Mount_Edgecumbe_Alaska was given the name Mount San Jacinto ( ` ` Mount Saint Hyacinth '' ) by Spanish explorer Juan de la Bodega in 1775 . Mount_Edgecumbe_Alaska was subsequently renamed by British Captain James Cook in 1778 , probably for George , Earl of Edgecumbe . eos
had for centuries been known to the native Tlingit people as L'UX , and Mount_Edgecumbe_Alaska was given the name Mount San Jacinto ( ` ` Mount Saint Hyacinth '' ) by Spanish explorer Juan de la Bodega in 1775 . Mount_Edgecumbe_Alaska was subsequently renamed by British Captain James Cook in 1778 , probably for George , Earl of Edgecumbe . Mount_Edgecumbe_Alaska is a local landmark and a tourist attraction . eos

is located in the Athabasca River and Astoria River valleys of Jasper National Park , Canada . Mount_Edith_Cavell was named in 1916 for Edith Cavell , an English nurse executed by the Germans during World War I for having helped persons held captive to escape to refuge . A close up view of the north face of Mount_Edith_Cavell is visible after a short hike to Cavell Meadows . eos
was named in 1916 for Edith Cavell , an English nurse executed by the Germans during World War I for having helped persons held captive to escape to refuge . A close up view of the north face of Mount_Edith_Cavell is visible after a short hike to Cavell Meadows . The trailhead is by the parking lot at the end of Mt. Edith Cavell road . eos
is visible after a short hike to Cavell Meadows . The trailhead is by the parking lot at the end of Mt. Edith Cavell road . The trail to the meadows is one way , rising 370 metres to 2,135 metres . eos
is the highest peak in the Rocky Mountains of North America . Mount_Elbert is also the highest of the fourteeners in the US State of Colorado , and the high point of the Sawatch Range . Mount_Elbert is located in Lake County , approximately 10 mi southwest of Leadville . eos

is the second highest mountain in the contiguous United States , after Mount Whitney in California , and Mount_Elbert is but 65 ft shorter than Whitney 's 14,505 feet ( 4,421 m ) . There are three routes up Mount_Elbert . eos
is but 65 ft shorter than Whitney 's 14,505 feet ( 4,421 m ) . There are three routes up Mount_Elbert . eos
. The standard route ascends the peak from the east , starting from the Colorado Trail . The most difficult is the Black Cloud Trail , which takes ten to fourteen hours , depending on the pace . eos
( Russian : Эльбрус ) is a peak located in the western Caucasus mountains , in Kabardino - Balkaria and Karachay - Cherkessia , Russia , near the border of Georgia . A stratovolcano that has lain dormant for about 2,000 years , Mount_Elbrus is the highest mountain in the Caucasus which belongs to Europe ( if the border between Europe and Asia is considered to be at the watershed divide of the Caucasus , or anywhere south of this ) . Mount_Elbrus ( west summit ) stands at 5,642 metres ( 18,510 ft ) and Mount_Elbrus can be considered to be the highest mountain in Europe ; Mount_Elbrus is also the highest point of Russia . eos
is the highest mountain in the Caucasus which belongs to Europe ( if the border between Europe and Asia is considered to be at the watershed divide of the Caucasus , or anywhere south of this ) . Mount_Elbrus ( west summit ) stands at 5,642 metres ( 18,510 ft ) and Mount_Elbrus can be considered to be the highest mountain in Europe ; Mount_Elbrus is also the highest point of Russia . The east summit is slightly lower : 5,621 metres ( 18,442 ft ) . eos
( west summit ) stands at 5,642 metres ( 18,510 ft ) and Mount_Elbrus can be considered to be the highest mountain in Europe ; Mount_Elbrus is also the highest point of Russia . The east summit is slightly lower : 5,621 metres ( 18,442 ft ) . eos

is an extinct shield volcano on the border of Uganda and Kenya . Mount_Elgon is named after the Elgonyi tribe , who once lived in huge caves on the south side of Mount_Elgon . Mount_Elgon was known as ` ` Ol Doinyo Ilgoon '' ( Breast Mountain ) by the Maasai and as ` ` Masawa '' on the Ugandan side . eos
is named after the Elgonyi tribe , who once lived in huge caves on the south side of Mount_Elgon . Mount_Elgon was known as ` ` Ol Doinyo Ilgoon '' ( Breast Mountain ) by the Maasai and as ` ` Masawa '' on the Ugandan side . Mount_Elgon is the oldest and largest solitary volcano in East Africa , covering an area of around 3500 km ² . eos
. Mount_Elgon was known as ` ` Ol Doinyo Ilgoon '' ( Breast Mountain ) by the Maasai and as ` ` Masawa '' on the Ugandan side . Mount_Elgon is the oldest and largest solitary volcano in East Africa , covering an area of around 3500 km ² . eos
was known as ` ` Ol Doinyo Ilgoon '' ( Breast Mountain ) by the Maasai and as ` ` Masawa '' on the Ugandan side . Mount_Elgon is the oldest and largest solitary volcano in East Africa , covering an area of around 3500 km ² . Mount_Elgon consists of five major peaks : eos
is the oldest and largest solitary volcano in East Africa , covering an area of around 3500 km ² . Mount_Elgon consists of five major peaks : * Wagagai ( 4,321 m ) , being in Uganda . eos
consists of five major peaks : * Wagagai ( 4,321 m ) , being in Uganda . * Sudek ( 4,302 m or 14,140 ft ) in Kenya eos
. Kmunke and Stigler made the first recorded ascent of Wagagai and Koitobos in 1911 . F Jackson , E Gedge , and J Martin made the first recorded ascent of Sudek in 1890 . eos
is one of the largest intact calderas in the world * The warm springs by the Suam River * Endebess Bluff ( 2563 m or 8408 ft ) eos
is the catchment area for the several rivers such as the Suam River , Nzoia River and the Turkwel River , some of which flow to Lake Victoria and others in Lake Turkana . The town of Kitale is in the foothills of Mount_Elgon . The area around Mount_Elgon is protected by two Mount Elgon National Parks - one on each side of the international border . eos
. The area around Mount_Elgon is protected by two Mount Elgon National Parks - one on each side of the international border . Some rare plants are found on Mount_Elgon , including Ardisiandra wettsteinii , Carduus afromontanus , Echinops hoehnelii , Ranunculus keniensis , and Romulea keniensis . eos

( "" Chinese : 峨嵋山 , Pinyin : Éméi Shān , Wade - Giles : eos
is often written as 峨眉山 and occasionally 峩嵋山 or 峩眉山 but all three are translated as Mount Emei or Mount Emeishan . Mount_Emei is one of the Four Sacred Buddhist Mountains of China . eos
is one of the Four Sacred Buddhist Mountains of China . The patron bodhisattva of Mount_Emei is Samantabhadra , known in Chinese as Puxian . 16th and 17th century sources allude to the practice of martial arts in the monasteries of Mount_Emei . made the earliest extant reference to the Shaolin Monastery as Chinese boxing 's place of origin . eos
is Samantabhadra , known in Chinese as Puxian . 16th and 17th century sources allude to the practice of martial arts in the monasteries of Mount_Emei . made the earliest extant reference to the Shaolin Monastery as Chinese boxing 's place of origin . A large surrounding area of countryside is geologically known as the Permian Emeishan Large Igneous Province , a large igneous province generated by the Emeishan Traps volcanic eruptions during the Permian Period . eos
. made the earliest extant reference to the Shaolin Monastery as Chinese boxing 's place of origin . A large surrounding area of countryside is geologically known as the Permian Emeishan Large Igneous Province , a large igneous province generated by the Emeishan Traps volcanic eruptions during the Permian Period . Mount_Emei was made a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1996 . eos
was made a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1996 . The Emei Shan Liocichla , a passerine bird is named after the site . eos
is a fourteener in the US state of Colorado , the highest of the Needle Mountains ( a subrange of the San Juan Mountains ) . Mount_Eolus is located in the Weminuche Wilderness ( part of the San Juan National Forest ) in La Plata County approximately 13 miles ( 21 km ) south of Silverton . Mount_Eolus is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the others are Sunlight Peak and Windom Peak . eos
is located in the Weminuche Wilderness ( part of the San Juan National Forest ) in La Plata County approximately 13 miles ( 21 km ) south of Silverton . Mount_Eolus is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the others are Sunlight Peak and Windom Peak . All three peaks are located around the cirque known as Upper Chicago Basin . eos
is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the others are Sunlight Peak and Windom Peak . All three peaks are located around the cirque known as Upper Chicago Basin . Mount_Eolus lies to the west of the upper basin , while the other peaks lie on the east side . eos
lies to the west of the upper basin , while the other peaks lie on the east side . These peaks are among the most remote of the fourteeners and have a strong wilderness character . Windom Peak is only 1 foot lower than Mount_Eolus ; some sources have Windom being slightly higher than Mount_Eolus . eos
; some sources have Windom being slightly higher than Mount_Eolus . North Eolus ( 14,039 ft ) is a northern subpeak of Mount_Eolus , which is not usually counted as a separate peak or as an official fourteener , since it has a topographic prominence of only 159 - 199 feet . However it is sometimes climbed in conjunction with Mount_Eolus . eos
. North Eolus ( 14,039 ft ) is a northern subpeak of Mount_Eolus , which is not usually counted as a separate peak or as an official fourteener , since it has a topographic prominence of only 159 - 199 feet . However it is sometimes climbed in conjunction with Mount_Eolus . eos

( "" Turkish : Erciyes Dağı "" ) is a massive stratovolcano located 25 km south of Kayseri , Turkey . Mount_Erciyes is the highest mountain in central Anatolia ( 3,916 metres ) . Mount_Erciyes is heavily eroded , but Mount_Erciyes may have erupted as recently as 253 BC , as may be depicted on Roman era coins . eos
is the highest mountain in central Anatolia ( 3,916 metres ) . Mount_Erciyes is heavily eroded , but Mount_Erciyes may have erupted as recently as 253 BC , as may be depicted on Roman era coins . Strabo wrote that in his time the summit was never free from snow and that those few who ascended it could see both the Black Sea and the Mediterranean . eos
is heavily eroded , but Mount_Erciyes may have erupted as recently as 253 BC , as may be depicted on Roman era coins . Strabo wrote that in his time the summit was never free from snow and that those few who ascended it could see both the Black Sea and the Mediterranean . eos
may have erupted as recently as 253 BC , as may be depicted on Roman era coins . Strabo wrote that in his time the summit was never free from snow and that those few who ascended it could see both the Black Sea and the Mediterranean . eos
in Antarctica is the southernmost active volcano on Earth . 3795 m high , Mount_Erebus is located on Ross Island , which is also home to three inactive volcanoes , notably Mt. Terror . eos
is located on Ross Island , which is also home to three inactive volcanoes , notably Mt. Terror . Mount_Erebus is part of the Pacific Ring of Fire , which includes over 160 active volcanoes . Mount_Erebus has been observed to be continuously active since 1972 and Mount_Erebus is the site of the Observatory run by New Mexico Tech . eos
is part of the Pacific Ring of Fire , which includes over 160 active volcanoes . Mount_Erebus has been observed to be continuously active since 1972 and Mount_Erebus is the site of the Observatory run by New Mexico Tech . Mount_Erebus was discovered on january 27 , 1841 ( and observed to be in eruption ) by polar explorer Sir James Clark Ross who named Mount_Erebus and Mount Terror after his ships , Erebus and Terror ( which were also used by Sir John Franklin on his disastrous Arctic expedition ) . eos
has been observed to be continuously active since 1972 and Mount_Erebus is the site of the Observatory run by New Mexico Tech . Mount_Erebus was discovered on january 27 , 1841 ( and observed to be in eruption ) by polar explorer Sir James Clark Ross who named Mount_Erebus and Mount Terror after his ships , Erebus and Terror ( which were also used by Sir John Franklin on his disastrous Arctic expedition ) . Mount_Erebus was first climbed ( to the rim ) by members of Sir Ernest Shackleton 's party in 1908 . eos
is the site of the Observatory run by New Mexico Tech . Mount_Erebus was first climbed ( to the rim ) by members of Sir Ernest Shackleton 's party in 1908 . eos
was discovered on january 27 , 1841 ( and observed to be in eruption ) by polar explorer Sir James Clark Ross who named Mount_Erebus and Mount Terror after his ships , Erebus and Terror ( which were also used by Sir John Franklin on his disastrous Arctic expedition ) . Mount_Erebus was first climbed ( to the rim ) by members of Sir Ernest Shackleton 's party in 1908 . Erebus was a primordial Greek god , the son of Chaos . eos
and Mount Terror after his ships , Erebus and Terror ( which were also used by Sir John Franklin on his disastrous Arctic expedition ) . Mount_Erebus was first climbed ( to the rim ) by members of Sir Ernest Shackleton 's party in 1908 . Erebus was a primordial Greek god , the son of Chaos . eos
was first climbed ( to the rim ) by members of Sir Ernest Shackleton 's party in 1908 . Erebus was a primordial Greek god , the son of Chaos . The first known solo ascent of Mount_Erebus was accomplished by Charles J Blackmer on january 19 - 20 , 1991 . eos
was accomplished by Charles J Blackmer on january 19 - 20 , 1991 . Blackmer , an ironworker for many years at McMurdo Station and the South Pole , accomplished this in a twenty - four hour period . The ascent took approximately seventeen hours . eos
or Errigal ( An Earagail / tEaragal in Irish ) situated in Gweedore , Donegal , is the tallest peak of the Derryveagh Mountains in the Northwest of Ireland with a height of 749 metres ( 2,457 feet ) . Mount_Errigal is also the most southern , steepest and highest of the mountain chain , called the ` Seven Sisters ' by locals ( Muckish , Crocknalaragagh , Aghla Beg , Ardloughnabrackbaddy , Aghla More , Mackoght ( also known as ` little Errigal ' ) and Mount_Errigal ) . eos

( also known as Muncibeddu in Sicilian and Mongibello in Italian , a combination of Latin mons and Arabic gibel , both meaning mountain ) is an active volcano on the east coast of Sicily , close to Messina and Catania . Mount_Etna is the largest active volcano in Europe , currently standing about 3,326 m ( 10,910 ft ) high , though it should be noted that this varies with summit eruptions ; Mount_Etna is 21.6 m ( 71 ft ) lower now than Mount_Etna was in 1865 . Mount_Etna is the highest mountain in Italy south of the Alps . eos
is the largest active volcano in Europe , currently standing about 3,326 m ( 10,910 ft ) high , though it should be noted that this varies with summit eruptions ; Mount_Etna is 21.6 m ( 71 ft ) lower now than Mount_Etna was in 1865 . Mount_Etna is the highest mountain in Italy south of the Alps . Mount_Etna covers an area of 1,190 km ² ( 460 square miles ) with a basal circumference of 140 km . eos
is 21.6 m ( 71 ft ) lower now than Mount_Etna was in 1865 . Mount_Etna is the highest mountain in Italy south of the Alps . Mount_Etna covers an area of 1,190 km ² ( 460 square miles ) with a basal circumference of 140 km . eos

is the highest mountain in Italy south of the Alps . Mount_Etna covers an area of 1,190 km ² ( 460 square miles ) with a basal circumference of 140 km . This makes Mount_Etna by far the largest of the three active volcanoes in Italy , being nearly three times the height of the next largest , Mount Vesuvius . eos
covers an area of 1,190 km ² ( 460 square miles ) with a basal circumference of 140 km . This makes Mount_Etna by far the largest of the three active volcanoes in Italy , being nearly three times the height of the next largest , Mount Vesuvius . Mount_Etna is one of the most active volcanoes in the world and Mount_Etna is in an almost constant state of eruption . eos
by far the largest of the three active volcanoes in Italy , being nearly three times the height of the next largest , Mount Vesuvius . Mount_Etna is one of the most active volcanoes in the world and Mount_Etna is in an almost constant state of eruption . Although Mount_Etna can occasionally be very destructive , Mount_Etna is not generally regarded as being particularly dangerous , and thousands of people live on Mount_Etna slopes and in the surrounding areas . eos
is one of the most active volcanoes in the world and Mount_Etna is in an almost constant state of eruption . Although Mount_Etna can occasionally be very destructive , Mount_Etna is not generally regarded as being particularly dangerous , and thousands of people live on Mount_Etna slopes and in the surrounding areas . The fertile volcanic soils support extensive agriculture , with vineyards and orchards spread across the lower slopes of Mount_Etna and the broad Plain of Catania to the south . eos
is in an almost constant state of eruption . Although Mount_Etna can occasionally be very destructive , Mount_Etna is not generally regarded as being particularly dangerous , and thousands of people live on Mount_Etna slopes and in the surrounding areas . The fertile volcanic soils support extensive agriculture , with vineyards and orchards spread across the lower slopes of Mount_Etna and the broad Plain of Catania to the south . eos

The fertile volcanic soils support extensive agriculture , with vineyards and orchards spread across the lower slopes of Mount_Etna and the broad Plain of Catania to the south . Due to Mount_Etna history of recent activity and nearby population , Mount_Etna has been designated a Decade Volcano by the United Nations . eos
