( 10,004 ft / 3,049 m ) is located in the Lewis Range in the US state of Montana . Mount_Merritt is one of six in Glacier National Park over 10,000 ft ( 3,048 m ) . Located in the northeastern part of the park , Mount_Merritt rises dramatically a vertical mile above nearby rivers . eos
is one of six in Glacier National Park over 10,000 ft ( 3,048 m ) . Located in the northeastern part of the park , Mount_Merritt rises dramatically a vertical mile above nearby rivers . The approach to Mount_Merritt involves a one way hike of 13 miles ( 21 km ) to the summit base . eos

is a lofty , mostly ice - free mountain rising to 4,165 metres , located 2.5 mi E of Mount Adam in the central portion of the Admiralty Mountains . Discovered in january 1841 by Capt . James Ross , who named Mount_Minto_Antarctica for the Earl of Minto , then First Lord of the Admiralty . eos
for the Earl of Minto , then First Lord of the Admiralty . eos
is the highest peak of the Appalachian Mountains and the highest peak in eastern North America , excluding island summits . Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina was the highest point in any state of the United States until Texas joined the union in 1845 . The nearest higher point on the North American continent is Harney Peak in the Black Hills of South Dakota . eos
was the highest point in any state of the United States until Texas joined the union in 1845 . The nearest higher point on the North American continent is Harney Peak in the Black Hills of South Dakota . Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina is located near Burnsville in Yancey County , North Carolina , in the Black Mountain subrange of the Appalachians , and about 32 kilometres ( 20 mi ) northeast of Asheville . eos
is located near Burnsville in Yancey County , North Carolina , in the Black Mountain subrange of the Appalachians , and about 32 kilometres ( 20 mi ) northeast of Asheville . Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina is protected by Mount Mitchell State Park and surrounded by the Pisgah National Forest . Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina was named after Elisha Mitchell , a professor at the University of North Carolina , who determined Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina height in 1835 and fell to his death at nearby Mitchell Falls in 1857 , having returned to verify his earlier measurements . eos
is protected by Mount Mitchell State Park and surrounded by the Pisgah National Forest . Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina was named after Elisha Mitchell , a professor at the University of North Carolina , who determined Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina height in 1835 and fell to his death at nearby Mitchell Falls in 1857 , having returned to verify his earlier measurements . The ascent of Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina is now rather easy , since a road off the historic and scenic Blue Ridge Parkway runs nearby , and a trail leads through a conifer forest to the top . eos
was named after Elisha Mitchell , a professor at the University of North Carolina , who determined Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina height in 1835 and fell to his death at nearby Mitchell Falls in 1857 , having returned to verify his earlier measurements . The ascent of Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina is now rather easy , since a road off the historic and scenic Blue Ridge Parkway runs nearby , and a trail leads through a conifer forest to the top . The summit once featured a 40 ft ( 12 m ) stone observation tower , which was torn down in late 2006 and is being replaced by a shorter observation platform . eos
height in 1835 and fell to his death at nearby Mitchell Falls in 1857 , having returned to verify his earlier measurements . The ascent of Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina is now rather easy , since a road off the historic and scenic Blue Ridge Parkway runs nearby , and a trail leads through a conifer forest to the top . The summit once featured a 40 ft ( 12 m ) stone observation tower , which was torn down in late 2006 and is being replaced by a shorter observation platform . eos
is now rather easy , since a road off the historic and scenic Blue Ridge Parkway runs nearby , and a trail leads through a conifer forest to the top . The summit once featured a 40 ft ( 12 m ) stone observation tower , which was torn down in late 2006 and is being replaced by a shorter observation platform . Also at the summit is the tomb of Dr. Mitchell . eos
is very mild in the summer and very harsh in the winter , more like Maine or southeastern Canada than the southeastern US In 1985 , the coldest temperature ever recorded in the state occurred there on january 21 when it fell to -34 ° F ( -37 ° C ) , during a severe cold spell that brought freezing temperatures as far south as Miami . Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina is also the coldest average reporting station in the state at 43.8 ° F or 6.6 ° C which is well below any other station . eos
is also the coldest average reporting station in the state at 43.8 ° F or 6.6 ° C which is well below any other station . The summit is often windy , with the record being 286 km / h or 178 MPH . The high elevations also expose plant life to high levels of pollution , including acid precipitation - rain , snow , and fog with very low pH. These acids damage the spruce and fir trees particularly badly , in part by releasing natural metals from the soil like aluminum , and by leaching important minerals . eos
is still mostly lush and green in the summer , many dead trunks can be seen due to these serious problems . Repairing the damage is a difficult issue , as the pollutants are often carried in from long distances . Sources can be local or hundreds of miles or kilometers away , requiring cooperation from as far away as the Midwest . eos
each spring through autumn , for Mount_Mitchell_North_Carolina incredible views and sunsets . Wildflowers are abundant all summer long . Young fir and spruce trees do well in the subalpine climate , and their pine cones feed the birds along with wild blueberry and blackberry shrubs . eos
incredible views and sunsets . Wildflowers are abundant all summer long . Young fir and spruce trees do well in the subalpine climate , and their pine cones feed the birds along with wild blueberry and blackberry shrubs . eos
, or Grand Monadnock , of Cheshire County , New Hampshire , is the most prominent peak of southeast New England . At 3165 ft , Mount_Monadnock is nearly 1,000 feet ( 305 m ) higher than any mountain peak within 30 miles and Mount_Monadnock rises 2,000 feet ( 610 m ) above the surrounding landscape . Mount_Monadnock bare , isolated , and rocky summit provides expansive views . eos
is nearly 1,000 feet ( 305 m ) higher than any mountain peak within 30 miles and Mount_Monadnock rises 2,000 feet ( 610 m ) above the surrounding landscape . Mount_Monadnock bare , isolated , and rocky summit provides expansive views . A number of hiking trails ascend Mount_Monadnock , including the 110 mile Metacomet - Monadnock Trail and the 50 mile Monadnock - Sunapee Greenway . eos
rises 2,000 feet ( 610 m ) above the surrounding landscape . Mount_Monadnock bare , isolated , and rocky summit provides expansive views . A number of hiking trails ascend Mount_Monadnock , including the 110 mile Metacomet - Monadnock Trail and the 50 mile Monadnock - Sunapee Greenway . eos

A number of hiking trails ascend Mount_Monadnock , including the 110 mile Metacomet - Monadnock Trail and the 50 mile Monadnock - Sunapee Greenway . Mount_Monadnock , sixty - two miles northwest of Boston and thirty - eight miles southwest of Concord , is located within the towns of Jaffrey and Dublin , New Hampshire . eos

is located in the Sierra Nevada Mountains in the state of California , in the southwestern United States . Mount_Morrison_California rises to the south of Convict Lake , in the Sherwin Range , near the town of Mammoth Lakes . Mount_Morrison_California was named after Sheriff Robert Morrison , who was killed near Convict Lake on september 23 , 1871 , as part of a posse pursuing escaped convicts . eos

The natural glass fulgurite appears at the top of Mount_Morrison_California , due to numerous lightning strikes . eos

lies within the Kidepo Valley National Park , north - east Uganda , Africa . Mount_Morungole is in the rugged , semi - arid Karamoja province near the border with the Sudan . Neighbouring peaks are Mount Zulia , and the Labwor and Dodoth Hills reach heights in excess of 2,000 meters . eos

is a broad , ice - covered mountain standing 16 km ( 10 mi ) E of Mount Berlin in the Flood Range , Marie Byrd Land . Discovered on aerial flights by the United States Antarctic Service in 1940 , and named for Richard S Moulton , chief dog driver at West Base and a member of the survey party which sledged to the western end of the Flood Range in december 1940 . On the northern slopes of Mount_Moulton , there are steep icefalls , called the Moulton Icefalls . eos
, there are steep icefalls , called the Moulton Icefalls . eos
is a peak in the Sierra Nevada mountain range of California , south of Mount Whitney . Mount_Muir rises to 14015 ft , and Mount_Muir is the eleventh highest peak in the state . Mount_Muir is named for John Muir , founder of the Sierra Club , notable California geologist , and American conservationist . eos
rises to 14015 ft , and Mount_Muir is the eleventh highest peak in the state . The southernmost section of the John Muir Trail contours along the west side of Mount_Muir near Mount_Muir summit and ends on the summit of Mount Whitney . eos

is the southernmost and highest mountain in the Wasatch Range of Utah , in the United States . Named after the biblical Mount Nebo overlooking Israel , which is said to be the place of Moses ' death , Mount_Nebo_Utah is the centerpiece of the Mount Nebo Wilderness , inside the Uinta National Forest . Mount_Nebo_Utah is crowned by three peaks , with the northern peak reaching 11,928 ft ( 3,636 m ) . eos
is the centerpiece of the Mount Nebo Wilderness , inside the Uinta National Forest . Mount_Nebo_Utah is crowned by three peaks , with the northern peak reaching 11,928 ft ( 3,636 m ) . Original surveys placed the southern peak as the highest at 11,877 ft ( 3,620 m ) . eos
is crowned by three peaks , with the northern peak reaching 11,928 ft ( 3,636 m ) . Original surveys placed the southern peak as the highest at 11,877 ft ( 3,620 m ) . Unfortunately , when Mount_Nebo_Utah was resurveyed in the 1970s and the northern peak was found to be the highest , two substantial trails already led to the south summit . eos
was resurveyed in the 1970s and the northern peak was found to be the highest , two substantial trails already led to the south summit . Parts of Mount_Nebo_Utah are covered in snow from mid - october until july . Mount_Nebo_Utah is a popular , although strenuous , destination for hikers from the nearby town of Nephi , and the city of Salt Lake City . eos
are covered in snow from mid - october until july . Mount_Nebo_Utah is a popular , although strenuous , destination for hikers from the nearby town of Nephi , and the city of Salt Lake City . The Mount Nebo Scenic Byway , a National Scenic Byway , departs I-15 at Payson and climbs to over 9,000 feet before rejoining the interstate at Nephi . eos
is a popular , although strenuous , destination for hikers from the nearby town of Nephi , and the city of Salt Lake City . The Mount Nebo Scenic Byway , a National Scenic Byway , departs I-15 at Payson and climbs to over 9,000 feet before rejoining the interstate at Nephi . The route features panoramic views of Mount_Nebo_Utah and the Utah Valley and Utah Lake far below . eos
and the Utah Valley and Utah Lake far below . There are numerous trailheads along the route for the hiking enthusiast including a short walk to the ` ` Devils Kitchen '' , an area which has been described as a ` ` mini Bryce Canyon '' . eos
is an active stratovolcano in New Zealand . Mount_Ngauruhoe is the youngest vent and highest peak in the Tongariro volcanic complex on the Central Plateau of the North Island , and Mount_Ngauruhoe first erupted about 2,500 years ago . Although seen by most as a volcano in Mount_Ngauruhoe own right , Mount_Ngauruhoe is technically a secondary cone of Mount Tongariro . eos
is the youngest vent and highest peak in the Tongariro volcanic complex on the Central Plateau of the North Island , and Mount_Ngauruhoe first erupted about 2,500 years ago . Although seen by most as a volcano in Mount_Ngauruhoe own right , Mount_Ngauruhoe is technically a secondary cone of Mount Tongariro . Mount_Ngauruhoe lies between the active volcanoes of Mount Tongariro to the north and Mount Ruapehu to the south , to the west of the Rangipo Desert 25 kilometres to the south of the southern shore of Lake Taupo . eos

Mount_Ngauruhoe erupted 45 times in the 20th century , making Mount_Ngauruhoe one of the world 's most active volcanoes in that period . eos

is an active volcano in the Virunga Mountains of the Democratic Republic of the Congo , situated about 25 km north of Lake Kivu . Mount_Nyamuragira has been described as Africa 's most active volcano and Mount_Nyamuragira has erupted over 30 times since 1880 . As well as eruptions from the summit , there have been numerous eruptions from the flanks of Mount_Nyamuragira , creating new smaller volcanoes that have lasted only for a short time ( eg Murara from late 1976 to 1977 ) . eos
has been described as Africa 's most active volcano and Mount_Nyamuragira has erupted over 30 times since 1880 . As well as eruptions from the summit , there have been numerous eruptions from the flanks of Mount_Nyamuragira , creating new smaller volcanoes that have lasted only for a short time ( eg Murara from late 1976 to 1977 ) . Mount_Nyamuragira is responsible for a large portion of the sulfur dioxide released into the atmosphere by volcanoes . eos

Mount_Nyamuragira is responsible for a large portion of the sulfur dioxide released into the atmosphere by volcanoes . Extensive lava flows can be seen on satellite photographs going 25 km south - west to Lake Kivu , about 22 km north - west and 35 km north - north - east . eos

Mount_Nyamuragira is only 13 km north - north - west of Nyiragongo , the volcano which caused extensive damage to the city of Goma in its 2002 eruption . eos

is a volcano in the Virunga Mountains associated with the Great Rift Valley . Mount_Nyiragongo is located in the Democratic Republic of the Congo , about 20 km north of the town of Goma and Lake Kivu and just west of the border with Rwanda . The main crater is 250 m deep , two km wide and sometimes contains a lava lake . eos
is located in the Democratic Republic of the Congo , about 20 km north of the town of Goma and Lake Kivu and just west of the border with Rwanda . The main crater is 250 m deep , two km wide and sometimes contains a lava lake . Nyiragongo and nearby Nyamuragira are together responsible for 40 % of Africa 's historical volcanic eruptions . eos
( "" Greek : Όλυμπος "" ; also transliterated as Mount Ólympos , and on modern maps , Óros Ólimbos ) is the highest mountain in Greece at 2,917 meters high ( 9,570 feet ) . Mitikas is the highest peak in Greece , the second highest being Skolio ( 2912 m ) . eos

is a summit of Allardyce Range on the South Atlantic / Antarctic island of South Georgia . Mount_Paget is the highest peak in the island of South Georgia , and any territory of the United Kingdom . However , a higher peak still , Mount Jackson , lies within the British Antarctic Territory . eos

( sometimes Pantocrator , Pantōkrator , αντοκράτωρ in Greek ) is a mountain located in north - eastern Corfu . At 906 m ( 2,972 ft ) Mount_Pantokrator is the highest mountain on the island . At the summit the whole of Corfu can be seen , as well as Albania which lies a short distance from the island . eos
is the highest mountain on the island . At the summit the whole of Corfu can be seen , as well as Albania which lies a short distance from the island . On particularly clear days it is also possible to see Italy despite it being around 130 km ( 80 miles ) away . eos
is a mountain of barren limestone in central Greece Mount_Parnassus towers above Delphi , north of the Gulf of Corinth , and Mount_Parnassus offers scenic views of the surrounding olive groves and countryside . According to Greek mythology , Mount_Parnassus was sacred to Apollo , the Corycian nymphs , and the home of the Muses . Mount_Parnassus was also favored by the Dorians . eos

is an active stratovolcano located on the island of Luzon in the Philippines , at the intersection of the borders of the provinces of Zambales , Tarlac , and Pampanga . Mount_Pinatubo was a stratovolcano made of andesite and dacite . Before 1991 , Mount_Pinatubo was inconspicuous and heavily eroded . eos
was a stratovolcano made of andesite and dacite . Before 1991 , Mount_Pinatubo was inconspicuous and heavily eroded . Mount_Pinatubo was covered in dense forest which supported a population of several thousand indigenous people , the Aeta , who had fled to the mountains from the lowlands when the Spanish conquered the Philippines in 1565 . eos
was inconspicuous and heavily eroded . Mount_Pinatubo was covered in dense forest which supported a population of several thousand indigenous people , the Aeta , who had fled to the mountains from the lowlands when the Spanish conquered the Philippines in 1565 . Mount_Pinatubo eruption in june 1991 , more than 490 years after the last known eruptive activity , produced the second largest terrestrial eruption of the 20th century . eos
was covered in dense forest which supported a population of several thousand indigenous people , the Aeta , who had fled to the mountains from the lowlands when the Spanish conquered the Philippines in 1565 . Mount_Pinatubo eruption in june 1991 , more than 490 years after the last known eruptive activity , produced the second largest terrestrial eruption of the 20th century . Successful predictions of the onset of the climactic eruption led to the evacuation of tens of thousands of people from the surrounding areas , saving many lives , but as the surrounding areas were severely damaged by pyroclastic flows , ash deposits , and later , lahars caused by rainwater remobilising earlier volcanic deposits , thousands of houses were destroyed . eos
eruption in june 1991 , more than 490 years after the last known eruptive activity , produced the second largest terrestrial eruption of the 20th century . Successful predictions of the onset of the climactic eruption led to the evacuation of tens of thousands of people from the surrounding areas , saving many lives , but as the surrounding areas were severely damaged by pyroclastic flows , ash deposits , and later , lahars caused by rainwater remobilising earlier volcanic deposits , thousands of houses were destroyed . The effects of the eruption were felt worldwide . eos
( or sometimes Mount Pulog ) is the second - highest mountain in the Philippines . The borders between the provinces of Benguet , Ifugao , and Nueva Vizcaya meet at Mount_Pulag peak . The climate on Mount_Pulag is tropical with rains predominating the whole year . eos
peak . The climate on Mount_Pulag is tropical with rains predominating the whole year . Rainfall on Mount_Pulag averages 4,489 mm yearly with august being the wettest month with an average rainfall of 1,135 mm . eos
is tropical with rains predominating the whole year . Rainfall on Mount_Pulag averages 4,489 mm yearly with august being the wettest month with an average rainfall of 1,135 mm . Mount_Pulag hosts 528 documented plant species . eos
averages 4,489 mm yearly with august being the wettest month with an average rainfall of 1,135 mm . Mount_Pulag hosts 528 documented plant species . Mount_Pulag is the natural habitat of the endemic dwarf bamboo , ( Yushania niitakayamensis ) and the Benguet pine ( Pinus insularis ) . eos
hosts 528 documented plant species . Mount_Pulag is the natural habitat of the endemic dwarf bamboo , ( Yushania niitakayamensis ) and the Benguet pine ( Pinus insularis ) . Among Mount_Pulag native wildlife are 33 bird species and several threatened mammals such as Philippine deer , giant bushy - tailed cloud rat and long - haired fruit bat . eos
is the natural habitat of the endemic dwarf bamboo , ( Yushania niitakayamensis ) and the Benguet pine ( Pinus insularis ) . Among Mount_Pulag native wildlife are 33 bird species and several threatened mammals such as Philippine deer , giant bushy - tailed cloud rat and long - haired fruit bat . On february 20 , 1987 , a large part of Mount_Pulag was designated as a National Park with Proclamation No . 75 . eos
native wildlife are 33 bird species and several threatened mammals such as Philippine deer , giant bushy - tailed cloud rat and long - haired fruit bat . On february 20 , 1987 , a large part of Mount_Pulag was designated as a National Park with Proclamation No . 75 . This act aims to preserve the environment around Mount_Pulag due to threats from increased development such as conversion to agricultural lands , timber production , hunting , and increased tourism . eos
was designated as a National Park with Proclamation No . 75 . is an active stratovolcano in Pierce County , Washington , located southeast of Seattle , Washington , in the United States . Mount_Rainier is the highest peak in the Cascade Range and Cascade Volcanic Arc at 14,411 feet ( 4,392 m ) . Mount_Rainier and the surrounding area are protected within Mount Rainier National Park . eos
is the highest peak in the Cascade Range and Cascade Volcanic Arc at 14,411 feet ( 4,392 m ) . Mount_Rainier and the surrounding area are protected within Mount Rainier National Park . With 26 major glaciers , Mount_Rainier is the most heavily glaciated peak in the lower 48 states with 35 square miles ( 91 km ) of permanent snowfields and glaciers . eos
and the surrounding area are protected within Mount Rainier National Park . With 26 major glaciers , Mount_Rainier is the most heavily glaciated peak in the lower 48 states with 35 square miles ( 91 km ) of permanent snowfields and glaciers . The summit is topped by two volcanic craters , each over 1,000 feet ( 300 m ) in diameter with the larger east crater overlapping the west crater . eos
is the most heavily glaciated peak in the lower 48 states with 35 square miles ( 91 km ) of permanent snowfields and glaciers . The summit is topped by two volcanic craters , each over 1,000 feet ( 300 m ) in diameter with the larger east crater overlapping the west crater . Geothermal heat from Mount_Rainier keeps areas of both crater rims free of snow and ice , and has formed an extensive network of glacier caves within the ice - filled craters . eos
keeps areas of both crater rims free of snow and ice , and has formed an extensive network of glacier caves within the ice - filled craters . A small crater lake , the highest in North America , occupies the lowest portion of the west crater below more than 160 feet ( 50 m ) of ice and is accessible only via the caves . Mount_Rainier was originally known as Talol , or Tahoma , from the Lushootseed word təq "" IPA : ʷ "" ú "" IPA : ʔ eos
was originally known as Talol , or Tahoma , from the Lushootseed word təq "" IPA : ʷ "" ú "" IPA : ʔ "" bə "" IPA : ʔ "" ( ` ` mother of waters '' ) spoken by the Puyallup . eos
has a topographic prominence of 13,210 feet ( 4,026 m ) , greater than that of K2 . Mount_Rainier is a prominent feature of the southern landscape in most of the Seattle metropolitan area . On clear days , Mount_Rainier can also be seen from as far away as Portland , Oregon , and Victoria , British Columbia . eos
is a prominent feature of the southern landscape in most of the Seattle metropolitan area . Because of Mount_Rainier scenic dominance , Seattle - Tacoma - area residents often refer to Mount_Rainier simply as ` ` the Mountain . '' eos

The White , Carbon , and Mowich join the Puyallup River , which discharges into Commencement Bay at Tacoma ; the Nisqually empties into Puget Sound east of Lacey ; and the Cowlitz joins the Columbia River between Kelso and Longview . eos
, or Mount Tatamailau , is the highest mountain in East Timor at 2963 metres . Mount_Ramelau is located approximately 70 km south of the capital Dili and in the district of Ainaro . Mount_Ramelau can be climbed easily at around three or four hours from the nearby town Hato Builico , which is a 1.5 - 2 hour drive from Maubisse . eos
is located approximately 70 km south of the capital Dili and in the district of Ainaro . Mount_Ramelau can be climbed easily at around three or four hours from the nearby town Hato Builico , which is a 1.5 - 2 hour drive from Maubisse . During the period East Timor was a Portuguese colony , Mount_Ramelau was considered the highest mountain of Portugal . eos

, or Redoubt Volcano , is an active volcano and Mount_Redoubt_Alaska is the highest peak in the Aleutian Range on the Alaska Peninsula in Alaska . Mount_Redoubt_Alaska is located in the Chigmit Mountains ( a subrange of the Aleutians ) , west of Cook Inlet , about 180 km ( 110 miles ) southwest of Anchorage , Alaska . Mount_Redoubt_Alaska erupted in 1902 , 1966 and again in 1989 . eos
is the highest peak in the Aleutian Range on the Alaska Peninsula in Alaska . Mount_Redoubt_Alaska is located in the Chigmit Mountains ( a subrange of the Aleutians ) , west of Cook Inlet , about 180 km ( 110 miles ) southwest of Anchorage , Alaska . Mount_Redoubt_Alaska erupted in 1902 , 1966 and again in 1989 . eos
is located in the Chigmit Mountains ( a subrange of the Aleutians ) , west of Cook Inlet , about 180 km ( 110 miles ) southwest of Anchorage , Alaska . Mount_Redoubt_Alaska erupted in 1902 , 1966 and again in 1989 . The eruption in 1989 spewed volcanic ash to a height of 14,000 m ( 45,000 feet ) and managed to catch eos
erupted in 1902 , 1966 and again in 1989 . The eruption in 1989 spewed volcanic ash to a height of 14,000 m ( 45,000 feet ) and managed to catch a KLM Royal Dutch Airlines Boeing 747 aircraft in its ash plume ( flight 867 landed safely at Anchorage ) . eos
is not a particularly steep peak , but Mount_Redoubt_Alaska is a massive mountain : Mount_Redoubt_Alaska rises 9,000 feet ( 2,700 m ) above the surrounding valleys to the north , south , and southeast in little over 5 miles ( 8 km ) . eos

or Gunung Rinjani is an active volcano in Indonesia on the island of Lombok . Mount_Rinjani rises to 3,726 m ( 12,224 ft ) , making Mount_Rinjani the second highest volcano in Indonesia . The first historical eruption occurred in september of 1847 . eos
rises to 3,726 m ( 12,224 ft ) , making Mount_Rinjani the second highest volcano in Indonesia . The first historical eruption occurred in september of 1847 . The most recent eruption of Mount_Rinjani was on 1 october 2004 . eos

was on 1 october 2004 . The volcano and spectacular Segara Anak crater lake , are protected by a national park established in 1997 . The 6 km by 8.5 km oval - shaped caldera is filled partially by a lake known as Segara Anak ( approximately 2000 m above sea level and estimated at being between 200 m and 300 m deep ) ; the caldera also contains hot springs . eos
( or Robson Peak ) is the highest point in the Canadian Rockies . Mount_Robson is located entirely within Mount Robson Provincial Park of British Columbia , and Mount_Robson is part of the Rainbow Range . Mount_Robson is commonly thought to be the highest point in BC , but that distinction is held by Mount Fairweather at 4663 m . eos
is located entirely within Mount Robson Provincial Park of British Columbia , and Mount_Robson is part of the Rainbow Range . Mount_Robson is commonly thought to be the highest point in BC , but that distinction is held by Mount Fairweather at 4663 m . The highest mountain in Canada is Mount Logan at 5959 m. eos
is part of the Rainbow Range . Mount_Robson is commonly thought to be the highest point in BC , but that distinction is held by Mount Fairweather at 4663 m . The highest mountain in Canada is Mount Logan at 5959 m. eos
is commonly thought to be the highest point in BC , but that distinction is held by Mount Fairweather at 4663 m . The highest mountain in Canada is Mount Logan at 5959 m. Mount_Robson was named in 1915 by Colin Robertson , an employee of the Hudson 's Bay Company . eos
was named in 1915 by Colin Robertson , an employee of the Hudson 's Bay Company . The Texqakallt , a Secwepemc people and the earliest inhabitants of the area , call Mount_Robson Yuh - hai - has - kun or The Mountain of the Spiral Road . Other unofficial names include Cloud Cap Mountain and Snow Cap Mountain . eos
Yuh - hai - has - kun or The Mountain of the Spiral Road . Other unofficial names include Cloud Cap Mountain and Snow Cap Mountain . Mount_Robson boasts great vertical relief over the local terrain . eos
boasts great vertical relief over the local terrain . From Berg Lake Mount_Robson rises almost 8,000 feet to the summit . The north face of Mount_Robson is heavily glaciated and 800 metres ( 2600 ft ) of ice plunge down from the top to the shores of Berg Lake . eos
rises almost 8,000 feet to the summit . The north face of Mount_Robson is heavily glaciated and 800 metres ( 2600 ft ) of ice plunge down from the top to the shores of Berg Lake . The south side of Mount_Robson rises almost 10,000 feet from base - to - summit . eos
is heavily glaciated and 800 metres ( 2600 ft ) of ice plunge down from the top to the shores of Berg Lake . The south side of Mount_Robson rises almost 10,000 feet from base - to - summit . The Emperor Face on the northwest side provides a formidable challenge to climbers attempting a route up this vertical wall of rock and ice . eos
rises almost 10,000 feet from base - to - summit . The Emperor Face on the northwest side provides a formidable challenge to climbers attempting a route up this vertical wall of rock and ice . With the combination of no easy routes up Mount_Robson and frequent severe weather , the result is usually just a handful of successful climbs each year . eos
and frequent severe weather , the result is usually just a handful of successful climbs each year . The south face of Mount_Robson is clearly visible from the Yellowhead Highway ( Highway 16 ) . The north face can be seen from Berg Lake , reached by a 17.5 kilometres ( 10.9 mi ) hike . eos
is clearly visible from the Yellowhead Highway ( Highway 16 ) . The north face can be seen from Berg Lake , reached by a 17.5 kilometres ( 10.9 mi ) hike . eos
is the highest point in the state of Virginia , USA , with a summit elevation of 5,729 feet ( 1,746 metres ) above mean sea level . Mount_Rogers is in Grayson County , about 6.45 miles WSW of Troutdale , Virginia , within the Mount Rogers National Recreation Area . The summit is most easily accessed from Grayson Highlands State Park using a well marked trail system . eos
is in Grayson County , about 6.45 miles WSW of Troutdale , Virginia , within the Mount Rogers National Recreation Area . The summit is most easily accessed from Grayson Highlands State Park using a well marked trail system . It is covered by trees and marked with a National Geodetic Survey triangulation station disk . eos
. Massive rhyolite lava flows erupted at Mount_Rogers during the Precambrian rifting event . Mount_Rogers is also the only place in Virginia that preserves evidence of ancient glaciation . eos
during the Precambrian rifting event . Mount_Rogers is also the only place in Virginia that preserves evidence of ancient glaciation . eos
is also the only place in Virginia that preserves evidence of ancient glaciation . eos
, or just Ruapehu , is an active stratovolcano at the southern end of the Taupo Volcanic Zone in New Zealand . Mount_Ruapehu is 23 kilometres northeast of Ohakune and 40 kilometres southwest of the southern shore of Lake Taupo , within Tongariro National Park . The North Island 's major skifields and only glaciers are on Mount_Ruapehu slopes . eos
is 23 kilometres northeast of Ohakune and 40 kilometres southwest of the southern shore of Lake Taupo , within Tongariro National Park . The North Island 's major skifields and only glaciers are on Mount_Ruapehu slopes . Mount_Ruapehu is one of the world 's most active volcanoes and the largest active volcano in New Zealand . eos
slopes . Mount_Ruapehu is one of the world 's most active volcanoes and the largest active volcano in New Zealand . Mount_Ruapehu is the highest point in the North Island and Mount_Ruapehu includes three major peaks : Tahurangi ( 2,797 m ) , Te Heuheu ( 2,755 m ) and Paretetaitonga ( 2,751 m ) . eos
is one of the world 's most active volcanoes and the largest active volcano in New Zealand . Mount_Ruapehu is the highest point in the North Island and Mount_Ruapehu includes three major peaks : Tahurangi ( 2,797 m ) , Te Heuheu ( 2,755 m ) and Paretetaitonga ( 2,751 m ) . The deep , active crater is between the peaks and fills with a crater lake between major eruptions . eos
is the highest point in the North Island and Mount_Ruapehu includes three major peaks : Tahurangi ( 2,797 m ) , Te Heuheu ( 2,755 m ) and Paretetaitonga ( 2,751 m ) . The deep , active crater is between the peaks and fills with a crater lake between major eruptions . eos

is the seventh highest peak in the Wind River Range , Wyoming and Mount_Sacagawea was named after Sacagawea , the female Shoshone who accompanied the Lewis and Clark Expedition . The Upper Fremont Glacier is located southeast and the Sacagawea Glacier is northeast of Mount_Sacagawea . is the second highest mountain in both the United States and Canada , being situated on the Alaska and Yukon border . The US side of Mount_Saint_Elias is located within Wrangell - St . Elias National Park and Preserve , while the Canadian side is part of Kluane National Park . eos
is located within Wrangell - St . Elias National Park and Preserve , while the Canadian side is part of Kluane National Park . Mount_Saint_Elias lies about 25 miles ( 40 km ) southwest of Mount Logan , the highest mountain in Canada . eos
lies about 25 miles ( 40 km ) southwest of Mount Logan , the highest mountain in Canada . Mount_Saint_Elias name in Tlingit is Yaas ` éit ` aa Shaa , meaning ` ` mountain behind Icy Bay '' , and Mount_Saint_Elias is occasionally called Shaa Tléin ` ` Big Mountain '' by the Yakutat Tlingit . Mount_Saint_Elias is one of the most important crests of the Kwaashk ` khwáan clan since they used Mount_Saint_Elias as a guide during their journey down the Copper River . eos
name in Tlingit is Yaas ` éit ` aa Shaa , meaning ` ` mountain behind Icy Bay '' , and Mount_Saint_Elias is occasionally called Shaa Tléin ` ` Big Mountain '' by the Yakutat Tlingit . Mount_Saint_Elias is one of the most important crests of the Kwaashk ` khwáan clan since they used Mount_Saint_Elias as a guide during their journey down the Copper River . Mount_Saint_Elias was first sighted by European explorers on july 16 , 1741 by Vitus Bering of Russia . eos

is one of the most important crests of the Kwaashk ` khwáan clan since they used Mount_Saint_Elias as a guide during their journey down the Copper River . Mount_Saint_Elias was first sighted by European explorers on july 16 , 1741 by Vitus Bering of Russia . While some historians contend that Mount_Saint_Elias was named by Bering , others believe that eighteenth century mapmakers named Mount_Saint_Elias after Cape Saint Elias , when Mount_Saint_Elias was left unnamed by Bering . eos
as a guide during their journey down the Copper River . Mount_Saint_Elias was first sighted by European explorers on july 16 , 1741 by Vitus Bering of Russia . While some historians contend that Mount_Saint_Elias was named by Bering , others believe that eighteenth century mapmakers named Mount_Saint_Elias after Cape Saint Elias , when Mount_Saint_Elias was left unnamed by Bering . eos
was first sighted by European explorers on july 16 , 1741 by Vitus Bering of Russia . While some historians contend that Mount_Saint_Elias was named by Bering , others believe that eighteenth century mapmakers named Mount_Saint_Elias after Cape Saint Elias , when Mount_Saint_Elias was left unnamed by Bering . Mount_Saint_Elias is notable for being the highest peak in the world that is so close to tidewater : Mount_Saint_Elias summit rises only 10 miles ( 16 km ) from the head of Taan Fjord , off of Icy Bay . eos
after Cape Saint Elias , when Mount_Saint_Elias was left unnamed by Bering . Mount_Saint_Elias is notable for being the highest peak in the world that is so close to tidewater : Mount_Saint_Elias summit rises only 10 miles ( 16 km ) from the head of Taan Fjord , off of Icy Bay . This gives Mount_Saint_Elias immense vertical relief , comparable to that of Mount McKinley ( Denali ) or peaks in the Himalaya . eos
was left unnamed by Bering . is a peak in the remote southwestern section of Glacier National Park , in Montana , United States . Mount_Saint_Nicholas is a particularly steep , pointed rock pinnacle , and Mount_Saint_Nicholas distinctive profile is visible from many summits in the southern half of the park . Because even Mount_Saint_Nicholas easiest ascent route is technical , with poor rock quality , Mount_Saint_Nicholas is ` ` considered the most dangerous and difficult mountain for climbers in Glacier National Park . '' eos
is a particularly steep , pointed rock pinnacle , and Mount_Saint_Nicholas distinctive profile is visible from many summits in the southern half of the park . Because even Mount_Saint_Nicholas easiest ascent route is technical , with poor rock quality , Mount_Saint_Nicholas is ` ` considered the most dangerous and difficult mountain for climbers in Glacier National Park . '' ( Edwards 1995:335 ) Mount_Saint_Nicholas excels in terms of steep vertical relief , even by the high standards prevalent in Glacier National Park . eos

easiest ascent route is technical , with poor rock quality , Mount_Saint_Nicholas is ` ` considered the most dangerous and difficult mountain for climbers in Glacier National Park . '' ( Edwards 1995:335 ) Mount_Saint_Nicholas excels in terms of steep vertical relief , even by the high standards prevalent in Glacier National Park . For example , Mount_Saint_Nicholas northwest face rises one vertical mile ( 5,280 ft/1 , 609 m ) in approximately 1.5 horizontal miles ( 7,920 ft/2 .4 km ) . eos

For example , Mount_Saint_Nicholas northwest face rises one vertical mile ( 5,280 ft/1 , 609 m ) in approximately 1.5 horizontal miles ( 7,920 ft/2 .4 km ) . Due to Mount_Saint_Nicholas pointed shape and isolation from the Continental Divide , Mount_Saint_Nicholas has similarly precipitous drops in all directions . eos
northwest face rises one vertical mile ( 5,280 ft/1 , 609 m ) in approximately 1.5 horizontal miles ( 7,920 ft/2 .4 km ) . Due to Mount_Saint_Nicholas pointed shape and isolation from the Continental Divide , Mount_Saint_Nicholas has similarly precipitous drops in all directions . In 1926 , Reverend Conrad Wellen , of Havre , Montana , made the first ascent of Mount_Saint_Nicholas . eos
pointed shape and isolation from the Continental Divide , Mount_Saint_Nicholas has similarly precipitous drops in all directions . In 1926 , Reverend Conrad Wellen , of Havre , Montana , made the first ascent of Mount_Saint_Nicholas . This was a significant achievement , since Mount_Saint_Nicholas had been considered by many to be unclimbable . eos

, this route begins with a straightforward scramble up a gully to a prominent notch . From the notch a thousand vertical feet of somewhat technical climbing remain . ( Edwards 1995:337 ) eos
, better known to most in Los Angeles as Old Baldy or Mount Baldy , is the highest peak in the San Gabriel Mountains of Southern California , USA and the highest point in Los Angeles County . Mount_San_Antonio has two summits . The eastern summit is higher at an elevation of 10,064 feet while the west is at 9,988 feet . eos
has two summits . The eastern summit is higher at an elevation of 10,064 feet while the west is at 9,988 feet . In winter , Mount_San_Antonio snow - capped peaks are usually visible on clear days and dominate the view of the Los Angeles skyline . eos
snow - capped peaks are usually visible on clear days and dominate the view of the Los Angeles skyline . Mount_San_Antonio , Mount_San_Antonio marks a boundary between San Bernardino County and Los Angeles County is called Baldy because of the absence of trees around the summit . The Tongva tribe call Mount_San_Antonio Yoát or Joat , which means snow . eos

Mount_San_Antonio may host more hikers than any other mountaintop in the western United States ( of those inaccessible by car ) , or so guesses San Gabriel Mountains historian John W Robinson . eos

Mount_San_Antonio is considered to be a cosmic spiritual ` ` recharging '' site by the Aetherius Society . eos
may host more hikers than any other mountaintop in the western United States ( of those inaccessible by car ) , or so guesses San Gabriel Mountains historian John W Robinson . Mount_San_Antonio is considered to be a cosmic spiritual ` ` recharging '' site by the Aetherius Society . The Mount Baldy Zen teaching centre was founded on Mount_San_Antonio in 1972 . eos
is considered to be a cosmic spiritual ` ` recharging '' site by the Aetherius Society . The Mount Baldy Zen teaching centre was founded on Mount_San_Antonio in 1972 . in 1972 . Mount_San_Antonio , along with the nearby peak known as Thunder Mountain , is currently home to the family owned and operated ski resort Mount Baldy Ski Lifts , the closest resort to Los Angeles . Nearby lies Mt. Baldy Village , a small seasonal community . eos

Baldy Village , a small seasonal community . The village has its own fire department , church , visitor 's center , and one - school school district ; Mt. Baldy School ( the abbreviation is the standard usage ) has about 88 students . eos
3 km SW of the peak , from the observatory at Mount Wilson some 22 miles distant . The exact distance was very accurately surveyed and using the measurements the speed of light was calculated to be 299,796 ± 4 km / s . Nearby is San Antonio Creek , the location of San Antonio Falls . eos
is located in the North Saskatchewan River valley of Banff National Park , in the Canadian Rockies of Alberta , Canada . J Norman Collie named Mount_Saskatchewan_Alberta in 1898 for the nearby Saskatchewan River . A pinnacle unofficially named Lighthouse Tower ( 2,960 m ( 9,711 ft ) ) is located on the eastern ridge of Mount_Saskatchewan_Alberta . eos

is located in the extreme southwestern corner of Yukon in Kluane National Park and Reserve . Mount_Saskatchewan_Yukon was named in 1967 for the province of Saskatchewan to mark Canada 's centennial . As of 2006 , Mount_Saskatchewan_Yukon remains unclimbed . eos
was named in 1967 for the province of Saskatchewan to mark Canada 's centennial . As of 2006 , Mount_Saskatchewan_Yukon remains unclimbed . The first attempt was made in 1967 as part of Canada 's centennial celebrations . eos
remains unclimbed . The first attempt was made in 1967 as part of Canada 's centennial celebrations . A team from Saskatchewan attempted to climb Mount_Saskatchewan_Yukon in May 2005 to celebrate the centennial of the province . eos
in May 2005 to celebrate the centennial of the province . However , warmer than usual weather conditions and difficulties in finding a relatively safe route rebuffed the attempt . eos
is a mountain located in Mount Seymour Provincial Park in the District of North Vancouver , British Columbia . Mount_Seymour is a part of the North Shore Mountains , rising to the north from the shores of Burrard Inlet and Indian Arm to a summit of 1449 metres above the Indian River and Deep Cove neighbourhoods . Mount_Seymour is most commonly identified for Mount_Seymour ski area of the same name . eos
is a part of the North Shore Mountains , rising to the north from the shores of Burrard Inlet and Indian Arm to a summit of 1449 metres above the Indian River and Deep Cove neighbourhoods . Mount_Seymour is most commonly identified for Mount_Seymour ski area of the same name . Mount_Seymour is named in honour of Frederick Seymour , first governor of the Colony of British Columbia . eos

, a 14,179-foot ( 4,322 m ) stratovolcano , is the second - highest peak in the Cascade Range and the fifth highest peak in California . Mount_Shasta is a member in the Cascade Volcanic Arc and Mount_Shasta is located in Siskiyou County , and Mount_Shasta has an estimated volume of 108 cubic miles ( 450 km ³ ) , making Mount_Shasta the most voluminous stratovolcano of the Cascades . Physically unconnected to any nearby mountain , and rising abruptly from miles of level ground which encircle Mount_Shasta , Mount_Shasta stands some 10,000 feet ( 3,000 m ) above the surrounding area . eos
is a member in the Cascade Volcanic Arc and Mount_Shasta is located in Siskiyou County , and Mount_Shasta has an estimated volume of 108 cubic miles ( 450 km ³ ) , making Mount_Shasta the most voluminous stratovolcano of the Cascades . Physically unconnected to any nearby mountain , and rising abruptly from miles of level ground which encircle Mount_Shasta , Mount_Shasta stands some 10,000 feet ( 3,000 m ) above the surrounding area . Mount_Shasta was memorably described by the poet Joaquin Miller : ` ` Lonely as God , and white as a winter moon , Mount Shasta starts up sudden and solitary from the heart of the great black forests of Northern California . '' eos
is located in Siskiyou County , and Mount_Shasta has an estimated volume of 108 cubic miles ( 450 km ³ ) , making Mount_Shasta the most voluminous stratovolcano of the Cascades . has an estimated volume of 108 cubic miles ( 450 km ³ ) , making Mount_Shasta the most voluminous stratovolcano of the Cascades . Physically unconnected to any nearby mountain , and rising abruptly from miles of level ground which encircle Mount_Shasta , Mount_Shasta stands some 10,000 feet ( 3,000 m ) above the surrounding area . Mount_Shasta was memorably described by the poet Joaquin Miller : ` ` Lonely as God , and white as a winter moon , Mount Shasta starts up sudden and solitary from the heart of the great black forests of Northern California . '' eos

, with an altitude of 14,229 feet ( 4,337 meters ) , is one of the fourteeners of the US State of Colorado . Mount_Shavano is the 17th highest peak in Colorado and a near - neighbor to Tabeguache Peak . Mount_Shavano lies just east of the Continental Divide and just west of the Arkansas River and the town of Salida in Chaffee County . eos
is the 17th highest peak in Colorado and a near - neighbor to Tabeguache Peak . Mount_Shavano lies just east of the Continental Divide and just west of the Arkansas River and the town of Salida in Chaffee County . Mount_Shavano lies in the south - central part of the Sawatch Range , north of Mount Ouray and Mount Chipeta and south of the Collegiate Peaks ( including Mount Princeton , Mount Harvard , and Mount Yale ) . eos
lies just east of the Continental Divide and just west of the Arkansas River and the town of Salida in Chaffee County . Mount_Shavano lies in the south - central part of the Sawatch Range , north of Mount Ouray and Mount Chipeta and south of the Collegiate Peaks ( including Mount Princeton , Mount Harvard , and Mount Yale ) . Mount_Shavano is famous for the Angel of Shavano , a snow formation in the image of an angel that emerges on the east face of Mount_Shavano during snow melt each spring . eos
lies in the south - central part of the Sawatch Range , north of Mount Ouray and Mount Chipeta and south of the Collegiate Peaks ( including Mount Princeton , Mount Harvard , and Mount Yale ) . Mount_Shavano is famous for the Angel of Shavano , a snow formation in the image of an angel that emerges on the east face of Mount_Shavano during snow melt each spring . Mount_Shavano is located within the San Isabel National Forest and Mount_Shavano was named after Chief Shavano of the Ute Tribe . eos

( pronounced / ʃɨˈʃældən / ) is a moderately active volcano on Unimak Island in the Aleutian Islands chain of Alaska . Mount_Shishaldin is a rather symmetric cone , reminiscent of Mount Fuji , with several smaller , low - profile cones scattered on the Northwest slope . Rising to 2857 m ( 9,373 ft ) above sea level Mount_Shishaldin is the third largest island based volcano in North America and one of the most active volcanoes in the Aleutian Range . eos
is a rather symmetric cone , reminiscent of Mount Fuji , with several smaller , low - profile cones scattered on the Northwest slope . Rising to 2857 m ( 9,373 ft ) above sea level Mount_Shishaldin is the third largest island based volcano in North America and one of the most active volcanoes in the Aleutian Range . eos
is the third largest island based volcano in North America and one of the most active volcanoes in the Aleutian Range . eos
( pronounced sigh ) is a small mountain in the US state of Washington . Although just 4,167 ft high , Mount_Si lies on the western margin of the Cascade Range just above the coastal plains around Puget Sound , and Mount_Si towers over the nearby town of North Bend . Mount_Si was named after local homesteader Josiah eos
lies on the western margin of the Cascade Range just above the coastal plains around Puget Sound , and Mount_Si towers over the nearby town of North Bend . Mount_Si was named after local homesteader Josiah ` ` Uncle Si '' Merritt . eos
towers over the nearby town of North Bend . Mount_Si was named after local homesteader Josiah ` ` Uncle Si '' Merritt . eos
was named after local homesteader Josiah ` ` Uncle Si '' Merritt . Mount_Si was made famous in the show Twin Peaks , which was filmed in North Bend . eos
was made famous in the show Twin Peaks , which was filmed in North Bend . Only about a 45-minute drive from Seattle , Mount_Si is a favorite outdoor destination for Puget Sound locals . On most summer days one can count numerous hikers on the trail to the summit . eos
is a favorite outdoor destination for Puget Sound locals . On most summer days one can count numerous hikers on the trail to the summit . Mount_Si gets between 80 - 100,000 climbers annually . eos
gets between 80 - 100,000 climbers annually . The trail climbs 3,500 ft in about 4 miles , making it an ideal conditioning trip , and it is open during the winter and spring when most of the Cascades are snowed in . Hikers wanting extra exercise will carry up jugs of water in backpacks , then empty them at the top so as to reduce knee stress on the walk down . eos
is the highest volcano in Antarctica , a member of the Volcanic Seven Summits . Mount_Sidley is a massive , mainly snow - covered shield volcano Mount_Sidley is the highest and most imposing of the five extinct volcanic mountains that comprise the Executive Committee Range of Marie Byrd Land . eos
is a massive , mainly snow - covered shield volcano Mount_Sidley is the highest and most imposing of the five extinct volcanic mountains that comprise the Executive Committee Range of Marie Byrd Land . Mount_Sidley is marked by a spectacular caldera on the southern side and Mount_Sidley stands NE of Mount Waesche in the southern part of the range . eos
is the highest and most imposing of the five extinct volcanic mountains that comprise the Executive Committee Range of Marie Byrd Land . Mount_Sidley is marked by a spectacular caldera on the southern side and Mount_Sidley stands NE of Mount Waesche in the southern part of the range . eos
is marked by a spectacular caldera on the southern side and Mount_Sidley stands NE of Mount Waesche in the southern part of the range . Mount_Sidley was discovered by Rear Admiral Richard E Byrd on an airplane flight , november 18 , 1934 , and named by him for Mabelle E Sidley , the daughter of William Horlick who was a contributor to the 1933 - 35 Byrd Antarctic Expedition . Despite Mount_Sidley lofty status , Mount_Sidley languishes in obscurity due to Mount_Sidley extremely remote location . eos
stands NE of Mount Waesche in the southern part of the range . Despite Mount_Sidley lofty status , Mount_Sidley languishes in obscurity due to Mount_Sidley extremely remote location . eos
was discovered by Rear Admiral Richard E Byrd on an airplane flight , november 18 , 1934 , and named by him for Mabelle E Sidley , the daughter of William Horlick who was a contributor to the 1933 - 35 Byrd Antarctic Expedition . Despite Mount_Sidley lofty status , Mount_Sidley languishes in obscurity due to Mount_Sidley extremely remote location . Mount_Sidley is little known even in the mountaineering world compared to the far more famous Mount Erebus , the second highest Antarctic volcano which is located near the US and New Zealand bases on Ross Island . eos

is one of the fourteeners of the Sierra Nevada in California . Mount_Sill is located in the Palisades , a group of striking rock peaks with a few small glaciers on their flanks . Mount_Sill is located 0.6 miles ( 1 km ) east of North Palisade , the high point of the group . eos
is located in the Palisades , a group of striking rock peaks with a few small glaciers on their flanks . Mount_Sill is located 0.6 miles ( 1 km ) east of North Palisade , the high point of the group . The two peaks are connected by a high , rocky ridge , on the north side of which lies the Palisade Glacier . eos
is located 0.6 miles ( 1 km ) east of North Palisade , the high point of the group . The two peaks are connected by a high , rocky ridge , on the north side of which lies the Palisade Glacier . Mount_Sill lies on the main Sierra Crest , but Mount_Sill is at a point where the crest turns sharply , giving Mount_Sill particularly striking summit views . eos
lies on the main Sierra Crest , but Mount_Sill is at a point where the crest turns sharply , giving Mount_Sill particularly striking summit views . Routes on Mount_Sill are found on all sides of Mount_Sill and range in difficulty from scrambles ( Class 2 - 3 ) to moderately technical rock climbs ( Yosemite Decimal System 5.7 ) . Mount_Sill is called Nen - i - mish ( ` ` the Guardian of the Valley '' ) by the indigenous Northern Paiute people . eos

is a dormant shield volcano , rising to 3,110 metres ( 10,203 ft ) and dominating the northwest part of Siple Island , which is separated from the Bakutis Coast , Marie Byrd Land , by the Getz Ice Shelf . Mount_Siple youthful appearance strongly suggests that Mount_Siple last erupted sometime during the Holocene . Mount_Siple is capped by a 4 x 5 km ( 2.5 x 3 mi ) summit caldera , and tuff cones lie on the lower flanks . eos
youthful appearance strongly suggests that Mount_Siple last erupted sometime during the Holocene . Mount_Siple is capped by a 4 x 5 km ( 2.5 x 3 mi ) summit caldera , and tuff cones lie on the lower flanks . Mount_Siple massive volume of 1,800 cubic kilometres ( 430 cu mi ) is comparable to that of Mount Erebus . eos
last erupted sometime during the Holocene . Mount_Siple is capped by a 4 x 5 km ( 2.5 x 3 mi ) summit caldera , and tuff cones lie on the lower flanks . Mount_Siple massive volume of 1,800 cubic kilometres ( 430 cu mi ) is comparable to that of Mount Erebus . eos
is capped by a 4 x 5 km ( 2.5 x 3 mi ) summit caldera , and tuff cones lie on the lower flanks . Mount_Siple massive volume of 1,800 cubic kilometres ( 430 cu mi ) is comparable to that of Mount Erebus . Mount_Siple is named after Paul Allen Siple ( 1908 - 68 ) , American Antarctic explorer and geographer who took part in six Antarctic expeditions , including the two Byrd expeditions of 1928 - 30 and 1933 - 35 ( Siple Coast , Siple Island ) . eos
massive volume of 1,800 cubic kilometres ( 430 cu mi ) is comparable to that of Mount Erebus . Mount_Siple is named after Paul Allen Siple ( 1908 - 68 ) , American Antarctic explorer and geographer who took part in six Antarctic expeditions , including the two Byrd expeditions of 1928 - 30 and 1933 - 35 ( Siple Coast , Siple Island ) . He was in command of the West Base of the US Antarctic Service ( USAS ) , 1939 - 41 , and was navigator on all major exploratory flights from the base , including the flight on which Mount_Siple was discovered . eos
is named after Paul Allen Siple ( 1908 - 68 ) , American Antarctic explorer and geographer who took part in six Antarctic expeditions , including the two Byrd expeditions of 1928 - 30 and 1933 - 35 ( Siple Coast , Siple Island ) . He was in command of the West Base of the US Antarctic Service ( USAS ) , 1939 - 41 , and was navigator on all major exploratory flights from the base , including the flight on which Mount_Siple was discovered . He served as US Army Senior Representative on Operation Highjump , 1946 - 47 ; as Director of Scientific Projects in the planning stages for the US - IGY ; and as the inaugural scientific leader at the US Amundsen - Scott South Pole Station 1956 - 57 . eos
was discovered . He served as US Army Senior Representative on Operation Highjump , 1946 - 47 ; as Director of Scientific Projects in the planning stages for the US - IGY ; and as the inaugural scientific leader at the US Amundsen - Scott South Pole Station 1956 - 57 . is a prominent topographical summit located on Blue Ridge within Henry W Coe State Park , just east of Morgan Hill , California . Because Mount_Sizer is the highest point on Blue Ridge and under 10 miles from the park 's headquarters , it makes Mount_Sizer an ideal destination for day hikers . eos
is the highest point on Blue Ridge and under 10 miles from the park 's headquarters , it makes Mount_Sizer an ideal destination for day hikers . There are two ways to reach the summit , one by trails and one by a combination of trail and fire road . eos
an ideal destination for day hikers . There are two ways to reach the summit , one by trails and one by a combination of trail and fire road . The fire road route leads you almost directly up Blue Ridge to Mount_Sizer and is affectionately nicknamed ` ` The Shortcut '' . eos
and is affectionately nicknamed ` ` The Shortcut '' . This road rises roughly 1,500 feet ( 457.2 m ) in 1.3 miles ( 2.1 km ) giving it an average grade of 22 % . To better understand this incline , most paved roads never exceed an 8 % grade in California . eos

or Gunung Slamet is an active stratovolcano in Central Java , Indonesia . Mount_Slamet has a cluster of around three dozens of cinder cones on the lower southeast - northeast flanks and a single cinder cone on the western flank . Mount_Slamet is composed by two overlapping edifices . eos
has a cluster of around three dozens of cinder cones on the lower southeast - northeast flanks and a single cinder cone on the western flank . Mount_Slamet is composed by two overlapping edifices . Four craters are found at the summit . eos
is composed by two overlapping edifices . Four craters are found at the summit . Historical eruptions have been recorded since the eighteenth century . eos
is a mountain in Jasper National Park , Alberta , Canada . Mount_Smythe is located in the Sir Winston Churchill Range , southwest of Gong Peak and north of Mount Nelson . Mount_Smythe reaches a height of 3,246 m ( 10,650 ft ) . eos

is a fourteen thousand foot mountain peak in the US state of Colorado . Mount_Sneffels is located in the Mount Sneffels Wilderness of the northern San Juan Mountains , in Ouray County approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) west of the town of Ouray . The primary route to the summit follows a creek bed up from Yankee Boy Basin . eos
is located in the Mount Sneffels Wilderness of the northern San Juan Mountains , in Ouray County approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) west of the town of Ouray . The primary route to the summit follows a creek bed up from Yankee Boy Basin . A secondary route follows a ridge line to the summit from the saddle of Blue Lakes Pass . eos
was named after the volcano Snæfellsjökull ( or Snæfell ) in Iceland featured in the Jules Verne novel Journey to the Centre of the Earth . The area on the western flank of Mount_Sneffels gives the appearance of volcanic crater . Seen from the Dallas Divide on Colorado State Highway 62 , Mount_Sneffels is one of the most photographed mountains in Colorado . eos

is a mountain located in the Ruwenzori Range . Mount_Stanley is the highest mountain of both the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Uganda , and the third highest in Africa , after Kilimanjaro ( 5,895 m ) and Mount Kenya ( 5,199 m ) . The peak and several other surrounding peaks are high enough to support glaciers . eos
is the highest mountain of both the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Uganda , and the third highest in Africa , after Kilimanjaro ( 5,895 m ) and Mount Kenya ( 5,199 m ) . The peak and several other surrounding peaks are high enough to support glaciers . Mount_Stanley consists of two twin summits and several lower peaks . eos
consists of two twin summits and several lower peaks . Mount_Stanley was first climbed in 1906 by Duke of the Abruzzi , J Petigax , C Ollier and J Brocherel . Margherita Peak is named after Queen Margherita of Savoy . eos
was first climbed in 1906 by Duke of the Abruzzi , J Petigax , C Ollier and J Brocherel . Margherita Peak is named after Queen Margherita of Savoy . eos
is the fifth highest mountain in Canada and the tenth highest peak in North America . A lower southeast peak of Mount_Steele stands at 4,300 m ( 14,108 ft ) . Mount_Steele was named after Sam Steele , the North West Mounted Police officer in charge of the force in the Yukon during the Klondike Gold Rush . eos

is a prominent mountain standing 6.4 km ( 4 mi ) NNW of Mount Frakes in the Crary Mountains of Marie Byrd Land , Antarctica . Mapped by USGS from ground surveys and US Navy air photos , 1959 - 66 . Named by US - ACAN for William C Steere , biologist at McMurdo Station , 1964 - 65 season . eos
is the second highest peak in Glacier National Park , located in Montana , United States . Mount_Stimson is part of the Lewis Range , which spans much of the park . Mount_Stimson is located in the remote southwestern portion of the park , approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) west of the Continental Divide and 12 miles ( 19 km ) southeast of Lake McDonald . eos
is part of the Lewis Range , which spans much of the park . Mount_Stimson is located in the remote southwestern portion of the park , approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) west of the Continental Divide and 12 miles ( 19 km ) southeast of Lake McDonald . Mount_Stimson is drained by Pinchot Creek ( on the south ) and Nyack Creek ( on the other sides ) , both of which flow into the Middle Fork of the Flathead River . eos
is located in the remote southwestern portion of the park , approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) west of the Continental Divide and 12 miles ( 19 km ) southeast of Lake McDonald . Mount_Stimson is drained by Pinchot Creek ( on the south ) and Nyack Creek ( on the other sides ) , both of which flow into the Middle Fork of the Flathead River . Mount_Stimson is named for Henry L Stimson ( 1867 - 1950 ) , former US Secretary of State . eos
is drained by Pinchot Creek ( on the south ) and Nyack Creek ( on the other sides ) , both of which flow into the Middle Fork of the Flathead River . Mount_Stimson is named for Henry L Stimson ( 1867 - 1950 ) , former US Secretary of State . Mount_Stimson is notable for Mount_Stimson large , steep rise above local terrain . eos
is named for Henry L Stimson ( 1867 - 1950 ) , former US Secretary of State . Mount_Stimson is notable for Mount_Stimson large , steep rise above local terrain . For example , Mount_Stimson northwest face rises over 6200 ft ( 1890 m ) from Nyack Creek in only 1.8 mi ( 9,500 ft/2 .9 km ) . eos
is notable for Mount_Stimson large , steep rise above local terrain . For example , Mount_Stimson northwest face rises over 6200 ft ( 1890 m ) from Nyack Creek in only 1.8 mi ( 9,500 ft/2 .9 km ) . This makes Mount_Stimson ` ` truly a monster of a mountain . '' eos

is also notable for Mount_Stimson isolation ; Mount_Stimson is one of the furthest peaks from a roadhead in the park . The standard route of ascent is the West ( or Northwest ) eos

, or Goropi , is the highest peak of the Goropu Mountains , part of the Owen Stanley Range in southeastern Papua New Guinea . Mount_Suckling lies about 250 kilometres ( 160 mi ) east of Port Moresby . Situated on a relatively narrow peninsula , Mount_Suckling lies only about 60 km ( 40 mi ) from the sea to both the northeast ( in the direction of Collingwood Bay ) and the south . eos
lies about 250 kilometres ( 160 mi ) east of Port Moresby . Situated on a relatively narrow peninsula , Mount_Suckling lies only about 60 km ( 40 mi ) from the sea to both the northeast ( in the direction of Collingwood Bay ) and the south . While not the highest peak in the Owen Stanley Range ( Mount Victoria is the highest ) eos
lies only about 60 km ( 40 mi ) from the sea to both the northeast ( in the direction of Collingwood Bay ) and the south . While not the highest peak in the Owen Stanley Range ( Mount Victoria is the highest ) , Mount_Suckling is the most topographically prominent peak in the range , and Mount_Suckling is in fact the third most prominent peak on the island of New Guinea . eos
is the most topographically prominent peak in the range , and Mount_Suckling is in fact the third most prominent peak on the island of New Guinea . Mount_Suckling rises above the timberline , while Mount_Suckling lower slopes are well - forested . The Maisin people inhabit the area around Mount_Suckling . eos
is in fact the third most prominent peak on the island of New Guinea . Mount_Suckling rises above the timberline , while Mount_Suckling lower slopes are well - forested . The Maisin people inhabit the area around Mount_Suckling . eos

( IPA : / tæməlˈpaɪəs / ; MWCD "" IPA : "" tam - əl-ˈpi - əs "" "" , known locally as ` ` Mount Tam '' ) is a peak in Marin County , California , USA , often considered symbolic of Marin County . eos
is protected within public lands such as Mount Tamalpais State Park and the Mount Tamalpais Watershed . eos
( or Tomboro ) is an active stratovolcano on Sumbawa island , Indonesia . Sumbawa is flanked both to the north and south by oceanic crust , and Mount_Tambora was formed by the active subduction zones beneath it . This raised Mount_Tambora as high as 4,300 m ( 14,000 ft ) , making Mount_Tambora one of the tallest peaks in the Indonesian archipelago , and drained off a large magma chamber inside Mount_Tambora . eos
was formed by the active subduction zones beneath it . This raised Mount_Tambora as high as 4,300 m ( 14,000 ft ) , making Mount_Tambora one of the tallest peaks in the Indonesian archipelago , and drained off a large magma chamber inside Mount_Tambora . It took centuries to refill the magma chamber , its volcanic activity reaching its peak in april 1815 . eos
as high as 4,300 m ( 14,000 ft ) , making Mount_Tambora one of the tallest peaks in the Indonesian archipelago , and drained off a large magma chamber inside Mount_Tambora . It took centuries to refill the magma chamber , its volcanic activity reaching its peak in april 1815 . Mount_Tambora erupted in 1815 with a rating of seven on the Volcanic Explosivity Index ; the largest eruption since the Lake Taupo eruption in AD 181 . eos
one of the tallest peaks in the Indonesian archipelago , and drained off a large magma chamber inside Mount_Tambora . It took centuries to refill the magma chamber , its volcanic activity reaching its peak in april 1815 . Mount_Tambora erupted in 1815 with a rating of seven on the Volcanic Explosivity Index ; the largest eruption since the Lake Taupo eruption in AD 181 . eos
. It took centuries to refill the magma chamber , its volcanic activity reaching its peak in april 1815 . Mount_Tambora erupted in 1815 with a rating of seven on the Volcanic Explosivity Index ; the largest eruption since the Lake Taupo eruption in AD 181 . eos
erupted in 1815 with a rating of seven on the Volcanic Explosivity Index ; the largest eruption since the Lake Taupo eruption in AD 181 . The explosion was heard on Sumatra island ( more than 2,000 km or 1,200 mi away ) . Heavy volcanic ash falls were observed as far away as Borneo , Sulawesi , Java and Maluku islands . eos
, formerly Mount Tapuaenuku , is the highest peak in the northeast of New Zealand 's South Island . The name translates from Māori as ` ` footprint of the rainbow '' , though Mount_Tapuaenuku is usually regarded as being named after Chief Tapuaenuku . At 2880 metres Mount_Tapuaenuku is the highest mountain in New Zealand outside the main ranges of the Southern Alps , and over 50 metres taller than the tallest peak in the North Island . eos
is usually regarded as being named after Chief Tapuaenuku . At 2880 metres Mount_Tapuaenuku is the highest mountain in New Zealand outside the main ranges of the Southern Alps , and over 50 metres taller than the tallest peak in the North Island . Mount_Tapuaenuku dominates the Inland Kaikoura Range , rising high above the valleys of the Clarence and Awatere Rivers . eos
is the highest mountain in New Zealand outside the main ranges of the Southern Alps , and over 50 metres taller than the tallest peak in the North Island . Mount_Tapuaenuku dominates the Inland Kaikoura Range , rising high above the valleys of the Clarence and Awatere Rivers . Mount_Tapuaenuku can be seen from as far away as Cape Terawhiti on the southeastern tip of the North Island , nearly 120 kilometres away , and Mount_Tapuaenuku is a prominent point on the horizon for travellers on the interisland ferries that ply Cook Strait . eos
dominates the Inland Kaikoura Range , rising high above the valleys of the Clarence and Awatere Rivers . Mount_Tapuaenuku can be seen from as far away as Cape Terawhiti on the southeastern tip of the North Island , nearly 120 kilometres away , and Mount_Tapuaenuku is a prominent point on the horizon for travellers on the interisland ferries that ply Cook Strait . The first European to sight Mount_Tapuaenuku was James Cook , who called Mount_Tapuaenuku Mount Odin , but later nicknamed Mount_Tapuaenuku ` ` The Watcher '' since his ship seemed to be visible from Mount_Tapuaenuku at so many points along the coast . eos
can be seen from as far away as Cape Terawhiti on the southeastern tip of the North Island , nearly 120 kilometres away , and Mount_Tapuaenuku is a prominent point on the horizon for travellers on the interisland ferries that ply Cook Strait . The first European to sight Mount_Tapuaenuku was James Cook , who called Mount_Tapuaenuku Mount Odin , but later nicknamed Mount_Tapuaenuku ` ` The Watcher '' since his ship seemed to be visible from Mount_Tapuaenuku at so many points along the coast . The first Europeans to attempt to climb Mount_Tapuaenuku were EJ Eyre , Lieutenant - Governor of New Munster , in 1849 and WGH Hamilton , in 1849 . eos
is a prominent point on the horizon for travellers on the interisland ferries that ply Cook Strait . The first Europeans to attempt to climb Mount_Tapuaenuku were EJ Eyre , Lieutenant - Governor of New Munster , in 1849 and WGH Hamilton , in 1849 . eos
at so many points along the coast . The first Europeans to attempt to climb Mount_Tapuaenuku were EJ Eyre , Lieutenant - Governor of New Munster , in 1849 and WGH Hamilton , in 1849 . They came within a short distance of the summit but were forced to turn back . eos

( Rarakiora in Māori ) is New Zealand 's second highest mountain , rising to a height of 3497 metres . Mount_Tasman is located in the Southern Alps of the South Island , four kilometres to the north of Mount_Tasman larger neighbour , Aoraki / Mount Cook . eos
is located in the Southern Alps of the South Island , four kilometres to the north of Mount_Tasman larger neighbour , Aoraki / Mount Cook . Unlike Aoraki / Mount Cook , Mount_Tasman sits on the South Island 's Main Divide , on the border between Aoraki / Mount Cook National Park and Westland National Park . Mount_Tasman is the highest point in Westland District . eos
larger neighbour , Aoraki / Mount Cook . Unlike Aoraki / Mount Cook , Mount_Tasman sits on the South Island 's Main Divide , on the border between Aoraki / Mount Cook National Park and Westland National Park . Mount_Tasman is the highest point in Westland District . eos

is the highest point in Westland District . eos
is a mountain in Banff National Park of the Canadian Rockies of Alberta , Canada . Mount_Temple_Alberta is located in the Bow River Valley between Paradise Creek and Moraine Creek and Mount_Temple_Alberta is the highest peak in the Lake Louise area . Mount_Temple_Alberta dominates the western landscape along the Trans - Canada Highway from Castle Junction to Lake Louise . eos
is located in the Bow River Valley between Paradise Creek and Moraine Creek and Mount_Temple_Alberta is the highest peak in the Lake Louise area . Mount_Temple_Alberta dominates the western landscape along the Trans - Canada Highway from Castle Junction to Lake Louise . eos
is the highest peak in the Lake Louise area . Mount_Temple_Alberta dominates the western landscape along the Trans - Canada Highway from Castle Junction to Lake Louise . eos

is a large shield volcano Mount_Terror_Antarctica forms the eastern part of Ross Island . Mount_Terror_Antarctica has numerous cinder cones and domes on the flanks of the shield and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is mostly under snow and ice . Mount_Terror_Antarctica is the second largest of the three volcanoes which make up Ross Island and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is somewhat overshadowed by Mount_Terror_Antarctica neighbor , Mount Erebus , 30 km ( 20 mi ) to the west . eos
forms the eastern part of Ross Island . Mount_Terror_Antarctica has numerous cinder cones and domes on the flanks of the shield and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is mostly under snow and ice . Mount_Terror_Antarctica is the second largest of the three volcanoes which make up Ross Island and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is somewhat overshadowed by Mount_Terror_Antarctica neighbor , Mount Erebus , 30 km ( 20 mi ) to the west . eos
has numerous cinder cones and domes on the flanks of the shield and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is mostly under snow and ice . Mount_Terror_Antarctica is the second largest of the three volcanoes which make up Ross Island and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is somewhat overshadowed by Mount_Terror_Antarctica neighbor , Mount Erebus , 30 km ( 20 mi ) to the west . Mount_Terror_Antarctica was named in 1841 by Sir James Clark Ross for his second ship , the HMS Terror . eos
is mostly under snow and ice . Mount_Terror_Antarctica is the second largest of the three volcanoes which make up Ross Island and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is somewhat overshadowed by Mount_Terror_Antarctica neighbor , Mount Erebus , 30 km ( 20 mi ) to the west . Mount_Terror_Antarctica was named in 1841 by Sir James Clark Ross for his second ship , the HMS Terror . eos
is the second largest of the three volcanoes which make up Ross Island and Mount_Terror_Antarctica is somewhat overshadowed by Mount_Terror_Antarctica neighbor , Mount Erebus , 30 km ( 20 mi ) to the west . Mount_Terror_Antarctica was named in 1841 by Sir James Clark Ross for his second ship , the HMS Terror . The rocks at the summit have not been studied , but lower areas have been studied and rocks from those areas range from 0.82 to 1.75 million years old . eos
is somewhat overshadowed by Mount_Terror_Antarctica neighbor , Mount Erebus , 30 km ( 20 mi ) to the west . The rocks at the summit have not been studied , but lower areas have been studied and rocks from those areas range from 0.82 to 1.75 million years old . eos

was named in 1841 by Sir James Clark Ross for his second ship , the HMS Terror . The rocks at the summit have not been studied , but lower areas have been studied and rocks from those areas range from 0.82 to 1.75 million years old . Mount_Terror_Antarctica shows no signs of volcanic activity more recent than that . eos
shows no signs of volcanic activity more recent than that . The first ascent of Mount_Terror_Antarctica was made by a New Zealand party in 1959 . Terror Point ( 77 ° 41 & amp ; prime ; S 168 ° 13 & amp ; prime ; E ) , located just below Mount_Terror_Antarctica , is the eastern limit of Fog Bay , 6 km ( 4 mi ) WNW of Cape MacKay on Ross Island . eos
was made by a New Zealand party in 1959 . Terror Point ( 77 ° 41 & amp ; prime ; S 168 ° 13 & amp ; prime ; E ) , located just below Mount_Terror_Antarctica , is the eastern limit of Fog Bay , 6 km ( 4 mi ) WNW of Cape MacKay on Ross Island . The name was first used by members of the British National Antarctic Expedition , 1901 - 04 , and was apparently applied in association with Mount_Terror_Antarctica Mount_Terror_Antarctica overlooks this point from the northeast . eos
, is the eastern limit of Fog Bay , 6 km ( 4 mi ) WNW of Cape MacKay on Ross Island .
