is the highest mountain peak in the mountain range of Guadarrama , a subsection of Spain 's larger Sistema Central mountain chain which lies at the center and divides the Iberian Peninsula . Straddling the provinces of Madrid and Segovia , Penalara reaches a height of 2,428 metres above sea level . Consequently , Penalara is one of the most emblematic and important peaks of the Guadarramas . eos
reaches a height of 2,428 metres above sea level . Consequently , Penalara is one of the most emblematic and important peaks of the Guadarramas . The eastern section of Penalara lies in the municipality of Rascafría in the province of Madrid , belonging to the Vale of Lozoya , and Penalara western section is located in the Vale of Valsaín in the province of Segovia . eos
is one of the most emblematic and important peaks of the Guadarramas . The eastern section of Penalara lies in the municipality of Rascafría in the province of Madrid , belonging to the Vale of Lozoya , and Penalara western section is located in the Vale of Valsaín in the province of Segovia . Penalara summit is a designated nature reserve known as the Parque Natural de Peñalara , which features several small lakes , a small glacier and some steep escarpments . eos
lies in the municipality of Rascafría in the province of Madrid , belonging to the Vale of Lozoya , and Penalara western section is located in the Vale of Valsaín in the province of Segovia . Penalara summit is a designated nature reserve known as the Parque Natural de Peñalara , which features several small lakes , a small glacier and some steep escarpments . The outline of Penalara is rounded , displaying few underhangs . eos
western section is located in the Vale of Valsaín in the province of Segovia . Penalara summit is a designated nature reserve known as the Parque Natural de Peñalara , which features several small lakes , a small glacier and some steep escarpments . The outline of Penalara is rounded , displaying few underhangs . eos
summit is a designated nature reserve known as the Parque Natural de Peñalara , which features several small lakes , a small glacier and some steep escarpments . The outline of Penalara is rounded , displaying few underhangs . The hillsides of Penalara are covered with different types of vegetation , depending on the elevation . eos
is rounded , displaying few underhangs . The hillsides of Penalara are covered with different types of vegetation , depending on the elevation . Largely undisturbed oak tree groves are found at an elevation of 1,000 to 1,300 metres . eos
are covered with different types of vegetation , depending on the elevation . Largely undisturbed oak tree groves are found at an elevation of 1,000 to 1,300 metres . From 1,100 metres to 2,000 metres , the slopes are dominated by wild pine forests . eos
is made up of small mammals , a large variety of insects and various bird species such as eagles and vultures . eos

is a mountain in the Pyrenees on the border of Spain and northwest Andorra . The nearest town is Arinsal , La Massana . eos
is an active volcano in the country of Ecuador , whose capital Quito wraps around Pichincha_Volcano eastern slopes . Pichincha_Volcano two highest peaks are the Guagua ( 15,696 feet/4 , 784 m ) , which means ` ` child '' in Quechua and the Rucu ( 15 , 413 feet/4 , 698 m ) , which means ` ` old person '' . The active caldera is in the Guagua , on the western side of Pichincha_Volcano . eos
eastern slopes . Pichincha_Volcano two highest peaks are the Guagua ( 15,696 feet/4 , 784 m ) , which means ` ` child '' in Quechua and the Rucu ( 15 , 413 feet/4 , 698 m ) , which means ` ` old person '' . The active caldera is in the Guagua , on the western side of Pichincha_Volcano . eos
two highest peaks are the Guagua ( 15,696 feet/4 , 784 m ) , which means ` ` child '' in Quechua and the Rucu ( 15 , 413 feet/4 , 698 m ) , which means ` ` old person '' . The active caldera is in the Guagua , on the western side of Pichincha_Volcano . Both peaks are visible from the city of Quito and are easily climbed . eos
. Both peaks are visible from the city of Quito and are easily climbed . Guagua is usually accessed from the village Lloa outside of Quito . eos
erupted and Pichincha_Volcano covered the city with several inches of ash . Prior to that , the last major eruption was in 1660 , when about a foot of ash fell on the city . The province in which Pichincha_Volcano is located takes its name from Pichincha_Volcano , as is the case for many of the other provinces in Ecuador ( Cotopaxi , Chimborazo , Imbabura , etc ) . eos
covered the city with several inches of ash . Prior to that , the last major eruption was in 1660 , when about a foot of ash fell on the city . The province in which Pichincha_Volcano is located takes its name from Pichincha_Volcano , as is the case for many of the other provinces in Ecuador ( Cotopaxi , Chimborazo , Imbabura , etc ) . eos
is located takes its name from Pichincha_Volcano , as is the case for many of the other provinces in Ecuador ( Cotopaxi , Chimborazo , Imbabura , etc ) . On May 24 , 1822 , in the context of the war of independence of Latin American , Patriot forces defeated a Spanish colonial army on the slopes of Pichincha_Volcano . The encounter , known as the Battle of Pichincha , sealed the independence of the lands that constitute modern Ecuador . eos
, as is the case for many of the other provinces in Ecuador ( Cotopaxi , Chimborazo , Imbabura , etc ) . On May 24 , 1822 , in the context of the war of independence of Latin American , Patriot forces defeated a Spanish colonial army on the slopes of Pichincha_Volcano . The encounter , known as the Battle of Pichincha , sealed the independence of the lands that constitute modern Ecuador . eos

is the highest mountain in central Spain . Situated in the Sierra de Gredos in the province of Ávila , Pico_Almanzor is 2592 m high . Pico_Almanzor is made of granite . eos

( formerly Pico de Santa Isabel ) is the highest mountain on the island of Bioko , which is part of Equatorial Guinea . With an altitude of 9,878 ft ( 3,011 m ) , Pico_Basili is the summit of the largest and highest of three overlapping basaltic shield volcanoes which form the island . From the summit , Mt. Cameroon can be seen to the northwest . eos
is the summit of the largest and highest of three overlapping basaltic shield volcanoes which form the island . From the summit , Mt. Cameroon can be seen to the northwest . Pico_Basili lies close to the city of Malabo . eos
lies close to the city of Malabo . Bioko was formed along the Cameroon line , a major northeast - trending geologic fault that runs from the Atlantic Ocean into Cameroon . This line includes other volcanic islands in the Gulf of Guinea such as Annobón , Príncipe and São Tomé , along with the massive stratovolcano of Mount Cameroon . eos
is the highest mountain in Venezuela , at 4,981 meters . Located in Mérida State , Pico_Bolivar top is permanently covered with Névé snow and three small glaciers . Pico_Bolivar can be reached by means of the Mérida Cable Car , the highest cable car in the world , which departs from the homonymous city . eos
top is permanently covered with Névé snow and three small glaciers . Pico_Bolivar can be reached by means of the Mérida Cable Car , the highest cable car in the world , which departs from the homonymous city . Pico_Bolivar is named after the Venezuelan independence hero Simon Bolívar . eos
can be reached by means of the Mérida Cable Car , the highest cable car in the world , which departs from the homonymous city . Pico_Bolivar is named after the Venezuelan independence hero Simon Bolívar . Pico_Bolivar is located on the mountain previously called La Columna , next to El León ( 4,743 m ) and El Toro ( 4,695 m ) . eos
is named after the Venezuelan independence hero Simon Bolívar . Pico_Bolivar is located on the mountain previously called La Columna , next to El León ( 4,743 m ) and El Toro ( 4,695 m ) . The new name was suggested by Miguel Febres Cordero in 1925 . eos
is located on the mountain previously called La Columna , next to El León ( 4,743 m ) and El Toro ( 4,695 m ) . The new name was suggested by Miguel Febres Cordero in 1925 . Pico_Bolivar was officially renamed on december 30th , 1934 . eos

is the highest mountain in Colombia and the fifth most prominent ( see list of peaks by prominence ) . The nearest peak that is higher is Cayambe , some 1288 km away . There is a permanent snowcap on Pico_Cristobal_Colon and on the nearby mountains . eos
and on the nearby mountains . Pico_Cristobal_Colon is part of the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta range , along with Pico Simón Bolívar . It is possible that nearby Pico Simón Bolívar is higher than Pico_Cristobal_Colon , if so then Pico Simón Bolívar is the true highest mountain in Colombia and fifth most prominent . eos

is Venezuela 's second highest peak , at 4,940 meters above the sea level . Pico_Humboldt is located in the Sierra Nevada Range , Venezuelan Andes ( Mérida State ) . Pico_Humboldt and Pico_Humboldt surrounding páramos are protected by the Sierra Nevada National Park . eos
is located in the Sierra Nevada Range , Venezuelan Andes ( Mérida State ) . Pico_Humboldt and Pico_Humboldt surrounding páramos are protected by the Sierra Nevada National Park . Pico_Humboldt summit is surrounded by the two largest glaciers out of the five remaining in the country ( the other three are in Pico Bolívar ) . eos
and Pico_Humboldt surrounding páramos are protected by the Sierra Nevada National Park . Pico_Humboldt summit is surrounded by the two largest glaciers out of the five remaining in the country ( the other three are in Pico Bolívar ) . The glaciers on Pico_Humboldt ( as most glaciers in the tropics ) have been receding fast since the 1970s and they are forecasted to melt completely in a couple of decades . eos
surrounding páramos are protected by the Sierra Nevada National Park . , at 4680 Meters above sea level , is the ninth highest mountain of Venezuela , and the third highest of the Sierra de la Culata range in the Mérida State , Pico_Pan_de_Azucar name which translates as ` ` Bread of Sugar '' is due to the sandy slopes of Pico_Pan_de_Azucar , which resembles ` ` Pan dulce '' , a kind of bread sprinkled with sugar eaten in the country . From Pico_Pan_de_Azucar summit a great escenic view can be seen , including Lake Maracaibo , Sierra Nevada de Mérida and surrounding mountains of the Sierra de la Culata . eos

From Pico_Pan_de_Azucar summit a great escenic view can be seen , including Lake Maracaibo , Sierra Nevada de Mérida and surrounding mountains of the Sierra de la Culata . eos

is the highest point in Cuba . Pico_Turquino is located in the southeast part of the island , in the Sierra Maestra mountain range in Santiago de Cuba Province . During the late 1950s , Fidel Castro and members of his 26th of july Movement used the area as a base during the Cuban Revolution . eos
is located in the southeast part of the island , in the Sierra Maestra mountain range in Santiago de Cuba Province . During the late 1950s , Fidel Castro and members of his 26th of july Movement used the area as a base during the Cuban Revolution . The name is believe to be a corruption of turqoise eos
was first mentioned ( under the name ` ` Tarquino '' ) on a map drawn by Gerardo Kramer in the late 1700s . A bust of José Martí , sculpted by Jilma Madera , was placed on Pico_Turquino to celebrate his centenary . Turquino National Park is established on a area around Pico_Turquino . eos
to celebrate his centenary . Turquino National Park is established on a area around Pico_Turquino . eos

is the highest mountain in Brazil , 2,994 metres ( 9,822 feet ) above sea level , at the Imeri mountain range ( Serra do Imeri ) , which borders on Venezuela . As determined by a border survey expedition in 1962 , Pico_da_Neblina summit lies barely within Brazilian territory , being a mere 687 metres ( 2,254 feet ) from the Venezuelan border at Pico 31 de Março . The latter is only 21 metres lower , Brazil 's second highest mountain and the highest mountain in Venezuela outside of the Andes . eos
summit lies barely within Brazilian territory , being a mere 687 metres ( 2,254 feet ) from the Venezuelan border at Pico 31 de Março . The latter is only 21 metres lower , Brazil 's second highest mountain and the highest mountain in Venezuela outside of the Andes . Pico_da_Neblina is often misquoted as being on the border between the two countries , and when one considers Pico_da_Neblina massif as a whole ( not just the main summit ) , this is really true . eos
is often misquoted as being on the border between the two countries , and when one considers Pico_da_Neblina massif as a whole ( not just the main summit ) , this is really true . Pico_da_Neblina is also the highest point in the Guiana Shield , but unlike famous Monte Roraima , Pico_da_Neblina is not a tepui , as the typical and unique tabletop mountains of the Guiana Highlands are known . Tepuis are only found far to the northeast of the Imeri range . eos
massif as a whole ( not just the main summit ) , this is really true . Pico_da_Neblina is also the highest point in the Guiana Shield , but unlike famous Monte Roraima , Pico_da_Neblina is not a tepui , as the typical and unique tabletop mountains of the Guiana Highlands are known . Tepuis are only found far to the northeast of the Imeri range . eos
is also the highest point in the Guiana Shield , but unlike famous Monte Roraima , Pico_da_Neblina is not a tepui , as the typical and unique tabletop mountains of the Guiana Highlands are known . Tepuis are only found far to the northeast of the Imeri range . Furthermore , Pico_da_Neblina is not table - shaped , but a rather sharp peak . eos
is not a tepui , as the typical and unique tabletop mountains of the Guiana Highlands are known . Tepuis are only found far to the northeast of the Imeri range . Furthermore , Pico_da_Neblina is not table - shaped , but a rather sharp peak . eos
is not table - shaped , but a rather sharp peak . The word neblina means ` ` fog '' in both Portuguese and Spanish ; so , Pico_da_Neblina name ( meaning ` ` Peak of the Mists '' ) reflects the fact that Pico_da_Neblina is shrouded in dense clouds most of the time . Pico_da_Neblina was first ascended in 1965 by members of a Brazilian army expedition . eos
name ( meaning ` ` Peak of the Mists '' ) reflects the fact that Pico_da_Neblina is shrouded in dense clouds most of the time . Pico_da_Neblina was first ascended in 1965 by members of a Brazilian army expedition . Pico_da_Neblina is contained in the Brazilian Pico da Neblina National Park ; Pico_da_Neblina northern slopes are also protected in Venezuela 's Serranía de la Neblina National Park . eos
is shrouded in dense clouds most of the time . Pico_da_Neblina was first ascended in 1965 by members of a Brazilian army expedition . Pico_da_Neblina is contained in the Brazilian Pico da Neblina National Park ; Pico_da_Neblina northern slopes are also protected in Venezuela 's Serranía de la Neblina National Park . eos
was first ascended in 1965 by members of a Brazilian army expedition . Pico_da_Neblina is contained in the Brazilian Pico da Neblina National Park ; Pico_da_Neblina northern slopes are also protected in Venezuela 's Serranía de la Neblina National Park . The twin parks , together with the neighbouring Parima - Tapirapecó National Park ( Venezuela ) , form a protected area complex of about 80,000 km ² , possibly the largest national park system in tropical rainforests in the world . eos

, or Citlaltépetl ( from Nahuatl citlal ( in ) = star , and tepētl = mountain ) , is the highest mountain in Mexico and the third highest in North America . Pico_de_Orizaba rises 5,636 meters ( 18,490 feet ) above sea level in the eastern end of the Eje Volcánico Transversal mountain range , on the border between the states of Veracruz and Puebla . Pico_de_Orizaba is currently dormant but not extinct ; the last eruptions occurred in 1687 , with previous eruptions in 1630 , 1613 , 1569 , 1566 , 1545 - 65 ? and 1537 . eos

is currently dormant but not extinct ; the last eruptions occurred in 1687 , with previous eruptions in 1630 , 1613 , 1569 , 1566 , 1545 - 65 ? and 1537 . eos
is a peak of the mountain range called Ajusco , located at the southern outskirts of Mexico City , specifically at the coordinates N19 12 46.8 W99 15 25.2 - 12776 ft ( 3894 m ) . Pico_del_Aguila is a popular Sunday hike , and Pico_del_Aguila can be climbed in about two hours . On a rare clear smogless night one can see virtually all of Mexico City illuminated at your feet from the summit . eos

( , literally ` ` straw plateau rock '' , also known as Mount Pedro ) is a mountain in the central hill - country of Sri Lanka , close to the city of Nuwara Eliya . At a height of 2.534 metres ( 8,281 feet ) , Pidurutalagala is the highest mountain in Sri Lanka . Pidurutalagala is a military area which is closed to the public . eos

is a high peak of the Needle Mountains , a subrange of the San Juan Mountains in the southwestern part of the US State of Colorado . Pigeon_Peak rises dramatically on the east side of the Animas River , 1.5 mi ( 2.4 km ) west of the fourteener Mount Eolus . Pigeon_Peak is located in the Weminuche Wilderness , part of the San Juan National Forest . eos
rises dramatically on the east side of the Animas River , 1.5 mi ( 2.4 km ) west of the fourteener Mount Eolus . Pigeon_Peak is located in the Weminuche Wilderness , part of the San Juan National Forest . Pigeon_Peak is notable both for Pigeon_Peak absolute height and for Pigeon_Peak local relief in particular . eos
is located in the Weminuche Wilderness , part of the San Juan National Forest . Pigeon_Peak is notable both for Pigeon_Peak absolute height and for Pigeon_Peak local relief in particular . Pigeon_Peak is the 57th highest independent peak in Colorado , narrowly missing the well - known list of fourteeners . eos
is notable both for Pigeon_Peak absolute height and for Pigeon_Peak local relief in particular . Pigeon_Peak is the 57th highest independent peak in Colorado , narrowly missing the well - known list of fourteeners . In terms of local relief , Pigeon_Peak is one of the most impressive peaks in Colorado . eos
absolute height and for Pigeon_Peak local relief in particular . Pigeon_Peak is the 57th highest independent peak in Colorado , narrowly missing the well - known list of fourteeners . In terms of local relief , Pigeon_Peak is one of the most impressive peaks in Colorado . eos
local relief in particular . Pigeon_Peak is the 57th highest independent peak in Colorado , narrowly missing the well - known list of fourteeners . In terms of local relief , Pigeon_Peak is one of the most impressive peaks in Colorado . eos
is the 57th highest independent peak in Colorado , narrowly missing the well - known list of fourteeners . In terms of local relief , Pigeon_Peak is one of the most impressive peaks in Colorado . Pigeon_Peak most dramatic rise is over the Animas River to the west , over which Pigeon_Peak rises 5,750 ft ( 1,750 m ) in under 2.5 mi ( 4 km ) . eos
is one of the most impressive peaks in Colorado . Pigeon_Peak most dramatic rise is over the Animas River to the west , over which Pigeon_Peak rises 5,750 ft ( 1,750 m ) in under 2.5 mi ( 4 km ) . Also , Pigeon_Peak east face is a 1,000 ft ( 305 m ) cliff . eos

( 3,796 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . The first ascent was made by A W. Moore and Horace Walker with the guide Jakob Anderegg on 9 july 1865 . eos

( originally Pike 's Peak , see below ) is a mountain in the Front Range of the Rocky Mountains , west of Colorado Springs , Colorado , in El Paso County . Pikes_Peak is named for Zebulon Pike , an explorer who led an expedition to the southern Colorado area in 1806 . At 14115 ft , Pikes_Peak is one of Colorado 's 54 fourteeners . eos
is named for Zebulon Pike , an explorer who led an expedition to the southern Colorado area in 1806 . At 14115 ft , Pikes_Peak is one of Colorado 's 54 fourteeners . Drivers race up Pikes_Peak in a famous annual race called the Pikes Peak International Hill Climb . eos
is one of Colorado 's 54 fourteeners . Drivers race up Pikes_Peak in a famous annual race called the Pikes Peak International Hill Climb . An upper portion of Pikes_Peak is a federally designated National Historic Landmark . eos
in a famous annual race called the Pikes Peak International Hill Climb . An upper portion of Pikes_Peak is a federally designated National Historic Landmark . eos
is a federally designated National Historic Landmark . eos
is a mountain near Lucerne , Switzerland . Jurisdiction over Pilatus_mountain is divided between the cantons of Obwalden , Nidwalden , and Lucerne . Pilatus_mountain is in Obwalden right on the border with Nidwalden . eos
is divided between the cantons of Obwalden , Nidwalden , and Lucerne . Pilatus_mountain is in Obwalden right on the border with Nidwalden . The top can be reached with the Pilatus Railway , the world 's steepest cogwheel railway from Alpnachstad , operating from May to november ( depending on snow conditions ) , and the whole year with the aerial panorama gondolas and aerial cableways from Kriens . eos
is in Obwalden right on the border with Nidwalden . The top can be reached with the Pilatus Railway , the world 's steepest cogwheel railway from Alpnachstad , operating from May to november ( depending on snow conditions ) , and the whole year with the aerial panorama gondolas and aerial cableways from Kriens . Pilatus_mountain has the longest summer toboggan track in Switzerland ( 0.88 miles or 1.350 km ) and the biggest suspension rope park in Central Switzerland . eos
has the longest summer toboggan track in Switzerland ( 0.88 miles or 1.350 km ) and the biggest suspension rope park in Central Switzerland . During the summer , the ` ` Golden Round Trip '' - a popular route for tourists - involves taking a boat from Lucerne across Lake Lucerne to Alpnachstad , going up on the cogwheel railway , coming down on the aerial cableways and panorama gondolas , and taking a bus back to Lucerne . Pilatus_mountain was named after a local legend which alleges that Pontius Pilate was buried there . eos
was named after a local legend which alleges that Pontius Pilate was buried there . Numbered amongst those who have reached Pilatus_mountain summit are Conrad Gessner , Queen Victoria and Lenin . eos
summit are Conrad Gessner , Queen Victoria and Lenin . eos
is a mountain in the Bow River valley of Banff National Park in Alberta , Canada . Pilot_Mountain_Alberta is located southeast of Redearth Creek and directly west of the Trans - Canada Highway . Pilot_Mountain_Alberta was named in 1884 by George M Dawson , for Pilot_Mountain_Alberta location is where the Bow Valley changes direction , thus affording distant views of Pilot_Mountain_Alberta all along the valley . eos
is located southeast of Redearth Creek and directly west of the Trans - Canada Highway . Pilot_Mountain_Alberta was named in 1884 by George M Dawson , for Pilot_Mountain_Alberta location is where the Bow Valley changes direction , thus affording distant views of Pilot_Mountain_Alberta all along the valley . Pilot_Mountain_Alberta can be scrambled on the northwest face by someone with good routefinding skills . eos
was named in 1884 by George M Dawson , for Pilot_Mountain_Alberta location is where the Bow Valley changes direction , thus affording distant views of Pilot_Mountain_Alberta all along the valley . Pilot_Mountain_Alberta can be scrambled on the northwest face by someone with good routefinding skills . Nearby Mount Brett ( 2984 m ) can be ascended from a ridge off the western slopes of Pilot_Mountain_Alberta . eos

( Snow Peak ) is a massive 3,069 m ( 10,069 ft ) shield volcano on Réunion , one of the volcanic islands in the Mascarene Archipelago in the southwestern Indian Ocean . Piton_des_Neiges was formed by the Réunion hotspot and Piton_des_Neiges emerged from the sea about two million years ago . Now deeply eroded , Piton_des_Neiges has been inactive for 20,000 years and Piton_des_Neiges is surrounded by three massive crater valleys , the Cirques . eos
was formed by the Réunion hotspot and Piton_des_Neiges emerged from the sea about two million years ago . Now deeply eroded , Piton_des_Neiges has been inactive for 20,000 years and Piton_des_Neiges is surrounded by three massive crater valleys , the Cirques . Piton_des_Neiges forms the northwestern two thirds of Réunion , with the very active Piton de la Fournaise comprising the rest . eos
emerged from the sea about two million years ago . Now deeply eroded , Piton_des_Neiges has been inactive for 20,000 years and Piton_des_Neiges is surrounded by three massive crater valleys , the Cirques . Piton_des_Neiges forms the northwestern two thirds of Réunion , with the very active Piton de la Fournaise comprising the rest . eos
has been inactive for 20,000 years and Piton_des_Neiges is surrounded by three massive crater valleys , the Cirques . Piton_des_Neiges forms the northwestern two thirds of Réunion , with the very active Piton de la Fournaise comprising the rest . The volcanic island is considered to be about three million years old ( Pliocene ) ; the other two islands in the archipelago , Mauritius and Rodrigues , are 7.8 million ( Miocene ) and 1 1/2 million ( Pleistocene ) years old , respectively . eos
is surrounded by three massive crater valleys , the Cirques . Piton_des_Neiges forms the northwestern two thirds of Réunion , with the very active Piton de la Fournaise comprising the rest . The volcanic island is considered to be about three million years old ( Pliocene ) ; the other two islands in the archipelago , Mauritius and Rodrigues , are 7.8 million ( Miocene ) and 1 1/2 million ( Pleistocene ) years old , respectively . eos
forms the northwestern two thirds of Réunion , with the very active Piton de la Fournaise comprising the rest . The volcanic island is considered to be about three million years old ( Pliocene ) ; the other two islands in the archipelago , Mauritius and Rodrigues , are 7.8 million ( Miocene ) and 1 1/2 million ( Pleistocene ) years old , respectively . The island possesses a high endemism of flowering plants ( about 225 ) ; this has justified the creation of a biological reserve on the lower slopes of Piton_des_Neiges . eos
. eos
( 3,308 m ) is a mountain in the Bregaglia range in Switzerland and Italy , the border between the two countries running along the summit ridge . Piz_Badile north - east face is considered one of the six great north faces of the Alps . The first ascent of Piz_Badile was by W A. B Coolidge with guides F and H Dévouassoud on 27 july 1867 by the south ridge . eos
north - east face is considered one of the six great north faces of the Alps . The first ascent of Piz_Badile was by W A. B Coolidge with guides F and H Dévouassoud on 27 july 1867 by the south ridge . Piz_Badile had first come to the notice of British alpinists from D W. Freshfield 's writings of the 1860s . eos
was by W A. B Coolidge with guides F and H Dévouassoud on 27 july 1867 by the south ridge . Piz_Badile had first come to the notice of British alpinists from D W. Freshfield 's writings of the 1860s . He gave the name ` the Grey Twins ' to Piz Badile and Piz Cengalo , and made the first ascent of Piz Cengalo in 1866 . eos
had first come to the notice of British alpinists from D W. Freshfield 's writings of the 1860s . He gave the name ` the Grey Twins ' to Piz Badile and Piz Cengalo , and made the first ascent of Piz Cengalo in 1866 . The two classic routes on Piz_Badile are the north ridge and the Cassin Route on the north - east face . eos
are the north ridge and the Cassin Route on the north - east face . The north ridge - the Badilekante - was first prospected solo by the Swiss guide Christian Klucker in 1892 ( Klucker later made the first ascent of Piz_Badile west - south - west ridge with Anton von Rydzewski and M Barbaria on 14 june 1897 ) . eos
west - south - west ridge with Anton von Rydzewski and M Barbaria on 14 june 1897 ) . After several unsuccessful attempts by Italian parties in 1911 , the ridge ( IV , one pitch of V - ) finally fell to Alfred Zürcher with the guide Walter Risch on 4 august 1923 . F l'Orsa and André Roch found a more direct line on the ridge on the second ascent ( 18 july 1926 ) . eos
is one of the highest in the Silvretta mountain range , the highest being the giant pyramid of Piz Linard ( 3,410 m , 11,188 ft ) . Piz_Buin forms the border between Graubünden and Vorarlberg . Piz_Buin is the highest mountain peak in Vorarlberg . eos
forms the border between Graubünden and Vorarlberg . Piz_Buin is the highest mountain peak in Vorarlberg . Piz_Buin original name in the Romansh language of the Swiss canton Graubünden is Piz Buin Grand . eos
is the highest mountain peak in Vorarlberg . Piz_Buin original name in the Romansh language of the Swiss canton Graubünden is Piz Buin Grand . A very similar summit nearby is called Piz Buin Pitschen ; it has the same shape but is slightly lower ( 3,255 m or 10,680 ft ) . eos
original name in the Romansh language of the Swiss canton Graubünden is Piz Buin Grand . A very similar summit nearby is called Piz Buin Pitschen ; it has the same shape but is slightly lower ( 3,255 m or 10,680 ft ) . Piz_Buin can be reached from the Wiesbadener hut in Austria , crossing the Vermunt glacier , climbing up the Wiesbadener ridge and hiking over the Ochsentaler Glacier to the Buin gap . eos
can be reached from the Wiesbadener hut in Austria , crossing the Vermunt glacier , climbing up the Wiesbadener ridge and hiking over the Ochsentaler Glacier to the Buin gap . From the gap there is a zigzag walk to the top , with only a 20 m ( 65 ft ) steep step to surmount before reaching the relatively flat summit space , which has an old wooden cross on the very top . The border between Switzerland and Austria crosses the summit from East to West . eos
is a pyramid - shaped mountain of the Swiss Alps . At 3,410 m Piz_Linard is the highest peak of the Silvretta mountain range . Piz_Linard was first climbed on august 1st , 1835 by the geologist and naturalist Oswald Heer lead by Johann Madutz . eos
is the highest peak of the Silvretta mountain range . Piz_Linard was first climbed on august 1st , 1835 by the geologist and naturalist Oswald Heer lead by Johann Madutz . There is a legend that a man of name ` ` Chounard '' reached the summit in 1572 carrying a large golden cross , however the cross has never been found . eos
was first climbed on august 1st , 1835 by the geologist and naturalist Oswald Heer lead by Johann Madutz . There is a legend that a man of name ` ` Chounard '' reached the summit in 1572 carrying a large golden cross , however the cross has never been found . eos
( 3,751 m ) is a mountain in the Bernina Range in Switzerland . Piz_Morteratsch is bordered on the east by the Morteratsch Glacier and on the south - west by the Tschierva Glacier . One of the easiest mountains in the range to climb , the normal route follows that taken by the first ascentionists C Brügger and P Gensler with guides Karl Emmermann and Angelo Klaingutti on 11 september 1858 . eos
is bordered on the east by the Morteratsch Glacier and on the south - west by the Tschierva Glacier . One of the easiest mountains in the range to climb , the normal route follows that taken by the first ascentionists C Brügger and P Gensler with guides Karl Emmermann and Angelo Klaingutti on 11 september 1858 . Three of Piz_Morteratsch ridges present greater difficulties and are highly regarded : eos
ridges present greater difficulties and are highly regarded : * South - south - east ridge ( D / D + ) , first ascent P J. H Unna with guides , 1903 * East - north - east ridge ( AD ) , first ascent of complete ridge , Paul Schucan and A Pfister , 10 october , 1908 ( the upper section had been climbed by Max Schintz with guides Alois and Josef Pollinger in august 1892 ) eos
is served by the Boval hut ( 2,495 m , open 15 march - 15 May and 15 june - 15 october ) and the Tschierva hut ( 2,573 m , open end of march - 15 May and 15 june - 15 october ) . eos
( 3,901 m ) is a mountain in the Bernina Range in Switzerland and Italy . There are three summits on Piz_Palu main ridge , which runs from east to west . The name Palü derives from the Latin palus , meaning a swamp , and Piz_Palu is probably named after the Alpe Palü , a high alpine pasture some 4 km to Piz_Palu east . eos
main ridge , which runs from east to west . The name Palü derives from the Latin palus , meaning a swamp , and Piz_Palu is probably named after the Alpe Palü , a high alpine pasture some 4 km to Piz_Palu east . It is uncertain when Piz_Palu was first climbed , but the first ascent of the central and highest peak was probably by K E. Digby with guide Peter Jenny and a porter in 1866 . eos
is probably named after the Alpe Palü , a high alpine pasture some 4 km to Piz_Palu east . It is uncertain when Piz_Palu was first climbed , but the first ascent of the central and highest peak was probably by K E. Digby with guide Peter Jenny and a porter in 1866 . Piz_Palu was certainly ascended on 28 june 1868 by A W. Moore , Horace Walker and Jakob Anderegg . eos
east . It is uncertain when Piz_Palu was first climbed , but the first ascent of the central and highest peak was probably by K E. Digby with guide Peter Jenny and a porter in 1866 . Piz_Palu was certainly ascended on 28 june 1868 by A W. Moore , Horace Walker and Jakob Anderegg . eos
was first climbed , but the first ascent of the central and highest peak was probably by K E. Digby with guide Peter Jenny and a porter in 1866 . Piz_Palu was certainly ascended on 28 june 1868 by A W. Moore , Horace Walker and Jakob Anderegg . The east peak ( 3,882 m ) was climbed by Oswald Heer , and P and M Flury , with guides Johann Madutz and Gian marchet Colani ( the ` King of the Bernina ' ) on 12 august 1835 . eos
was certainly ascended on 28 june 1868 by A W. Moore , Horace Walker and Jakob Anderegg . The east peak ( 3,882 m ) was climbed by Oswald Heer , and P and M Flury , with guides Johann Madutz and Gian marchet Colani ( the ` King of the Bernina ' ) on 12 august 1835 . All three peaks were first traversed by Wachler , Wallner , George , Hans Gross and Christian Gross on 22 july 1868 . eos
has gained some prominence from the film The White Hell of Pitz Palu ( 1929 ) , co - directed by mountain - film pioneer Arnold Fanck and Georg Wilhelm Pabst , and starring a young Leni Riefenstahl . eos

( pronounced as peetse rawzech ) is a mountain in the Bernina Range in Switzerland and Italy . There are two summits on Piz_Roseg main ridge : * the south - east and higher summit ( 3,937 m ) eos
main ridge : * the south - east and higher summit ( 3,937 m ) * the north - west summit , known as the Schneekuppe ( 3,920 m ) . eos
to the Schneekuppe was by F T. Bircham with guides Peter Jenny and Alexander Fleury on 31 august 1863 . The highest point of Piz_Roseg was reached two years later by A W. Moore and Horace Walker with guide Jakob Anderegg on 28 june 1865 . Piz_Roseg is separated from the neighbouring Piz Scerscen by the Porta da Roseg ( 3,522 m ) , also called the Güssfeldtsattel . eos
was reached two years later by A W. Moore and Horace Walker with guide Jakob Anderegg on 28 june 1865 . Piz_Roseg is separated from the neighbouring Piz Scerscen by the Porta da Roseg ( 3,522 m ) , also called the Güssfeldtsattel . The Swiss side of this col - a steep ice slope of up to 70 ° - was first climbed by Paul Güssfeldt , with guides Hans Grass , Peter Jenny and Caspar Capat on 13 september 1872 . eos
is separated from the neighbouring Piz Scerscen by the Porta da Roseg ( 3,522 m ) , also called the Güssfeldtsattel . The Swiss side of this col - a steep ice slope of up to 70 ° - was first climbed by Paul Güssfeldt , with guides Hans Grass , Peter Jenny and Caspar Capat on 13 september 1872 . Grass and Capat had spent the previous day cutting steps up the first two - fifths of the route . eos
was first climbed by Christian Klucker and L Norman - Neruda on 16 july 1890 ; the face - with a notable serac band halfway up - sports a number of difficult routes . Klucker , together with M Barberia , also made the first traverse from the Italian side of the Porta da Roseg on 21 june 1898 . eos
( 3,971 m ) is a mountain in the Bernina Range in Switzerland and Italy , joining the neighbouring Piz Bernina by its north - east ridge via a 3,895 m pass . Piz_Scerscen name means ` the circular mountain ' ( ` Scerscen ' is pronounced cherchen ) . Piz_Scerscen has a prominent secondary summit called the Schneehaube ( 3,875 m ) . eos
name means ` the circular mountain ' ( ` Scerscen ' is pronounced cherchen ) . Piz_Scerscen has a prominent secondary summit called the Schneehaube ( 3,875 m ) . The first ascent of Piz_Scerscen was by Paul Güssfeldt , Hans Grass and Caspar Capat on 13 september 1877 via the north - west spur , descending the same way . eos
has a prominent secondary summit called the Schneehaube ( 3,875 m ) . The first ascent of Piz_Scerscen was by Paul Güssfeldt , Hans Grass and Caspar Capat on 13 september 1877 via the north - west spur , descending the same way . This is the well - known Eisnase route , involving a 100-metre ice pitch of between 60 - 70 ° , although its precise length and steepness are debated . eos
was by Paul Güssfeldt , Hans Grass and Caspar Capat on 13 september 1877 via the north - west spur , descending the same way . This is the well - known Eisnase route , involving a 100-metre ice pitch of between 60 - 70 ° , although its precise length and steepness are debated . This was the route followed by Walter Risch on the first solo ascent of Piz_Scerscen in 1924 . eos
in 1924 . The first ascent of the north - west face was by Christian Klucker and L Norman - Neruda on 9 july 1890 . eos
( 3,995 m ) is a mountain in the Bernina Range in Switzerland and Italy , and Piz_Zupo is the second highest peak in the range after Piz Bernina . The first ascent of Piz_Zupo was made by L Enderlin and Serardi , with Badrutt ( a chamois hunter ) on 9 july 1863 . eos
is the second highest peak in the range after Piz Bernina . The first ascent of Piz_Zupo was made by L Enderlin and Serardi , with Badrutt ( a chamois hunter ) on 9 july 1863 . eos

is a 6,614 ft . mountain in the US state of Alaska , located in Chugach State Park . Sitauted in the Chugach Mountains , Polar_Bear_Peak lies at the head of South Fork Eagle River , 5 mi ESE of Eagle Lake , and ESE of Anchorage . Polar_Bear_Peak was named in 1963 by members of the Mountaineering Club of Alaska because a snow patch on Polar_Bear_Peak north face resembles a Polar Bear skin . eos
lies at the head of South Fork Eagle River , 5 mi ESE of Eagle Lake , and ESE of Anchorage . Polar_Bear_Peak was named in 1963 by members of the Mountaineering Club of Alaska because a snow patch on Polar_Bear_Peak north face resembles a Polar Bear skin . eos

( 4,092 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps on the border between Valais , Switzerland and the Aosta Valley in Italy . Pollux_mountain is the lower of a pair of twin peaks ( the other being Castor ) named after the Gemini twins of Roman mythology . Pollux_mountain is separated from Castor by a pass at 3,845 m ( 12,615 ft ) , named the Passo di Verra in Italian and the Zwillingsjoch in German . eos
is the lower of a pair of twin peaks ( the other being Castor ) named after the Gemini twins of Roman mythology . Pollux_mountain is separated from Castor by a pass at 3,845 m ( 12,615 ft ) , named the Passo di Verra in Italian and the Zwillingsjoch in German . Pollux_mountain is known as Monte Polluce in Italian . eos
is separated from Castor by a pass at 3,845 m ( 12,615 ft ) , named the Passo di Verra in Italian and the Zwillingsjoch in German . Pollux_mountain is known as Monte Polluce in Italian . The first ascent was by Jules Jacot from Geneva with guides Josef - Marie Perren and Peter Taugwalder ( father ) on august 1 ( the Swiss national day ) 1864 . eos
is known as Monte Polluce in Italian . The first ascent was by Jules Jacot from Geneva with guides Josef - Marie Perren and Peter Taugwalder ( father ) on august 1 ( the Swiss national day ) 1864 . Their route was via the Schwartztor , a pass first crossed by John Ball and Gabriel Zumtaugwald in 1845 . eos
north ridge , PD + ) , the Capanna Quintino Sella ( 3,585 m ) , and the Cesare Volante e Giorgio Rossi bivouac hut ( 3,850 m ) . The first winter and ski ascent of Pollux_mountain was by Dr Alfred von Martin and Karl Planck on 7 march 1913 . There are also a pair of summits named Pollux and Castor in Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming , USA . eos
was by Dr Alfred von Martin and Karl Planck on 7 march 1913 . There are also a pair of summits named Pollux and Castor in Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming , USA . Located in the Absaroka Range , Pollux is 3,373 m , 65 m higher than its twin . eos
( commonly referred to as El Popo or Don Goyo ) ( "" IPA : popokaˈtepetɬ "" ) is an active volcano and the second highest peak in Mexico after the Pico de Orizaba ( 5,636 m ) . Popocatipetl comes from the Nahuatl words popōca ` it smokes ' and tepētl ` mountain ' , thus Smoking Mountain . eos
comes from the Nahuatl words popōca ` it smokes ' and tepētl ` mountain ' , thus Smoking Mountain . Popocatipetl is linked to the Iztaccíhuatl volcano to the north by the high saddle known as the Paso de Cortés , and Popocatipetl lies in the eastern half of the Trans - Mexican volcanic belt . Popocatipetl is one of the most active volcanoes in Mexico , having had more than 20 major eruptions since the arrival of the Spanish in 1519 . eos
is linked to the Iztaccíhuatl volcano to the north by the high saddle known as the Paso de Cortés , and Popocatipetl lies in the eastern half of the Trans - Mexican volcanic belt . Popocatipetl is one of the most active volcanoes in Mexico , having had more than 20 major eruptions since the arrival of the Spanish in 1519 . Popocatipetl is currently active . eos
lies in the eastern half of the Trans - Mexican volcanic belt . Popocatipetl is one of the most active volcanoes in Mexico , having had more than 20 major eruptions since the arrival of the Spanish in 1519 . Popocatipetl is currently active . eos
is one of the most active volcanoes in Mexico , having had more than 20 major eruptions since the arrival of the Spanish in 1519 . Popocatipetl is currently active . A major eruption occurred in 1947 to begin this cycle of activity . eos
is currently active . A major eruption occurred in 1947 to begin this cycle of activity . Then , on december 21 , 1994 Popocatipetl spewed gas and ash which was carried as far as 25 km away by prevailing winds . eos
spewed gas and ash which was carried as far as 25 km away by prevailing winds . The activity prompted the evacuation of nearby towns and scientists to begin monitoring for an eruption . In december 2000 , tens of thousands of people were evacuated by the government based on the warnings of scientists . eos
then made Popocatipetl largest display in thousands of years . Popocatipetl is only 70 km to the southeast of Mexico City , from where Popocatipetl can be seen regularly , depending on atmospheric conditions . The residents of Puebla , a mere 40 km east of Popocatipetl , enjoy the views of Popocatipetl almost all year long . eos

is only 70 km to the southeast of Mexico City , from where Popocatipetl can be seen regularly , depending on atmospheric conditions . Popocatipetl is also one of the three tall peaks in Mexico to contain glaciers , with the others being Iztaccíhuatl and Pico de Orizaba . eos

, ( or Pumarikish , Peak 11 ) is a high peak of the Hispar Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range . Pumari_Chhish lies about 4 km east of Khunyang Chhish , in the heart of the Hispar , north of the Hispar Glacier . Pumari_Chhish was first attempted by an Austrian group in 1974 , who failed to climb or bypass the Yazghil Glacier on the north side of Pumari_Chhish . eos
lies about 4 km east of Khunyang Chhish , in the heart of the Hispar , north of the Hispar Glacier . Pumari_Chhish was first attempted by an Austrian group in 1974 , who failed to climb or bypass the Yazghil Glacier on the north side of Pumari_Chhish . In 1979 , a Japanese group from the Hokkaido Alpine Association succeeded in climbing Pumari_Chhish via a long route starting from the Khunyang Glacier , well to the west of Pumari_Chhish . eos
was first attempted by an Austrian group in 1974 , who failed to climb or bypass the Yazghil Glacier on the north side of Pumari_Chhish . In 1979 , a Japanese group from the Hokkaido Alpine Association succeeded in climbing Pumari_Chhish via a long route starting from the Khunyang Glacier , well to the west of Pumari_Chhish . They first had to cross a significant col to access the upper Yazghil Glacier ; they then ascended the north ridge of Pumari_Chhish . eos
. In 1979 , a Japanese group from the Hokkaido Alpine Association succeeded in climbing Pumari_Chhish via a long route starting from the Khunyang Glacier , well to the west of Pumari_Chhish . They first had to cross a significant col to access the upper Yazghil Glacier ; they then ascended the north ridge of Pumari_Chhish . eos
via a long route starting from the Khunyang Glacier , well to the west of Pumari_Chhish . They first had to cross a significant col to access the upper Yazghil Glacier ; they then ascended the north ridge of Pumari_Chhish . According the Index , there have been no other successful ascents of Pumari_Chhish , and only one other attempt , on the south face , in 1999 . eos
. They first had to cross a significant col to access the upper Yazghil Glacier ; they then ascended the north ridge of Pumari_Chhish . According the Index , there have been no other successful ascents of Pumari_Chhish , and only one other attempt , on the south face , in 1999 . eos

( or Pumo Ri ) is a mountain in the Himalaya on the Nepal - Tibet border . Pumori lies just eight kilometres west of Mount Everest . Pumori , which means ` ` Ummarried Daughter '' in the Sherpa dialect , was named by George Mallory . eos
lies just eight kilometres west of Mount Everest . Pumori , which means ` ` Ummarried Daughter '' in the Sherpa dialect , was named by George Mallory . Climbers sometimes refer to Pumori as ` ` Everest 's Daughter '' . eos
, which means ` ` Ummarried Daughter '' in the Sherpa dialect , was named by George Mallory . Climbers sometimes refer to Pumori as ` ` Everest 's Daughter '' . Pumori is a popular climbing peak and the easiest route is graded class 3 , although with avalanche danger . eos
as ` ` Everest 's Daughter '' . Pumori is a popular climbing peak and the easiest route is graded class 3 , although with avalanche danger . Pumori was first climbed in 1962 by Gerhard Lenser of a German - Swiss expedition . eos
is a popular climbing peak and the easiest route is graded class 3 , although with avalanche danger . Pumori was first climbed in 1962 by Gerhard Lenser of a German - Swiss expedition . Two Czechs ( Leopold Sulovsky and Michalec Zeduak ) climbed a new route on the South face in the spring of 1996 ( Joe Simpson , 1997 , Dark Shadows falling ) . eos
was first climbed in 1962 by Gerhard Lenser of a German - Swiss expedition . Two Czechs ( Leopold Sulovsky and Michalec Zeduak ) climbed a new route on the South face in the spring of 1996 ( Joe Simpson , 1997 , Dark Shadows falling ) . An outlier of Pumori is Kala Patthar ( 5,643 m/18 , 513 ' ) , which appears as a big brown bump below the impressive south face of Pumori . eos
is Kala Patthar ( 5,643 m/18 , 513 ' ) , which appears as a big brown bump below the impressive south face of Pumori . Many trekkers going to see Mt. Everest up close will attempt to climb to the top of Kala Patthar . The views from almost anywhere on Kala Patther of Everest , Lhotse and Nuptse are truly spectacular on a sunny day . eos
. Many trekkers going to see Mt. Everest up close will attempt to climb to the top of Kala Patthar . The views from almost anywhere on Kala Patther of Everest , Lhotse and Nuptse are truly spectacular on a sunny day . eos
( pronounced "" ˈpʊntʃak ˈdʒaja "" ) , sometimes called Mount Carstensz or the Carstensz Pyramid , is the highest mountain on the island of New Guinea , on the Australia - New Guinea continent and in Oceania . Puncak_Jaya is the highest point between the Himalayas and the Andes and the highest island peak in the world . Puncak_Jaya is located in what is variously called the Sudirman Range or the Dugunduguoo , in the western central highlands of Papua , the Indonesian western half of the island , and Puncak_Jaya is the highest peak in the country . eos
is the highest point between the Himalayas and the Andes and the highest island peak in the world . Puncak_Jaya is located in what is variously called the Sudirman Range or the Dugunduguoo , in the western central highlands of Papua , the Indonesian western half of the island , and Puncak_Jaya is the highest peak in the country . eos
is located in what is variously called the Sudirman Range or the Dugunduguoo , in the western central highlands of Papua , the Indonesian western half of the island , and Puncak_Jaya is the highest peak in the country . eos
is the highest peak in the country . eos
( often written Puu Oo , and pronounced "" puʔu ʔoːʔoː "" ( roughly ` ` poo - oo oh - oh '' ) ) is a cinder / spatter cone in the eastern rift zone of the Kīlauea volcano of the Hawaiian Islands . Puu_Oo has been erupting continuously since january 3 , 1983 , making Puu_Oo the longest - lived rift - zone eruption of the last two centuries . eos
has been erupting continuously since january 3 , 1983 , making Puu_Oo the longest - lived rift - zone eruption of the last two centuries . From 1983 through 1998 , lava from Puu_Oo covered more than 97 km ² ( 37 square miles ) . Although the name is often translated as ` ` Hill of the Ōō Bird '' from Hawaiian , there is a different explanation of the Hawaiian appellation . eos
the longest - lived rift - zone eruption of the last two centuries . From 1983 through 1998 , lava from Puu_Oo covered more than 97 km ² ( 37 square miles ) . Although the name is often translated as ` ` Hill of the Ōō Bird '' from Hawaiian , there is a different explanation of the Hawaiian appellation . eos
covered more than 97 km ² ( 37 square miles ) . Although the name is often translated as ` ` Hill of the Ōō Bird '' from Hawaiian , there is a different explanation of the Hawaiian appellation . The word Ōō also means digging stick . eos
is a peak in Jasper National Park , Canada named for Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta pyramid - like shape . James Hector named Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta in 1859 due to Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta appearance from the Athabasca River valley on the eastern side of Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta . Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta is a relatively easy scramble on the eastern slopes . eos

in 1859 due to Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta appearance from the Athabasca River valley on the eastern side of Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta . Pyramid_Mountain_Alberta is a relatively easy scramble on the eastern slopes . These slopes can be reached by following a steep fire road from the parking lot at Pyramid Lake . eos

is a fourteener in the US state of Colorado , the highest peak in the Tenmile Range ( a northern extension of the Mosquito Range ) . Quandary_Peak is the 12th , 13th , or 14th highest peak in Colorado , depending on how Quandary_Peak is ranked . ( Quandary_Peak has nearly the same elevation as Castle Peak and Mount Evans . ) eos
is the 12th , 13th , or 14th highest peak in Colorado , depending on how Quandary_Peak is ranked . ( Quandary_Peak has nearly the same elevation as Castle Peak and Mount Evans . ) Quandary_Peak lies in Summit County and in the Arapaho National Forest , about 6 mi ( 10 km ) south - southwest of the town of Breckenridge . eos
is ranked . ( Quandary_Peak has nearly the same elevation as Castle Peak and Mount Evans . ) Quandary_Peak lies in Summit County and in the Arapaho National Forest , about 6 mi ( 10 km ) south - southwest of the town of Breckenridge . eos
has nearly the same elevation as Castle Peak and Mount Evans . ) Quandary_Peak lies in Summit County and in the Arapaho National Forest , about 6 mi ( 10 km ) south - southwest of the town of Breckenridge . The standard route up Quandary_Peak is a trail hike ( class 1 ) , starting from a trailhead about 1 mi ( 1.6 km ) north of Hoosier Pass on the east side of Quandary_Peak . eos
lies in Summit County and in the Arapaho National Forest , about 6 mi ( 10 km ) south - southwest of the town of Breckenridge . The standard route up Quandary_Peak is a trail hike ( class 1 ) , starting from a trailhead about 1 mi ( 1.6 km ) north of Hoosier Pass on the east side of Quandary_Peak . Hence Quandary_Peak is a popular fourteener to climb , because of the relatively easy ascent , as well as Quandary_Peak proximity to Denver and Breckenridge . eos
is a trail hike ( class 1 ) , starting from a trailhead about 1 mi ( 1.6 km ) north of Hoosier Pass on the east side of Quandary_Peak . Hence Quandary_Peak is a popular fourteener to climb , because of the relatively easy ascent , as well as Quandary_Peak proximity to Denver and Breckenridge . Quandary_Peak is also popular with backcountry skiers and snowboarders . eos
. Hence Quandary_Peak is a popular fourteener to climb , because of the relatively easy ascent , as well as Quandary_Peak proximity to Denver and Breckenridge . Quandary_Peak is also popular with backcountry skiers and snowboarders . eos
is a popular fourteener to climb , because of the relatively easy ascent , as well as Quandary_Peak proximity to Denver and Breckenridge . Quandary_Peak is also popular with backcountry skiers and snowboarders . The gentle ascent makes for an easy climb from the east , with less danger from avalanche than on many other fourteeners , and the other slopes of Quandary_Peak are steep and appeal to expert backountry skiers . eos
proximity to Denver and Breckenridge . Quandary_Peak is also popular with backcountry skiers and snowboarders . is also popular with backcountry skiers and snowboarders . The gentle ascent makes for an easy climb from the east , with less danger from avalanche than on many other fourteeners , and the other slopes of Quandary_Peak are steep and appeal to expert backountry skiers . One such steep ski mountaineering route is the Cristo Couloir . eos

is the highest point in Lebanon , at 3088 metres high . eos
is a mountain in the Karakoram mountain range in Pakistan . Rakaposhi is situated in the Nagar Valley approximately 100 km north of the city of Gilgit . Rakaposhi means ` ` shining wall '' in the local language . eos
is situated in the Nagar Valley approximately 100 km north of the city of Gilgit . Rakaposhi means ` ` shining wall '' in the local language . Rakaposhi is also known as Rakaposhi Peak , Rakapushi and Dumani ( ` ` Mother of Mist '' ) . eos
is also known as Rakaposhi Peak , Rakapushi and Dumani ( ` ` Mother of Mist '' ) . Rakaposhi is ranked 27th highest in the world and 12th highest in Pakistan , but Rakaposhi is more popular for Rakaposhi beauty than Rakaposhi rank might suggest and Rakaposhi is said to be one of the most beautiful mountains in the world . eos
is ranked 27th highest in the world and 12th highest in Pakistan , but Rakaposhi is more popular for Rakaposhi beauty than Rakaposhi rank might suggest and Rakaposhi is said to be one of the most beautiful mountains in the world . Rakaposhi was first climbed in 1958 by Mike Banks and Tom Patey , members of a British - Pakistani expedition , via the Southwest Spur / Ridge route . eos
is more popular for Rakaposhi beauty than Rakaposhi rank might suggest and Rakaposhi is said to be one of the most beautiful mountains in the world . was first climbed in 1958 by Mike Banks and Tom Patey , members of a British - Pakistani expedition , via the Southwest Spur / Ridge route . Both of them suffered minor frostbite during the ascent . Another climber slipped and fell on the descent and died during the night . eos
is a mountain located on Vancouver Island , British Columbia . Rambler_Peak is 23 km E of Gold River and 4 km SE of Mount Colonel Foster . Rambler_Peak is a hydrographic divide located at the headwaters of the Elk River . eos
is 23 km E of Gold River and 4 km SE of Mount Colonel Foster . Rambler_Peak is a hydrographic divide located at the headwaters of the Elk River . The Wolf , Elk , Ucoma Rivers and Cervus Creek all start at Rambler_Peak . eos

is located in the Kaibab National Forest in Coconino County , Arizona . Red_Butte is known to the Havasupai nation as Wii'i Gdwiisa , ` ` clenched fist mountain '' , and Red_Butte is regarded as a sacred site . Red_Butte is the most notable feature on the Coconino Plateau between the San Francisco volcanic field and the Grand Canyon . eos

is a large mountain massif located in the southern Teton Range . The west and northern flanks of Rendezvous_Mountain are in Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming , while much of the remainder of Rendezvous_Mountain is in Bridger - Teton National Forest . Rendezvous_Mountain extends for a distance of 5 miles ( 8 km ) between Granite Canyon to the north and Phillips Canyon to the south . eos
are in Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming , while much of the remainder of Rendezvous_Mountain is in Bridger - Teton National Forest . Rendezvous_Mountain extends for a distance of 5 miles ( 8 km ) between Granite Canyon to the north and Phillips Canyon to the south . Though there are numerous summits above 10,000 feet ( 3,048 m ) , the one that is most commonly visited is the North Peak , where the Jackson Hole Mountain Resort aerial tram provides access to the summit for skiers in the winter and sightseerings and hikers in the summer . eos
is in Bridger - Teton National Forest . Rendezvous_Mountain extends for a distance of 5 miles ( 8 km ) between Granite Canyon to the north and Phillips Canyon to the south . Though there are numerous summits above 10,000 feet ( 3,048 m ) , the one that is most commonly visited is the North Peak , where the Jackson Hole Mountain Resort aerial tram provides access to the summit for skiers in the winter and sightseerings and hikers in the summer . eos
extends for a distance of 5 miles ( 8 km ) between Granite Canyon to the north and Phillips Canyon to the south . Though there are numerous summits above 10,000 feet ( 3,048 m ) , the one that is most commonly visited is the North Peak , where the Jackson Hole Mountain Resort aerial tram provides access to the summit for skiers in the winter and sightseerings and hikers in the summer . The descent from the summit of Rendezvous_Mountain back to Teton Village is steep , with an altitude loss of 4,135 feet ( 1,260 m ) in only a little more than 6 miles ( 9.6 km ) . eos
back to Teton Village is steep , with an altitude loss of 4,135 feet ( 1,260 m ) in only a little more than 6 miles ( 9.6 km ) . eos
is an active volcano Reventador lies in the eastern Andes of Ecuador . Reventador lies in a remote area of the national park of the same name . eos
lies in the eastern Andes of Ecuador . Reventador lies in a remote area of the national park of the same name . eos
lies in a remote area of the national park of the same name . Since 1541 Reventador has erupted over 25 times , although Reventador isolated location means that many of Reventador eruptions have gone unreported . Reventador most recent eruption was in 2007 , but the largest historical eruption occurred in 2002 . eos
has erupted over 25 times , although Reventador isolated location means that many of Reventador eruptions have gone unreported . During that eruption the plume from Reventador reached a height of 17 km and pyroclastic flows went up to 7 km from the cone . eos

( 4,199 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps of Switzerland . The first ascent of Rimpfischhorn was by Leslie Stephen and Robert Liveing with guides Melchior Anderegg and Johann Zumtaugwald on 9 september 1859 . Their route of ascent was from Fluh Alp via the Rimpfischwänge . eos

( 9,513 ft / 2,900 m ) is located in the Lewis Range in the US state of Montana . Rising_Wolf_Mountain is in the southeastern section of Glacier National Park and Rising_Wolf_Mountain rises dramatically above the Two Medicine region . The Blackfeet consider the Two Medicine region of the park to be sacred ground and their name for Rising_Wolf_Mountain , ` ` Mahkuyi - opuahsin '' , meaning , The way the wolf gets up , was later translated to the current name of Rising_Wolf_Mountain . eos

is the highest peak of Cordillera Oriental , in the Andes Mountains of Colombia . Ritacuba_Blanco is located . The summit is accessible from the west via the town of El Cocuy , the village of Guicán and the hamlet of Las Cabaňas . eos
is located . The summit is accessible from the west via the town of El Cocuy , the village of Guicán and the hamlet of Las Cabaňas . The hike is fairly easy , but weather is not reliable , and a glacier must be crossed . eos
glacier is melting at very high rates , backing down 25 linear mts per year ; same is happening at amazing speeds to all other snow - covered tropical mountains in Colombia . In 1950 , Ritacuba_Blanco glacier extended down to 4,500 meters above sea level height ; in january 2007 it lowest point was at 4,800 meters above sea level . If this melting rate continues , Ritacuba_Blanco glacier is expected to disappear before 2025 . eos

, the highest peak of the Ruby Mountains and Elko County , is located in the northeast portion of the state of Nevada in the western United States . Ruby_Dome rises from a base elevation of about 6000 feet to a height of 11,387 feet ( 3470 m , the NAD8 elevation is about 5 feet higher ) . Ruby_Dome is located at 40 ° 37.3 ' N and 115 ° 28.5 ` W , about 21 miles southeast of the community of Elko . eos

( "" Hungarian : Tengerszem - csúcs "" , "" German : Meeraugspitze "" ) is a mountain in the crest of the High Tatras , at the Polish - Slovak border . Rysy has three peaks : middle ( 2,503 m ) , north - western ( 2,499 m ) and south - eastern ( 2,473 m ) . The north - western peak is the highest point ( and the most prominent ) of Poland , while the highest of the three peaks is just on the Slovak side of the border . eos
has three peaks : middle ( 2,503 m ) , north - western ( 2,499 m ) and south - eastern ( 2,473 m ) . The north - western peak is the highest point ( and the most prominent ) of Poland , while the highest of the three peaks is just on the Slovak side of the border . eos
( also known as Tambo Quemado ) is a pyroclastic shield in Bolivia . Sacabaya is located on the Altiplano near to the Rio Lauca . Sacabaya is composed of ignimbrite , which has formed a shield . eos
is located on the Altiplano near to the Rio Lauca . Sacabaya is composed of ignimbrite , which has formed a shield . Sacabaya is capped by an area of vents which has many overlapping craters , and is elongated in shape . eos
is composed of ignimbrite , which has formed a shield . Sacabaya is capped by an area of vents which has many overlapping craters , and is elongated in shape . At the southern end lies the youngest of the craters . eos
is capped by an area of vents which has many overlapping craters , and is elongated in shape . At the southern end lies the youngest of the craters . This crater has a lava dome within it . eos
has fumaroles and Sacabaya associated tephra deposits have been shaped into sand dunes by wind activity . eos

( Persian : سهند ) is a massive , heavily eroded stratovolcano in northwestern Iran . At 3707 m , Sahand is the highest mountain in the Iranian province of East Azarbaijan . Sahand is one of the highest mountains in Iranian Azerbaijan , in addition to being an important dormant volcano in the country . eos
is the highest mountain in the Iranian province of East Azarbaijan . Sahand is one of the highest mountains in Iranian Azerbaijan , in addition to being an important dormant volcano in the country . The Sahand mountains are directly south of Tabriz , the highest peak of which is Jam Daqi at an altitude of 3,750 m. eos
is one of the highest mountains in Iranian Azerbaijan , in addition to being an important dormant volcano in the country . The Sahand mountains are directly south of Tabriz , the highest peak of which is Jam Daqi at an altitude of 3,750 m. Approximately 17 peaks can be accounted for as being over 3,000 m in height . eos
( Nevado Salcantay ) or Salkantay ( Nevado Salkantay ) is the highest peak of the Cordillera Vilcabamba , part of the Peruvian Andes . Salcantay is located in the Cusco Region , about 60 km west - northwest of the city of Cusco . Salcantay is the 38th highest peak in the Andes , and the twelfth highest in Peru . eos
is located in the Cusco Region , about 60 km west - northwest of the city of Cusco . Salcantay is the 38th highest peak in the Andes , and the twelfth highest in Peru . However , as a range highpoint in deeply incised terrain , Salcantay is the second most topographically prominent peak in the country , after Huascarán . eos
is the 38th highest peak in the Andes , and the twelfth highest in Peru . However , as a range highpoint in deeply incised terrain , Salcantay is the second most topographically prominent peak in the country , after Huascarán . eos

( or Mount San Gorgonio , or Old Greyback ) is the highest peak in Southern California at 11,502 feet ( 3,506 m ) above sea level . San_Gorgonio_Mountain is located in the San Bernardino Mountains , 27 mi ( 42 km ) east of the city of San Bernardino and 12 mi ( 19 km ) north - northeast of San Gorgonio Pass . eos
is located in the San Bernardino Mountains , 27 mi ( 42 km ) east of the city of San Bernardino and 12 mi ( 19 km ) north - northeast of San Gorgonio Pass . San_Gorgonio_Mountain lies in the San Gorgonio Wilderness , part of the San Bernardino National Forest . eos
lies in the San Gorgonio Wilderness , part of the San Bernardino National Forest . Spanish missionaries in the area during the early 1800s named San_Gorgonio_Mountain after Saint Gorgonius . Since San_Gorgonio_Mountain is the highest point in a region which is separated from higher peaks ( eg in the Sierra Nevada ) by relatively low terrain , San_Gorgonio_Mountain is one of the most topographically prominent peaks in the United States . eos
after Saint Gorgonius . Since San_Gorgonio_Mountain is the highest point in a region which is separated from higher peaks ( eg in the Sierra Nevada ) by relatively low terrain , San_Gorgonio_Mountain is one of the most topographically prominent peaks in the United States . San_Gorgonio_Mountain is ranked 7th among peaks in the contiguous US , and 18th among all US peaks . eos
is the highest point in a region which is separated from higher peaks ( eg in the Sierra Nevada ) by relatively low terrain , San_Gorgonio_Mountain is one of the most topographically prominent peaks in the United States . San_Gorgonio_Mountain is ranked 7th among peaks in the contiguous US , and 18th among all US peaks . Several trails lead to the broad summit of San_Gorgonio_Mountain , which rises only a few hundred feet ( 100 m ) above the tree line . eos
is one of the most topographically prominent peaks in the United States . San_Gorgonio_Mountain is ranked 7th among peaks in the contiguous US , and 18th among all US peaks . Several trails lead to the broad summit of San_Gorgonio_Mountain , which rises only a few hundred feet ( 100 m ) above the tree line . eos
is ranked 7th among peaks in the contiguous US , and 18th among all US peaks . Several trails lead to the broad summit of San_Gorgonio_Mountain , which rises only a few hundred feet ( 100 m ) above the tree line . Any route requires well over 4,000 feet ( 1,220 m ) of elevation gain . eos
, which rises only a few hundred feet ( 100 m ) above the tree line . Any route requires well over 4,000 feet ( 1,220 m ) of elevation gain . There is however one less used trail leading from the Fish Creek Trailhead to San_Gorgonio_Mountain that has about 3400 ' of gain , far less than the 4600 ' - 5200 ' of gain on the standard routes from the South Fork and Vivian Creek trailheads . eos

is the highest peak in Riverside County , California . San_Jacinto_Peak is part of the San Jacinto Mountains , and San_Jacinto_Peak lies within Mount San Jacinto State Park . To the east , San_Jacinto_Peak towers over the city of Palm Springs ; to the west , San_Jacinto_Peak borders the mountain community of Idyllwild . San_Jacinto_Peak is also frequently named Mount San Jacinto . eos
is part of the San Jacinto Mountains , and San_Jacinto_Peak lies within Mount San Jacinto State Park . To the east , San_Jacinto_Peak towers over the city of Palm Springs ; to the west , San_Jacinto_Peak borders the mountain community of Idyllwild . San_Jacinto_Peak is also frequently named Mount San Jacinto . The steep escarpment of San_Jacinto_Peak north face , above Snow Creek , climbs over 10,000 feet ( 3 km ) in 7 miles ( 11.3 km ) . eos
lies within Mount San Jacinto State Park . To the east , San_Jacinto_Peak towers over the city of Palm Springs ; to the west , San_Jacinto_Peak borders the mountain community of Idyllwild . San_Jacinto_Peak is also frequently named Mount San Jacinto . The steep escarpment of San_Jacinto_Peak north face , above Snow Creek , climbs over 10,000 feet ( 3 km ) in 7 miles ( 11.3 km ) . eos
towers over the city of Palm Springs ; to the west , San_Jacinto_Peak borders the mountain community of Idyllwild . San_Jacinto_Peak is also frequently named Mount San Jacinto . The steep escarpment of San_Jacinto_Peak north face , above Snow Creek , climbs over 10,000 feet ( 3 km ) in 7 miles ( 11.3 km ) . This is one of the largest gains in elevation over such a small horizontal distance in the contiguous United States . eos

San_Jacinto_Peak is flanked by Jean Peak ( 10,670 feet , 3252 metres ) and Marion Mountain ( 10,362 feet , 3158 metres ) . eos
is flanked by Jean Peak ( 10,670 feet , 3252 metres ) and Marion Mountain ( 10,362 feet , 3158 metres ) . These peaks were named in 1897 by USGS topographer Edmund Taylor Perkins , Jr. . Perkins named Jean Peak for his sweetheart and future bride , Jean Waters of Plumas County , whom he married in 1903 . eos
environs . Near the summit of San_Jacinto_Peak is a stone hut that was built in 1935 by Zubi , an immigrant from Central Europe who for many years until his death in the 1970s was a beloved figure in the mountain community of Idyllwild . In the 1930s , Idyllwild staged an annual race from the town center to San_Jacinto_Peak and back . eos
and San_Jacinto_Peak environs . In the 1930s , Idyllwild staged an annual race from the town center to San_Jacinto_Peak and back . eos
is a stone hut that was built in 1935 by Zubi , an immigrant from Central Europe who for many years until his death in the 1970s was a beloved figure in the mountain community of Idyllwild . In the 1930s , Idyllwild staged an annual race from the town center to San_Jacinto_Peak and back . Contestants could choose any route they wished to get to and from San_Jacinto_Peak . eos

is a fourteen thousand foot peak in the San Juan Mountains of the US state of Colorado . San_Luis_Peak is located in the La Garita Wilderness ( part of the Rio Grande National Forest ) in Saguache County approximately 10 miles ( 16 km ) north of Creede . San_Luis_Peak is situated rather far to the east of the other fourteeners in the San Juans , and San_Luis_Peak has more of a wilderness setting than many other fourteeners . eos
is located in the La Garita Wilderness ( part of the Rio Grande National Forest ) in Saguache County approximately 10 miles ( 16 km ) north of Creede . San_Luis_Peak is situated rather far to the east of the other fourteeners in the San Juans , and San_Luis_Peak has more of a wilderness setting than many other fourteeners . San_Luis_Peak is a relatively straightforward climb , with two hiking routes to the summit , the South Ridge and the East Flank . eos

, or Sangemar Mar , or Sang - e - Marmar , is a peak in the Batura Muztagh . This is the westernmost subrange of the Karakoram range , and is located in the Gilgit district of the Northern Areas of Pakistan , west of the Hunza Valley . It runs from Chalt village , in the Bar Valley on the eastern end , to Kampir Dior in Kurumbar Valley on the western end . eos
is much lower in elevation than many of the surrounding peaks , such as Batura Sar and Rakaposhi , Sangemarmar_Sar is little - known , and there has been only one successful ascent of Sangemarmar_Sar , according to the Index . However , because of Sangemarmar_Sar location on the southeast flank of the range , relatively near the Hunza Valley , Sangemarmar_Sar does enjoy tremendous vertical relief above local terrain . eos

is a prominent summit in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains of New Mexico , United States , located 15 mi ( 24 km ) northeast of Santa Fe . There are no higher mountains in New Mexico south of Santa_Fe_Baldy . Santa_Fe_Baldy is prominent as seen from Los Alamos and communities along the Rio Grande in northern New Mexico , but Santa_Fe_Baldy is relatively inconspicuous from Santa Fe , as Santa_Fe_Baldy north - south trending main ridge line is seen nearly end - on , disguising the size of Santa_Fe_Baldy . eos
. Santa_Fe_Baldy is prominent as seen from Los Alamos and communities along the Rio Grande in northern New Mexico , but Santa_Fe_Baldy is relatively inconspicuous from Santa Fe , as Santa_Fe_Baldy north - south trending main ridge line is seen nearly end - on , disguising the size of Santa_Fe_Baldy . Tree line in the Sangre de Cristos is unusually high ( exceeding 12,000 ft/3 , 660 m in places ) and only the top 600 - 800 ft ( 180 - 240 m ) of Santa_Fe_Baldy is perpetually free of trees , but several severe forest fires have created bare spots extending to lower elevations . eos
is prominent as seen from Los Alamos and communities along the Rio Grande in northern New Mexico , but Santa_Fe_Baldy is relatively inconspicuous from Santa Fe , as Santa_Fe_Baldy north - south trending main ridge line is seen nearly end - on , disguising the size of Santa_Fe_Baldy . Tree line in the Sangre de Cristos is unusually high ( exceeding 12,000 ft/3 , 660 m in places ) and only the top 600 - 800 ft ( 180 - 240 m ) of Santa_Fe_Baldy is perpetually free of trees , but several severe forest fires have created bare spots extending to lower elevations . An extensive region of aspen trees on Santa_Fe_Baldy flanks produces spectacular orange - yellow coloration during the fall that is the subject of many photographic studies . eos

An extensive region of aspen trees on Santa_Fe_Baldy flanks produces spectacular orange - yellow coloration during the fall that is the subject of many photographic studies . eos

is perpetually free of trees , but several severe forest fires have created bare spots extending to lower elevations . An extensive region of aspen trees on Santa_Fe_Baldy flanks produces spectacular orange - yellow coloration during the fall that is the subject of many photographic studies . Santa_Fe_Baldy lies in the Pecos Wilderness , part of the Santa Fe National Forest , on the water divide between the Rio Grande and the Pecos River . eos
flanks produces spectacular orange - yellow coloration during the fall that is the subject of many photographic studies . Santa_Fe_Baldy lies in the Pecos Wilderness , part of the Santa Fe National Forest , on the water divide between the Rio Grande and the Pecos River . The western slopes are drained by the Rio Capulin and the Rio Nambe , both flowing to the Rio Grande . eos
lies in the Pecos Wilderness , part of the Santa Fe National Forest , on the water divide between the Rio Grande and the Pecos River . The western slopes are drained by the Rio Capulin and the Rio Nambe , both flowing to the Rio Grande . The eastern side of Santa_Fe_Baldy consists of two small cirques , one containing Lake Katherine , one of the highest lakes in New Mexico , at elevation 11,742 ft ( 3,579 m ) . eos
consists of two small cirques , one containing Lake Katherine , one of the highest lakes in New Mexico , at elevation 11,742 ft ( 3,579 m ) . Santa_Fe_Baldy is accessed by Trail 251 , the Skyline Trail , which climbs to a saddle about 1,000 ft ( 300 m ) below the summit ; the remaining distance is covered by a steep unofficial trail along the ridgeline . Under good conditions the summit is a simple ` ` walk - up '' climb , but the Sangre de Cristos are unusually prone to lightning , and during the summer months , the wise hiker is off Santa_Fe_Baldy and other high summits in the range by noon , to avoid afternoon thunderstorms . eos
is accessed by Trail 251 , the Skyline Trail , which climbs to a saddle about 1,000 ft ( 300 m ) below the summit ; the remaining distance is covered by a steep unofficial trail along the ridgeline . Under good conditions the summit is a simple ` ` walk - up '' climb , but the Sangre de Cristos are unusually prone to lightning , and during the summer months , the wise hiker is off Santa_Fe_Baldy and other high summits in the range by noon , to avoid afternoon thunderstorms . Nearby peaks include Lake Peak , 12,409 ft ( 3,782 m ) and Tesuque Peak , 12,043 ft ( 3,671 m ) , both located about 3 mi ( 5 km ) to the south of Santa_Fe_Baldy . eos

Santa Fe Ski Basin is located on the western slopes of Tesuque Peak . eos

( Serbian and Macedonian : Шар Планина , Šar Planina ; Albanian : Malet e Sharrit , Mali i Sharrit , Sharr ) is a mountain located on the southern border of Kosovo , Serbia and the northwest part of the Republic of Macedonia . eos
is around 80 kilometers long , some 10 - 20 kilometers wide . There are several high peaks : * Titov Vrv ( 2747 m ) , the highest peak eos
extends to Mount Korab ( 2764 m ) in the southwest , and Sar_Mountain passes into northeastern Albania . Vegetation on Sar_Mountain includes crops up to around 1000 meters , forests up to 1700 meters , and above that lie high pastures which encompass around 550 square kilometers . Sar_Mountain is the largest compact area covered with pastures on the European continent . eos
passes into northeastern Albania .
