Sar_Mountain is the largest compact area covered with pastures on the European continent . Sar_Mountain is most known as the origin of the dog breed Šarplaninac ( Macedonian : eos
is the largest compact area covered with pastures on the European continent . Sar_Mountain is most known as the origin of the dog breed Šarplaninac ( Macedonian : Šarplaninec , Albanian : Qeni i Sharrit ) which was bred on these pastures . eos
is most known as the origin of the dog breed Šarplaninac ( Macedonian : Šarplaninec , Albanian : Qeni i Sharrit ) which was bred on these pastures . The Šar National Park is in the territory of the Autonomous Province of Kosovo and it spreads on 380 square kilometres , on the northern slopes of Sar_Mountain . eos
. What this national park boasts in particular are the endemic relict Macedonian Pine and white - bark pine , as well as the Alpine rose . As for game , this is the habitat of the lynx , bear , chamois , wolf , roe deer , wild boar and other species . eos
is the fourth highest independent peak in the Hindu Kush . Saraghrar is a huge , irregular stretched plateau at elevation around 7,000 m ( 22,966 ft ) , lying above vertical granite and ice faces , which protect Saraghrar all around . Saraghrar distinct summits are poorly identified , and information gathered from expeditions that have visited the area is often misleading . eos
is a huge , irregular stretched plateau at elevation around 7,000 m ( 22,966 ft ) , lying above vertical granite and ice faces , which protect Saraghrar all around . Saraghrar distinct summits are poorly identified , and information gathered from expeditions that have visited the area is often misleading . The main summits are : NE summit ( 7349 m ) , NW summit ( 7300 m ) , SW summit ( 7148 m ) , S summit ( 7307 m ) and SE summit ( 7208 m ) . eos
all around . Saraghrar distinct summits are poorly identified , and information gathered from expeditions that have visited the area is often misleading . The main summits are : NE summit ( 7349 m ) , NW summit ( 7300 m ) , SW summit ( 7148 m ) , S summit ( 7307 m ) and SE summit ( 7208 m ) . eos
distinct summits are poorly identified , and information gathered from expeditions that have visited the area is often misleading . The main summits are : NE summit ( 7349 m ) , NW summit ( 7300 m ) , SW summit ( 7148 m ) , S summit ( 7307 m ) and SE summit ( 7208 m ) . To date ( 2005 ) , the NW summit is the only unclimbed peak of Saraghrar . eos

( or Sasir Kangri ) is the highest peak in the Saser Muztagh , the easternmost subrange of the Karakoram range in India . Saser_Kangri is the 35th highest independent peak in the world . Saser_Kangri consists of four main peaks : eos
is the 35th highest independent peak in the world . Saser_Kangri consists of four main peaks : * Saser Kangri eos
consists of four main peaks : * Saser Kangri I at 7,672 metres ( 25,170 feet ) eos
lies toward the northwestern end of the Saser Muztagh , at the head of the North Shukpa Kunchang Glacier , a major glacier which drains the eastern slopes of the group . The Sakang and Pukpoche Glaciers head on the western side of the group , and drain into the Nubra River . Early exploration and climbing attempts of Saser_Kangri occurred on the western side , from the Nubra Valley ; this is lower , more populated , and hence more easily accessible than the eastern side , which faces the Tibetan Plateau . eos
occurred on the western side , from the Nubra Valley ; this is lower , more populated , and hence more easily accessible than the eastern side , which faces the Tibetan Plateau . Early European exploration included a visit in 1909 by famed explorer T G. Longstaff , along with Arthur Neve and A M. Slingsby . However , visits and failed climbing attempts by multiple groups on the western side over the period 1922 - 1970 showed that the western side was surprisingly difficult . eos
, by a very different route . They approached Saser_Kangri from the southeast , via the upper Shyok Valley and the North Shukpa Kunchang Glacier , a long and difficult journey . Only in 1987 did climbers succeed in ascending Saser_Kangri from the western side : an Indian - British team successfully climbed Saser_Kangri in conjunction with the first ascent of Saser Kangri IV . eos
from the southeast , via the upper Shyok Valley and the North Shukpa Kunchang Glacier , a long and difficult journey . Only in 1987 did climbers succeed in ascending Saser_Kangri from the western side : an Indian - British team successfully climbed Saser_Kangri in conjunction with the first ascent of Saser Kangri IV . Saser Kangri II West was first climbed in 1984 by an Indo - Japanese team . eos
from the western side : an Indian - British team successfully climbed Saser_Kangri in conjunction with the first ascent of Saser Kangri IV . Saser Kangri II West was first climbed in 1984 by an Indo - Japanese team . Saser Kangri II East remains unclimbed ; it is now believed that this is slightly higher that Saser Kangri II West and the world 's second highest unclimbed mountain after Gangkhar Puensum . eos

is the highest point in the Saur Range , part of the Tien Shan , on the border between Kazakhstan and China . Sauyr_Zhotasy lies 100 km southeast of Lake Zaysan . Despite Sauyr_Zhotasy low elevation , Sauyr_Zhotasy is well separated from higher ranges in Sauyr_Zhotasy area , and Sauyr_Zhotasy is therefore ranked highly by topographic prominence . eos

, with Schneeberg_Alps 2076 m - high summit Klosterwappen , is the highest mountain of Lower Austria , and the easternmost 2000 m - high mountain in the Alps . Schneeberg_Alps is a distinctive limestone massif with steep slopes on three sides . Schneeberg_Alps is one of the Northern Calcareous Alps in the borderland between Lower Austria and Styria , in the eastern part of Austria . eos
2076 m - high summit Klosterwappen , is the highest mountain of Lower Austria , and the easternmost 2000 m - high mountain in the Alps . Schneeberg_Alps is a distinctive limestone massif with steep slopes on three sides . Schneeberg_Alps is one of the Northern Calcareous Alps in the borderland between Lower Austria and Styria , in the eastern part of Austria . eos
is a distinctive limestone massif with steep slopes on three sides . Schneeberg_Alps is one of the Northern Calcareous Alps in the borderland between Lower Austria and Styria , in the eastern part of Austria . Schneeberg_Alps and the Rax ( 2007 m ) , some 13 km to the south - west , are collectively considered the Viennese Hausberge ( local mountains ) . eos
is one of the Northern Calcareous Alps in the borderland between Lower Austria and Styria , in the eastern part of Austria . Schneeberg_Alps and the Rax ( 2007 m ) , some 13 km to the south - west , are collectively considered the Viennese Hausberge ( local mountains ) . The rich Karst plateaux have provided drinking water for Vienna , via a 120 km - long pipeline , since 1873 , claiming to be the best drinking water in the world . eos
and the Rax ( 2007 m ) , some 13 km to the south - west , are collectively considered the Viennese Hausberge ( local mountains ) . The rich Karst plateaux have provided drinking water for Vienna , via a 120 km - long pipeline , since 1873 , claiming to be the best drinking water in the world . On clear days , Schneeberg_Alps can be readily seen from parts of Vienna , some 65 km away ( as the crow flies ) , together with Schneeberg_Alps snow - fields that reach down Schneeberg_Alps northern slopes even in summer and provide a challenge to skiers . eos
can be readily seen from parts of Vienna , some 65 km away ( as the crow flies ) , together with Schneeberg_Alps snow - fields that reach down Schneeberg_Alps northern slopes even in summer and provide a challenge to skiers . A rack - and - pinion railway , the Schneebergbahn , now over 100 years old , climbs to a height of 1800 m , reducing the walk to the summit to an hour or two . There are also a number of other routes for walkers , including from the spa resort of Puchberg am Schneeberg to the east , or from the south , in Höllental . eos
snow - fields that reach down Schneeberg_Alps northern slopes even in summer and provide a challenge to skiers . ( 4,078 m ) is a mountain in the Aarmassif in the Bernese Alps . The first ascent was on 16 august 1861 by Leslie Stephen , Ulrich Kaufmann , Christian Michel and Peter Michel . Their route of ascent , via the upper Schreck Couloir to the Schrecksattel and then by the south - east ridge , was the normal route for the following fifty years , but is now seldom used . eos
had been attempted several times before this , most notably by the Swiss naturalist Joseph Hugi in 1828 ( Schreckhorn Hugisattel is named after him ) and the guided party of Pierre Jean Édouard Desor ( a Swiss geologist ) in 1842 . ` The ambition of hoisting the first flag on the Schreckhorn , the one big Bernese summit which was untrodden , was far too obvious for us to resist ' , Desor later wrote , but they climbed a secondary summit of the Lauteraarhorn by mistake . The first ascent by the south - west ridge ( AD + ) - the normal route by which Schreckhorn is climbed - was by an unguided British party comprising Edward Branby , John Wicks and Claude Wilson on 26 july 1902 . eos
Hugisattel is named after him ) and the guided party of Pierre Jean Édouard Desor ( a Swiss geologist ) in 1842 . ` The ambition of hoisting the first flag on the Schreckhorn , the one big Bernese summit which was untrodden , was far too obvious for us to resist ' , Desor later wrote , but they climbed a secondary summit of the Lauteraarhorn by mistake . The first ascent by the south - west ridge ( AD + ) - the normal route by which Schreckhorn is climbed - was by an unguided British party comprising Edward Branby , John Wicks and Claude Wilson on 26 july 1902 . eos
is climbed - was by an unguided British party comprising Edward Branby , John Wicks and Claude Wilson on 26 july 1902 . The north - west ridge ( the Andersongrat , AD ) was first climbed by John Stafford Anderson and George Percival Baker , with guides Ulrich Almer and Aloys Pollinger on 7 august 1883 . The Strahlegg Hut , destroyed by an avalanche , has been replaced by the Schreckhorn Hut ( 2,520 m ) . eos
may also be ascended from the Gleckstein Hut ( 2,317 m ) and the Lauteraar Hut ( 2,392 m ) . eos
( German : Schlern ) ( 2,563 m ) is a mountain of the Dolomites in Trentino - Alto Adige / Südtirol , Italy . eos

( right , in the image at right ) was first ascended in 1888 by Johann Santner . It is named the Santner Spitze in his honour . Sciliar dominates the town of Siusi allo Sciliar , and the summit can be reached by following the trail marked with the number 1 from the town . eos
dominates the town of Siusi allo Sciliar , and the summit can be reached by following the trail marked with the number 1 from the town . At 1700 m , there is a mountain refuge , Rifugio Malghetta Sciliar ( German : Schlernboden ) , open from 1st june to 15th october . Near the summit is the Rifugio Bolzano ( German : Schlernhaus ) ( 2457 m ) . eos
also Gunung Semeru - is the tallest mountain on the island of Java and one of its most active volcanoes . Known also as Mahameru ( Great Mountain ) , Semeru is very steep and eos
is very steep and Semeru rises abruptly above the coastal plains of eastern Java . Maars containing crater lakes have formed along a line through the summit . eos
rises abruptly above the coastal plains of eastern Java . Maars containing crater lakes have formed along a line through the summit . Semeru lies at the south end of the Tengger Volcanic Complex . eos
lies at the south end of the Tengger Volcanic Complex . Semeru eruptive history is extensive . Since 1818 , at least 55 eruptions have been recorded ( 10 of which resulted in fatalities ) consisting of both lava flows and pyroclastic flows . eos
eruptive history is extensive . Since 1818 , at least 55 eruptions have been recorded ( 10 of which resulted in fatalities ) consisting of both lava flows and pyroclastic flows . Moderate explosive eruptions ( VEI 2 - 3 ) have also been recorded with some regularity . eos
has been in a state of near - constant eruption from 1967 to the present . At times , small eruptions happen every 10 minutes or so . Semeru is regularly climbed by tourists , usually starting from the village of Rano Pani to the north , but though non - technical Semeru can be dangerous . eos
is regularly climbed by tourists , usually starting from the village of Rano Pani to the north , but though non - technical Semeru can be dangerous . Soe Hok Gie , an Indonesian political activist of the 1960s died in 1969 from inhaling poisonous gas while hiking on Semeru . eos
can be dangerous . Soe Hok Gie , an Indonesian political activist of the 1960s died in 1969 from inhaling poisonous gas while hiking on Semeru . eos

is a mountain in the Cuillin on the Isle of Skye , Scotland . Sgurr_Dearg is topped by the Inaccessible Pinnacle ( colloquially referred to by mountaineers as the In Pin or In Pinn ) , a fin of rock measuring 50 metres ( 150 feet ) along its longest edge . eos
is topped by the Inaccessible Pinnacle ( colloquially referred to by mountaineers as the In Pin or In Pinn ) , a fin of rock measuring 50 metres ( 150 feet ) along its longest edge . The top of the Inaccessible Pinnacle , which at 986 m is the highest point of Sgurr_Dearg , is the only summit in the British Isles which can only be reached by rock climbing . eos
, is the only summit in the British Isles which can only be reached by rock climbing . This makes it the biggest hurdle for many Munro baggers . First climbed by Charles and Lawrence Pilkington in 1880 , the Pinnacle was never climbed by Sir Hugh Munro himself . eos
status as the most difficult of the Munros Sgurr_Dearg has now spawned a cottage industry for the local guides , who are frequently to be seen escorting parties of novice climbers . Unlike much of the Cuillin , the pinnacle is basalt not gabbro and thus is somewhat slippery in the wet . eos
has now spawned a cottage industry for the local guides , who are frequently to be seen escorting parties of novice climbers . Unlike much of the Cuillin , the pinnacle is basalt not gabbro and thus is somewhat slippery in the wet . eos

, or Shiprock Peak or Ship Rock ( Navajo : Tsé Bit ` a ` í , ` ` winged rock '' ) is a rock formation rising nearly above the high - desert plain on the Navajo reservation , about southwest of the northern New Mexico town of Shiprock , which is named for Shiprock . eos

( officially : Xixiabangma ) is the fourteenth highest mountain in the world and the lowest of the eight - thousanders . Shishapangma was the last 8,000 metre peak to be climbed , due to Shishapangma location entirely within China and the restrictions on outside visitation to the region imposed by the Chinese during the 1950s and later . The Tibetan name shi sha sbang eos
was the last 8,000 metre peak to be climbed , due to Shishapangma location entirely within China and the restrictions on outside visitation to the region imposed by the Chinese during the 1950s and later . The Tibetan name shi sha sbang ma means ` ` crest above the grassy plains '' . eos
location entirely within China and the restrictions on outside visitation to the region imposed by the Chinese during the 1950s and later . The Tibetan name shi sha sbang ma means ` ` crest above the grassy plains '' . eos
is called Gosainthan , which means ` ` place of the saint '' ) . Another interpretation , based on the spelling Shisha - Pangma , is that the name means , literally , ` ` Sherpa Woman . '' Shishapangma is located in south - central Tibet , a few kilometres from the border with Nepal . eos
is located in south - central Tibet , a few kilometres from the border with Nepal . Shishapangma is the only eight - thousander entirely within Chinese territory . Shishapangma is the highest peak in the Jugal Himal , which is contiguous with , and often considered a part of , the Langtang Himal . eos
is the only eight - thousander entirely within Chinese territory . Shishapangma is the highest peak in the Jugal Himal , which is contiguous with , and often considered a part of , the Langtang Himal . The combined Jugal / Langtang Himal straddles the Tibet / Nepal border . eos
is the highest peak in the Jugal Himal , which is contiguous with , and often considered a part of , the Langtang Himal . The combined Jugal / Langtang Himal straddles the Tibet / Nepal border . Since Shishapangma is on the dry north side of the Himalayan crest , and further away from the lower terrain of Nepal , Shishapangma has somewhat less dramatic vertical relief than most other major Himalayan peaks . eos
is on the dry north side of the Himalayan crest , and further away from the lower terrain of Nepal , Shishapangma has somewhat less dramatic vertical relief than most other major Himalayan peaks . Shishapangma was first climbed on May 2 , 1964 by a Chinese expedition led by Xǔ Jìng 许竞 . In addition to Xǔ Jìng , the summit team consisted of Zhāng Jùnyán 张俊岩 , Wáng Fùzhōu 王富洲 , Wū Zōngyuè 邬宗岳 , Chén Sān 陈三 , Soinam Dorjê ( Suǒnán Duōjí 索南多吉 ) eos
has somewhat less dramatic vertical relief than most other major Himalayan peaks . Shishapangma was first climbed on May 2 , 1964 by a Chinese expedition led by Xǔ Jìng 许竞 . In addition to Xǔ Jìng , the summit team consisted of Zhāng Jùnyán 张俊岩 , Wáng Fùzhōu 王富洲 , Wū Zōngyuè 邬宗岳 , Chén Sān 陈三 , Soinam Dorjê ( Suǒnán Duōjí 索南多吉 ) eos
was first climbed on May 2 , 1964 by a Chinese expedition led by Xǔ Jìng 许竞 . In addition to Xǔ Jìng , the summit team consisted of Zhāng Jùnyán 张俊岩 , Wáng Fùzhōu 王富洲 , Wū Zōngyuè 邬宗岳 , Chén Sān 陈三 , Soinam Dorjê ( Suǒnán Duōjí 索南多吉 ) , Chéng Tiānliàng 程天亮 , Migmar Zhaxi eos
, including noted American alpinist Alex Lowe and veteran Portuguese climber Bruno Carvalho . Nevertheless , Shishapangma is one of the easiest eight - thousanders to climb . The standard route ascends from the north side , and boasts relatively easy access , with vehicle travel possible to base camp at 5,000 metres ( 16,400 feet ) . eos
is one of the easiest eight - thousanders to climb . The standard route ascends from the north side , and boasts relatively easy access , with vehicle travel possible to base camp at 5,000 metres ( 16,400 feet ) . More technically demanding are the routes on the steeper Southwest Face , which involve 2,200 metres ( 7,218 feet ) of ascent on a 50 degree slope . eos
is one of the high peaks of the Batura Muztagh , which is the westernmost subrange of the Karakoram range . Alternate forms of the name of Shispare are Shispare Sar and Shisparé Sar . eos

( "" Russian : Шивелуч "" ) is the northernmost active volcano in Kamchatka Krai , Russia . Shiveluch is sometimes called Sheveluch ( Шевелуч ) or Sopka Shiveluch . eos
is sometimes called Sheveluch ( Шевелуч ) or Sopka Shiveluch . Shiveluch began forming about 60,000 to 70,000 years ago , and Shiveluch has had at least 60 large eruptions during the Holocene . eos

is the highest point in the nation of Georgia . Located in the Svaneti region along the Russian frontier , Shkhara lies north of the city of Kutaisi , Georgia 's second largest city . The summit lies in the central part of the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range , to the south - east of Mount Elbrus , Europe 's highest mountain . eos
lies north of the city of Kutaisi , Georgia 's second largest city . The summit lies in the central part of the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range , to the south - east of Mount Elbrus , Europe 's highest mountain . Shkhara is the third highest peak in the Caucasus , just behind Dykh - Tau . eos
is the third highest peak in the Caucasus , just behind Dykh - Tau . Shkhara is the high point and the eastern anchor of a massif known as the Bezingi ( or Bezengi ) Wall , a long ridge . eos
is the high point and the eastern anchor of a massif known as the Bezingi ( or Bezengi ) Wall , a long ridge . Shkhara is a large , steep peak in a heavily glaciated region , and Shkhara presents serious challenges to mountaineers . eos
is a large , steep peak in a heavily glaciated region , and Shkhara presents serious challenges to mountaineers . Shkhara North Face ( on the Russian side ) is high and contains several classic difficult routes . The significant subsummit Shkhara West , 5068 m , is a climbing objective in its own right , and a traverse of the entire Bezingi Wall is considered ` ` Europe 's longest , most arduous , and most committing expedition . '' eos
presents serious challenges to mountaineers . Shkhara North Face ( on the Russian side ) is high and contains several classic difficult routes . '' eos
North Face ( on the Russian side ) is high and contains several classic difficult routes . The significant subsummit Shkhara West , 5068 m , is a climbing objective in its own right , and a traverse of the entire Bezingi Wall is considered ` ` Europe 's longest , most arduous , and most committing expedition . '' Shkhara was first climbed in 1888 via the North East Ridge route , by the British / Swiss team of U Almer , J Cockin and C Roth . eos
was first climbed in 1888 via the North East Ridge route , by the British / Swiss team of U Almer , J Cockin and C Roth . This route is still one of the easier and more popular routes on Shkhara . The first complete traverse of the Bezingi Wall was in 1931 , by the Austrians K Poppinger , K Moldan , and S Schintlmeister . eos
. The first complete traverse of the Bezingi Wall was in 1931 , by the Austrians K Poppinger , K Moldan , and S Schintlmeister . Climbing on the Russian side of the massif is facilitated by the presence of the Bezengi Camp , a well - equipped base camp featuring huts , cottages , a library , and a sauna . eos
is climbed by ` ` only a handful of people '' each year , due to Shkhara difficulty , size , and remoteness . eos
difficulty , size , and remoteness . eos
( officially known as the Shota Rustaveli Peak ) is a mountain in the central part of the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range , straddling the border of Svaneti ( Georgia ) and Kabardino - Balkaria ( Russia ) . The elevation of Shota_Rustaveli_Peak is 4,860 meters ( 15,940 ft . ) . Shota_Rustaveli_Peak is generally considered to be the 9th highest peak of the Caucasus . eos
is 4,860 meters ( 15,940 ft . ) . Shota_Rustaveli_Peak is generally considered to be the 9th highest peak of the Caucasus . The slopes of Shota_Rustaveli_Peak are glaciated and some of the glaciers descend well into the adjacent valleys . eos

( also , and perhaps more properly , called Cerro La Negra ) is a companion peak of Mexico 's highest mountain , the Pico de Orizaba . At 4640 m above sea level ( depending on which source one consults ) Sierra_Negra is one of Mexico 's highest peaks , perhaps even the fourth highest . However , because Sierra_Negra is overshadowed by Sierra_Negra much higher companion Sierra_Negra is not as well known as , for instance , the slightly lower Matlalcueitl , and Sierra_Negra is often not included in lists of Mexico 's mountains . eos
is one of Mexico 's highest peaks , perhaps even the fourth highest . However , because Sierra_Negra is overshadowed by Sierra_Negra much higher companion Sierra_Negra is not as well known as , for instance , the slightly lower Matlalcueitl , and Sierra_Negra is often not included in lists of Mexico 's mountains . The summit of Sierra_Negra is the site for one of the world 's premier astronomical instruments , the Large Millimeter Telescope . eos
is overshadowed by Sierra_Negra much higher companion Sierra_Negra is not as well known as , for instance , the slightly lower Matlalcueitl , and Sierra_Negra is often not included in lists of Mexico 's mountains . The summit of Sierra_Negra is the site for one of the world 's premier astronomical instruments , the Large Millimeter Telescope . The service road for this project is claimed to be the highest road in North America . eos

Speakers of Orizaba Nahuatl call Sierra_Negra Istaktepetl ikni ` The Brother ( or Sister ) of the White Mountain ' ( the Pico de Orizaba being , of course , the White Mountain ) . eos

is a massive Pleistocene stratovolcano located immediately southwest of the Antuco volcano , in the Bío - Bío Region of Chile . Sierra_Velluda has two main summits and Sierra_Velluda is the tallest mountain in Laguna del Laja National Park . eos

is the highest point in Belgium , located in the High Fens ( Hautes Fagnes in French ) , at 694 m. Signal_de_Botrange is the top of a broad plateau , and a road crosses Signal_de_Botrange , passing an adjacent café . In 1923 , the six - metre - high Baltia tower was built on Signal_de_Botrange to allow visitors to reach an altitude of 700 m . A stone tower built in 1934 reaches 718 m. eos

( also known as Punta Gnifetti ) ( 4,554 m ) is a peak of the Monte Rosa massif in the Pennine Alps in Italy and Switzerland . Signalkuppe is named after ` the Signal ' , a prominent gendarme atop the east ridge . eos
is named after ` the Signal ' , a prominent gendarme atop the east ridge . The first ascent was by Giovanni Gnifetti , a parish priest from Alagna Valsesia , together with J Farinetti , C Ferraris , C Grober , J and G Giordiano and porters on 9 august 1842 . The highest hut in Europe , the Margherita hut ( named after Italy 's Queen consort Margherita of Savoy ) lies on the summit of Signalkuppe . eos
. Work started in 1890 , supported by the Italian crown , and Queen Margherita opened it in 1893 . The new hut , a high - altitude Faraday Cage , is clad in sheet copper to shield against unwanted electrical fields . eos
, or Skilbrum , is a mountain in the Karakoram range in Northern Areas of Pakistan , approximately 9 km ( 5 mi ) west - southwest of K2 . Skil_Brum lies on the western side of the Godwin - Austen Glacier , roughly opposite Broad Peak . eos
lies on the western side of the Godwin - Austen Glacier , roughly opposite Broad Peak . In 1957 , Marcus Schmuck and Fritz Wintersteller made a flash first ascent of Skil_Brum , in pure Alpine style . Starting from base camp of Broad Peak at 4,950 metres , they camped at 6,060 metres , made the summit the next day , then camped again at 6,060 metres , and then returned to base camp the next morning . eos
, in pure Alpine style . Starting from base camp of Broad Peak at 4,950 metres , they camped at 6,060 metres , made the summit the next day , then camped again at 6,060 metres , and then returned to base camp the next morning . The whole ascent , from base camp to base camp was done in 53 hours , a startlingly short time for a major Himalayan ascent in that era . eos
, or Staircase Peak , is a high peak of the Baltoro Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range . Skyang_Kangri lies on the Pakistan - China border , about 7 km northeast of K2 , the world 's second - highest mountain . The name ` ` Staircase Peak '' refers to the East Ridge , which resembles a giant staircase with five steps . eos
lies on the Pakistan - China border , about 7 km northeast of K2 , the world 's second - highest mountain . The name ` ` Staircase Peak '' refers to the East Ridge , which resembles a giant staircase with five steps . Skyang_Kangri was first attempted by the party of renowned climber and explorer Luigi Amadeo di Savoia , the Duke of the Abruzzi , in 1909 , during an expedition to K2 . eos
was first attempted by the party of renowned climber and explorer Luigi Amadeo di Savoia , the Duke of the Abruzzi , in 1909 , during an expedition to K2 . They attempted the East Ridge , as did a subsequent failed attempt in 1975 , in which one climber died and one had to be evacuated by helicopter . The first ascent was made in 1976 by a Japanese expedition , climbing the East Ridge without major incident . eos
, but reached only about 7,070 metres . According to the Index , there have been no subsequent attempts on Skyang_Kangri . eos

( Manx : Sniaul ) is the highest mountain and the only summit higher than 2000 feet on the Isle of Man . It is said that on a clear day six kingdoms can be seen from the top ( England , Ireland , Scotland , Wales , the Isle of Man and the Kingdom of Heaven itself ) . eos
, and is the highest section of the Snaefell mountain course over which the Isle of Man TT Races are held . There are mountains in Iceland called Snæfell ( note the slightly different spelling ) , including the mountain under the famous Snæfellsjökull glacier . eos
is a stratovolcano with a glacier ( Icelandic : jökull ) covering Snaefellsjoekull summit in western Iceland . The name of Snaefellsjoekull is actually Snæfell , but Snaefellsjoekull is normally called ` ` Snæfellsjökull '' to discern Snaefellsjoekull from two other mountains with this name . Snaefellsjoekull is situated on the most western part of the Snæfellsnes peninsula in Iceland . eos

is situated on the most western part of the Snæfellsnes peninsula in Iceland . Sometimes Snaefellsjoekull may be seen from the city of Reykjavík over the bay of Faxaflói , at a distance of 120 km . Snaefellsjoekull is one of the most famous sites of Iceland , primarily due to the novel Journey to the Center of the Earth ( 1864 ) , by Jules Verne , in which the protagonists find the entrance to a passage leading to the center of the earth on Snaefellsjoekull . eos

Snaefellsjoekull is included in the Snæfellsjökull National Park ( Icelandic : Þjóðgarðurinn Snæfellsjökull ) . eos

is a mountain located on the Continental Divide in the Columbia Icefield of Jasper National Park , on the border between Alberta and British Columbia , Canada . Snow_Dome_Canada was named in 1898 by J Norman Collie because Snow_Dome_Canada snow - capped massif resembles a dome . Snow_Dome_Canada , reaching a height of 3,456 m ( 11,339 ft ) , is a hydrological apex of North America as water from Snow_Dome_Canada flows into rivers that drain into the Pacific Ocean ( via the Columbia River ) , the Arctic Ocean ( via the Athabasca River ) , and Hudson Bay ( via the North Saskatchewan River ) . eos
was named in 1898 by J Norman Collie because Snow_Dome_Canada snow - capped massif resembles a dome . Snow_Dome_Canada , reaching a height of 3,456 m ( 11,339 ft ) , is a hydrological apex of North America as water from Snow_Dome_Canada flows into rivers that drain into the Pacific Ocean ( via the Columbia River ) , the Arctic Ocean ( via the Athabasca River ) , and Hudson Bay ( via the North Saskatchewan River ) . The Dome Glacier flows to the north - east , the Stutfield Glacier to the north - west , the Columbia Glacier to the west and Athabasca Glacier flows to the east of Snow_Dome_Canada . eos
snow - capped massif resembles a dome . is a fourteen thousand foot mountain in the US state of Colorado . Snowmass_Mountain is the thirty - fourth highest mountain peak in the state . Snowmass_Mountain is located in the Elk Mountains , within the Maroon Bells - Snowmass Wilderness of the White River National Forest . eos
is the thirty - fourth highest mountain peak in the state . Snowmass_Mountain is located in the Elk Mountains , within the Maroon Bells - Snowmass Wilderness of the White River National Forest . Snowmass_Mountain lies along the border between Pitkin and Gunnison counties , west of Aspen and southwest of the town of Snowmass Village . eos
is located in the Elk Mountains , within the Maroon Bells - Snowmass Wilderness of the White River National Forest . Snowmass_Mountain lies along the border between Pitkin and Gunnison counties , west of Aspen and southwest of the town of Snowmass Village . Snowmass_Mountain is named for the large snowfield that lies on Snowmass_Mountain eastern slopes . eos
lies along the border between Pitkin and Gunnison counties , west of Aspen and southwest of the town of Snowmass Village . Snowmass_Mountain is named for the large snowfield that lies on Snowmass_Mountain eastern slopes . Snowmass_Mountain should not be confused with the Snowmass ski area , located outside Snowmass Village ; nor with nearby Snowmass Peak , a lower but more visually striking peak that towers over Snowmass Lake . eos
is named for the large snowfield that lies on Snowmass_Mountain eastern slopes . Snowmass_Mountain should not be confused with the Snowmass ski area , located outside Snowmass Village ; nor with nearby Snowmass Peak , a lower but more visually striking peak that towers over Snowmass Lake . Hagerman Peak sits between Snowmass_Mountain and Snowmass Peak and is also often mistaken for Snowmass_Mountain . eos

is a stratovolcano at the border of Argentina and Chile . A large composite complex , Socompa is best known for Socompa large debris avalanche deposit , widely accepted as the best preserved example of this type deposit in the world . Socompa is difficult to reach - either from the north along dirt tracks south of the Miscanti Pass , or from the west via the Escondida copper mine . eos
is best known for Socompa large debris avalanche deposit , widely accepted as the best preserved example of this type deposit in the world . Socompa is difficult to reach - either from the north along dirt tracks south of the Miscanti Pass , or from the west via the Escondida copper mine . Both routes require a full - day 's driving and for any reasonable amount of time to be spent at Socompa would need significant planning . eos
large debris avalanche deposit , widely accepted as the best preserved example of this type deposit in the world . Socompa is difficult to reach - either from the north along dirt tracks south of the Miscanti Pass , or from the west via the Escondida copper mine . Both routes require a full - day 's driving and for any reasonable amount of time to be spent at Socompa would need significant planning . eos
is difficult to reach - either from the north along dirt tracks south of the Miscanti Pass , or from the west via the Escondida copper mine . Both routes require a full - day 's driving and for any reasonable amount of time to be spent at Socompa would need significant planning . The western rim of Socompa borders the Monturaqui Basin , which is draped with the large debris avalanche deposit . eos
would need significant planning . The western rim of Socompa borders the Monturaqui Basin , which is draped with the large debris avalanche deposit . Escondida mining currently has a network of roads covering this area , from beneath which they pump ground water for use at the nearby copper mine . eos

is a peak in the Sierra Nevada in the US state of California , near the southeast end of the Palisades group of peaks . Split_Mountain north summit rises to 14,064 feet ( 4,287 m ) , and is the eighth highest peak in the state . The name Split Mountain , inspired by the shape of Split_Mountain double summit , was first coined by mountaineer Bolton Brown in 1895 . eos
north summit rises to 14,064 feet ( 4,287 m ) , and is the eighth highest peak in the state . The name Split Mountain , inspired by the shape of Split_Mountain double summit , was first coined by mountaineer Bolton Brown in 1895 . Alternately , Split_Mountain has been called Southeast Palisade or South Palisade . eos
double summit , was first coined by mountaineer Bolton Brown in 1895 . Alternately , Split_Mountain has been called Southeast Palisade or South Palisade . The two toned appearance of Split_Mountain eastern face is created by a roof pendant of darker colored granodiorite atop a lighter colored body of leucogranite . eos
has been called Southeast Palisade or South Palisade . The two toned appearance of Split_Mountain eastern face is created by a roof pendant of darker colored granodiorite atop a lighter colored body of leucogranite . Split_Mountain is one of the easier California fourteeners to climb . eos
eastern face is created by a roof pendant of darker colored granodiorite atop a lighter colored body of leucogranite . Split_Mountain is one of the easier California fourteeners to climb . The least technical route is the class 2 north slope , which can be approached from the west or east . eos
is one of the easier California fourteeners to climb . The least technical route is the class 2 north slope , which can be approached from the west or east . Joseph LeConte , Helen LeConte and Curtis Lindley took the simple western approach from Upper Basin when they climbed Split_Mountain on july 23 , 1902 . eos
on july 23 , 1902 . A more common route to the north face is from the east , by way of Red Lake . Starting at the Red Lake trailhead , this trail covers 6 miles ( 10 km ) with 4,000 feet ( 1,220 m ) of elevation gain one way to the lake . eos

is a mountain located in the northeastern section of Kootenay National Park . Stanley_Peak was named in 1901 by Edward Whymper after Frederick Stanley , the sixth governor - general of Canada . Stanley_Peak is visible from the Trans - Canada Highway and Highway 93 . eos
was named in 1901 by Edward Whymper after Frederick Stanley , the sixth governor - general of Canada . Stanley_Peak is visible from the Trans - Canada Highway and Highway 93 . Stanley Glacier on the northeast face of Stanley_Peak can be seen up close by following a hiking trail into a hanging valley between Stanley_Peak and a southern outlier of Storm Mountain . eos
is visible from the Trans - Canada Highway and Highway 93 . Stanley Glacier on the northeast face of Stanley_Peak can be seen up close by following a hiking trail into a hanging valley between Stanley_Peak and a southern outlier of Storm Mountain . Stanley_Peak can be ascended from a scrambling route by late summer but involves much routefinding among the many ledges and gullies on the north face . eos

is located in the Teton Range , Grand Teton National Park , in the US state of Wyoming . Located .48 miles ( .77 km ) southeast of Buck Mountain , the summit is also east of the Alaska Basin Trail , from a point known as Static Peak Divide , the summit can be climbed in a scramble . Below the summit on the north face , a small remnant glacier persists , sheltered from direct sunlight by steep cliffs . eos
( 4,241 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . Stecknadelhorn lies on the Nadelgrat , a high - level ridge running roughly north - south above the resort of Saas Fee to the east , and the Mattertal to the west . Stecknadelhorn was first climbed by Oscar Eckenstein and Matthias Zurbriggen on 8 august 1887 . eos
lies on the Nadelgrat , a high - level ridge running roughly north - south above the resort of Saas Fee to the east , and the Mattertal to the west . Stecknadelhorn was first climbed by Oscar Eckenstein and Matthias Zurbriggen on 8 august 1887 . eos
was first climbed by Oscar Eckenstein and Matthias Zurbriggen on 8 august 1887 . eos
is along the west bank of the Hudson River south of Cornwall - on - Hudson , New York . Storm_King_Mountain distinctive curved ridge is the most prominent aspect of the view south down Newburgh Bay , from Newburgh , Beacon and the Newburgh - Beacon Bridge . Together with Breakneck Ridge on the opposite bank of the river Storm_King_Mountain forms ` ` Wey - Gat '' or Wind Gate , the picturesque northern gateway to the Hudson Highlands . eos
distinctive curved ridge is the most prominent aspect of the view south down Newburgh Bay , from Newburgh , Beacon and the Newburgh - Beacon Bridge . Together with Breakneck Ridge on the opposite bank of the river Storm_King_Mountain forms ` ` Wey - Gat '' or Wind Gate , the picturesque northern gateway to the Hudson Highlands . Storm_King_Mountain can also be seen by southbound travelers on nearby sections of the New York State Thruway . eos
forms ` ` Wey - Gat '' or Wind Gate , the picturesque northern gateway to the Hudson Highlands . Storm_King_Mountain can also be seen by southbound travelers on nearby sections of the New York State Thruway . This view was popular with early artists of the Hudson River School , and helped give them their name . eos
can also be seen by southbound travelers on nearby sections of the New York State Thruway . This view was popular with early artists of the Hudson River School , and helped give them their name . While thought of as the highest in the area , Storm_King_Mountain summit reaching approximately 1,340 feet ( 408 m ) above sea level , the eastern summit unofficially known as Butter Hill is actually higher , at 1,380 feet ( 421 m ) in elevation . eos

( 4,190 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . eos
( in Portuguese , Pão de Açúcar ) , is a peak situated in Rio de Janeiro , Brazil , from the mouth of Guanabara Bay on a peninsula that sticks out into the Atlantic Ocean . Rising 396 m above sea - level , Sugarloaf_Mountain_Brazil name is said to refer to Sugarloaf_Mountain_Brazil resemblance to the traditional shape of concentrated refined loaf sugar . However , it is believed by some that the name actually derives from Pau - nh - acuqua ( ` ` high hill '' ) in the Tupi - Guarani language , as used by the indigenous Tamoios . eos
name is said to refer to Sugarloaf_Mountain_Brazil resemblance to the traditional shape of concentrated refined loaf sugar . However , it is believed by some that the name actually derives from Pau - nh - acuqua ( ` ` high hill '' ) in the Tupi - Guarani language , as used by the indigenous Tamoios . Sugarloaf_Mountain_Brazil is only one of several monolithic morros of granite and quartz that rise straight from the water 's edge around Rio de Janeiro . eos

A glass - paneled cable car ( in popular Portuguese , bondinho - more properly called teleférico ) , capable of holding 75 passengers , runs along a 1400-metre route between the peaks of Babilônia and Urca every half hour . The original cable car line was built in 1912 . eos

is a fourteener in the Needle Mountains , a subrange of the San Juan Mountains in the US state of Colorado . Sunlight_Peak is located in the Weminuche Wilderness ( part of the San Juan National Forest ) in La Plata County approximately 13 miles ( 21 km ) south of Silverton . Sunlight_Peak is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the other two are Mount Eolus and Windom Peak . eos
is located in the Weminuche Wilderness ( part of the San Juan National Forest ) in La Plata County approximately 13 miles ( 21 km ) south of Silverton . Sunlight_Peak is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the other two are Mount Eolus and Windom Peak . Windom and Sunlight lie on the east side of Twin Lakes , in upper Chicago Basin , while Eolus lies on the west side . eos
is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the other two are Mount Eolus and Windom Peak . Windom and Sunlight lie on the east side of Twin Lakes , in upper Chicago Basin , while Eolus lies on the west side . All three peaks are relatively remote by Colorado standards , and have a strong wilderness character ; however they can be popular in summer . eos
is from the south , known as the ` ` Red Couloir '' . It is a non - technical scramble , but achieving the top of the summit block does require an exposed rock climbing move . eos
is a fourteen thousand foot mountain peak in the US state of Colorado . Sunshine_Peak is located in the San Juan Mountains in Hinsdale County approximately 9 miles ( 14 km ) south west of Lake City , and about 1 mi ( 1.6 km ) south of Redcloud Peak . Sunshine_Peak rises on the north side of the Lake Fork of the Gunnison River . eos
is located in the San Juan Mountains in Hinsdale County approximately 9 miles ( 14 km ) south west of Lake City , and about 1 mi ( 1.6 km ) south of Redcloud Peak . Sunshine_Peak rises on the north side of the Lake Fork of the Gunnison River . Sunshine_Peak has the dubious distinction of being the lowest of Colorado 's 54 official fourteeners . eos
rises on the north side of the Lake Fork of the Gunnison River . Sunshine_Peak has the dubious distinction of being the lowest of Colorado 's 54 official fourteeners . Sunshine_Peak is also not particularly independent from Sunshine_Peak higher neighbor Redcloud Peak , with a topographic prominence of 501 ft ( 153 m ) ( the minimum standard for an independent fourteener is 300 ft , or 91 m ) . eos
has the dubious distinction of being the lowest of Colorado 's 54 official fourteeners . Sunshine_Peak is also not particularly independent from Sunshine_Peak higher neighbor Redcloud Peak , with a topographic prominence of 501 ft ( 153 m ) ( the minimum standard for an independent fourteener is 300 ft , or 91 m ) . However Sunshine_Peak has more and steeper local relief than many of the other fourteeners . eos
is also not particularly independent from Sunshine_Peak higher neighbor Redcloud Peak , with a topographic prominence of 501 ft ( 153 m ) ( the minimum standard for an independent fourteener is 300 ft , or 91 m ) . However Sunshine_Peak has more and steeper local relief than many of the other fourteeners . For example , Sunshine_Peak rises 4,450 ft ( 1,356 m ) above the townsite of Sherman to the south in only 1.2 mi ( 2 km ) . eos

( 4,491 m ) is a mountain in the Mischabelhörner group of the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . The first ascent of Taeschhorn was by the Rev. John Llewelyn - Davies and Rev. J W. Hayward with guides Stefan and Johann Zumtaugwald and Peter - Josef Summermatter on 30 july 1862 . eos

( in Persian : تفتان Taftân ) is an eroded stratovolcano in southeastern Iran situated in the Sistan and Baluchestan province . At nearly 4,000 meters ( 13,000 ft ) above sea level , Taftan_volcano is the highest mountain in southeastern Iran . eos
is the highest mountain in southeastern Iran . The nearest city is Khash . Taftan is a Persian word which means ` ` The Place of Heat '' . eos
is an inactive volcano , however sulphurous gases are emitted from fumaroles at Taftan_volcano summit . Taftan_volcano is usually ascended from west side where a well - equipped shelter has been built . There are very strong winds on Taftan_volcano . eos

is located in the Teton Range , Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming , immediately south of Grand Teton . Teepe_Pillar is the seventh highest in the Teton Range . Teepe_Pillar is separated from Grand Teton by a col which drops sharply to the east and west . eos
is the seventh highest in the Teton Range . Teepe_Pillar is separated from Grand Teton by a col which drops sharply to the east and west . Northeast of and well below the summit , the Teepe Glacier is situated in a cirque . eos
is separated from Grand Teton by a col which drops sharply to the east and west . Northeast of and well below the summit , the Teepe Glacier is situated in a cirque . From Jackson Hole , Teepe_Pillar is difficult to observe except from the northeast as Teepe_Pillar is hidden from view by Disappointment Peak . eos
is difficult to observe except from the northeast as Teepe_Pillar is hidden from view by Disappointment Peak . Best access to the summit is by way of Garnet Canyon to the Lower Saddle , a broad plateau which divides Grand Teton from Middle Teton . The summit is easiest to reach when approached from the west , however , true to Teepe_Pillar name , Teepe_Pillar is a steep technical climb from every direction , involving up to 5 pitches at Class 5.4 to reach the summit . eos

is the sixth highest peak in the Teton Range , Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming . The name of Teewinot_Mountain is derived from the Shoshone Native American word meaning ` ` many pinnacles '' . Teewinot_Mountain is immediately northeast of Grand Teton and the two are separated from one another by the Teton Glacier . eos
is derived from the Shoshone Native American word meaning ` ` many pinnacles '' . Teewinot_Mountain is immediately northeast of Grand Teton and the two are separated from one another by the Teton Glacier . Teewinot_Mountain rises more than 5,500 feet ( 1,675 m ) above of Jenny Lake . eos
is immediately northeast of Grand Teton and the two are separated from one another by the Teton Glacier . Teewinot_Mountain rises more than 5,500 feet ( 1,675 m ) above of Jenny Lake . The 40 mile ( 64 km ) long Teton Range is the youngest mountain chain in the Rocky Mountains , and began their uplift 9 million years ago , during the Miocene . eos
rises more than 5,500 feet ( 1,675 m ) above of Jenny Lake . The 40 mile ( 64 km ) long Teton Range is the youngest mountain chain in the Rocky Mountains , and began their uplift 9 million years ago , during the Miocene . Several periods of glaciation have carved Teewinot_Mountain and the other peaks of the range into their current shapes . eos
and the other peaks of the range into their current shapes . Along with a number of other high peaks in the central Teton Range , Teewinot_Mountain is part of what is known as the Cathedral Group , due to the similarity of the peaks to the spires of a cathedral . eos
is part of what is known as the Cathedral Group , due to the similarity of the peaks to the spires of a cathedral . eos
( pronounced ` ` Tay - dee '' ) or Pico del Teide , is a volcano on Tenerife , Canary Islands . Teide and Teide surrounds comprise the Parque Nacional del Teide , an 18900 ha national park that was named a World Heritage Site by UNESCO on june 29th , 2007 . At 3,718 metres ( 12,198 ft ) above sea level , and approximately 7,500 metres ( 25,000 ft ) above the adjacent sea bed , Teide is the highest mountain in Spain and the highest mountain in any Atlantic island . eos
and Teide surrounds comprise the Parque Nacional del Teide , an 18900 ha national park that was named a World Heritage Site by UNESCO on june 29th , 2007 . At 3,718 metres ( 12,198 ft ) above sea level , and approximately 7,500 metres ( 25,000 ft ) above the adjacent sea bed , Teide is the highest mountain in Spain and the highest mountain in any Atlantic island . ( Note : The actual summit stands higher than the triangulation station , and associated bench mark , which has an altitude of 3,715 m ( 12,188 ft ) ) . eos
surrounds comprise the Parque Nacional del Teide , an 18900 ha national park that was named a World Heritage Site by UNESCO on june 29th , 2007 . ( Note : The actual summit stands higher than the triangulation station , and associated bench mark , which has an altitude of 3,715 m ( 12,188 ft ) ) . eos
is the highest mountain in Spain and the highest mountain in any Atlantic island . The island of Tenerife itself is the third largest volcano by volume on Earth , making Tenerife the third largest volcanic island on Earth . eos
is also the third highest volcano on a volcanic ocean island . Due to Teide eruptive history and location close to population centres , Teide has been designated a Decade Volcano worthy of close study to prevent future natural disasters . eos

is the highest point within Death Valley National Park , in the US state of California . Telescope_Peak is also the highest point of the Panamint Range , and Telescope_Peak lies in Inyo County . From atop Telescope_Peak one can see for over one hundred miles in many directions , including west across Panamint Valley to Mount Whitney and the Sierra Nevada in California , and east across the Badwater Basin in Death Valley ( the lowest point in North America ) to Charleston Peak in the Spring Mountains of Nevada . eos
is also the highest point of the Panamint Range , and Telescope_Peak lies in Inyo County . From atop Telescope_Peak one can see for over one hundred miles in many directions , including west across Panamint Valley to Mount Whitney and the Sierra Nevada in California , and east across the Badwater Basin in Death Valley ( the lowest point in North America ) to Charleston Peak in the Spring Mountains of Nevada . Hiking trails from the base to the summit total 7 miles . eos
lies in Inyo County . Hiking trails from the base to the summit total 7 miles . eos
one can see for over one hundred miles in many directions , including west across Panamint Valley to Mount Whitney and the Sierra Nevada in California , and east across the Badwater Basin in Death Valley ( the lowest point in North America ) to Charleston Peak in the Spring Mountains of Nevada . Hiking trails from the base to the summit total 7 miles . Telescope_Peak was named for the great distance visible from the summit . eos
was named for the great distance visible from the summit . Telescope_Peak is also notable for having one of the greatest vertical rises above local terrain of any mountain in the contiguous United States . Telescope_Peak summit rises 11,331 feet ( 3,478 m ) above the floor of Death Valley ( Badwater , -282 ft / -86 m ) in about 15 miles ( 24 km ) , and about 10,000 feet ( 3,050 m ) above the floor of Panamint Valley in about 8 miles ( 13 km ) . eos
is also notable for having one of the greatest vertical rises above local terrain of any mountain in the contiguous United States . Telescope_Peak summit rises 11,331 feet ( 3,478 m ) above the floor of Death Valley ( Badwater , -282 ft / -86 m ) in about 15 miles ( 24 km ) , and about 10,000 feet ( 3,050 m ) above the floor of Panamint Valley in about 8 miles ( 13 km ) . This is comparable to the rises for other large US peaks such as Mount Rainier , Mount Shasta , and Mount San Jacinto . eos

This is comparable to the rises for other large US peaks such as Mount Rainier , Mount Shasta , and Mount San Jacinto . , or Blocksberg , is the highest peak in the Harz Mountains in Germany and also the highest peak of northern Germany ; The_Brocken is located between the rivers Weser and Elbe . Although The_Brocken altitude ( 1,141 metres ) is below alpine dimensions , The_Brocken microclimate resembles that of mountains of 2000 m altitude . The_Brocken tends to have a snow cover from september to May , and mists and fogs shroud The_Brocken up to 300 days of the year . eos
is located between the rivers Weser and Elbe . Although The_Brocken altitude ( 1,141 metres ) is below alpine dimensions , The_Brocken microclimate resembles that of mountains of 2000 m altitude . ( alternatively Terich Mir and Terichmir ) is the highest mountain in the Hindu Kush region of northern Pakistan . Tirich_Mir was first climbed in 1950 by a Norwegian expedition comprised of Arne Næss , P Kvernberg , H Berg , and Tony Streather . Tirich_Mir overlooks Chitral town . eos
was first climbed in 1950 by a Norwegian expedition comprised of Arne Næss , P Kvernberg , H Berg , and Tony Streather . Tirich_Mir overlooks Chitral town . Tirich_Mir can easily be seen from the main bazaar . eos

( 3,238 m ) is a mountain in the Urner Alps of Switzerland . Titlis is located in the canton of Obwalden in Switzerland , overlooking Engelberg and Titlis is famous as the site of the world 's first revolving cable car . The cable car system connects Engelberg to the top through four principal stages ( Gerschnialp , Trübsee , Stand and Kleintitlis ( 3,020 m ) . eos
is located in the canton of Obwalden in Switzerland , overlooking Engelberg and Titlis is famous as the site of the world 's first revolving cable car . The cable car system connects Engelberg to the top through four principal stages ( Gerschnialp , Trübsee , Stand and Kleintitlis ( 3,020 m ) . The last part of cable car way leads above the glacier . eos
is famous as the site of the world 's first revolving cable car . The cable car system connects Engelberg to the top through four principal stages ( Gerschnialp , Trübsee , Stand and Kleintitlis ( 3,020 m ) . The last part of cable car way leads above the glacier . eos
, or Tomurty , is the highest peak in the Karlik Shan , in the far eastern part of the Tien Shan mountain range of Xinjiang , China . While not of great absolute elevation among Chinese peaks , Tomort is well - separated from higher terrain , and hence Tomort has a high topographic prominence . eos
is well - separated from higher terrain , and hence Tomort has a high topographic prominence . Tomort was reconnoitered or attempted in 1996 , 1997 , 2000 , and 2004 , by Chinese and Japanese parties . Tomort first , and to date only , ascent was in 2005 , by a small group from the Alpine Club of the National Defense Academy of Japan , led by Isao Fukura . eos
has a high topographic prominence . Tomort was reconnoitered or attempted in 1996 , 1997 , 2000 , and 2004 , by Chinese and Japanese parties . Tomort first , and to date only , ascent was in 2005 , by a small group from the Alpine Club of the National Defense Academy of Japan , led by Isao Fukura . eos
was reconnoitered or attempted in 1996 , 1997 , 2000 , and 2004 , by Chinese and Japanese parties . Tomort first , and to date only , ascent was in 2005 , by a small group from the Alpine Club of the National Defense Academy of Japan , led by Isao Fukura . They described the summit as a ` ` table - top ice - snow plateau , with glaciers several kilometers long descending on all sides , '' which was reached by ` ` a crevassed glacier and a 50 degree snow / ice face . '' eos

( also known as Tarso Toussidé ) rises 3265 metres above sea level , the westernmost volcano of the Tibesti Mountains . The peak is almost centered within the black shape that has tentacle - shaped lava flows extending down the western flank . Toussidi base measures approximately 55 miles ( 90 km ) in diameter . eos
base measures approximately 55 miles ( 90 km ) in diameter . The light brownish area surrounding the peak shows a distinctive radial drainage pattern that is quite common for stratovolcanoes as the terrain falls away from the main peak . The depression southeast of Toussidi measures approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) in diameter and 3300 feet ( 1000 m ) in depth . eos
measures approximately 5 miles ( 8 km ) in diameter and 3300 feet ( 1000 m ) in depth . The white base is caused by an accumulation of carbonate salts , creating this soda lake of Tibesti . With the exception of small vents that emit gasses and a few hot springs that continue to deposit minerals at the surface of the crater floor , little volcanic activity presently occurs in this region . eos
is the highest point in the Bitterroot Mountains , part of the larger Bitterroot Range in western Montana . Located at approximately 45 ° 53 ' 23.43 N , 114 ° 17 ' 52.11 W , Trapper_Peak_Montana is within the Central Bitterroot subrange of the Bitterroot Mountains and the Selway - Bitterroot Wilderness Area . eos

rises over 6000 ft above the nearby Bitterroot Valley . A trail to Trapper_Peak_Montana climbs from the end of a Forest Service road . eos

is in the northern Teton Range , Grand Teton National Park , Wyoming . Traverse_Peak rises abruptly above Moran Canyon to the south and the North Fork of Snowshoe Canyon to the north . From Moran Bay on Jackson Lake , the south slopes of Traverse_Peak can be seen behind Bivouac Peak rising above Moran Canyon . eos

( 8,020 ft / 2,444 m ) is located in Glacier National Park , Montana , United States . Triple_Divide_Peak is the hydrologic apex of the North American continent . The Continental ( Great ) Divide and the Laurentian Divide meet at the summit of Triple_Divide_Peak , and all water that falls at this point can flow to any of the Pacific , Arctic or the Atlantic Oceans . eos
is the hydrologic apex of the North American continent . The Continental ( Great ) Divide and the Laurentian Divide meet at the summit of Triple_Divide_Peak , and all water that falls at this point can flow to any of the Pacific , Arctic or the Atlantic Oceans . Rainfall on the western side of Triple_Divide_Peak ( after several creeks ) enters the Middle Fork of the Flathead River , which in turn enters the Clark Fork River , Pend Oreille River , and the Columbia River which empties into the Pacific Ocean at Astoria , Oregon . eos
, and all water that falls at this point can flow to any of the Pacific , Arctic or the Atlantic Oceans . Rainfall on the western side of Triple_Divide_Peak ( after several creeks ) enters the Middle Fork of the Flathead River , which in turn enters the Clark Fork River , Pend Oreille River , and the Columbia River which empties into the Pacific Ocean at Astoria , Oregon . Flathead Lake and Lake Pend Oreille are also fed by this system of rivers , as well as some man - made lakes on the Columbia River . eos
( after several creeks ) enters the Middle Fork of the Flathead River , which in turn enters the Clark Fork River , Pend Oreille River , and the Columbia River which empties into the Pacific Ocean at Astoria , Oregon . Flathead Lake and Lake Pend Oreille are also fed by this system of rivers , as well as some man - made lakes on the Columbia River . After several creeks , the northeastern slope of Triple_Divide_Peak sheds water toward St. Mary Lake , which feeds the St. Mary River , which in turn flows into Oldman River , Saskatchewan River , and the Nelson River , which empties into Hudson Bay , This ultimately reaches the Arctic Ocean . eos
sheds water toward St. Mary Lake , which feeds the St. Mary River , which in turn flows into Oldman River , Saskatchewan River , and the Nelson River , which empties into Hudson Bay , This ultimately reaches the Arctic Ocean . Cedar Lake and Lake Winnipeg in Manitoba are also fed by this system of rivers . Moisture on the southeastern slopes feeds into Atlantic Creek , which in turn enter the North Fork of Cut Bank Creek , Marias River , Missouri River , which joins the Mississippi River at Saint Louis , Missouri , before emptying into the Gulf of Mexico near New Orleans . eos
is one of the high peaks of the Hispar Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range in the Northern Areas of Pakistan . Trivor height is often given as 7,728 metres , but this elevation is not consistent with photographic evidence . The height given here is from a Russian 1:100,000 topographic map . eos
height is often given as 7,728 metres , but this elevation is not consistent with photographic evidence . The height given here is from a Russian 1:100,000 topographic map . There have been only two successful climbs of Trivor ; the first ascent was in 1960 by a British - American party . eos
; the first ascent was in 1960 by a British - American party . eos
( more precisely , South Truchas Peak ) is the second highest independent peak in the US State of New Mexico . Truchas_Peak is located in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains , 26 mi ( 42 km ) northeast of Santa Fe . Truchas_Peak lies within the Pecos Wilderness , part of the Santa Fe National Forest . eos
is located in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains , 26 mi ( 42 km ) northeast of Santa Fe . Truchas_Peak lies within the Pecos Wilderness , part of the Santa Fe National Forest . ( The north end of Truchas_Peak borders on the Carson National Forest . ) eos
lies within the Pecos Wilderness , part of the Santa Fe National Forest . ( The north end of Truchas_Peak borders on the Carson National Forest . ) The name of Truchas_Peak is Spanish for ` ` trout '' ( plural ) . eos
borders on the Carson National Forest . ) The name of Truchas_Peak is Spanish for ` ` trout '' ( plural ) . Truchas_Peak is a small north - south trending massif with four indentifiable summits , North Truchas Peak , Middle Truchas Peak , ` ` Medio Truchas Peak '' ( unofficial name ) , and South Truchas Peak , the highest summit . eos
is Spanish for ` ` trout '' ( plural ) . Truchas_Peak is a small north - south trending massif with four indentifiable summits , North Truchas Peak , Middle Truchas Peak , ` ` Medio Truchas Peak '' ( unofficial name ) , and South Truchas Peak , the highest summit . Of the three subsidiary summits , only North Truchas Peak , 13,024 ft ( 3,970 m ) has enough topographic prominence ( about 650 ft/200 m ) to be considered an independent peak . eos
is a small north - south trending massif with four indentifiable summits , North Truchas Peak , Middle Truchas Peak , ` ` Medio Truchas Peak '' ( unofficial name ) , and South Truchas Peak , the highest summit . Of the three subsidiary summits , only North Truchas Peak , 13,024 ft ( 3,970 m ) has enough topographic prominence ( about 650 ft/200 m ) to be considered an independent peak . Truchas_Peak lie on the water divide between the Rio Grande and the Pecos River . eos
lie on the water divide between the Rio Grande and the Pecos River . Truchas_Peak are drained on the west by the Rio Medio , the Rio Quemado , and the Rio de las Trampas ; on the northeast by the Rio Santa Barbara ; and on the southeast by small creeks that quickly run into the upper reaches of the Pecos River . Truchas_Peak also connects to numerous other high peaks in the region , many via the Santa Barbara Divide , a major east - west high ridge which separates the Pecos watershed on the south from the Santa Barbara watershed to the north . eos
are drained on the west by the Rio Medio , the Rio Quemado , and the Rio de las Trampas ; on the northeast by the Rio Santa Barbara ; and on the southeast by small creeks that quickly run into the upper reaches of the Pecos River . Truchas_Peak also connects to numerous other high peaks in the region , many via the Santa Barbara Divide , a major east - west high ridge which separates the Pecos watershed on the south from the Santa Barbara watershed to the north . Truchas_Peak has a true wilderness character , as Truchas_Peak is difficult to access Truchas_Peak within a single day . eos
also connects to numerous other high peaks in the region , many via the Santa Barbara Divide , a major east - west high ridge which separates the Pecos watershed on the south from the Santa Barbara watershed to the north . Truchas_Peak has a true wilderness character , as Truchas_Peak is difficult to access Truchas_Peak within a single day . Many trails access the slopes of Truchas_Peak , most notably the Skyline Trail ( Trail number 251 ) , which traverses the eastern slopes at elevation around 12,000 feet ( 3,660 m ) and accesses the Truchas Lakes , a set of small lakes in a cirque below the south side of North Truchas Peak . eos

is a mountain in the San Juan Mountains of western Colorado in the United States , south of Silverton . Twilight_Peak is adjacent to the Needle Mountains ( Colorado ) . The standard approach is via a trail from Molas Pass to the north . eos

is an active stratovolcano in southwestern Peru . Ubinas is the Peru 's most active volcano . The upper slopes of Ubinas , composed primarily of Pleistocene andesitic lava flows , steepen to nearly 45 degrees . eos
is the Peru 's most active volcano . The upper slopes of Ubinas , composed primarily of Pleistocene andesitic lava flows , steepen to nearly 45 degrees . The steep - walled , 1.4 km wide and 150 m deep summit caldera contains an ash cone with a 500-m - wide funnel - shaped vent that is 200 m deep . eos
, composed primarily of Pleistocene andesitic lava flows , steepen to nearly 45 degrees . The steep - walled , 1.4 km wide and 150 m deep summit caldera contains an ash cone with a 500-m - wide funnel - shaped vent that is 200 m deep . Debris - avalanche deposits from the collapse of the SE flank of Ubinas extend 10 km from Ubinas . eos
extend 10 km from Ubinas . As of april 22 , 2006 , Ubinas is currently active ; emitting ash , smoke , and toxic gases . On april 23 , 2006 , Peru declared a state of emergency in towns near Ubinas . eos

( also Ultar , Ultar II , Bojohagur Duanasir II ) is the southeasternmost major peak of the Batura Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range . Ultar lies about 10 km ( 6 miles ) northeast of the Karimabad , a town on the Karakoram Highway in the Hunza Valley , part of the Gilgit District of the Northern Areas of Pakistan . eos

, also Ulugh Muztag , is an extremely remote mountain group on the Northern Tibet plateau . Ulugh_Muztagh is part of the Kunlun Mountains of Central Asia . For a long time Ulugh_Muztagh elevation was thought to be as high as 7,723 metres , but Ulugh_Muztagh was measured by a 1985 expedition , who established Ulugh_Muztagh true elevation of 6,973 m , which has since been confirmed by SRTM data and modern high resolution Chinese topographic mapping . eos
is part of the Kunlun Mountains of Central Asia . For a long time Ulugh_Muztagh elevation was thought to be as high as 7,723 metres , but Ulugh_Muztagh was measured by a 1985 expedition , who established Ulugh_Muztagh true elevation of 6,973 m , which has since been confirmed by SRTM data and modern high resolution Chinese topographic mapping . The subsidiary West Peak was climbed by a Finnish expedition in 2003 and a height of 6925 meters was confirmed for Ulugh Muztagh II . eos
elevation was thought to be as high as 7,723 metres , but Ulugh_Muztagh was measured by a 1985 expedition , who established Ulugh_Muztagh true elevation of 6,973 m , which has since been confirmed by SRTM data and modern high resolution Chinese topographic mapping . The subsidiary West Peak was climbed by a Finnish expedition in 2003 and a height of 6925 meters was confirmed for Ulugh Muztagh II . The 7,723 metre elevation claim was made by the English country gentleman and explorer Saint George Littledale in 1895 . eos

is the sixth highest mountain peak in the US state of Colorado and Uncompahgre_Peak is the highest peak of the San Juan Mountains . Uncompahgre_Peak is located in the Uncompahgre Wilderness in the northern San Juans , in northern Hinsdale County approximately 7 miles ( 11 km ) west of the town of Lake City . Uncompahgre_Peak has a broad summit plateau , rising about 1500 ft above the broad surrounding alpine basins . eos
is the highest peak of the San Juan Mountains . Uncompahgre_Peak is located in the Uncompahgre Wilderness in the northern San Juans , in northern Hinsdale County approximately 7 miles ( 11 km ) west of the town of Lake City . Uncompahgre_Peak has a broad summit plateau , rising about 1500 ft above the broad surrounding alpine basins . eos
is located in the Uncompahgre Wilderness in the northern San Juans , in northern Hinsdale County approximately 7 miles ( 11 km ) west of the town of Lake City . Uncompahgre_Peak has a broad summit plateau , rising about 1500 ft above the broad surrounding alpine basins . The south , east and west sides are not particularly steep , but the north face boasts a 700 ft cliff . eos
has a broad summit plateau , rising about 1500 ft above the broad surrounding alpine basins . The south , east and west sides are not particularly steep , but the north face boasts a 700 ft cliff . Like all peaks in the San Juan Mountains , Uncompahgre_Peak is of volcanic origin , but Uncompahgre_Peak is not a volcano . eos
is of volcanic origin , but Uncompahgre_Peak is not a volcano . The rock is of poor quality for climbing , precluding an ascent of the north face . The most popular route for climbing Uncompahgre_Peak is Uncompahgre National Forest Service Trail Number 239 , which starts from the end of the Nellie Creek Road , east - southeast of Uncompahgre_Peak . eos
is not a volcano . The rock is of poor quality for climbing , precluding an ascent of the north face . The most popular route for climbing Uncompahgre_Peak is Uncompahgre National Forest Service Trail Number 239 , which starts from the end of the Nellie Creek Road , east - southeast of Uncompahgre_Peak . eos
is Uncompahgre National Forest Service Trail Number 239 , which starts from the end of the Nellie Creek Road , east - southeast of Uncompahgre_Peak . The Nellie Creek Road is a four wheel drive road accessed from the Henson Creek Road , about 4 miles west of Lake City . The trail to the summit is a strenuous hike rising 2919 ft in elevation in about 3.5 mi . eos

is a high peak in the Saint Elias Mountains of Alaska . University_Peak is one of the twenty highest peaks in the United States . University_Peak can be considered a southern outlier of the large massif of Mount Bona . eos
is one of the twenty highest peaks in the United States . University_Peak can be considered a southern outlier of the large massif of Mount Bona . However , University_Peak is a much steeper peak than Bona , and University_Peak presents significant climbing challenges of University_Peak own . eos

is a mountain massif in the Alps , between Berchtesgaden , Germany and Salzburg , Austria . Untersberg is perennially popular with tourists due to Untersberg proximity to the city of Salzburg , less than 16 km ( 10 mi ) to the north of Untersberg and within easy reach by bus . A variety of paths lead to the top , but most people use the cable car that lifts passengers over 1300 m to the Geiereck peak . eos
is perennially popular with tourists due to Untersberg proximity to the city of Salzburg , less than 16 km ( 10 mi ) to the north of Untersberg and within easy reach by bus . A variety of paths lead to the top , but most people use the cable car that lifts passengers over 1300 m to the Geiereck peak . The first recorded ascent of Untersberg was in the first half of the 12th century by Eberwein , a member of the Augustinian monastery at Berchtesgaden . eos

, one of Chile 's most active volcanoes , rises above the lake and town of the same name . Villarrica_volcano is also known as Rucapillán , a Mapuche word meaning ` ` House of the Spirit '' . is the highest mountain of Antarctica , located about 1,200 km ( 750 mi ) from the South Pole . Vinson_Massif is about 21 km ( 13 mi ) long and 13 km ( 8 mi ) wide . The southern end of Vinson_Massif is capped by Mount Craddock ( 4,650 m ) . eos
is about 21 km ( 13 mi ) long and 13 km ( 8 mi ) wide . The southern end of Vinson_Massif is capped by Mount Craddock ( 4,650 m ) . Vinson_Massif is in the Sentinel Range of the Ellsworth Mountains , which stand above the Ronne Ice Shelf near the base of the Antarctic Peninsula . eos
is capped by Mount Craddock ( 4,650 m ) . Vinson_Massif is in the Sentinel Range of the Ellsworth Mountains , which stand above the Ronne Ice Shelf near the base of the Antarctic Peninsula . Vinson_Massif existence was unsuspected until 1957 , when Vinson_Massif was spotted by US Navy aircraft . eos
is in the Sentinel Range of the Ellsworth Mountains , which stand above the Ronne Ice Shelf near the base of the Antarctic Peninsula . Vinson_Massif existence was unsuspected until 1957 , when Vinson_Massif was spotted by US Navy aircraft . Vinson_Massif was named after Carl Vinson ( also the namesake of an aircraft carrier ) , a United States Georgia Congressman who was a key supporter of funding for Antarctic research . eos

( also Volcán de Chiriqui ) is the tallest mountain in Panama and Volcan_Baru is 3474 m high . A dormant volcano just south of the Continental Divide in the western Chiriquí Province , Volcan_Baru is surrounded by a fertile area of cool highlands drained by the Chiriquí and Caldera rivers . The towns of Volcan and Cerro Punta can be found on Volcan_Baru western side , while Boquete is on the eastern flank . eos
is 3474 m high . is large stratovolcano in western Guatemala . Volcan_Tajumulco is the highest mountain in Guatemala and Central America at 4,220 m ( 13,845 feet ) . Volcan_Tajumulco has had several historical reports of volcanic eruptions , but none have been confirmed to be true eruptions . eos
is the highest mountain in Guatemala and Central America at 4,220 m ( 13,845 feet ) . Volcan_Tajumulco has had several historical reports of volcanic eruptions , but none have been confirmed to be true eruptions . eos
has had several historical reports of volcanic eruptions , but none have been confirmed to be true eruptions . eos
( ` ` Volcano of Fire '' ) is an active stratovolcano in Guatemala . Volcan_de_Fuego is close to the city of Antigua Guatemala . Volcan_de_Fuego has erupted frequently since the Spanish conquest . eos
is close to the city of Antigua Guatemala . Volcan_de_Fuego has erupted frequently since the Spanish conquest . Volcan_de_Fuego is famous for being almost constantly active at a low level . eos
has erupted frequently since the Spanish conquest . Volcan_de_Fuego is famous for being almost constantly active at a low level . Smoke issues from Volcan_de_Fuego top daily , but larger eruptions are rare . eos
is famous for being almost constantly active at a low level . Smoke issues from Volcan_de_Fuego top daily , but larger eruptions are rare . On august 9 , 2007 Volcan_de_Fuego erupted spewing lava , rock and ash . eos
top daily , but larger eruptions are rare . On august 9 , 2007 Volcan_de_Fuego erupted spewing lava , rock and ash . Guatemala 's volcanology service reported that seven families were evacuated from their homes near Volcan_de_Fuego . eos

is the third highest mountain in Germany ( Zugspitze is the highest at 2,962 m , Hochwanner the second at 2,746 m ) . The three main peaks ( right side in image ) are Hocheck ( 2651 m ) , Mittelspitze ( Middle Peak , 2,713 m ) and Südspitze ( South Peak , 2,712 m ) . Watzmann also includes the Watzmannfrau ( Watzmann Wife , also known as Kleiner Watzmann or Small Watzmann ) , at 2307 m ( leftmost peak in image ) and the Watzmannkinder ( Watzmann Children ) , five lower peaks in the recess between the main peaks and the Watzmannfrau . eos
also includes the Watzmannfrau ( Watzmann Wife , also known as Kleiner Watzmann or Small Watzmann ) , at 2307 m ( leftmost peak in image ) and the Watzmannkinder ( Watzmann Children ) , five lower peaks in the recess between the main peaks and the Watzmannfrau . The best climbing period is june through september , in some years october . The easiest route is to follow hiking trails from the village of Ramsau near the small town of Berchtesgaden up to the Watzmann Hut at 1,928 metres . eos
( or Palla Bianca in Italian ) is the second highest mountain in the Ötztal Alps and the third highest mountain in Austria . WeissFkugel lies on the border between Austria and Italy . WeissFkugel features many glaciers . eos
lies on the border between Austria and Italy . WeissFkugel features many glaciers . The easiest way to climb WeissFkugel is over the south side of WeissFkugel . eos
features many glaciers . The easiest way to climb WeissFkugel is over the south side of WeissFkugel . WeissFkugel was first climbed in 1850 by JA Specht , Leander Klotz , and Nicodem Klotz . eos
is over the south side of WeissFkugel . WeissFkugel was first climbed in 1850 by JA Specht , Leander Klotz , and Nicodem Klotz . Due to WeissFkugel central location , WeissFkugel has one of the best views in the entire Alps . eos
