( 4,505 m ) is a mountain in the Swiss Alps , west of Zermatt and north of the Matterhorn . Weisshorn was first climbed on 19 august 1861 by John Tyndall with guides J J. Bennen and Ulrich Wenger . The south face was first climbed in 1895 by J M. Biner , A Imboden and E Broome . eos
was first climbed on 19 august 1861 by John Tyndall with guides J J. Bennen and Ulrich Wenger . The south face was first climbed in 1895 by J M. Biner , A Imboden and E Broome . With Weisshorn 4505 m , Weisshorn overtops the illustrious Matterhorn by some 60 m. eos
4505 m , Weisshorn overtops the illustrious Matterhorn by some 60 m. Departing from the Tracuit at 3265 m , you 'll reach the summit via the NW ridge . The first 3 hours consist of relatively easy walking across the glacier and will lead you on top of the Bishorn ( 4153 m ) . eos
overtops the illustrious Matterhorn by some 60 m. Departing from the Tracuit at 3265 m , you 'll reach the summit via the NW ridge . The first 3 hours consist of relatively easy walking across the glacier and will lead you on top of the Bishorn ( 4153 m ) . eos
( 4,023 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland near the village of Saas - Fee . Weissmies was first climbed by Jakob Christian Häusser and Peter Josef Zurbriggen in 1855 via the Triftgrat . The ascent was mired in some controversy as the local guides did not believe that Weissmies could be ascended without their help ; when they themselves ascended to the summit by following Häusser and Zurbriggen 's footprints , they found that the highest point had indeed been reached . eos
was first climbed by Jakob Christian Häusser and Peter Josef Zurbriggen in 1855 via the Triftgrat . The ascent was mired in some controversy as the local guides did not believe that Weissmies could be ascended without their help ; when they themselves ascended to the summit by following Häusser and Zurbriggen 's footprints , they found that the highest point had indeed been reached . The approach to the Trift Glacier / south - west ridge ( Triftgrat ) route can now be made via lift to Hohsaas , which is located virtually at the edge of the glacier . eos
could be ascended without their help ; when they themselves ascended to the summit by following Häusser and Zurbriggen 's footprints , they found that the highest point had indeed been reached . The approach to the Trift Glacier / south - west ridge ( Triftgrat ) route can now be made via lift to Hohsaas , which is located virtually at the edge of the glacier . The ascent from Hohsaas takes about 4 hours and involves slopes to 40 degrees and crevasses . eos
( 3,701 m ) is a mountain in the Swiss Alps close to the village of Grindelwald . Although Wetterhorn was first climbed in 1844 , the ascent by Alfred Wills and party in 1854 is the more celebrated , and is generally regarded to have marked the beginning of the golden age of alpinism . eos
was first climbed in 1844 , the ascent by Alfred Wills and party in 1854 is the more celebrated , and is generally regarded to have marked the beginning of the golden age of alpinism . eos
is a fourteen thousand foot mountain peak in the US state of Colorado . Wetterhorn_Peak is located in the Uncompahgre Wilderness of the northern San Juan Mountains , in northern Hinsdale County , 9 mi east of the town of Ouray . Wetterhorn_Peak lies 2.75 mi west of Uncompahgre Peak . eos
is located in the Uncompahgre Wilderness of the northern San Juan Mountains , in northern Hinsdale County , 9 mi east of the town of Ouray . Wetterhorn_Peak lies 2.75 mi west of Uncompahgre Peak . Wetterhorn_Peak , and Wetterhorn_Peak neighbor Matterhorn Peak , 13590 eos
lies 2.75 mi west of Uncompahgre Peak . Wetterhorn_Peak , and Wetterhorn_Peak neighbor Matterhorn Peak , 13590 ft , are named after the Wetterhorn and the Matterhorn , two famous peaks in the Swiss Alps . eos
, and Wetterhorn_Peak neighbor Matterhorn Peak , 13590 ft , are named after the Wetterhorn and the Matterhorn , two famous peaks in the Swiss Alps . Both Colorado peaks are pointed rock spires ( hence slightly resembling their namesake peaks ) , whose shapes contrast with the broad bulk of the higher Uncompahgre Peak . eos
neighbor Matterhorn Peak , 13590 ft , are named after the Wetterhorn and the Matterhorn , two famous peaks in the Swiss Alps . Both Colorado peaks are pointed rock spires ( hence slightly resembling their namesake peaks ) , whose shapes contrast with the broad bulk of the higher Uncompahgre Peak . eos
was made in 1906 by George Barnard , C Smedley , W P. Smedley , and D Utter , but a previous ascent by miners working in the area in the 19th century is likely . The standard , and only common , route on Wetterhorn_Peak is the southeast ridge , which is accessed via the Matterhorn Creek drainage on the south side of Wetterhorn_Peak . The trailhead is on the Henson Creek Road , accessible from Lake City . eos
is the southeast ridge , which is accessed via the Matterhorn Creek drainage on the south side of Wetterhorn_Peak . The trailhead is on the Henson Creek Road , accessible from Lake City . The route involves 3535 ft of ascent from the trailhead and some exposed scrambling ( Class 3/4 ) on the ridge itself . eos
. The trailhead is on the Henson Creek Road , accessible from Lake City . The route involves 3535 ft of ascent from the trailhead and some exposed scrambling ( Class 3/4 ) on the ridge itself . eos
is the highest peak in the US state of New Mexico , with an elevation of 13,161 feet ( 4,011 m ) . Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico is located in the northern part of the state , northeast of Taos . Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico lies in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains , the southernmost subrange of the Rocky Mountains . eos
is located in the northern part of the state , northeast of Taos . Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico lies in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains , the southernmost subrange of the Rocky Mountains . Named in honor of Major George Montague Wheeler ( 1832 - 1909 ) who for ten years led a party of surveyors and naturalists collecting geologic , biologic , planimetric and topographic data in New Mexico and six other southwestern states . eos
lies in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains , the southernmost subrange of the Rocky Mountains . Named in honor of Major George Montague Wheeler ( 1832 - 1909 ) who for ten years led a party of surveyors and naturalists collecting geologic , biologic , planimetric and topographic data in New Mexico and six other southwestern states . Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico was formerly called Taos Peak , after the nearby town of Taos , New Mexico . eos
was formerly called Taos Peak , after the nearby town of Taos , New Mexico . eos
, or White Mountain Peak , is the highest peak of the White Mountains of the US state of California . White_Mountain_California is also the highest peak in Mono County and the third highest peak in the state , after Mount Whitney and Mount Williamson . White_Mountain_California is the fourteenth most topographically prominent peak in the contiguous United States . eos
is also the highest peak in Mono County and the third highest peak in the state , after Mount Whitney and Mount Williamson . White_Mountain_California is the fourteenth most topographically prominent peak in the contiguous United States . The University of California operates the White Mountain Research Station , comprising three high altitude research stations , on White_Mountain_California : eos
is the fourteenth most topographically prominent peak in the contiguous United States . The University of California operates the White Mountain Research Station , comprising three high altitude research stations , on White_Mountain_California : Crooked Creek Station at 10,200 feet ( 3,100 m ) , Barcroft Station at 12,500 ft ( 3,800 m ) , and a small summit station . eos
: Crooked Creek Station at 10,200 feet ( 3,100 m ) , Barcroft Station at 12,500 ft ( 3,800 m ) , and a small summit station . These stations study the effects of altitude on animal physiology . eos
is California 's easiest fourteener via the jeep road , White_Mountain_California may be the most strenuous via White_Mountain_California western ridge , an 8,150 ft ( 2,500 m ) climb out of Owens Valley via a steep ridge from the end of a rough road . White_Mountain_California is rarely approached from the north where White_Mountain_California is guarded by a narrow arête or knife - edge ridge . A better nontechnical alternative to the jeep road would be to drive as far as possible up Leidy Canyon from Fish Lake Valley , then take a graded cattle trail up the broad ridge to Perry Aiken Flat . eos
may be the most strenuous via White_Mountain_California western ridge , an 8,150 ft ( 2,500 m ) climb out of Owens Valley via a steep ridge from the end of a rough road . A better nontechnical alternative to the jeep road would be to drive as far as possible up Leidy Canyon from Fish Lake Valley , then take a graded cattle trail up the broad ridge to Perry Aiken Flat . eos
is rarely approached from the north where White_Mountain_California is guarded by a narrow arête or knife - edge ridge . A better nontechnical alternative to the jeep road would be to drive as far as possible up Leidy Canyon from Fish Lake Valley , then take a graded cattle trail up the broad ridge to Perry Aiken Flat . From the flats it is an easy traverse south into the cirque of the North Fork , North Branch of Perry Aiken Creek . eos

is a 14,017-foot ( 4,272 m ) mountain peak in the US state of Colorado . Wilson_Peak is located in the Lizard Head Wilderness of the Uncompahgre National Forest , in the southern San Juan Mountains . Wilson_Peak is the highest point in San Miguel County . eos
is located in the Lizard Head Wilderness of the Uncompahgre National Forest , in the southern San Juan Mountains . Wilson_Peak is the highest point in San Miguel County . Wilson_Peak base is accessible by four wheel drive roads 11 miles ( 18 km ) west of Telluride , Colorado . eos
is the highest point in San Miguel County . Wilson_Peak base is accessible by four wheel drive roads 11 miles ( 18 km ) west of Telluride , Colorado . Wilson_Peak is part of a compact range of mountains , the San Miguel Range often considered distinct from the wider San Juan Range . eos
base is accessible by four wheel drive roads 11 miles ( 18 km ) west of Telluride , Colorado . Wilson_Peak is part of a compact range of mountains , the San Miguel Range often considered distinct from the wider San Juan Range . Two additional fourteen thousand foot peaks are within 2 miles ( 3 km ) of Wilson_Peak summit : eos
is part of a compact range of mountains , the San Miguel Range often considered distinct from the wider San Juan Range . Two additional fourteen thousand foot peaks are within 2 miles ( 3 km ) of Wilson_Peak summit : Mount Wilson ( 14,256 feet ( 4,345 m ) ) and El Diente Peak ( 14,159 feet ( 4,316 m ) ) . eos
summit : Mount Wilson ( 14,256 feet ( 4,345 m ) ) and El Diente Peak ( 14,159 feet ( 4,316 m ) ) . Gladstone peak ( 13,913 feet ( 4,241 m ) ) is located on the ridge between Wilson_Peak and Mount Wilson . eos
and Mount Wilson . Also known as the Wilson Massif , the San Miguels are some of the southernmost San Juans . Wilson_Peak is climbed by hundreds each year , primarily in summer months , but winter ascents are not unusual and sometimes serve as the beginning of backcountry skiing descents . eos
is climbed by hundreds each year , primarily in summer months , but winter ascents are not unusual and sometimes serve as the beginning of backcountry skiing descents . Summer ascents of Wilson_Peak are considered Class 3 technical climbs , meaning that scrambling over rock is required ( with hand holds being used for balance ) and ropes typically not employed . The easiest traditional route begins at the end of the Silver Pick Road , climbs south through Silver Pick Basin to the Rock of Ages Saddle ( between Silver Pick and Navajo Basins ) at 13,100 feet ( 3,990 m ) , then east to 13,200 feet ( 4,020 m ) on the saddle between Gladstone and Wilson Peaks , then finally northeast to the summit . eos
are considered Class 3 technical climbs , meaning that scrambling over rock is required ( with hand holds being used for balance ) and ropes typically not employed . The easiest traditional route begins at the end of the Silver Pick Road , climbs south through Silver Pick Basin to the Rock of Ages Saddle ( between Silver Pick and Navajo Basins ) at 13,100 feet ( 3,990 m ) , then east to 13,200 feet ( 4,020 m ) on the saddle between Gladstone and Wilson Peaks , then finally northeast to the summit . Round trip distance is 8 miles ( 13 km ) . eos
is the highest point in the southern end of the Wind River Range which is located in the US state of Wyoming . Wind_River_Peak straddles the Continental Divide and Wind_River_Peak is surrounded by National Forest lands . The west slopes are in the Bridger Wilderness of Bridger - Teton National Forest , while the east side is in the Popo Agie Wilderness of Shoshone National Forest . eos

is a fourteener in the Needle Mountains , a subrange of the San Juan Mountains in the US state of Colorado . Windom_Peak is located in the Weminuche Wilderness ( part of the San Juan National Forest ) in La Plata County approximately 13 miles ( 21 km ) south of Silverton . Windom_Peak is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the other two are Mount Eolus and Sunlight Peak . eos
is located in the Weminuche Wilderness ( part of the San Juan National Forest ) in La Plata County approximately 13 miles ( 21 km ) south of Silverton . Windom_Peak is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the other two are Mount Eolus and Sunlight Peak . Windom and Sunlight lie on the east side of Twin Lakes , in upper Chicago Basin , while Eolus lies on the west side . eos
is one of three fourteeners in the Needle Mountains ; the other two are Mount Eolus and Sunlight Peak . Windom and Sunlight lie on the east side of Twin Lakes , in upper Chicago Basin , while Eolus lies on the west side . All three peaks are relatively remote by Colorado standards , and have a strong wilderness character ; however they can be popular in summer . eos
, or Snow Lotus Peak , is one of the major mountains of the Tian Shan mountain range . Xuelian_Feng lies in Xinjiang province , China , about 50 km east - northeast of Jengish Chokusu , the highest peak in the range . Xuelian_Feng is notable for Xuelian_Feng large , steep relief above the nearby valleys , and for Xuelian_Feng large topographic prominence . eos
lies in Xinjiang province , China , about 50 km east - northeast of Jengish Chokusu , the highest peak in the range . Xuelian_Feng is notable for Xuelian_Feng large , steep relief above the nearby valleys , and for Xuelian_Feng large topographic prominence . ( Xuelian_Feng is ranked 84th in the world by this measure ) . eos
is notable for Xuelian_Feng large , steep relief above the nearby valleys , and for Xuelian_Feng large topographic prominence . ( Xuelian_Feng is ranked 84th in the world by this measure ) . Xuelian_Feng has two summits , with the main being the north summit ; the south summit has an elevation of 6527 m. eos

is ranked 84th in the world by this measure ) . Xuelian_Feng has two summits , with the main being the north summit ; the south summit has an elevation of 6527 m. The Tokai Section of the Japanese Alpine Club made four expeditions to Xuelian_Feng , in 1986 , 1988 , 1989 , and 1990 , with the last being successful in ascending the main summit . eos
has two summits , with the main being the north summit ; the south summit has an elevation of 6527 m. ( The 1989 expedition ascended the south summit and ` ` Junction Peak '' , another subpeak to the south of the main summit , with elevation 6450 m , and came close to but did not reach the main summit . eos

or Nevado Yerupaja is a mountain of the Cordillera Huayhuash in north central Peru , part of the Andes . At 6,635 m ( other sources : 6,617 m ) Yerupaja is the second highest in Peru and the highest in the Cordillera Huayhuash . The summit was first reached in 1950 by Jim Maxwell and Dave Harrah , and Yerupaja northern peak ( Yerupaja Norte ) in 1968 by the Wellingtonian Roger Bates and Graeme Dingle . eos
is the second highest in Peru and the highest in the Cordillera Huayhuash . The summit was first reached in 1950 by Jim Maxwell and Dave Harrah , and Yerupaja northern peak ( Yerupaja Norte ) in 1968 by the Wellingtonian Roger Bates and Graeme Dingle . Yerupaja local name is El Carnicero , which means Butcher . eos
northern peak ( Yerupaja Norte ) in 1968 by the Wellingtonian Roger Bates and Graeme Dingle . Yerupaja local name is El Carnicero , which means Butcher . This name refers to the knife - edge - sharpness of Yerupaja summit ridge . eos
local name is El Carnicero , which means Butcher . This name refers to the knife - edge - sharpness of Yerupaja summit ridge . Many visitors consider Yerupaja to be the most spectacular peak in South America . eos
summit ridge . Many visitors consider Yerupaja to be the most spectacular peak in South America . There have been only a few successful ascents of Yerupaja because Yerupaja is one of the hardest Andean high peaks to climb . eos
to be the most spectacular peak in South America . There have been only a few successful ascents of Yerupaja because Yerupaja is one of the hardest Andean high peaks to climb . The most popular route is the southwest face . eos
because Yerupaja is one of the hardest Andean high peaks to climb . The most popular route is the southwest face . The approach is normally made from Huaraz southwards via Chiquián and Jahuacocha . eos
is one of the hardest Andean high peaks to climb . The most popular route is the southwest face . The approach is normally made from Huaraz southwards via Chiquián and Jahuacocha . eos
( 4,221 m ) is a mountain in the Pennine Alps in Switzerland . The first ascent was by Leslie Stephen and Florence Crauford Grove with guides Jakob Anderegg and Melchior Anderegg on 22 august 1864 via the north ridge ( AD ) . Stephen wrote later that it was ` the nastiest piece of climbing I have ever accomplished ' . eos
was first climbed Zinalrothorn was known locally as Moming . The normal route , the south - east ridge , was first climbed by the combined parties of Clinton Thomas Dent with guide Alexander Burgener , and George Augustus Passingham , with guides Ferdinand Imseng and Franz Andermatten on 5 september 1872 . The first winter and ski ascent was by Marcel Kurz and T Theytaz on 7 february 1914 . eos
was known locally as Moming . The normal route , the south - east ridge , was first climbed by the combined parties of Clinton Thomas Dent with guide Alexander Burgener , and George Augustus Passingham , with guides Ferdinand Imseng and Franz Andermatten on 5 september 1872 . The first winter and ski ascent was by Marcel Kurz and T Theytaz on 7 february 1914 . eos
is the highest mountain in Germany . Zugspitze is located at the Austrian border in the town of Grainau of the district of Garmisch - Partenkirchen , Bavaria . On the Austrian side is the town of Ehrwald in the district of Reutte , Tyrol . eos
is located at the Austrian border in the town of Grainau of the district of Garmisch - Partenkirchen , Bavaria . On the Austrian side is the town of Ehrwald in the district of Reutte , Tyrol . There is a cog railway ( Zugspitzbahn ) leading from the tourist resort of Garmisch - Partenkirchen to the peak . eos
at the Eibsee ( Eibsee Aerial Tramway ) , and the other ascends from Austria ( Tiroler Zugspitzbahn ) . The peak is regularly crowded with tourists . For those wishing to reach the summit under their own power , various hiking and ski trails can also be followed to the top . eos
is a popular skiing destination , with several slopes on both sides . The Zugspitzplatt is the highest ski resort of Germany and thus has enough snow all winter . The border between Germany and Austria goes right through Zugspitze . eos
. There used to be a border checkpoint at the summit . But since Germany and Austria are now both part of the Schengen zone , the border crossing is no longer staffed . eos
belongs to the Wetterstein range in the northern Kalkalpen . Zugspitze gets Zugspitze name from the many avalanches ( Lawinenzüge in German ) on Zugspitze steep north slopes . At Zugspitze summit is the Münchner Haus , an Alpenvereinshütte , a facility built by the Deutscher Alpenverein . eos
gets Zugspitze name from the many avalanches ( Lawinenzüge in German ) on Zugspitze steep north slopes . At Zugspitze summit is the Münchner Haus , an Alpenvereinshütte , a facility built by the Deutscher Alpenverein . For more than a hundred years now , the summit has also had a weather station , which nowadays also gathers data for the Global Atmosphere Watch . eos
name from the many avalanches ( Lawinenzüge in German ) on Zugspitze steep north slopes . At Zugspitze summit is the Münchner Haus , an Alpenvereinshütte , a facility built by the Deutscher Alpenverein . For more than a hundred years now , the summit has also had a weather station , which nowadays also gathers data for the Global Atmosphere Watch . eos
steep north slopes . At Zugspitze summit is the Münchner Haus , an Alpenvereinshütte , a facility built by the Deutscher Alpenverein . For more than a hundred years now , the summit has also had a weather station , which nowadays also gathers data for the Global Atmosphere Watch . eos
summit is the Münchner Haus , an Alpenvereinshütte , a facility built by the Deutscher Alpenverein . For more than a hundred years now , the summit has also had a weather station , which nowadays also gathers data for the Global Atmosphere Watch . Shortly after WW II the USA military took over the Schneefernerhaus ( as the hotel at the top was then called ) for the exclusive use of USA military and civilian employees . eos
over 50 years earlier , according to a 1770 map discovered by the Alpenverein . On 7 january 1882 the first successful winter assault on Zugspitze was accomplished by F Kilger , H and J Zametzer and H Schwaiger . Climbing up Zugspitze can involve several routes . eos
was accomplished by F Kilger , H and J Zametzer and H Schwaiger . Climbing up Zugspitze can involve several routes . The difference in elevation between Garmisch - Partenkirchen and the summit is 2 200 m , making the climb a challenge even for trained mountaineers . eos
can involve several routes . The difference in elevation between Garmisch - Partenkirchen and the summit is 2 200 m , making the climb a challenge even for trained mountaineers . On the German side , from Garmisch - Partenkirchen , climbers go either through the Höllental ( ` ` Valley of Hell '' ) or the Reintal . eos
exact height was a matter of debate for quite a while . Given figures ranged from 2 960 m to 2 970 m , but it is now generally accepted that the peak is 2 962 m above sea level as a result of a survey carried out by the Bavarian land survey office . The lounge at the new café is named ` ` 2962 '' for this reason . eos
( Punta Zumstein in Italian ) ( 4,563 m ) is a peak of the Monte Rosa massif in the Pennine Alps in Italy and Switzerland . Zumsteinspitze lies between the Dufourspitze ( to which Zumsteinspitze is joined by the Grenzsattel ) and the Signalkuppe ( to which Zumsteinspitze is joined by the Colle Gnifetti ) . eos
lies between the Dufourspitze ( to which Zumsteinspitze is joined by the Grenzsattel ) and the Signalkuppe ( to which Zumsteinspitze is joined by the Colle Gnifetti ) . Zumsteinspitze is named after Zumsteinspitze first recorded ascentionist , Joseph Zumstein , a forest inspector from Valsesia , who climbed Zumsteinspitze with a large party on 1 august 1820 . Zumsteinspitze was the first of the peaks of Monte Rosa to be climbed . eos
is joined by the Grenzsattel ) and the Signalkuppe ( to which Zumsteinspitze is joined by the Colle Gnifetti ) . Zumsteinspitze is named after Zumsteinspitze first recorded ascentionist , Joseph Zumstein , a forest inspector from Valsesia , who climbed Zumsteinspitze with a large party on 1 august 1820 . Zumsteinspitze was the first of the peaks of Monte Rosa to be climbed . The first winter ascent was by E Allegra and guides on 30 march 1902 . eos

( Persian : عبدالكريم سروش ) or Dr. Abdulkarim Soroush ( 1945 - ) is a leading Iranian thinker , philosopher , reformer and Rumi scholar . eos
, FRSE , ( baptised and probably born june 5 , 1723 OS ( june 16 NS ) - july 17 , 1790 ) was a Scottish political economist and moral philosopher . Adam_Smith Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations was one of the earliest attempts to study the historical development of industry and commerce in Europe . That work helped to create the modern academic discipline of economics and provided one of the best - known intellectual rationales for free trade , capitalism , and libertarianism . eos
Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations was one of the earliest attempts to study the historical development of industry and commerce in Europe . That work helped to create the modern academic discipline of economics and provided one of the best - known intellectual rationales for free trade , capitalism , and libertarianism . eos
( april 20 , 1889 - april 30 , 1945 ) was Chancellor of Germany from 1933 , and ` ` Führer '' ( leader ) of Germany from 1934 until Adolf_Hitler death . Adolf_Hitler was leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party ( Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei or NSDAP ) , better known as the Nazi Party . Adolf_Hitler gained power in a Germany facing crisis after World War I , using charismatic oratory and propaganda , appealing to economic need of the lower and middle classes , nationalism , anti - Semitism and anti - communism to establish a totalitarian or fascist dictatorship . eos
death . Adolf_Hitler was leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party ( Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei or NSDAP ) , better known as the Nazi Party . Adolf_Hitler gained power in a Germany facing crisis after World War I , using charismatic oratory and propaganda , appealing to economic need of the lower and middle classes , nationalism , anti - Semitism and anti - communism to establish a totalitarian or fascist dictatorship . eos
was leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party ( Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei or NSDAP ) , better known as the Nazi Party . Adolf_Hitler gained power in a Germany facing crisis after World War I , using charismatic oratory and propaganda , appealing to economic need of the lower and middle classes , nationalism , anti - Semitism and anti - communism to establish a totalitarian or fascist dictatorship . With a restructured economy and rearmed military , Adolf_Hitler pursued an aggressive foreign policy with the intention of expanding German Lebensraum ( ` ` living space '' ) , which triggered World War II when Germany invaded Poland . eos
gained power in a Germany facing crisis after World War I , using charismatic oratory and propaganda , appealing to economic need of the lower and middle classes , nationalism , anti - Semitism and anti - communism to establish a totalitarian or fascist dictatorship . With a restructured economy and rearmed military , Adolf_Hitler pursued an aggressive foreign policy with the intention of expanding German Lebensraum ( ` ` living space '' ) , which triggered World War II when Germany invaded Poland . At the height of its power , Nazi Germany occupied most of Europe , but it and the Axis Powers were eventually defeated by the Allies . eos
pursued an aggressive foreign policy with the intention of expanding German Lebensraum ( ` ` living space '' ) , which triggered World War II when Germany invaded Poland . At the height of its power , Nazi Germany occupied most of Europe , but it and the Axis Powers were eventually defeated by the Allies . By then , Adolf_Hitler racial policies had culminated in a genocide of approximately eleven million people , including about six million Jews , in what is now known as the Holocaust . eos
racial policies had culminated in a genocide of approximately eleven million people , including about six million Jews , in what is now known as the Holocaust . In the final days of the war , Adolf_Hitler committed suicide in Adolf_Hitler underground bunker in Berlin with Adolf_Hitler newlywed wife , Eva Braun . Since the end of World War II , Adolf_Hitler has been regarded in most of the world as synonymous with evil , and portrayals of Adolf_Hitler have been nearly universally condemnatory . eos

( born in Paris on june 30 1949 ) is a French essayist , and only son of a Jewish Polish artisan manufacturing fine leather goods who was deported to Auschwitz . Alain_Finkielkraut currently teaches at the École polytechnique , an elite engineering college , as professor of the ` ` history of ideas '' in the department of humanities and social sciences . Author of a number of books , Alain_Finkielkraut is among France 's cohort of public intellectuals who appear regularly on talk shows and publish columns in the French media , in Alain_Finkielkraut case from what in France is known as a humanist standpoint . eos

, OBE ( june 23 , 1912 - june 7 , 1954 ) , was an English mathematician , logician , and cryptographer . Alan_Turing is often considered to be the father ! of modern computer science . Alan_Turing provided an influential formalisation of the concept of the algorithm and computation with the Turing machine , formulating the now widely accepted ` ` Turing '' version of the Church - Turing thesis , namely that any practical computing model has either the equivalent or a subset of the capabilities of a Turing machine . eos
is often considered to be the father ! of modern computer science . Alan_Turing provided an influential formalisation of the concept of the algorithm and computation with the Turing machine , formulating the now widely accepted ` ` Turing '' version of the Church - Turing thesis , namely that any practical computing model has either the equivalent or a subset of the capabilities of a Turing machine . With the Turing test , Alan_Turing made a significant and characteristically provocative contribution to the debate regarding artificial intelligence : whether it will ever be possible to say that a machine is conscious and can think . eos
provided an influential formalisation of the concept of the algorithm and computation with the Turing machine , formulating the now widely accepted ` ` Turing '' version of the Church - Turing thesis , namely that any practical computing model has either the equivalent or a subset of the capabilities of a Turing machine . With the Turing test , Alan_Turing made a significant and characteristically provocative contribution to the debate regarding artificial intelligence : whether it will ever be possible to say that a machine is conscious and can think . During World War II , Alan_Turing worked at Bletchley Park , Britain 's codebreaking centre , and Alan_Turing was for a time head of Hut 8 , the section responsible for German Naval cryptanalysis . eos
made a significant and characteristically provocative contribution to the debate regarding artificial intelligence : whether it will ever be possible to say that a machine is conscious and can think . During World War II , Alan_Turing worked at Bletchley Park , Britain 's codebreaking centre , and Alan_Turing was for a time head of Hut 8 , the section responsible for German Naval cryptanalysis . Alan_Turing devised a number of techniques for breaking German ciphers , including the method of the bombe , an electromechanical machine which could find settings for the Enigma machine . eos
worked at Bletchley Park , Britain 's codebreaking centre , and Alan_Turing was for a time head of Hut 8 , the section responsible for German Naval cryptanalysis . Alan_Turing devised a number of techniques for breaking German ciphers , including the method of the bombe , an electromechanical machine which could find settings for the Enigma machine . After the war , Alan_Turing worked at the National Physical Laboratory , creating one of the first designs for a stored - program computer , although it was never actually built . eos

In 1947 Alan_Turing moved to the University of Manchester to work , largely on software , on the Manchester Mark eos
worked at the National Physical Laboratory , creating one of the first designs for a stored - program computer , although it was never actually built . In 1947 Alan_Turing moved to the University of Manchester to work , largely on software , on the Manchester Mark I then emerging as one of the world 's earliest true computers . eos
moved to the University of Manchester to work , largely on software , on the Manchester Mark I then emerging as one of the world 's earliest true computers . In 1952 , Alan_Turing was convicted of ` ` acts of gross indecency '' after admitting to a sexual relationship with a man in Manchester . eos
was convicted of ` ` acts of gross indecency '' after admitting to a sexual relationship with a man in Manchester . Alan_Turing was placed on probation and required to undergo hormone therapy . Alan_Turing died after eating an apple laced with cyanide in 1954 , sixteen days short of Alan_Turing 42nd birthday . eos

( German pronunciation ) ( march 14 , 1879 - april 18 , 1955 ) was a German - born theoretical physicist widely regarded as one of the greatest physicists of all time . Albert_Einstein formulated the special and general theories of relativity . In addition , Albert_Einstein made significant advancements to quantum theory and statistical mechanics . eos
formulated the special and general theories of relativity . In addition , Albert_Einstein made significant advancements to quantum theory and statistical mechanics . While best known for the Theory of Relativity ( and specifically mass - energy equivalence , E = mc ^ 2 ) , Albert_Einstein was awarded the 1921 Nobel Prize for Physics for Albert_Einstein 1905 ( Albert_Einstein ` ` wonderful year '' or ` ` miraculous year '' ) explanation of the photoelectric effect and ` ` for his services to Theoretical Physics '' . eos
made significant advancements to quantum theory and statistical mechanics . While best known for the Theory of Relativity ( and specifically mass - energy equivalence , E = mc ^ 2 ) , Albert_Einstein was awarded the 1921 Nobel Prize for Physics for Albert_Einstein 1905 ( Albert_Einstein ` ` wonderful year '' or ` ` miraculous year '' ) explanation of the photoelectric effect and ` ` for his services to Theoretical Physics '' . In popular culture , the name ` ` Einstein '' has become synonymous with great intelligence and genius . eos
was awarded the 1921 Nobel Prize for Physics for Albert_Einstein 1905 ( Albert_Einstein ` ` wonderful year '' or ` ` miraculous year '' ) explanation of the photoelectric effect and ` ` for his services to Theoretical Physics '' . In popular culture , the name ` ` Einstein '' has become synonymous with great intelligence and genius . Among Albert_Einstein many investigations were : capillary action , Albert_Einstein special theory of relativity which stemmed from an attempt to reconcile the laws of mechanics with the laws of the electromagnetic field , Albert_Einstein general theory of relativity which extended the principle of relativity to include gravitation , relativistic cosmology , critical opalescence , classical problems of statistical mechanics and problems in which they were merged with quantum theory , including an explanation of the Brownian movement of molecules , atomic transition probabilities , criticism of the probabilistic interpretation of quantum theory , the quantum theory of a monatomic gas , the thermal properties of light with a low radiation density which laid the foundation of the photon theory of light , the theory of radiation , including stimulated emission ; the construction of a unified field theory , and the geometrization of physics . eos
1905 ( Albert_Einstein ` ` wonderful year '' or ` ` miraculous year '' ) explanation of the photoelectric effect and ` ` for his services to Theoretical Physics '' . , born Edward Alexander Crowley , ( 12 october 1875 - 1 december 1947 ; the surname is pronounced / "" IPA : ` krəʊli "" / ie with the first syllable sounding like the bird ) was an English occultist , prolific writer , mystic , hedonist , aficionado of chess and mountain climbing , and sexual revolutionary . Aleister_Crowley claimed to be a Freemason , but the legitimacy of Aleister_Crowley claims have been disputed . eos
claimed to be a Freemason , but the legitimacy of Aleister_Crowley claims have been disputed . Other interests and accomplishments were wide - ranging - Aleister_Crowley was a chess master , mountain climber , poet , painter , astrologer , drug experimenter , and social critic . eos
claims have been disputed . Other interests and accomplishments were wide - ranging - Aleister_Crowley was a chess master , mountain climber , poet , painter , astrologer , drug experimenter , and social critic . eos

Aleister_Crowley is perhaps best known today for Aleister_Crowley occult writings , especially The Book of the Law , the central sacred text of Thelema . Aleister_Crowley was also an influential member in several occult organizations , including the Golden Dawn , the A ∴ A ∴ ( Argenteum Astrum ) , and Ordo Templi Orientis ( OTO ) . eos

( 6 august 1881 - 11 march 1955 ) was a Scottish biologist and pharmacologist . Alexander_Fleming published many articles on bacteriology , immunology , and chemotherapy . Alexander_Fleming best - known achievements are the discovery of the enzyme lysozyme in 1922 and isolation of the antibiotic substance penicillin from the fungus Penicillium notatum in 1928 , for which Alexander_Fleming shared a Nobel Prize with Florey and Chain . . eos

( march 3 , 1847 - august 2 , 1922 ) was a Scottish scientist and inventor Alexander_Graham_Bell emigrated to Canada . Today , Alexander_Graham_Bell is widely considered as one of the foremost developers of the telephone , together with Antonio Meucci , inventor of the first telephone prototype , and Philipp Reis . Six years after having obtained Alexander_Graham_Bell telephone patent Alexander_Graham_Bell became a naturalized citizen of the United States . eos

In addition to Alexander_Graham_Bell work in telecommunications technology , Alexander_Graham_Bell was responsible for important advances in aviation and hydrofoil technology . eos

( born february 24 1933 in Mombasa , Kenya ) is a world - renowned academic and political writer on African and Islamic studies . Ali_Mazrui views are broadly similar to many other Anglophile Muslims such as India 's Syed Ali Khan . Ali_Mazrui obtained Ali_Mazrui BA with Distinction from Manchester University in Great Britain , Ali_Mazrui MA from Columbia University in New York , and Ali_Mazrui doctorate from Oxford University . eos
views are broadly similar to many other Anglophile Muslims such as India 's Syed Ali Khan . Ali_Mazrui obtained Ali_Mazrui BA with Distinction from Manchester University in Great Britain , Ali_Mazrui MA from Columbia University in New York , and Ali_Mazrui doctorate from Oxford University . Upon completing Ali_Mazrui education at Oxford University , Ali_Mazrui joined the faculty of Makerere University ( Kampala , Uganda ) , where Ali_Mazrui served as head of the Department of Political Science and Dean of the Faculty of Social Sciences . eos
obtained Ali_Mazrui BA with Distinction from Manchester University in Great Britain , Ali_Mazrui MA from Columbia University in New York , and Ali_Mazrui doctorate from Oxford University . Upon completing Ali_Mazrui education at Oxford University , Ali_Mazrui joined the faculty of Makerere University ( Kampala , Uganda ) , where Ali_Mazrui served as head of the Department of Political Science and Dean of the Faculty of Social Sciences . Ali_Mazrui served at Makerere University until 1973 , when Ali_Mazrui was forced into exile by Idi Amin . eos

joined the faculty of the University of Michigan as professor and later Ali_Mazrui was appointed the Director of the Center for Afroamerican and African Studies ( 1978 - 198l ) . In 1989 , Ali_Mazrui was appointed to the faculty of Binghamton University , State University of New York as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) . In addition to Ali_Mazrui appointments as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities , Professor in Political Science , African Studies , Philosophy , Interpretation and Culture and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) , Ali_Mazrui also holds three concurrent faculty appointments as Albert Luthuli Professor - at - Large in the Humanities and Development Studies at the University of Jos in Nigeria , Andrew D White Professor - at - Large Emeritus and Senior Scholar in Africana Studies at Cornell University and Chancellor of the Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology , Nairobi , Kenya . eos
was appointed the Director of the Center for Afroamerican and African Studies ( 1978 - 198l ) . In 1989 , Ali_Mazrui was appointed to the faculty of Binghamton University , State University of New York as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) . In addition to Ali_Mazrui appointments as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities , Professor in Political Science , African Studies , Philosophy , Interpretation and Culture and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) , Ali_Mazrui also holds three concurrent faculty appointments as Albert Luthuli Professor - at - Large in the Humanities and Development Studies at the University of Jos in Nigeria , Andrew D White Professor - at - Large Emeritus and Senior Scholar in Africana Studies at Cornell University and Chancellor of the Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology , Nairobi , Kenya . eos
was appointed to the faculty of Binghamton University , State University of New York as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) . In addition to Ali_Mazrui appointments as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities , Professor in Political Science , African Studies , Philosophy , Interpretation and Culture and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) , Ali_Mazrui also holds three concurrent faculty appointments as Albert Luthuli Professor - at - Large in the Humanities and Development Studies at the University of Jos in Nigeria , Andrew D White Professor - at - Large Emeritus and Senior Scholar in Africana Studies at Cornell University and Chancellor of the Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology , Nairobi , Kenya . In 1999 , Ali_Mazrui retired as the inaugural Walter Rodney Professor at the University of Guyana , Georgetown , Guyana . eos
appointments as the Albert Schweitzer Professor in the Humanities , Professor in Political Science , African Studies , Philosophy , Interpretation and Culture and the Director of the Institute of Global Cultural Studies ( IGCS ) , Ali_Mazrui also holds three concurrent faculty appointments as Albert Luthuli Professor - at - Large in the Humanities and Development Studies at the University of Jos in Nigeria , Andrew D White Professor - at - Large Emeritus and Senior Scholar in Africana Studies at Cornell University and Chancellor of the Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology , Nairobi , Kenya . In 1999 , Ali_Mazrui retired as the inaugural Walter Rodney Professor at the University of Guyana , Georgetown , Guyana . Ali_Mazrui has also been a Visiting Scholar at Stanford University , The University of Chicago , Colgate University , McGill University , National University of Singapore , Oxford University , Harvard University , Bridgewater State College , Ohio State University , and at other institutions in Cairo , Australia , Leeds , Nairobi , Teheran , Denver , London , Baghdad , and Sussex amongst others . eos

, Baron Giddens ( born january 18 , 1938 ) is a British sociologist Anthony_Giddens is renowned for Anthony_Giddens theory of structuration and Anthony_Giddens holistic view of modern societies . Anthony_Giddens is considered to be one of the most prominent modern contributors in the field of sociology , the author of at least 34 books , published in at least 29 languages , issuing on average more than one book every year . Anthony_Giddens has been described as Britain 's best known social scientist since John Maynard Keynes . eos

is considered to be one of the most prominent modern contributors in the field of sociology , the author of at least 34 books , published in at least 29 languages , issuing on average more than one book every year . Anthony_Giddens has been described as Britain 's best known social scientist since John Maynard Keynes . Three notable stages can be identified in Anthony_Giddens academic life . eos
has been described as Britain 's best known social scientist since John Maynard Keynes . Three notable stages can be identified in Anthony_Giddens academic life . The first one involved outlining a new vision of what sociology is , presenting a theoretical and methodological understanding of that field , based on a critical reinterpretation of the classics . eos
academic life . The first one involved outlining a new vision of what sociology is , presenting a theoretical and methodological understanding of that field , based on a critical reinterpretation of the classics . Anthony_Giddens major publications of that era include Capitalism and Modern Social Theory ( 1971 ) and New Rules of Sociological Method ( 1976 ) . eos
major publications of that era include Capitalism and Modern Social Theory ( 1971 ) and New Rules of Sociological Method ( 1976 ) . In the second stage Anthony_Giddens developed the theory of structuration , an analysis of agency and structure , in which primacy is granted to neither . Anthony_Giddens works of that period , like Central Problems in Social Theory ( 1979 ) and The Constitution of Society ( 1984 ) brought Anthony_Giddens international fame on the sociological arena . eos
developed the theory of structuration , an analysis of agency and structure , in which primacy is granted to neither . Anthony_Giddens works of that period , like Central Problems in Social Theory ( 1979 ) and The Constitution of Society ( 1984 ) brought Anthony_Giddens international fame on the sociological arena . The most recent stage concerns modernity , globalization and politics , especially the impact of modernity on social and personal life . eos
works of that period , like Central Problems in Social Theory ( 1979 ) and The Constitution of Society ( 1984 ) brought Anthony_Giddens international fame on the sociological arena . The most recent stage concerns modernity , globalization and politics , especially the impact of modernity on social and personal life . This stage is reflected by Anthony_Giddens critique of postmodernity , and discussions of a new ` ` utopian - realist '' third way in politics , visible in the Consequence of Modernity ( 1990 ) , Modernity and Self - Identity ( 1991 ) , The Transformation of Intimacy ( 1992 ) , Beyond Left and Right ( 1994 ) and The Third Way : eos

critique of postmodernity , and discussions of a new ` ` utopian - realist '' third way in politics , visible in the Consequence of Modernity ( 1990 ) , Modernity and Self - Identity ( 1991 ) , The Transformation of Intimacy ( 1992 ) , Beyond Left and Right ( 1994 ) and The Third Way : The Renewal of Social Democracy ( 1998 ) . Anthony_Giddens ambition is both to recast social theory and to re - examine our understanding of the development and trajectory of modernity . eos
ambition is both to recast social theory and to re - examine our understanding of the development and trajectory of modernity . It is not clear , however , that Anthony_Giddens theories have had any beneficial impact on social research . Anthony_Giddens theories have been criticised as being empty conceptual schemes lacking any empirical implications . eos

( august 26 1743 - May 8 1794 ) the ` ` father of modern chemistry , '' was a French nobleman prominent in the histories of chemistry , finance , biology , and economics . Antoine_Lavoisier stated the first version of the Law of conservation of mass , eos
stated the first version of the Law of conservation of mass , Antoine_Lavoisier co - discovered , Antoine_Lavoisier recognized and Antoine_Lavoisier named oxygen ( 1778 ) as well as hydrogen , Antoine_Lavoisier disproved the phlogiston theory , Antoine_Lavoisier introduced the Metric system eos

( born august 1 , 1933 ) is an Italian moral and political philosopher , and a former political inmate . Antonio_Negri is perhaps best - known for Antonio_Negri co - authorship of Empire and Antonio_Negri work on Spinoza . Born in Padua , Antonio_Negri became a political philosophy professor in Antonio_Negri hometown university . eos
is perhaps best - known for Antonio_Negri co - authorship of Empire and Antonio_Negri work on Spinoza . Born in Padua , Antonio_Negri became a political philosophy professor in Antonio_Negri hometown university . Antonio_Negri founded Potere Operaio ( Worker Power ) group in 1969 and Antonio_Negri was a leading member of the Autonomia Marxist group . eos

Accused in the early 1980s of being the mastermind behind the May 1978 assassination of Aldo Moro , leader of Christian - Democrat Party , Antonio_Negri was later cleared of any links with the Red Brigades who had carried out Moro 's kidnapping . eos

( Greek : Ἀρχιμήδης ) ( c. 287 BC - 212 BC ) was an ancient Greek mathematician , physicist , engineer , astronomer , and philosopher born in the seaport colony of Syracuse , Magna Graecia , what is now Sicily . eos
one of the greatest , if not the greatest , mathematicians in antiquity . Carl Friedrich Gauss , himself frequently called the most influential mathematician of all time , modestly claimed that Archimedes was one of the three epoch - making mathematicians ( the others being Isaac Newton and Ferdinand Eisenstein ) . Apart from Archimedes fundamental theoretical contributions to math , Archimedes also shaped the fields of physics and practical engineering , and Archimedes has been called ` ` the greatest scientist ever '' . eos
was one of the three epoch - making mathematicians ( the others being Isaac Newton and Ferdinand Eisenstein ) . Apart from Archimedes fundamental theoretical contributions to math , Archimedes also shaped the fields of physics and practical engineering , and Archimedes has been called ` ` the greatest scientist ever '' . Archimedes was a relative of the Hiero monarchy , which was the ruling family of Syracuse ( Saracussia ) , a seaport kingdom . eos
fundamental theoretical contributions to math , Archimedes also shaped the fields of physics and practical engineering , and Archimedes has been called ` ` the greatest scientist ever '' . Archimedes was a relative of the Hiero monarchy , which was the ruling family of Syracuse ( Saracussia ) , a seaport kingdom . King Hiero II , who was rumored to be Archimedes uncle , commissioned Archimedes to design and fabricate a new class of ships for his navy , which were crucial for the preservation of the ruling class in Syracuse . eos

was a relative of the Hiero monarchy , which was the ruling family of Syracuse ( Saracussia ) , a seaport kingdom . King Hiero II , who was rumored to be Archimedes uncle , commissioned Archimedes to design and fabricate a new class of ships for his navy , which were crucial for the preservation of the ruling class in Syracuse . Hiero II had promised large caches of grain to the Romans in the north in return for peace . eos
uncle , commissioned Archimedes to design and fabricate a new class of ships for his navy , which were crucial for the preservation of the ruling class in Syracuse . Hiero II had promised large caches of grain to the Romans in the north in return for peace . Faced with war when unable to present the promised amount , Hiero II commissioned Archimedes to develop a large luxury / supply / war barge in order to serve the changing requirements of his navy . eos
to design and fabricate a new class of ships for his navy , which were crucial for the preservation of the ruling class in Syracuse . Faced with war when unable to present the promised amount , Hiero II commissioned Archimedes to develop a large luxury / supply / war barge in order to serve the changing requirements of his navy . eos
to develop a large luxury / supply / war barge in order to serve the changing requirements of his navy . It is rumored that the Archimedes Screw was actually an invention of happenstance , as Archimedes needed a tool to remove bilge water . The ship , coined Saracussia , after its nation , may be mythical . eos
needed a tool to remove bilge water . The ship , coined Saracussia , after its nation , may be mythical . There is no record on foundry art , nor any other period pieces depicting its creation . eos
is credited with many inventions and discoveries , some of which we still use today , like Archimedes Archimedes screw . Archimedes was famous for Archimedes compound pulley , a system of pulleys used to lift heavy loads such as ships . Archimedes made several war machines for Archimedes patron and friend Hiero II . eos

Archimedes did a lot of work in geometry , which included finding the surface areas and volumes of solids accurately . eos

( Greek : Ἀριστοτέλης Aristotélēs ) eos
wrote on diverse subjects , including physics , poetry , biology and zoology , logic , rhetoric , politics and government , and ethics . Along with Socrates and Plato , Aristotle was one of the most influential of ancient Greek philosophers . They transformed Presocratic Greek philosophy into the foundations of Western philosophy as we know it . eos
was one of the most influential of ancient Greek philosophers . They transformed Presocratic Greek philosophy into the foundations of Western philosophy as we know it . Some consider Plato and Aristotle to have founded two of the most important schools of Ancient philosophy ; others consider Aristotelianism as a development and concretization of Plato 's insights . eos
to have founded two of the most important schools of Ancient philosophy ; others consider Aristotelianism as a development and concretization of Plato 's insights . Although Aristotle wrote dialogues , only fragments of these have survived . The works that have survived are in treatise form and were , for the most part , unpublished texts . eos
wrote dialogues , only fragments of these have survived . The works that have survived are in treatise form and were , for the most part , unpublished texts . These are generally thought to be lecture notes or texts used by Aristotle students . eos
students . Among the most important are Physics , Metaphysics ( or Ontology ) , Nicomachean Ethics , Politics , De Anima ( On the Soul ) and Poetics . These works , although connected in many fundamental ways , differ significantly in both style and substance . eos
was a polymath . Aristotle not only studied almost every subject possible at the time , but Aristotle made significant contributions to most of them . eos
not only studied almost every subject possible at the time , but Aristotle made significant contributions to most of them . In science , Aristotle studied anatomy , astronomy , economics , embryology , geography , geology , meteorology , physics , and zoology . eos
made significant contributions to most of them . In science , Aristotle studied anatomy , astronomy , economics , embryology , geography , geology , meteorology , physics , and zoology . In philosophy , Aristotle wrote on aesthetics , ethics , government , metaphysics , politics , psychology , rhetoric and theology . eos
studied anatomy , astronomy , economics , embryology , geography , geology , meteorology , physics , and zoology . In philosophy , Aristotle wrote on aesthetics , ethics , government , metaphysics , politics , psychology , rhetoric and theology . Aristotle also dealt with education , foreign customs , literature and poetry . eos
wrote on aesthetics , ethics , government , metaphysics , politics , psychology , rhetoric and theology . Aristotle also dealt with education , foreign customs , literature and poetry . Aristotle combined works practically constitute an encyclopedia of Greek knowledge . eos
also dealt with education , foreign customs , literature and poetry . Aristotle combined works practically constitute an encyclopedia of Greek knowledge . eos

, GCMG , KCB ( december 5 , 1875 - november 30 , 1933 ) was the first Canadian commander of the Canadian Expeditionary Force ( a corps of four divisions ) on the Western Front during World War I Arthur_Currie was among the most successful generals of the war ; Arthur_Currie is still considered one of the finest commanders in Canadian military history . Under Arthur_Currie capable leadership the Canadian Corps won a long series of battles , fighting as a unit for the first time in a major war . eos
was among the most successful generals of the war ; Arthur_Currie is still considered one of the finest commanders in Canadian military history . Under Arthur_Currie capable leadership the Canadian Corps won a long series of battles , fighting as a unit for the first time in a major war . They soon earned a fierce reputation as some of the most effective troops on the Western Front . eos

, 1st Duke of Wellington , KG , GCB , GCH , PC , FRS ( c. 1 May , 1769 - 14 september , 1852 ) was an Irish - born British soldier and statesman , widely considered one of the leading military and political figures of the 19th century . Commissioned an ensign in the British Army , Arthur_Wellesley_1st_Duke_of_Wellington rose to prominence in the Napoleonic Wars , eventually reaching the rank of field marshal . eos
rose to prominence in the Napoleonic Wars , eventually reaching the rank of field marshal . As a general Arthur_Wellesley_1st_Duke_of_Wellington is often compared to the 1st Duke of Marlborough , with whom Arthur_Wellesley_1st_Duke_of_Wellington shared many characteristics , chiefly a transition to politics after a highly successful military career . Arthur_Wellesley_1st_Duke_of_Wellington served as a Tory Prime Minister of the United Kingdom on two separate occasions , and Arthur_Wellesley_1st_Duke_of_Wellington was one of the leading figures in the House of Lords until Arthur_Wellesley_1st_Duke_of_Wellington retirement in 1846 . eos

( Malayalam : അരുന ധതി റോയ , Bengali : অরুন্ধতী eos
won the Booker Prize in 1997 for Arundhati_Roy first novel The God of Small Things . Arundhati_Roy was born in Assam to a Keralite Syrian Christian mother , the women 's rights activist Mary Roy , and a Bengali Hindu father , a tea planter by profession . Arundhati_Roy spent Arundhati_Roy childhood in Aymanam in Kerala , and Arundhati_Roy went to school in Corpus Christi . eos
first novel The God of Small Things . Arundhati_Roy spent Arundhati_Roy childhood in Aymanam in Kerala , and Arundhati_Roy went to school in Corpus Christi . eos
was born in Assam to a Keralite Syrian Christian mother , the women 's rights activist Mary Roy , and a Bengali Hindu father , a tea planter by profession . Arundhati_Roy spent Arundhati_Roy childhood in Aymanam in Kerala , and Arundhati_Roy went to school in Corpus Christi . Arundhati_Roy then studied architecture at the Delhi School of Architecture , where Arundhati_Roy met Arundhati_Roy first husband , architect Gerard Da Cunha . eos

( Devanagari : अशोक ( :) ; IAST transliteration : "" IAST : Aśoka ( ḥ ) "" , pronunciation : "" IPA : "" aɕoːkə ( hə ) "" "" ) ( 304 BC-232 BC ) eos
reigned over most of South Asia and beyond , from present - day Afghanistan and parts of Persia in the west , to Bengal and Assam in the east , and as far south as Mysore . A later convert to Buddhism , Ashoka_the_Great established monuments marking several significant sites in the life of Shakyamuni Buddha , and according to Buddhist tradition Ashoka_the_Great was closely involved in the preservation and transmission of Buddhism . The name ` ` Ashoka '' means ` ` without sorrow '' in Sanskrit . eos
established monuments marking several significant sites in the life of Shakyamuni Buddha , and according to Buddhist tradition Ashoka_the_Great was closely involved in the preservation and transmission of Buddhism . The name ` ` Ashoka '' means ` ` without sorrow '' in Sanskrit . In Ashoka_the_Great edicts Ashoka_the_Great is referred to as ` ` Devaanaampriya '' or ` ` The Beloved Of The Gods of heaven '' . eos
was closely involved in the preservation and transmission of Buddhism . The name ` ` Ashoka '' means ` ` without sorrow '' in Sanskrit . In Ashoka_the_Great edicts Ashoka_the_Great is referred to as ` ` Devaanaampriya '' or ` ` The Beloved Of The Gods of heaven '' . eos
edicts Ashoka_the_Great is referred to as ` ` Devaanaampriya '' or ` ` The Beloved Of The Gods of heaven '' . HG Wells wrote of Ashoka_the_Great : ` ` In the history of the world there have been thousands of kings and emperors who called themselves ` their highnesses , ' ` their majesties , ' and ` their exalted majesties ' and so on . They shone for a brief moment , and as quickly disappeared . eos
is referred to as ` ` Devaanaampriya '' or ` ` The Beloved Of The Gods of heaven '' . They shone for a brief moment , and as quickly disappeared . eos
: ` ` In the history of the world there have been thousands of kings and emperors who called themselves ` their highnesses , ' ` their majesties , ' and ` their exalted majesties ' and so on . They shone for a brief moment , and as quickly disappeared . But Ashoka shines and shines brightly like a bright star , even unto this day . '' eos
legend is related in the 2nd century CE Ashokavadana ( ` ` Narrative of Ashoka '' ) and Divyavadana ( ` ` Divine narrative '' ) . eos
( May 4 , 1929 - january 20 , 1993 ) was an Academy Award - winning actress , fashion model , and humanitarian . Raised under Nazi rule during World War II , Audrey_Hepburn trained extensively to become a ballerina , before deciding to pursue acting . Audrey_Hepburn first gained notice for Audrey_Hepburn starring role in the Broadway production of Gigi ( 1951 ) . eos
trained extensively to become a ballerina , before deciding to pursue acting . Audrey_Hepburn first gained notice for Audrey_Hepburn starring role in the Broadway production of Gigi ( 1951 ) . Audrey_Hepburn was then cast in Roman Holiday ( 1953 ) as Princess Ann , the role for which Audrey_Hepburn won an Academy Award . eos
first gained notice for Audrey_Hepburn starring role in the Broadway production of Gigi ( 1951 ) . Audrey_Hepburn was then cast in Roman Holiday ( 1953 ) as Princess Ann , the role for which Audrey_Hepburn won an Academy Award . Audrey_Hepburn was one of the leading Hollywood actresses during the 1950s and 1960s and Audrey_Hepburn received four more Academy Award nominations , including one for Audrey_Hepburn iconic performance as Holly Golightly in Breakfast at Tiffany 's ( 1961 ) . eos
starring role in the Broadway production of Gigi ( 1951 ) . Audrey_Hepburn was then cast in Roman Holiday ( 1953 ) as Princess Ann , the role for which Audrey_Hepburn won an Academy Award . Audrey_Hepburn was one of the leading Hollywood actresses during the 1950s and 1960s and Audrey_Hepburn received four more Academy Award nominations , including one for Audrey_Hepburn iconic performance as Holly Golightly in Breakfast at Tiffany 's ( 1961 ) . eos
was then cast in Roman Holiday ( 1953 ) as Princess Ann , the role for which Audrey_Hepburn won an Academy Award . Audrey_Hepburn was one of the leading Hollywood actresses during the 1950s and 1960s and Audrey_Hepburn received four more Academy Award nominations , including one for Audrey_Hepburn iconic performance as Holly Golightly in Breakfast at Tiffany 's ( 1961 ) . In 1964 , Audrey_Hepburn played Eliza Doolittle in My Fair Lady , the critically acclaimed film adaptation of the play . eos

Audrey_Hepburn starred in few films in the 1970s and 1980s and instead Audrey_Hepburn devoted Audrey_Hepburn time to Audrey_Hepburn children . eos

( Latin : IMP • CAESAR • eos
life prior to 27 BC , was the first and among the most important of the Roman Emperors . Although Augustus preserved the outward form of the Roman Republic , Augustus ruled as an autocrat for 41 years , and Augustus rule is the dividing line between the Republic and the Roman Empire . Augustus ended a century of civil wars and Augustus gave Rome an era of peace , prosperity , and imperial greatness , known as the Pax Romana , or Roman peace . eos

Augustus ended a century of civil wars and Augustus gave Rome an era of peace , prosperity , and imperial greatness , known as the Pax Romana , or Roman peace . eos
ruled as an autocrat for 41 years , and Augustus rule is the dividing line between the Republic and the Roman Empire . Augustus ended a century of civil wars and Augustus gave Rome an era of peace , prosperity , and imperial greatness , known as the Pax Romana , or Roman peace . eos

( born september 27 , 1984 ) is a Juno Award - winning Canadian singer , songwriter , and occasional actress . Avril_Lavigne was originally known for Avril_Lavigne ` ` skater punk '' persona , but Avril_Lavigne has since shed that image in favour of a more sophisticated and feminine style . Avril_Lavigne two albums , eos
was originally known for Avril_Lavigne ` ` skater punk '' persona , but Avril_Lavigne has since shed that image in favour of a more sophisticated and feminine style . Avril_Lavigne two albums , Let Go ( 2002 ) and Under My Skin ( 2004 ) , have topped charts in several countries . eos

Although Avril_Lavigne surname is of French origin , Avril_Lavigne does not speak French and Avril_Lavigne name is pronounced in an anglicized way , somewhat as IPA : ləˈviːn ( ` ` La - veen '' ) , rather than IPA : laˈviːɲ . Lavigne , or rather la vigne , in French means the vine or the vineyard . eos
surname is of French origin , Avril_Lavigne does not speak French and Avril_Lavigne name is pronounced in an anglicized way , somewhat as IPA : ləˈviːn ( ` ` La - veen '' ) , rather than IPA : laˈviːɲ . Lavigne , or rather la vigne , in French means the vine or the vineyard . Avril_Lavigne first name , Avril , is French for april , but is also pronounced in an anglicized way as IPA : ˈævrəl ( ` ` Av - ril '' ) , rather than IPA : aˈvril . Avril_Lavigne is featured in Maxim magazine 's Maxim gallery . eos

( pronunciation ) , born Ayaan Hirsi Magan 13 november 1969 in Mogadishu , Somalia , is a Dutch feminist and politician , daughter of Hirsi Magan Isse . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali is a prominent ( and often controversial ) author , film maker , and critic of Islam . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali was a member of the Tweede Kamer ( the Lower House of the States - General of the Netherlands ) for the People 's Party for Freedom and Democracy ( VVD ) from january 30 2003 until May 16 , 2006 . eos
is a prominent ( and often controversial ) author , film maker , and critic of Islam . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali was a member of the Tweede Kamer ( the Lower House of the States - General of the Netherlands ) for the People 's Party for Freedom and Democracy ( VVD ) from january 30 2003 until May 16 , 2006 . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali has had to maintain a high level of security due to threats against Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali life for voicing views critical of Islam . eos
was a member of the Tweede Kamer ( the Lower House of the States - General of the Netherlands ) for the People 's Party for Freedom and Democracy ( VVD ) from january 30 2003 until May 16 , 2006 . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali has had to maintain a high level of security due to threats against Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali life for voicing views critical of Islam . For example , Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali film Submission , directed by Theo van Gogh ( who himself was assassinated for this film ) , made Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali one of the targets of the Hofstad Network . eos
has had to maintain a high level of security due to threats against Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali life for voicing views critical of Islam . For example , Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali film Submission , directed by Theo van Gogh ( who himself was assassinated for this film ) , made Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali one of the targets of the Hofstad Network . On May 15 , 2006 , officials of the Netherlands government cast doubt on Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali status as a Dutch national , because Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali provided false information in Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali application for refugee status in the Netherlands . eos
life for voicing views critical of Islam . For example , Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali film Submission , directed by Theo van Gogh ( who himself was assassinated for this film ) , made Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali one of the targets of the Hofstad Network . On May 15 , 2006 , officials of the Netherlands government cast doubt on Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali status as a Dutch national , because Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali provided false information in Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali application for refugee status in the Netherlands . eos
film Submission , directed by Theo van Gogh ( who himself was assassinated for this film ) , made Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali one of the targets of the Hofstad Network . On May 15 , 2006 , officials of the Netherlands government cast doubt on Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali status as a Dutch national , because Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali provided false information in Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali application for refugee status in the Netherlands . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali later used the same false information when Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali applied for , and was granted , Dutch citizenship . eos
one of the targets of the Hofstad Network . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali later used the same false information when Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali applied for , and was granted , Dutch citizenship . eos
application for refugee status in the Netherlands . Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali later used the same false information when Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali applied for , and was granted , Dutch citizenship . The Dutch minister of immigration and integration , Rita Verdonk , moved to annul Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali citizenship , a move that was later overridden on the urging of Parliament . eos

On june 27 , 2006 , the Dutch government announced that Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali would keep Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali Dutch citizenship after Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali signed the dictate that indirectly lead to the fall of the second Balkenende cabinet . eos
released to the New York Times personal letters from Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali father and other family members that affirmed Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali story about fleeing a forced marriage . On june 27 , 2006 , the Dutch government announced that Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali would keep Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali Dutch citizenship after Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali signed the dictate that indirectly lead to the fall of the second Balkenende cabinet . On May 16 , Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali announced Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali resignation from parliament and Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali confirmed Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali previous statement that Ayaan_Hirsi_Ali would move to the United States to work at the American Enterprise Institute , a pro - market economics think tank . eos

, CBE , FRS , RDI , commonly known as Barnes Wallis , ( september 26 1887 - october 30 1979 ) was an English scientist , engineer and inventor . Barnes_Wallis is best known for inventing the bouncing bomb used by the RAF in Operation Chastise ( the Dambusters Raid ) to attack the Möhne and Eder dams in the Ruhr area in May 1943 , during the Second World War . eos

( c. 480 - 543 ) , born at Nursia ( Norcia ) , Italy , was the founder of western monasticism . Many of those monastic men and women belong to a Christian religious order named in Benedict_of_Nursia honor , the Order of Saint Benedict . Benedict_of_Nursia was canonized in 1220 . eos
honor , the Order of Saint Benedict . Benedict_of_Nursia was canonized in 1220 . The only authentic life of Benedict_of_Nursia is that contained in the second book of St Gregory 's Dialogues . eos
was canonized in 1220 . The only authentic life of Benedict_of_Nursia is that contained in the second book of St Gregory 's Dialogues . It is more of a character sketch than a biography and consists , for the most part , of a number of miraculous incidents , which , although they illustrate the life of Benedict_of_Nursia , give little help towards a chronological account of Benedict_of_Nursia career . eos

( july 29 1883 - april 28 , 1945 ) was the Prime - Minister and dictator of Italy from 1922 until Benito_Mussolini overthrow in 1943 . Benito_Mussolini established a repressive fascist regime that valued nationalism , militarism and anti - communism combined with strict censorship and state propaganda . Benito_Mussolini became a close ally of German dictator Adolf Hitler , whom Benito_Mussolini influenced . eos
overthrow in 1943 . Benito_Mussolini established a repressive fascist regime that valued nationalism , militarism and anti - communism combined with strict censorship and state propaganda . Benito_Mussolini became a close ally of German dictator Adolf Hitler , whom Benito_Mussolini influenced . eos
established a repressive fascist regime that valued nationalism , militarism and anti - communism combined with strict censorship and state propaganda . Benito_Mussolini became a close ally of German dictator Adolf Hitler , whom Benito_Mussolini influenced . Benito_Mussolini entered the war in june , 1940 on the side of Nazi Germany . eos

, 1st Viscount Montgomery of Alamein , KG , GCB , DSO , PC ( 17 november 1887 - 24 march 1976 ) was a British Army officer , often referred to as ` ` Monty '' . Bernard_Montgomery_1st_Viscount_Montgomery_of_Alamein successfully commanded Allied forces at the Battle of El Alamein , a major turning point in World War II , and troops under Bernard_Montgomery_1st_Viscount_Montgomery_of_Alamein command were largely responsible for the expulsion of Axis forces from North Africa . Bernard_Montgomery_1st_Viscount_Montgomery_of_Alamein was later a prominent commander in Italy and North - West Europe , where Bernard_Montgomery_1st_Viscount_Montgomery_of_Alamein was in command of all Allied ground forces during Operation Overlord and then until after the Battle of Normandy . eos

( born William Jefferson Blythe III on august 19 1946 ) was the 42nd President of the United States , serving from 1993 to 2001 . Before Bill_Clinton election as President , Bill_Clinton served nearly 12 years as the 50th and 52nd Governor of Arkansas . Bill_Clinton wife , Hillary Rodham Clinton , is the junior United States Senator from New York , where they both reside . eos

VC CB DSO & amp ; Bar MC DCED ( 8 february 1894 - 11 september 1956 ) was a Canadian First World War flying ace , officially credited with 72 victories , the highest number for a British Empire pilot . eos
( born january 6 , 1965 ) is an Adjunct Professor at the Copenhagen Business School and a former director of the Environmental Assessment Institute in Copenhagen . Bjorn_Lomborg became internationally - known for Bjorn_Lomborg best - selling and controversial book The Skeptical Environmentalist . eos
became internationally - known for Bjorn_Lomborg best - selling and controversial book The Skeptical Environmentalist . After the book 's publication , members of the Danish scientific community accused Bjorn_Lomborg of scientific dishonesty . eos

of scientific dishonesty . These allegations were investigated by appropriate arms of the Danish government and in the end , no official charges were left standing . However , many scientists - including the majority of climatologists - remain critical of Bjorn_Lomborg work . eos
work . In 2002 , Bjorn_Lomborg and the Environmental Assessment Institute founded the Copenhagen Consensus , which sought to establish priorities for advancing global welfare using methodologies based on the theory of welfare economics . eos

, OBE ( born Barking , England , april 12 , 1941 - died London , february 24 , 1993 ) was an English footballer . Bobby_Moore captained West Ham United for more than ten years and Bobby_Moore was skipper of the England team which won the 1966 World Cup . Bobby_Moore is widely regarded as the finest captain England has ever had , and one of the greatest defenders the world has seen . eos

( born 10 May 1960 ) , better known as Bono ( pronounced Bohn - oh ) , is the lead singer and occasional rhythm guitarist / harmonicist of the Irish rock band U2 . Bono is also known for Bono humanitarian work in Africa and Bono efforts in cancelling the debt of poor third world countries . eos

( also Boudicca , formerly better known as Boadicea ) ( d. 60/61 ) was a queen of the Brythonic Celtic Iceni people of Norfolk in Eastern Britain Boudica led a major uprising of the tribes against the occupying forces of the Roman Empire . Upon the death of Boudica husband Prasutagus , the Romans annexed his kingdom and brutally humiliated Boudica and Boudica daughters , spurring Boudica leadership of the revolt . eos
led a major uprising of the tribes against the occupying forces of the Roman Empire . Upon the death of Boudica husband Prasutagus , the Romans annexed his kingdom and brutally humiliated Boudica and Boudica daughters , spurring Boudica leadership of the revolt . In 60 or 61 , while governor Gaius Suetonius Paulinus was leading a campaign on the island of Anglesey in north Wales , Boudica led the Iceni , along with the Trinovantes and others , in a rebellion which destroyed the former Trinovantian capital and Roman colonia of Camulodunum ( Colchester ) , and routed the Roman Legio IX Hispana under Quintus Petillius Cerialis . eos
husband Prasutagus , the Romans annexed his kingdom and brutally humiliated Boudica and Boudica daughters , spurring Boudica leadership of the revolt . In 60 or 61 , while governor Gaius Suetonius Paulinus was leading a campaign on the island of Anglesey in north Wales , Boudica led the Iceni , along with the Trinovantes and others , in a rebellion which destroyed the former Trinovantian capital and Roman colonia of Camulodunum ( Colchester ) , and routed the Roman Legio IX Hispana under Quintus Petillius Cerialis . Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . eos
and Boudica daughters , spurring Boudica leadership of the revolt . Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . eos
