In 60 or 61 , while governor Gaius Suetonius Paulinus was leading a campaign on the island of Anglesey in north Wales , Boudica led the Iceni , along with the Trinovantes and others , in a rebellion which destroyed the former Trinovantian capital and Roman colonia of Camulodunum ( Colchester ) , and routed the Roman Legio IX Hispana under Quintus Petillius Cerialis . Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . eos
led the Iceni , along with the Trinovantes and others , in a rebellion which destroyed the former Trinovantian capital and Roman colonia of Camulodunum ( Colchester ) , and routed the Roman Legio IX Hispana under Quintus Petillius Cerialis . Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . Roman emperor Nero briefly considered withdrawing Roman forces from the island , but ultimately Boudica was defeated at the Battle of Watling Street by the heavily outnumbered forces of governor Suetonius . eos
army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . Roman emperor Nero briefly considered withdrawing Roman forces from the island , but ultimately Boudica was defeated at the Battle of Watling Street by the heavily outnumbered forces of governor Suetonius . The chronicles of these events , as recorded by the historians Tacitus and Dio Cassius , were rediscovered during the Renaissance and led to a resurgence of Boudica legendary fame during the Victorian era , when Queen Victoria was portrayed as Boudica ` ` namesake '' . eos
was defeated at the Battle of Watling Street by the heavily outnumbered forces of governor Suetonius . The chronicles of these events , as recorded by the historians Tacitus and Dio Cassius , were rediscovered during the Renaissance and led to a resurgence of Boudica legendary fame during the Victorian era , when Queen Victoria was portrayed as Boudica ` ` namesake '' . Boudica has since remained an important cultural symbol in the United Kingdom . eos

( born july 2 , 1957 in Calgary , Alberta ) is a Canadian former professional wrestler , and part of the famous Hart wrestling family . In the course of Bret_Hart career , Bret_Hart was known by several monikers : Bret ` ` Hit Man '' Hart , ( adopted from boxer Thomas Hearns ) , ` ` The Excellence of Execution '' ( originally dubbed as such by Gorilla Monsoon ) and perhaps the most resounding , ` ` The best there is , the best there was , and the best there ever will be '' ( derived from the 1984 film The Natural , which starred Robert Redford ) . eos
career , Bret_Hart was known by several monikers : Bret ` ` Hit Man '' Hart , ( adopted from boxer Thomas Hearns ) , ` ` The Excellence of Execution '' ( originally dubbed as such by Gorilla Monsoon ) and perhaps the most resounding , ` ` The best there is , the best there was , and the best there ever will be '' ( derived from the 1984 film The Natural , which starred Robert Redford ) . Bret_Hart justifies Bret_Hart claim to the latter title by citing three facts : that Bret_Hart never seriously injured an opponent through any fault of Bret_Hart own ; that , in the course of Bret_Hart career with the World Wrestling Federation , Bret_Hart only ever missed two shows , both as a result of traffic and flight difficulties , and that Bret_Hart rarely refused to job . eos

, PC , CC , GOQ , LLD ( born march 20 , 1939 ) , was the eighteenth Prime Minister of Canada from september 17 , 1984 , to june 25 , 1993 and Brian_Mulroney was leader of the Progressive Conservative Party of Canada from 1983 to 1993 . According to Canadian protocol , as a former Prime Minister , Brian_Mulroney is called ` ` The Right Honourable '' for life . Brian_Mulroney became Prime Minister after Brian_Mulroney Progressive Conservatives won the most parliamentary seats in Canadian history . eos
was leader of the Progressive Conservative Party of Canada from 1983 to 1993 . According to Canadian protocol , as a former Prime Minister , Brian_Mulroney is called ` ` The Right Honourable '' for life . Brian_Mulroney became Prime Minister after Brian_Mulroney Progressive Conservatives won the most parliamentary seats in Canadian history . eos
is called ` ` The Right Honourable '' for life . Brian_Mulroney became Prime Minister after Brian_Mulroney Progressive Conservatives won the most parliamentary seats in Canadian history . At the time , Brian_Mulroney was unique in Canadian politics in that Brian_Mulroney had never been a career politician . eos
became Prime Minister after Brian_Mulroney Progressive Conservatives won the most parliamentary seats in Canadian history . At the time , Brian_Mulroney was unique in Canadian politics in that Brian_Mulroney had never been a career politician . Instead Brian_Mulroney was a longtime businessman and Brian_Mulroney had become leader of the Progressive Conservative Party without ever having been elected to public office . eos

( born april 2 , 1947 in Endicott , New York ) is an American social critic , intellectual , author and teacher . Camille_Paglia is a professor of humanities and media studies at the University of the Arts in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania . Camille_Paglia has been called the ` ` feminist that other feminists love to hate '' , one of the world 's top 100 intellectuals by the UK 's Prospect Magazine , and by Camille_Paglia own description ` ` a feminist bisexual egomaniac '' . eos

( 29 september 1571 - 18 july 1610 ) was an Italian artist active in Rome , Naples , Malta and Sicily between 1593 and 1610 . Caravaggio is commonly placed in the Baroque school , of which Caravaggio was the first great representative . Even in Caravaggio own lifetime eos
is commonly placed in the Baroque school , of which Caravaggio was the first great representative . Even in Caravaggio own lifetime Caravaggio was considered enigmatic , fascinating , and dangerous . eos
was the first great representative . Even in Caravaggio own lifetime Caravaggio was considered enigmatic , fascinating , and dangerous . eos
own lifetime Caravaggio was considered enigmatic , fascinating , and dangerous . Caravaggio burst upon the Rome art scene in 1600 , and thereafter Caravaggio never lacked for commissions or patrons , yet Caravaggio handled Caravaggio success atrociously . eos
was considered enigmatic , fascinating , and dangerous . Caravaggio burst upon the Rome art scene in 1600 , and thereafter Caravaggio never lacked for commissions or patrons , yet Caravaggio handled Caravaggio success atrociously . An early published notice on Caravaggio , dating from 1604 and describing Caravaggio lifestyle some three years previously , tells how ` ` after a fortnight 's work he will swagger about for a month or two with a sword at his side and a servant following him , from one ball - court to the next , ever ready to engage in a fight or an argument , so that it is most awkward to get along with him . '' eos
burst upon the Rome art scene in 1600 , and thereafter Caravaggio never lacked for commissions or patrons , yet Caravaggio handled Caravaggio success atrociously . An early published notice on Caravaggio , dating from 1604 and describing Caravaggio lifestyle some three years previously , tells how ` ` after a fortnight 's work he will swagger about for a month or two with a sword at his side and a servant following him , from one ball - court to the next , ever ready to engage in a fight or an argument , so that it is most awkward to get along with him . '' In 1606 Caravaggio killed a young man in a brawl and Caravaggio fled from Rome with a price on Caravaggio head . eos

An early published notice on Caravaggio , dating from 1604 and describing Caravaggio lifestyle some three years previously , tells how ` ` after a fortnight 's work he will swagger about for a month or two with a sword at his side and a servant following him , from one ball - court to the next , ever ready to engage in a fight or an argument , so that it is most awkward to get along with him . '' In 1606 Caravaggio killed a young man in a brawl and Caravaggio fled from Rome with a price on Caravaggio head . eos
, dating from 1604 and describing Caravaggio lifestyle some three years previously , tells how ` ` after a fortnight 's work he will swagger about for a month or two with a sword at his side and a servant following him , from one ball - court to the next , ever ready to engage in a fight or an argument , so that it is most awkward to get along with him . '' In 1606 Caravaggio killed a young man in a brawl and Caravaggio fled from Rome with a price on Caravaggio head . In Malta in 1608 Caravaggio was involved in another brawl , and yet another in Naples in 1609 , possibly a deliberate attempt on Caravaggio life by unidentified enemies . eos

In Malta in 1608 Caravaggio was involved in another brawl , and yet another in Naples in 1609 , possibly a deliberate attempt on Caravaggio life by unidentified enemies . By the next year , after a career of little more than a decade , Caravaggio was dead . eos

Huge new churches and palazzi were being built in Rome in the decades of the late 16th and early 17th centuries , and paintings were needed to fill them . eos

was dead . Huge new churches and palazzi were being built in Rome in the decades of the late 16th and early 17th centuries , and paintings were needed to fill them . The Counter - Reformation Church searched for authentic religious art with which to counter the threat of Protestantism , and for this task the artificial conventions of Mannerism , which had ruled art for almost a century , no longer seemed adequate . eos
novelty was a radical naturalism which combined close physical observation with a dramatic , even theatrical , approach to chiaroscuro , the use of light and shadow . In Caravaggio hands this new style was the vehicle for authentic and moving spirituality . Famous and extremely influential while Caravaggio lived , Caravaggio was almost completely forgotten in the centuries after Caravaggio death , and it was only in the 20th century that Caravaggio importance to the development of Western art was rediscovered . eos
hands this new style was the vehicle for authentic and moving spirituality . Famous and extremely influential while Caravaggio lived , Caravaggio was almost completely forgotten in the centuries after Caravaggio death , and it was only in the 20th century that Caravaggio importance to the development of Western art was rediscovered . Yet despite this Caravaggio influence on the common style which eventually emerged from the ruins of Mannerism , the new Baroque , was profound . eos
lived , Caravaggio was almost completely forgotten in the centuries after Caravaggio death , and it was only in the 20th century that Caravaggio importance to the development of Western art was rediscovered . Yet despite this Caravaggio influence on the common style which eventually emerged from the ruins of Mannerism , the new Baroque , was profound . Andre Berne - Joffroy , Paul Valéry 's secretary , said of Caravaggio : ` ` What begins in the work of Caravaggio is , quite simply , modern painting . '' eos

( july 26 , 1875 , Kesswil , - june 6 , 1961 , Küsnacht ) ( "" IPA : ˈkarl ˈgʊstaf ˈjʊŋ "" ) was a Swiss psychiatrist and founder of analytical psychology . eos
, also known after Carolus_Linnaeus ennoblement as Carl von Linné , ( May 23 , 1707 - january 10 , 1778 ) , was a Swedish botanist , physician and zoologist Carolus_Linnaeus laid the foundations for the modern scheme of nomenclature . Carolus_Linnaeus is known as the ` ` father of modern taxonomy . '' Carolus_Linnaeus is also considered one of the fathers of modern ecology ( see History of ecology ) . eos

is also considered one of the fathers of modern ecology ( see History of ecology ) . Carolus_Linnaeus was the most renowned botanist of Carolus_Linnaeus time , and also noted for Carolus_Linnaeus fine language skills . The French philosopher Jean - Jacques Rousseau sent Carolus_Linnaeus the message : ` ` Tell him I know no greater man on earth . '' ; the German writer Johann Wolfgang von Goethe wrote : ` ` With the exception of Shakespeare and Spinoza , I know no one among the no longer living who has influenced me more strongly . '' ; Swedish author august Strindberg wrote : ` ` Linnaeus was in reality a poet who happened to become a naturalist '' . eos

, called the Great ( Russian : Екатерина II Великая , Yekaterina II Velikaya ; 2 May 1729 - 17 november , 1796 ) - sometimes referred to as an epitome of the ` ` enlightened despot '' - reigned as Empress of Russia for some 34 years , from june 28 1762 until Catherine_II_of_Russia death . eos

( OC , OQ ) ( born march 30 1968 ) is a French Canadian Grammy and Juno award winning pop singer and occasional songwriter and actress . Celine_Dion began Celine_Dion career in the early 1980s as a French singer before breaking into the international music scene in the 1990s . Celine_Dion was born to a large , impoverished family in Charlemagne , Québec . eos
began Celine_Dion career in the early 1980s as a French singer before breaking into the international music scene in the 1990s . Celine_Dion was born to a large , impoverished family in Charlemagne , Québec . As a teen , Celine_Dion achieved success in francophone Canada after Celine_Dion manager and future husband , René Angélil , mortgaged his home in order to finance Celine_Dion first record . eos
career in the early 1980s as a French singer before breaking into the international music scene in the 1990s . Celine_Dion was born to a large , impoverished family in Charlemagne , Québec . As a teen , Celine_Dion achieved success in francophone Canada after Celine_Dion manager and future husband , René Angélil , mortgaged his home in order to finance Celine_Dion first record . eos
was born to a large , impoverished family in Charlemagne , Québec . As a teen , Celine_Dion achieved success in francophone Canada after Celine_Dion manager and future husband , René Angélil , mortgaged his home in order to finance Celine_Dion first record . Celine_Dion later gained recognition in parts of Europe and Asia after Celine_Dion won both the 1982 Yamaha World Popular Song Festival and the 1988 Eurovision Song Contest . eos
achieved success in francophone Canada after Celine_Dion manager and future husband , René Angélil , mortgaged his home in order to finance Celine_Dion first record . Celine_Dion later gained recognition in parts of Europe and Asia after Celine_Dion won both the 1982 Yamaha World Popular Song Festival and the 1988 Eurovision Song Contest . In 1990 Celine_Dion established a foothold in the anglophone music market with the release of Unison , published by Epic Records . eos

In 1990 Celine_Dion established a foothold in the anglophone music market with the release of Unison , published by Epic Records . During the 1990s Celine_Dion achieved worldwide fame and success with several English and French records , of which Celine_Dion most successful were Falling into You ( 1996 ) and ` ` My Heart Will Go On '' eos

By 2004 Celine_Dion had accumulated record sales of 175 million , and Celine_Dion was presented with the Chopard Diamond award from the World Music Awards show for becoming the Best - selling Female Artist in the World . eos
had accumulated record sales of 175 million , and Celine_Dion was presented with the Chopard Diamond award from the World Music Awards show for becoming the Best - selling Female Artist in the World . As of 2003 Celine_Dion has performed nightly in Celine_Dion show A New Day ... at Caesars Palace , Las Vegas , under a contract that extends through 2007 . Celine_Dion music has been influenced by various genres , which range from pop and rock to gospel and classical , and Celine_Dion is noted for Celine_Dion technically skilled and powerful vocals . eos

( 742 or 747 - 28 january 814 ) ( also Charles the Great ; from Latin , "" Latin : Carolus Magnus "" ) was the King of the Franks ( 768 - 814 ) who conquered Italy and took the Iron Crown of Lombardy in 774 and , on a visit to Rome in 800 , was crowned "" Latin : imperator Romanorum "" ( ` ` Emperor of the Romans '' ) by Pope Leo III on Christmas Day , presaging the revival of the Roman imperial tradition in the West in the form of the Holy Roman Empire . By Charlemagne foreign conquests and internal reforms , Charlemagne helped define Western Europe and the Middle Ages . eos
foreign conquests and internal reforms , Charlemagne helped define Western Europe and the Middle Ages . Charlemagne rule is also associated with the Carolingian Renaissance , a revival of the arts and education in the West . The son of King Pippin the Short and Bertrada of Laon , Charlemagne succeeded Charlemagne father and eos
helped define Western Europe and the Middle Ages . Charlemagne rule is also associated with the Carolingian Renaissance , a revival of the arts and education in the West . The son of King Pippin the Short and Bertrada of Laon , Charlemagne succeeded Charlemagne father and eos
rule is also associated with the Carolingian Renaissance , a revival of the arts and education in the West . The son of King Pippin the Short and Bertrada of Laon , Charlemagne succeeded Charlemagne father and Charlemagne co - ruled with Charlemagne brother Carloman until the latter 's death in 771 . eos
succeeded Charlemagne father and Charlemagne co - ruled with Charlemagne brother Carloman until the latter 's death in 771 . Charlemagne continued the policy of Charlemagne father towards the papacy and Charlemagne became its protector , removing the Lombards from power in Italy , and waging war on the Saracens who menaced Charlemagne realm from Spain . eos
father and Charlemagne co - ruled with Charlemagne brother Carloman until the latter 's death in 771 . Charlemagne continued the policy of Charlemagne father towards the papacy and Charlemagne became its protector , removing the Lombards from power in Italy , and waging war on the Saracens who menaced Charlemagne realm from Spain . It was during one of these campaigns that Charlemagne experienced the worst defeat of Charlemagne life at Roncesvalles ( 778 ) . eos

also campaigned against the peoples to Charlemagne east , especially the Saxons , and after a protracted war Charlemagne subjected them to Charlemagne rule . By converting them to Christianity , Charlemagne integrated them into Charlemagne realm and Charlemagne thus paved the way for the later Ottonian Dynasty . Today regarded as the founding father of both France and Germany and sometimes as the Father of Europe , as Charlemagne was the first ruler of a united Western Europe since the fall of the Roman Empire . eos

( 26 december 1791 - 18 october 1871 ) was an English mathematician , analytical philosopher , mechanical engineer and ( proto - ) computer scientist Charles_Babbage originated the idea of a programmable computer . Parts of Charles_Babbage uncompleted mechanisms are on display in the London Science Museum . eos
originated the idea of a programmable computer . Parts of Charles_Babbage uncompleted mechanisms are on display in the London Science Museum . In 1991 , working from Charles_Babbage original plans , a difference engine was completed , and functioned perfectly . eos
uncompleted mechanisms are on display in the London Science Museum . In 1991 , working from Charles_Babbage original plans , a difference engine was completed , and functioned perfectly . It was built to tolerances achievable in the 19th century , indicating that Charles_Babbage machine would have worked . eos
original plans , a difference engine was completed , and functioned perfectly . It was built to tolerances achievable in the 19th century , indicating that Charles_Babbage machine would have worked . Nine years later , the Science Museum completed the printer Charles_Babbage had designed for the difference engine ; it featured astonishing complexity for a 19th century device . eos

FRS ( 12 february 1809 - 19 april 1882 ) was an English naturalist Charles_Darwin achieved lasting fame by producing considerable evidence that species originated through evolutionary change , at the same time proposing the scientific theory that natural selection is the mechanism by which such change occurs . This theory is now considered a cornerstone of biology , and has significantly affected other disciplines such as philosophy , psychology and anthropology . Charles_Darwin developed an interest in natural history while studying first medicine , then theology , at university . eos
achieved lasting fame by producing considerable evidence that species originated through evolutionary change , at the same time proposing the scientific theory that natural selection is the mechanism by which such change occurs . This theory is now considered a cornerstone of biology , and has significantly affected other disciplines such as philosophy , psychology and anthropology . Charles_Darwin developed an interest in natural history while studying first medicine , then theology , at university . eos
developed an interest in natural history while studying first medicine , then theology , at university . Charles_Darwin observations on Charles_Darwin five - year voyage on the Beagle brought Charles_Darwin eminence as a geologist and fame as a popular author . Charles_Darwin biological finds led Charles_Darwin to study the transmutation of species and in 1838 Charles_Darwin conceived Charles_Darwin theory of natural selection . eos
observations on Charles_Darwin five - year voyage on the Beagle brought Charles_Darwin eminence as a geologist and fame as a popular author . Charles_Darwin biological finds led Charles_Darwin to study the transmutation of species and in 1838 Charles_Darwin conceived Charles_Darwin theory of natural selection . Fully aware that others had been severely punished for such ` ` heretical '' ideas , Charles_Darwin confided only in Charles_Darwin closest friends and Charles_Darwin continued Charles_Darwin research to meet anticipated objections . eos
five - year voyage on the Beagle brought Charles_Darwin eminence as a geologist and fame as a popular author . Charles_Darwin biological finds led Charles_Darwin to study the transmutation of species and in 1838 Charles_Darwin conceived Charles_Darwin theory of natural selection . Fully aware that others had been severely punished for such ` ` heretical '' ideas , Charles_Darwin confided only in Charles_Darwin closest friends and Charles_Darwin continued Charles_Darwin research to meet anticipated objections . eos

Fully aware that others had been severely punished for such ` ` heretical '' ideas , Charles_Darwin confided only in Charles_Darwin closest friends and Charles_Darwin continued Charles_Darwin research to meet anticipated objections . eos
theory of natural selection . Fully aware that others had been severely punished for such ` ` heretical '' ideas , Charles_Darwin confided only in Charles_Darwin closest friends and Charles_Darwin continued Charles_Darwin research to meet anticipated objections . However , in 1858 the information that Alfred Russel Wallace had developed a similar theory forced an early joint publication of the theory . eos

Fully aware that others had been severely punished for such ` ` heretical '' ideas , Charles_Darwin confided only in Charles_Darwin closest friends and Charles_Darwin continued Charles_Darwin research to meet anticipated objections . However , in 1858 the information that Alfred Russel Wallace had developed a similar theory forced an early joint publication of the theory . eos

research to meet anticipated objections . However , in 1858 the information that Alfred Russel Wallace had developed a similar theory forced an early joint publication of the theory . Charles_Darwin 1859 book eos
1859 book On the Origin of Species by Means of Natural Selection , or The Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life ( usually abbreviated to The Origin of Species ) established evolution by common descent as the dominant scientific explanation of diversification in nature . Charles_Darwin continued Charles_Darwin research and Charles_Darwin wrote a series of books on plants and animals , including humankind , notably The Descent of Man , and Selection in Relation to Sex and The Expression of the Emotions in Man and Animals . eos
continued Charles_Darwin research and Charles_Darwin wrote a series of books on plants and animals , including humankind , notably The Descent of Man , and Selection in Relation to Sex and The Expression of the Emotions in Man and Animals . In recognition of Charles_Darwin pre - eminence , Charles_Darwin was buried in Westminster Abbey , close to John Herschel and Isaac Newton . eos

( 7 february 1812 - 9 june 1870 ) , pen - name ` ` Boz '' , was an English novelist . During Charles_Dickens career Charles_Dickens achieved massive worldwide popularity , winning acclaim for Charles_Dickens rich storytelling and memorable characters . Considered one of the English language 's greatest writers , Charles_Dickens was the foremost novelist of the Victorian era as well as a vigorous social campaigner . eos
career Charles_Dickens achieved massive worldwide popularity , winning acclaim for Charles_Dickens rich storytelling and memorable characters . Considered one of the English language 's greatest writers , Charles_Dickens was the foremost novelist of the Victorian era as well as a vigorous social campaigner . Later critics , beginning with George Gissing and G K. Chesterton , championed Charles_Dickens mastery of prose , Charles_Dickens endless invention of memorable characters and Charles_Dickens powerful social sensibilities . eos

Considered one of the English language 's greatest writers , Charles_Dickens was the foremost novelist of the Victorian era as well as a vigorous social campaigner . Chesterton , championed Charles_Dickens mastery of prose , Charles_Dickens endless invention of memorable characters and Charles_Dickens powerful social sensibilities . eos
was the foremost novelist of the Victorian era as well as a vigorous social campaigner . Later critics , beginning with George Gissing and G K. Chesterton , championed Charles_Dickens mastery of prose , Charles_Dickens endless invention of memorable characters and Charles_Dickens powerful social sensibilities . Yet Charles_Dickens also received criticism from Charles_Dickens more rarefied readers , including George Henry Lewes , Henry James , and Virginia Woolf , who list faults such as sentimentality , unrealistic events and grotesque characters . eos
mastery of prose , Charles_Dickens endless invention of memorable characters and Charles_Dickens powerful social sensibilities . Yet Charles_Dickens also received criticism from Charles_Dickens more rarefied readers , including George Henry Lewes , Henry James , and Virginia Woolf , who list faults such as sentimentality , unrealistic events and grotesque characters . The popularity of Charles_Dickens novels and short stories during Charles_Dickens lifetime and to the present is demonstrated by the fact that none has ever gone out of print . eos

Charles_Dickens wrote serialised novels , which was the usual format for fiction at the time , and each new part of Charles_Dickens stories would be eagerly anticipated by the reading public . eos

, Prince de Benevente ( february 2 , 1754 - May 17 , 1838 ) was a French diplomat . Charles_Maurice_de_Talleyrand-Perigord worked successfully from the regime of Louis XVI , through the French Revolution and then under Napoleon I , Louis XVIII and Louis - Philippe . eos
worked successfully from the regime of Louis XVI , through the French Revolution and then under Napoleon I , Louis XVIII and Louis - Philippe . Known since the turn of the 19th century simply by the name Talleyrand , Charles_Maurice_de_Talleyrand-Perigord is widely regarded as one of the most versatile and influential diplomats in European history . eos

( born november 16 , 1930 ) is a Nigerian writer . eos
( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo , formerly Christovam Colon ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Catalan : Cristòfor Colom ; c 1451-May 20 , 1506 ) was a navigator and an admiral for the Crown of Castile . Christopher_Columbus voyages to the Americas began a European effort at exploration and colonization of the continent . eos
voyages to the Americas began a European effort at exploration and colonization of the continent . While history places great significance on Christopher_Columbus first voyage of 1492 , Christopher_Columbus did not actually reach the mainland until Christopher_Columbus third voyage in 1498 . Likewise , Christopher_Columbus was not the earliest European explorer to reach the Americas , as there are accounts of European transatlantic contact prior to 1492 . eos
first voyage of 1492 , Christopher_Columbus did not actually reach the mainland until Christopher_Columbus third voyage in 1498 . Likewise , Christopher_Columbus was not the earliest European explorer to reach the Americas , as there are accounts of European transatlantic contact prior to 1492 . Nevertheless , Christopher_Columbus voyage came at a critical time of growing national imperialism and economic competition between developing nation states seeking wealth from the establishment of trade routes and colonies . eos

voyage came at a critical time of growing national imperialism and economic competition between developing nation states seeking wealth from the establishment of trade routes and colonies . Therefore , the period before 1492 is known as Pre - Columbian , and the anniversary of this event ( vd . Columbus Day ) is celebrated throughout the Americas and in Spain and Italy . eos

( born in Portsmouth , England april 13 , 1949 ) is an author , journalist and literary critic . Now living in Washington , DC , Christopher_Hitchens has been a columnist at Vanity Fair , The Nation and Slate ; additionally , Christopher_Hitchens is an occasional contributor to many other publications . Most recently Christopher_Hitchens has appeared regularly in the Wall Street Journal . eos
has been a columnist at Vanity Fair , The Nation and Slate ; additionally , Christopher_Hitchens is an occasional contributor to many other publications . Most recently Christopher_Hitchens has appeared regularly in the Wall Street Journal . Christopher_Hitchens is known for Christopher_Hitchens iconoclasm , anti - clericalism , atheism , antitheism , anti - fascism and anti - monarchism . eos
is an occasional contributor to many other publications . Most recently Christopher_Hitchens has appeared regularly in the Wall Street Journal . Christopher_Hitchens is known for Christopher_Hitchens iconoclasm , anti - clericalism , atheism , antitheism , anti - fascism and anti - monarchism . eos
has appeared regularly in the Wall Street Journal . Christopher_Hitchens is known for Christopher_Hitchens iconoclasm , anti - clericalism , atheism , antitheism , anti - fascism and anti - monarchism . Christopher_Hitchens is also noted for Christopher_Hitchens acidic wit and Christopher_Hitchens noisy departure from the Anglo - American political left . eos
is known for Christopher_Hitchens iconoclasm , anti - clericalism , atheism , antitheism , anti - fascism and anti - monarchism . Christopher_Hitchens is also noted for Christopher_Hitchens acidic wit and Christopher_Hitchens noisy departure from the Anglo - American political left . Christopher_Hitchens was formerly a Trotskyist and a fixture in the left wing publications of Britain and America . eos

Christopher_Hitchens was formerly a Trotskyist and a fixture in the left wing publications of Britain and America . But a series of disagreements beginning in the early 1990s led to Christopher_Hitchens resignation from The Nation shortly after the september 11 , 2001 , attacks . eos

was formerly a Trotskyist and a fixture in the left wing publications of Britain and America . But a series of disagreements beginning in the early 1990s led to Christopher_Hitchens resignation from The Nation shortly after the september 11 , 2001 , attacks . While Christopher_Hitchens idiosyncratic ideas and positions preclude easy classification , Christopher_Hitchens is a vociferous critic of what Christopher_Hitchens describes as ` ` fascism with an Islamic face , '' and Christopher_Hitchens is sometimes described as a ` ` neoconservative '' . eos
resignation from The Nation shortly after the september 11 , 2001 , attacks . While Christopher_Hitchens idiosyncratic ideas and positions preclude easy classification , Christopher_Hitchens is a vociferous critic of what Christopher_Hitchens describes as ` ` fascism with an Islamic face , '' and Christopher_Hitchens is sometimes described as a ` ` neoconservative '' . Christopher_Hitchens describes Christopher_Hitchens as ` ` on the same side as the neo - conservatives '' , and refers to Christopher_Hitchens ` ` temporary neocon allies '' . eos
idiosyncratic ideas and positions preclude easy classification , Christopher_Hitchens is a vociferous critic of what Christopher_Hitchens describes as ` ` fascism with an Islamic face , '' and Christopher_Hitchens is sometimes described as a ` ` neoconservative '' . Christopher_Hitchens describes Christopher_Hitchens as ` ` on the same side as the neo - conservatives '' , and refers to Christopher_Hitchens ` ` temporary neocon allies '' . Christopher_Hitchens no longer considers Christopher_Hitchens a Trotskyist or even a socialist ; yet Christopher_Hitchens maintains that Christopher_Hitchens political views have not changed significantly . eos

describes Christopher_Hitchens as ` ` on the same side as the neo - conservatives '' , and refers to Christopher_Hitchens ` ` temporary neocon allies '' . Christopher_Hitchens no longer considers Christopher_Hitchens a Trotskyist or even a socialist ; yet Christopher_Hitchens maintains that Christopher_Hitchens political views have not changed significantly . Christopher_Hitchens points out that , throughout Christopher_Hitchens career , Christopher_Hitchens has been both an atheist and an antitheist , and that Christopher_Hitchens has always remained a believer in the Enlightenment values of secularism , humanism and reason ; Christopher_Hitchens is an Honorary Associate of the National Secular Society . eos

OBE , ( born Harry Rodger Webb ; 14 october , 1940 ; Lucknow , India ) is a major pop star and singer from England . With Cliff_Richard backing group The Shadows , Cliff_Richard dominated the British popular music scene in the late 1950s and early 1960s , before the advent of The Beatles . A conversion to Christianity and subsequent softening of Cliff_Richard music led to Cliff_Richard having more of a pop than rock image . eos
backing group The Shadows , Cliff_Richard dominated the British popular music scene in the late 1950s and early 1960s , before the advent of The Beatles . A conversion to Christianity and subsequent softening of Cliff_Richard music led to Cliff_Richard having more of a pop than rock image . Although never able to achieve the same impact in the United States as Cliff_Richard had in Britain , in spite of having several chart hits there , Cliff_Richard has remained a popular music , film , and television personality in the UK and Cliff_Richard also retains a following in several other countries . eos

During the last six decades , Cliff_Richard has charted many hit singles , and Cliff_Richard holds the record ( along with Elvis Presley ) as the only act to make the UK singles charts in all of its active decades ( 1950s-2000s ) . eos

( february 27 , 272-May 22 , 337 ) , commonly known as Constantine I , Constantine the Great , or ( among Eastern Orthodox and Eastern Catholic Christians ) Saint Constantine , was a Roman Emperor , proclaimed Augustus by Constantine_I troops on july 25,306 and Constantine_I ruled an ever - growing portion of the Roman Empire until Constantine_I death . Constantine_I is best remembered in modern times for the Edict of Milan in 313 , which fully legalized Christianity in the Empire , for the first time , and the Council of Nicaea in 325 ; these actions are considered major factors in the spreading of the Christian religion . eos

Constantine_I is best remembered in modern times for the Edict of Milan in 313 , which fully legalized Christianity in the Empire , for the first time , and the Council of Nicaea in 325 ; these actions are considered major factors in the spreading of the Christian religion . Constantine_I reputation as the ` ` first Christian Emperor '' has been promulgated by historians from Lactantius and Eusebius of Caesarea to the present day , although there has been debate over the veracity of Constantine_I faith . eos
is best remembered in modern times for the Edict of Milan in 313 , which fully legalized Christianity in the Empire , for the first time , and the Council of Nicaea in 325 ; these actions are considered major factors in the spreading of the Christian religion . Constantine_I reputation as the ` ` first Christian Emperor '' has been promulgated by historians from Lactantius and Eusebius of Caesarea to the present day , although there has been debate over the veracity of Constantine_I faith . This debate stems from Constantine_I continued support for pagan deities and the fact that Constantine_I was baptized very close to Constantine_I death . eos

( born june 2 , 1953 in Tulsa , Oklahoma ) is a prominent African - American scholar and public intellectual . Formerly at Harvard University , Cornel_West is currently a professor of Religion at Princeton . Cornel_West intellectual contributions draw from such diverse traditions as the African American Baptist Church , Marxism , pragmatism , and transcendentalism . eos

was born december 17 , 1982 in Thornhill , Ontario , Canada . Craig_Kielburger is an accomplished child rights advocate and leadership specialist . Craig_Kielburger also is an award - winning author and a popular speaker , thrice nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize . eos
is an accomplished child rights advocate and leadership specialist . Craig_Kielburger also is an award - winning author and a popular speaker , thrice nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize . Craig_Kielburger has founded Free The Children , the world 's largest network of children helping children through education , and Craig_Kielburger has co - founded Leaders Today , a youth leadership training organization known around the world . eos
also is an award - winning author and a popular speaker , thrice nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize . Craig_Kielburger has founded Free The Children , the world 's largest network of children helping children through education , and Craig_Kielburger has co - founded Leaders Today , a youth leadership training organization known around the world . Since Craig_Kielburger organized the former group at the age of 12 , Craig_Kielburger became famous as a young social activist of remarkable precociousness . eos

( Old Persian : Kuruš , modern Persian : کوروش , Kourosh ; ca . 576 or 590 BC - july 529 BC ) , also known as Cyrus II of Persia and Cyrus the Elder , was the founder of the Persian Empire under the Achaemenid dynasty . eos
conquered the Medes and Cyrus_the_Great unified the two separate Iranian kingdoms ; as the king of Persia , Cyrus_the_Great reigned over the new empire from 559 BC until Cyrus_the_Great death . The empire expanded under Cyrus_the_Great rule , eventually conquering most of Southwest Asia and much of the Indian frontier to create the largest nation the world had yet seen . eos

( july 24 , 1899-september 23 , 1981 ) was a chief of the Tsleil - Waututh , a Salish First Nations people located in Burrard Inlet , British Columbia . Dan_George was also a notable actor . Dan_George was born Geswanouth Slahoot on a First Nations reserve in North Vancouver in 1899 . eos
was also a notable actor . Dan_George was born Geswanouth Slahoot on a First Nations reserve in North Vancouver in 1899 . Dan_George English name was Dan Slaholt . eos
was born Geswanouth Slahoot on a First Nations reserve in North Vancouver in 1899 . Dan_George English name was Dan Slaholt . Dan_George last name was changed to George when Dan_George entered a residential school at the age of 5 . eos
English name was Dan Slaholt . Dan_George last name was changed to George when Dan_George entered a residential school at the age of 5 . Dan_George worked at a number of different jobs including longshoreman , construction worker and school bus driver . eos

At the age of 71 , Dan_George won several awards for Dan_George role in the film Little Big Man , including a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor . Dan_George continued to act in other movies , such as The Outlaw Josey Wales and Harry and Tonto , and on television , including the miniseries Centennial , based on the book by James A Michener . eos

During Dan_George acting career , Dan_George also worked to promote better understanding by non - aboriginals of First Nations people . eos
performed the role of Rita Joe 's father in George Ryga 's stage play , The Ecstasy of Rita Joe , in performances held in Vancouver , the National Arts Centre in Ottawa and Washington . During Dan_George acting career , Dan_George also worked to promote better understanding by non - aboriginals of First Nations people . Dan_George soliloquy , Lament for Confederation , a riveting indictment of the appropriation of native territory by white colonialism , was performed at the city of Vancouver 's celebration of the Canadian centennial in 1967 ; this speech is credited with escalating native political activism in Canada as well as touching off widespread pro - native sentiment among non - natives . eos

In 1971 , Dan_George was made an Officer of the Order of Canada . eos

( b. march 28 1942 in Boston , Massachusetts ) , is a prominent American philosopher . Daniel_Dennett research centers on philosophy of mind , philosophy of science and philosophy of biology , particularly as those fields relate to evolutionary biology and cognitive science . eos

( born march 5 , 1934 in Tel Aviv ) , is an American psychologist , notable for Daniel_Kahneman pioneering work on behavioral finance and hedonic psychology . With Amos Tversky and others , Daniel_Kahneman established a cognitive basis for common human errors using heuristics and in developing prospect theory . Daniel_Kahneman spent Daniel_Kahneman childhood years in Paris , France and Daniel_Kahneman moved to Palestine in 1946 . eos

established a cognitive basis for common human errors using heuristics and in developing prospect theory . Daniel_Kahneman received Daniel_Kahneman BSc in mathematics and psychology from the Hebrew University in Jerusalem in 1954 , after which Daniel_Kahneman served in the Israeli Defense Forces , principally in its psychology department . eos

, OM , CH , CVO , CBE , FRS ( born on May 8 , 1926 in London , England ) is one of the world 's best known broadcasters and naturalists . Widely considered one of the pioneers of the nature documentary , David_Attenborough has written and presented eight major series ( with a ninth in production ) surveying nearly every aspect of life on Earth . David_Attenborough is also a former senior manager at the BBC , having served as controller of BBC2 and director of programming for BBC Television in the 1960s and 1970s . eos
has written and presented eight major series ( with a ninth in production ) surveying nearly every aspect of life on Earth . David_Attenborough is the younger brother of director and actor Richard Attenborough . eos

OBE ( born May 2 , 1975 ) is an English footballer David_Beckham plays for Real Madrid . Named a member of Pelé 's FIFA 100 , David_Beckham is one of the most famous players in the world , and considered a celebrity even outside the football world . David_Beckham is the fifth most capped England player of all time , and in addition to being the only Englishman to score in three different World Cups , David_Beckham is also only the fifth player in World Cup history to score twice from direct free kicks . eos

David_Beckham was captain of the English national team from 15 november 2000 to 2 july , 2006 . eos

( april 30 , 1770 - february 10 , 1857 ) , was an English - Canadian map - maker and explorer , known to native peoples as ` ` the Stargazer '' . David_Thompson_explorer was born in London to Welsh parents , and David_Thompson_explorer died in Montreal ( now Quebec , then Canada East in the Province of Canada ) . David_Thompson_explorer was a fur trader of the Hudson 's Bay Company and North West Company . eos
was born in London to Welsh parents , and David_Thompson_explorer died in Montreal ( now Quebec , then Canada East in the Province of Canada ) . David_Thompson_explorer was a fur trader of the Hudson 's Bay Company and North West Company . In 1785 , David_Thompson_explorer was sent to Canada to serve with the Hudson 's Bay Company , and David_Thompson_explorer served under apprentice for seven years . eos
died in Montreal ( now Quebec , then Canada East in the Province of Canada ) . David_Thompson_explorer was a fur trader of the Hudson 's Bay Company and North West Company . In 1785 , David_Thompson_explorer was sent to Canada to serve with the Hudson 's Bay Company , and David_Thompson_explorer served under apprentice for seven years . eos
was a fur trader of the Hudson 's Bay Company and North West Company . In 1785 , David_Thompson_explorer was sent to Canada to serve with the Hudson 's Bay Company , and David_Thompson_explorer served under apprentice for seven years . From 1792 to 1812 , David_Thompson_explorer explored and mapped the country west of Hudson Bay and Lake Superior , across the Rocky Mountains to the headwaters of the Columbia River and down the Columbia to the Pacific Ocean . eos
was sent to Canada to serve with the Hudson 's Bay Company , and David_Thompson_explorer served under apprentice for seven years . From 1792 to 1812 , David_Thompson_explorer explored and mapped the country west of Hudson Bay and Lake Superior , across the Rocky Mountains to the headwaters of the Columbia River and down the Columbia to the Pacific Ocean . David_Thompson_explorer was the first European to explore the Columbia from source to mouth . eos

explored and mapped the country west of Hudson Bay and Lake Superior , across the Rocky Mountains to the headwaters of the Columbia River and down the Columbia to the Pacific Ocean . David_Thompson_explorer was the first European to explore the Columbia from source to mouth . David_Thompson_explorer joined the Hudson 's Bay Company as an apprentice in 1784 . eos
was the first European to explore the Columbia from source to mouth . David_Thompson_explorer joined the Hudson 's Bay Company as an apprentice in 1784 . In 1797 , David_Thompson_explorer left the Hudson 's Bay Company and David_Thompson_explorer joined the North West Company . eos
joined the Hudson 's Bay Company as an apprentice in 1784 . In 1797 , David_Thompson_explorer left the Hudson 's Bay Company and David_Thompson_explorer joined the North West Company . The maps David_Thompson_explorer made of the Columbia River basin east of the Cascade Mountains were of such high quality and detail that they continued to be regarded as authoritative well into the mid-20th century . eos
left the Hudson 's Bay Company and David_Thompson_explorer joined the North West Company . The maps David_Thompson_explorer made of the Columbia River basin east of the Cascade Mountains were of such high quality and detail that they continued to be regarded as authoritative well into the mid-20th century . The land mass mapped by David_Thompson_explorer amounted to 3.9 million square kilometres of wilderness ( one - fifth of the continent ) . eos
joined the North West Company . The land mass mapped by David_Thompson_explorer amounted to 3.9 million square kilometres of wilderness ( one - fifth of the continent ) . eos
made of the Columbia River basin east of the Cascade Mountains were of such high quality and detail that they continued to be regarded as authoritative well into the mid-20th century . The land mass mapped by David_Thompson_explorer amounted to 3.9 million square kilometres of wilderness ( one - fifth of the continent ) . David_Thompson_explorer contemporary , the great explorer Alexander Mackenzie , remarked that David_Thompson_explorer did more in ten months than he would have thought possible in two years . eos
amounted to 3.9 million square kilometres of wilderness ( one - fifth of the continent ) . David_Thompson_explorer contemporary , the great explorer Alexander Mackenzie , remarked that David_Thompson_explorer did more in ten months than he would have thought possible in two years . David_Thompson_explorer 1814 map , David_Thompson_explorer greatest achievement , was so accurate that 100 years later it was still the basis for many of the maps issued by the Canadian government . eos
contemporary , the great explorer Alexander Mackenzie , remarked that David_Thompson_explorer did more in ten months than he would have thought possible in two years . David_Thompson_explorer 1814 map , David_Thompson_explorer greatest achievement , was so accurate that 100 years later it was still the basis for many of the maps issued by the Canadian government . David_Thompson_explorer also completed the exacting survey of much of the Canada - US boundary along the 49th parallel in the west , and from the St. Lawrence River to Lake of the Woods . eos

and Charlotte had 13 children . In David_Thompson_explorer published journals , David_Thompson_explorer recorded seeing large footprints near what is now Jasper , Alberta , in 1811 . It has been suggested that these prints were similar to what has since been called the sasquatch . eos
published journals , David_Thompson_explorer recorded seeing large footprints near what is now Jasper , Alberta , in 1811 . It has been suggested that these prints were similar to what has since been called the sasquatch . However , David_Thompson_explorer noted that these tracks showed ` ` a small Nail at the end of each "" toe "" '' , and David_Thompson_explorer stated that these tracks ` ` very much resembles a large Bear 's Track '' . eos

David_Thompson_explorer died in Montreal in near obscurity , David_Thompson_explorer achievements almost unrecognized . David_Thompson_explorer is interred there in the Mount Royal Cemetery . eos

CBE DSO and Bar DCand Bar FRAeS DL LegH CdeG RAF ( 21 february 1910 - 5 september 1982 ) ; surname pronounced "" IPA : / ˈbɑːdə / "" ) was a successful fighter pilot in the Royal Air Force during the Second World War . eos
is upheld as an inspirational leader and hero of the era , not least because Douglas_Bader fought despite having lost both legs in a pre - war flying accident . Douglas_Bader brutally forthright , dogmatic and often highly opinionated views ( especially against authority ) coupled with Douglas_Bader boundless energy and enthusiasm inspired adoration and frustration in equal measures with both Douglas_Bader subordinates and peers . eos

( b. june 10 , 1929 in Birmingham , Alabama USA ) is a distinguished biologist ( Myrmecology , a branch of entomology ) , researcher ( sociobiology , biodiversity ) and theorist ( consilience , biophilia ) , a naturalist ( conservationism ) , and a prominent man of letters . E._O._Wilson is known for E._O._Wilson remarkably prolific career as a scientist , E._O._Wilson advocacy for environmentalism , and E._O._Wilson scientific humanist ideas concerned with religious , moral , and ethical matters . E._O._Wilson is currently the Pellegrino Research Professor in Entomology for the Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology at Harvard University . eos

( born april 21 , 1965 in Carman , Manitoba , Canada ) is an NHL goalie Ed_Belfour currently plays for the Florida Panthers of the National Hockey League . Ed_Belfour was born in Carman , Manitoba and Ed_Belfour grew up playing hockey . Ed_Belfour played junior hockey for the Winkler Flyers before going to the University of North Dakota where Ed_Belfour helped the school win the NCAA championship in the 1986 - 87 season . eos
currently plays for the Florida Panthers of the National Hockey League . Ed_Belfour was born in Carman , Manitoba and Ed_Belfour grew up playing hockey . was born in Carman , Manitoba and Ed_Belfour grew up playing hockey . Ed_Belfour played junior hockey for the Winkler Flyers before going to the University of North Dakota where Ed_Belfour helped the school win the NCAA championship in the 1986 - 87 season . The following year , Ed_Belfour signed as a free agent with the Chicago Blackhawks , alternating time between them and the Saginaw Hawks of the International Hockey League . eos

( 17 june 1239 - 7 july 1307 ) , popularly known as ` ` Longshanks '' because of Edward_I_of_England 6 foot 2 inch ( 1.88 m ) frame and the ` ` Hammer of the Scots '' ( Edward_I_of_England tombstone , in Latin , read , Edwardus Primus Scotorum Malleus hic est , 1308 . Pactum Serva , ` ` Here is Edward I , Hammer of the Scots '' ; though this inscription was probably added in the sixteenth century ) , achieved fame as the monarch who conquered Wales and who kept Scotland under English domination during Edward_I_of_England lifetime . eos

, FRS , ( May 17 , 1749 - january 26 , 1823 ) was an English country doctor Edward_Jenner studied nature and Edward_Jenner natural surroundings from childhood and Edward_Jenner practiced medicine in Berkeley , Gloucestershire , England . Edward_Jenner is famous as the first doctor to introduce and study the smallpox vaccine . Edward_Jenner trained in Sodbury , Gloucestershire as an apprentice to Dr. Ludlow for 8 years from the age of 13 , then Edward_Jenner went up to London in 1770 to study under the surgeon John Hunter ( a noted experimentalist , and later a fellow of the Royal Society ) and others at St George 's Hospital . eos

William Osler records that Edward_Jenner was a student to Edward_Jenner Hunter repeated William Harvey 's advice , very famous in medical circles , ` ` Do n't think , try '' . eos
trained in Sodbury , Gloucestershire as an apprentice to Dr. Ludlow for 8 years from the age of 13 , then Edward_Jenner went up to London in 1770 to study under the surgeon John Hunter ( a noted experimentalist , and later a fellow of the Royal Society ) and others at St George 's Hospital . William Osler records that Edward_Jenner was a student to Edward_Jenner Hunter repeated William Harvey 's advice , very famous in medical circles , ` ` Do n't think , try '' . Edward_Jenner therefore was early noticed by men famous for advancing the practice and institutions of medicine , and Hunter remained in correspondence with Edward_Jenner over natural history and proposed Edward_Jenner for the Royal Society . eos
went up to London in 1770 to study under the surgeon John Hunter ( a noted experimentalist , and later a fellow of the Royal Society ) and others at St George 's Hospital . William Osler records that Edward_Jenner was a student to Edward_Jenner Hunter repeated William Harvey 's advice , very famous in medical circles , ` ` Do n't think , try '' . Edward_Jenner therefore was early noticed by men famous for advancing the practice and institutions of medicine , and Hunter remained in correspondence with Edward_Jenner over natural history and proposed Edward_Jenner for the Royal Society . eos
was a student to Edward_Jenner Hunter repeated William Harvey 's advice , very famous in medical circles , ` ` Do n't think , try '' . Edward_Jenner therefore was early noticed by men famous for advancing the practice and institutions of medicine , and Hunter remained in correspondence with Edward_Jenner over natural history and proposed Edward_Jenner for the Royal Society . Returning to Edward_Jenner native countryside , by 1773 Edward_Jenner became a successful general practitioner and surgeon , practicing in purpose - built premises at Berkeley . eos
Hunter repeated William Harvey 's advice , very famous in medical circles , ` ` Do n't think , try '' . Edward_Jenner therefore was early noticed by men famous for advancing the practice and institutions of medicine , and Hunter remained in correspondence with Edward_Jenner over natural history and proposed Edward_Jenner for the Royal Society . Returning to Edward_Jenner native countryside , by 1773 Edward_Jenner became a successful general practitioner and surgeon , practicing in purpose - built premises at Berkeley . eos
therefore was early noticed by men famous for advancing the practice and institutions of medicine , and Hunter remained in correspondence with Edward_Jenner over natural history and proposed Edward_Jenner for the Royal Society . Returning to Edward_Jenner native countryside , by 1773 Edward_Jenner became a successful general practitioner and surgeon , practicing in purpose - built premises at Berkeley . Edward_Jenner and others formed a medical society in Rodborough , Gloucestershire , meeting to read papers on medical subjects and dine together . eos

Edward_Jenner contributed papers on angina pectoris , ophthalmia and valvular disease of the heart and Edward_Jenner commented on cowpox . eos

Edward_Jenner was elected Fellow of the Royal Society in 1788 , following a careful study combining observation , experiment and dissection into a description of the previously misunderstood life of the cuckoo in the nest . eos

also belonged to a similar society which met in Alveston , near Bristol . Edward_Jenner was elected Fellow of the Royal Society in 1788 , following a careful study combining observation , experiment and dissection into a description of the previously misunderstood life of the cuckoo in the nest . Edward_Jenner description of the newly - hatched cuckoo pushing its host 's eggs and fledglings from the nest ( contrary to the existing belief that the adult cuckoo did it ) was only confirmed in the 20th century when photography became feasible . eos
was elected Fellow of the Royal Society in 1788 , following a careful study combining observation , experiment and dissection into a description of the previously misunderstood life of the cuckoo in the nest . Edward_Jenner description of the newly - hatched cuckoo pushing its host 's eggs and fledglings from the nest ( contrary to the existing belief that the adult cuckoo did it ) was only confirmed in the 20th century when photography became feasible . Having observed the behaviour , Edward_Jenner demonstrated an anatomical adaptation for it - the baby cuckoo has a depression in its back which is not present after 12 days of life , in which it cups eggs and other chicks to push them out of the nest . eos
description of the newly - hatched cuckoo pushing its host 's eggs and fledglings from the nest ( contrary to the existing belief that the adult cuckoo did it ) was only confirmed in the 20th century when photography became feasible . Having observed the behaviour , Edward_Jenner demonstrated an anatomical adaptation for it - the baby cuckoo has a depression in its back which is not present after 12 days of life , in which it cups eggs and other chicks to push them out of the nest . It had been assumed that the adult bird did this , but the adult does not remain in the area for sufficiently long . eos
demonstrated an anatomical adaptation for it - the baby cuckoo has a depression in its back which is not present after 12 days of life , in which it cups eggs and other chicks to push them out of the nest . It had been assumed that the adult bird did this , but the adult does not remain in the area for sufficiently long . Edward_Jenner findings were published in the Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society in 1787 . eos
findings were published in the Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society in 1787 . Some discrepancies in the paper are ascribed to Edward_Jenner nephew who is said to have made up some observations . Edward_Jenner married Catherine Kingscote ( died 1815 from tuberculosis ) in march 1788 having met her when balloons were hot science , and Edward_Jenner and other Fellows were experimenting with them . eos
nephew who is said to have made up some observations . Edward_Jenner married Catherine Kingscote ( died 1815 from tuberculosis ) in march 1788 having met her when balloons were hot science , and Edward_Jenner and other Fellows were experimenting with them . Edward_Jenner trial balloon descended into Kingscote Park , owned by Anthony Kingscote , Catherine being one of his three daughters . eos

Edward_Jenner trial balloon descended into Kingscote Park , owned by Anthony Kingscote , Catherine being one of his three daughters . In 1792 , Edward_Jenner obtained Edward_Jenner MD from the University of St Andrews . eos

( born 30 june , 1946 ) , a professor of English and American Literature and Language , is the Walter M Cabot Professor of Aesthetics and the General Theory of Value at Harvard University . Elaine_Scarry interests include Theory of Representation , the Language of Physical Pain and Structure of Verbal and Material Making in Art , Science and the Law . Elaine_Scarry is the author of The Body in Pain which is known as a definitive study of pain and inflicting pain . eos
interests include Theory of Representation , the Language of Physical Pain and Structure of Verbal and Material Making in Art , Science and the Law . Elaine_Scarry is the author of The Body in Pain which is known as a definitive study of pain and inflicting pain . Elaine_Scarry argues that physical pain leads to destruction and the unmaking of the human world , whereas human creation at the opposite end of the spectrum leads to the making of the world . eos
is the author of The Body in Pain which is known as a definitive study of pain and inflicting pain . Elaine_Scarry argues that physical pain leads to destruction and the unmaking of the human world , whereas human creation at the opposite end of the spectrum leads to the making of the world . As a writer and lecturer on civic questions ranging from plane crashes to nuclear weapons to the Patriot Act , Elaine_Scarry has become an important public intellectual . eos
argues that physical pain leads to destruction and the unmaking of the human world , whereas human creation at the opposite end of the spectrum leads to the making of the world . As a writer and lecturer on civic questions ranging from plane crashes to nuclear weapons to the Patriot Act , Elaine_Scarry has become an important public intellectual . ( Elaine_Scarry discusses this public role in an interview in the book , Global Values 101 , published by Beacon Press in 2006 . ) eos

( Elizabeth Angela Marguerite ; 4 august 1900 - 30 march 2002 ) was the Queen Consort of King George VI from 1936 until his death in 1952 . After Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon husband 's death , Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was known as Queen Elizabeth , The Queen Mother , to avoid confusion with Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon eldest daughter , Queen Elizabeth II . Before Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon husband ascended the throne , from 1923 to 1936 , Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was known as the Duchess of York . eos
husband 's death , Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was known as Queen Elizabeth , The Queen Mother , to avoid confusion with Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon eldest daughter , Queen Elizabeth II . Before Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon husband ascended the throne , from 1923 to 1936 , Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was known as the Duchess of York . Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was the last Queen of Ireland and Empress of India . eos
was known as Queen Elizabeth , The Queen Mother , to avoid confusion with Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon eldest daughter , Queen Elizabeth II . Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was the last Queen of Ireland and Empress of India . eos

As Queen Consort , Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was famous for Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon role in providing moral support to the British public during World War II , so much so that Adolf Hitler described Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon as ` ` the most dangerous woman in Europe . '' In Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon later years , Elizabeth_Bowes-Lyon was a consistently popular member of the British Royal Family , when other members of the family were suffering from low levels of public approval . eos

( july 14 , 1858 - june 14 , 1928 ) was one of the founders of the British suffragette movement . It is the name of ` ` Mrs Pankhurst '' , more than any other , which is associated with the struggle for the enfranchisement of women in the period immediately preceding World War I eos
was born Emmeline Goulden in Manchester , England to abolitionist Robert Goulden and feminist Sophia Crane , and Emmeline_Pankhurst married Richard Marsden Pankhurst , a barrister , in Salford in 1879 . Dr Pankhurst was already a supporter of the women 's suffrage movement , and had been the author of the Married Women 's Property Acts of 1870 and 1882 . In 1889 , Emmeline_Pankhurst founded the Women 's Franchise League , but Emmeline_Pankhurst campaign was interrupted by Emmeline_Pankhurst husband 's death in 1898 . eos
married Richard Marsden Pankhurst , a barrister , in Salford in 1879 . Dr Pankhurst was already a supporter of the women 's suffrage movement , and had been the author of the Married Women 's Property Acts of 1870 and 1882 . In 1889 , Emmeline_Pankhurst founded the Women 's Franchise League , but Emmeline_Pankhurst campaign was interrupted by Emmeline_Pankhurst husband 's death in 1898 . eos
founded the Women 's Franchise League , but Emmeline_Pankhurst campaign was interrupted by Emmeline_Pankhurst husband 's death in 1898 . In 1903 Emmeline_Pankhurst founded the better - known Women 's Social and Political Union , an organization most famous for its militancy which began in 1905 . Its members included Annie Kenney , Emily Wilding Davison who was killed by the King 's horse in the 1913 Epsom Derby as the result of a suffragette protest , and the composer Dame Ethel Mary Smyth . eos
campaign was interrupted by Emmeline_Pankhurst husband 's death in 1898 . In 1903 Emmeline_Pankhurst founded the better - known Women 's Social and Political Union , an organization most famous for its militancy which began in 1905 . Its members included Annie Kenney , Emily Wilding Davison who was killed by the King 's horse in the 1913 Epsom Derby as the result of a suffragette protest , and the composer Dame Ethel Mary Smyth . eos
husband 's death in 1898 . In 1903 Emmeline_Pankhurst founded the better - known Women 's Social and Political Union , an organization most famous for its militancy which began in 1905 . Its members included Annie Kenney , Emily Wilding Davison who was killed by the King 's horse in the 1913 Epsom Derby as the result of a suffragette protest , and the composer Dame Ethel Mary Smyth . eos
founded the better - known Women 's Social and Political Union , an organization most famous for its militancy which began in 1905 . Its members included Annie Kenney , Emily Wilding Davison who was killed by the King 's horse in the 1913 Epsom Derby as the result of a suffragette protest , and the composer Dame Ethel Mary Smyth . Emmeline_Pankhurst was joined in the movement by Emmeline_Pankhurst daughters , Christabel Pankhurst and Sylvia Pankhurst , both of whom would make a substantial contribution to the campaign in different ways . eos
was joined in the movement by Emmeline_Pankhurst daughters , Christabel Pankhurst and Sylvia Pankhurst , both of whom would make a substantial contribution to the campaign in different ways . Emmeline_Pankhurst other daughter , Adela Pankhurst emigrated to Australia where she was politically active in first the Communist Party of Australia and then the fascist Australia First Movement . eos
daughters , Christabel Pankhurst and Sylvia Pankhurst , both of whom would make a substantial contribution to the campaign in different ways . All attempts to gain votes for women were put on hold , and Emmeline_Pankhurst efforts were instead directed to urging women to take over men 's jobs , so that the men could go and fight in the war . With back up from David Lloyd George , Emmeline_Pankhurst organised a parade of 30,000 women , using £ 2,000 funding from the government , to encourage employers to let women take over men 's jobs in industry . eos
efforts were instead directed to urging women to take over men 's jobs , so that the men could go and fight in the war . With back up from David Lloyd George , Emmeline_Pankhurst organised a parade of 30,000 women , using £ 2,000 funding from the government , to encourage employers to let women take over men 's jobs in industry . In 1916 , this allowed the government to draft all able - bodied men into the armed services . eos
organised a parade of 30,000 women , using £ 2,000 funding from the government , to encourage employers to let women take over men 's jobs in industry . In 1916 , this allowed the government to draft all able - bodied men into the armed services . It is frequently alleged that suffragettes had earlier been involved in the ` ` White Feather Campaign '' which involved shaming of men in the UK to fight in the First World War in which 702,000 men from the UK died and many more were injured ; however , there is no concrete evidence of this . eos
lived in an apartment that was located at 159 Knightsbridge , London . The address still exists , but is now operating as Hotel . ` ` Characteristically , Mrs. Pankhurst threw all her energies and all her influence into the effort , which now , designated itself pro - war and pro - conscription . eos
and sister rallied their followers in an effort to reroute the militant momentum which they had so successfully orchestrated in the struggle for suffrage : On september 8 , 1914 , Christabel re - appeared at the London Opera House , after her long exile , to utter a declaration , not on women 's enfranchisement , but on ` ` The German Peril '' . Emmeline_Pankhurst toured the country , making recruiting speeches . Emmeline_Pankhurst supporters handed the white feather to every young man they encountered wearing civilian dress , and bobbed up at Hyde Park meetings with placards : ` ` Intern Them All '' . Britain started to implement voting rights for women , in the same year as Ireland , in march 1918 . eos

supporters handed the white feather to every young man they encountered wearing civilian dress , and bobbed up at Hyde Park meetings with placards : ` ` Intern Them All '' . Britain started to implement voting rights for women , in the same year as Ireland , in march 1918 . While the Representation of the People Act 1918 only gave voting rights to women over 30 , and that with a property qualification , while all men over 21 were enfranchised , the Suffragettes nevertheless saw it as a great victory . eos
died at the age of 69 , ten years after seeing Emmeline_Pankhurst most ardently pursued goal come to fruition . eos

, MBE , PC , ( june 16 , 1912 - february 8 , 1998 ) was a right - wing British politician and Conservative Party Member of Parliament ( MP ) between 1950 and february 1974 , and an Ulster Unionist MP between october 1974 and 1987 . ( also referred to as Euclid of Alexandria ) ( Greek : Εὐκλείδης ) ( c. 325 eos
lived in Alexandria , Hellenistic Egypt , almost certainly during the reign of Ptolemy I ( 323 BC-283 BC ) , is often considered to be the ` ` father of geometry '' . Euclid most popular work , Elements , is thought to be one of the most successful textbooks in the history of mathematics . Within it , the properties of geometrical objects are deduced from a small set of axioms , thereby founding the axiomatic method of mathematics . eos
most popular work , Elements , is thought to be one of the most successful textbooks in the history of mathematics . Within it , the properties of geometrical objects are deduced from a small set of axioms , thereby founding the axiomatic method of mathematics . Although best - known for its geometric results , the Elements also includes various results in number theory , such as the connection between perfect numbers and Mersenne primes , the proof of the infinitude of prime numbers , Euclid lemma on factorization ( which lead to the fundamental theorem of arithmetic , on uniqueness of prime factorizations ) , and the Euclidean algorithm for finding the greatest common divisor of two numbers . eos
lemma on factorization ( which lead to the fundamental theorem of arithmetic , on uniqueness of prime factorizations ) , and the Euclidean algorithm for finding the greatest common divisor of two numbers . Euclid also wrote works on perspective , conic sections , spherical geometry , and possibly quadric surfaces . Neither the year nor place of Euclid birth have been established , nor the circumstances of Euclid death . eos
also wrote works on perspective , conic sections , spherical geometry , and possibly quadric surfaces . Neither the year nor place of Euclid birth have been established , nor the circumstances of Euclid death . eos
birth have been established , nor the circumstances of Euclid death . eos
death . eos
( born january 20 1964 , Mumbai , India ) is a writer and journalist specializing in international relations . Fareed_Zakaria was named editor of Newsweek International in october 2000 ; the magazine reaches an audience of 3.5 million worldwide . eos

OC , BA , D Litt ( born May 12 , 1921 in Belleville , Ontario ) is a conservationist and one of Canada 's most widely - read authors . Many of Farley_Mowat most popular works have been memoirs of Farley_Mowat childhood , Farley_Mowat war service , and Farley_Mowat work as a naturalist . Farley_Mowat works have been translated into 52 languages and Farley_Mowat has sold more than 14 million copies of Farley_Mowat books . eos

, at the service of Spain , led the first successful attempt to sail around the entire Earth . Ferdinand_Magellan did not complete Ferdinand_Magellan final , westward voyage ; Ferdinand_Magellan was killed during the Battle of Mactan in the Philippines . Ferdinand_Magellan did , however , die farther west than the Spice Islands of Indonesia , which Ferdinand_Magellan had visited from the west on earlier voyages , making Ferdinand_Magellan one of the first individuals to cross all the meridians of the globe . eos

, 1st Viscount St Alban , KC ( 22 january 1561 - 9 april 1626 ) was an English philosopher , statesman and essayist but Francis_Bacon is best known for leading the scientific revolution with Francis_Bacon new ` observation and experimentation ' theory which is the way science has been conducted ever since . Francis_Bacon was knighted in 1603 , created Baron Verulam in 1618 , and created Viscount St Alban in 1621 ; both peerage titles became extinct upon Francis_Bacon death . Francis_Bacon began Francis_Bacon professional life as a lawyer , but Francis_Bacon has become best known as a philosophical advocate and defender of the scientific revolution . eos
is best known for leading the scientific revolution with Francis_Bacon new ` observation and experimentation ' theory which is the way science has been conducted ever since . Francis_Bacon works establish and popularize an inductive methodology for scientific inquiry , often called the Baconian method . , Vice Admiral , ( c. 1540 - january 28 1596 ) was an English privateer , navigator , naval pioneer and raider , politician and civil engineer of the Elizabethan era , considered by many a pirate . Francis_Drake was second - in - command of the English fleet against the Spanish Armada in 1588 . Francis_Drake died of dysentery while unsuccessfully attacking San Juan , Puerto Rico in 1596 . eos

( c. 1475-june 26 , 1541 ) was a Spanish conquistador , conqueror of the Inca Empire and founder of the city of Lima , the modern - day capital of Peru . Francisco_Pizarro was born in Trujillo , ( Extremadura ) , Spain . eos
was born in Trujillo , ( Extremadura ) , Spain . Sources differ in the birth year they assign to Francisco_Pizarro : 1471 , 1475 - 1478 , or unknown . Francisco_Pizarro was an illegitimate son of Gonzalo Pizarro ( senior ) who as colonel of infantry afterwards served in Italy under Gonzalo Fernández de Córdoba , and in Navarre , with some distinction . eos
: 1471 , 1475 - 1478 , or unknown . Francisco_Pizarro was an illegitimate son of Gonzalo Pizarro ( senior ) who as colonel of infantry afterwards served in Italy under Gonzalo Fernández de Córdoba , and in Navarre , with some distinction . Francisco_Pizarro was the eldest brother of Gonzalo Pizarro ( junior ) , Juan Pizarro , and Hernando Pizarro . eos
was an illegitimate son of Gonzalo Pizarro ( senior ) who as colonel of infantry afterwards served in Italy under Gonzalo Fernández de Córdoba , and in Navarre , with some distinction . Francisco_Pizarro was the eldest brother of Gonzalo Pizarro ( junior ) , Juan Pizarro , and Hernando Pizarro . Francisco_Pizarro was the second cousin of Hernán Cortés , the Conquistador of Mexico . eos

Francisco_Pizarro is heard of in 1510 as having taken part in an expedition from Hispaniola to Urab under Alonso de Ojeda , by whom Francisco_Pizarro was entrusted with charge of the unfortunate settlement at San Sebastián . eos
sailed to the New World in 1502 , landing in the West Indies and Francisco_Pizarro lived on the island of Hispaniola , where Francisco_Pizarro took part in various Spanish missions of exploration and conquest . Francisco_Pizarro is heard of in 1510 as having taken part in an expedition from Hispaniola to Urab under Alonso de Ojeda , by whom Francisco_Pizarro was entrusted with charge of the unfortunate settlement at San Sebastián . In 1513 , Francisco_Pizarro accompanied Vasco Núñez de Balboa ( whom Francisco_Pizarro later helped to bring to the executioner 's block ) in his crossing of the Isthmus of Panama to discover the Pacific and to establish a settlement at Darién , Panama . eos

"" IPA : fʀɑ̃ˈswa mɔˈʀis mitɛˈʀɑ̃ "" ( october 26 , 1916 - january 8 , 1996 ) was a French politician . eos
was elected President of France in May 1981 , re - elected in 1988 and Francois_Mitterrand held office until 1995 . As of 2006 , Francois_Mitterrand holds the record of longest serving ( 14 years ) President of France . Francois_Mitterrand is also the oldest President of the Fifth Republic leaving office at 78 . eos

, OM , KBE FRS ( 1 june 1907 - 9 august 1996 ) was a Royal Air Force officer Frank_Whittle invented the jet engine . Due to funding and manufacturing problems and a lack of foresight on the part of the British Government in keeping sensitive patents secret , Hans von Ohain of Germany was able to beat Frank_Whittle to production models but Frank_Whittle work and tireless efforts to produce Frank_Whittle designs given official lack of interest are legendary . By the end of the war , Frank_Whittle efforts and Britain 's superior high - temperature alloys resulted in engines that led the world in performance for the next decade . eos
invented the jet engine . By the end of the war , Frank_Whittle efforts and Britain 's superior high - temperature alloys resulted in engines that led the world in performance for the next decade . eos

Frank_Whittle and Ohain met after the war and initially Frank_Whittle was angry with him as Frank_Whittle felt Ohain had stolen Frank_Whittle ideas . eos
