( september 5 1946 - november 24 1991 ) was a rock musician , best known as the frontman and lead singer for the English rock band Queen . Freddie_Mercury is remembered for Freddie_Mercury powerful vocal abilities and charisma as a live performer . As a songwriter , Freddie_Mercury composed many international hits , including ` ` Bohemian Rhapsody '' , ` ` Somebody to Love '' , ` ` We Are the Champions '' and ` ` Crazy Little Thing Called Love . '' eos
is remembered for Freddie_Mercury powerful vocal abilities and charisma as a live performer . As a songwriter , Freddie_Mercury composed many international hits , including ` ` Bohemian Rhapsody '' , ` ` Somebody to Love '' , ` ` We Are the Champions '' and ` ` Crazy Little Thing Called Love . '' Freddie_Mercury died from complications of AD , greatly increasing public awareness of the disease . eos

, KBE , MC , MD , FRSC ( november 14 , 1891 - february 21 , 1941 ) was a Canadian medical scientist , doctor and Nobel laureate noted as one of the co - discovers of insulin . Frederick_Banting was born in Alliston , Ontario , Canada . After studying medicine at the University of Toronto and graduating in 1916 , Frederick_Banting served in the Canadian Army Medical Corps during World War eos
was born in Alliston , Ontario , Canada . After studying medicine at the University of Toronto and graduating in 1916 , Frederick_Banting served in the Canadian Army Medical Corps during World War I Frederick_Banting won the Military Cross during the war . eos
served in the Canadian Army Medical Corps during World War I Frederick_Banting won the Military Cross during the war . After the war , Frederick_Banting returned to Canada and between 1919 and 1920 eos
won the Military Cross during the war . After the war , Frederick_Banting returned to Canada and between 1919 and 1920 Frederick_Banting completed Frederick_Banting training as an orthopedic surgeon at the Hospital for Sick Children in Toronto . eos
returned to Canada and between 1919 and 1920 Frederick_Banting completed Frederick_Banting training as an orthopedic surgeon at the Hospital for Sick Children in Toronto . In july 1920 Frederick_Banting began to practice medicine in London , Ontario and give lectures on endocrinology at the University of Western Ontario . eos
completed Frederick_Banting training as an orthopedic surgeon at the Hospital for Sick Children in Toronto . In july 1920 Frederick_Banting began to practice medicine in London , Ontario and give lectures on endocrinology at the University of Western Ontario . There , on the night of 31 october , 1920 , during Frederick_Banting routine reading of articles in a medical journal , Frederick_Banting wrote down an idea for a method to isolate the internal secretion of the pancreas , the crucial step needed for effective treatment for diabetes . eos

In july 1920 Frederick_Banting began to practice medicine in London , Ontario and give lectures on endocrinology at the University of Western Ontario . There , on the night of 31 october , 1920 , during Frederick_Banting routine reading of articles in a medical journal , Frederick_Banting wrote down an idea for a method to isolate the internal secretion of the pancreas , the crucial step needed for effective treatment for diabetes . eos
began to practice medicine in London , Ontario and give lectures on endocrinology at the University of Western Ontario . There , on the night of 31 october , 1920 , during Frederick_Banting routine reading of articles in a medical journal , Frederick_Banting wrote down an idea for a method to isolate the internal secretion of the pancreas , the crucial step needed for effective treatment for diabetes . Up to that point , all methods to obtain a useful secretion which could be safely administered to humans had proved unsuccessful . eos
wrote down an idea for a method to isolate the internal secretion of the pancreas , the crucial step needed for effective treatment for diabetes . Up to that point , all methods to obtain a useful secretion which could be safely administered to humans had proved unsuccessful . Dissatisfied with Frederick_Banting practice and fascinated by Frederick_Banting idea , Frederick_Banting left London and Frederick_Banting moved to Toronto . eos
routine reading of articles in a medical journal , Frederick_Banting wrote down an idea for a method to isolate the internal secretion of the pancreas , the crucial step needed for effective treatment for diabetes . During a summer of intense work , Frederick_Banting tested Frederick_Banting idea , performing operations on dogs to tie up their pancreatic ducts , which resulted in a partial atrophy of the pancreas . eos
, the young graduate student Charles Best . During a summer of intense work , Frederick_Banting tested Frederick_Banting idea , performing operations on dogs to tie up their pancreatic ducts , which resulted in a partial atrophy of the pancreas . eos
tested Frederick_Banting idea , performing operations on dogs to tie up their pancreatic ducts , which resulted in a partial atrophy of the pancreas . The pancreas would be then removed some weeks later , with the hope that it would then contain a high concentration of uncontaminated secretion of the pancreas . An extract would then be made from it and administered to dogs with diabetes , to test whether it could treat their diabetes through lowering the blood sugar level . eos

An extract would then be made from it and administered to dogs with diabetes , to test whether it could treat their diabetes through lowering the blood sugar level . eos
that Frederick_Banting method was working , and that Frederick_Banting could keep dogs with diabetes alive with Frederick_Banting extract . Frederick_Banting enthusiastically reported Frederick_Banting findings to Macleod , who had been away on his summer holidays during this time . In retrospect , some claim that Frederick_Banting experiments were crude and did not prove the validity of Frederick_Banting idea , which was not physiologically sound in any case . eos

The use of dog pancreases proved impractical and was soon abandoned in favour of using pancreas from calves and cows . eos

and Macleod received the Nobel Prize in Medicine . Frederick_Banting shared the award money with Best , believing that Best deserved the Prize more than Macleod , who in turn shared his award money with Collip . Frederick_Banting was widely esteemed in Canada as the first Canadian to achieve worldwide scientific fame . eos

( born december 15 , 1923 ) is an English - born physicist and mathematician , famous for Freeman_Dyson work in quantum mechanics , nuclear weapons design and policy , and for Freeman_Dyson serious theorizing in futurism and science fiction concepts , including the search for extraterrestrial intelligence . Freeman_Dyson is a lifelong opponent of nationalism , and proponent of nuclear disarmament and international cooperation . Freeman_Dyson is a member of the Board of Sponsors of The Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists . eos
work in quantum mechanics , nuclear weapons design and policy , and for Freeman_Dyson serious theorizing in futurism and science fiction concepts , including the search for extraterrestrial intelligence . Freeman_Dyson is a member of the Board of Sponsors of The Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists . eos

Freeman_Dyson is a member of the Board of Sponsors of The Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists . eos

, also known as Gabo ( born march 6 , 1928 ) , is a Colombian novelist , journalist , publisher , political activist , and recipient of the 1982 Nobel Prize in Literature . Born in the town of Aracataca in the department of Magdalena , Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez has lived mostly in Mexico and Europe and Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez currently spends much of Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez time in Mexico City . Widely credited with introducing the global public to magical realism , Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez has secured both significant critical acclaim and widespread commercial success . eos
has lived mostly in Mexico and Europe and Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez currently spends much of Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez time in Mexico City . Widely credited with introducing the global public to magical realism , Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez has secured both significant critical acclaim and widespread commercial success . A growing consensus of literary scholars holds that Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez ranks alongside Jorge Luis Borges and Julio Cortázar as one of South America 's greatest 20th - century authors . eos
currently spends much of Gabriel_Garcia_Marquez time in Mexico City . , Latin : ; Claudius Galenus of Pergamum ( 129 - 200 AD ) , better known in English as Galen , was an ancient Greek physician . The forename ` ` Claudius '' is absent in Greek texts ; it was first documented in texts from the Renaissance . eos
views dominated European medicine for over a thousand years . eos
( pron . "" IPA : káu ɕĭŋ tɕiɛ̂n "" ; "" Chinese : 高行健 , Pinyin : "" "" "" ; born january 4 , 1940 ) , is a Chinese emigré novelist , dramatist and critic , Gao_Xingjian received the 2000 Nobel Prize in Literature . Gao_Xingjian is also a noted translator , stage director and painter . eos
received the 2000 Nobel Prize in Literature . Gao_Xingjian is also a noted translator , stage director and painter . Born in Ganzhou , Jiangxi , China , Gao_Xingjian is now a French citizen . eos
is also a noted translator , stage director and painter . Born in Ganzhou , Jiangxi , China , Gao_Xingjian is now a French citizen . In 1992 Gao_Xingjian was awarded the Chevalier de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres by the French government . eos
is now a French citizen . In 1992 Gao_Xingjian was awarded the Chevalier de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres by the French government . Although the general position by the Chinese media and government towards Gao_Xingjian is that of silence , the Yangcheng Evening News , a state - run newspaper , in 2001 , criticized one of Gao_Xingjian works . eos

( born december 2 , 1930 ) is an American economist . A professor at the University of Chicago , Gary_Becker won the 1992 Bank of Sweden Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel for ` ` having extended the domain of microeconomic analysis to a wide range of human behavior and interaction , including non - market behavior '' . Gary_Becker is also a member of the Hoover Institution and the National Bureau of Economic Research . eos
won the 1992 Bank of Sweden Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel for ` ` having extended the domain of microeconomic analysis to a wide range of human behavior and interaction , including non - market behavior '' . Gary_Becker is also a member of the Hoover Institution and the National Bureau of Economic Research . Born in Pottsville , Pennsylvania , Gary_Becker earned a BA at Princeton University in 1951 and a PhD at the University of Chicago in 1955 . eos
is also a member of the Hoover Institution and the National Bureau of Economic Research . Born in Pottsville , Pennsylvania , Gary_Becker earned a BA at Princeton University in 1951 and a PhD at the University of Chicago in 1955 . Gary_Becker taught at Columbia University from 1957 to 1968 , and Gary_Becker then returned to Chicago , where Gary_Becker still teaches price theory to the new graduate students each year . eos

Gary_Becker won the John Bates Clark Medal in 1967 . eos

Gary_Becker was one of the first economists to branch into what were traditionally considered topics belonging to sociology , including racial discrimination , crime , family organization , and drug addiction . eos

Gary_Becker is known for arguing that many different types of human behavior can be seen as rational and utility maximizing . eos

Gary_Becker is known for arguing that many different types of human behavior can be seen as rational and utility maximizing . Gary_Becker approach can include altruistic behavior by defining individuals ' utility appropriately . eos

Gary_Becker explains that Gary_Becker framework of analysis is not a traditional self - interested motivation but rather an analysis based on a set of assumptions and individual preferences . eos

( Serbian Cyrillic : Гаврило Принцип ) ( pronounced ( gäv ' ri : lo : eos
assassinated Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria and his wife Sophie , Duchess of Hohenberg in Sarajevo on june 28 , 1914 . The event , known as the assassination in Sarajevo , prompted the Austrian action against Serbia that led to World War I. eos

forged a powerful army based on meritocracy to become one of the most successful military leaders in the whole of history . While Genghis_Khan image in most of the world is that of a ruthless , bloodthirsty conqueror , Genghis_Khan is an iconic and beloved figure in Mongolia , where Genghis_Khan is seen as the father of the Mongol Nation ( see also Mongolia ) . Before becoming a Khan , Genghis_Khan eliminated and united many of the nomadic tribes of north East Asia and Central Asia under a social identity as the ` ` Mongols . '' eos
image in most of the world is that of a ruthless , bloodthirsty conqueror , Genghis_Khan is an iconic and beloved figure in Mongolia , where Genghis_Khan is seen as the father of the Mongol Nation ( see also Mongolia ) . Before becoming a Khan , Genghis_Khan eliminated and united many of the nomadic tribes of north East Asia and Central Asia under a social identity as the ` ` Mongols . '' Starting with the invasion of Western Xia and Jin Dynasty in northern China and consolidating through numerous conquests including the Khwarezmid Empire in Persia , Mongol rule across the Eurasian landmass radically altered the demography and geopolitics of these areas . eos

eliminated and united many of the nomadic tribes of north East Asia and Central Asia under a social identity as the ` ` Mongols . '' Starting with the invasion of Western Xia and Jin Dynasty in northern China and consolidating through numerous conquests including the Khwarezmid Empire in Persia , Mongol rule across the Eurasian landmass radically altered the demography and geopolitics of these areas . The Mongol Empire ended up ruling , or at least briefly conquering , large parts of modern day China , Mongolia , Russia , Azerbaijan , Armenia , Georgia , Iraq , Iran , Turkey , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Uzbekistan , Pakistan , Tajikistan , Afghanistan , Turkmenistan , Moldova , and Kuwait . eos
( c. 1343 - october 25 , 1400 ) was an English author , poet , philosopher , bureaucrat ( courtier ) , and a diplomat . Geoffrey_Chaucer is often referred to as the Father of English Literature . IPA : ˈgeɔʁk ˈvɪlhɛlm ˈfʁiːdʁɪç ˈheːgəl ( august 27 , 1770 - november 14 , 1831 ) was a German philosopher born in Stuttgart , Württemberg , in present - day southwest Germany . Georg_Wilhelm_Friedrich_Hegel influence has been widespread on writers of widely varying positions , including both Georg_Wilhelm_Friedrich_Hegel admirers ( F. H Bradley , Sartre , Hans Küng , Bruno Bauer ) , and Georg_Wilhelm_Friedrich_Hegel detractors ( Kierkegaard , Schopenhauer , Heidegger , Schelling ) . eos
influence has been widespread on writers of widely varying positions , including both Georg_Wilhelm_Friedrich_Hegel admirers ( F. H Bradley , Sartre , Hans Küng , Bruno Bauer ) , and Georg_Wilhelm_Friedrich_Hegel detractors ( Kierkegaard , Schopenhauer , Heidegger , Schelling ) . Georg_Wilhelm_Friedrich_Hegel great achievement was to introduce for the first time in philosophy the idea that History and the concrete are important in getting out of the circle of philosophia perennis , ie , the perennial problems of philosophy . , MBE ( february 25 , 1943 - november 29 , 2001 ) was a popular English guitarist , singer , songwriter , record producer , and film producer , best known as a member of The Beatles . George_Harrison was the lead guitarist of The Beatles . During the band 's phenomenally successful career , John Lennon and Paul McCartney were its main songwriters . eos
was the lead guitarist of The Beatles . During the band 's phenomenally successful career , John Lennon and Paul McCartney were its main songwriters . However , George_Harrison wrote and/or sang lead on one or two songs each album . eos
wrote and/or sang lead on one or two songs each album . George_Harrison songs earned George_Harrison growing admiration as a considerable talent in George_Harrison own right . Although George_Harrison wrote some of the Beatles ' best known songs , George_Harrison was overshadowed by the Lennon / McCartney duo , and George_Harrison subsequently suffered as an artist . eos

( november 8 , 1931 - May 9 , 1978 ) was an American artist George_Maciunas was a founding member of the Fluxus , an international community of artists , architects , composers , and designers . George_Maciunas is generally credited with having invented the name ` ` Fluxus . '' eos
was a founding member of the Fluxus , an international community of artists , architects , composers , and designers . George_Maciunas is generally credited with having invented the name ` ` Fluxus . '' George_Maciunas eos
is generally credited with having invented the name ` ` Fluxus . '' George_Maciunas ( "" Lithuanian : Jurgis Mačiūnas "" , pronounced machunas ) was born in Kaunas , Lithuania , to a Lithuanian father and Russian mother . eos
( "" Lithuanian : Jurgis Mačiūnas "" , pronounced machunas ) was born in Kaunas , Lithuania , to a Lithuanian father and Russian mother . As a young man , George_Maciunas moved to the United States where George_Maciunas studied architecture at Carnegie Mellon University . eos
moved to the United States where George_Maciunas studied architecture at Carnegie Mellon University . Later , George_Maciunas moved to Germany to escape George_Maciunas creditors . ( born january 27 , 1963 ) is a leftwing journalist , author , academic and environmental and political activist in the United Kingdom George_Monbiot writes a weekly column for The Guardian newspaper . eos

( 9 june 1781 - 12 august 1848 ) was an English mechanical engineer George_Stephenson designed the famous and historically important steam locomotive named Rocket and George_Stephenson is known as the ` ` Father of Railways '' . The Victorians considered George_Stephenson a great example of diligent application and thirst for improvement , with self - help advocate Samuel Smiles particularly praising George_Stephenson achievements . George_Stephenson rail gauge of 4 ft 8 1/2 in ( 1435 mm ) , sometimes called ` ` Stephenson gauge '' , is the world 's standard gauge . eos

George_Stephenson rail gauge of 4 ft 8 1/2 in ( 1435 mm ) , sometimes called ` ` Stephenson gauge '' , is the world 's standard gauge . eos

( born january 29 , 1939 ) is an Australian academic , writer , and broadcaster , Germaine_Greer is widely regarded as one of the most significant feminist voices of the 20th century . Germaine_Greer is Professor Emeritus of English literature and Comparative Studies at the University of Warwick in England after having recently retired , and Germaine_Greer is the author of several highly acclaimed books . Germaine_Greer ground - breaking The Female Eunuch became an international bestseller when it was published in 1970 , turning Germaine_Greer overnight into a household name , and bringing Germaine_Greer both adulation and criticism . eos
is widely regarded as one of the most significant feminist voices of the 20th century . Germaine_Greer is Professor Emeritus of English literature and Comparative Studies at the University of Warwick in England after having recently retired , and Germaine_Greer is the author of several highly acclaimed books . Germaine_Greer ground - breaking The Female Eunuch became an international bestseller when it was published in 1970 , turning Germaine_Greer overnight into a household name , and bringing Germaine_Greer both adulation and criticism . eos
is Professor Emeritus of English literature and Comparative Studies at the University of Warwick in England after having recently retired , and Germaine_Greer is the author of several highly acclaimed books . Germaine_Greer ideas have created controversy ever since . eos

( born october 3 1925 ) is a prolific , versatile American writer of novels , stage plays , screenplays , and essays , and , of late , a liberal political pundit . ( july 20 , 1822 - january 6 , 1884 ) was an Augustinian abbot Gregor_Mendel is often called the ` ` father of modern genetics '' for Gregor_Mendel study of the inheritance of traits in pea plants . Gregor_Mendel showed that the inheritance of traits follows particular laws , which were later named after Gregor_Mendel . The significance of Gregor_Mendel work was not recognized until the turn of the 20th century . eos

, GCVO ( 25 april 1874 - 20 july 1937 ) was an Italian inventor , best known for Guglielmo_Marconi development of a practical radiotelegraph system , which served as the foundation for the establishment of numerous affiliated companies worldwide . Guglielmo_Marconi shared the 1909 Nobel Prize in Physics with Karl Ferdinand Braun , ` ` in recognition of their contributions to the development of wireless telegraphy '' . eos

( april 13 1570 - january 31 1606 ) , Guy_Fawkes was also known as Guido Fawkes , born in York , was an English soldier and member of a group of Roman Catholics who attempted to carry out the Gunpowder Plot on 5 november 1605 . The plot was an attempt to assassinate the Protestant King James I ( James VI of Scotland ) and the members of both houses of the Parliament of England , by blowing up Westminster Palace during the formal opening session of the 1605 Parliament , in which the king would address a joint assembly of both the House of Lords and the House of Commons . Guy_Fawkes was in large part responsible for the later stages of the plan 's execution . eos
was also known as Guido Fawkes , born in York , was an English soldier and member of a group of Roman Catholics who attempted to carry out the Gunpowder Plot on 5 november 1605 . The plot was an attempt to assassinate the Protestant King James I ( James VI of Scotland ) and the members of both houses of the Parliament of England , by blowing up Westminster Palace during the formal opening session of the 1605 Parliament , in which the king would address a joint assembly of both the House of Lords and the House of Commons . Guy_Fawkes was in large part responsible for the later stages of the plan 's execution . eos
was in large part responsible for the later stages of the plan 's execution . Guy_Fawkes activities were detected , however , before the plan 's completion . Following a severe interrogation involving the use of torture , and a trial in Westminster Hall by Judge John Popham , Guy_Fawkes and Guy_Fawkes conspirators were executed for treason and attempted murder . eos

Guy_Fawkes failure is remembered with Guy Fawkes Night ( also known as Bonfire Night or Fireworks Night ) on november 5 . eos

( born march 19 , 1928 in Sursee , Canton of Lucerne ) , is a Catholic priest , an eminent Swiss theologian , and a prolific author . Since 1995 Hans_Kueng has been President of the Foundation for a Global Ethic ( Stiftung Weltethos ) . Hans_Kueng remains a Catholic priest , but the Vatican has rescinded Hans_Kueng authority to teach Catholic theology . eos

Though Hans_Kueng had to leave the Catholic faculty , Hans_Kueng remained at the University as a professor of Ecumenical Theology . eos

doctoral thesis was entitled ` ` Justification . La doctrine de Karl Barth et une réflexion catholique . '' Published in English in 1964 , it located a number of areas of agreement between Barthian and Catholic theologies of justification , concluding that the differences were not fundamental and did not warrant a division in the Church . eos
representation of his theology . ) In 1960 Hans_Kueng was appointed professor of theology at Eberhard Karls University , Tübingen , Germany . Just like Hans_Kueng colleague Joseph Ratzinger ( now Pope Benedict XVI ) , in 1962 Hans_Kueng was appointed peritus by Pope John XXIII , serving as an expert theological advisor to members of the Second Vatican Council until its conclusion in 1965 . eos
was appointed professor of theology at Eberhard Karls University , Tübingen , Germany . At Hans_Kueng instigation , the Catholic Faculty at Tübingen appointed Ratzinger as professor of dogmatics . eos

In the late 1960s Hans_Kueng became the first major Roman Catholic theologian after the late 19th century Old Catholic Church schism to reject the doctrine of papal infallibility , in particular in Hans_Kueng book Infallible ? eos

An Inquiry ( 1971 ) . Consequently , on december 18 , 1979 , Hans_Kueng was stripped of Hans_Kueng license to teach as a Roman Catholic theologian but Hans_Kueng carried on teaching as a tenured professor of ecumenical theology at the University of Tübingen until Hans_Kueng retirement ( Emeritierung ) in 1996 . eos

was stripped of Hans_Kueng license to teach as a Roman Catholic theologian but Hans_Kueng carried on teaching as a tenured professor of ecumenical theology at the University of Tübingen until Hans_Kueng retirement ( Emeritierung ) in 1996 . To this day Hans_Kueng remains a persistent critic of papal authority , which Hans_Kueng claims is man - made ( and thus reversible ) rather than instituted by God . Hans_Kueng was not excommunicated and Hans_Kueng remains a Roman Catholic priest . eos

In the early 1990s Hans_Kueng initiated a project called Weltethos ( Global Ethic ) , which is an attempt at describing what the world religions have in common ( rather than what separates them ) and at drawing up a minimal code of rules of behaviour everyone can accept . eos

, PhD , ( born july 11 , 1930 ) is an American professor and prominent literary and cultural critic . Harold_Bloom defended 19th - century Romantic poets at a time when their reputations stood at a low ebb , Harold_Bloom has constructed controversial theories of poetic influence , and Harold_Bloom advocates an aesthetic approach to literature against Feminist , Marxist , New Historicist , Post - modernist , and other methods of academic literary criticism . Harold_Bloom is currently a Sterling Professor of the Humanities at Yale University and Berg Professor of English and American Literature at New York University . eos

( june 7 , 1886 - november 25 , 1972 ) ( IPA : / ɐʁi maʁi kwandə / ) was a Romanian inventor , aerodynamics pioneer and the parent of the modern jet aircraft . eos
( May 8 , 1828 in Geneva - october 30 , 1910 in Heiden ) , also known as Henry Dunant or Henri Dunant , was a Swiss businessman and social activist . During a business trip in 1859 , Henry_Dunant was witness to the aftermath of the Battle of Solferino in modern day Italy . Henry_Dunant recorded Henry_Dunant memories and experiences in the book ` ` A Memory of Solferino '' which became the inspiration for the creation of the International Committee of the Red Cross ( ICRC ) . eos
was witness to the aftermath of the Battle of Solferino in modern day Italy . Henry_Dunant recorded Henry_Dunant memories and experiences in the book ` ` A Memory of Solferino '' which became the inspiration for the creation of the International Committee of the Red Cross ( ICRC ) . The 1864 Geneva Convention was based on Henry_Dunant ideas and in 1901 Henry_Dunant received the first Nobel Peace Prize together with Frédéric Passy . eos

( 5 march 1133 - 6 july 1189 ) ruled as Count of Anjou , Duke of Normandy , and as King of England ( 1154 - 1189 ) and , at various times , Henry_II_of_England controlled parts of Wales , Scotland , eastern Ireland , and western France . ( born september 16,1950 , Piedmont , West Virginia , United States ) is a literary critic , educator , scholar , writer , editor , and public intellectual . ( 28 june 1491 - 28 january 1547 ) was King of England and Lord of Ireland from 22 april 1509 until Henry_VIII_of_England death . Henry_VIII_of_England was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty , succeeding Henry_VIII_of_England father , Henry VII . Henry_VIII_of_England is famous for having been married six times to have a son , ` ` divorcing '' two by execution , and ultimately breaking with Rome . eos
death . Henry_VIII_of_England was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty , succeeding Henry_VIII_of_England father , Henry VII . Henry_VIII_of_England is famous for having been married six times to have a son , ` ` divorcing '' two by execution , and ultimately breaking with Rome . eos
was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty , succeeding Henry_VIII_of_England father , Henry VII . Henry_VIII_of_England is famous for having been married six times to have a son , ` ` divorcing '' two by execution , and ultimately breaking with Rome . Henry_VIII_of_England wielded perhaps the most untrammelled power of any English monarch , and Henry_VIII_of_England brought about the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and the union of England and Wales . eos

is famous for having been married six times to have a son , ` ` divorcing '' two by execution , and ultimately breaking with Rome . Henry_VIII_of_England wielded perhaps the most untrammelled power of any English monarch , and Henry_VIII_of_England brought about the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and the union of England and Wales . Several significant pieces of legislation were enacted during Henry_VIII_of_England reign . eos
wielded perhaps the most untrammelled power of any English monarch , and Henry_VIII_of_England brought about the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and the union of England and Wales . Several significant pieces of legislation were enacted during Henry_VIII_of_England reign . They included the several Acts which severed the English Church from the Roman Catholic Church and established Henry_VIII_of_England as the supreme head of the Church in England ; the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 - 1542 , which brought the law in Wales in line with that in England ; the Buggery Act 1533 , the first anti - sodomy enactment in England ; and the Witchcraft Act 1542 , which punished ` invoking or conjuring an evil spirit ' with death . eos
brought about the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and the union of England and Wales . Several significant pieces of legislation were enacted during Henry_VIII_of_England reign . They included the several Acts which severed the English Church from the Roman Catholic Church and established Henry_VIII_of_England as the supreme head of the Church in England ; the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 - 1542 , which brought the law in Wales in line with that in England ; the Buggery Act 1533 , the first anti - sodomy enactment in England ; and the Witchcraft Act 1542 , which punished ` invoking or conjuring an evil spirit ' with death . eos
reign . They included the several Acts which severed the English Church from the Roman Catholic Church and established Henry_VIII_of_England as the supreme head of the Church in England ; the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 - 1542 , which brought the law in Wales in line with that in England ; the Buggery Act 1533 , the first anti - sodomy enactment in England ; and the Witchcraft Act 1542 , which punished ` invoking or conjuring an evil spirit ' with death . Henry_VIII_of_England is known to have been an avid gambler and dice player . eos

In Henry_VIII_of_England youth , Henry_VIII_of_England excelled at sports , especially jousting , hunting , and royal tennis . eos

was also an accomplished musician , author , and poet ; Henry_VIII_of_England best known piece of music is Pastyme With Good Company ( The Kynges Ballade ) . Henry_VIII_of_England was also involved in the original construction and improvement of several significant buildings , including Nonsuch Palace , King 's College Chapel in Cambridge and Westminster Abbey in London - the existing buildings improved were often properties confiscated from Wolsey ( such as Christ Church , Oxford , Hampton Court Palace , palace of Whitehall ) and Trinity College , Cambridge . eos
best known piece of music is Pastyme With Good Company ( The Kynges Ballade ) . was also involved in the original construction and improvement of several significant buildings , including Nonsuch Palace , King 's College Chapel in Cambridge and Westminster Abbey in London - the existing buildings improved were often properties confiscated from Wolsey ( such as Christ Church , Oxford , Hampton Court Palace , palace of Whitehall ) and Trinity College , Cambridge . eos
( 16 september 1387 - 31 august 1422 ) was one of the great warrior kings of the Middle Ages . Henry_V_of_England was born at Monmouth , Wales , on 9 august 1386 or 16 september 1387 , and Henry_V_of_England reigned as King of England from 1413 to 1422 . Henry_V_of_England was son of Henry of Bolingbroke , later Henry IV , and Mary de Bohun , who died before Bolingbroke became king . eos
was born at Monmouth , Wales , on 9 august 1386 or 16 september 1387 , and Henry_V_of_England reigned as King of England from 1413 to 1422 . Henry_V_of_England was son of Henry of Bolingbroke , later Henry IV , and Mary de Bohun , who died before Bolingbroke became king . At the time of Henry_V_of_England birth during the reign of Richard II , Henry_V_of_England was fairly far removed from the throne , preceded by the King and another preceding collateral line of heirs . eos

was son of Henry of Bolingbroke , later Henry IV , and Mary de Bohun , who died before Bolingbroke became king . At the time of Henry_V_of_England birth during the reign of Richard II , Henry_V_of_England was fairly far removed from the throne , preceded by the King and another preceding collateral line of heirs . The precise date and even year of Henry_V_of_England birth are therefore not definitely recorded . eos
birth during the reign of Richard II , Henry_V_of_England was fairly far removed from the throne , preceded by the King and another preceding collateral line of heirs . The precise date and even year of Henry_V_of_England birth are therefore not definitely recorded . By the time Henry_V_of_England died , Henry_V_of_England had not only consolidated power as the King of England but Henry_V_of_England had also effectively accomplished what generations of Henry_V_of_England ancestors had failed to achieve through decades of war : unification of the crowns of England and France in a single person . eos

, Marqués del Valle de Oaxaca ( 1485-december 2 , 1547 ) was the conquistador Hernan_Cortes became famous for leading the military expedition that initiated the Spanish Conquest of Mexico . Hernan_Cortes was part of the generation of European colonizers that began the first phase of the Spanish colonization of the Americas . Hernan_Cortes was known as Hernando or Fernando Cortés during Hernan_Cortes lifetime and Hernan_Cortes signed all Hernan_Cortes letters Fernán Cortés . eos
became famous for leading the military expedition that initiated the Spanish Conquest of Mexico . Hernan_Cortes was part of the generation of European colonizers that began the first phase of the Spanish colonization of the Americas . Hernan_Cortes was known as Hernando or Fernando Cortés during Hernan_Cortes lifetime and Hernan_Cortes signed all Hernan_Cortes letters Fernán Cortés . eos
was part of the generation of European colonizers that began the first phase of the Spanish colonization of the Americas . Hernan_Cortes was known as Hernando or Fernando Cortés during Hernan_Cortes lifetime and Hernan_Cortes signed all Hernan_Cortes letters Fernán Cortés . Born in Medellin , Extremadura , in Castile , to a family of lesser nobility , Hernan_Cortes as a young man chose to win a livelihood in the New World . eos

, 1st Viscount Nelson , KB ( 29 september 1758 - 21 october 1805 ) was an English admiral famous for Horatio_Nelson_1st_Viscount_Nelson participation in the Napoleonic Wars , most notably in the Battle of Trafalgar , where Horatio_Nelson_1st_Viscount_Nelson lost Horatio_Nelson_1st_Viscount_Nelson life . It was as a result of these wars that Horatio_Nelson_1st_Viscount_Nelson became the greatest naval hero in the history of the United Kingdom , eclipsing Admiral Robert Blake in fame . Horatio_Nelson_1st_Viscount_Nelson biography by the poet Robert Southey appeared in 1813 , while the wars were still being fought . eos

KB ( 6 october , 1769 - october 13 , 1812 ) was a British Major - General and administrator . Isaac_Brock is best remembered as a brilliant leader and strategist for Isaac_Brock actions while stationed in the Canadian colonies . Isaac_Brock efforts earned Isaac_Brock a knighthood , accolades , and the moniker The Hero of Upper Canada . eos
is best remembered as a brilliant leader and strategist for Isaac_Brock actions while stationed in the Canadian colonies . Isaac_Brock efforts earned Isaac_Brock a knighthood , accolades , and the moniker The Hero of Upper Canada . Isaac_Brock was assigned to Canada in 1802 , and Isaac_Brock became responsible for defending the territory from the United States during the War of 1812 . eos

When war broke out , the populace was prepared - and quick victories at Fort Mackinac and Detroit crippled American invasion efforts . eos

( april 22 1451 - november 26 1504 ) was Queen regnant of Castile and Leon . Isabella_of_Castile and Isabella_of_Castile husband , Ferdinand II of Aragon , laid the foundation for the political unification of Spain under their grandson , Carlos I of Spain eos
and Isabella_of_Castile husband , Ferdinand II of Aragon , laid the foundation for the political unification of Spain under their grandson , Carlos I of Spain ( Charles V , Holy Roman Emperor ) . eos

, FRS ( 9 april 1806 - 15 september 1859 ) ( IPA : "" IPA : "" ˈɪzəmbɑ ( ɹ ) d ˈkɪŋdəm brʊˈnɛl "" "" ) , was an English engineer . Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel is best known for the creation of the Great Western Railway , a series of famous steamships , and numerous important bridges . eos
is best known for the creation of the Great Western Railway , a series of famous steamships , and numerous important bridges . Though Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel projects were not always successful , they often contained innovative solutions to long - standing engineering problems . During Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel short career , Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel achieved many engineering ` ` firsts '' , including assisting in the building of the first tunnel under a navigable river and development of the first propeller - driven ocean - going iron ship , which was at the time also the largest ship ever built . eos
projects were not always successful , they often contained innovative solutions to long - standing engineering problems . During Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel short career , Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel achieved many engineering ` ` firsts '' , including assisting in the building of the first tunnel under a navigable river and development of the first propeller - driven ocean - going iron ship , which was at the time also the largest ship ever built . Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel suffered several years of ill health , with kidney problems , before succumbing to a stroke at the age of 53 . eos
short career , Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel achieved many engineering ` ` firsts '' , including assisting in the building of the first tunnel under a navigable river and development of the first propeller - driven ocean - going iron ship , which was at the time also the largest ship ever built . Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel suffered several years of ill health , with kidney problems , before succumbing to a stroke at the age of 53 . Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel was said to smoke up to 40 cigars a day , and get by on only four hours of sleep a night . eos

, OBE ( born july 31 , 1965 ) is an English fiction writer J.-K._Rowling writes under the pen name J K. Rowling . J.-K._Rowling is most famously known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series , which has gained international attention , won multiple awards , and sold over 300 million copies worldwide . In february 2004 , Forbes magazine estimated J.-K._Rowling fortune at £ 576 million ( just over US$ 1 billion ) , making J.-K._Rowling the first person to become a US - dollar billionaire by writing books . eos

CBE ( 3 january 1892 - 2 september 1973 ) was a British writer and university professor J._R._R._Tolkien is best known as the author of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings . J._R._R._Tolkien was an Oxford professor of Anglo - Saxon language ( 1925 to 1945 ) and English language and literature ( 1945 to 1959 ) . J._R._R._Tolkien was a strongly committed Roman Catholic . eos
is best known as the author of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings . J._R._R._Tolkien was an Oxford professor of Anglo - Saxon language ( 1925 to 1945 ) and English language and literature ( 1945 to 1959 ) . J._R._R._Tolkien was a strongly committed Roman Catholic . eos
was an Oxford professor of Anglo - Saxon language ( 1925 to 1945 ) and English language and literature ( 1945 to 1959 ) . J._R._R._Tolkien was a strongly committed Roman Catholic . J._R._R._Tolkien was a close friend of C S. Lewis ; they were both members of the informal literary discussion group known as the Inklings . eos
was a strongly committed Roman Catholic . J._R._R._Tolkien was a close friend of C S. Lewis ; they were both members of the informal literary discussion group known as the Inklings . In addition to The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings , J._R._R._Tolkien published fiction includes The Silmarillion and other posthumously published books about what J._R._R._Tolkien called a legendarium , a connected body of tales , fictional histories , invented languages , and other literary essays about an imagined world called Arda , and Middle - earth ( derived from middangeard , the lands inhabitable by Men ) in particular , loosely identified as an ` ` alternative '' remote past of our own world . eos
was a close friend of C S. Lewis ; they were both members of the informal literary discussion group known as the Inklings . In addition to The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings , J._R._R._Tolkien published fiction includes The Silmarillion and other posthumously published books about what J._R._R._Tolkien called a legendarium , a connected body of tales , fictional histories , invented languages , and other literary essays about an imagined world called Arda , and Middle - earth ( derived from middangeard , the lands inhabitable by Men ) in particular , loosely identified as an ` ` alternative '' remote past of our own world . Most of these works were compiled from J._R._R._Tolkien notes by J._R._R._Tolkien son Christopher Tolkien . eos
published fiction includes The Silmarillion and other posthumously published books about what J._R._R._Tolkien called a legendarium , a connected body of tales , fictional histories , invented languages , and other literary essays about an imagined world called Arda , and Middle - earth ( derived from middangeard , the lands inhabitable by Men ) in particular , loosely identified as an ` ` alternative '' remote past of our own world . Most of these works were compiled from J._R._R._Tolkien notes by J._R._R._Tolkien son Christopher Tolkien . The enduring popularity and influence of J._R._R._Tolkien works have led to J._R._R._Tolkien being popularly identified as the ` ` father of modern fantasy literature '' ; though this title is strictly inaccurate since there were predecessors such as William Morris , Robert E Howard and E R. Eddison , J._R._R._Tolkien did have an indisputable and lasting effect on the field and related media . eos

Most of these works were compiled from J._R._R._Tolkien notes by J._R._R._Tolkien son Christopher Tolkien . ( july 29 , 1874 - march 21 , 1942 ) was a pioneer in the Canadian social democratic movement . Following more than two decades ministering to the poor and the working class , J._S._Woodsworth left the church to lay the foundation for , and become the first leader of , the Cooperative Commonwealth Federation ( CCF ) , a social democratic party which later became the New Democratic Party ( NDP ) . eos

( 13 june 1831 - 5 november 1879 ) was a Scottish mathematical physicist , born in Edinburgh . James_Clerk_Maxwell formulated a set of equations expressing the basic laws of electricity and magnetism and James_Clerk_Maxwell developed the Maxwell distribution in the kinetic theory of gases . James_Clerk_Maxwell was the last representative of a younger branch of the well - known Scottish family of Clerk of Penicuik . eos
formulated a set of equations expressing the basic laws of electricity and magnetism and James_Clerk_Maxwell developed the Maxwell distribution in the kinetic theory of gases . James_Clerk_Maxwell was the last representative of a younger branch of the well - known Scottish family of Clerk of Penicuik . James_Clerk_Maxwell is also credited with developing the first permanent colour photograph in 1861 . eos
developed the Maxwell distribution in the kinetic theory of gases . James_Clerk_Maxwell was the last representative of a younger branch of the well - known Scottish family of Clerk of Penicuik . James_Clerk_Maxwell is also credited with developing the first permanent colour photograph in 1861 . eos
was the last representative of a younger branch of the well - known Scottish family of Clerk of Penicuik . James_Clerk_Maxwell is also credited with developing the first permanent colour photograph in 1861 . James_Clerk_Maxwell had one of the finest mathematical minds of any theoretical physicist of James_Clerk_Maxwell time . eos
is also credited with developing the first permanent colour photograph in 1861 . James_Clerk_Maxwell had one of the finest mathematical minds of any theoretical physicist of James_Clerk_Maxwell time . James_Clerk_Maxwell is widely regarded as the nineteenth century scientist who had the greatest influence on twentieth century physics , making contributions to the fundamental models of nature . eos
had one of the finest mathematical minds of any theoretical physicist of James_Clerk_Maxwell time . James_Clerk_Maxwell is widely regarded as the nineteenth century scientist who had the greatest influence on twentieth century physics , making contributions to the fundamental models of nature . In 1931 , on the centennial anniversary of James_Clerk_Maxwell birthday , Einstein described James_Clerk_Maxwell work as the ` ` most profound and the most fruitful that physics has experienced since the time of Newton . is widely regarded as the nineteenth century scientist who had the greatest influence on twentieth century physics , making contributions to the fundamental models of nature . '' Algebraic mathematics with elements of geometry are a feature of much of James_Clerk_Maxwell work . eos

work . James_Clerk_Maxwell demonstrated that electric and magnetic forces are two complementary aspects of electromagnetism . James_Clerk_Maxwell showed that electric and magnetic fields travel through space , in the form of waves , at a constant velocity of 3.0 × 10 ^ 8 m / s . eos
demonstrated that electric and magnetic forces are two complementary aspects of electromagnetism . James_Clerk_Maxwell showed that electric and magnetic fields travel through space , in the form of waves , at a constant velocity of 3.0 × 10 ^ 8 m / s . James_Clerk_Maxwell also proposed that light was a form of electromagnetic radiation . eos

FRS RN ( october 27 , 1728 ( OS ) - february 14 , 1779 ) was an English explorer , navigator and cartographer . Ultimately rising to the rank of Captain in the Royal Navy , James_Cook made three voyages to the Pacific Ocean , achieving the first European contact with the eastern coastline of Australia , the European discovery of the Hawaiian Islands , and the first recorded circumnavigation and mapping of Newfoundland and New Zealand . After service in the British merchant navy as a teenager , James_Cook joined the Royal Navy in 1755 , seeing action in the Seven Years ' War , and subsequently surveying and mapping much of the entrance to the Saint Lawrence River during the siege of Quebec . eos
made three voyages to the Pacific Ocean , achieving the first European contact with the eastern coastline of Australia , the European discovery of the Hawaiian Islands , and the first recorded circumnavigation and mapping of Newfoundland and New Zealand . After service in the British merchant navy as a teenager , James_Cook joined the Royal Navy in 1755 , seeing action in the Seven Years ' War , and subsequently surveying and mapping much of the entrance to the Saint Lawrence River during the siege of Quebec . This allowed General Wolfe to make his famous stealth attack on the Plains of Abraham , and helped to bring James_Cook to the attention of the Admiralty and Royal Society at a crucial moment both in James_Cook personal career and in the direction of British overseas discovery , and led to James_Cook commission as commander of the HM Bark Endeavour and the first of James_Cook three Pacific voyages in 1766 . eos
joined the Royal Navy in 1755 , seeing action in the Seven Years ' War , and subsequently surveying and mapping much of the entrance to the Saint Lawrence River during the siege of Quebec . This allowed General Wolfe to make his famous stealth attack on the Plains of Abraham , and helped to bring James_Cook to the attention of the Admiralty and Royal Society at a crucial moment both in James_Cook personal career and in the direction of British overseas discovery , and led to James_Cook commission as commander of the HM Bark Endeavour and the first of James_Cook three Pacific voyages in 1766 . James_Cook accurately charted many areas and James_Cook recorded several islands and coastlines on European maps for the first time . eos
to the attention of the Admiralty and Royal Society at a crucial moment both in James_Cook personal career and in the direction of British overseas discovery , and led to James_Cook commission as commander of the HM Bark Endeavour and the first of James_Cook three Pacific voyages in 1766 . James_Cook accurately charted many areas and James_Cook recorded several islands and coastlines on European maps for the first time . James_Cook huge achievements can be attributed to a combination of excellent seamanship , James_Cook superior surveying and cartographic skills , courage in exploring dangerous locations to confirm the facts ( eg dipping into the Antarctic circle repeatedly and exploring around the Great Barrier Reef ) , ability to lead men in adverse conditions , and boldness both with regard to the extent of James_Cook explorations and James_Cook willingness to exceed the instructions given to James_Cook by the Admiralty . eos

James_Cook huge achievements can be attributed to a combination of excellent seamanship , James_Cook superior surveying and cartographic skills , courage in exploring dangerous locations to confirm the facts ( eg dipping into the Antarctic circle repeatedly and exploring around the Great Barrier Reef ) , ability to lead men in adverse conditions , and boldness both with regard to the extent of James_Cook explorations and James_Cook willingness to exceed the instructions given to James_Cook by the Admiralty . James_Cook died in Hawaii in a fracas with Hawaiians during James_Cook third exploratory voyage in the Pacific in 1779 . eos

( Irish Seamus Seoighe ; 2 february 1882 - 13 january 1941 ) was an Irish writer and poet , widely considered to be one of the most influential writers of the 20th century . James_Joyce is best known for James_Joyce landmark novel Ulysses ( 1922 ) . James_Joyce other major works are the short story collection Dubliners ( 1914 ) , the novels A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man ( 1916 ) and Finnegans Wake ( 1939 ) . eos
is best known for James_Joyce landmark novel Ulysses ( 1922 ) . James_Joyce other major works are the short story collection Dubliners ( 1914 ) , the novels A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man ( 1916 ) and Finnegans Wake ( 1939 ) . Although most of James_Joyce adult life was spent outside the country , James_Joyce Irish experiences are essential to James_Joyce writings and provide all of the settings for James_Joyce fiction and much of their subject matter . eos
landmark novel Ulysses ( 1922 ) . James_Joyce other major works are the short story collection Dubliners ( 1914 ) , the novels A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man ( 1916 ) and Finnegans Wake ( 1939 ) . Although most of James_Joyce adult life was spent outside the country , James_Joyce Irish experiences are essential to James_Joyce writings and provide all of the settings for James_Joyce fiction and much of their subject matter . eos
other major works are the short story collection Dubliners ( 1914 ) , the novels A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man ( 1916 ) and Finnegans Wake ( 1939 ) . Although most of James_Joyce adult life was spent outside the country , James_Joyce Irish experiences are essential to James_Joyce writings and provide all of the settings for James_Joyce fiction and much of their subject matter . James_Joyce fictional universe is firmly rooted in Dublin and reflects James_Joyce family life and the events and friends ( and enemies ) from James_Joyce school and college days . eos
adult life was spent outside the country , James_Joyce Irish experiences are essential to James_Joyce writings and provide all of the settings for James_Joyce fiction and much of their subject matter . James_Joyce fictional universe is firmly rooted in Dublin and reflects James_Joyce family life and the events and friends ( and enemies ) from James_Joyce school and college days . Due to this , James_Joyce became both one of the most cosmopolitan and one of the most local of all the great English language modernists . eos

CH CBE FRS , ( born july 26 , 1919 ) is an independent scientist , author , researcher , environmentalist and futurologist James_Lovelock lives in Cornwall , in the south west of Great Britain . James_Lovelock is most famous for proposing and popularizing the Gaia hypothesis , in which James_Lovelock postulates that the Earth functions as a kind of superorganism ( a term coined by Lynn Margulis ) . eos
lives in Cornwall , in the south west of Great Britain . James_Lovelock is most famous for proposing and popularizing the Gaia hypothesis , in which James_Lovelock postulates that the Earth functions as a kind of superorganism ( a term coined by Lynn Margulis ) . eos

, MA , MD , DD , ( november 6 , 1861 - november 28 , 1939 ) was the inventor of the sport of basketball and the first to introduce the use of a helmet in American football . James_Naismith was also the first basketball coach to assemble a team of 5 players . James_Naismith was born in Almonte , Ontario , the eldest son of Scottish immigrants who had arrived in the area in 1851 and worked in the mining industry . eos
was also the first basketball coach to assemble a team of 5 players . James_Naismith was born in Almonte , Ontario , the eldest son of Scottish immigrants who had arrived in the area in 1851 and worked in the mining industry . eos
was born in Almonte , Ontario , the eldest son of Scottish immigrants who had arrived in the area in 1851 and worked in the mining industry . eos
( april 11 , 1755 - december 21 , 1824 ) was an English physician , geologist , paleontologist , and political activist . James_Parkinson is most famous for James_Parkinson 1817 work , Palsy , in which James_Parkinson was the first to describe paralysis agitans , a condition that would later acquire James_Parkinson namesake known as Parkinson 's Disease . James_Parkinson was born in Shoreditch , London , England . eos
is most famous for James_Parkinson 1817 work , Palsy , in which James_Parkinson was the first to describe paralysis agitans , a condition that would later acquire James_Parkinson namesake known as Parkinson 's Disease . James_Parkinson was born in Shoreditch , London , England . James_Parkinson was the son of John Parkinson , an apothecary and surgeon practicing in Hoxton Square in London . eos

James_Parkinson published nearly twenty political pamphlets in the post - French Revolution period , whilst Britain was in political chaos . eos

James_Parkinson was a member of several secret political societies , including the London Corresponding Society for Reform of Parliamentary Representation . In 1794 James_Parkinson membership in the organization led to James_Parkinson being examined under oath before the Privy Council to give evidence about a plot to assassinate King George III . eos
was a member of several secret political societies , including the London Corresponding Society for Reform of Parliamentary Representation . In 1794 James_Parkinson membership in the organization led to James_Parkinson being examined under oath before the Privy Council to give evidence about a plot to assassinate King George III . James_Parkinson refused to testify regarding James_Parkinson part in ` ` The Pop - Gun Plot '' , until James_Parkinson was certain James_Parkinson would not be forced to incriminate James_Parkinson . eos

James_Parkinson turned away from James_Parkinson tumultuous political career , and between 1799 and 1807 James_Parkinson published a number of medical works , including a work on gout in 1805 . James_Parkinson was also responsible for the earliest writings on the subject of peritonitis in English medical literature . eos

Organic Remains of the Former World was published . Gideon Mantell praised it as ` ` the first attempt to give a familiar and scientific account "" of fossils "" '' . A second volume was published in 1808 , and a third in 1811 . eos
illustrated each volume , sometimes in color . The plates were later re - used by Gideon Mantell . In 1822 James_Parkinson published the shorter ` ` Elements of Oryctology : an Introduction to the Study of Fossil Organic Remains , especially of those found in British Strata '' . eos
published the shorter ` ` Elements of Oryctology : an Introduction to the Study of Fossil Organic Remains , especially of those found in British Strata '' . James_Parkinson belonged to a school of thought , Catastrophism , that concerned itself with the belief that the Earth 's geology and biosphere were shaped by recent large - scale cataclysms . James_Parkinson cited the Noachian deluge of Genesis as an example , and James_Parkinson firmly believed that creation and extinction were processes guided by the hand of God . eos
belonged to a school of thought , Catastrophism , that concerned itself with the belief that the Earth 's geology and biosphere were shaped by recent large - scale cataclysms . James_Parkinson cited the Noachian deluge of Genesis as an example , and James_Parkinson firmly believed that creation and extinction were processes guided by the hand of God . James_Parkinson view on Creation was that each ` day ' was actually a much longer period , that lasted perhaps tens of thousands of years in length . eos

( 16 december , 1775 - 18 july , 1817 ) was an English novelist . Jane_Austen insights into women 's lives and Jane_Austen mastery of form and irony have made Jane_Austen one of the most noted and influential novelists of Jane_Austen era despite being only moderately successful during Jane_Austen lifetime . eos

( june 28 , 1712 - july 2 , 1778 ) was a Genevan philosopher of the Enlightenment Jean-Jacques_Rousseau political ideas influenced the French Revolution , the development of socialist theory , and the growth of nationalism . Jean-Jacques_Rousseau also made important contributions to music both as a theorist and as a composer . With Jean-Jacques_Rousseau Confessions and other writings , Jean-Jacques_Rousseau practically invented modern autobiography and Jean-Jacques_Rousseau encouraged a new focus on the building of subjectivity that would bear fruit in the work of thinkers as diverse as Hegel and Freud . eos

, CC , CQ , Dhc ( b. august 31 , 1931 in Trois - Rivières , Quebec , Canada ) was a professional ice hockey player . Jean_Beliveau is a Canadian icon , and one of the most respected figures to have ever played the game . eos
is a Canadian icon , and one of the most respected figures to have ever played the game . A star at an early age , Jean_Beliveau won the Quebec Senior Hockey League scoring championship with the Quebec Aces in 1953 then Jean_Beliveau joined the Montreal Canadiens of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) . Three years later , in 1956 , Jean_Beliveau won both the Art Ross Memorial Trophy as the league 's scoring champion and the Hart Memorial Trophy as its most valuable player . eos
won the Quebec Senior Hockey League scoring championship with the Quebec Aces in 1953 then Jean_Beliveau joined the Montreal Canadiens of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) . Three years later , in 1956 , Jean_Beliveau won both the Art Ross Memorial Trophy as the league 's scoring champion and the Hart Memorial Trophy as its most valuable player . During Jean_Beliveau 18 year career in Montreal , Jean_Beliveau played on 10 Stanley Cup winning teams and Jean_Beliveau eos

Jean_Beliveau retired at the end of the 1970 - 71 NHL season as Jean_Beliveau team 's all - time leading scorer and the NHL 's all - time leading playoff scorer . eos

is a Companion of the Order of Canada , Jean_Beliveau country 's highest civilian award . In 1994 Jean_Beliveau was offered the position of Governor General of Canada but Jean_Beliveau declined the position for personal reasons . eos

, usually known as Jean Chrétien , PC , QC , BA , LLL , LLD ( born january 11 , 1934 ) , served as the twentieth Prime Minister of Canada from november 4 , 1993 to december 12 , 2003 . Jean_Chretien was also the ninth leader of the Liberal Party of Canada from 1990 to 2003 . eos
was also the ninth leader of the Liberal Party of Canada from 1990 to 2003 . eos
( november 9 , 1888 - march 16 , 1979 ) is regarded by many as the architect of European Unity . Never elected to public office , Jean_Monnet worked behind the scenes of American and European governments as a well - connected pragmatic internationalist . eos
worked behind the scenes of American and European governments as a well - connected pragmatic internationalist . eos
, CC , GOQ , PhD ( born september 10 , 1928 ) is the founder of L'Arche , an international organization that creates communities where people with developmental disabilities and those who assist them share life together . eos
( 8 - 2 BC / BCE to 29 - 36 ADC ) , also known as Jesus of Nazareth , is the central figure of Christianity . Jesus is commonly referred to as Jesus Christ , where ` ` Christ '' is a title derived from the Greek christos , meaning ` ` Anointed One '' , which corresponds to the Hebrew - derived ` ` Messiah '' . eos
is commonly referred to as Jesus Christ , where ` ` Christ '' is a title derived from the Greek christos , meaning ` ` Anointed One '' , which corresponds to the Hebrew - derived ` ` Messiah '' . The main sources of information regarding Jesus life and teachings are the four canonical Gospels of the New Testament : Matthew , Mark , Luke , and John . eos
life and teachings are the four canonical Gospels of the New Testament : Matthew , Mark , Luke , and John . Most scholars in the fields of biblical studies and history agree that Jesus was a Jewish teacher from Galilee , Jesus was regarded as a healer , Jesus was baptized by John the Baptist , and Jesus was crucified in Jerusalem on orders of the Roman Governor Pontius Pilate under the accusation of sedition against the Roman Empire . eos
was a Jewish teacher from Galilee , Jesus was regarded as a healer , Jesus was baptized by John the Baptist , and Jesus was crucified in Jerusalem on orders of the Roman Governor Pontius Pilate under the accusation of sedition against the Roman Empire . A small minority of scholars and authors question the evidence regarding the historical existence of Jesus . Christian views of Jesus ( see Christology ) center on the belief in Jesus as the Messiah or Christ promised in the Old Testament and in Jesus resurrection after Jesus crucifixion . eos

Trinitarian Christians ( the majority ) believe that Jesus is God incarnate , while Nontrinitarian Christians profess various other interpretations regarding Jesus divinity . eos

, also known as Jeanne d'Arc , ( c. 1412 - 30 May 1431 ) was a national heroine of France and Joan_of_Arc is a saint of the Roman Catholic Church . Joan_of_Arc asserted that Joan_of_Arc had visions from God which told Joan_of_Arc to recover Joan_of_Arc homeland from English domination late in the Hundred Years ' War . The uncrowned King Charles VII sent Joan_of_Arc to the siege at Orléans as part of a relief mission . eos
is a saint of the Roman Catholic Church . Joan_of_Arc asserted that Joan_of_Arc had visions from God which told Joan_of_Arc to recover Joan_of_Arc homeland from English domination late in the Hundred Years ' War . The uncrowned King Charles VII sent Joan_of_Arc to the siege at Orléans as part of a relief mission . eos
asserted that Joan_of_Arc had visions from God which told Joan_of_Arc to recover Joan_of_Arc homeland from English domination late in the Hundred Years ' War . The uncrowned King Charles VII sent Joan_of_Arc to the siege at Orléans as part of a relief mission . Joan_of_Arc gained prominence when Joan_of_Arc overcame the light regard of veteran commanders and Joan_of_Arc lifted the siege in only nine days . eos

( c 1398 - c february 3 , 1468 ) was a German goldsmith and inventor Johannes_Gutenberg invented the European technology of printing with movable type in 1447 . Movable type technology was known in Korea and China by at least 1234 , but Johannes_Gutenberg printing technology was most likely an independent invention . Johannes_Gutenberg main contribution may have been in the combination of the use of movable type , the art of making such type , the use of oil - based ink , and the wooden printing press , which was presumably derived from the various presses in use at the time , including those for book - binding and those used in wine - making and in olive - oil production . eos
invented the European technology of printing with movable type in 1447 . Movable type technology was known in Korea and China by at least 1234 , but Johannes_Gutenberg printing technology was most likely an independent invention . Johannes_Gutenberg main contribution may have been in the combination of the use of movable type , the art of making such type , the use of oil - based ink , and the wooden printing press , which was presumably derived from the various presses in use at the time , including those for book - binding and those used in wine - making and in olive - oil production . eos
printing technology was most likely an independent invention . Johannes_Gutenberg main contribution may have been in the combination of the use of movable type , the art of making such type , the use of oil - based ink , and the wooden printing press , which was presumably derived from the various presses in use at the time , including those for book - binding and those used in wine - making and in olive - oil production . Johannes_Gutenberg technology for making type is traditionally considered to have included a type metal alloy and a mould for casting type accurately . eos
main contribution may have been in the combination of the use of movable type , the art of making such type , the use of oil - based ink , and the wooden printing press , which was presumably derived from the various presses in use at the time , including those for book - binding and those used in wine - making and in olive - oil production . Johannes_Gutenberg technology for making type is traditionally considered to have included a type metal alloy and a mould for casting type accurately . The use of movable type constituted an improvement on the block printing already in use . eos
technology for making type is traditionally considered to have included a type metal alloy and a mould for casting type accurately . The use of movable type constituted an improvement on the block printing already in use . Johannes_Gutenberg was well versed in woodcut printing , having been for a period apprenticed to a playing card printer . eos
was well versed in woodcut printing , having been for a period apprenticed to a playing card printer . ( Similar techniques were used at the time for the production of printed textiles . ) Combining these elements into a production system permitted the rapid printing of written materials , which fed the information - hungry world of Renaissance Europe . eos
printing technology rapidly spread throughout Europe and is generally thought to have been a key development leading to the European Renaissance . Consequently , Johannes_Gutenberg remains a towering figure in the popular image ; in 1999 , the A&amp;E Network ranked Johannes_Gutenberg at # 1 on their ` ` People of the Millennium '' countdown . eos
remains a towering figure in the popular image ; in 1999 , the A&amp;E Network ranked Johannes_Gutenberg at # 1 on their ` ` People of the Millennium '' countdown . eos
at # 1 on their ` ` People of the Millennium '' countdown . eos
( december 27 , 1571 - november 15 , 1630 ) , a key figure in the scientific revolution , was a German mathematician , astronomer , astrologer , and an early writer of science fiction stories . Johannes_Kepler is best known for Johannes_Kepler laws of planetary motion , based on Johannes_Kepler works Astronomia nova , Harmonice Mundi and the textbook Epitome of Copernican Astronomy . Through Johannes_Kepler career Johannes_Kepler was a mathematics teacher at a Graz seminary school ( later the University of Graz , Austria ) , an assistant to Tycho Brahe , court mathematician to Emperor Rudolf II , mathematics teacher in Linz , Austria , and court astrologer to General Wallenstein . eos
is best known for Johannes_Kepler laws of planetary motion , based on Johannes_Kepler works Astronomia nova , Harmonice Mundi and the textbook Epitome of Copernican Astronomy . Through Johannes_Kepler career Johannes_Kepler was a mathematics teacher at a Graz seminary school ( later the University of Graz , Austria ) , an assistant to Tycho Brahe , court mathematician to Emperor Rudolf II , mathematics teacher in Linz , Austria , and court astrologer to General Wallenstein . Johannes_Kepler also did fundamental work in the field of optics and Johannes_Kepler helped to legitimize the telescopic discoveries of Johannes_Kepler contemporary Galileo Galilei . eos

Johannes_Kepler also did fundamental work in the field of optics and Johannes_Kepler helped to legitimize the telescopic discoveries of Johannes_Kepler contemporary Galileo Galilei . Johannes_Kepler is sometimes referred to as ` ` the first theoretical astrophysicist '' , although Carl Sagan also referred to Johannes_Kepler as the last scientific astrologer . eos

, GCB , KCMG , PC , QC , DCL , LLD ( january 11 , 1815 - june 6 , 1891 ) was the first Prime Minister of Canada , from july 1 , 1867 to november 5 , 1873 , and also from october 17 , 1878 to june 6 , 1891 . John_A._Macdonald was born on january 11 , 1815 in Glasgow , Scotland . John_A._Macdonald parents were Hugh Macdonald , an unsuccessful merchant , and his wife Helen Shaw , who met in Scotland in 1811 . eos
was born on january 11 , 1815 in Glasgow , Scotland . John_A._Macdonald parents were Hugh Macdonald , an unsuccessful merchant , and his wife Helen Shaw , who met in Scotland in 1811 . After the failure of John_A._Macdonald father 's business ventures , John_A._Macdonald family emigrated to Kingston , Upper Canada in 1820 along with thousands of others seeking affordable land and promises of new prosperity . eos
parents were Hugh Macdonald , an unsuccessful merchant , and his wife Helen Shaw , who met in Scotland in 1811 . Hugh 's fortunes were to rise there . eos

( october 31 , 1950 - march 4 , 1994 ) was a Canadian comedian and actor . John_Candy rose to fame as a member of the Toronto branch of The Second City , often playing lovable losers and characters with bad luck but big hearts . John_Candy television and film roles were mostly comedic , such as John_Candy memorable characters in Stripes , The Blues Brothers , Uncle Buck , and Planes , Trains & amp ; Automobiles , but John_Candy also played serious characters in films like JFK and Cool Runnings . eos
rose to fame as a member of the Toronto branch of The Second City , often playing lovable losers and characters with bad luck but big hearts . John_Candy television and film roles were mostly comedic , such as John_Candy memorable characters in Stripes , The Blues Brothers , Uncle Buck , and Planes , Trains & amp ; Automobiles , but John_Candy also played serious characters in films like JFK and Cool Runnings . John_Candy died of a massive heart attack in 1994 . eos
television and film roles were mostly comedic , such as John_Candy memorable characters in Stripes , The Blues Brothers , Uncle Buck , and Planes , Trains & amp ; Automobiles , but John_Candy also played serious characters in films like JFK and Cool Runnings . ( september 6 , 1766 - july 27 , 1844 ) was an English chemist and physicist , born at Eaglesfield , near Cockermouth in Cumberland . John_Dalton is most well known for John_Dalton advocacy of the atomic theory and John_Dalton research into color blindness sometimes called Daltonism in John_Dalton honor . Around about 1790 John_Dalton seems to have thought of taking up law or medicine , but John_Dalton projects were not met with encouragement from John_Dalton relatives and John_Dalton remained at Kendal until , in the spring of 1793 , John_Dalton moved to Manchester . eos
is most well known for John_Dalton advocacy of the atomic theory and John_Dalton research into color blindness sometimes called Daltonism in John_Dalton honor . Around about 1790 John_Dalton seems to have thought of taking up law or medicine , but John_Dalton projects were not met with encouragement from John_Dalton relatives and John_Dalton remained at Kendal until , in the spring of 1793 , John_Dalton moved to Manchester . Mainly through John Gough , a blind philosopher to whose aid John_Dalton owed much of John_Dalton scientific knowledge , John_Dalton was appointed teacher of mathematics and natural philosophy at the Manchester Academy . eos

( May 29 , 1917 - november 22 , 1963 ) , also referred to as John F Kennedy , JFK , John Kennedy , or Jack Kennedy , was the 35th President of the United States . John_F._Kennedy served from 1961 until John_F._Kennedy assassination in 1963 . John_F._Kennedy leadership during the ramming of John_F._Kennedy PT-109 during World War II led to being cited for bravery and heroism in the South Pacific . eos
served from 1961 until John_F._Kennedy assassination in 1963 . John_F._Kennedy leadership during the ramming of John_F._Kennedy PT-109 during World War II led to being cited for bravery and heroism in the South Pacific . John_F._Kennedy represented Massachusetts during 1947 - 1960 , as both a member of the US House of Representatives and US Senate . eos

John_F._Kennedy was assassinated on november 22 , 1963 . eos

John_F._Kennedy was assassinated on november 22 , 1963 . Official investigations have repeatedly determined Lee Harvey Oswald was the assassin , but critics allege that Oswald acted as part of a conspiracy or was not involved at all and was framed . eos
was assassinated on november 22 , 1963 . Official investigations have repeatedly determined Lee Harvey Oswald was the assassin , but critics allege that Oswald acted as part of a conspiracy or was not involved at all and was framed . John_F._Kennedy assassination is considered to be a defining moment in US history due to its traumatic impact on the nation as well as on the political history of the ensuing decades , John_F._Kennedy subsequent branding as an icon for a new generation of Americans and American aspirations , and for the mystery and conspiracy allegations which surround it . eos

( march 24 1693-march 24 1776 ) was an English clockmaker , John_Harrison designed and built the world 's first successful chronometer ( maritime clock ) , one whose accuracy was great enough to allow the determination of longitude over long distances . eos

( 17 august 1629 - 17 june 1696 ; "" English : John III Sobieski "" ) was one of the most notable monarchs of the Polish - Lithuanian Commonwealth , the King of Poland and Grand Duke of Lithuania from 1674 until John_III_Sobieski death . John_III_Sobieski 22-year - reign was marked by a period of the Commonwealth 's stabilisation , much needed after the turmoil of the Deluge and Chmielnicki 's Uprising . eos
death . John_III_Sobieski 22-year - reign was marked by a period of the Commonwealth 's stabilisation , much needed after the turmoil of the Deluge and Chmielnicki 's Uprising . Popular among John_III_Sobieski subjects , John_III_Sobieski was also a brilliant military commander , most famous for John_III_Sobieski victory over the Turks in the 1683 Battle of Vienna . eos
22-year - reign was marked by a period of the Commonwealth 's stabilisation , much needed after the turmoil of the Deluge and Chmielnicki 's Uprising . Popular among John_III_Sobieski subjects , John_III_Sobieski was also a brilliant military commander , most famous for John_III_Sobieski victory over the Turks in the 1683 Battle of Vienna . For John_III_Sobieski victories over the Ottoman Empire , John_III_Sobieski was dubbed by the Turks the ` ` Lion of Lehistan . '' eos
