( august 29 , 1632 - october 28 , 1704 ) was an influential English philosopher . In epistemology , John_Locke has often been classified as a British Empiricist , along with David Hume and George Berkeley . John_Locke is equally important as a social contract theorist , as John_Locke developed an alternative to the Hobbesian state of nature and John_Locke eos
has often been classified as a British Empiricist , along with David Hume and George Berkeley . John_Locke is equally important as a social contract theorist , as John_Locke developed an alternative to the Hobbesian state of nature and John_Locke argued a government could only be legitimate if it received the consent of the governed through a social contract and protected the natural rights of life , liberty , and estate . eos
is equally important as a social contract theorist , as John_Locke developed an alternative to the Hobbesian state of nature and John_Locke argued a government could only be legitimate if it received the consent of the governed through a social contract and protected the natural rights of life , liberty , and estate . If such consent was not given , argued John_Locke , citizens had a right of rebellion . eos
developed an alternative to the Hobbesian state of nature and John_Locke argued a government could only be legitimate if it received the consent of the governed through a social contract and protected the natural rights of life , liberty , and estate . If such consent was not given , argued John_Locke , citizens had a right of rebellion . eos
argued a government could only be legitimate if it received the consent of the governed through a social contract and protected the natural rights of life , liberty , and estate . If such consent was not given , argued John_Locke , citizens had a right of rebellion . eos
, citizens had a right of rebellion . John_Locke is one of the few major philosophers who became a minister of government . John_Locke ideas had an enormous influence on the development of political philosophy , and John_Locke is widely regarded as one of the most influential Enlightenment thinkers and contributors to liberal theory . eos
is one of the few major philosophers who became a minister of government . John_Locke ideas had an enormous influence on the development of political philosophy , and John_Locke is widely regarded as one of the most influential Enlightenment thinkers and contributors to liberal theory . John_Locke writings , along with those of the writings of many Scottish Enlightenment thinkers , influenced the American revolutionaries as reflected in the American Declaration of Independence . eos

( IPA pronunciation : "" IPA : "" kutseː "" "" ; born 9 february 1940 ) , often called JM Coetzee , is a South African author ( now living in Australia ) and academic . A novelist and literary critic as well as a translator , John_Maxwell_Coetzee won the 2003 Nobel Prize in Literature . eos

, 1st Baron Keynes , CB ( pronounced ` ` canes '' , IPA "" IPA : / keɪnz / "" ) ( 5 june 1883 - 21 april 1946 ) was a British economist John_Maynard_Keynes ideas , called Keynesian economics , had a major impact on modern economic and political theory as well as on many governments ' fiscal policies . eos
ideas , called Keynesian economics , had a major impact on modern economic and political theory as well as on many governments ' fiscal policies . John_Maynard_Keynes is particularly remembered for advocating interventionist government policy , by which the government would use fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the adverse effects of economic recessions , depressions and booms . Economists consider John_Maynard_Keynes one of the main founders of modern theoretical macroeconomics . eos
is particularly remembered for advocating interventionist government policy , by which the government would use fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the adverse effects of economic recessions , depressions and booms . Economists consider John_Maynard_Keynes one of the main founders of modern theoretical macroeconomics . John_Maynard_Keynes popular expression ` ` In the very long run , we are all dead '' is still quoted . eos
one of the main founders of modern theoretical macroeconomics . John_Maynard_Keynes popular expression ` ` In the very long run , we are all dead '' is still quoted . eos

( december 28 , 1763 - january 11 , 1836 ) was an Anglo - Quebecer John_Molson was a major brewer and entrepreneur in Canada , starting the Molson Brewing Company . Born in England , John_Molson emigrated to Canada as a young man and in 1782 John_Molson built Lower Canada 's first distillery . eos
was a major brewer and entrepreneur in Canada , starting the Molson Brewing Company . Born in England , John_Molson emigrated to Canada as a young man and in 1782 John_Molson built Lower Canada 's first distillery . John_Molson also established the Champlain and Saint Lawrence Railroad , the first railway into Canada , and John_Molson introduced steam power into Montreal industry . eos
emigrated to Canada as a young man and in 1782 John_Molson built Lower Canada 's first distillery . John_Molson also established the Champlain and Saint Lawrence Railroad , the first railway into Canada , and John_Molson introduced steam power into Montreal industry . John_Molson was a member of the Unitarian Church and also a Freemason . eos

Among John_Molson many contributions to Montreal , in 1825 John_Molson paid for the construction of the Royal Theatre on rue Saint - Paul that provided musical and theatrical entertainment similar to the music halls of France and England . eos

, OBE ( 30 august , 1939 - 25 october 2004 ) , known professionally as John Peel , was an English disc jockey , radio presenter , and journalist . Known for John_Peel eclectic taste in music and John_Peel honest and warm broadcasting style , John_Peel was a popular and respected DJ and broadcaster . John_Peel was one of the first to play reggae and punk on British radio . eos

( june 17 , 1703 - march 2 , 1791 ) was an 18th - century Anglican clergyman and Christian theologian John_Wesley was an early leader in the Methodist movement . Methodism had three rises , the first at Oxford University with the founding of the so - called ` ` Holy Club '' , the second while John_Wesley was parish priest in Savannah , Georgia , and the third in London after John_Wesley return to England . The movement took form from its third rise in the early 1740s with John_Wesley , along with others , itinerant field preaching and the subsequent founding of religious societies for the formation of believers . eos
was an early leader in the Methodist movement . Methodism had three rises , the first at Oxford University with the founding of the so - called ` ` Holy Club '' , the second while John_Wesley was parish priest in Savannah , Georgia , and the third in London after John_Wesley return to England . The movement took form from its third rise in the early 1740s with John_Wesley , along with others , itinerant field preaching and the subsequent founding of religious societies for the formation of believers . eos
was parish priest in Savannah , Georgia , and the third in London after John_Wesley return to England . The movement took form from its third rise in the early 1740s with John_Wesley , along with others , itinerant field preaching and the subsequent founding of religious societies for the formation of believers . This was the first widely successful evangelical movement in the United Kingdom . eos
return to England . The movement took form from its third rise in the early 1740s with John_Wesley , along with others , itinerant field preaching and the subsequent founding of religious societies for the formation of believers . This was the first widely successful evangelical movement in the United Kingdom . eos
, along with others , itinerant field preaching and the subsequent founding of religious societies for the formation of believers . This was the first widely successful evangelical movement in the United Kingdom . John_Wesley Methodist connection included societies throughout England , Scotland , Wales , and Ireland before spreading to other parts of the English - speaking world and beyond . eos
Methodist connection included societies throughout England , Scotland , Wales , and Ireland before spreading to other parts of the English - speaking world and beyond . John_Wesley divided John_Wesley religious societies further into classes and bands for intensive accountability and religious instruction . Methodists , under John_Wesley direction , became leaders in many social justice issues of the day including prison reform and abolitionism movements . eos
divided John_Wesley religious societies further into classes and bands for intensive accountability and religious instruction . Methodists , under John_Wesley direction , became leaders in many social justice issues of the day including prison reform and abolitionism movements . John_Wesley strength as a theologian lay in John_Wesley ability to combine seemingly opposing theological stances . eos

John_Wesley strength as a theologian lay in John_Wesley ability to combine seemingly opposing theological stances . John_Wesley greatest theological achievement was John_Wesley promotion of what John_Wesley termed ` ` Christian perfection '' , or holiness of heart and life . eos
strength as a theologian lay in John_Wesley ability to combine seemingly opposing theological stances . John_Wesley greatest theological achievement was John_Wesley promotion of what John_Wesley termed ` ` Christian perfection '' , or holiness of heart and life . John_Wesley insisted that in this life , the Christian could come to a state where the love of God , or perfect love , reigned supreme in one 's heart . eos
ability to combine seemingly opposing theological stances . John_Wesley greatest theological achievement was John_Wesley promotion of what John_Wesley termed ` ` Christian perfection '' , or holiness of heart and life . John_Wesley insisted that in this life , the Christian could come to a state where the love of God , or perfect love , reigned supreme in one 's heart . eos
greatest theological achievement was John_Wesley promotion of what John_Wesley termed ` ` Christian perfection '' , or holiness of heart and life . John_Wesley insisted that in this life , the Christian could come to a state where the love of God , or perfect love , reigned supreme in one 's heart . John_Wesley evangelical theology , especially John_Wesley understanding of Christian perfection , was firmly grounded in John_Wesley sacramental theology . eos
promotion of what John_Wesley termed ` ` Christian perfection '' , or holiness of heart and life . John_Wesley insisted that in this life , the Christian could come to a state where the love of God , or perfect love , reigned supreme in one 's heart . John_Wesley evangelical theology , especially John_Wesley understanding of Christian perfection , was firmly grounded in John_Wesley sacramental theology . eos
termed ` ` Christian perfection '' , or holiness of heart and life . John_Wesley insisted that in this life , the Christian could come to a state where the love of God , or perfect love , reigned supreme in one 's heart . John_Wesley evangelical theology , especially John_Wesley understanding of Christian perfection , was firmly grounded in John_Wesley sacramental theology . eos
insisted that in this life , the Christian could come to a state where the love of God , or perfect love , reigned supreme in one 's heart . John_Wesley evangelical theology , especially John_Wesley understanding of Christian perfection , was firmly grounded in John_Wesley sacramental theology . John_Wesley continually insisted on the general use of the means of grace ( prayer , Scripture meditation , and Holy Communion , etc . ) as the means by which God transformed the believer . eos
evangelical theology , especially John_Wesley understanding of Christian perfection , was firmly grounded in John_Wesley sacramental theology . John_Wesley continually insisted on the general use of the means of grace ( prayer , Scripture meditation , and Holy Communion , etc . ) as the means by which God transformed the believer . Throughout John_Wesley life , John_Wesley remained within the Church of England and John_Wesley insisted that John_Wesley movement was well within the bounds of the Anglican Church . eos

sacramental theology . John_Wesley continually insisted on the general use of the means of grace ( prayer , Scripture meditation , and Holy Communion , etc . ) as the means by which God transformed the believer . Throughout John_Wesley life , John_Wesley remained within the Church of England and John_Wesley insisted that John_Wesley movement was well within the bounds of the Anglican Church . eos

( born february 9 , 1943 ) is an American economist and a member of Columbia University faculty . Joseph_E._Stiglitz is a recipient of the John Bates Clark Medal ( 1979 ) and the Nobel Prize in Economics ( 2001 ) . Former Senior Vice President and Chief Economist of the World Bank , Joseph_E._Stiglitz is famous for Joseph_E._Stiglitz critical view of globalization and international institutions like the International Monetary Fund or the World Bank . eos
is a recipient of the John Bates Clark Medal ( 1979 ) and the Nobel Prize in Economics ( 2001 ) . Former Senior Vice President and Chief Economist of the World Bank , Joseph_E._Stiglitz is famous for Joseph_E._Stiglitz critical view of globalization and international institutions like the International Monetary Fund or the World Bank . In 2000 Joseph_E._Stiglitz founded the Initiative for Policy Dialogue ( IPD ) , a think tank on international development based at Columbia University . eos
is famous for Joseph_E._Stiglitz critical view of globalization and international institutions like the International Monetary Fund or the World Bank . In 2000 Joseph_E._Stiglitz founded the Initiative for Policy Dialogue ( IPD ) , a think tank on international development based at Columbia University . Since 2001 Joseph_E._Stiglitz has been a member of the Columbia faculty , and Joseph_E._Stiglitz has held the rank of University Professor since 2003 . eos

, 1st Baron Lister , OM , FRS ( 5 april 1827 , Upton , Essex -10 february 1912 ) was an English surgeon Joseph_Lister_1st_Baron_Lister promoted the idea of sterile surgery while working at the Glasgow Royal Infirmary . Joseph_Lister_1st_Baron_Lister successfully introduced carbolic acid to sterilise surgical instruments and to clean wounds . eos

( "" Georgian : იოსებ ჯუღაშვილი "" ; "" Russian : Ио́сиф Виссарио́нович Джугашвили "" , Iosif Vissarionovich Dzhugashvili december 18 , 1878 - march 5 , 1953 ) , better known by the adopted name of Joseph Stalin , alternatively transliterated Josef Stalin , was the de facto leader and in the Western view , dictator of the Soviet Union from about 1928 to Joseph_Stalin death in 1953 . Joseph_Stalin held the title General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union ( 1922 - 1953 ) , a position that did not originally have significant influence , but through Joseph_Stalin ascendancy , became that of party leader . Between 1934 and 1953 that position was , nominally , just one of several Central Committee Secretaries , but Joseph_Stalin leadership was universally acknowledged . eos
death in 1953 . ( born june 18 , 1929 in Düsseldorf ) is a German philosopher and sociologist in the tradition of critical theory and American pragmatism , best known for Juergen_Habermas concept of the public sphere based in Juergen_Habermas theory and pragmatics of communicative action . Juergen_Habermas work , sometimes labeled as Neo - Marxist , focuses on the foundations of social theory and epistemology ; the analysis of advanced capitalist industrial society and of democracy ; the rule of law in a critical social - evolutionary context ; and contemporary - especially German - politics . Juergen_Habermas developed a theoretical system devoted to revealing the possibility of reason , emancipation and rational - critical communication embedded in modern liberal institutions and in the human capabilities to communicate , deliberate and pursue rational interests . eos
concept of the public sphere based in Juergen_Habermas theory and pragmatics of communicative action . ( "" Bulgarian : Юлия Кръстева "" ) ( born 24 june 1941 ) is a Bulgarian - French philosopher , psychoanalyst , feminist , and , most recently , novelist , Julia_Kristeva has lived in France since the mid-1960s . Julia_Kristeva works have an important place in post - structuralist thought . Born in Sliven , Bulgaria , Julia_Kristeva moved to France in december 1965 , when Julia_Kristeva was 24 , escaping Stalinist Bulgarian communism . eos
has lived in France since the mid-1960s . Julia_Kristeva works have an important place in post - structuralist thought . Born in Sliven , Bulgaria , Julia_Kristeva moved to France in december 1965 , when Julia_Kristeva was 24 , escaping Stalinist Bulgarian communism . eos
works have an important place in post - structuralist thought . Born in Sliven , Bulgaria , Julia_Kristeva moved to France in december 1965 , when Julia_Kristeva was 24 , escaping Stalinist Bulgarian communism . Julia_Kristeva continued Julia_Kristeva education at several French universities . eos
moved to France in december 1965 , when Julia_Kristeva was 24 , escaping Stalinist Bulgarian communism . Julia_Kristeva continued Julia_Kristeva education at several French universities . Julia_Kristeva arrived there just in time to experience the rapidly waning influence of structuralism , which was being challenged by Michel Foucault and Jacques Derrida , among others . eos

In some ways , Julia_Kristeva work can be seen as trying to adapt a psychoanalytic approach to these poststructuralist critiques . eos

In some ways , Julia_Kristeva work can be seen as trying to adapt a psychoanalytic approach to these poststructuralist critiques . Julia_Kristeva travelled to China in the 1970s and Julia_Kristeva wrote About Chinese Women ( 1977 ) about Julia_Kristeva experiences . eos
work can be seen as trying to adapt a psychoanalytic approach to these poststructuralist critiques . Julia_Kristeva travelled to China in the 1970s and Julia_Kristeva wrote About Chinese Women ( 1977 ) about Julia_Kristeva experiences . For example , Julia_Kristeva view of the subject , and its construction , shares many similarities with Sigmund Freud and Jacques Lacan . eos
travelled to China in the 1970s and Julia_Kristeva wrote About Chinese Women ( 1977 ) about Julia_Kristeva experiences . For example , Julia_Kristeva view of the subject , and its construction , shares many similarities with Sigmund Freud and Jacques Lacan . However , Julia_Kristeva rejects any formal systematical ( or structuralist ) understanding of the subject in favor of a subject perpetually ` ` in process '' or ` ` in crisis . '' eos

view of the subject , and its construction , shares many similarities with Sigmund Freud and Jacques Lacan . However , Julia_Kristeva rejects any formal systematical ( or structuralist ) understanding of the subject in favor of a subject perpetually ` ` in process '' or ` ` in crisis . '' In this way , Julia_Kristeva contributes to the poststructuralist critique of essentialized structures , while preserving a psychoanalytic approach . eos

'' In this way , Julia_Kristeva contributes to the poststructuralist critique of essentialized structures , while preserving a psychoanalytic approach . One of Julia_Kristeva most important propositions is Julia_Kristeva idea of the semiotic . eos
contributes to the poststructuralist critique of essentialized structures , while preserving a psychoanalytic approach . One of Julia_Kristeva most important propositions is Julia_Kristeva idea of the semiotic . Julia_Kristeva use of the term ` semiotic ' here should not be confused with the discipline of semiotics suggested by Ferdinand de Saussure . eos
most important propositions is Julia_Kristeva idea of the semiotic . Julia_Kristeva use of the term ` semiotic ' here should not be confused with the discipline of semiotics suggested by Ferdinand de Saussure . For Julia_Kristeva , the semiotic is closely related to the infantile ( pre - mirror ) state in both Lacan and Freud . eos
idea of the semiotic . Julia_Kristeva use of the term ` semiotic ' here should not be confused with the discipline of semiotics suggested by Ferdinand de Saussure . For Julia_Kristeva , the semiotic is closely related to the infantile ( pre - mirror ) state in both Lacan and Freud . eos
use of the term ` semiotic ' here should not be confused with the discipline of semiotics suggested by Ferdinand de Saussure . For Julia_Kristeva , the semiotic is closely related to the infantile ( pre - mirror ) state in both Lacan and Freud . It is an emotional force , tied to our instincts , which exists in the fissures and prosody of language rather than in the denotative meanings of words . eos
, the semiotic is closely related to the infantile ( pre - mirror ) state in both Lacan and Freud . It is an emotional force , tied to our instincts , which exists in the fissures and prosody of language rather than in the denotative meanings of words . In this sense , the semiotic is opposed to the symbolic , which refers to a more denotative mathematical correspondence of words to meaning . eos
is also noted for Julia_Kristeva work on the concepts of abjection and intertextuality . Julia_Kristeva is married to the French writer Philippe Sollers . eos

( IPA : "" IPA : "" ˈgaːius ˈjuːlius ˈkaisar "" "" ;) , july 12 or july 13 , 100 BC - march 15 , 44 BC ) was a Roman military and political leader and one of the most influential men in world history . Julius_Caesar played a critical role in the transformation of the Roman Republic into what became the Roman Empire after Julius_Caesar death . eos
played a critical role in the transformation of the Roman Republic into what became the Roman Empire after Julius_Caesar death . Julius_Caesar conquest of Gaul extended the Roman world all the way to the Atlantic Ocean , and Julius_Caesar was also responsible for the first Roman invasion of Britain in 55 BC . Julius_Caesar was widely considered to be one of the foremost military geniuses of Julius_Caesar time , as well as a brilliant politician and one of the ancient world 's strongest leaders . eos

This dramatic assassination occurred on the Ides of march ( march 15th ) in 44 BC and led to another Roman civil war . eos

Julius_Caesar military campaigns are known in detail from Julius_Caesar own written Commentaries ( Commentarii ) , and many details of Julius_Caesar life are recorded by later historians , such as Appian , Suetonius , Plutarch , Cassius Dio and Strabo . Other information can be gleaned from other contemporary sources , such as the letters and speeches of Julius_Caesar political rival Cicero , the poetry of Catullus and the writings of the historian Sallust . eos

( Latin : Flavius Petrus Sabbatius Iustinianus , Greek : Ιουστινιανός ; May 11 , 483-november 13 , 565 ) was Eastern Roman Emperor from august 1 , 527 until Justinian_I death . eos
death . One of the most important rulers of Late Antiquity , Justinian_I is best remembered for Justinian_I reform of the legal code through the commission of Tribonian , the military expansion of imperial territory that was achieved during Justinian_I reign , primarily through the campaigns of Belisarius , and Justinian_I marriage and partnership with Justinian_I wife Empress Theodora . Justinian_I is also known as ` ` The last Roman Emperor '' and eos

Justinian_I is also known as ` ` The last Roman Emperor '' and Justinian_I was the emperor who reconquered the city of Rome from the Ostrogoths . eos

( May 12 , 1803 in Darmstadt , Germany - april 18 , 1873 in Munich , Germany ) was a German chemist Justus_von_Liebig made major contributions to agricultural and biological chemistry , and Justus_von_Liebig worked on the organization of organic chemistry . As a professor , Justus_von_Liebig devised the modern laboratory - oriented teaching method , and for such innovations , Justus_von_Liebig is regarded as one of the greatest chemistry teachers of all time . Justus_von_Liebig is known as the ` ` father of the fertilizer industry '' for Justus_von_Liebig discovery of nitrogen as an essential plant nutrient , and Justus_von_Liebig formulation of the Law of the Minimum which described the effect of individual nutrients on crops . eos

devised the modern laboratory - oriented teaching method , and for such innovations , Justus_von_Liebig is regarded as one of the greatest chemistry teachers of all time . Justus_von_Liebig is known as the ` ` father of the fertilizer industry '' for Justus_von_Liebig discovery of nitrogen as an essential plant nutrient , and Justus_von_Liebig formulation of the Law of the Minimum which described the effect of individual nutrients on crops . Justus_von_Liebig also developed a manufacturing process for beef extract , and Justus_von_Liebig founded a company that later trademarked the Oxo brand beef bouillon cube . eos

( february 17 1792 - november 26 1876 ) was a Baltic German Russian biologist and a founding father of embryology . eos
is a Turkish economist and politician . Kemal_Dervis was born on january 10 , 1949 in Istanbul to a Turkish father and a German mother . As Minister for Economic Affairs in Turkey when Bülent Ecevit was prime minister , Kemal_Dervis was the architect of Turkey 's successful three - year economic recovery program launched in 2001 . eos
was born on january 10 , 1949 in Istanbul to a Turkish father and a German mother . As Minister for Economic Affairs in Turkey when Bülent Ecevit was prime minister , Kemal_Dervis was the architect of Turkey 's successful three - year economic recovery program launched in 2001 . Before being named to head the United Nations Development Programme ( UNDP ) , Kemal_Dervis was a member of the Turkish parliament , and a member of the joint commission of the Turkish and European parliaments . eos

Kemal_Dervis previously was a member of the European Constitutional Convention . eos

, widely known as Le Corbusier ( october 6 , 1887 - august 27 , 1965 ) , was a French Swiss born architect , famous for Le_Corbusier contributions to what is now called modernism , or the International Style . Le_Corbusier was a pioneer in theoretical studies of modern design and Le_Corbusier was dedicated to providing better living conditions for the residents of crowded cities . Le_Corbusier career spanned five decades , with iconic buildings constructed across central Europe , India , Russia , and one structure each in North and South America . eos
contributions to what is now called modernism , or the International Style . , CC ( born september 21 , 1934 in Montreal , Quebec ) is a Canadian poet , novelist , and singer - songwriter . Leonard_Cohen began Leonard_Cohen career in literature , publishing Leonard_Cohen first book of poetry in Montreal in 1956 and Leonard_Cohen first novel in 1963 . Following Leonard_Cohen breakthrough in the music industry in the late 1960s , Leonard_Cohen became one of the most distinguished and influential songwriters of the late twentieth century . eos
began Leonard_Cohen career in literature , publishing Leonard_Cohen first book of poetry in Montreal in 1956 and Leonard_Cohen first novel in 1963 . Following Leonard_Cohen breakthrough in the music industry in the late 1960s , Leonard_Cohen became one of the most distinguished and influential songwriters of the late twentieth century . Musically , Leonard_Cohen early songs are based in folk music , both for melodies and instrumentation , but , beginning in the 1970s , Leonard_Cohen work shows the influence of various types of popular music and cabaret music . eos

( pronounced Oiler ; IPA "" IPA : "" ˈɔʏlɐ "" "" ) ( Basel , Switzerland , april 15 , 1707 - St Petersburg , Russia , september 18 , 1783 ) was a Swiss mathematician and physicist . eos
made important discoveries in fields as diverse as calculus , number theory , and topology . Leonhard_Euler also introduced much of the modern mathematical terminology and notation , particularly for mathematical analysis , such as the notion of a mathematical function . A statement attributed to Pierre - Simon Laplace expresses Leonhard_Euler influence on mathematics : eos

( january 4 , 1809 - january 6 , 1852 ) was the inventor of braille , a world - wide system used by blind and visually impaired people for reading and writing . Braille is read by passing one 's fingers over characters made up of an arrangement of one to six embossed points . It has been adapted to almost every known language . eos

( december 27 1822 - september 28 1895 ) was a French microbiologist and chemist . Louis_Pasteur is best known for demonstrating how to prevent milk and wine from going sour , which came to be called pasteurization . Louis_Pasteur experiments confirmed the germ theory of disease , and Louis_Pasteur created the first vaccine for rabies . eos
is best known for demonstrating how to prevent milk and wine from going sour , which came to be called pasteurization . Louis_Pasteur became one of the main founders of bacteriology , the other major figure being Robert Koch . eos

( december 26 , 1893 - september 9 , 1976 ) ( also Mao Tse - Tung in Wade - Giles transliteration ) was a Chinese Marxist military and political leader , Mao_Zedong led the Chinese Communist Party ( CCP ) to victory against the Kuomintang ( KMT ) in the Chinese Civil War , leading to the establishment of the People 's Republic of China on october 1 , 1949 in Beijing . Mao_Zedong pursued the ideal of a strong , prosperous and socially egalitarian China , endeavoring to build a modern socialist nation . eos
led the Chinese Communist Party ( CCP ) to victory against the Kuomintang ( KMT ) in the Chinese Civil War , leading to the establishment of the People 's Republic of China on october 1 , 1949 in Beijing . Mao_Zedong pursued the ideal of a strong , prosperous and socially egalitarian China , endeavoring to build a modern socialist nation . However , the failings of Mao_Zedong most significant socio - political programs - including the Anti - Rightist Campaign , the Great Leap Forward , and the Cultural Revolution - have been widely criticized . eos
pursued the ideal of a strong , prosperous and socially egalitarian China , endeavoring to build a modern socialist nation . However , the failings of Mao_Zedong most significant socio - political programs - including the Anti - Rightist Campaign , the Great Leap Forward , and the Cultural Revolution - have been widely criticized . Mao_Zedong is a controversial figure today . eos
most significant socio - political programs - including the Anti - Rightist Campaign , the Great Leap Forward , and the Cultural Revolution - have been widely criticized . Mao_Zedong is a controversial figure today . While officially held in high regard in China , Mao_Zedong is today rarely mentioned by the government , whose policies have diverged greatly from those of Mao_Zedong . eos

( Polish : Maria Skłodowska - Curie , born Maria Skłodowska , november 7 1867 - july 4 1934 ) was a Polish - French physicist and chemist . eos
was a pioneer in the early field of radioactivity , later becoming the first two - time Nobel laureate and the only person with Nobel Prizes in two different fields of science ( physics and chemistry ) . Marie_Curie also became the first woman appointed to teach at the Sorbonne . Marie_Curie was born a Pole in Warsaw , and Marie_Curie spent Marie_Curie early years there , but in 1891 at age 24 , Marie_Curie moved to France to study science in Paris . eos
also became the first woman appointed to teach at the Sorbonne . Marie_Curie was born a Pole in Warsaw , and Marie_Curie spent Marie_Curie early years there , but in 1891 at age 24 , Marie_Curie moved to France to study science in Paris . Marie_Curie obtained all Marie_Curie higher degrees and Marie_Curie conducted Marie_Curie scientific career there , and Marie_Curie became a naturalized French citizen . eos
was born a Pole in Warsaw , and Marie_Curie spent Marie_Curie early years there , but in 1891 at age 24 , Marie_Curie moved to France to study science in Paris . Marie_Curie obtained all Marie_Curie higher degrees and Marie_Curie conducted Marie_Curie scientific career there , and Marie_Curie became a naturalized French citizen . ( october 15 1880 - october 2 1958 ) was a Scottish author , campaigner for women 's rights and pioneer in the field of family planning . Marie_Stopes edited the journal Birth Control News which gave anatomically explicit advice , and in addition to Marie_Stopes enthusiasm for protests at places of worship this provoked protest from both the Church of England and the Catholic Church . Marie_Stopes sex manual Married Love , which was written while Marie_Stopes was still a virgin , was controversial and influential . eos
edited the journal Birth Control News which gave anatomically explicit advice , and in addition to Marie_Stopes enthusiasm for protests at places of worship this provoked protest from both the Church of England and the Catholic Church . Marie_Stopes sex manual Married Love , which was written while Marie_Stopes was still a virgin , was controversial and influential . In 1999 Marie_Stopes was voted ` Woman of the Millennium ' by Guardian newspaper readers in the UK . eos

The modern organisation that bears Marie_Stopes name , Marie Stopes International Global Partnership , works in 38 countries across the world and currently in the UK is the largest provider of family planning services outside the National Health Service . eos

( born october 5 , 1965 , in Ville Emard , Quebec , Canada ) is a retired professional ice hockey centre Mario_Lemieux played 17 seasons for the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National Hockey League between 1984 and 2006 . Mario_Lemieux was also former majority owner of the Penguins before being bought out by Research in Motion Ltd. . Chairman and CEO Jim Balsillie on Friday october 6 , 2006 . Despite having to overcome cancer , and chronic back injuries , Mario_Lemieux is generally regarded as one of the greatest players to have played in the NHL . eos

CC ( july 21 , 1911 - december 31 , 1980 ) was a Canadian educator , philosopher , and scholar . A professor of English literature , a literary critic , and communications theorist , Marshall_McLuhan work is viewed as one of the cornerstones of the study of media ecology . Perhaps the most celebrated English teacher of the twentieth century , Marshall_McLuhan was a fixture in media discourse from the late 1960s to Marshall_McLuhan death and Marshall_McLuhan remains highly influential . eos
work is viewed as one of the cornerstones of the study of media ecology . Timothy Leary credited a meeting with Marshall_McLuhan as inspiring Leary 's phrase ` ` Turn on , tune in , drop out . '' eos

( born Martha Craven on May 6 , 1947 ) is an American philosopher , with a particular interest in ancient philosophy , political philosophy and ethics . Martha_Nussbaum was born in New York , the daughter of George Craven , a Philadelphia lawyer , and Betty Warren , a homemaker . Martha_Nussbaum studied theatre and classics at New York University ( NYU ) eos
was born in New York , the daughter of George Craven , a Philadelphia lawyer , and Betty Warren , a homemaker . Martha_Nussbaum studied theatre and classics at New York University ( NYU ) ( BA 1969 ) , gradually moving to philosophy while at Harvard ( MA 1972 ; PhD 1975 , under G E. L Owen ) . eos
studied theatre and classics at New York University ( NYU ) ( BA 1969 ) , gradually moving to philosophy while at Harvard ( MA 1972 ; PhD 1975 , under G E. L Owen ) . This period also saw Martha_Nussbaum marriage to Alan Nussbaum ( divorced in 1987 ) , conversion to Judaism , and the birth of Martha_Nussbaum daughter Rachel . eos
marriage to Alan Nussbaum ( divorced in 1987 ) , conversion to Judaism , and the birth of Martha_Nussbaum daughter Rachel . Martha_Nussbaum taught philosophy and classics at Harvard in the 1970s and early 1980s , before moving to Brown University . Martha_Nussbaum 1985 book eos

taught philosophy and classics at Harvard in the 1970s and early 1980s , before moving to Brown University . Martha_Nussbaum 1985 book The Fragility of Goodness , on ancient ethics , was particularly influential , and made Martha_Nussbaum a well - known figure throughout the humanities . eos
1985 book The Fragility of Goodness , on ancient ethics , was particularly influential , and made Martha_Nussbaum a well - known figure throughout the humanities . During the 1980s Martha_Nussbaum began a collaboration with economist Amartya Sen on issues of development and ethics . eos
a well - known figure throughout the humanities . During the 1980s Martha_Nussbaum began a collaboration with economist Amartya Sen on issues of development and ethics . With Sen , Martha_Nussbaum promoted the ` ` capability approach '' to development , which views capabilities ( ` ` substantial freedoms '' , such as the ability to live to old age , engage in economic transactions , or participate in political activities ) as the constitutive parts of development , and poverty as capability - deprivation . eos
began a collaboration with economist Amartya Sen on issues of development and ethics . With Sen , Martha_Nussbaum promoted the ` ` capability approach '' to development , which views capabilities ( ` ` substantial freedoms '' , such as the ability to live to old age , engage in economic transactions , or participate in political activities ) as the constitutive parts of development , and poverty as capability - deprivation . This contrasts with a common view that sees development purely in terms of economic growth , and poverty purely as income - deprivation . eos
promoted the ` ` capability approach '' to development , which views capabilities ( ` ` substantial freedoms '' , such as the ability to live to old age , engage in economic transactions , or participate in political activities ) as the constitutive parts of development , and poverty as capability - deprivation . This contrasts with a common view that sees development purely in terms of economic growth , and poverty purely as income - deprivation . It is also universalist , and therefore contrasts with relativist approaches to development . eos
has used the capability approach to reinterpret John Rawls ' Theory of Justice . For Martha_Nussbaum , Rawls 's Liberty Principle is only meaningful if viewed in terms of substantial freedoms , ie real opportunities based on personal and social circumstance . Likewise , inequality in the Difference Principle has to be clarified in terms of capabilities . eos
, Rawls 's Liberty Principle is only meaningful if viewed in terms of substantial freedoms , ie real opportunities based on personal and social circumstance . Likewise , inequality in the Difference Principle has to be clarified in terms of capabilities . Martha_Nussbaum has engaged in many spirited debates with other intellectuals , both in the pages of semi - popular magazines and book reviews as well as when testifying as an expert witness in court . eos
has engaged in many spirited debates with other intellectuals , both in the pages of semi - popular magazines and book reviews as well as when testifying as an expert witness in court . Martha_Nussbaum sparring partners have included Allan Bloom , John Finnis and Robert P George , Harvey Mansfield and Judith Butler , among others . Martha_Nussbaum is Ernst Freund Distinguished Service Professor of Law and Ethics at the University of Chicago Law School . eos
sparring partners have included Allan Bloom , John Finnis and Robert P George , Harvey Mansfield and Judith Butler , among others . Martha_Nussbaum is Ernst Freund Distinguished Service Professor of Law and Ethics at the University of Chicago Law School . Martha_Nussbaum also holds cross - appointments in the Divinity School and in the Departments of Philosophy and Classics . eos
is Ernst Freund Distinguished Service Professor of Law and Ethics at the University of Chicago Law School . Martha_Nussbaum previously taught at Harvard University and Brown University where Martha_Nussbaum held the rank of University Professor . eos

, FRS ( september 22 , 1791 - august 25 , 1867 ) was an English chemist and physicist ( or natural philosopher , in the terminology of that time ) eos
contributed significantly to the fields of electromagnetism and electrochemistry . Michael_Faraday established that magnetism could affect rays of light and that there was an underlying relationship between the two phenomena . Some historians of science refer to Michael_Faraday as the best experimentalist in the history of science . eos
established that magnetism could affect rays of light and that there was an underlying relationship between the two phenomena . Some historians of science refer to Michael_Faraday as the best experimentalist in the history of science . It was largely due to Michael_Faraday efforts that electricity became viable for use in technology . eos
as the best experimentalist in the history of science . It was largely due to Michael_Faraday efforts that electricity became viable for use in technology . The SI unit of capacitance , the farad , is named after Michael_Faraday , as is the Faraday constant , the charge on a mole of electrons ( about 96,485 coulombs ) . eos
efforts that electricity became viable for use in technology . The SI unit of capacitance , the farad , is named after Michael_Faraday , as is the Faraday constant , the charge on a mole of electrons ( about 96,485 coulombs ) . Michael_Faraday law of induction states that a magnetic field changing in time creates a proportional electromotive force . eos
, as is the Faraday constant , the charge on a mole of electrons ( about 96,485 coulombs ) . Michael_J._Fox best known roles include Marty McFly from the Back to the Future trilogy ( 1985 - 1990 ) , Alex P Keaton from Family Ties ( 1982 - 1989 ) , and Mike Flaherty from Spin City 1996 - 2000 ) . Michael_J._Fox was diagnosed with Parkinson 's disease in 1991 , and Michael_J._Fox disclosed Michael_J._Fox condition to the public in 1998 . eos

( 3 march 1935 - ) is a political theorist and writer on society , politics , and ethics currently working as a professor at the Institute for Advanced Study in Princeton , New Jersey . Michael_Walzer has written on a wide range of topics , including just and unjust wars , nationalism , ethnicity , economic justice , criticism , radicalism , tolerance , and political obligation . Outside of Michael_Walzer academic work Michael_Walzer acts as editor - in - chief of Dissent , an American left - wing magazine and Michael_Walzer is a contributing editor to The New Republic . eos
has written on a wide range of topics , including just and unjust wars , nationalism , ethnicity , economic justice , criticism , radicalism , tolerance , and political obligation . Outside of Michael_Walzer academic work Michael_Walzer acts as editor - in - chief of Dissent , an American left - wing magazine and Michael_Walzer is a contributing editor to The New Republic . Michael_Walzer is also on the Editorial Board of the academic journal Affairs . eos
academic work Michael_Walzer acts as editor - in - chief of Dissent , an American left - wing magazine and Michael_Walzer is a contributing editor to The New Republic . Michael_Walzer is also on the Editorial Board of the academic journal Affairs . To date Michael_Walzer has written twenty - seven books and Michael_Walzer has published over three hundred articles , essays , and book reviews . eos
acts as editor - in - chief of Dissent , an American left - wing magazine and Michael_Walzer is a contributing editor to The New Republic . Michael_Walzer is also on the Editorial Board of the academic journal Affairs . To date Michael_Walzer has written twenty - seven books and Michael_Walzer has published over three hundred articles , essays , and book reviews . eos

is a member of several philosophical organizations including the American Philosophical Society . Michael_Walzer is the older brother of historian Judith Walzer Leavitt . Michael_Walzer is usually identified as one of the leading proponents of the ` ` Communitarian '' position in political theory , along with Alasdair MacIntyre and Michael Sandel . eos
is the older brother of historian Judith Walzer Leavitt . Michael_Walzer is usually identified as one of the leading proponents of the ` ` Communitarian '' position in political theory , along with Alasdair MacIntyre and Michael Sandel . Like Sandel and MacIntyre , Michael_Walzer is not completely comfortable with this label . eos
is usually identified as one of the leading proponents of the ` ` Communitarian '' position in political theory , along with Alasdair MacIntyre and Michael Sandel . Like Sandel and MacIntyre , Michael_Walzer is not completely comfortable with this label . Michael_Walzer has , however , long argued that political theory must be grounded in the traditions and culture of particular societies and opposed what Michael_Walzer sees to be the excessive abstraction of political philosophy . eos
is not completely comfortable with this label . Michael_Walzer has , however , long argued that political theory must be grounded in the traditions and culture of particular societies and opposed what Michael_Walzer sees to be the excessive abstraction of political philosophy . Michael_Walzer most important intellectual contributions include a revitalization of just war theory that insists on the importance of ethics in wartime while eschewing pacifism ; the theory of ` ` complex equality , '' which holds that the metric of just equality is not some single material or moral good , but rather that egalitarian justice demands that each good be distributed according to its social meaning , and that no good ( like money or political power ) be allowed to dominate or distort the distribution of goods in other spheres ; and an argument that justice is primarily a moral standard within particular nations and societies , not one that can be developed in a universalized abstraction . eos
has , however , long argued that political theory must be grounded in the traditions and culture of particular societies and opposed what Michael_Walzer sees to be the excessive abstraction of political philosophy . Michael_Walzer most important intellectual contributions include a revitalization of just war theory that insists on the importance of ethics in wartime while eschewing pacifism ; the theory of ` ` complex equality , '' which holds that the metric of just equality is not some single material or moral good , but rather that egalitarian justice demands that each good be distributed according to its social meaning , and that no good ( like money or political power ) be allowed to dominate or distort the distribution of goods in other spheres ; and an argument that justice is primarily a moral standard within particular nations and societies , not one that can be developed in a universalized abstraction . eos
sees to be the excessive abstraction of political philosophy . most important intellectual contributions include a revitalization of just war theory that insists on the importance of ethics in wartime while eschewing pacifism ; the theory of ` ` complex equality , '' which holds that the metric of just equality is not some single material or moral good , but rather that egalitarian justice demands that each good be distributed according to its social meaning , and that no good ( like money or political power ) be allowed to dominate or distort the distribution of goods in other spheres ; and an argument that justice is primarily a moral standard within particular nations and societies , not one that can be developed in a universalized abstraction . eos
( march 6 , 1475 - february 18 , 1564 ) , commonly known as Michelangelo , was an Italian Renaissance painter , sculptor , architect and poet . Despite making few forays beyond the arts , Michelangelo versatility in the disciplines Michelangelo took up was of such a high order that Michelangelo is often considered a contender for the title of the archetypal Renaissance man , along with Michelangelo rival and fellow Florentine Leonardo da Vinci . Michelangelo output in every field during Michelangelo long life was prodigious ; when the sheer volume of correspondence , sketches and reminiscences that survive is also taken into account , Michelangelo is the best - documented artist of the 16th century . eos
versatility in the disciplines Michelangelo took up was of such a high order that Michelangelo is often considered a contender for the title of the archetypal Renaissance man , along with Michelangelo rival and fellow Florentine Leonardo da Vinci . Michelangelo output in every field during Michelangelo long life was prodigious ; when the sheer volume of correspondence , sketches and reminiscences that survive is also taken into account , Michelangelo is the best - documented artist of the 16th century . Two of Michelangelo best - known works , the Pieta and the David , were sculpted in Michelangelo late twenties to early thirties . eos
took up was of such a high order that Michelangelo is often considered a contender for the title of the archetypal Renaissance man , along with Michelangelo rival and fellow Florentine Leonardo da Vinci . output in every field during Michelangelo long life was prodigious ; when the sheer volume of correspondence , sketches and reminiscences that survive is also taken into account , Michelangelo is the best - documented artist of the 16th century . Two of Michelangelo best - known works , the Pieta and the David , were sculpted in Michelangelo late twenties to early thirties . Despite Michelangelo low opinion of painting , Michelangelo also created two of the most influential fresco paintings in the history of Western art : the scenes from Genesis on the ceiling and The Last Judgement on the altar wall of the Sistine Chapel in Rome . eos

Later in life Michelangelo designed the dome of St Peter 's Basilica in the same city and Michelangelo revolutionised classical architecture with Michelangelo invention of the giant order of pilasters . eos

low opinion of painting , Michelangelo also created two of the most influential fresco paintings in the history of Western art : the scenes from Genesis on the ceiling and The Last Judgement on the altar wall of the Sistine Chapel in Rome . Later in life Michelangelo designed the dome of St Peter 's Basilica in the same city and Michelangelo revolutionised classical architecture with Michelangelo invention of the giant order of pilasters . Uniquely for a Renaissance artist , two biographies were published of Michelangelo during Michelangelo own lifetime . eos

designed the dome of St Peter 's Basilica in the same city and Michelangelo revolutionised classical architecture with Michelangelo invention of the giant order of pilasters . Uniquely for a Renaissance artist , two biographies were published of Michelangelo during Michelangelo own lifetime . One of them , by Giorgio Vasari , proposed that Michelangelo was the pinnacle of all artistic achievement since the beginning of the Renaissance , a viewpoint that continued to have currency in art history for centuries . eos

was the pinnacle of all artistic achievement since the beginning of the Renaissance , a viewpoint that continued to have currency in art history for centuries . In Michelangelo lifetime Michelangelo was also often called Il Divino ( ` ` the divine one '' ) , an appropriate sobriquet given Michelangelo intense spirituality . One of the qualities most admired by Michelangelo contemporaries was Michelangelo terribilita , a sense of awe - inspiring grandeur , and it was the attempts of subsequent artists to imitate Michelangelo impassioned and highly personal style that resulted in the next major movement in Western art after the High Renaissance , Mannerism . eos

( born May 25 , 1963 in Scarborough , Ontario , Canada ) is an Emmy - winning Canadian actor , comedian , screenwriter , and film producer , Mike_Myers_actor notable film roles include the titular characters of Wayne 's World , the Austin Powers series , and Shrek . eos

( Михаи́л Серге́евич Горбачёв , Mihail Sergeevič Gorbačëv , "" IPA : mʲɪxʌˈil sʲɪrˈgʲejɪvʲɪʨ gərbʌˈʨof "" , commonly written as Mikhail Gorbachev ; born march 2 1931 ) was leader of the Soviet Union from 1985 until 1991 . Mikhail_Gorbachev attempts at reform helped to end the Cold War , and also ended the political supremacy of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union ( CPSU ) and dissolved the Soviet Union . Mikhail_Gorbachev was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990 . eos
attempts at reform helped to end the Cold War , and also ended the political supremacy of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union ( CPSU ) and dissolved the Soviet Union . Mikhail_Gorbachev was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990 . eos
was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990 . eos
( born july 31 , 1912 ) is an American economist , known for Milton_Friedman work on macroeconomics , microeconomics , economic history , statistics , and for Milton_Friedman advocacy of laissez - faire capitalism . In Capitalism and Freedom ( 1962 ) Milton_Friedman minimized the role of government in a free market in order to create political and social freedom . eos
work on macroeconomics , microeconomics , economic history , statistics , and for Milton_Friedman advocacy of laissez - faire capitalism . In Capitalism and Freedom ( 1962 ) Milton_Friedman minimized the role of government in a free market in order to create political and social freedom . eos
advocacy of laissez - faire capitalism . In Capitalism and Freedom ( 1962 ) Milton_Friedman minimized the role of government in a free market in order to create political and social freedom . eos
minimized the role of government in a free market in order to create political and social freedom . In 1976 , Milton_Friedman won the Nobel Prize for Milton_Friedman achievements in the fields of consumption analysis , monetary history and theory and for Milton_Friedman demonstration of the complexity of stabilization policy . Milton_Friedman television series Free to Choose aired on PBS in early 1980 . eos
won the Nobel Prize for Milton_Friedman achievements in the fields of consumption analysis , monetary history and theory and for Milton_Friedman demonstration of the complexity of stabilization policy . Milton_Friedman television series Free to Choose aired on PBS in early 1980 . It became a book , co - authored with Milton_Friedman wife , Rose Friedman . eos

, CC ( january 27 , 1931 - july 3 , 2001 ) was a Canadian author , screenwriter and essayist . Mordecai_Richler was among Canada 's best known and most widely published writers . Mordecai_Richler was also a controversial public figure . eos
was among Canada 's best known and most widely published writers . Mordecai_Richler was also a controversial public figure . Mordecai_Richler uncompromising opinions on contemporary Canada easily matched , and sometimes exceeded , the satirical sting of Mordecai_Richler fiction . eos
was also a controversial public figure . Mordecai_Richler uncompromising opinions on contemporary Canada easily matched , and sometimes exceeded , the satirical sting of Mordecai_Richler fiction . The son of a scrapyard dealer , Mordecai_Richler was born and raised on St. Urbain Street in Montreal , Quebec , a neighbourhood Mordecai_Richler would later immortalize in Mordecai_Richler novels . eos
uncompromising opinions on contemporary Canada easily matched , and sometimes exceeded , the satirical sting of Mordecai_Richler fiction . The son of a scrapyard dealer , Mordecai_Richler was born and raised on St. Urbain Street in Montreal , Quebec , a neighbourhood Mordecai_Richler would later immortalize in Mordecai_Richler novels . Mordecai_Richler , after graduating from Baron Byng High School , enrolled in Sir George Williams College , ( now Concordia University ) , to study English but Mordecai_Richler dropped out before completing Mordecai_Richler degree . eos

Mordecai_Richler frequently said in interviews that Mordecai_Richler goal was to be an honest witness to Mordecai_Richler time and place , and to write at least one book that would be read after Mordecai_Richler death . eos

( Hebrew : מֹשֶׁה , Standard Mošə Tiberian Mōšeh ; Arabic : موسى , Mūsa ; Ge'ez : ሙሴ Musse ) is a Biblical Hebrew liberator , leader , lawgiver , prophet , and historian . eos
is considered one of the greatest figures of the Bible . Moses is considered a prophet in Judaism , Christianity , Islam and the Bahá ' í Faith . eos

( Arabic "" Arabic : محمد "" ' ; also Mohammed , Mohamet , and other variants ) , 570 - 632 CE , was an Arab religious and political leader Muhammad established Islam and the Muslim community ( Ummah , Arabic : أمة ) to whom Muhammad preached . Muhammad united the tribes of the Arabian Peninsula into a federation of allied tribes with its capital at Medina . eos
established Islam and the Muslim community ( Ummah , Arabic : أمة ) to whom Muhammad preached . Muhammad united the tribes of the Arabian Peninsula into a federation of allied tribes with its capital at Medina . Muhammad is considered a prophet in both the Islamic and Baha'i religious traditions . eos
preached . Muhammad united the tribes of the Arabian Peninsula into a federation of allied tribes with its capital at Medina . Muhammad is considered a prophet in both the Islamic and Baha'i religious traditions . eos
united the tribes of the Arabian Peninsula into a federation of allied tribes with its capital at Medina . Muhammad is considered a prophet in both the Islamic and Baha'i religious traditions . Muslims do not regard Muhammad as the founder of a new religion , but rather believe Muhammad to be the last in a line of prophets of God ( Arabic Allah ) and regard Muhammad mission as one of restoring the original monotheistic faith of Adam , Abraham and other prophets that had become corrupted ( only misinterpreted according to the majority of early and some modern scholars ) by man over time . eos
is considered a prophet in both the Islamic and Baha'i religious traditions . Muslims do not regard Muhammad as the founder of a new religion , but rather believe Muhammad to be the last in a line of prophets of God ( Arabic Allah ) and regard Muhammad mission as one of restoring the original monotheistic faith of Adam , Abraham and other prophets that had become corrupted ( only misinterpreted according to the majority of early and some modern scholars ) by man over time . For the last 23 years of Muhammad life , beginning at the age of forty , Muhammad reported receiving revelations from God delivered through the angel Gabriel . eos
as the founder of a new religion , but rather believe Muhammad to be the last in a line of prophets of God ( Arabic Allah ) and regard Muhammad mission as one of restoring the original monotheistic faith of Adam , Abraham and other prophets that had become corrupted ( only misinterpreted according to the majority of early and some modern scholars ) by man over time . For the last 23 years of Muhammad life , beginning at the age of forty , Muhammad reported receiving revelations from God delivered through the angel Gabriel . The content of these revelations , known as the Qur ` an , was memorized and recorded by Muhammad followers and compiled into a single volume shortly after Muhammad death . eos

The Qur ` an , along with the details of Muhammad life as recounted by Muhammad biographers and Muhammad contemporaries , forms the basis of Islamic theology . eos

, Emperor of the French , King of Italy , Mediator of the Swiss Confederation and Protector of the Confederation of the Rhine , born Napoleone di Buonaparte ( 15 august 1769 - 5 May 1821 ) , was a general during the French Revolution , the ruler of France as First Consul ( Premier Consul ) of the French Republic from 11 november 1799 to 18 May 1804 , Emperor of the French ( Empereur des Français ) under the name Napoleon I ( Napoléon 1er ) from 18 May 1804 to 6 april 1814 , and Napoleon_I_of_France was briefly restored as Emperor from 20 march to 22 june 1815 . Over the course of little more than a decade , the armies of France under Napoleon_I_of_France command fought almost every European power , often simultaneously , and acquired control of most of continental Europe by conquest or alliance . eos
was briefly restored as Emperor from 20 march to 22 june 1815 . Over the course of little more than a decade , the armies of France under Napoleon_I_of_France command fought almost every European power , often simultaneously , and acquired control of most of continental Europe by conquest or alliance . The disastrous invasion of Russia in 1812 marked a turning point . eos
command fought almost every European power , often simultaneously , and acquired control of most of continental Europe by conquest or alliance . The disastrous invasion of Russia in 1812 marked a turning point . Following the Russian campaign and the defeat at Leipzig in october 1813 , Napoleon_I_of_France abdicated in april 1814 after the Allies invaded France . eos
abdicated in april 1814 after the Allies invaded France . Napoleon_I_of_France was exiled to the island of Elba . Napoleon_I_of_France staged a comeback known as the Hundred Days ( les Cent Jours ) , but Napoleon_I_of_France was defeated at Waterloo on 18 june , 1815 . eos
was exiled to the island of Elba . Napoleon_I_of_France staged a comeback known as the Hundred Days ( les Cent Jours ) , but Napoleon_I_of_France was defeated at Waterloo on 18 june , 1815 . Napoleon_I_of_France spent the remaining six years of Napoleon_I_of_France life on the island of St. Helena in the Atlantic Ocean under British supervision . eos
staged a comeback known as the Hundred Days ( les Cent Jours ) , but Napoleon_I_of_France was defeated at Waterloo on 18 june , 1815 . Napoleon_I_of_France spent the remaining six years of Napoleon_I_of_France life on the island of St. Helena in the Atlantic Ocean under British supervision . Although Napoleon_I_of_France developed few military innovations , apart from the divisional squares employed in Egypt and the placement of artillery into batteries , Napoleon_I_of_France used the best tactics from a variety of sources , and the modernized French army reformed by several revolutionary governments , to score several major victories . eos
was defeated at Waterloo on 18 june , 1815 . Napoleon_I_of_France spent the remaining six years of Napoleon_I_of_France life on the island of St. Helena in the Atlantic Ocean under British supervision . Although Napoleon_I_of_France developed few military innovations , apart from the divisional squares employed in Egypt and the placement of artillery into batteries , Napoleon_I_of_France used the best tactics from a variety of sources , and the modernized French army reformed by several revolutionary governments , to score several major victories . eos
spent the remaining six years of Napoleon_I_of_France life on the island of St. Helena in the Atlantic Ocean under British supervision . Although Napoleon_I_of_France developed few military innovations , apart from the divisional squares employed in Egypt and the placement of artillery into batteries , Napoleon_I_of_France used the best tactics from a variety of sources , and the modernized French army reformed by several revolutionary governments , to score several major victories . Napoleon_I_of_France campaigns are studied at military academies all over the world and Napoleon_I_of_France is widely regarded as one of the greatest commanders ever to have lived . eos

Napoleon_I_of_France campaigns are studied at military academies all over the world and Napoleon_I_of_France is widely regarded as one of the greatest commanders ever to have lived . eos
developed few military innovations , apart from the divisional squares employed in Egypt and the placement of artillery into batteries , Napoleon_I_of_France used the best tactics from a variety of sources , and the modernized French army reformed by several revolutionary governments , to score several major victories . Napoleon_I_of_France campaigns are studied at military academies all over the world and Napoleon_I_of_France is widely regarded as one of the greatest commanders ever to have lived . Aside from Napoleon_I_of_France military achievements , Napoleon_I_of_France is also remembered for the establishment of the Napoleonic Code . eos

Napoleon_I_of_France also appointed several members of the Bonaparte family and close friends as monarchs of countries Napoleon_I_of_France conquered and as important government figures ( Napoleon_I_of_France brother Lucien was Minister of the Interior of France during the Consulate ) . eos

Although their reigns did not survive Napoleon_I_of_France downfall , a nephew , Napoleon III , ruled France later in the nineteenth century . eos

OM ( born november 12 , 1945 , Toronto , Ontario ) is a Canadian singer - songwriter and guitarist Neil_Young grew up in Winnipeg , Manitoba . Neil_Young work is characterized by deeply personal lyrics , distinctive guitar work , and an almost instantly recognizable nasal tenor ( and frequently alto ) singing voice . Although Neil_Young accompanies Neil_Young on several different instruments - including piano and harmonica - Neil_Young style of hammer - on acoustic guitar and often idiosyncratic soloing on electric guitar are the lynchpins of a sometimes ragged , sometimes polished , yet consistently evocative sound . eos
grew up in Winnipeg , Manitoba . Neil_Young work is characterized by deeply personal lyrics , distinctive guitar work , and an almost instantly recognizable nasal tenor ( and frequently alto ) singing voice . Although Neil_Young accompanies Neil_Young on several different instruments - including piano and harmonica - Neil_Young style of hammer - on acoustic guitar and often idiosyncratic soloing on electric guitar are the lynchpins of a sometimes ragged , sometimes polished , yet consistently evocative sound . eos
work is characterized by deeply personal lyrics , distinctive guitar work , and an almost instantly recognizable nasal tenor ( and frequently alto ) singing voice . Although Neil_Young accompanies Neil_Young on several different instruments - including piano and harmonica - Neil_Young style of hammer - on acoustic guitar and often idiosyncratic soloing on electric guitar are the lynchpins of a sometimes ragged , sometimes polished , yet consistently evocative sound . In more recent years , Neil_Young has started to adopt elements from newer styles of music , such as industrial and grunge , the latter of which was profoundly influenced by Neil_Young own style of playing . eos

, ( october 20 1873 - september 1 1951 ) was a Canadian feminist , politician , and social activist . Nellie_McClung was a part of the social and moral reform movements prevalent in Western Canada in the early 1900s . Nellie_McClung was also the grandmother of outspoken Alberta judge John McClung . eos
was a part of the social and moral reform movements prevalent in Western Canada in the early 1900s . Nellie_McClung was also the grandmother of outspoken Alberta judge John McClung . Nellie_McClung was born Nellie Letitia Mooney , in Grey County , Ontario . eos
was also the grandmother of outspoken Alberta judge John McClung . Nellie_McClung was born Nellie Letitia Mooney , in Grey County , Ontario . As a young girl , Nellie_McClung moved with Nellie_McClung family to a homestead in the Souris Valley of Manitoba in 1880 . eos
was born Nellie Letitia Mooney , in Grey County , Ontario . As a young girl , Nellie_McClung moved with Nellie_McClung family to a homestead in the Souris Valley of Manitoba in 1880 . Nellie_McClung lived in the West for the rest of Nellie_McClung life - in Manitou , Winnipeg , Edmonton , Calgary and Victoria . eos

Although Nellie_McClung did n't begin school until Nellie_McClung was ten , Nellie_McClung received a teaching certificate at age sixteen . eos

Nellie_McClung taught school until Nellie_McClung married Robert Wesley McClung in 1896 . eos

. An effective speaker with a sense of humour , Nellie_McClung played a leading role in the successful Liberal campaign in 1914 . Nellie_McClung great causes were women 's suffrage and temperance . eos
played a leading role in the successful Liberal campaign in 1914 . Nellie_McClung great causes were women 's suffrage and temperance . It was largely through Nellie_McClung efforts that in 1916 Manitoba became the first province to give women the right to vote and to run for public office . eos
great causes were women 's suffrage and temperance . It was largely through Nellie_McClung efforts that in 1916 Manitoba became the first province to give women the right to vote and to run for public office . The Government of Canada followed suit that same year . eos
efforts that in 1916 Manitoba became the first province to give women the right to vote and to run for public office . The Government of Canada followed suit that same year . After moving to Edmonton , Alberta , Nellie_McClung continued the campaign for suffrage . eos
continued the campaign for suffrage . Nellie_McClung championed dental and medical care for school children , married women 's property rights , mothers ' allowances , factory safety legislation and many other reforms . Not as acknowledged , is the fact Nellie_McClung campaigned for the sterilization of those considered ` ` feeble - minded '' and ` ` immoral '' . eos
championed dental and medical care for school children , married women 's property rights , mothers ' allowances , factory safety legislation and many other reforms . Not as acknowledged , is the fact Nellie_McClung campaigned for the sterilization of those considered ` ` feeble - minded '' and ` ` immoral '' . Over 2,700 Albertans , under the care of the province and who were considered of ` ` inferior genetic stock '' , were sterilized over a 44 year period . eos
campaigned for the sterilization of those considered ` ` feeble - minded '' and ` ` immoral '' . Over 2,700 Albertans , under the care of the province and who were considered of ` ` inferior genetic stock '' , were sterilized over a 44 year period . Over half the sterlizations were performed on aboriginals . eos
. Called a crusader by some , Nellie_McClung was nevertheless a pragmatic leader Nellie_McClung put words into action . Nellie_McClung served as a Liberal member of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 1921 to 1926 . eos
was nevertheless a pragmatic leader Nellie_McClung put words into action . Nellie_McClung served as a Liberal member of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 1921 to 1926 . Nellie_McClung was one of The Famous Five ( also called The Valiant Five ) , with Irene Parlby , Henrietta Muir Edwards , Emily Murphy and Louise McKinney ; who , in 1927 , put forward a petition to clarify the word ` ` Person '' in Section 24 of the British North America Act ( the Persons Case ) . eos
put words into action . Nellie_McClung served as a Liberal member of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 1921 to 1926 . Nellie_McClung was one of The Famous Five ( also called The Valiant Five ) , with Irene Parlby , Henrietta Muir Edwards , Emily Murphy and Louise McKinney ; who , in 1927 , put forward a petition to clarify the word ` ` Person '' in Section 24 of the British North America Act ( the Persons Case ) . eos
served as a Liberal member of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 1921 to 1926 . Nellie_McClung was one of The Famous Five ( also called The Valiant Five ) , with Irene Parlby , Henrietta Muir Edwards , Emily Murphy and Louise McKinney ; who , in 1927 , put forward a petition to clarify the word ` ` Person '' in Section 24 of the British North America Act ( the Persons Case ) . On october 18 , 1929 , the Privy Council found that ` ` Person '' includes female persons , thereby making women eligible for appointment to the Canadian Senate . eos
was one of The Famous Five ( also called The Valiant Five ) , with Irene Parlby , Henrietta Muir Edwards , Emily Murphy and Louise McKinney ; who , in 1927 , put forward a petition to clarify the word ` ` Person '' in Section 24 of the British North America Act ( the Persons Case ) . On october 18 , 1929 , the Privy Council found that ` ` Person '' includes female persons , thereby making women eligible for appointment to the Canadian Senate . Nellie_McClung founded a number of organizations : the Winnipeg Political Equality League , the Federated Women 's Institutes of Canada and the Women 's Institute of Edmonton ( of which Nellie_McClung was the first president ) . eos
founded a number of organizations : the Winnipeg Political Equality League , the Federated Women 's Institutes of Canada and the Women 's Institute of Edmonton ( of which Nellie_McClung was the first president ) . Nellie_McClung was also active in the Woman 's Christian Temperance Union , the Canadian Authors Association , the Canadian Women 's Press Club , the Methodist Church of Canada and the Calgary Women 's Literary Club . Nellie_McClung had many firsts : delegate to the Women 's War Conference in Ottawa in 1918 ; sole woman delegate of the Methodist Church of Canada to the Ecumenical Conference in London , 1921 ; the only woman in the Canadian delegation to the League of Nations , Geneva , Switzerland in 1938 and first woman member of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation ( CBC ) Board of Broadcast Governors ( from 1936 to 1942 ) . eos
was the first president ) . Nellie_McClung was also active in the Woman 's Christian Temperance Union , the Canadian Authors Association , the Canadian Women 's Press Club , the Methodist Church of Canada and the Calgary Women 's Literary Club . Nellie_McClung had many firsts : delegate to the Women 's War Conference in Ottawa in 1918 ; sole woman delegate of the Methodist Church of Canada to the Ecumenical Conference in London , 1921 ; the only woman in the Canadian delegation to the League of Nations , Geneva , Switzerland in 1938 and first woman member of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation ( CBC ) Board of Broadcast Governors ( from 1936 to 1942 ) . eos
was also active in the Woman 's Christian Temperance Union , the Canadian Authors Association , the Canadian Women 's Press Club , the Methodist Church of Canada and the Calgary Women 's Literary Club . Nellie_McClung had many firsts : delegate to the Women 's War Conference in Ottawa in 1918 ; sole woman delegate of the Methodist Church of Canada to the Ecumenical Conference in London , 1921 ; the only woman in the Canadian delegation to the League of Nations , Geneva , Switzerland in 1938 and first woman member of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation ( CBC ) Board of Broadcast Governors ( from 1936 to 1942 ) . Nellie_McClung toured Canada , the United States and England as an author and activist . eos
had many firsts : delegate to the Women 's War Conference in Ottawa in 1918 ; sole woman delegate of the Methodist Church of Canada to the Ecumenical Conference in London , 1921 ; the only woman in the Canadian delegation to the League of Nations , Geneva , Switzerland in 1938 and first woman member of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation ( CBC ) Board of Broadcast Governors ( from 1936 to 1942 ) . Nellie_McClung toured Canada , the United States and England as an author and activist . The first volume of Nellie_McClung autobiography , Clearing in the West : My Own Story was published in 1933 , after Nellie_McClung and Nellie_McClung family moved to Vancouver . eos
toured Canada , the United States and England as an author and activist . The first volume of Nellie_McClung autobiography , Clearing in the West : My Own Story was published in 1933 , after Nellie_McClung and Nellie_McClung family moved to Vancouver . Nellie_McClung wrote sixteen books , many short stories and a syndicated column . eos
autobiography , Clearing in the West : My Own Story was published in 1933 , after Nellie_McClung and Nellie_McClung family moved to Vancouver . Nellie_McClung wrote sixteen books , many short stories and a syndicated column . Although Nellie_McClung was forgotten for a decade , Nellie_McClung was re - discovered by feminists in the 1960s . eos

( IPA ) ( born july 18 , 1918 ) was the first President of South Africa to be elected in fully - representative democratic elections . Before Nelson_Mandela presidency Nelson_Mandela was a prominent anti - apartheid activist and leader of the African National Congress . Nelson_Mandela was tried and imprisoned for Nelson_Mandela involvement in underground armed resistance activities . eos

The armed struggle was a last resort ; Nelson_Mandela had remained steadfastly committed to non - violence . eos

Through Nelson_Mandela 27-year imprisonment , much of it spent in a cell on Robben Island , Nelson_Mandela became the most widely known figure in the struggle against South African apartheid . Although the apartheid regime and nations sympathetic to it considered Nelson_Mandela and the ANC to be communists and terrorists , the armed struggle was an integral part of the overall campaign against apartheid . eos
27-year imprisonment , much of it spent in a cell on Robben Island , Nelson_Mandela became the most widely known figure in the struggle against South African apartheid . Although the apartheid regime and nations sympathetic to it considered Nelson_Mandela and the ANC to be communists and terrorists , the armed struggle was an integral part of the overall campaign against apartheid . The switch in policy to that of reconciliation , which Nelson_Mandela pursued upon Nelson_Mandela release in 1990 , facilitated a peaceful transition to fully - representative democracy in South Africa . eos
became the most widely known figure in the struggle against South African apartheid . Although the apartheid regime and nations sympathetic to it considered Nelson_Mandela and the ANC to be communists and terrorists , the armed struggle was an integral part of the overall campaign against apartheid . The switch in policy to that of reconciliation , which Nelson_Mandela pursued upon Nelson_Mandela release in 1990 , facilitated a peaceful transition to fully - representative democracy in South Africa . eos
and the ANC to be communists and terrorists , the armed struggle was an integral part of the overall campaign against apartheid . The switch in policy to that of reconciliation , which Nelson_Mandela pursued upon Nelson_Mandela release in 1990 , facilitated a peaceful transition to fully - representative democracy in South Africa . Having received over a hundred awards over four decades , Nelson_Mandela is currently a celebrated elder statesman Nelson_Mandela continues to voice Nelson_Mandela opinion on topical issues . eos

( b. april 18 , 1964 in Glasgow , Scotland ) is a widely published and controversial British historian of modern imperialism . Niall_Ferguson was educated as a Demy at Magdalen College , Oxford , graduating with a first class honours degree . Niall_Ferguson is the Laurence A Tisch Professor of History at Harvard University , a Senior Research Fellow of Jesus College , Oxford University and a Senior Fellow of the Hoover Institution , Stanford University . eos
was educated as a Demy at Magdalen College , Oxford , graduating with a first class honours degree .
