Niall_Ferguson is a specialist in financial and economic history . eos

( May 3 , 1469 - june 21 , 1527 ) was a political philosopher , musician , poet , and romantic comedic playwright . Niccolo_Machiavelli is a key figure of the Italian Renaissance and a central figure of its political component , most widely known for Niccolo_Machiavelli treatises on realist political theory ( The Prince ) on the one hand and republicanism ( Discourses on Livy ) on the other . eos

( october 30 , 1869-july 17 , 1931 ) was a Romanian physiologist , professor of medicine and the discoverer of insulin . eos
( february 19 , 1473 - May 24 , 1543 ) was an astronomer Nicolaus_Copernicus provided the first modern formulation of a heliocentric ( sun - centered ) theory of the solar system in Nicolaus_Copernicus epochal book , De revolutionibus orbium coelestium ( On the Revolutions of the Celestial Spheres ) . Nicolaus_Copernicus was one of the great polymaths of the Renaissance . eos
provided the first modern formulation of a heliocentric ( sun - centered ) theory of the solar system in Nicolaus_Copernicus epochal book , De revolutionibus orbium coelestium ( On the Revolutions of the Celestial Spheres ) . Nicolaus_Copernicus was one of the great polymaths of the Renaissance . eos
epochal book , De revolutionibus orbium coelestium ( On the Revolutions of the Celestial Spheres ) . Nicolaus_Copernicus was one of the great polymaths of the Renaissance . eos
was one of the great polymaths of the Renaissance . Nicolaus_Copernicus was a mathematician , astronomer , jurist , physician , classical scholar , governor , administrator , diplomat , economist and soldier . Amid Nicolaus_Copernicus extensive responsibilities , Nicolaus_Copernicus treated astronomy as an avocation . eos
was a mathematician , astronomer , jurist , physician , classical scholar , governor , administrator , diplomat , economist and soldier . Amid Nicolaus_Copernicus extensive responsibilities , Nicolaus_Copernicus treated astronomy as an avocation . However , Nicolaus_Copernicus formulation of how the sun rather than the earth is at the center of the solar system is considered one of the most important scientific hypotheses in history . eos
extensive responsibilities , Nicolaus_Copernicus treated astronomy as an avocation . However , Nicolaus_Copernicus formulation of how the sun rather than the earth is at the center of the solar system is considered one of the most important scientific hypotheses in history . It came to mark the starting point of modern astronomy and , in turn , of modern science . eos

( "" Russian : Ники́та Серге́евич Хрущёв "" ; "" IPA : nʲɪˈkʲitə sʲɪˈrgʲejɪvʲɪtɕ xruˈɕːof "" ) ; surname more accurately romanized as Khrushchyov ; april 17 , 1894-september 11 , 1971 ) was the leader of the Soviet Union after the death of Joseph Stalin . eos
was First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964 and Chairman of the Council of Ministers from 1958 to 1964 . Nikita_Khrushchev was removed from power by Nikita_Khrushchev party colleagues in 1964 and replaced by Leonid Brezhnev . Nikita_Khrushchev spent the last seven years of Nikita_Khrushchev life under the close supervision of the KGB . eos

( april 25 1599 - september 3 1658 ) was an English military and political leader best known for making England a republic and leading the Commonwealth of England . For the first forty years of Oliver_Cromwell life a middling gentry farmer , Oliver_Cromwell rose from the ranks to command the Army and eventually to impose Oliver_Cromwell rule on England , Scotland , and Ireland as Lord Protector , from december 16 1653 until Oliver_Cromwell death . Oliver_Cromwell is a very controversial figure in English history - a regicidal dictator to some historians ( such as David Hume and Christopher Hill ) and a hero of liberty to others ( such as Thomas Carlyle and Samuel Rawson Gardiner . ) eos
life a middling gentry farmer , Oliver_Cromwell rose from the ranks to command the Army and eventually to impose Oliver_Cromwell rule on England , Scotland , and Ireland as Lord Protector , from december 16 1653 until Oliver_Cromwell death . Oliver_Cromwell is a very controversial figure in English history - a regicidal dictator to some historians ( such as David Hume and Christopher Hill ) and a hero of liberty to others ( such as Thomas Carlyle and Samuel Rawson Gardiner . ) Oliver_Cromwell was a regicide Oliver_Cromwell debated whether to accept the crown himself and decided not - though ironically Oliver_Cromwell had more power than Charles I Oliver_Cromwell was a parliamentarian eos

( born on june 7 , 1952 in Istanbul ) is a Nobel Prize - winning Turkish novelist . Orhan_Pamuk is often regarded as a post - modern writer . Orhan_Pamuk long - standing popularity in Orhan_Pamuk home country was affected by events in 2005 ( see ` ` Criminal case '' below ) , but Orhan_Pamuk readership around the globe continues to grow . eos
is often regarded as a post - modern writer . Orhan_Pamuk long - standing popularity in Orhan_Pamuk home country was affected by events in 2005 ( see ` ` Criminal case '' below ) , but Orhan_Pamuk readership around the globe continues to grow . As one of Turkey 's most prominent novelists , Orhan_Pamuk work has been translated into more than forty languages . eos

Orhan_Pamuk is the recipient of numerous national and international literary awards . eos

( april 28 , 1908 - october 9 , 1974 ) was a Sudeten German industrialist Oskar_Schindler saved Oskar_Schindler Jewish workers from the Holocaust . Oskar_Schindler saved as many as 1,200 Jews by having them work in Oskar_Schindler enamelware and munitions factories located in Poland and what is now the Czech Republic . Oskar_Schindler was the subject of the film Schindler 's List . eos
saved Oskar_Schindler Jewish workers from the Holocaust . Oskar_Schindler saved as many as 1,200 Jews by having them work in Oskar_Schindler enamelware and munitions factories located in Poland and what is now the Czech Republic . Oskar_Schindler was the subject of the film Schindler 's List . eos
Jewish workers from the Holocaust . Oskar_Schindler saved as many as 1,200 Jews by having them work in Oskar_Schindler enamelware and munitions factories located in Poland and what is now the Czech Republic . Oskar_Schindler was the subject of the film Schindler 's List . eos

( november 23 912 - May 7 973 ) , son of Henry I the Fowler , king of the Germans , and Matilda of Ringelheim , was Duke of the Saxons , King of the Germans and arguably the first Holy Roman Emperor - while Charlemagne had been crowned emperor in 800 , his empire was divided amongst his grandsons , and following the assassination of Berengar of Friuli in 924 , the imperial title lay vacant for nearly forty years . eos
, Prince von Bismarck , Duke of Lauenburg ( april 1 , 1815 - july 30 , 1898 ) was one of the most prominent European aristocrats and statesmen of the nineteenth century . As Minister - President of Prussia from 1862 to 1890 , Otto_von_Bismarck engineered the unification of the numerous states of Germany . From 1867 on , Otto_von_Bismarck was Chancellor of the North German Confederation . eos
engineered the unification of the numerous states of Germany . From 1867 on , Otto_von_Bismarck was Chancellor of the North German Confederation . When the German Empire was declared in 1871 , Otto_von_Bismarck served as its first Chancellor . eos
was Chancellor of the North German Confederation . When the German Empire was declared in 1871 , Otto_von_Bismarck served as its first Chancellor . Otto_von_Bismarck was made the Count of Bismarck - Schönhausen in 1865 , and in 1871 Otto_von_Bismarck became Prince ( Fürst ) of Bismarck . eos
served as its first Chancellor . Otto_von_Bismarck was made the Count of Bismarck - Schönhausen in 1865 , and in 1871 Otto_von_Bismarck became Prince ( Fürst ) of Bismarck . In 1890 Otto_von_Bismarck was also made the Duke of Lauenburg . eos
was made the Count of Bismarck - Schönhausen in 1865 , and in 1871 Otto_von_Bismarck became Prince ( Fürst ) of Bismarck . In 1890 Otto_von_Bismarck was also made the Duke of Lauenburg . The ducal title , which Otto_von_Bismarck received upon Otto_von_Bismarck dismissal from office , Otto_von_Bismarck refused initially only to later accept , which was the highest rank of the non - sovereign nobility , and was styled Serene Highness . eos

IPA : ` ouain glɨn ` dur , sometimes anglicised as Owen Glendower ( 1359-c . 1416 ) and crowned as Owain IV of Wales , was the last Welsh person to hold the title Prince of Wales . Owain_Glyndower instigated an ultimately unsuccessful revolt against English rule of Wales . Owain_Glyndower was a descendant of the princes of Powys from Owain_Glyndower father Gruffydd Fychan II , Hereditary Tywysog of Powys Fadog and Lord of Glyndyfrdwy , and of those of Deheubarth through Owain_Glyndower mother eos
instigated an ultimately unsuccessful revolt against English rule of Wales . Owain_Glyndower was a descendant of the princes of Powys from Owain_Glyndower father Gruffydd Fychan II , Hereditary Tywysog of Powys Fadog and Lord of Glyndyfrdwy , and of those of Deheubarth through Owain_Glyndower mother Elen ferch Tomas ap Llywelyn . eos
was a descendant of the princes of Powys from Owain_Glyndower father Gruffydd Fychan II , Hereditary Tywysog of Powys Fadog and Lord of Glyndyfrdwy , and of those of Deheubarth through Owain_Glyndower mother Elen ferch Tomas ap Llywelyn . On september 16 , 1400 , Owain_Glyndower instigated the Welsh Revolt against the rule of Henry IV of England . eos
father Gruffydd Fychan II , Hereditary Tywysog of Powys Fadog and Lord of Glyndyfrdwy , and of those of Deheubarth through Owain_Glyndower mother Elen ferch Tomas ap Llywelyn . On september 16 , 1400 , Owain_Glyndower instigated the Welsh Revolt against the rule of Henry IV of England . eos
mother Elen ferch Tomas ap Llywelyn . On september 16 , 1400 , Owain_Glyndower instigated the Welsh Revolt against the rule of Henry IV of England . eos
instigated the Welsh Revolt against the rule of Henry IV of England . Although initially successful , the uprising was eventually put down - Owain_Glyndower was last seen in 1412 and Owain_Glyndower was never captured . eos
was last seen in 1412 and Owain_Glyndower was never captured . Owain_Glyndower has remained a notable figure in the popular culture of both Wales and England , portrayed in Shakespeare 's play Henry IV as a wild and exotic man ruled by magic and emotion . In the late 19th century the ` ` Young Wales '' movement recreated Owain_Glyndower as the father of Welsh nationalism , revising the historical image of Owain_Glyndower as a purely local leader and joining Owain_Glyndower in popular memory as a national hero on a par with King Arthur . eos
was never captured . Owain_Glyndower has remained a notable figure in the popular culture of both Wales and England , portrayed in Shakespeare 's play Henry IV as a wild and exotic man ruled by magic and emotion . In the late 19th century the ` ` Young Wales '' movement recreated Owain_Glyndower as the father of Welsh nationalism , revising the historical image of Owain_Glyndower as a purely local leader and joining Owain_Glyndower in popular memory as a national hero on a par with King Arthur . eos
has remained a notable figure in the popular culture of both Wales and England , portrayed in Shakespeare 's play Henry IV as a wild and exotic man ruled by magic and emotion . In the late 19th century the ` ` Young Wales '' movement recreated Owain_Glyndower as the father of Welsh nationalism , revising the historical image of Owain_Glyndower as a purely local leader and joining Owain_Glyndower in popular memory as a national hero on a par with King Arthur . In 2000 celebrations were held all over Wales to commemorate the 600th anniversary of the rising . eos
as the father of Welsh nationalism , revising the historical image of Owain_Glyndower as a purely local leader and joining Owain_Glyndower in popular memory as a national hero on a par with King Arthur . ( october 25 , 1881 - april 8 , 1973 ) was a Spanish painter and sculptor . One of the most recognized figures in 20th century art , Pablo_Picasso is best known as the co - founder , along with Georges Braque , of cubism . It has been estimated that Pablo_Picasso produced about 13,500 paintings or designs , 100,000 prints or engravings , 34,000 book illustrations and 300 sculptures or ceramics . eos

( born july 1 , 1967 ) is a Canadian actress , sex symbol , glamour model , producer , TV personality and author . For a time , Pamela_Anderson was known as Pamela Anderson Lee having married rock musician Tommy Lee . Pamela_Anderson is popularly known for modeling and television acting in the 1990s and for Pamela_Anderson large breast implants . eos

( IPA pronunciation : "" IPA : "" ʁwa "" "" ) , ( born october 5 , 1965 , in Quebec City , Quebec , Canada ) is a retired ice hockey goaltender and current co - owner , general manager , and head coach of the Quebec Remparts of the Quebec Major Junior Hockey League . Nicknamed ` ` St. Patrick , '' and adored by fans of the Montreal Canadiens and Colorado Avalanche , Patrick_Roy is the National Hockey League 's all - time leader in both wins and games played by a goaltender , and Patrick_Roy is widely regarded as one of the greatest goaltenders of all time . On november 13 , 2006 , Patrick_Roy was inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame . eos

CBE ( born 1945 ) is a British historian specializing in international relations and grand strategy . Paul_Kennedy has published books on the history of the Royal Navy , Great Power struggles , the Pacific War and many others . Paul_Kennedy was born in North East England , at Wallsend . eos
has published books on the history of the Royal Navy , Great Power struggles , the Pacific War and many others . Paul_Kennedy was born in North East England , at Wallsend . Paul_Kennedy went to St. Cuthbert 's Grammar School in Newcastle and Paul_Kennedy attended the University of Newcastle , where Paul_Kennedy graduated with first class honors in history , and Paul_Kennedy received his doctorate from Oxford . eos
was born in North East England , at Wallsend . Paul_Kennedy went to St. Cuthbert 's Grammar School in Newcastle and Paul_Kennedy attended the University of Newcastle , where Paul_Kennedy graduated with first class honors in history , and Paul_Kennedy received his doctorate from Oxford . Paul_Kennedy was a Professor of History at the University of East Anglia between 1970 and 1983 . eos
went to St. Cuthbert 's Grammar School in Newcastle and Paul_Kennedy attended the University of Newcastle , where Paul_Kennedy graduated with first class honors in history , and Paul_Kennedy received his doctorate from Oxford . Paul_Kennedy was a Professor of History at the University of East Anglia between 1970 and 1983 . Paul_Kennedy is a Fellow of the Royal Historical Society , a former Visiting Fellow of the Institute for Advanced Study at Princeton University , and of the Alexander von Humboldt Foundation in Germany . eos

Paul_Kennedy most famous book , The Rise and Fall of the Great Powers , has been translated into 23 languages and assesses the interaction between economics and strategy over the past five centuries . eos

, MBE , ( born june 18 , 1942 ) is an English songwriter , musician and singer , best known as a member of The Beatles and one half of the songwriting partnership known as Lennon / McCartney . Paul_McCartney was a member of the The Beatles ( ` the greatest and most influential act of the rock era ' ) , As a Beatle , Paul_McCartney was one - half of the songwriting team credited as Lennon / McCartney , along with fellow band member John Lennon . eos
was a member of the The Beatles ( ` the greatest and most influential act of the rock era ' ) , As a Beatle , Paul_McCartney was one - half of the songwriting team credited as Lennon / McCartney , along with fellow band member John Lennon . Beatles songs attributed solely to Paul_McCartney include ` ` Ca n't Buy Me Love '' , ` ` Hello Goodbye '' , ` ` Hey Jude '' , ` ` Let It Be '' , and ` ` The Long and Winding Road . eos
was one - half of the songwriting team credited as Lennon / McCartney , along with fellow band member John Lennon . Beatles songs attributed solely to Paul_McCartney include ` ` Ca n't Buy Me Love '' , ` ` Hello Goodbye '' , ` ` Hey Jude '' , ` ` Let It Be '' , and ` ` The Long and Winding Road . Paul_McCartney song ` ` Yesterday '' is listed as the most covered song in history : more than 2,000 versions have been recorded , and it has been played more than 7,000,000 times on American TV and radio . eos
include ` ` Ca n't Buy Me Love '' , ` ` Hello Goodbye '' , ` ` Hey Jude '' , ` ` Let It Be '' , and ` ` The Long and Winding Road . Paul_McCartney song ` ` Yesterday '' is listed as the most covered song in history : more than 2,000 versions have been recorded , and it has been played more than 7,000,000 times on American TV and radio . Following the announcement of Paul_McCartney departure from The Beatles on 10 april 1970 , Paul_McCartney launched a successful solo career ( Paul_McCartney released Paul_McCartney first album on 17 april 1970 ) and Paul_McCartney formed the band Wings - scoring 30 top ten singles in the United Kingdom and United States . eos
song ` ` Yesterday '' is listed as the most covered song in history : more than 2,000 versions have been recorded , and it has been played more than 7,000,000 times on American TV and radio . Following the announcement of Paul_McCartney departure from The Beatles on 10 april 1970 , Paul_McCartney launched a successful solo career ( Paul_McCartney released Paul_McCartney first album on 17 april 1970 ) and Paul_McCartney formed the band Wings - scoring 30 top ten singles in the United Kingdom and United States . The keyboardist for Wings was Paul_McCartney first wife , Linda McCartney . eos
formed the band Wings - scoring 30 top ten singles in the United Kingdom and United States . The keyboardist for Wings was Paul_McCartney first wife , Linda McCartney . At the time of its release , in 1977 , the Wings single ` ` Mull of Kintyre '' was the highest - selling record in British chart history ( and remained so until 1984 ) . eos

Paul_McCartney was awarded the MBE on october 16 1965 , by Queen Elizabeth II , and , on 11 march 1997 , Paul_McCartney was knighted ( Knight Bachelor ) by her for Paul_McCartney services to music . Paul_McCartney dedicated Paul_McCartney knighthood to fellow Beatles John Lennon , George Harrison and Ringo Starr and the people of Liverpool . eos

Paul_McCartney owns the copyrights to more than three - thousand songs , including all of the songs written by Buddy Holly , Paul_McCartney childhood idol . eos

Paul_McCartney also owns the publishing rights to musicals such as Guys and Dolls , A Chorus Line , and Grease . eos

Aside from Paul_McCartney musical work , Paul_McCartney is a painter ( although until recently Paul_McCartney kept Paul_McCartney artwork private ) and a strong advocate for animal rights , vegetarianism , music education ( LIPA ) , and against landmines . eos

( b. december 22 , 1943 ) is an American academic and political figure . Paul_Wolfowitz is currently the President of the World Bank , but Paul_Wolfowitz may be most famous as a prominent architect of the foreign policy of the George W Bush administration known as the Bush Doctrine , which resulted in the invasion of Iraq . A former aide to Democratic Senator eos
is currently the President of the World Bank , but Paul_Wolfowitz may be most famous as a prominent architect of the foreign policy of the George W Bush administration known as the Bush Doctrine , which resulted in the invasion of Iraq . A former aide to Democratic Senator ` ` Scoop '' Jackson in the 1970s , Paul_Wolfowitz also served in the US Defense Department , as Director of Policy Planning and Assistant Secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs at the US State Department , as US Ambassador to Indonesia , and as Deputy Secretary of Defense in the Administration of George W Bush . eos
may be most famous as a prominent architect of the foreign policy of the George W Bush administration known as the Bush Doctrine , which resulted in the invasion of Iraq . A former aide to Democratic Senator ` ` Scoop '' Jackson in the 1970s , Paul_Wolfowitz also served in the US Defense Department , as Director of Policy Planning and Assistant Secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs at the US State Department , as US Ambassador to Indonesia , and as Deputy Secretary of Defense in the Administration of George W Bush . eos
also served in the US Defense Department , as Director of Policy Planning and Assistant Secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs at the US State Department , as US Ambassador to Indonesia , and as Deputy Secretary of Defense in the Administration of George W Bush . eos
( d. c. 65 ) , St. Paul , known as the Apostle to the Gentiles , was the most notable Christian missionary , together with the apostle St. Peter . eos
did not know Jesus in life but Paul_of_Tarsus was converted by a miraculous vision known as the ` ` Road to Damascus '' . Paul_of_Tarsus was the second most prolific contributor to the New Testament ( after St. Luke ) . Fourteen letters were attributed to Paul_of_Tarsus , with greater or lesser degrees of confidence , which contain the earliest systematic account of Christian doctrine and providing information on the life of the infant Church . eos
was converted by a miraculous vision known as the ` ` Road to Damascus '' . Paul_of_Tarsus was the second most prolific contributor to the New Testament ( after St. Luke ) . Fourteen letters were attributed to Paul_of_Tarsus , with greater or lesser degrees of confidence , which contain the earliest systematic account of Christian doctrine and providing information on the life of the infant Church . eos
was the second most prolific contributor to the New Testament ( after St. Luke ) . Fourteen letters were attributed to Paul_of_Tarsus , with greater or lesser degrees of confidence , which contain the earliest systematic account of Christian doctrine and providing information on the life of the infant Church . Paul_of_Tarsus letters are arguably the oldest part of the New Testament . eos
, with greater or lesser degrees of confidence , which contain the earliest systematic account of Christian doctrine and providing information on the life of the infant Church . Paul_of_Tarsus letters are arguably the oldest part of the New Testament . Paul_of_Tarsus also appears in the pages of St. Luke 's second volume , the Acts of the Apostles , so that it is possible to compare the account of Paul_of_Tarsus life in the Acts , with Paul_of_Tarsus own account in Paul_of_Tarsus various letters . eos
letters are arguably the oldest part of the New Testament . Paul_of_Tarsus also appears in the pages of St. Luke 's second volume , the Acts of the Apostles , so that it is possible to compare the account of Paul_of_Tarsus life in the Acts , with Paul_of_Tarsus own account in Paul_of_Tarsus various letters . Paul_of_Tarsus letters are largely written to churches which Paul_of_Tarsus had founded or visited ; Paul_of_Tarsus was a great traveller , going to Cyprus , Asia Minor ( modern Turkey ) , mainland Greece , Crete and Rome bringing the gospel of Jesus Christ , first to Jews and then to Gentiles . eos
various letters . Paul_of_Tarsus letters are largely written to churches which Paul_of_Tarsus had founded or visited ; Paul_of_Tarsus was a great traveller , going to Cyprus , Asia Minor ( modern Turkey ) , mainland Greece , Crete and Rome bringing the gospel of Jesus Christ , first to Jews and then to Gentiles . Paul_of_Tarsus letters are full of expositions of what Christians should believe and how they should live ; what Paul_of_Tarsus does not do is to tell Paul_of_Tarsus correspondents ( or the modern reader ) much about the life and teachings of Jesus . eos

letters are largely written to churches which Paul_of_Tarsus had founded or visited ; Paul_of_Tarsus was a great traveller , going to Cyprus , Asia Minor ( modern Turkey ) , mainland Greece , Crete and Rome bringing the gospel of Jesus Christ , first to Jews and then to Gentiles . Paul_of_Tarsus letters are full of expositions of what Christians should believe and how they should live ; what Paul_of_Tarsus does not do is to tell Paul_of_Tarsus correspondents ( or the modern reader ) much about the life and teachings of Jesus . Paul_of_Tarsus most explicit references are to the Last Supper , the crucifixion and the resurrection ; raising the question , still disputed , as to how consistent Paul_of_Tarsus version of the Christian faith is with that of the Gospels . eos

most explicit references are to the Last Supper , the crucifixion and the resurrection ; raising the question , still disputed , as to how consistent Paul_of_Tarsus version of the Christian faith is with that of the Gospels . Paul_of_Tarsus influence on Christian thinking has , arguably been more significant than any one other New Testament writer . Paul_of_Tarsus works were hugely influential on some of the great Christian thinkers and leaders of movements , including St. Augustine of Hippo and Martin Luther the instigator of the European Protestant Reformation and even upon the German church in the twentieth century through the interpretive writings of the scholar Karl Barth . eos

influence on Christian thinking has , arguably been more significant than any one other New Testament writer . Paul_of_Tarsus is the patron saint of Malta and the City of London , and Paul_of_Tarsus has also had several cities named in Paul_of_Tarsus honour ( including São Paulo , Brazil , and Saint Paul , Minnesota ) . eos

( july 31 , 1921 - february 25 2005 ) was an English lawyer and the founder of human rights group Amnesty International ( AI ) . eos
, CC , LLD , DLitt ( july 13 , 1934 - january 24 , 2002 ) was a Canadian broadcaster , writer and reporter , most famous for Peter_Gzowski work on the CBC radio show Morningside . Peter_Gzowski wrote books , Peter_Gzowski hosted television shows , and Peter_Gzowski worked at a number of newspapers and at Maclean 's Magazine . It is estimated that Peter_Gzowski conducted 27,000 interviews as host of Morningside . eos

It is estimated that Peter_Gzowski conducted 27,000 interviews as host of Morningside . Peter_Gzowski was known for a friendly but somewhat gruff at times interviewing style . eos

( Russian : Пётр I Алексеевич or Pyotr I Alekse & amp;#769 ; yevich ; or Peter Alexeyevich Romanov ) ( 9 june 1672 - 8 february 1725 "" 30 May 1672 - 28 january 1725 OS "" ) ruled Russia from 7 May ( 27 april O.S. ) 1682 until Peter_I_of_Russia death , before 1696 jointly with Peter_I_of_Russia weak and sickly half - brother , Ivan V eos

Vladimir Putin , the Russian president , has a portrait of Peter_I_of_Russia in his office . eos

( born july 6 , 1946 in Melbourne , Victoria , Australia ) is an Australian philosopher . Peter_Singer is the Ira W DCmp Professor of Bioethics at Princeton University , and laureate professor at the Centre for Applied Philosophy and Public Ethics , University of Melbourne . Peter_Singer specializes in practical ethics , approaching ethical issues from a preference utilitarian perspective . eos
is the Ira W DCmp Professor of Bioethics at Princeton University , and laureate professor at the Centre for Applied Philosophy and Public Ethics , University of Melbourne . Peter_Singer specializes in practical ethics , approaching ethical issues from a preference utilitarian perspective . Peter_Singer is a moral atheist . eos
specializes in practical ethics , approaching ethical issues from a preference utilitarian perspective . Peter_Singer is a moral atheist . Peter_Singer parents were Viennese Jews who escaped to Australia in 1938 . eos
is a moral atheist . Peter_Singer parents were Viennese Jews who escaped to Australia in 1938 . Peter_Singer father imported tea and coffee , while Peter_Singer mother practised medicine . eos
parents were Viennese Jews who escaped to Australia in 1938 . Peter_Singer father imported tea and coffee , while Peter_Singer mother practised medicine . Peter_Singer studied law , history and philosophy at the University of Melbourne , gaining Peter_Singer degree in 1967 . eos

received an MA for a thesis entitled Why should I be moral ? in 1969 . Peter_Singer was awarded a scholarship to study at Oxford University , obtaining a BPhil in 1971 with a thesis on civil disobedience , supervised by R M. Hare , and subsequently published as a book in 1973 . eos
was awarded a scholarship to study at Oxford University , obtaining a BPhil in 1971 with a thesis on civil disobedience , supervised by R M. Hare , and subsequently published as a book in 1973 . After spending two years as a Radcliffe lecturer at University College , Oxford , Peter_Singer was visiting professor at New York University for 16 months . Peter_Singer returned to Melbourne in 1977 , where Peter_Singer has spent most of Peter_Singer career , apart from many visiting positions internationally , and until Peter_Singer move to Princeton in 1999 . eos
was visiting professor at New York University for 16 months . Peter_Singer has served , on two occasions , as chair of philosophy at Monash University , and Peter_Singer founded its Centre for Human Bioethics . eos

was recognized as the Australian Humanist of the Year by the Council of Australian Humanist Societies . Outside academic circles , Peter_Singer is best known for Peter_Singer book Animal Liberation , widely regarded as the touchstone of the animal liberation movement . Peter_Singer is a founding member of the Great Ape Project , which seeks to persuade the United Nations to adopt a Declaration on Great Apes awarding personhood to non - human great apes . eos

( born june 26 , 1947 in Karlsruhe , Germany ) is a philosopher . eos
PC , CC , CH , QC , MA , LLD , FRSC "" IPA : "" pjɛʀ ɛliʌt tʀydo "" "" ( october 18 , 1919 - september 28 , 2000 ) was the fifteenth Prime Minister of Canada from april 20 , 1968 to june 4 , 1979 , and from march 3 , 1980 to june 30 , 1984 . Pierre_Trudeau was a charismatic figure Pierre_Trudeau , from the late 1960s until the mid-1980s , dominated the Canadian political scene and Pierre_Trudeau aroused passionate reactions . eos
was a charismatic figure Pierre_Trudeau , from the late 1960s until the mid-1980s , dominated the Canadian political scene and Pierre_Trudeau aroused passionate reactions . ` ` He haunts us still , '' biographers Christina McCall and Stephen Clarkson wrote . Admirers praise the force of Pierre_Trudeau intellect . eos
, from the late 1960s until the mid-1980s , dominated the Canadian political scene and Pierre_Trudeau aroused passionate reactions . ` ` He haunts us still , '' biographers Christina McCall and Stephen Clarkson wrote . Admirers praise the force of Pierre_Trudeau intellect . eos
aroused passionate reactions . ` ` He haunts us still , '' biographers Christina McCall and Stephen Clarkson wrote . Admirers praise the force of Pierre_Trudeau intellect . eos
intellect . They salute Pierre_Trudeau political acumen in preserving national unity and bringing into force the Charter of Rights and Freedoms . Detractors fault Pierre_Trudeau for poor administrative practices , arrogance , and lack of understanding of Canada outside Quebec ( and arguably the far North ) . eos
political acumen in preserving national unity and bringing into force the Charter of Rights and Freedoms . Detractors fault Pierre_Trudeau for poor administrative practices , arrogance , and lack of understanding of Canada outside Quebec ( and arguably the far North ) . They deplore Pierre_Trudeau economic policies that increased the national debt , and criticize Pierre_Trudeau for increasing a sense of political alienation in western provinces . eos

Nevertheless , few would dispute that Pierre_Trudeau was a towering figure Pierre_Trudeau helped redefine Canada . eos

( Greek : "" "" , Plátōn , ` ` wide , broad - shouldered '' ) ( c. 427-c . eos
real name is believed to have been Aristocles , was an immensely influential ancient Greek philosopher , a student of Socrates , writer of philosophical dialogues , and founder of the Academy in Athens where Aristotle studied . Plato lectured extensively at the Academy , and Plato wrote on many philosophical issues , dealing especially in politics , ethics , metaphysics , and epistemology . The most important writings of Plato are Plato dialogues , although some letters have come down to us under Plato name . eos
lectured extensively at the Academy , and Plato wrote on many philosophical issues , dealing especially in politics , ethics , metaphysics , and epistemology . The most important writings of Plato are Plato dialogues , although some letters have come down to us under Plato name . It is believed that all of Plato authentic dialogues survive . eos
wrote on many philosophical issues , dealing especially in politics , ethics , metaphysics , and epistemology . The most important writings of Plato are Plato dialogues , although some letters have come down to us under Plato name . It is believed that all of Plato authentic dialogues survive . eos
are Plato dialogues , although some letters have come down to us under Plato name . It is believed that all of Plato authentic dialogues survive . However , some dialogues ascribed to Plato by the Greeks are now considered by the consensus of scholars to be either suspect ( eg , First Alcibiades , Clitophon ) or probably spurious ( such as Demodocus , or the Second Alcibiades ) . eos
dialogues , although some letters have come down to us under Plato name . It is believed that all of Plato authentic dialogues survive . However , some dialogues ascribed to Plato by the Greeks are now considered by the consensus of scholars to be either suspect ( eg , First Alcibiades , Clitophon ) or probably spurious ( such as Demodocus , or the Second Alcibiades ) . eos
name . It is believed that all of Plato authentic dialogues survive . However , some dialogues ascribed to Plato by the Greeks are now considered by the consensus of scholars to be either suspect ( eg , First Alcibiades , Clitophon ) or probably spurious ( such as Demodocus , or the Second Alcibiades ) . eos
authentic dialogues survive . However , some dialogues ascribed to Plato by the Greeks are now considered by the consensus of scholars to be either suspect ( eg , First Alcibiades , Clitophon ) or probably spurious ( such as Demodocus , or the Second Alcibiades ) . The letters are all considered to probably be spurious , with the possible exception of the Seventh Letter . eos
by the Greeks are now considered by the consensus of scholars to be either suspect ( eg , First Alcibiades , Clitophon ) or probably spurious ( such as Demodocus , or the Second Alcibiades ) . The letters are all considered to probably be spurious , with the possible exception of the Seventh Letter . Socrates is often a character in Plato dialogues . eos
dialogues . How much of the content and argument of any given dialogue is Socrates ' point of view , and how much of it is Plato , is heavily disputed , since Socrates himself did not write anything ; this is often referred to as the ` ` Socratic problem '' . However , Plato was doubtless strongly influenced by Socrates ' teachings , so many of the ideas presented , at least in Plato early works , were probably borrowings or adaptations . eos
, is heavily disputed , since Socrates himself did not write anything ; this is often referred to as the ` ` Socratic problem '' . ( Latin : Benedictus PP . XVI eos
was elected on april 19 , 2005 in a papal conclave , Pope_Benedict_XVI celebrated Pope_Benedict_XVI Papal Inauguration Mass on april 24 , 2005 , and Pope_Benedict_XVI took possession of Pope_Benedict_XVI cathedral , the Basilica of St. John Lateran , on May 7 , 2005 . Pope_Benedict_XVI has both German and Vatican citizenship . Pope_Benedict_XVI succeeded Pope John Paul II , who died on april 2 , 2005 . eos

cathedral , the Basilica of St. John Lateran , on May 7 , 2005 . Pope_Benedict_XVI has both German and Vatican citizenship . Pope_Benedict_XVI succeeded Pope John Paul II , who died on april 2 , 2005 . eos
has both German and Vatican citizenship . Pope_Benedict_XVI succeeded Pope John Paul II , who died on april 2 , 2005 . One of the best - known theologians since the 1960s and a prolific author , Pope_Benedict_XVI is viewed as a defender of traditional Catholic doctrine and values and of their importance in the survival of Western civilization . eos
succeeded Pope John Paul II , who died on april 2 , 2005 . One of the best - known theologians since the 1960s and a prolific author , Pope_Benedict_XVI is viewed as a defender of traditional Catholic doctrine and values and of their importance in the survival of Western civilization . Pope_Benedict_XVI served as a professor at various German universities , and Pope_Benedict_XVI was a theological consultant at the Second Vatican Council before becoming Archbishop of Munich and Freising and Cardinal . eos
is viewed as a defender of traditional Catholic doctrine and values and of their importance in the survival of Western civilization . Pope_Benedict_XVI served as a professor at various German universities , and Pope_Benedict_XVI was a theological consultant at the Second Vatican Council before becoming Archbishop of Munich and Freising and Cardinal . At the time of Pope_Benedict_XVI election as Pope , Pope_Benedict_XVI had been Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith ( curial heads lose their positions upon the death of a pope ) and Pope_Benedict_XVI was Dean of the College of Cardinals . eos
served as a professor at various German universities , and Pope_Benedict_XVI was a theological consultant at the Second Vatican Council before becoming Archbishop of Munich and Freising and Cardinal . At the time of Pope_Benedict_XVI election as Pope , Pope_Benedict_XVI had been Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith ( curial heads lose their positions upon the death of a pope ) and Pope_Benedict_XVI was Dean of the College of Cardinals . During Pope_Benedict_XVI papacy , Pope_Benedict_XVI has emphasized what Pope_Benedict_XVI sees as a need for Europe to return to fundamental Christian values in response to increasing de - Christianisation and secularisation in many developed countries . eos
was a theological consultant at the Second Vatican Council before becoming Archbishop of Munich and Freising and Cardinal . At the time of Pope_Benedict_XVI election as Pope , Pope_Benedict_XVI had been Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith ( curial heads lose their positions upon the death of a pope ) and Pope_Benedict_XVI was Dean of the College of Cardinals . During Pope_Benedict_XVI papacy , Pope_Benedict_XVI has emphasized what Pope_Benedict_XVI sees as a need for Europe to return to fundamental Christian values in response to increasing de - Christianisation and secularisation in many developed countries . eos
election as Pope , Pope_Benedict_XVI had been Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith ( curial heads lose their positions upon the death of a pope ) and Pope_Benedict_XVI was Dean of the College of Cardinals . During Pope_Benedict_XVI papacy , Pope_Benedict_XVI has emphasized what Pope_Benedict_XVI sees as a need for Europe to return to fundamental Christian values in response to increasing de - Christianisation and secularisation in many developed countries . For this reason , Pope_Benedict_XVI has identified relativism 's denial of objective truth - and more particularly , the denial of moral truths - as the central problem of the 21st century . eos

( june 21 , 1002 - april 19 , 1054 ) , born Bruno of Eguisheim - Dagsburg , was Pope from february 12 , 1049 to Pope_Leo_IX death . eos
death . eos
( 1042 - july 29 , 1099 ) , born Otho of Lagery ( alternatively : Otto or Odo ) , was a Pope from 1088 to july 29 , 1099 . Pope_Urban_II is most known for starting the First Crusade ( 1095 - 99 ) and setting up the modern day Roman Curia , in the manner of a royal court , to help run the Church . Pope_Urban_II was born into nobility in France at Lagery ( near Châtillon - sur - Marne ) and Pope_Urban_II was church - educated . eos
is most known for starting the First Crusade ( 1095 - 99 ) and setting up the modern day Roman Curia , in the manner of a royal court , to help run the Church . Pope_Urban_II was born into nobility in France at Lagery ( near Châtillon - sur - Marne ) and Pope_Urban_II was church - educated . Pope_Urban_II was archdeacon of Reims when , under the influence of St. Bruno Pope_Urban_II teacher , Pope_Urban_II resigned and Pope_Urban_II entered the cloister at Cluny where Pope_Urban_II rose to be prior . eos
was born into nobility in France at Lagery ( near Châtillon - sur - Marne ) and Pope_Urban_II was church - educated . Pope_Urban_II was archdeacon of Reims when , under the influence of St. Bruno Pope_Urban_II teacher , Pope_Urban_II resigned and Pope_Urban_II entered the cloister at Cluny where Pope_Urban_II rose to be prior . In 1078 , Pope Gregory VII ( 1073 - 85 ) summoned Pope_Urban_II to Italy and made Pope_Urban_II cardinal - bishop of Ostia . eos
was church - educated . Pope_Urban_II was archdeacon of Reims when , under the influence of St. Bruno Pope_Urban_II teacher , Pope_Urban_II resigned and Pope_Urban_II entered the cloister at Cluny where Pope_Urban_II rose to be prior . In 1078 , Pope Gregory VII ( 1073 - 85 ) summoned Pope_Urban_II to Italy and made Pope_Urban_II cardinal - bishop of Ostia . eos
was archdeacon of Reims when , under the influence of St. Bruno Pope_Urban_II teacher , Pope_Urban_II resigned and Pope_Urban_II entered the cloister at Cluny where Pope_Urban_II rose to be prior . In 1078 , Pope Gregory VII ( 1073 - 85 ) summoned Pope_Urban_II to Italy and made Pope_Urban_II cardinal - bishop of Ostia . Pope_Urban_II was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . eos

entered the cloister at Cluny where Pope_Urban_II rose to be prior . In 1078 , Pope Gregory VII ( 1073 - 85 ) summoned Pope_Urban_II to Italy and made Pope_Urban_II cardinal - bishop of Ostia . Pope_Urban_II was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . eos
rose to be prior . In 1078 , Pope Gregory VII ( 1073 - 85 ) summoned Pope_Urban_II to Italy and made Pope_Urban_II cardinal - bishop of Ostia . Pope_Urban_II was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . eos
to Italy and made Pope_Urban_II cardinal - bishop of Ostia . Pope_Urban_II was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . eos
cardinal - bishop of Ostia . Pope_Urban_II was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . eos
was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . Pope_Urban_II took up the policies of Pope Gregory VII , and while pursuing them with determination , Pope_Urban_II showed greater flexibility , and diplomatic finesse . eos
was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . Pope_Urban_II took up the policies of Pope Gregory VII , and while pursuing them with determination , Pope_Urban_II showed greater flexibility , and diplomatic finesse . eos
was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . Pope_Urban_II took up the policies of Pope Gregory VII , and while pursuing them with determination , Pope_Urban_II showed greater flexibility , and diplomatic finesse . At the outset Pope_Urban_II had to reckon with the presence of the powerful antipope Clement III ( 1080 , 1084 - 1100 ) in Rome ; but a series of well - attended synods held in Rome , Amalfi , Benevento , and Troia supported Pope_Urban_II in renewed declarations against simony , lay investiture , and clerical marriages , and a continued opposition to Emperor Henry IV ( 1056 - 1105 ) . eos
took up the policies of Pope Gregory VII , and while pursuing them with determination , Pope_Urban_II showed greater flexibility , and diplomatic finesse . At the outset Pope_Urban_II had to reckon with the presence of the powerful antipope Clement III ( 1080 , 1084 - 1100 ) in Rome ; but a series of well - attended synods held in Rome , Amalfi , Benevento , and Troia supported Pope_Urban_II in renewed declarations against simony , lay investiture , and clerical marriages , and a continued opposition to Emperor Henry IV ( 1056 - 1105 ) . In accordance with this last policy , the marriage of the countess Matilda of Tuscany with Guelph of Bavaria was promoted , Prince Conrad was helped in his rebellion against his father and crowned King of the Romans at Milan in 1093 , and the Empress ( Adelaide or Praxedes ) encouraged in her charges against her husband . eos
showed greater flexibility , and diplomatic finesse . At the outset Pope_Urban_II had to reckon with the presence of the powerful antipope Clement III ( 1080 , 1084 - 1100 ) in Rome ; but a series of well - attended synods held in Rome , Amalfi , Benevento , and Troia supported Pope_Urban_II in renewed declarations against simony , lay investiture , and clerical marriages , and a continued opposition to Emperor Henry IV ( 1056 - 1105 ) . In accordance with this last policy , the marriage of the countess Matilda of Tuscany with Guelph of Bavaria was promoted , Prince Conrad was helped in his rebellion against his father and crowned King of the Romans at Milan in 1093 , and the Empress ( Adelaide or Praxedes ) encouraged in her charges against her husband . eos
had to reckon with the presence of the powerful antipope Clement III ( 1080 , 1084 - 1100 ) in Rome ; but a series of well - attended synods held in Rome , Amalfi , Benevento , and Troia supported Pope_Urban_II in renewed declarations against simony , lay investiture , and clerical marriages , and a continued opposition to Emperor Henry IV ( 1056 - 1105 ) . In accordance with this last policy , the marriage of the countess Matilda of Tuscany with Guelph of Bavaria was promoted , Prince Conrad was helped in his rebellion against his father and crowned King of the Romans at Milan in 1093 , and the Empress ( Adelaide or Praxedes ) encouraged in her charges against her husband . In a protracted struggle also with Philip I of France ( 1060 - 1108 ) , whom Pope_Urban_II had excommunicated for his adulterous marriage to Bertrade de Montfort , Pope_Urban_II finally proved victorious . eos
in renewed declarations against simony , lay investiture , and clerical marriages , and a continued opposition to Emperor Henry IV ( 1056 - 1105 ) . In accordance with this last policy , the marriage of the countess Matilda of Tuscany with Guelph of Bavaria was promoted , Prince Conrad was helped in his rebellion against his father and crowned King of the Romans at Milan in 1093 , and the Empress ( Adelaide or Praxedes ) encouraged in her charges against her husband . In a protracted struggle also with Philip I of France ( 1060 - 1108 ) , whom Pope_Urban_II had excommunicated for his adulterous marriage to Bertrade de Montfort , Pope_Urban_II finally proved victorious . eos
had excommunicated for his adulterous marriage to Bertrade de Montfort , Pope_Urban_II finally proved victorious . Pope_Urban_II had much correspondence with Archbishop Anselm of Canterbury , to whom Pope_Urban_II extended an order to come urgently to Rome just after the Archbishop 's first flight from England , and earlier Pope_Urban_II gave Pope_Urban_II approval to Anselm 's work De Incarnatione Verbi ( The Incarnation of the Word ) . eos
finally proved victorious . ( february 6 1925 - april 30 2006 ) was an Indonesian author of novels , short stories , essays , polemics , and histories of Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer homeland and its people . A well - regarded writer in the West , Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer outspoken and often politically charged writings faced censorship in Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer native land during the pre - reformation era . For opposing the policies of both founding president Sukarno , as well as those of its successor , the New Order regime of Suharto , Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer faced extrajudicial punishment . eos
homeland and its people . A well - regarded writer in the West , Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer outspoken and often politically charged writings faced censorship in Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer native land during the pre - reformation era . For opposing the policies of both founding president Sukarno , as well as those of its successor , the New Order regime of Suharto , Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer faced extrajudicial punishment . eos
outspoken and often politically charged writings faced censorship in Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer native land during the pre - reformation era . For opposing the policies of both founding president Sukarno , as well as those of its successor , the New Order regime of Suharto , Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer faced extrajudicial punishment . During the many years in which Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer suffered imprisonment and house arrest , Pramoedya_Ananta_Toer became a cause célèbre for advocates of freedom of expression and human rights . eos
native land during the pre - reformation era . ( born june 10 , 1942 , in Edmonton , Alberta ) , is a right - leaning populist Canadian politician . Preston_Manning was the first and only leader of the Reform Party of Canada , a Canadian federal political party that evolved into the Canadian Alliance . Preston_Manning sat in Parliament for this party until retirement , after which it in turn merged with the Progressive Conservative Party to form today 's Conservative Party of Canada . eos
was the first and only leader of the Reform Party of Canada , a Canadian federal political party that evolved into the Canadian Alliance . Preston_Manning sat in Parliament for this party until retirement , after which it in turn merged with the Progressive Conservative Party to form today 's Conservative Party of Canada . Preston_Manning came from a political background : eos
sat in Parliament for this party until retirement , after which it in turn merged with the Progressive Conservative Party to form today 's Conservative Party of Canada . Preston_Manning came from a political background : Preston_Manning was the son of Ernest Manning , Social Credit Party Premier of Alberta between 1943 and 1968 . eos
came from a political background : Preston_Manning was the son of Ernest Manning , Social Credit Party Premier of Alberta between 1943 and 1968 . In 1964 , Preston_Manning graduated from the University of Alberta with a BA in Economics . eos
was the son of Ernest Manning , Social Credit Party Premier of Alberta between 1943 and 1968 . In 1964 , Preston_Manning graduated from the University of Alberta with a BA in Economics . Preston_Manning sought election to the Canadian House of Commons in the 1965 federal election as a candidate of the federal Social Credit Party , but Preston_Manning was defeated . eos
graduated from the University of Alberta with a BA in Economics . Preston_Manning sought election to the Canadian House of Commons in the 1965 federal election as a candidate of the federal Social Credit Party , but Preston_Manning was defeated . Preston_Manning identifies Preston_Manning as an evangelical Christian . eos

as an evangelical Christian . Preston_Manning formed the Reform Party in 1987 . Preston_Manning chief policy adviser was Stephen Harper , a student at the University of Calgary and now the Prime Minister of Canada . eos
identifies Preston_Manning as an evangelical Christian . Preston_Manning formed the Reform Party in 1987 . Preston_Manning chief policy adviser was Stephen Harper , a student at the University of Calgary and now the Prime Minister of Canada . eos
formed the Reform Party in 1987 . Preston_Manning chief policy adviser was Stephen Harper , a student at the University of Calgary and now the Prime Minister of Canada . Harper designed the Reform Party 's 1988 campaign platform . eos
chief policy adviser was Stephen Harper , a student at the University of Calgary and now the Prime Minister of Canada . Harper designed the Reform Party 's 1988 campaign platform . The Reform Party was a combination of fiscal conservatism and populism , though aspects of social - conservatism grew , branding the party as ` ` very right - wing . '' eos
was elected to the House of Commons in the 1993 federal election , when Reform experienced its first major electoral success , replacing the Progressive Conservative Party as Canada 's dominant conservative party , with a base especially in Western Canada . In the 1997 election , the party became Canada 's official opposition , with Preston_Manning becoming the Leader of the Opposition . With Reform 's emergence , however , Preston_Manning fragmented the conservative vote into two parts - Reform and the weakened PC Party . eos
becoming the Leader of the Opposition . With Reform 's emergence , however , Preston_Manning fragmented the conservative vote into two parts - Reform and the weakened PC Party . With Canada 's plurality voting system , the result was political domination by the Liberal Party . eos
fragmented the conservative vote into two parts - Reform and the weakened PC Party . With Canada 's plurality voting system , the result was political domination by the Liberal Party . Consequently , Preston_Manning new goal was to reunite the two conservative parties under Preston_Manning leadership , and Preston_Manning launched the United Alternative movement to examine ways for the parties to cooperate . eos
new goal was to reunite the two conservative parties under Preston_Manning leadership , and Preston_Manning launched the United Alternative movement to examine ways for the parties to cooperate . The movement resulted in the formation of a new party , the Canadian Alliance , which as its full name ( Canadian Reform Conservative Alliance ) shows , was intended to supplant both parties . Most of the PC Party , however , refused to cooperate , and critics claimed the new party was little more than an image makeover for the Reform Party . eos

Most of the PC Party , however , refused to cooperate , and critics claimed the new party was little more than an image makeover for the Reform Party . eos

Most of the PC Party , however , refused to cooperate , and critics claimed the new party was little more than an image makeover for the Reform Party . eos
opened the door for rival leadership bids in the Canadian Alliance leadership election . After a fiercely close campaign , Preston_Manning was succeeded as leader by the younger and more flamboyant Stockwell Day in 2000 . Preston_Manning published Preston_Manning memoirs of political life , eos

ends the book by promising to ` ` scout '' the future of Canada ; Preston_Manning is in this sense continuing to write about policy , especially policy that Preston_Manning feels will be detrimental to the future of the country . Preston_Manning founded the Manning Centre for Building Democracy in 2005 to train conservatives for active political life . Preston_Manning also served as Governor General for the British Columbia Universities Model Parliament Society ( BCUMP ) in january 2006 . eos

Following the ` ` crushing blow '' received by Ralph Klein in the Alberta Progressive Conservative Party 's leadership review vote in which Klein received the support of only 55 % of delegates , Preston_Manning told Canadian Press that Preston_Manning was ` ` leaving the door open '' for a possible bid in the Alberta Progressive Conservative leadership election being held to choose a successor to Ralph Klein . eos
also served as Governor General for the British Columbia Universities Model Parliament Society ( BCUMP ) in january 2006 . Following the ` ` crushing blow '' received by Ralph Klein in the Alberta Progressive Conservative Party 's leadership review vote in which Klein received the support of only 55 % of delegates , Preston_Manning told Canadian Press that Preston_Manning was ` ` leaving the door open '' for a possible bid in the Alberta Progressive Conservative leadership election being held to choose a successor to Ralph Klein . Preston_Manning announced on May 18 , 2006 that Preston_Manning would not be a candidate in the leadership election , citing a desire to remain close to family and to influence politics by generating new policy ideas through the Manning Centre . eos
told Canadian Press that Preston_Manning was ` ` leaving the door open '' for a possible bid in the Alberta Progressive Conservative leadership election being held to choose a successor to Ralph Klein . Preston_Manning announced on May 18 , 2006 that Preston_Manning would not be a candidate in the leadership election , citing a desire to remain close to family and to influence politics by generating new policy ideas through the Manning Centre . Muriel Manning , Preston_Manning mother and an Alberta socialite , died on april 21 , 2006 , at Rockyview General Hospital in Calgary , Alberta , at the age of 95 . eos

and Qin_Shi_Huang prime minister Lǐ Sī passed a series of major reforms aimed at cementing the unification , and they undertook some gigantic construction projects , most notably the precursor version of the current Great Wall of China . For all the tyranny of Qin_Shi_Huang autocratic rule , Qin_Shi_Huang is still regarded by many today as the founding father in Chinese history Qin_Shi_Huang unification of China has endured for more than two millennia ( with interruptions ) . eos

( in English often spelled Rauf Denktash ) ( born january 27 , 1924 ) is the founder of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus , a defacto state which is only recognized by Turkey . Rauf_Denktas was the first President of the TRNC and Rauf_Denktas has served four five - year terms in that office . eos

( march 31 , 1596 - february 11 , 1650 ) , also known as Cartesius , was a noted French philosopher , mathematician , and scientist . Dubbed the ` ` Founder of Modern Philosophy '' and the ` ` Father of Modern Mathematics , '' Rene_Descartes ranks as one of the most important and influential thinkers of modern times . For good or bad , much of subsequent western philosophy is a reaction to Rene_Descartes writings , which have been closely studied from Rene_Descartes time down to the present day . eos
ranks as one of the most important and influential thinkers of modern times . For good or bad , much of subsequent western philosophy is a reaction to Rene_Descartes writings , which have been closely studied from Rene_Descartes time down to the present day . Rene_Descartes was one of the key thinkers of the Scientific Revolution in the Western World . eos
writings , which have been closely studied from Rene_Descartes time down to the present day . Rene_Descartes was one of the key thinkers of the Scientific Revolution in the Western World . Rene_Descartes influence in mathematics is also apparent , the Cartesian coordinate system used in plane geometry and algebra being named after Rene_Descartes . eos
time down to the present day . Rene_Descartes was one of the key thinkers of the Scientific Revolution in the Western World . Rene_Descartes influence in mathematics is also apparent , the Cartesian coordinate system used in plane geometry and algebra being named after Rene_Descartes . eos
was one of the key thinkers of the Scientific Revolution in the Western World . Rene_Descartes influence in mathematics is also apparent , the Cartesian coordinate system used in plane geometry and algebra being named after Rene_Descartes . Rene_Descartes frequently contrasted Rene_Descartes views with those of Rene_Descartes predecessors . eos
influence in mathematics is also apparent , the Cartesian coordinate system used in plane geometry and algebra being named after Rene_Descartes . Rene_Descartes frequently contrasted Rene_Descartes views with those of Rene_Descartes predecessors . In the opening section of the ` ` Passions of the Soul '' , Rene_Descartes goes so far as to assert that Rene_Descartes will write on Rene_Descartes topic ` ` as if no one had written on these matters before '' . eos
. Rene_Descartes frequently contrasted Rene_Descartes views with those of Rene_Descartes predecessors . In the opening section of the ` ` Passions of the Soul '' , Rene_Descartes goes so far as to assert that Rene_Descartes will write on Rene_Descartes topic ` ` as if no one had written on these matters before '' . eos
predecessors . In the opening section of the ` ` Passions of the Soul '' , Rene_Descartes goes so far as to assert that Rene_Descartes will write on Rene_Descartes topic ` ` as if no one had written on these matters before '' . Nevertheless many elements of Rene_Descartes philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine . eos

In the opening section of the ` ` Passions of the Soul '' , Rene_Descartes goes so far as to assert that Rene_Descartes will write on Rene_Descartes topic ` ` as if no one had written on these matters before '' . Nevertheless many elements of Rene_Descartes philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine . eos
goes so far as to assert that Rene_Descartes will write on Rene_Descartes topic ` ` as if no one had written on these matters before '' . Nevertheless many elements of Rene_Descartes philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine . In Rene_Descartes natural philosophy , Rene_Descartes differs from the Schools on two major points : first , Rene_Descartes rejects the analysis of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , Rene_Descartes rejects any appeal to ends - divine or natural - in explaining natural phenomena . eos

Nevertheless many elements of Rene_Descartes philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine . In Rene_Descartes natural philosophy , Rene_Descartes differs from the Schools on two major points : first , Rene_Descartes rejects the analysis of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , Rene_Descartes rejects any appeal to ends - divine or natural - in explaining natural phenomena . eos

Nevertheless many elements of Rene_Descartes philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine . In Rene_Descartes natural philosophy , Rene_Descartes differs from the Schools on two major points : first , Rene_Descartes rejects the analysis of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , Rene_Descartes rejects any appeal to ends - divine or natural - in explaining natural phenomena . eos
philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine . In Rene_Descartes natural philosophy , Rene_Descartes differs from the Schools on two major points : first , Rene_Descartes rejects the analysis of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , Rene_Descartes rejects any appeal to ends - divine or natural - in explaining natural phenomena . In Rene_Descartes theology , Rene_Descartes insists on the absolute freedom of God 's act of creation . eos
natural philosophy , Rene_Descartes differs from the Schools on two major points : first , Rene_Descartes rejects the analysis of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , Rene_Descartes rejects any appeal to ends - divine or natural - in explaining natural phenomena . In Rene_Descartes theology , Rene_Descartes insists on the absolute freedom of God 's act of creation . Rene_Descartes was a major figure in 17th century continental rationalism , later advocated by Baruch Spinoza and Gottfried Leibniz , and opposed by the empiricist school of thought , consisting of Hobbes , Locke , Berkeley , and Hume . eos
differs from the Schools on two major points : first , Rene_Descartes rejects the analysis of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , Rene_Descartes rejects any appeal to ends - divine or natural - in explaining natural phenomena . theology , Rene_Descartes insists on the absolute freedom of God 's act of creation . Rene_Descartes was a major figure in 17th century continental rationalism , later advocated by Baruch Spinoza and Gottfried Leibniz , and opposed by the empiricist school of thought , consisting of Hobbes , Locke , Berkeley , and Hume . Leibniz , Spinoza and Rene_Descartes were all versed in mathematics as well as philosophy , and Rene_Descartes and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well . eos
insists on the absolute freedom of God 's act of creation . Rene_Descartes was a major figure in 17th century continental rationalism , later advocated by Baruch Spinoza and Gottfried Leibniz , and opposed by the empiricist school of thought , consisting of Hobbes , Locke , Berkeley , and Hume . Leibniz , Spinoza and Rene_Descartes were all versed in mathematics as well as philosophy , and Rene_Descartes and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well . eos
was a major figure in 17th century continental rationalism , later advocated by Baruch Spinoza and Gottfried Leibniz , and opposed by the empiricist school of thought , consisting of Hobbes , Locke , Berkeley , and Hume . Leibniz , Spinoza and Rene_Descartes were all versed in mathematics as well as philosophy , and Rene_Descartes and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well . As the inventor of the Cartesian coordinate system , Rene_Descartes founded analytic geometry , that bridge between algebra and geometry crucial to the invention of the calculus and analysis . eos
were all versed in mathematics as well as philosophy , and Rene_Descartes and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well . As the inventor of the Cartesian coordinate system , Rene_Descartes founded analytic geometry , that bridge between algebra and geometry crucial to the invention of the calculus and analysis . Rene_Descartes reflections on mind and mechanism began the strain of western thought that much later , impelled by the invention of the electronic computer and by the possibility of machine intelligence , blossomed into , eg , the Turing test . eos
and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well . Rene_Descartes reflections on mind and mechanism began the strain of western thought that much later , impelled by the invention of the electronic computer and by the possibility of machine intelligence , blossomed into , eg , the Turing test . eos

Rene_Descartes reflections on mind and mechanism began the strain of western thought that much later , impelled by the invention of the electronic computer and by the possibility of machine intelligence , blossomed into , eg , the Turing test . Rene_Descartes most famous statement is ` ` Cogito ergo sum '' eos
reflections on mind and mechanism began the strain of western thought that much later , impelled by the invention of the electronic computer and by the possibility of machine intelligence , blossomed into , eg , the Turing test . Rene_Descartes most famous statement is ` ` Cogito ergo sum '' ( French : ` ` Je pense , donc je suis '' or in English : ` ` I think , therefore I am '' ) , found in § 7 of ` ` Principles of Philosophy '' eos
most famous statement is ` ` Cogito ergo sum '' ( French : ` ` Je pense , donc je suis '' or in English : ` ` I think , therefore I am '' ) , found in § 7 of ` ` Principles of Philosophy '' ( Latin ) and part IV of ` ` Discourse on Method '' ( French ) . eos
( born 18 july 1950 , Shamley Green , Surrey ) , sometimes abbreviated as SRB for ` ` Sir Richard Branson '' , is an English entrepreneur , best known for Richard_Branson Virgin brand , a banner that encompasses a variety of business organisations . It is estimated that Richard_Branson is worth over £ 3 billion ( equivalent to more than US$ 5 billion ) according to the Sunday Times Rich List 2006 . On the 12th of october , 2006 , Richard_Branson emphasised Richard_Branson stated plan is to invest $ 3 billion over 10 years to fight global warming . eos

CBE ( november 10 1925 - august 5 1984 ) was a Welsh actor . Richard_Burton is often considered to be one of the greatest British actors of all time and at one time Richard_Burton was the highest paid actor in Hollywood . Known for Richard_Burton immaculate vocal style , Richard_Burton was nominated 7 times for Best Actor Oscars . eos

( born march 261941 ) is an eminent British ethologist , evolutionary scientist , and popular science writer Richard_Dawkins holds the Charles Simonyi Chair in the Public Understanding of Science at Oxford University . Richard_Dawkins first came to prominence with Richard_Dawkins 1976 book The Selfish Gene which popularised the gene - centric view of evolution and introduced the term meme into the lexicon , thereby helping to found the field of memetics . eos
holds the Charles Simonyi Chair in the Public Understanding of Science at Oxford University . Richard_Dawkins first came to prominence with Richard_Dawkins 1976 book The Selfish Gene which popularised the gene - centric view of evolution and introduced the term meme into the lexicon , thereby helping to found the field of memetics . In 1982 , Richard_Dawkins made a major contribution to the science of evolution with the theory , presented in Richard_Dawkins widely cited book The Extended Phenotype , that phenotypic effects are not limited to an organism 's body but can stretch far into the environment , including into the bodies of other organisms . eos
first came to prominence with Richard_Dawkins 1976 book The Selfish Gene which popularised the gene - centric view of evolution and introduced the term meme into the lexicon , thereby helping to found the field of memetics . In 1982 , Richard_Dawkins made a major contribution to the science of evolution with the theory , presented in Richard_Dawkins widely cited book The Extended Phenotype , that phenotypic effects are not limited to an organism 's body but can stretch far into the environment , including into the bodies of other organisms . Richard_Dawkins has since written several best - selling popular books on evolution , and Richard_Dawkins has appeared in a number of television and radio programmes on evolutionary biology , creationism , and religion . eos

Richard_Dawkins has since written several best - selling popular books on evolution , and Richard_Dawkins has appeared in a number of television and radio programmes on evolutionary biology , creationism , and religion . eos
made a major contribution to the science of evolution with the theory , presented in Richard_Dawkins widely cited book The Extended Phenotype , that phenotypic effects are not limited to an organism 's body but can stretch far into the environment , including into the bodies of other organisms . Richard_Dawkins has since written several best - selling popular books on evolution , and Richard_Dawkins has appeared in a number of television and radio programmes on evolutionary biology , creationism , and religion . Richard_Dawkins is an outspoken atheist , humanist , and sceptic , and Richard_Dawkins is a prominent member of the Brights movement . eos

Richard_Dawkins is an outspoken atheist , humanist , and sceptic , and Richard_Dawkins is a prominent member of the Brights movement . In a play on Thomas Huxley 's epithet ` ` Darwin 's bulldog '' , Richard_Dawkins impassioned defence of Darwinian evolution has earned Richard_Dawkins the appellation ` ` Darwin 's rottweiler '' . eos

( 2 october 1452 - 22 august 1485 ) was King of England from 1483 until Richard_III_of_England death . Richard_III_of_England was the last king from the House of York , and Richard_III_of_England defeat ended the Wars of the Roses . After the death of Richard_III_of_England brother King Edward IV , Richard_III_of_England briefly governed as regent for Edward 's son King Edward V with the title of Lord Protector , but Richard_III_of_England placed Edward and his brother Richard in the Tower ( see Princes in the Tower ) and Richard_III_of_England acquired the throne for Richard_III_of_England , being crowned on 6 july 1483 . eos
death . Richard_III_of_England was the last king from the House of York , and Richard_III_of_England defeat ended the Wars of the Roses . After the death of Richard_III_of_England brother King Edward IV , Richard_III_of_England briefly governed as regent for Edward 's son King Edward V with the title of Lord Protector , but Richard_III_of_England placed Edward and his brother Richard in the Tower ( see Princes in the Tower ) and Richard_III_of_England acquired the throne for Richard_III_of_England , being crowned on 6 july 1483 . eos
was the last king from the House of York , and Richard_III_of_England defeat ended the Wars of the Roses . After the death of Richard_III_of_England brother King Edward IV , Richard_III_of_England briefly governed as regent for Edward 's son King Edward V with the title of Lord Protector , but Richard_III_of_England placed Edward and his brother Richard in the Tower ( see Princes in the Tower ) and Richard_III_of_England acquired the throne for Richard_III_of_England , being crowned on 6 july 1483 . Two large - scale rebellions rose against Richard_III_of_England . eos

brother King Edward IV , Richard_III_of_England briefly governed as regent for Edward 's son King Edward V with the title of Lord Protector , but Richard_III_of_England placed Edward and his brother Richard in the Tower ( see Princes in the Tower ) and Richard_III_of_England acquired the throne for Richard_III_of_England , being crowned on 6 july 1483 . Two large - scale rebellions rose against Richard_III_of_England . The first , in 1483 , was led by old diehard opponents of Edward IV and , most notably , Richard_III_of_England own ` kingmaker ' , Henry Stafford , Duke of Buckingham . eos

. The first , in 1483 , was led by old diehard opponents of Edward IV and , most notably , Richard_III_of_England own ` kingmaker ' , Henry Stafford , Duke of Buckingham . The revolt collapsed and Buckingham was executed at Salisbury , near the Bull 's Head Inn . eos
own ` kingmaker ' , Henry Stafford , Duke of Buckingham . The revolt collapsed and Buckingham was executed at Salisbury , near the Bull 's Head Inn . However , in 1485 , another rebellion arose against Richard_III_of_England , headed by Henry Tudor , 2nd Earl of Richmond ( later King Henry VII ) and his uncle Jasper . eos
, headed by Henry Tudor , 2nd Earl of Richmond ( later King Henry VII ) and his uncle Jasper . The rebels landed and Richard_III_of_England fell in the Battle of Bosworth Field , then known as Redemore or Dadlington Field , as the last Plantagenet king and the last English king to die in battle . William Shakespeare 's play Richard III has made Richard_III_of_England name particularly infamous . eos

( born january 11 , 1939 in New York City ) is currently a judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit . Richard_Posner is a major voice in the law and economics movement , which Richard_Posner helped start while a professor at the University of Chicago Law School . Richard_Posner is the author of several books on jurisprudence and legal philosophy , including The Problems of Jurisprudence ; Sex and Reason ; Overcoming Law ; Law , Pragmatism and Democracy ; and The Problematics of Moral and Legal Theory . eos
is a major voice in the law and economics movement , which Richard_Posner helped start while a professor at the University of Chicago Law School . CC , OBC ( 1957 - ) is a Canadian paraplegic athlete and activist for people with spinal cord injuries Rick_Hansen is most famous for Rick_Hansen Man in Motion world tour to raise money for the cause and show the physical capabilities of such people . Rick_Hansen is married to Amanda , Rick_Hansen former physiotherapist . eos

( born Robert Peter Williams on february 13 , 1974 in Burslem , Stoke - on - Trent , Staffordshire ) is an English pop artist / songwriter . Robbie_Williams career started as a member of the immensely successful band Take That in 1990 , which Robbie_Williams left in 1995 . eos
