, 1st Baron Baden - Powell OM , GCMG , GCVO , KCB ( 22 february 1857 - 8 january 1941 ) , also known as B - P , was a Lieutenant - General in the British Army , writer , and founder of the world Scouting Movement . After having been educated at Charterhouse School , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell joined the British Army in 1876 , and Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell was posted in India and Africa , and Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell served three years in the British Secret Intelligence Service . In 1899 , during the Second Boer War in South Africa , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell successfully defended Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell fortress and the surrounding city in the Siege of Mafeking . eos
joined the British Army in 1876 , and Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell was posted in India and Africa , and Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell served three years in the British Secret Intelligence Service . In 1899 , during the Second Boer War in South Africa , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell successfully defended Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell fortress and the surrounding city in the Siege of Mafeking . In 1910 Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell retired from the Army . eos

Several of Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell military books , written for military reconnaissance and scout training in Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell African years , were also used by boys . Based on those earlier books , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell wrote Scouting for Boys , published in 1908 by Pearson , for youth readership . eos
African years , were also used by boys . Based on those earlier books , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell wrote Scouting for Boys , published in 1908 by Pearson , for youth readership . During writing , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell tested Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell ideas through a camping trip on Brownsea Island in 1907 , which is now seen as the beginning of Scouting . eos

wrote Scouting for Boys , published in 1908 by Pearson , for youth readership . After Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell marriage with Olave StClair Soames , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell , Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell sister Agnes Baden - Powell and notably Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell wife actively gave guidance to the Scouting Movement and the Girl Guides Movement . eos

Robert_Baden-Powell_1st_Baron_Baden-Powell is buried in Nyeri , Kenya . eos

has been Director - General for External and Politico - Military Affairs at the General Secretariat of the Council of the European Union since 2002 , responsible to Javier Solana , High Representative of the EU 's Common Foreign and Security Policy . eos
( 6 june 1868 - 29 march 1912 ) was a Royal Naval officer and Antarctic explorer . In the so - called ` Race to the South Pole ' Robert_Falcon_Scott came second , behind the Norwegian Roald Amundsen ; and Robert_Falcon_Scott subsequently died , along with four companions , whilst trying to return to the safety of their base . Robert_Falcon_Scott has become the most famous , and tragic , hero of the ` ` heroic age '' of Antarctic exploration . eos

( born january 9 , 1941 in Rochester , New York ) is a political scientist and professor at Harvard University , well - known for Robert_Putnam writings on civic engagement , civil society , and social capital . Robert_Putnam also developed the influential two - level game theory that assumes international agreements will only be successfully brokered if they also result in domestic benefits . Robert_Putnam most famous ( and controversial ) work , Bowling Alone , argues that the United States has undergone an unprecedented collapse in civic , social , associational , and political life ( social capital ) since the 1960s , with serious negative consequences . eos
writings on civic engagement , civil society , and social capital . Robert_Putnam also developed the influential two - level game theory that assumes international agreements will only be successfully brokered if they also result in domestic benefits . Robert_Putnam most famous ( and controversial ) work , Bowling Alone , argues that the United States has undergone an unprecedented collapse in civic , social , associational , and political life ( social capital ) since the 1960s , with serious negative consequences . eos
also developed the influential two - level game theory that assumes international agreements will only be successfully brokered if they also result in domestic benefits . Robert_Putnam most famous ( and controversial ) work , Bowling Alone , argues that the United States has undergone an unprecedented collapse in civic , social , associational , and political life ( social capital ) since the 1960s , with serious negative consequences . Though Robert_Putnam measured this decline in data of many varieties , Robert_Putnam most striking point was that virtually every traditional civic , social and fraternal organization - typified by bowling leagues - had undergone a massive decline in membership while the number of people bowling increased drastically . eos
most famous ( and controversial ) work , Bowling Alone , argues that the United States has undergone an unprecedented collapse in civic , social , associational , and political life ( social capital ) since the 1960s , with serious negative consequences . Though Robert_Putnam measured this decline in data of many varieties , Robert_Putnam most striking point was that virtually every traditional civic , social and fraternal organization - typified by bowling leagues - had undergone a massive decline in membership while the number of people bowling increased drastically . Robert_Putnam makes a distinction between two kinds of social capital : bonding capital and bridging capital . eos
measured this decline in data of many varieties , Robert_Putnam most striking point was that virtually every traditional civic , social and fraternal organization - typified by bowling leagues - had undergone a massive decline in membership while the number of people bowling increased drastically . Robert_Putnam makes a distinction between two kinds of social capital : bonding capital and bridging capital . Bonding occurs when you are socializing with people who are like you : same age , same race , same religion , and so on . eos
most striking point was that virtually every traditional civic , social and fraternal organization - typified by bowling leagues - had undergone a massive decline in membership while the number of people bowling increased drastically . Robert_Putnam makes a distinction between two kinds of social capital : bonding capital and bridging capital . Bonding occurs when you are socializing with people who are like you : same age , same race , same religion , and so on . eos
makes a distinction between two kinds of social capital : bonding capital and bridging capital . Bonding occurs when you are socializing with people who are like you : same age , same race , same religion , and so on . But in order to create peaceful societies in a diverse multi - etnic country , one needs to have a second kind of social capital : bridging . eos
argues that those two kinds of social capital , bonding and bridging , do strengthen each other . eos
( 1910 - 2000 ) , born Mary Maxwell was the wife of Shoghi Effendi , the head of the Bahá ' í Faith from 1921 - 1957 . Ruhiyyih_Khanum was appointed by him as a Hand of the Cause , and Ruhiyyih_Khanum served an important role in the transfer of authority from 1957 - 1963 . eos

( born Ahmed Salman Rushdie , "" Urdu : أحمد سلمان رشدی "" , on june 19 , 1947 , in Bombay , India ) is a British - Indian essayist and author of fiction , most of which is set on the Indian subcontinent . Salman_Rushdie narrative style , blending the supernatural with more realistic settings , has been described as magic realism . Salman_Rushdie Magnum opus , Midnight 's Children , was in 1993 declared the ` ` Booker of Bookers '' . eos
narrative style , blending the supernatural with more realistic settings , has been described as magic realism . Salman_Rushdie Magnum opus , Midnight 's Children , was in 1993 declared the ` ` Booker of Bookers '' . Salman_Rushdie is best known for the violent criticism Salman_Rushdie book eos
Magnum opus , Midnight 's Children , was in 1993 declared the ` ` Booker of Bookers '' . Salman_Rushdie is best known for the violent criticism Salman_Rushdie book The Satanic Verses ( 1988 ) provoked in the Muslim community . eos
is best known for the violent criticism Salman_Rushdie book The Satanic Verses ( 1988 ) provoked in the Muslim community . After death threats and a fatwa by Ruhollah Khomeini , calling for Salman_Rushdie assassination , Salman_Rushdie spent years underground , appearing in public only sporadically . eos

, CB , KCMG , MVO ( 5 january 1849 - 30 january 1919 ) was a distinguished soldier and famous member of the North West Mounted Police . eos
( born april 18 , 1927 ) is a political scientist known for Samuel_P._Huntington analysis of the relationship between the military and the civil government , Samuel_P._Huntington investigation of coups d'etat , and Samuel_P._Huntington thesis that the central political actors of the 21st century will be civilizations rather than nation - states . More recently , Samuel_P._Huntington garnered widespread attention for Samuel_P._Huntington analysis of threats posed to the United States by modern - day immigration . Samuel_P._Huntington is a professor at Harvard University . eos

Samuel_P._Huntington came to prominence as a scholar in the 1960s with the publication of Political Order in Changing Societies , a work which challenged the conventional view of modernization theorists that economic and social progress would bring about stable democracies in recently decolonized countries . eos

( january 7 , 1827 - july 22 , 1915 ) was a prolific Canadian engineer and inventor , known for the introduction of Universal Standard Time , Canada 's first postage stamp , a huge body of surveying and map making , engineering much of the Intercolonial Railway and the Canadian Pacific Railway , and a founding member of the Royal Society of Canada and founder of the Royal Canadian Institute , a science organization in Toronto . eos
SOM ( july 11 , 1963-march 3 , 2000 ) was a Canadian curler , an Olympic and triple World Champion . Born in Biggar , Saskatchewan , Sandra_Schmirler learned curling at high school . Sandra_Schmirler first major successes in the sport came in 1991 , when Sandra_Schmirler won the provincial championships as the skip ( captain ) of Sandra_Schmirler team . eos
learned curling at high school . Sandra_Schmirler first major successes in the sport came in 1991 , when Sandra_Schmirler won the provincial championships as the skip ( captain ) of Sandra_Schmirler team . Only two years later , in 1993 , Sandra_Schmirler Regina - based team also won the Canadian Championships , and were sent out to the World Championships , which they won . eos
first major successes in the sport came in 1991 , when Sandra_Schmirler won the provincial championships as the skip ( captain ) of Sandra_Schmirler team . At the 1998 Winter Olympics , Sandra_Schmirler sailed through the round - robin competition with relative ease , and in the semi - final Sandra_Schmirler faced the all - Scottish Great Britain rink , which was skipped by Kirsty Hay but also included a future world championship - winning skip for Scotland , Jackie Lockhart . The game surprisingly went to an extra end , and a major upset appeared to be on the cards when Sandra_Schmirler shouted out ` ` oh no ! '' , fearing Sandra_Schmirler last stone was too heavy . eos
sailed through the round - robin competition with relative ease , and in the semi - final Sandra_Schmirler faced the all - Scottish Great Britain rink , which was skipped by Kirsty Hay but also included a future world championship - winning skip for Scotland , Jackie Lockhart . The game surprisingly went to an extra end , and a major upset appeared to be on the cards when Sandra_Schmirler shouted out ` ` oh no ! '' , fearing Sandra_Schmirler last stone was too heavy . However , it slowed up in the nick of time , and Sandra_Schmirler team progressed to the final , where they faced the Danish rink skipped by Helena Blach Lavrsen , surprise conquerors of the formidable Swedish team . eos

, OC , OBC ( born january 28 , 1968 ) is a Canadian musician , singer and songwriter . Sarah_McLachlan founded Lilith Fair , a tour which showcased female musicians in the late 1990s . Known for the emotional sound of Sarah_McLachlan ballads , some of Sarah_McLachlan popular songs include ` ` Angel '' , ` ` Building a Mystery '' , ` ` Adia '' , ` ` Possession '' , ` ` I Will Remember You '' , ` ` World on Fire '' , and ` ` Into the Fire '' . Sarah_McLachlan best - selling album to date is Surfacing , for which Sarah_McLachlan won two Grammy Awards and four Juno Awards . eos

( born in 1949 ) , is a Palestinian professor of philosophy and president of the Al - Quds University in Jerusalem ( Al Quds is the Arabic name for Jerusalem ) . Sari_Nusseibeh was also , until december 2002 , the representative of the Palestinian National Authority in Jerusalem . eos
was also , until december 2002 , the representative of the Palestinian National Authority in Jerusalem . Sari_Nusseibeh was born in Sheikh Jarrah , East Jerusalem to the politician Anwar Nusseibeh and Nuzha Al Ghussein , descended from Palestine 's wealthy landed aristocracy and daughter of Palestinian political leader Yaqub al - Ghusayn . Sari_Nusseibeh has a PhD in Philosophy , from Harvard University ( 1978 ) . eos
was born in Sheikh Jarrah , East Jerusalem to the politician Anwar Nusseibeh and Nuzha Al Ghussein , descended from Palestine 's wealthy landed aristocracy and daughter of Palestinian political leader Yaqub al - Ghusayn . Sari_Nusseibeh has a PhD in Philosophy , from Harvard University ( 1978 ) . Sari_Nusseibeh and Ami Ayalon are the co - founders of The People 's Voice , an Israeli - Palestinian civil initiative that aims to advance the process of achieving peace between Israel and the Palestinians . eos
has a PhD in Philosophy , from Harvard University ( 1978 ) . Sari_Nusseibeh and Ami Ayalon are the co - founders of The People 's Voice , an Israeli - Palestinian civil initiative that aims to advance the process of achieving peace between Israel and the Palestinians . Sari_Nusseibeh is head and founder of the Palestinian Consultancy Group , co - founder and member of several Palestinian institutions including the Jerusalem Friends of the Sick Society , the Federation of Employees in the Education Sector in the West Bank , the Arab Council for Public Affairs , the Committee Confronting the Iron Fist , and the Jerusalem Arab Council . eos
and Ami Ayalon are the co - founders of The People 's Voice , an Israeli - Palestinian civil initiative that aims to advance the process of achieving peace between Israel and the Palestinians . Sari_Nusseibeh is head and founder of the Palestinian Consultancy Group , co - founder and member of several Palestinian institutions including the Jerusalem Friends of the Sick Society , the Federation of Employees in the Education Sector in the West Bank , the Arab Council for Public Affairs , the Committee Confronting the Iron Fist , and the Jerusalem Arab Council . Sari_Nusseibeh is also on the advisory board of The International Center for Ethics , Justice and Public Life at Brandeis University . eos

Sari_Nusseibeh is also on the advisory board of The International Center for Ethics , Justice and Public Life at Brandeis University . , OC ( born august 28 , 1965 ) is a Canadian singer and songwriter Shania_Twain has enjoyed popular success in the country and pop music genres . Shania_Twain third album Come on Over is the biggest - selling album of all time by a female artist , and the seventh biggest selling album in music history , and Shania_Twain is the only female artist to have three albums certified Diamond by the RIAA . Shania_Twain is also the recipient of numerous awards , including five Grammy awards and nearly forty BMI Songwriter awards . eos

( 石原 慎太郎 , Ishihara Shintarō ) , born september 30 , 1932 is the governor of Tokyo , Japan , and one of Japan 's most widely known nationalist and populist politicians . Before entering politics , Shintaro_Ishihara was famous as an author . eos
was famous as an author . eos
( "" Persian : شیرین عبادی "" ; born 21 june 1947 ) is an Iranian lawyer , human rights activist and founder of the Association for Support of Children 's Rights in Iran . On december 10 , 2003 , Shirin_Ebadi was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for Shirin_Ebadi significant and pioneering efforts for democracy and human rights , especially for the rights of women and children . Shirin_Ebadi is the first Iranian and the first Muslim woman to receive the prize . eos
was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for Shirin_Ebadi significant and pioneering efforts for democracy and human rights , especially for the rights of women and children . Shirin_Ebadi is the first Iranian and the first Muslim woman to receive the prize . eos

( May 6 , 1856 - september 23 , 1939 ; IPA pronunciation : IPA : ˈziːkmʊnt ˈfrɔʏt ) was an Austrian neurologist and the founder of the psychoanalytic school of psychology . Sigmund_Freud is best known for Sigmund_Freud theories of the unconscious mind , especially involving the mechanism of repression ; Sigmund_Freud redefinition of sexual desire as mobile and directed towards a wide variety of objects ; and Sigmund_Freud therapeutic technique , especially Sigmund_Freud understanding of transference in the therapeutic relationship and the presumed value of dreams as sources of insight into unconscious desires . eos
is best known for Sigmund_Freud theories of the unconscious mind , especially involving the mechanism of repression ; Sigmund_Freud redefinition of sexual desire as mobile and directed towards a wide variety of objects ; and Sigmund_Freud therapeutic technique , especially Sigmund_Freud understanding of transference in the therapeutic relationship and the presumed value of dreams as sources of insight into unconscious desires . The name Freud is generally pronounced IPA : fɹɔɪd in English and IPA : frɔʏt in German . Sigmund_Freud is commonly referred to as ` ` the father of psychoanalysis '' and Sigmund_Freud work has been tremendously influential in the popular imagination - popularizing such notions as the unconscious , defense mechanisms , Freudian slips and dream symbolism - while also making a long - lasting impact on fields as diverse as literature , film , Marxist and feminist theories , literary criticism , philosophy and psychology . eos

The name Freud is generally pronounced IPA : fɹɔɪd in English and IPA : frɔʏt in German . therapeutic technique , especially Sigmund_Freud understanding of transference in the therapeutic relationship and the presumed value of dreams as sources of insight into unconscious desires . The name Freud is generally pronounced IPA : fɹɔɪd in English and IPA : frɔʏt in German . Sigmund_Freud is commonly referred to as ` ` the father of psychoanalysis '' and Sigmund_Freud work has been tremendously influential in the popular imagination - popularizing such notions as the unconscious , defense mechanisms , Freudian slips and dream symbolism - while also making a long - lasting impact on fields as diverse as literature , film , Marxist and feminist theories , literary criticism , philosophy and psychology . eos

( Greek : Σωκράτης , invariably anglicized as "" IPA : "" sɔkɹətiːz "" "" , Sǒcratēs ; 470 - 399 BC ) was an ancient Greek philosopher Socrates is widely credited for laying the foundation for Western philosophy . eos
is widely credited for laying the foundation for Western philosophy . Socrates was born and lived in Athens , where Socrates spent most of Socrates time in enthusiastic pursuit of wisdom ( philosophy ) . Socrates ` ` followed the argument '' in Socrates personal reflection , and in a sustained and rigorous dialogue between friends , followers , and contemporary itinerant teachers of wisdom . eos
was born and lived in Athens , where Socrates spent most of Socrates time in enthusiastic pursuit of wisdom ( philosophy ) . Socrates ` ` followed the argument '' in Socrates personal reflection , and in a sustained and rigorous dialogue between friends , followers , and contemporary itinerant teachers of wisdom . Later in Socrates life Socrates became known as the wisest man in all of Greece . eos

( november 29 , 1949 - june 2 , 1983 ) was a Canadian folk musician and songwriter . Stan_Rogers was noted for Stan_Rogers rich , baritone voice and Stan_Rogers finely - crafted , traditional - sounding songs which were frequently inspired by Canadian history and the daily lives of working people , especially those from the fishing villages of the Maritime provinces and , later , the farms of the Canadian prairies . Stan_Rogers died in an airliner accident on the ground at the Greater Cincinnati Airport at the age of 33 . eos
was noted for Stan_Rogers rich , baritone voice and Stan_Rogers finely - crafted , traditional - sounding songs which were frequently inspired by Canadian history and the daily lives of working people , especially those from the fishing villages of the Maritime provinces and , later , the farms of the Canadian prairies . Stan_Rogers died in an airliner accident on the ground at the Greater Cincinnati Airport at the age of 33 . A larger - than - life figure , Stan_Rogers influence on Canadian folk music has been deep and lasting . eos

( Old Church Slavonic : Стѣфань , Serbian : Стефан Немања ) eos
was Grand Prince ( Serbian : Велики Жупан ) of the medieval Serb state of Rascia ( Рашка ) in 1168 - 1196 . Stefan_Nemanja established control over the territories of neighboring Serb states , including Zeta / Doclea , and Stefan_Nemanja unified them into a single state . eos

, CH , CBE , FRS ( born 8 january 1942 ) is a theoretical physicist . Stephen_Hawking is the Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge , and a Fellow of Gonville and Caius College , Cambridge . Stephen_Hawking is known for Stephen_Hawking significant contributions to the field of quantum physics , particularly Stephen_Hawking theories regarding theoretical cosmology , quantum gravity , black holes , and Stephen_Hawking popular works in which Stephen_Hawking discusses Stephen_Hawking own theories and cosmology in general . eos
is the Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge , and a Fellow of Gonville and Caius College , Cambridge . Stephen_Hawking is known for Stephen_Hawking significant contributions to the field of quantum physics , particularly Stephen_Hawking theories regarding theoretical cosmology , quantum gravity , black holes , and Stephen_Hawking popular works in which Stephen_Hawking discusses Stephen_Hawking own theories and cosmology in general . These include the runaway popular science bestseller A Brief History of Time , which stayed on the London Sunday Times bestseller list for a record - breaking 237 weeks . eos
is known for Stephen_Hawking significant contributions to the field of quantum physics , particularly Stephen_Hawking theories regarding theoretical cosmology , quantum gravity , black holes , and Stephen_Hawking popular works in which Stephen_Hawking discusses Stephen_Hawking own theories and cosmology in general . These include the runaway popular science bestseller A Brief History of Time , which stayed on the London Sunday Times bestseller list for a record - breaking 237 weeks . Despite enduring severe disability and , of late , being rendered quadriplegic by motor neuron disease ( specifically , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , or , ` ` Lou Gehrig 's Disease '' ) , Stephen_Hawking has had a successful career for many years , and Stephen_Hawking has achieved status as an academic celebrity . eos

CBE ( born on 23 march , 1962 , in Marlow , England ) is a British rower Steve_Redgrave won a gold medal at five consecutive Olympic Games from 1984 to 2000 , as well as an additional bronze medal in 1988 . As the only Briton ever to achieve this feat , Steve_Redgrave is widely considered to be Britain 's greatest Olympian . eos
won a gold medal at five consecutive Olympic Games from 1984 to 2000 , as well as an additional bronze medal in 1988 . ( born september 18 1954 , in Montreal , Canada ) is a prominent American experimental psychologist , cognitive scientist , and popular science writer known for Steven_Pinker spirited and wide - ranging advocacy of evolutionary psychology and the computational theory of mind . Steven_Pinker academic specializations are visual cognition and language development in children , and Steven_Pinker is most famous for popularising the idea that language is an ` ` instinct '' or biological adaptation shaped by natural selection rather than a by - product of general intelligence . ( born May 3 , 1933 ) is an American physicist . Steven_Weinberg was awarded the 1979 Nobel Prize in Physics ( with colleagues Abdus Salam and Sheldon Glashow ) for combining electromagnetism and the weak force into the electroweak force . More recently , Steven_Weinberg has written some papers arguing that the smallness of the cosmological constant is due to the anthropic principle . eos
was awarded the 1979 Nobel Prize in Physics ( with colleagues Abdus Salam and Sheldon Glashow ) for combining electromagnetism and the weak force into the electroweak force . , CB , DSO ( august 16 , 1888 - May 19 , 1935 ) , professionally known as TE Lawrence and , later , TE Shaw , but most famously known as Lawrence of Arabia , gained international renown for T._E._Lawrence role as a British liaison officer during the Arab Revolt of 1916 to 1918 . T._E._Lawrence very public image was in some part the result of US traveller and journalist Lowell Thomas 's sensationalised reportage of the Revolt , as well as T._E._Lawrence autobiographical account , Seven Pillars of Wisdom . eos

( "" Tibetan : "" "" , Wylie : Bstan - ` dzin Rgya - mtsho "" ) ( b. july 6 1935 ) is the fourteenth and current Dalai Lama , and as such , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama is often referred to in Western media simply as the Dalai Lama , without any qualifiers . eos
is often referred to in Western media simply as the Dalai Lama , without any qualifiers . The fifth of sixteen children of a farming family in the Tibetan province of Amdo , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was proclaimed the tulku ( rebirth ) of the thirteenth Dalai Lama at the age of five . On november 17 1950 , at the age of fifteen , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was enthroned as Tibet 's Head of State and most important political ruler , while Tibet faced occupation by the forces of the People 's Republic of China . eos
was proclaimed the tulku ( rebirth ) of the thirteenth Dalai Lama at the age of five . On november 17 1950 , at the age of fifteen , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was enthroned as Tibet 's Head of State and most important political ruler , while Tibet faced occupation by the forces of the People 's Republic of China . After the collapse of the Tibetan resistance movement in 1959 , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama fled to India , where Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was active in establishing the Central Tibetan Administration ( the Tibetan government in exile ) and seeking to preserve Tibetan culture and education among the thousands of refugees who accompanied Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama . eos
was enthroned as Tibet 's Head of State and most important political ruler , while Tibet faced occupation by the forces of the People 's Republic of China . After the collapse of the Tibetan resistance movement in 1959 , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama fled to India , where Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was active in establishing the Central Tibetan Administration ( the Tibetan government in exile ) and seeking to preserve Tibetan culture and education among the thousands of refugees who accompanied Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama . A charismatic figure and noted public speaker , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama is the first Dalai Lama to travel to the West , where Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama has helped to spread Buddhism and to publicise the ideal of Free Tibet . eos
fled to India , where Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was active in establishing the Central Tibetan Administration ( the Tibetan government in exile ) and seeking to preserve Tibetan culture and education among the thousands of refugees who accompanied Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama . A charismatic figure and noted public speaker , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama is the first Dalai Lama to travel to the West , where Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama has helped to spread Buddhism and to publicise the ideal of Free Tibet . In 1989 , Tenzin_Gyatso_14th_Dalai_Lama was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize . eos

, CC ( july 28 , 1958 - june 28 , 1981 ) was a Canadian humanitarian , athlete , and cancer treatment activist . Terry_Fox became famous for Terry_Fox Marathon of Hope , a cross - Canada run to raise money for cancer research , running with one prosthetic leg . Terry_Fox is considered one of Canada 's greatest heroes of the 20th Century and Terry_Fox is celebrated internationally every september as people participate in the ` Terry Fox Run ' , the world 's largest one - day fundraiser for cancer research . eos

( february 11 1847 - october 18 1931 ) was an American inventor and businessman Thomas_Edison developed many devices which greatly influenced life in the 20th century . Dubbed ` ` The Wizard of Menlo Park '' by a newspaper reporter , Thomas_Edison was one of the first inventors to apply the principles of mass production to the process of invention , and Thomas_Edison can therefore be credited with the creation of the first industrial research laboratory . Some of the inventions attributed to Thomas_Edison were not completely original but amounted to improvements of earlier inventions or were actually created by numerous employees working under Thomas_Edison direction . eos
developed many devices which greatly influenced life in the 20th century . Dubbed ` ` The Wizard of Menlo Park '' by a newspaper reporter , Thomas_Edison was one of the first inventors to apply the principles of mass production to the process of invention , and Thomas_Edison can therefore be credited with the creation of the first industrial research laboratory . Some of the inventions attributed to Thomas_Edison were not completely original but amounted to improvements of earlier inventions or were actually created by numerous employees working under Thomas_Edison direction . eos
was one of the first inventors to apply the principles of mass production to the process of invention , and Thomas_Edison can therefore be credited with the creation of the first industrial research laboratory . Some of the inventions attributed to Thomas_Edison were not completely original but amounted to improvements of earlier inventions or were actually created by numerous employees working under Thomas_Edison direction . Nevertheless , Thomas_Edison is considered one of the most prolific inventors in history , holding 1,097 US patents in Thomas_Edison name , as well as many patents in the United Kingdom , France , and Germany . eos

( 7 february 1478 - 6 july 1535 ) , posthumously known also as Saint Thomas More , was an English lawyer , author , and statesman . During Thomas_More lifetime Thomas_More earned a reputation as a leading humanist scholar and Thomas_More occupied many public offices , including that of Lord Chancellor from 1529 to 1532 . Thomas_More coined the word ` ` utopia '' , a name Thomas_More gave to an ideal , imaginary island nation whose political system Thomas_More described in a book published in 1516 . eos
lifetime Thomas_More earned a reputation as a leading humanist scholar and Thomas_More occupied many public offices , including that of Lord Chancellor from 1529 to 1532 . Thomas_More coined the word ` ` utopia '' , a name Thomas_More gave to an ideal , imaginary island nation whose political system Thomas_More described in a book published in 1516 . Thomas_More is chiefly remembered for Thomas_More principled refusal to accept King Henry VIII 's claim to be the supreme head of the Church of England , a decision which ended Thomas_More political career and led to Thomas_More execution as a traitor . eos

In 1935 , four hundred years after Thomas_More death , Thomas_More was canonized in the Catholic Church by Pope Pius XI , and Thomas_More was later declared the patron saint of lawyers and statesmen . eos

( born 30 june , 1930 ) , is an American economist , political writer , and commentator , generally from a socially conservative and economically laissez faire perspective . Thomas_Sowell is presently a senior fellow at Stanford University 's Hoover Institution . eos
is presently a senior fellow at Stanford University 's Hoover Institution . In 1990 , Thomas_Sowell won the Francis Boyer Award , presented by the American Enterprise Institute . In 2002 Thomas_Sowell was awarded the National Humanities Medal for prolific scholarship melding history , economics , and political science . eos

, KBE ( born june 8 , 1955 in London , England ) is the inventor of the World Wide Web and director of the World Wide Web Consortium , which oversees its continued development . Informally , in technical circles , Tim_Berners-Lee is sometimes called ` ` TimBL '' or ` ` TBL '' . eos

( january 12 , 1930 in Cochrane , Ontario , Canada - february 21 1974 in St. Catharines , Ontario , Canada ) was a Canadian professional hockey defenceman from Cochrane , Ontario . Tim_Horton played 24 seasons in the National Hockey League for the Toronto Maple Leafs , New York Rangers , Pittsburgh Penguins and Buffalo Sabres . Tim_Horton was also a businessman and the founder of Tim Hortons , Canada 's largest coffee and doughnut store chain before dying in a car accident in St. Catharines , Ontario . eos

( born april 3 , 1925 ) , known as Tony Benn , formerly 2nd Viscount Stansgate , is a British politician on the left of the Labour Party . Tony_Benn was instrumental in the creation of the Peerage Act 1963 . The term ` ` Bennite '' , generally understood to mean a radical left - wing position of corporatist but compassionate socialism , was derived from Tony_Benn name . eos

( born 6 May 1953 ) is the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom , First Lord of the Treasury , Minister for the Civil Service , Leader of the UK Labour Party , and Member of the UK Parliament for the constituency of Sedgefield in North East England . As a member of the Cabinet of the United Kingdom Tony_Blair is also a Privy Counsellor . eos
is also a Privy Counsellor . As First Lord of the Treasury , Tony_Blair official residence is 10 Downing Street in London , UK . Tony_Blair became leader of the British Labour Party in july 1994 following the sudden death of Tony_Blair predecessor , John Smith . eos
official residence is 10 Downing Street in London , UK . Tony_Blair became leader of the British Labour Party in july 1994 following the sudden death of Tony_Blair predecessor , John Smith . Under Tony_Blair leadership , the party won a landslide victory in the May 1997 general election , ending 18 years of government by the UK 's centre - right Conservative Party . eos
became leader of the British Labour Party in july 1994 following the sudden death of Tony_Blair predecessor , John Smith . Under Tony_Blair leadership , the party won a landslide victory in the May 1997 general election , ending 18 years of government by the UK 's centre - right Conservative Party . Tony_Blair is the Labour Party 's longest - serving Prime Minister , the only person to have led the party to three consecutive general election victories and the only Labour prime minister to serve more than one full consecutive term . eos

leadership , the party won a landslide victory in the May 1997 general election , ending 18 years of government by the UK 's centre - right Conservative Party . Tony_Blair is the Labour Party 's longest - serving Prime Minister , the only person to have led the party to three consecutive general election victories and the only Labour prime minister to serve more than one full consecutive term . Together with Gordon Brown and Peter Mandelson , Tony_Blair is both credited and criticised for moving the Labour Party towards the centre of British politics , using the term ` ` New Labour '' to distinguish Tony_Blair pro - market policies from the more collectivist policies which the party had espoused in the past . eos
is the Labour Party 's longest - serving Prime Minister , the only person to have led the party to three consecutive general election victories and the only Labour prime minister to serve more than one full consecutive term . Together with Gordon Brown and Peter Mandelson , Tony_Blair is both credited and criticised for moving the Labour Party towards the centre of British politics , using the term ` ` New Labour '' to distinguish Tony_Blair pro - market policies from the more collectivist policies which the party had espoused in the past . Tony_Blair has described Tony_Blair political philosophy as ` ` modern social democracy '' and ` ` the third way '' . eos

( Bulgarian : Васил Левски , also transliterated as Vassil Levski ) , born Vasil Ivanov Kunchev ( Васил Иванов Кунчев ) was a Bulgarian revolutionary , ideologist , strategist and theoretician of the Bulgarian national revolution and leader of the struggle for liberation from Ottoman rule . Due to Vasil_Levski major significance to the liberation of Bulgaria , Vasil_Levski is hailed as a national hero and often referred to as ` ` The Apostle of Freedom '' by the Bulgarian people . eos

( Alexandrina Victoria ; 24 May 1819 - 22 january 1901 ) was the Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland from 20 june 1837 , and the first Empress of India from 1 january 1877 , until Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom death in 1901 . Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom reign lasted more than sixty - three years , longer than that of any other British monarch . Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom reign was marked by a great expansion of the British Empire . eos
death in 1901 . Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom reign lasted more than sixty - three years , longer than that of any other British monarch . Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom reign was marked by a great expansion of the British Empire . eos
reign lasted more than sixty - three years , longer than that of any other British monarch . Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom reign was marked by a great expansion of the British Empire . The Victorian Era was at the height of the Industrial Revolution , a period of significant social , economic , and technological change in the United Kingdom . eos
reign was marked by a great expansion of the British Empire . The Victorian Era was at the height of the Industrial Revolution , a period of significant social , economic , and technological change in the United Kingdom . In that period the British Empire reached its zenith and became the formidable global power of the time . eos
, Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom was almost entirely of German descent ( except from Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom ancestor Sophia of Hanover who was a female - line granddaughter of James I ) , was the last monarch of the House of Hanover ; Victoria_of_the_United_Kingdom son King Edward VII belonged to the House of Saxe - Coburg and Gotha . eos

( "" Russian : Владимир Ильич Ульянов "" , better known by the alias Lenin ( Ленин ) ) ( april 22 , 1870 - january 24 , 1924 ) , was a Russian revolutionary , a communist politician , the main leader of the october Revolution , the first head of Soviet Russia , and the primary theorist of the ideology that has come to be called Leninism , which is a variant of Marxism . eos

( december 5 , 1901 - february 1 , 1976 ) was a celebrated German physicist and Nobel laureate , one of the founders of quantum mechanics , and acknowledged to be one of the most important physicists of the twentieth century . Werner_Heisenberg was born in Würzburg , Germany and Werner_Heisenberg died in Munich . Werner_Heisenberg was the head of Germany 's nuclear energy program , though the nature of this project , and Werner_Heisenberg work in this capacity , has been heavily debated . eos
was born in Würzburg , Germany and Werner_Heisenberg died in Munich . Werner_Heisenberg was the head of Germany 's nuclear energy program , though the nature of this project , and Werner_Heisenberg work in this capacity , has been heavily debated . Werner_Heisenberg is most well - known for discovering one of the central principles of modern physics , the Heisenberg uncertainty principle . eos
died in Munich . Werner_Heisenberg was the head of Germany 's nuclear energy program , though the nature of this project , and Werner_Heisenberg work in this capacity , has been heavily debated . Werner_Heisenberg is most well - known for discovering one of the central principles of modern physics , the Heisenberg uncertainty principle . eos

, PC , GCMG , KC , BCL , DCL , LLD , DLitt , baptized Henri - Charles - Wilfrid Laurier ( november 20 , 1841 - february 17 , 1919 ) was the seventh Prime Minister of Canada from july 11 , 1896 , to october 7 , 1911 . The second child of Carolus Laurier and Marcelle Martineau , Wilfrid_Laurier was born in Saint - Lin ( today called ` Saint - Lin - Laurentides ' ) on november 20 , 1841 . Wilfrid_Laurier grew up in a family where politics was a staple of talk and debate . eos
was born in Saint - Lin ( today called ` Saint - Lin - Laurentides ' ) on november 20 , 1841 . Wilfrid_Laurier grew up in a family where politics was a staple of talk and debate . Wilfrid_Laurier father , an educated man having liberal ideas , enjoyed a certain degree of prestige about town . eos
grew up in a family where politics was a staple of talk and debate . Wilfrid_Laurier father , an educated man having liberal ideas , enjoyed a certain degree of prestige about town . In addition to being a farmer and surveyor , Wilfrid_Laurier also occupied such sought - after positions as mayor , justice of the peace , militia lieutenant and school board member . eos
father , an educated man having liberal ideas , enjoyed a certain degree of prestige about town . In addition to being a farmer and surveyor , Wilfrid_Laurier also occupied such sought - after positions as mayor , justice of the peace , militia lieutenant and school board member . At the age of 11 , Wilfrid_Laurier left home to study in New Glasgow , a neighbouring town largely inhabited by immigrants from the British Isles . eos

Over the next two years , Wilfrid_Laurier had the opportunity of familiarizing Wilfrid_Laurier with the mentality , language and culture of English - speakers . eos

Often considered one of Canada 's great statesmen and the first francophone prime minister , Wilfrid_Laurier is well known for Wilfrid_Laurier policies of conciliation , nation building , and compromises between French and English Canada . eos

Wilfrid_Laurier argued for an English - French partnership in Canada . eos

Wilfrid_Laurier is the fourth - longest serving Prime Minister of Canada , behind William Lyon Mackenzie King , John A Macdonald , and Pierre Trudeau . eos

is the fourth - longest serving Prime Minister of Canada , behind William Lyon Mackenzie King , John A Macdonald , and Pierre Trudeau . A Maclean 's historical ranking of the Prime Ministers placed Wilfrid_Laurier third behind King ( first ) and Macdonald . Wilfrid_Laurier also holds the record for the most consecutive federal elections won ( 4 ) , and Wilfrid_Laurier 15 year tenure remains the longest unbroken term of office among Prime Ministers . eos

In addition , Wilfrid_Laurier nearly 45 years ( 1874 - 1919 ) of service in the House of Commons is an all - time record in Canadian politics , unmatched by any other politician . eos

( in English : ` ` William Conrad Roentgen '' ) ( march 27 , 1845 - february 10 , 1923 ) was a German physicist , of the University of Würzburg , Wilhelm_Conrad_Rontgen , on november 8 , 1895 , produced and detected electromagnetic radiation in a wavelength range today known as x - rays or Röntgen Rays , an achievement that earned Wilhelm_Conrad_Rontgen the first Nobel Prize in Physics in 1901 . Wilhelm_Conrad_Rontgen name is usually given as ` ` Roentgen '' ( an alternative German spelling ) in English ; therefore most English scientific and medical references to Wilhelm_Conrad_Rontgen are found under this spelling . eos

( november 28 1757-august 12 1827 ) was an English poet , painter , and printmaker . Largely unrecognised during William_Blake lifetime , William_Blake work is today considered seminal and significant in the history of both poetry and the visual arts . According to Northrop Frye , who undertook a study of William_Blake entire poetic corpus , William_Blake prophetic poems form ` ` what is in proportion to its merits the least read body of poetry in the English language . ( april 1 , 1578 - june 3 , 1657 ) was a medical doctor William_Harvey is credited with first correctly describing , in exact detail , the properties of blood being pumped around the body by the heart . This developed the ideas of René Descartes who in his Description of the Human Body said that the arteries and veins were pipes which carried nourishment around the body . Although Spanish physician Michael Servetus discovered circulation a quarter century before William_Harvey was born , all but three copies of his manuscript Christianismi Restitutio were destroyed and as a result , the secrets of circulation were lost until William_Harvey rediscovered them nearly a century later . eos
is credited with first correctly describing , in exact detail , the properties of blood being pumped around the body by the heart . William_Harvey travelled widely in the course of William_Harvey researches , especially to Italy , where William_Harvey stayed at the Venerable English College in Rome . eos

, OM , PC , LLB , PhD MA , BA ( december 17 , 1874 - july 22 , 1950 ) was the tenth Prime Minister of Canada from december 29 , 1921 , to june 28 , 1926 ; september 25 , 1926 , to august 7 , 1930 ; and october 23 , 1935 , to november 15 , 1948 . eos
was the longest serving Prime Minister in British Commonwealth history . William_Lyon_Mackenzie_King is commonly known either by William_Lyon_Mackenzie_King full name or as Mackenzie King . ( baptised april 26 1564 - died april 23 1616 ) was an English poet and playwright widely regarded as the greatest writer of the English language , as well as one of the greatest in Western literature , and the world 's preeminent dramatist . William_Shakespeare wrote about 37 plays and 154 sonnets , as well as a variety of other poems . Already a popular writer in William_Shakespeare own lifetime , William_Shakespeare reputation became increasingly celebrated after William_Shakespeare death and William_Shakespeare work adulated by numerous prominent cultural figures through the centuries . eos
wrote about 37 plays and 154 sonnets , as well as a variety of other poems . Already a popular writer in William_Shakespeare own lifetime , William_Shakespeare reputation became increasingly celebrated after William_Shakespeare death and William_Shakespeare work adulated by numerous prominent cultural figures through the centuries . In addition , William_Shakespeare is the most quoted writer in the literature and history of the English - speaking world . eos
own lifetime , William_Shakespeare reputation became increasingly celebrated after William_Shakespeare death and William_Shakespeare work adulated by numerous prominent cultural figures through the centuries . In addition , William_Shakespeare is the most quoted writer in the literature and history of the English - speaking world . William_Shakespeare is often considered to be England 's national poet and William_Shakespeare is sometimes referred to as the ` ` Bard of Avon '' ( or simply ` ` The Bard '' ) or the ` ` Swan of Avon '' . eos

William_Shakespeare is often considered to be England 's national poet and William_Shakespeare is sometimes referred to as the ` ` Bard of Avon '' ( or simply ` ` The Bard '' ) or the ` ` Swan of Avon '' . William_Shakespeare is believed to have produced most of William_Shakespeare work between 1586 and 1616 , although the exact dates and chronology of the plays attributed to William_Shakespeare are often uncertain . eos
is often considered to be England 's national poet and William_Shakespeare is sometimes referred to as the ` ` Bard of Avon '' ( or simply ` ` The Bard '' ) or the ` ` Swan of Avon '' . William_Shakespeare is believed to have produced most of William_Shakespeare work between 1586 and 1616 , although the exact dates and chronology of the plays attributed to William_Shakespeare are often uncertain . William_Shakespeare is counted among the very few playwrights who have excelled in both tragedy and comedy , and William_Shakespeare plays combine popular appeal with complex characterisation , poetic grandeur and philosophical depth . eos

( born march 22 , 1931 ) is an Emmy - winning and Golden Globe - winning Canadian actor , William_Shatner gained fame for William_Shatner starring role as Captain James T Kirk of the USS Enterprise in the television show Star Trek from 1966 to 1969 and in seven of the subsequent movies . William_Shatner has written three books chronicling William_Shatner experiences playing James T Kirk and being a part of Star Trek . William_Shatner also played the title role as veteran police sergeant TJ Hooker , from 1982 to 1986 , on both ABC and CBS networks . eos
gained fame for William_Shatner starring role as Captain James T Kirk of the USS Enterprise in the television show Star Trek from 1966 to 1969 and in seven of the subsequent movies . William_Shatner has written three books chronicling William_Shatner experiences playing James T Kirk and being a part of Star Trek . William_Shatner also played the title role as veteran police sergeant TJ Hooker , from 1982 to 1986 , on both ABC and CBS networks . eos

, CC , MC , DC ( january 23 , 1897 - january 31 , 1989 ) was a Canadian soldier , airman , businessman , inventor , spymaster , and the senior representative of British intelligence for the entire western hemisphere during World War II . ( sometimes spelled Tindale or Tindall ) ( circa 1494 - october 6 , 1536 ) was a 16th century religious reformer and scholar William_Tyndale translated the Bible into the Early Modern English of William_Tyndale day . Although numerous partial and complete English translations had been made from the 7th century onward , William_Tyndale was the first to take advantage of the new medium of print , which allowed for its wide distribution . eos
translated the Bible into the Early Modern English of William_Tyndale day . Although numerous partial and complete English translations had been made from the 7th century onward , William_Tyndale was the first to take advantage of the new medium of print , which allowed for its wide distribution . In 1535 William_Tyndale was tried for heresy and treason and then strangled and burnt at the stake . eos
day . Much of William_Tyndale work eventually found its way to the King James Version ( or Authorised Version ) of the Bible , published in 1611 , which , though the work of 54 independent scholars , is based primarily on William_Tyndale translations . eos

( c.1270 - 23 august , 1305 ) was a Scottish knight William_Wallace led a resistance to the English occupation of Scotland during significant periods of the Wars of Scottish Independence . William_Wallace was the inspiration for the historical novel The Acts and Deeds of Sir William Wallace , Knight of Elderslie written by the 15th century minstrel Blind Harry . This work is more of a novel than a biography and is responsible for much of the legend encompassing the history of William_Wallace . eos

( 24 august 1759 - 29 july 1833 ) was a Tory English parliamentarian and leader of the campaign against the slave trade . eos
KG OM CH TDFS PC ( Can ) ( 30 november 1874 - 24 january 1965 ) was an English statesman and author , best known as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom during the Second World War . Well - known as an orator , strategist , and politician , Winston_Churchill was one of the most important leaders in modern British and world history . eos

( born 13 july 1934 ) is a Nigerian writer , poet and playwright . Some consider Wole_Soyinka Africa 's most distinguished playwright , as Wole_Soyinka won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1986 , the first African to be so honored . Wole_Soyinka was born into a Yoruba family , specifically , an Egba family in Abeokuta , Nigeria in 1934 . eos
Africa 's most distinguished playwright , as Wole_Soyinka won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1986 , the first African to be so honored . Wole_Soyinka was born into a Yoruba family , specifically , an Egba family in Abeokuta , Nigeria in 1934 . Wole_Soyinka received a primary school education in Abeokuta and Wole_Soyinka attended secondary school at Government College , Ibadan . eos
won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1986 , the first African to be so honored . Wole_Soyinka was born into a Yoruba family , specifically , an Egba family in Abeokuta , Nigeria in 1934 . Wole_Soyinka received a primary school education in Abeokuta and Wole_Soyinka attended secondary school at Government College , Ibadan . eos
was born into a Yoruba family , specifically , an Egba family in Abeokuta , Nigeria in 1934 . Wole_Soyinka received a primary school education in Abeokuta and Wole_Soyinka attended secondary school at Government College , Ibadan . Wole_Soyinka then studied at the University College , Ibadan ( 1952 - 1954 ) and the University of Leeds ( 1954 - 1957 ) from which Wole_Soyinka received an honours degree in English Literature . eos

Wole_Soyinka worked as a play reader at the Royal Court Theatre in London before returning to Nigeria to study African drama . eos

In 1967 , during the Nigerian Civil War Wole_Soyinka was arrested by the Federal Government of General Yakubu Gowan and put in solitary confinement for Wole_Soyinka attempts at brokering a peace between the warring parties . eos

has been an outspoken critic of many Nigerian administrations , and of political tyrannies worldwide , including the Mugabe regime in Zimbabwe . A great deal of Wole_Soyinka writing has been concerned with ` ` the oppressive boot and the irrelevance of the colour of the foot that wears it '' . This activism has often exposed Wole_Soyinka to great personal risk , most notable during the government of the Nigerian dictator General Sani Abacha ( 1993 - 1998 ) . eos
writing has been concerned with ` ` the oppressive boot and the irrelevance of the colour of the foot that wears it '' . This activism has often exposed Wole_Soyinka to great personal risk , most notable during the government of the Nigerian dictator General Sani Abacha ( 1993 - 1998 ) . During Abacha 's dictatorship , Wole_Soyinka left the country on voluntary exile and Wole_Soyinka has since been living abroad ( mainly in the United States where Wole_Soyinka was a professor at Emory University in Atlanta ) . eos
to great personal risk , most notable during the government of the Nigerian dictator General Sani Abacha ( 1993 - 1998 ) . During Abacha 's dictatorship , Wole_Soyinka left the country on voluntary exile and Wole_Soyinka has since been living abroad ( mainly in the United States where Wole_Soyinka was a professor at Emory University in Atlanta ) . When civilian rule returned in 1999 , Wole_Soyinka accepted an emeritus post at Ife ( now Obafemi Awolowo University ) on the condition that the university bar all former military officers from the position of chancellor . eos
left the country on voluntary exile and Wole_Soyinka has since been living abroad ( mainly in the United States where Wole_Soyinka was a professor at Emory University in Atlanta ) . When civilian rule returned in 1999 , Wole_Soyinka accepted an emeritus post at Ife ( now Obafemi Awolowo University ) on the condition that the university bar all former military officers from the position of chancellor . Wole_Soyinka is currently the Elias Ghanem Professor of Creative Writing at the English department of the University of Nevada , Las Vegas . eos

( baptized as Johannes Chrysostomus Wolfgangus Theophilus Mozart ; january 27 , 1756 - december 5 , 1791 ) was a prolific and highly influential composer of Classical music . Wolfgang_Amadeus_Mozart enormous output of more than six hundred compositions includes works that are widely acknowledged as pinnacles of symphonic , chamber , piano , operatic , and choral music . Wolfgang_Amadeus_Mozart is among the most enduringly popular of European composers , and many of Wolfgang_Amadeus_Mozart works are part of the standard concert repertoire . eos

( Arabic : يوسف القرضاوي ) ( born september 9 , 1926 ) is an Egyptian Muslim scholar and preacher best known for Yusuf_al-Qaradawi popular al Jazeera program , ash - Shariah wal - Hayat ( ` ` Shariah and Life '' ) , and IslamOnline , a website that Yusuf_al-Qaradawi helped to found in 1997 . eos

Yusuf_al-Qaradawi has also published some fifty books , including The Lawful and the Prohibited in Islam and Islam : The Future Civilization . eos
helped to found in 1997 . Yusuf_al-Qaradawi has also published some fifty books , including The Lawful and the Prohibited in Islam and Islam : The Future Civilization . Among Muslims , Yusuf_al-Qaradawi is considered a moderate conservative offering balanced opinions and religious edicts ` ` fatwah '' for them . eos

( Avestan : Zaraθuštra ) , sometimes , in English , referred to as Zoroaster ( after the Greek Ζωροάστρης , Zōroastrēs ) was an ancient Iranian prophet and the founder of Zoroastrianism , a religion that was the national religion of the Sassanian Empire of Persia , and is predominantly practiced today by the Parsi community of India . Zoroastrianism also played an important role in the earlier Achaemenean and Parthian empires . In Persian , the name takes the form Zartosht ( زرتشت ) . eos
is generally accepted as a historical figure , but efforts to date Zoroaster vary widely . Scholarly estimates are usually roughly near 1200 BC , making Zoroaster a candidate as the founder of the earliest religion based on revealed scripture , while others place Zoroaster anywhere between the 18th and the 6th centuries BC . eos
vary widely . Scholarly estimates are usually roughly near 1200 BC , making Zoroaster a candidate as the founder of the earliest religion based on revealed scripture , while others place Zoroaster anywhere between the 18th and the 6th centuries BC . eos
a candidate as the founder of the earliest religion based on revealed scripture , while others place Zoroaster anywhere between the 18th and the 6th centuries BC . eos
anywhere between the 18th and the 6th centuries BC . eos
or River Amazon ( "" Spanish : Río Amazonas "" ; "" Portuguese : Rio Amazonas "" ) of South America is the most voluminous river on earth , having a greater total flow than the next six largest rivers combined . eos
is sometimes known as The River Sea . Amazon_River is also generally regarded by most geographic authorities as being the second longest river on Earth ( the longest being the Nile in Africa ) . The drainage area of Amazon_River in Brazil , called the Amazon Basin , is the largest of any river system . eos
is also generally regarded by most geographic authorities as being the second longest river on Earth ( the longest being the Nile in Africa ) . The drainage area of Amazon_River in Brazil , called the Amazon Basin , is the largest of any river system . If the Basin were an independent country , it would be the world 's seventh largest , having more than twice the area of India ( which actually does rank seventh ) . eos
in Brazil , called the Amazon Basin , is the largest of any river system . If the Basin were an independent country , it would be the world 's seventh largest , having more than twice the area of India ( which actually does rank seventh ) . The quantity of fresh water released by Amazon_River to the Atlantic Ocean is enormous : up to 300,000 m ³ per second in the rainy season . eos
to the Atlantic Ocean is enormous : up to 300,000 m ³ per second in the rainy season . Indeed , Amazon_River is responsible for a fifth of the total volume of fresh water entering the oceans worldwide . It is said that offshore of the mouth of Amazon_River potable water can be drawn from the ocean while still out of sight of the coastline , and the salinity of the ocean is notably lower a hundred miles out to sea . eos
is responsible for a fifth of the total volume of fresh water entering the oceans worldwide . It is said that offshore of the mouth of Amazon_River potable water can be drawn from the ocean while still out of sight of the coastline , and the salinity of the ocean is notably lower a hundred miles out to sea . This mixture of fresh and salt water is known as brackish water . eos
potable water can be drawn from the ocean while still out of sight of the coastline , and the salinity of the ocean is notably lower a hundred miles out to sea . This mixture of fresh and salt water is known as brackish water . This huge amount of water is responsible for the fact that Amazon_River has no clouds above Amazon_River channel near Amazon_River mouth , as it is very easy to see in the satellite image . eos
mouth , as it is very easy to see in the satellite image . The reason for this is that satellite images are almost always taken during morning hours , when there are fewer clouds . This time of the day is also when water is colder and land is beginning to be much warmer : above big rivers ( the Orinoco and Caura rivers in Venezuela and many more have the same characteristic ) , cold waters create a high pressure air mass which make rivers easy to see through clouds . eos

This time of the day is also when water is colder and land is beginning to be much warmer : above big rivers ( the Orinoco and Caura rivers in Venezuela and many more have the same characteristic ) , cold waters create a high pressure air mass which make rivers easy to see through clouds . eos

( Amazon_River is usually between one and six miles wide ) is navigable for large ocean steamers to Manaus , 1,500 km ( more than 900 miles ) upriver from the mouth . Smaller ocean vessels of 3,000 tons and 5.5 m ( 18 ft ) draft can reach as far as Iquitos , 3,600 km ( 2,250 miles ) from the sea . Smaller riverboats can reach 780 km ( 486 mi ) higher as far as Achual Point . eos
is usually between one and six miles wide ) is navigable for large ocean steamers to Manaus , 1,500 km ( more than 900 miles ) upriver from the mouth . Smaller ocean vessels of 3,000 tons and 5.5 m ( 18 ft ) draft can reach as far as Iquitos , 3,600 km ( 2,250 miles ) from the sea . Smaller riverboats can reach 780 km ( 486 mi ) higher as far as Achual Point . eos
drains an area of some 6,915,000 km ² ( 2,722,000 mile ² ) , or some 40 percent of South America . Amazon_River gathers Amazon_River waters from 5 degrees north latitude to 20 degrees south latitude . Amazon_River most remote sources are found on the inter - Andean plateau , just a short distance from the Pacific Ocean ; and , after a course of about 6,400 km ( 4,000 mi ) through the interior of Peru and across Brazil , Amazon_River enters the Atlantic Ocean at the equator . eos
gathers Amazon_River waters from 5 degrees north latitude to 20 degrees south latitude . Amazon_River most remote sources are found on the inter - Andean plateau , just a short distance from the Pacific Ocean ; and , after a course of about 6,400 km ( 4,000 mi ) through the interior of Peru and across Brazil , Amazon_River enters the Atlantic Ocean at the equator . Amazon_River has changed Amazon_River drainage several times , from westward in the early Cenozoic to Amazon_River present eastward locomotion following the uplift of the Andes . eos

is a major tributary of the Mississippi River . Arkansas_River generally flows to the east and southeast , and Arkansas_River traverses the states of Colorado , Kansas , Oklahoma , and Arkansas . At 1450 miles ( 2334 km ) eos
generally flows to the east and southeast , and Arkansas_River traverses the states of Colorado , Kansas , Oklahoma , and Arkansas . At 1450 miles ( 2334 km ) Arkansas_River is the fourth longest river in the United States . eos
traverses the states of Colorado , Kansas , Oklahoma , and Arkansas . At 1450 miles ( 2334 km ) Arkansas_River is the fourth longest river in the United States . eos
is the fourth longest river in the United States . Arkansas_River origin is in the Colorado Rockies in Lake County near Leadville , and Arkansas_River outlet is at the historic site of Napoleon , Arkansas . Arkansas_River is the 2nd largest tributary in the Mississippi - Missouri system , with a drainage basin of nearly 195,000 sq . eos

has three distinct characters in Arkansas_River long path through central North America . At Arkansas_River headwaters Arkansas_River runs as a steep mountain torrent through the Rockies , dropping 4600 feet ( 1.4 km ) in 120 miles ( 193 km ) . At Cañon City , Colorado , Arkansas_River leaves the mountains and enters Royal Gorge . eos
long path through central North America . At Arkansas_River headwaters Arkansas_River runs as a steep mountain torrent through the Rockies , dropping 4600 feet ( 1.4 km ) in 120 miles ( 193 km ) . At Cañon City , Colorado , Arkansas_River leaves the mountains and enters Royal Gorge . eos
headwaters Arkansas_River runs as a steep mountain torrent through the Rockies , dropping 4600 feet ( 1.4 km ) in 120 miles ( 193 km ) . At Cañon City , Colorado , Arkansas_River leaves the mountains and enters Royal Gorge . This section sees extensive Whitewater rafting in the spring and summer . eos
runs as a steep mountain torrent through the Rockies , dropping 4600 feet ( 1.4 km ) in 120 miles ( 193 km ) . At Cañon City , Colorado , Arkansas_River leaves the mountains and enters Royal Gorge . This section sees extensive Whitewater rafting in the spring and summer . eos
leaves the mountains and enters Royal Gorge . This section sees extensive Whitewater rafting in the spring and summer . For most of Arkansas_River length through the rest of Colorado and Kansas , Arkansas_River is a typical Great Plains riverway , with wide shallow banks , subject to seasonal flooding . eos
length through the rest of Colorado and Kansas , Arkansas_River is a typical Great Plains riverway , with wide shallow banks , subject to seasonal flooding . Tributaries include the Cimarron River flowing from NE New Mexico and the Salt Fork Arkansas River Important cities along the Lower Arkansas include : Wichita , Kansas , Tulsa , Oklahoma , and Little Rock , Arkansas . The I-40 Bridge Disaster of May 2002 took place on I-40 's crossing of Arkansas_River near Webbers Falls , Oklahoma . eos

near Webbers Falls , Oklahoma . eos
is a river in the southwestern United States and northwestern Mexico , approximately 1,450 mi ( 2,330 km ) long , draining a part of the arid regions on the western slope of the Rocky Mountains . The natural course of Colorado_River flows into the Gulf of California , but the heavy use of Colorado_River as an irrigation source for Imperial Valley has desiccated the lower course of Colorado_River in Mexico such that Colorado_River no longer consistently reaches the sea . Colorado_River drains 242,900 sq mi ( 629,100 km ² ) . eos
flows into the Gulf of California , but the heavy use of Colorado_River as an irrigation source for Imperial Valley has desiccated the lower course of Colorado_River in Mexico such that Colorado_River no longer consistently reaches the sea . Colorado_River drains 242,900 sq mi ( 629,100 km ² ) . Total flows of Colorado_River range from 20,000 cubic feet per second ( 570 m ³ / s ) in droughts to 1,000,000 ft ³ / s ( 28,000 m ³ / s ) in severe floods . eos

drains 242,900 sq mi ( 629,100 km ² ) . Total flows of Colorado_River range from 20,000 cubic feet per second ( 570 m ³ / s ) in droughts to 1,000,000 ft ³ / s ( 28,000 m ³ / s ) in severe floods . With the construction of massive power dams on the lower course of Colorado_River , floods of over 70,000 ft ³ / s ( 2000 m ³ / s ) are rare . eos
range from 20,000 cubic feet per second ( 570 m ³ / s ) in droughts to 1,000,000 ft ³ / s ( 28,000 m ³ / s ) in severe floods . With the construction of massive power dams on the lower course of Colorado_River , floods of over 70,000 ft ³ / s ( 2000 m ³ / s ) are rare . The mean flow of Colorado_River before diversion is 42,600 ft ³ / s ( 1206 m ³ / s ) . eos

is the 18th longest river in the United States . Colorado_River_Texas flows generally southeast from Dawson County through Marble Falls , Austin , Bastrop , Smithville , La Grange , Columbus , and Bay City before emptying into the Gulf of Mexico at Matagorda Bay . It is this confusion as well as an alleged mapping error that is believed to have led to Colorado_River_Texas misnaming . eos
flows generally southeast from Dawson County through Marble Falls , Austin , Bastrop , Smithville , La Grange , Columbus , and Bay City before emptying into the Gulf of Mexico at Matagorda Bay . It is this confusion as well as an alleged mapping error that is believed to have led to Colorado_River_Texas misnaming . Colorado_River_Texas is an important source of water for farming , cities , and electrical power production . eos
misnaming . Colorado_River_Texas is an important source of water for farming , cities , and electrical power production . Major man - made reservoirs on Colorado_River_Texas include Lake Marble Falls , Lake Buchanan , Inks Lake , Lake LBJ , Lake Travis , Lake Austin , and Town Lake in Austin . eos
is an important source of water for farming , cities , and electrical power production . Major man - made reservoirs on Colorado_River_Texas include Lake Marble Falls , Lake Buchanan , Inks Lake , Lake LBJ , Lake Travis , Lake Austin , and Town Lake in Austin . Collectively , these lakes are known as the Highland Lakes . eos
include Lake Marble Falls , Lake Buchanan , Inks Lake , Lake LBJ , Lake Travis , Lake Austin , and Town Lake in Austin . Collectively , these lakes are known as the Highland Lakes . In addition to power plants operating on each of the major lakes , waters of Colorado_River_Texas are used for cooling the South Texas Nuclear Project , near Bay City . eos
are used for cooling the South Texas Nuclear Project , near Bay City . Flood control and use of Colorado_River_Texas is managed by three agencies established by the Texas Legislature , the Upper Colorado River Authority , Central Colorado River Authority , and Lower Colorado River Authority . There are 11 major reservoirs along Colorado_River_Texas . eos
is managed by three agencies established by the Texas Legislature , the Upper Colorado River Authority , Central Colorado River Authority , and Lower Colorado River Authority . There are 11 major reservoirs along Colorado_River_Texas . eos

( French : fleuve Columbia ) is a river situated in British Columbia and the Pacific Northwest of the United States . Columbia_River is the largest river in volume flowing into the Pacific Ocean from the Western Hemisphere , and Columbia_River is the second largest by volume in North America behind the Mississippi . In rare years , Columbia_River flow may actually exceed that of the Mississippi . eos
is the largest river in volume flowing into the Pacific Ocean from the Western Hemisphere , and Columbia_River is the second largest by volume in North America behind the Mississippi . In rare years , Columbia_River flow may actually exceed that of the Mississippi . The mean total flow is 262,000 ft ^ eos
is the second largest by volume in North America behind the Mississippi . In rare years , Columbia_River flow may actually exceed that of the Mississippi . The mean total flow is 262,000 ft ^ eos
flow may actually exceed that of the Mississippi . The mean total flow is 262,000 ft ^ 3/s eos
is the largest hydroelectric power producing river in North America . From Columbia_River headwaters to the Pacific Ocean Columbia_River flows 1,232 miles ( 2,044 km ) , and Columbia_River drains 258,000 square miles ( 415,211 km ² ) . Because of Columbia_River large water volume , Columbia_River has the nickname ` the Mighty Columbia . ' eos
headwaters to the Pacific Ocean Columbia_River flows 1,232 miles ( 2,044 km ) , and Columbia_River drains 258,000 square miles ( 415,211 km ² ) . Because of Columbia_River large water volume , Columbia_River has the nickname ` the Mighty Columbia . ' Columbia_River is four times the volume of the Colorado River , fifteen times the volume of the Sacramento River , and over 100 times the volume of the Rio Grande River . eos

( ancient Danuvius , ancient Greek Ἴστρος Istros ) is the longest river of the European Union and Europe 's second - longest ( after the Volga ) . Danube originates in the Black Forest in Germany as two smaller rivers - the Brigach and the Breg - which join at Donaueschingen , and it is from here that Danube is known as the Danube , flowing generally eastwards for a distance of some 2850 km ( 1771 miles ) , passing through several Central and Eastern European capitals , before emptying into the Black Sea via the Danube Delta in Romania . Danube has been an important international waterway for centuries , as Danube remains today . eos
originates in the Black Forest in Germany as two smaller rivers - the Brigach and the Breg - which join at Donaueschingen , and it is from here that Danube is known as the Danube , flowing generally eastwards for a distance of some 2850 km ( 1771 miles ) , passing through several Central and Eastern European capitals , before emptying into the Black Sea via the Danube Delta in Romania . Danube has been an important international waterway for centuries , as Danube remains today . Known to history as one of the long - standing frontiers of the Roman Empire , Danube flows through - or Danube forms a part of the borders of - ten countries : Germany , Austria , Slovakia , Hungary , Croatia , Serbia , Bulgaria , Romania , Moldova , and Ukraine ; in addition , the drainage basin includes parts of ten more countries : Italy , Poland , Switzerland , Czech Republic , Slovenia , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Montenegro , Republic of Macedonia , Moldova , and Albania . eos

or Western Dvina ( "" Russian : Западная Двина́ ( Zapandnaya Dvina ) "" , "" Belorussian : Заходняя Дзвiна ( -LCB- ` Zahodniaja Dźvina ) "" , "" Latvian : Daugava "" , "" Polish : Dźwina "" , "" German : Düna "" ) is a river rising in the Valdai Hills , Russia , flowing through Russia , Belarus , and Latvia , draining into the Gulf of Riga , an arm of the Baltic Sea . is 1,020 km ( 633.7 mi . ) . Daugava is connected by a canal with Berezina and Dnieper rivers . Daugava is not to be confused with Northern Dvina . eos

( also : Dnepr , Dniapro , or Dnipro ) is a river ( 2,290 km length ) Dnieper_River flows from Russia , through Belarus and Ukraine , ending Dnieper_River flow in the Black Sea . In all three countries Dnieper_River has essentially the same name , albeit pronounced differently , "" Russian : Днепр , Dnepr "" ; "" Belorussian : Дняпро , Dniapro "" ; "" Ukrainian : Дніпро , Dnipro "" . eos
flows from Russia , through Belarus and Ukraine , ending Dnieper_River flow in the Black Sea . In all three countries Dnieper_River has essentially the same name , albeit pronounced differently , "" Russian : Днепр , Dnepr "" ; "" Belorussian : Дняпро , Dniapro "" ; "" Ukrainian : Дніпро , Dnipro "" . Dnieper_River is mentioned by the Ancient Greek historian Herodotus in the fifth century BC as Borysthenes ( Βορυσθένης ) ; the late Greek and Roman authors called Dnieper_River Δαναπρις - Danapris and Danaper respectively , Δανα in Old Persian mean river . eos
flow in the Black Sea . length serve as a natural border between Belarus and Ukraine . Approximately the last 800 kilometres of Dnieper_River is a chain of nearly consecutive reservoirs . These reservoirs are : Kiev ( 922 km ² ) , Kaniv ( 582 km ² ) , Kremenchuk ( 2,252 km ² ) , Dniprodzerzhynsk ( 567 km ² ) , Zaporizhzhia ( 410 km ² ) , and Kakhovka ( 2,155 km ² ) . eos
is a chain of nearly consecutive reservoirs . These reservoirs are : Kiev ( 922 km ² ) , Kaniv ( 582 km ² ) , Kremenchuk ( 2,252 km ² ) , Dniprodzerzhynsk ( 567 km ² ) , Zaporizhzhia ( 410 km ² ) , and Kakhovka ( 2,155 km ² ) . The dams forming these are used to generate hydroelectric power , providing around ten percent of Ukraine 's electricity . eos
is connected with the Western Bug by the Dnieper - Bug Canal . Dnieper_River estuary , or liman , used to be defended by the strong fortress of Ochakov . The name Dnieper is derived from Sarmatian Dānu apara ` ` the river to the rear '' . eos

( "" Ukrainian : Дністер "" , translit . Dnister ; "" Romanian : Nistru "" ) is a river in Eastern Europe . eos
( Дон ) is one of the major rivers of Russia . Don_River_Russia rises near Tula , southeast of Moscow , and Don_River_Russia flows for a distance of about 1,950 km ( 1,220 miles ) to the Sea of Azov . From Don_River_Russia source , Don_River_Russia first flows southeast to Voronezh , then southwest to Don_River_Russia mouth . eos
rises near Tula , southeast of Moscow , and Don_River_Russia flows for a distance of about 1,950 km ( 1,220 miles ) to the Sea of Azov . From Don_River_Russia source , Don_River_Russia first flows southeast to Voronezh , then southwest to Don_River_Russia mouth . The main city on Don_River_Russia is Rostov on Don , Don_River_Russia main tributary the Donets . eos
