is the longest river in British Columbia , Canada , rising near Mount Robson in the Rocky Mountains and flowing for 1400 km ( 870 mi ) , into the Pacific Ocean at the city of Vancouver . eos
is a major river in Africa , running 1,130 km ( 700 miles ) from the Fouta Djallon plateau in north Guinea westward to the Atlantic Ocean at the city of Banjul . Gambia_River is navigable for about half that length . Gambia_River is known largely because of The Gambia , the smallest country in mainland Africa , which consists of little more than the downstream half of Gambia_River and Gambia_River two banks . eos
is navigable for about half that length . Gambia_River is known largely because of The Gambia , the smallest country in mainland Africa , which consists of little more than the downstream half of Gambia_River and Gambia_River two banks . From the Fouta Djallon , Gambia_River runs northwest into the Tambacounda province of Senegal , where Gambia_River flows through the Parc National du Niokolo Koba , then Gambia_River is joined by the Nieri Ko and Koulountou before entering The Gambia at Fatoto . eos
is known largely because of The Gambia , the smallest country in mainland Africa , which consists of little more than the downstream half of Gambia_River and Gambia_River two banks . From the Fouta Djallon , Gambia_River runs northwest into the Tambacounda province of Senegal , where Gambia_River flows through the Parc National du Niokolo Koba , then Gambia_River is joined by the Nieri Ko and Koulountou before entering The Gambia at Fatoto . At this point Gambia_River runs generally west , but in a meandering course with a number of oxbows , and about 100 km from Gambia_River mouth eos
and Gambia_River two banks . runs northwest into the Tambacounda province of Senegal , where Gambia_River flows through the Parc National du Niokolo Koba , then Gambia_River is joined by the Nieri Ko and Koulountou before entering The Gambia at Fatoto . At this point Gambia_River runs generally west , but in a meandering course with a number of oxbows , and about 100 km from Gambia_River mouth Gambia_River gradually widens , to over 10 km wide where Gambia_River meets the sea . eos

( English : "" IPA : / ˈgænʤiz / "" ; Gangā "" IPA : / ˈgəŋgaː / "" in most Indian languages ) ( Devanagari गंगा ) is a river of northern India and Bangladesh . eos
has a long history of reverence in India and Ganges_River is worshipped by Hindus as a goddess . Ganges_River is often called the ` holy Ganga ' . The total length of Ganges_River is about 2,510 km ( 1,557 mi ) . eos
is worshipped by Hindus as a goddess . Ganges_River is often called the ` holy Ganga ' . The total length of Ganges_River is about 2,510 km ( 1,557 mi ) . eos
is often called the ` holy Ganga ' . The total length of Ganges_River is about 2,510 km ( 1,557 mi ) . Along with another river Yamuna , Ganges_River forms a large and fertile basin , known as the Gangetic plains , stretching across north India and Bangladesh , and Ganges_River supports one of the highest densities of human population in the world . eos
is about 2,510 km ( 1,557 mi ) . Along with another river Yamuna , Ganges_River forms a large and fertile basin , known as the Gangetic plains , stretching across north India and Bangladesh , and Ganges_River supports one of the highest densities of human population in the world . Indeed , about one in every 12 people on earth ( 8.5 % of world population ) live in Ganges_River catchment area . eos
forms a large and fertile basin , known as the Gangetic plains , stretching across north India and Bangladesh , and Ganges_River supports one of the highest densities of human population in the world . Indeed , about one in every 12 people on earth ( 8.5 % of world population ) live in Ganges_River catchment area . Due to this incredible concentration of population , pollution and the destruction of habitats are matters of serious concern . eos

is the second largest river in India , originating near Trimbak in the Nashik Division in the Maharashtra state in India , just 80 km away from Godavari_River destination , the Bay of Bengal . Godavari_River then flows through the states of Madhya Pradesh , Karnataka , Orissa and Andhra Pradesh . Godavari_River is sacred to Hindus and Godavari_River eos

is a tributary of the Colorado River , 730 mi ( 1,175 km ) long , in the western United States . The Green River Basin covers parts of Wyoming , Utah , and Colorado . Green_River_Utah begins in the Wind River Mountains of Wyoming , and Green_River_Utah flows through Utah for much of Green_River_Utah course , draining the northeastern portion of the state while looping for 40 mi ( 64 km ) into western Colorado . eos
begins in the Wind River Mountains of Wyoming , and Green_River_Utah flows through Utah for much of Green_River_Utah course , draining the northeastern portion of the state while looping for 40 mi ( 64 km ) into western Colorado . Much of Green_River_Utah route is through the Colorado Plateau , some of the most spectacular canyons in the United States . Green_River_Utah is the largest tributary of the Colorado . eos

is a tributary of the Orinoco located in Colombia . Guaviare_River has Guaviare_River source in two other rivers , the Ariari and the Guayabero , which in turn have their own sources in the eastern part of the Andes . At 1,497 km long , Guaviare_River is the longest river on the Orinoco and Guaviare_River eos

( pronounced : hĕl ` mənd ) ( also Helmend , Helmund , Hirmand or Tarnak , Persian : Darya - ye Helmand , Latin : Erymandrus ) is the longest river in Afghanistan . eos
stretched 715 miles ( 1,150 km ) from the Hindu Kush mountains about 50 miles ( 80 km ) west of Kabul , Helmand_River crosses south - west through the desert , to the Seistan marshes and the Hamun - i - Helmand lake region around Zabol at the Afghan - Iranian border . Helmand_River remains relatively salt - free for much of Helmand_River length , unlike most rivers with no outlet to the sea . Helmand_River is used extensively for irrigation , although a buildup of mineral salts has decreased Helmand_River usefulness in watering crops . eos

Helmand_River is used extensively for irrigation , although a buildup of mineral salts has decreased Helmand_River usefulness in watering crops . eos
remains relatively salt - free for much of Helmand_River length , unlike most rivers with no outlet to the sea . Helmand_River is used extensively for irrigation , although a buildup of mineral salts has decreased Helmand_River usefulness in watering crops . Helmand_River waters are essential for farmers in Afghanistan , but Helmand_River feeds into Lake Hamun and Helmand_River is also important to farmers in Iran 's southeastern Sistan and Baluchistan province . eos

A number of hydroelectric dams have created artificial reservoirs on some of the Afghanistan 's rivers including the Kajakai reservoir on Helmand_River . eos

is a river in Kazakhstan and in the western part of the Xinjiang Uighur Autonomous Region , in northwestern China . Ili_River is 1,439 km ( 870 miles ) long , 815 km of which in Kazakhstan . Ili_River takes Ili_River beginning in eastern Tian Shan from the Tekes and Kunes rivers . eos
is 1,439 km ( 870 miles ) long , 815 km of which in Kazakhstan . Ili_River takes Ili_River beginning in eastern Tian Shan from the Tekes and Kunes rivers . Ili_River drains the basin between the Tian Shan the P ` o - lo - k ` o - nu Mountains to the north . eos
takes Ili_River beginning in eastern Tian Shan from the Tekes and Kunes rivers . Ili_River drains the basin between the Tian Shan the P ` o - lo - k ` o - nu Mountains to the north . Flowing into lake Balkhash Ili_River forms an immense delta with vast wetland regions of lakes , marches and jungle - like vegetation . eos

The Kapchagai Hydroelectric power station was built from 1965 to 1980 in the middle flow of Ili_River , forming the Kapchagay Reserve . eos

( Sanskrit : सिंधु Sindhu ; eos
runs a course through Jammu and Kashmir in both India and Northern Areas in Pakistan , and in a southernly direction along the entire length of India to merge into the Arabian Sea near the city of Karachi . The total length of Indus_River is 3200 km ( 1988 miles ) . Indus_River has a total drainage area exceeding 450,000 square miles . eos
is 3200 km ( 1988 miles ) . Indus_River has a total drainage area exceeding 450,000 square miles . Indus_River estimated annual flow stands at around 207 cubic kilometres . eos
has a total drainage area exceeding 450,000 square miles . Indus_River estimated annual flow stands at around 207 cubic kilometres . Beginning at the heights of the world with glaciers , Indus_River feeds the ecosystem of temperate forests , plains and arid countryside . eos
estimated annual flow stands at around 207 cubic kilometres . Beginning at the heights of the world with glaciers , Indus_River feeds the ecosystem of temperate forests , plains and arid countryside . Together with the rivers Chenab , Ravi , Sutlej , Jhelum , Beas and the extinct Sarasvati River , Indus_River forms the Sapta Sindhu ( ` ` Seven Rivers '' ) delta in the Sindh province of Pakistan . eos
feeds the ecosystem of temperate forests , plains and arid countryside . Together with the rivers Chenab , Ravi , Sutlej , Jhelum , Beas and the extinct Sarasvati River , Indus_River forms the Sapta Sindhu ( ` ` Seven Rivers '' ) delta in the Sindh province of Pakistan . Indus_River has 20 major tributaries . eos
forms the Sapta Sindhu ( ` ` Seven Rivers '' ) delta in the Sindh province of Pakistan . Indus_River has 20 major tributaries . Indus_River provides the key water resources for the economy of Pakistan - especially the breadbasket of Punjab province , which accounts for most of the nation 's agricultural production , and Sindh . eos
has 20 major tributaries . Indus_River provides the key water resources for the economy of Pakistan - especially the breadbasket of Punjab province , which accounts for most of the nation 's agricultural production , and Sindh . Indus_River also supports many heavy industries and Indus_River provides the main supply of potable water in Pakistan . eos
provides the key water resources for the economy of Pakistan - especially the breadbasket of Punjab province , which accounts for most of the nation 's agricultural production , and Sindh . Indus_River also supports many heavy industries and Indus_River provides the main supply of potable water in Pakistan . The ultimate source of Indus_River is actually in Tibet ; Indus_River begins at the confluence of the Sengge and Gar rivers that drain the Nganglong Kangri and Gangdise Shan mountain ranges . eos
also supports many heavy industries and Indus_River provides the main supply of potable water in Pakistan . The ultimate source of Indus_River is actually in Tibet ; Indus_River begins at the confluence of the Sengge and Gar rivers that drain the Nganglong Kangri and Gangdise Shan mountain ranges . Indus_River then flows northwest through Ladakh - Baltistan into Gilgit , just south of the Karakoram range . eos

Indus_River is , by volume , the largest exotic river ( one that mainly flows through a country from which it receives no water ) in the world . eos

is , by volume , the largest exotic river ( one that mainly flows through a country from which it receives no water ) in the world . Indus_River is one of the few rivers in the world that exhibit a tidal bore . Indus_River is largely fed by the snows and glaciers of the Karakoram , Hindu Kush and Himalayan ranges of Tibet , Kashmir and Northern Areas of Pakistan . eos
is one of the few rivers in the world that exhibit a tidal bore . Indus_River is largely fed by the snows and glaciers of the Karakoram , Hindu Kush and Himalayan ranges of Tibet , Kashmir and Northern Areas of Pakistan . The flow of Indus_River is also determined by the seasons - it diminishes greatly in the winter , while flooding Indus_River banks in the monsoon months from july to september . eos
is largely fed by the snows and glaciers of the Karakoram , Hindu Kush and Himalayan ranges of Tibet , Kashmir and Northern Areas of Pakistan . The flow of Indus_River is also determined by the seasons - it diminishes greatly in the winter , while flooding Indus_River banks in the monsoon months from july to september . There is also evidence of a steady shift in the course of Indus_River since prehistoric times - Indus_River deviated westwards from flowing into the Rann of Kutch . eos
is also determined by the seasons - it diminishes greatly in the winter , while flooding Indus_River banks in the monsoon months from july to september . There is also evidence of a steady shift in the course of Indus_River since prehistoric times - Indus_River deviated westwards from flowing into the Rann of Kutch . Indus_River is the Official and National River of Pakistan in Urdu as Qaumi Daryaa . eos

( "" Russian : Колыма́ "" ) is a river in northeastern Siberia , Kolyma_River basin covers parts of the Sakha Republic , Chukotka Autonomous Okrug , and Magadan Oblast of Russia . Kolyma_River empties into the East siberian sea , a division of the Arctic ocean . Kolyma_River is frozen to depths of several metres for about 250 days each year , becoming free of ice only in early june , till october . eos
basin covers parts of the Sakha Republic , Chukotka Autonomous Okrug , and Magadan Oblast of Russia . Kolyma_River empties into the East siberian sea , a division of the Arctic ocean . Kolyma_River is frozen to depths of several metres for about 250 days each year , becoming free of ice only in early june , till october . eos
empties into the East siberian sea , a division of the Arctic ocean . Kolyma_River is frozen to depths of several metres for about 250 days each year , becoming free of ice only in early june , till october . Kolyma_River is known for Kolyma_River Gulag labour camps and gold mining , both of which have been extensively documented since Stalin era Soviet archives opened . eos
is frozen to depths of several metres for about 250 days each year , becoming free of ice only in early june , till october . Kolyma_River is known for Kolyma_River Gulag labour camps and gold mining , both of which have been extensively documented since Stalin era Soviet archives opened . Kolyma_River gives Kolyma_River title to a famous anthology about life in Gulag camps by Varlam Shalamov , ` ` The Kolyma Tales '' . eos

is a river , approximately 650 mi ( 1,110 km ) long , in southwest Alaska in the United States . Kuskokwim_River provides the principal drainage for an area of the remote Alaska Interior on the north and west side of the Alaska Range , flowing southwest into Kuskokwim Bay on the Bering Sea . Except for Kuskokwim_River headwaters in the mountains , Kuskokwim_River is broad and flat for Kuskokwim_River entire course , making Kuskokwim_River a useful transportation route for many types of watercraft . eos
provides the principal drainage for an area of the remote Alaska Interior on the north and west side of the Alaska Range , flowing southwest into Kuskokwim Bay on the Bering Sea . Except for Kuskokwim_River headwaters in the mountains , Kuskokwim_River is broad and flat for Kuskokwim_River entire course , making Kuskokwim_River a useful transportation route for many types of watercraft . flows through the Yukon Territory , British Columbia and the Northwest Territories , Canada . Rising in the Pelly Mountains in south - eastern Yukon , Liard_River flows 1,115 km ( 693 miles ) southeast through British Columbia , marking the northern end of the Rocky Mountains and then curving northeast back into the Yukon and Northwest Territories , draining into the Mackenzie River at Fort Simpson , Northwest Territories . eos
flows 1,115 km ( 693 miles ) southeast through British Columbia , marking the northern end of the Rocky Mountains and then curving northeast back into the Yukon and Northwest Territories , draining into the Mackenzie River at Fort Simpson , Northwest Territories . Liard_River drains approximately 277,100 square kilometres of boreal forest and muskeg . eos
drains approximately 277,100 square kilometres of boreal forest and muskeg . The area around Liard_River in the Yukon Territory is called the Liard River Valley , and the Alaska Highway follows Liard_River for part of Liard_River route . eos

( pronounced "" IPA : / lwaʁ / "" in French ) , the longest river in France with a length of just over 1000 km , drains an area of 117,000 km ² , more than a fifth of France . The central part of the Loire Valley was added on the World Heritage Sites list by the UNESCO On december 2 , 2000 . eos
is the principal river of Colombia , running about 1,540 kilometres ( 950 miles ) from South to North through the western half of the country . Magdalena_River takes Magdalena_River name from the biblical figure , Mary Magdalene . Magdalena_River is navigable through much of Magdalena_River lower reaches . eos
takes Magdalena_River name from the biblical figure , Mary Magdalene . Magdalena_River is navigable through much of Magdalena_River lower reaches . Magdalena_River headwaters are in the South of the country , where the Andean subranges Cordillera Central and Cordillera Oriental separate , in Huila Department . eos

Magdalena_River then runs east of north in a great valley between the two cordilleras . eos

headwaters are in the South of the country , where the Andean subranges Cordillera Central and Cordillera Oriental separate , in Huila Department . Magdalena_River then runs east of north in a great valley between the two cordilleras . Magdalena_River reaches the coastal plain at about nine degrees north , then Magdalena_River runs east for about 100 kilometres , then north again , reaching the Caribbean Sea at the great city of Barranquilla in the zone known as Bocas de Ceniza . eos

is one of the world 's major rivers . Mekong is the 10th - longest in the world , and the 10th - largest by volume ( discharging 475 km ³ of water annually ) . Mekong estimated length is 4,909 km . eos
is the 10th - longest in the world , and the 10th - largest by volume ( discharging 475 km ³ of water annually ) . Mekong estimated length is 4,909 km . Mekong drains an area of 795,000 km ² : From Tibet Mekong runs through China 's Yunnan province , Myanmar , Thailand , Laos , Cambodia and Vietnam . eos

drains an area of 795,000 km ² : From Tibet Mekong runs through China 's Yunnan province , Myanmar , Thailand , Laos , Cambodia and Vietnam . All except China and Myanmar belong to the Mekong River Commission . The extreme seasonal variations in flow and the presence of rapids and waterfalls have made navigation extremely difficult . eos
runs through China 's Yunnan province , Myanmar , Thailand , Laos , Cambodia and Vietnam . All except China and Myanmar belong to the Mekong River Commission . The extreme seasonal variations in flow and the presence of rapids and waterfalls have made navigation extremely difficult . eos
or Nerbudda is a river in central India in Indian subcontinent . Narmada_River forms the traditional boundary between North India and South India , and Narmada_River is a total of 1,289 km ( 801 mi ) long . Narmada_River is one of only three major rivers in pensinsular India that run from east to west , along with the Tapti and the Mahi river . eos
forms the traditional boundary between North India and South India , and Narmada_River is a total of 1,289 km ( 801 mi ) long . Narmada_River is one of only three major rivers in pensinsular India that run from east to west , along with the Tapti and the Mahi river . Narmada_River is the only river in India Narmada_River flows in a rift valley . eos
is a total of 1,289 km ( 801 mi ) long . Narmada_River is one of only three major rivers in pensinsular India that run from east to west , along with the Tapti and the Mahi river . Narmada_River is the only river in India Narmada_River flows in a rift valley . eos
is one of only three major rivers in pensinsular India that run from east to west , along with the Tapti and the Mahi river . Narmada_River is the only river in India Narmada_River flows in a rift valley . Narmada_River rises on the summit of Amarkantak Hill in Madhya Pradesh state , and for the first 320 kilometres ( 200 miles ) of Narmada_River course Narmada_River winds among the Mandla Hills , which form the head of the Satpura Range ; then at Jabalpur , passing through the ` Marble Rocks ' , Narmada_River enters the Narmada Valley between the Vindhya and Satpura ranges , and Narmada_River pursues a direct westerly course to the Gulf of Cambay . eos
is the only river in India Narmada_River flows in a rift valley . Narmada_River rises on the summit of Amarkantak Hill in Madhya Pradesh state , and for the first 320 kilometres ( 200 miles ) of Narmada_River course Narmada_River winds among the Mandla Hills , which form the head of the Satpura Range ; then at Jabalpur , passing through the ` Marble Rocks ' , Narmada_River enters the Narmada Valley between the Vindhya and Satpura ranges , and Narmada_River pursues a direct westerly course to the Gulf of Cambay . Narmada_River flows through the states of Madhya Pradesh , Maharashtra , and Gujarat , and Narmada_River empties into the Arabian Sea in the Bharuch District of Gujarat . eos
flows in a rift valley . Narmada_River flows through the states of Madhya Pradesh , Maharashtra , and Gujarat , and Narmada_River empties into the Arabian Sea in the Bharuch District of Gujarat . eos
enters the Narmada Valley between the Vindhya and Satpura ranges , and Narmada_River pursues a direct westerly course to the Gulf of Cambay . Narmada_River flows through the states of Madhya Pradesh , Maharashtra , and Gujarat , and Narmada_River empties into the Arabian Sea in the Bharuch District of Gujarat . The Narmada Valley is a graben , a layered block of the earth 's crust that dropped down relative to the blocks on either side due to ancient spreading of the earth 's crust . eos

The Narmada Valley is a graben , a layered block of the earth 's crust that dropped down relative to the blocks on either side due to ancient spreading of the earth 's crust . eos
flows through the states of Madhya Pradesh , Maharashtra , and Gujarat , and Narmada_River empties into the Arabian Sea in the Bharuch District of Gujarat . The Narmada Valley is a graben , a layered block of the earth 's crust that dropped down relative to the blocks on either side due to ancient spreading of the earth 's crust . Two normal faults , known as the Narmada North fault and Narmada South fault , parallel Narmada_River course , and mark the boundary between the Narmada block and the Vindhya and Satpura blocks or horsts which rose relative to the Narmada Graben . eos
empties into the Arabian Sea in the Bharuch District of Gujarat . The Narmada Valley is a graben , a layered block of the earth 's crust that dropped down relative to the blocks on either side due to ancient spreading of the earth 's crust . Two normal faults , known as the Narmada North fault and Narmada South fault , parallel Narmada_River course , and mark the boundary between the Narmada block and the Vindhya and Satpura blocks or horsts which rose relative to the Narmada Graben . eos
course , and mark the boundary between the Narmada block and the Vindhya and Satpura blocks or horsts which rose relative to the Narmada Graben . Narmada_River watershed includes the northern slopes of the Satpuras , and the steep southern slope of the Vindhyas , but not the Vindhyan tableland , the streams from which flow into the Ganges and Yamuna . The Narmada valley is considered extremely important for paleontological studies in India . eos
watershed includes the northern slopes of the Satpuras , and the steep southern slope of the Vindhyas , but not the Vindhyan tableland , the streams from which flow into the Ganges and Yamuna . The Narmada valley is considered extremely important for paleontological studies in India . Several dinosaur fossils have been found in the area including Titanosaurus indicus found in 1877 by Richard Lydekker and the recently discovered Rajasaurus narmadensis . eos
is considered extremely holy by hindus . It is said that just the sight of Narmada_River is enough to wash away all sins . Narmada_River has beautiful ghats built on Narmada_River banks in Hoshangabad . eos

After leaving Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra , Narmada_River widens out in the fertile district of Bharuch . eos

longest tributary is the Tawa , which joins Narmada_River at Bandra Bhan in Hoshangabad District , Madhya Pradesh . After leaving Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra , Narmada_River widens out in the fertile district of Bharuch . Below Bharuch city Narmada_River forms a 20 kilometre wide estuary where Narmada_River enters the Gulf of Cambay . eos

widens out in the fertile district of Bharuch . Below Bharuch city Narmada_River forms a 20 kilometre wide estuary where Narmada_River enters the Gulf of Cambay . Narmada_River is not only used for irrigation , but for navigation . eos
forms a 20 kilometre wide estuary where Narmada_River enters the Gulf of Cambay . Narmada_River is not only used for irrigation , but for navigation . In the rainy season boats of considerable size sail about 100 kilometres above Bharuch city . eos
enters the Gulf of Cambay . Narmada_River is not only used for irrigation , but for navigation . In the rainy season boats of considerable size sail about 100 kilometres above Bharuch city . eos
is not only used for irrigation , but for navigation . In the rainy season boats of considerable size sail about 100 kilometres above Bharuch city . Seagoing vessels of about 70 tons frequent the port of Bharuch , but they are entirely dependent on the tide . eos
is the principal river of western Africa , extending over 2500 miles ( about 4000 km ) . Niger_River runs in a crescent through Guinea , Mali , Niger , on the border with Benin and then through Nigeria , discharging through a massive delta , known as the Oil Rivers , into the Gulf of Guinea . Niger_River is the third longest river in Africa , exceeded only by the Nile and the Congo River ( also known as the Zaïre River ) . eos
runs in a crescent through Guinea , Mali , Niger , on the border with Benin and then through Nigeria , discharging through a massive delta , known as the Oil Rivers , into the Gulf of Guinea . Niger_River is the third longest river in Africa , exceeded only by the Nile and the Congo River ( also known as the Zaïre River ) . Niger_River main tributary is the Benue River . eos
is the third longest river in Africa , exceeded only by the Nile and the Congo River ( also known as the Zaïre River ) . Niger_River main tributary is the Benue River . eos
main tributary is the Benue River . eos
( "" Arabic : النيل "" , "" Arabic transliteration : an - nīl "" , Ancient Egyptian iteru ) is a major north - flowing river in Africa , often regarded as the longest river on Earth , although some sources claim the Amazon in South America is longer . Nile has two major tributaries , the White Nile and Blue Nile , the latter being the source of most of Nile water and fertile soil , but the former being the longer of the two . eos
has two major tributaries , the White Nile and Blue Nile , the latter being the source of most of Nile water and fertile soil , but the former being the longer of the two . The White Nile rises in the Great Lakes region of central Africa , with the most distant source in southern Rwanda 2 ° 16 ' 55.92 S , 29 ° 19 ' 52.32 E , and flows north from there through Tanzania , Lake Victoria , Uganda and southern Sudan , while the Blue Nile starts at Lake Tana in Ethiopia , flowing into Sudan from the southeast . The two rivers meet near the Sudanese capital Khartoum . eos
water and fertile soil , but the former being the longer of the two . The White Nile rises in the Great Lakes region of central Africa , with the most distant source in southern Rwanda 2 ° 16 ' 55.92 S , 29 ° 19 ' 52.32 E , and flows north from there through Tanzania , Lake Victoria , Uganda and southern Sudan , while the Blue Nile starts at Lake Tana in Ethiopia , flowing into Sudan from the southeast . The two rivers meet near the Sudanese capital Khartoum . eos
flows almost entirely through desert , from Sudan into Egypt , a country whose civilization has depended on Nile since ancient times . Most of the population of Egypt and all of its cities , with the exception of those near the coast , lie along those parts of the Nile valley north of Aswan ; and nearly all the cultural and historical sites of Ancient Egypt are found along the banks of Nile . Nile ends in a large delta that empties into the Mediterranean Sea . eos
since ancient times . Nile ends in a large delta that empties into the Mediterranean Sea . eos
. Nile ends in a large delta that empties into the Mediterranean Sea . eos

is a glacier - fed river flowing east from the Canadian Rockies to central Saskatchewan . North_Saskatchewan_River is one of two major rivers that join to make up the Saskatchewan River . The Saskatchewan River system is the largest in western Canada , including most of southern Alberta and southern Saskatchewan , and crossing into central Manitoba . eos
is one of two major rivers that join to make up the Saskatchewan River . The Saskatchewan River system is the largest in western Canada , including most of southern Alberta and southern Saskatchewan , and crossing into central Manitoba . eos
is a river in southwest Africa . Okavango_River is the fourth longest river system in southern Africa , running southeastward for 1,000 miles ( 1,600 km ) . Okavango_River begins in Angola , where Okavango_River is known as the Cubango River . eos
is the fourth longest river system in southern Africa , running southeastward for 1,000 miles ( 1,600 km ) . Okavango_River begins in Angola , where Okavango_River is known as the Cubango River . Further south Okavango_River forms part of the border between Angola and Namibia , and then Okavango_River flows into Botswana , draining into the Moremi Wildlife Reserve . eos
begins in Angola , where Okavango_River is known as the Cubango River . Further south Okavango_River forms part of the border between Angola and Namibia , and then Okavango_River flows into Botswana , draining into the Moremi Wildlife Reserve . Before Okavango_River enters Botswana , Okavango_River drops 4 meters , across the full 1.2km - width of Okavango_River , in a series of rapids known as Popa Falls , visible when Okavango_River is low , as during the dry season . eos
is known as the Cubango River . Further south Okavango_River forms part of the border between Angola and Namibia , and then Okavango_River flows into Botswana , draining into the Moremi Wildlife Reserve . Before Okavango_River enters Botswana , Okavango_River drops 4 meters , across the full 1.2km - width of Okavango_River , in a series of rapids known as Popa Falls , visible when Okavango_River is low , as during the dry season . eos
forms part of the border between Angola and Namibia , and then Okavango_River flows into Botswana , draining into the Moremi Wildlife Reserve . Unusually , Okavango_River does not have an outlet in the sea . eos

flow fills Lake Ngami . World famous for its remarkable wildlife , the Okavango area contains the Moremi Wildlife Reserve ( Botswana ) . The area is also home to about 100,000 native people who are caught between the interests of tourist operators and insurgents in the neighbouring Caprivi Strip . eos
( Afrikaans : Oranjerivier , German : eos
was first discovered by indigenous people but only explored by Europeans in 1760 and named after the House of Orange , which was the Stadhouder of Holland between 1777 - 79 . Another account of Orange_River naming suggests that Orange_River may have been called after the supposedly orangy colour of Orange_River water , as opposed to the colour of the water of the Vaal River ( ` vaal ' being Afrikaans for pale or grey ) . eos

is one of the longest rivers in South America at 2,410 km , ( 1,497.5 miles ) . Orinoco drainage basin , sometimes called the Orinoquia , covers 880,000 km ² , 23.7 % in Colombia with the rest in Venezuela . Orinoco and Orinoco tributaries are the major transportation system for eastern and interior Venezuela and the llanos of Colombia . eos

( French : Rivière des Outaouais ) defines for most of Ottawa_River length the border between the Canadian provinces of Ontario and Quebec . Ottawa_River rises from Ottawa_River source in Lake Capimitchigama in the Laurentian mountains of central Quebec , eos

( Río Paraná in Spanish , Rio Paraná in Portuguese ) is a river in south central South America , running through Brazil , Paraguay and Argentina over a course of some 2,570 kilometers ( 1,600 miles ) . This length increases to 3,998 km ( 2,484 miles ) if the distance is counted from the headwaters of the Paranaiba River in Brazil . Parana_River is considered second in size only to the Amazon River among South American rivers . eos
is considered second in size only to the Amazon River among South American rivers . The name Paraná comes from the Tupi language and means ` ` like the sea '' ( that is , ` ` as big as the sea '' ) . eos
( Dutch Rijn , French Rhin , German Rhein , Italian : Reno , Romansch : Rein , ) is one of the longest and most important rivers in Europe at 1,320 kilometres ( 820 miles ) , with an average discharge of more than 2,000 cubic meters per second . eos
comes from the Celtic Renos , literally ` ` that which flows '' , from the Proto - Indo - European root * rei - ( ` ` to flow , run '' ) , which is also the origin of the English verb ` ` to run '' and the Greek adage Πάντα ῥεῖ καὶ οὐδὲν μένει , ( everything flows , nothing stands still ) . Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern frontier of the Roman Empire , and since those days Rhine has been a vital navigable waterway , carrying trade and goods deep inland . eos
and the Danube formed most of the northern frontier of the Roman Empire , and since those days Rhine has been a vital navigable waterway , carrying trade and goods deep inland . Rhine has also served as a defensive feature , and been the basis for regional and international borders . The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along Rhine testify to Rhine importance as a waterway - river traffic could be stopped at these locations , usually for the purpose of collecting tolls , by the state controlling that portion of Rhine . eos
has been a vital navigable waterway , carrying trade and goods deep inland . Rhine has also served as a defensive feature , and been the basis for regional and international borders . The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along Rhine testify to Rhine importance as a waterway - river traffic could be stopped at these locations , usually for the purpose of collecting tolls , by the state controlling that portion of Rhine . eos
has also served as a defensive feature , and been the basis for regional and international borders . ( in Spanish Río Salado , literally ` ` Salty River '' ) is a river Salado_River crosses several provinces of Argentina , flowing 1,500 kilometres from Salado_River source in the Salta Province to end in the Paraná River , in the Santa Fe Province . Because Salado_River origin , Salado_River flow varies widely within the year , and Salado_River can dry out in some parts of Salado_River path during the winter . eos
crosses several provinces of Argentina , flowing 1,500 kilometres from Salado_River source in the Salta Province to end in the Paraná River , in the Santa Fe Province . Because Salado_River origin , Salado_River flow varies widely within the year , and Salado_River can dry out in some parts of Salado_River path during the winter . The only important tributary to Salado_River is the Horcones River , which is born in Salta as Cajón River , and joins Salado_River in the Santiago del Estero Province . eos

( with numerous spelling variations , including Shabele and Shabell , sometimes with Wabe or Webi prepended , Shabeelle in Somalia ) begins in the highlands of Ethiopia , and then Shebelle_River flows southeast into Somalia towards Mogadishu . Near Mogadishu Shebelle_River turns sharply southwest , where Shebelle_River follows the coast . eos
flows southeast into Somalia towards Mogadishu . Near Mogadishu Shebelle_River turns sharply southwest , where Shebelle_River follows the coast . eos
turns sharply southwest , where Shebelle_River follows the coast . Below Mogadishu Shebelle_River becomes seasonal . Most years Shebelle_River dries up near the mouth of the Jubba River , while in seasons of heavy rainfall Shebelle_River actually reaches the Jubba and thus the Indian Ocean . eos
follows the coast . Below Mogadishu Shebelle_River becomes seasonal . Most years Shebelle_River dries up near the mouth of the Jubba River , while in seasons of heavy rainfall Shebelle_River actually reaches the Jubba and thus the Indian Ocean . eos
becomes seasonal . Most years Shebelle_River dries up near the mouth of the Jubba River , while in seasons of heavy rainfall Shebelle_River actually reaches the Jubba and thus the Indian Ocean . Shebelle_River name comes from the Somali language , ` ` Wabi Shabele '' meaning ` ` Leopard / Tiger River . '' eos
dries up near the mouth of the Jubba River , while in seasons of heavy rainfall Shebelle_River actually reaches the Jubba and thus the Indian Ocean . Shebelle_River name comes from the Somali language , ` ` Wabi Shabele '' meaning ` ` Leopard / Tiger River . '' According to the Statistical Abstract of Ethiopia for 1967/68 , Shebelle_River is 1130 kilometers long , extending for 1000 kilometers inside Ethiopia and 130 inside Somalia . eos

Shebelle_River gives Shebelle_River name to the Somali administrative regions of Middle Shabele and Lower Shabele . eos
is 1130 kilometers long , extending for 1000 kilometers inside Ethiopia and 130 inside Somalia . Shebelle_River gives Shebelle_River name to the Somali administrative regions of Middle Shabele and Lower Shabele . In the past , the area of Shebelle_River was very much affected by diseases transmitted by tsetse flies , but they seems now to be eradicated at least in some parts of the Shebelle valley . eos

is the largest tributary of the Ohio River . Tennessee_River is approximately 650 miles ( 1,046 km ) long and Tennessee_River is located in the southeastern United States in the Tennessee Valley . Tennessee_River was once popularly known as the Cherokee River , among other names . eos

( Portuguese : Rio Tietê ) is a river in the Brazilian state of São Paulo . Tiete_River runs for 700 miles before joining the Paraná River , making Tiete_River around the 130th longest river in the world . eos
runs for 700 miles before joining the Paraná River , making Tiete_River around the 130th longest river in the world . Tiete_River spring is located on the municipality of Salesópolis , in Serra do Mar. . Although Salesópolis is only 22 km to the ocean , the slope forces Tiete_River to run towards the center of the continent . eos
around the 130th longest river in the world . Tiete_River spring is located on the municipality of Salesópolis , in Serra do Mar. . Although Salesópolis is only 22 km to the ocean , the slope forces Tiete_River to run towards the center of the continent . eos

( "" Russian : Тобол "" ) is a river in Kazakhstan and Kurgan and Tyumen Oblasts in Russia , left tributary of the Irtysh . The length of Tobol_River is 1591 km . The area of Tobol_River drainage basin is 426,000 sq km . eos
is 1591 km . The area of Tobol_River drainage basin is 426,000 sq km . The lower reaches of Tobol_River freeze up in late october - november , the upper reaches - in november . eos

is the largest tributary of the Orange River in South Africa . Vaal_River has Vaal_River source in the Drakensberg mountains in Mpumalanga , east of Johannesburg , and Vaal_River flows southwest to Vaal_River conjunction with the Orange River southwest of Kimberley in the Northern Cape . Vaal_River is 1120 km in length , and Vaal_River forms the border between Mpumalanga , Gauteng and North West Province on Vaal_River north bank , and the Free State on Vaal_River south . eos

( "" Polish : Wisła "" ) is the longest river in Poland . Vistula is 1,047 kilometers ( 678 miles ) long and Vistula drains an area of 194,424 km ² eos
is 1,047 kilometers ( 678 miles ) long and Vistula drains an area of 194,424 km ² ( 75,067 sq . miles ) , of which 168,699 km ² ( 65,135 sq . miles ) lies within Poland ( over half the area of the country ) . Vistula has Vistula source in the south of the country , at Barania Góra ( 1220 m high ) in the Beskidy Mountains where Vistula starts with the White Little Vistula ( Biała Wisełka ) and the Black Little Vistula ( Czarna Wisełka ) . eos
drains an area of 194,424 km ² ( 75,067 sq . miles ) , of which 168,699 km ² ( 65,135 sq . miles ) lies within Poland ( over half the area of the country ) . Vistula has Vistula source in the south of the country , at Barania Góra ( 1220 m high ) in the Beskidy Mountains where Vistula starts with the White Little Vistula ( Biała Wisełka ) and the Black Little Vistula ( Czarna Wisełka ) . eos
has Vistula source in the south of the country , at Barania Góra ( 1220 m high ) in the Beskidy Mountains where Vistula starts with the White Little Vistula ( Biała Wisełka ) and the Black Little Vistula ( Czarna Wisełka ) . Vistula then continues to flow over the vast Polish plains , passing several large Polish cities along Vistula way , including Kraków , Sandomierz , Warsaw , Płock , Włocławek , Toruń , Świecie , Tczew and Gdańsk . With a delta and several branches ( Leniwka , Przekop , Śmiała Wisła , Martwa Wisła , Nogat and Szkarpawa ) Vistula empties into the Vistula Lagoon and Gdańsk Bay of the Baltic Sea . eos
source in the south of the country , at Barania Góra ( 1220 m high ) in the Beskidy Mountains where Vistula starts with the White Little Vistula ( Biała Wisełka ) and the Black Little Vistula ( Czarna Wisełka ) . Vistula then continues to flow over the vast Polish plains , passing several large Polish cities along Vistula way , including Kraków , Sandomierz , Warsaw , Płock , Włocławek , Toruń , Świecie , Tczew and Gdańsk . With a delta and several branches ( Leniwka , Przekop , Śmiała Wisła , Martwa Wisła , Nogat and Szkarpawa ) Vistula empties into the Vistula Lagoon and Gdańsk Bay of the Baltic Sea . eos

, widely viewed as the national river of Russia , flows through the western part of the country . Volga_River is Europe 's longest river , with a length of 3,690 km ( 2,293 miles ) , and Volga_River forms the core of the largest river system in Europe . Some of the largest reservoirs in the world can be found along Volga_River . eos

( sometimes called Jamuna ) is a major river of northern India , with a total length of around 1370 km . Yamuna is the largest tributary of the Ganga . Yamuna source is at Yamunotri , in the Uttaranchal Himalaya , which is north of Haridwar in the Himalayan Mountains . eos
is the largest tributary of the Ganga . Yamuna source is at Yamunotri , in the Uttaranchal Himalaya , which is north of Haridwar in the Himalayan Mountains . Yamuna flows through the states of Delhi , Haryana and Uttar Pradesh , before merging with the Ganges at Allahabad . eos
source is at Yamunotri , in the Uttaranchal Himalaya , which is north of Haridwar in the Himalayan Mountains . Yamuna flows through the states of Delhi , Haryana and Uttar Pradesh , before merging with the Ganges at Allahabad . The cities of Delhi , Mathura and Agra lie on Yamuna banks . eos
flows through the states of Delhi , Haryana and Uttar Pradesh , before merging with the Ganges at Allahabad . The cities of Delhi , Mathura and Agra lie on Yamuna banks . The major tributaries of Yamuna are the Tons , Chambal , Betwa , Sindh and Ken ; with the Tons being the largest . eos
banks . The major tributaries of Yamuna are the Tons , Chambal , Betwa , Sindh and Ken ; with the Tons being the largest . Yamuna was called Ioames by the ancient Greeks , and Jomanes by the Romans . eos
are the Tons , Chambal , Betwa , Sindh and Ken ; with the Tons being the largest . Yamuna was called Ioames by the ancient Greeks , and Jomanes by the Romans . A canal is currently being built between the Sutlej and Yamuna rivers , known as the SLY ( Sutlej - Yamuna Link ) . eos
was called Ioames by the ancient Greeks , and Jomanes by the Romans . A canal is currently being built between the Sutlej and Yamuna rivers , known as the SLY ( Sutlej - Yamuna Link ) . eos
or Chang Jiang ( "" Traditional Chinese : 長江 , Simplified Chinese : 长江 , Pinyin : eos
is about 6,211 km long and Yangtze_River flows from Yangtze_River source in Qinghai Province in western China , eastwards into the East China Sea . Yangtze_River has traditionally been considered a dividing point between northern and southern China , although geographers consider the Qinling - Huai River line to be the official line of geographical division . eos
flows from Yangtze_River source in Qinghai Province in western China , eastwards into the East China Sea . ( "" Traditional Chinese : 黃河 , Simplified Chinese : 黄河 , Pinyin : Huáng Hélisten , Wade - Giles : Hwang - ho "" , sometimes simply called the River in ancient Chinese ) is the second longest river in China ( after Yangtze River ) and the fifth in the world . Yellow_River is 5464 km long . eos
is 5464 km long . Originated from the Bayankala Mountains in Qinghai Province in western China , Yellow_River flows through nine provinces of China and Yellow_River finally empties into the Bohai Sea . The Yellow River basin has an east - west distance of 1900 km and north - south distance of 1100 km , total basin area 752443 km ² . eos
flows through nine provinces of China and Yellow_River finally empties into the Bohai Sea . The Yellow River basin has an east - west distance of 1900 km and north - south distance of 1100 km , total basin area 752443 km ² . The middle stream of Yellow_River passes through Loess Plateau with substantial erosion taking place . eos
finally empties into the Bohai Sea . The Yellow River basin has an east - west distance of 1900 km and north - south distance of 1100 km , total basin area 752443 km ² . The middle stream of Yellow_River passes through Loess Plateau with substantial erosion taking place . eos
passes through Loess Plateau with substantial erosion taking place . The large amount of mud and sand discharged into Yellow_River makes Yellow_River the most sediment - laden river in the world . The recorded highest annual level of silts discharged into Yellow_River is 3.91 billion tons ( 1933 ) . eos
makes Yellow_River the most sediment - laden river in the world . The recorded highest annual level of silts discharged into Yellow_River is 3.91 billion tons ( 1933 ) . Highest silt concentration level is recorded in 1977 with 920 kg / m ³ . eos
the most sediment - laden river in the world . The recorded highest annual level of silts discharged into Yellow_River is 3.91 billion tons ( 1933 ) . Highest silt concentration level is recorded in 1977 with 920 kg / m ³ . eos
is 3.91 billion tons ( 1933 ) . Highest silt concentration level is recorded in 1977 with 920 kg / m ³ . These sediments later deposit in the slower lower reaches of Yellow_River , elevating the river bed and creating the famous ` ` river above ground '' . eos
, elevating the river bed and creating the famous ` ` river above ground '' . In Kaifeng , Yellow_River is forty meters above the ground level . Yellow_River is called the ` ` Mother River of China '' and ` ` the Cradle of Chinese Civilization '' in China , as eos
is forty meters above the ground level . Yellow_River is called the ` ` Mother River of China '' and ` ` the Cradle of Chinese Civilization '' in China , as the Yellow River basin is the birth - place of the northern Chinese civilizations and the most prosperous region in the early Chinese history . eos
is called the ` ` Mother River of China '' and ` ` the Cradle of Chinese Civilization '' in China , as the Yellow River basin is the birth - place of the northern Chinese civilizations and the most prosperous region in the early Chinese history . However , the frequent devastating flooding , largely due to the elevated river bed in Yellow_River lower course , has also earned Yellow_River the unenviable distinction as ` ` China 's Sorrow '' . eos
lower course , has also earned Yellow_River the unenviable distinction as ` ` China 's Sorrow '' . eos

is a major watercourse of northwestern North America . Over half of Yukon_River lies in the US state of Alaska , with the other portion lying in and giving Yukon_River name to Canada 's Yukon Territory . Yukon_River is 3,700 km ( 2,300 mi ) long and Yukon_River empties into the Bering Sea at the Yukon - Kuskokwim Delta . eos
lies in the US state of Alaska , with the other portion lying in and giving Yukon_River name to Canada 's Yukon Territory . Yukon_River is 3,700 km ( 2,300 mi ) long and Yukon_River empties into the Bering Sea at the Yukon - Kuskokwim Delta . The average flow is 6,430 m ³ / s ( 227,000 ft ³ / s ) . eos
name to Canada 's Yukon Territory . Yukon_River is 3,700 km ( 2,300 mi ) long and Yukon_River empties into the Bering Sea at the Yukon - Kuskokwim Delta . The average flow is 6,430 m ³ / s ( 227,000 ft ³ / s ) . eos
is 3,700 km ( 2,300 mi ) long and Yukon_River empties into the Bering Sea at the Yukon - Kuskokwim Delta . The average flow is 6,430 m ³ / s ( 227,000 ft ³ / s ) . The total drainage area is 832,700 km ² ( 321,500 mi ² ) , of which 323,800 km ² ( 126,300 mi ² ) is in Canada . eos
empties into the Bering Sea at the Yukon - Kuskokwim Delta . The average flow is 6,430 m ³ / s ( 227,000 ft ³ / s ) . The total drainage area is 832,700 km ² ( 321,500 mi ² ) , of which 323,800 km ² ( 126,300 mi ² ) is in Canada . eos
was one of the principal means of transportation during the 1896 - 1903 Klondike Gold Rush . Paddle - wheel riverboats continued to ply Yukon_River until the 1950s , when the Klondike Highway was completed . Yukon means ` ` great river '' in Gwich ` in . eos
until the 1950s , when the Klondike Highway was completed . Yukon means ` ` great river '' in Gwich ` in . Yukon_River was called Kwiguk , or ` ` large stream '' , in Yupik . eos
was called Kwiguk , or ` ` large stream '' , in Yupik . The Lewes River is the former name of the upper course of Yukon_River , from Marsh Lake to the confluence of the Pelly River at Fort Selkirk . eos
, from Marsh Lake to the confluence of the Pelly River at Fort Selkirk . eos
